[\[41a.1\]]lto ba'i me'i las bshad pa yin no/_/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/_'byung ba lnga'i las bshad pa yin no/_/dwangs ma lus zungs rang rang gis/_/zhes bya ba ni/_lus zungs kyi me'i las bshad pa yin no/_/smin byed kun la zas 'ju ba'i/_/
[\[41a.2\]]me ni lhag pa yin par 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_smin par byed pa me'i drod thams cad kyi nang nas zas 'ju bar byed pa'i pho ba'i me drod gang yin pa de ni lhag cing mchog tu gyur par 'dod pa yin no/_/de ni rtsa ba de 'phel 'phel/_/zad gyur zad pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang
[\[41a.3\]]gi phyir zas 'ju ba'i me drod de ni rtsa ba yin te/_'phel bar gyur na/_me drod gzhan dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur la/_zas kyi me drod de zad par gyur na 'byung ba lnga dang lus zungs kyi me drod kyang zas kyi bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro/_/de bas rigs pas cho ga bzhin/_/zas skom rigs shing
[\[41a.4\]]phan pa yin/_/de 'bad pas bsrung gnas gyur na/_/tshe dang stobs ni gnas par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar rtsa ba yin pa'i rgyu yin pa de bas na/_zas 'ju bar byed pa'i me drod de rigs shing phan pa'i cho ga bzhin du zas dang skom gyi bud shing rjes su mthun par bsrung zhing bskyang ba
[\[41a.5\]]la 'bad pa dang ldan par bya'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_zas 'ju ba'i pho ba'i me gnas par gyur na tshe gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_lus kyi stobs gnas par 'gyur ba yin no/_/mnyam gnas rang gnas 'dug na mnyam/_/mnyam las gzhan 'gro drod mi snyoms/_/mkhris pa shas cher
[\[41a.6\]]rno bar 'gyur/_/bad kan gyis gnod me drod chung /_/zhes bya ba la/_me dang mnyam du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rlung rang gi gnas su 'dug la/_me'i drod kyang mnyam zhing snyoms par 'gyur la/_lam gzhan du 'gro zhing rang gi gnas na 'dug na me'i drod mi snyoms shing cha mi snyoms par 'gyur
[\[41a.7\]]ro/_/me dang mnyam du gnas pa de bad kan gyi shas kyis mnan cing gnod par gyur na/_me drod chung bar 'gyur ro/_/me drod mnyam dang mi mnyam rno/_/chung dang de ltar rnam bzhi yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_me'i drod kyi stobs kyi dbye ba ni cha mnyam pa dang /_cha mi mnyam pa dang /_rno ba dang chung
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]ba ste rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ba yin no/_/gang zhig zas ni legs zos pa/_/legs par 'ju 'di mnyam pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_da la me shas mnyam pa ni zas kyi tshod la sogs pa legs par brtags te/_zos pa de legs par 'ju bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/legs par ma zos myur
[\[41b.2\]]'ju ba'am/_/legs zos ring zhing 'ju mi mnyam/_/zhes bya ba la/_me drod mi mnyam zhing mi snyoms pa ni/_zas kyi cho ga'i tshul bzhin du legs par ma zos kyang myur du 'ju ba'am legs par zos su zin kyang ring zhig na 'ju bar gyur pa yin no/_/zas ni legs par ma zos kyang /_/myur
[\[41b.3\]]'ju me drod rnon po yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_me'i drod rnon po'i mtshan nyid ni/_tshad la sogs pa dang ldan par legs par ma zos su zin kyang myur du 'ju bar byed pa yin te/_de nyid 'phel bar gyur na/_me drod drags ches par 'gyur ro/_/zas ni legs par zos gyur kyang /_/ring nas 'ju zhing
[\[41b.4\]]kha skam dang /_/sbo dang rgyu ma 'khrugs pa dang /_/lci ba me drod chung ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_me drod chung ba ni zas kyi cho ga legs par zos su zin kyang kha skam pa la sogs par byed nas ring zhig na gdod 'ju bar byed pa yin no/_/rgyu ma 'khrugs pa ni sgra mi gsal bar krug krug zer ba'o/_/
[\[41b.5\]]lci ba ni lus kyi khong lci zhing snyom pa'o/_/me drod nyams na 'chi 'gyur zhing /_/skyon med na ni yun ring 'tsho/_/ma snyoms nad ni skye 'gyur bas/_/de'i phyir me drod gtso bo yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gong du smos pa'i me drod nyams shing med par gyur na ni/_'chi zhing srog 'dor bar 'gyur la/_
[\[41b.6\]]skyon med cing nad kyi nyes pa dang ma 'dres na yun ring du 'tsho zhing tshe gnas par 'gyur ro/_/me'i drod che chung ma snyoms par gyur na ni nad rnams skyed par 'gyur la/_de bas na me'i drod ni lus gnas pa yin no/_/zhes bshad do/_/lus stobs lhan cig skyes pa dang /_/dus skyes rigs pa las
[\[41b.7\]]byung gsum/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus kyi stobs kyi tshul ni rnam pa gsum ste/_lhan cig skyes pa dang /_dus kyi dbang gis skyes pa dang /_rigs pa'i sbyor ba las skyes pa'o/_/de la lus sems las byung ba/_/rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i stobs/_/zhes bya ba la/_stobs de dag gi
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]nang nas lus dang sems las byung ba'i stobs rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'am/_tha mal bar gnas pa gang yin pa de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/_/na tshod dus tshigs las byung ba/_/dus skyes yin te/_zhes bya ba la/_na tshod byis pa dang
[\[42a.2\]]dar la bab pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba'i dbang las byung zhing na tshod ji lta ba'i tshul ma skyes pa dang /_dgun la sogs pa'i dus las byung zhing skyed pa'i dus las bskyed pa ste/_de gnyis ni dus las skyes pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/_/rigs pa las/_byung ba spyod lam zas kyis
[\[42a.3\]]bskyed/_/de bzhin gzi bskyed sbyor las byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_de la rigs pa las byung ba'i stobs spyod lam zhes pa lus dang ngag dang yid kyis byas pa'i spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_de bzhin du zas kyi rnam pa bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bldag pa dang /_myang ba la
[\[42a.4\]]sogs pa rnam pa du ma ste/_de gnyis las byung ba ni rigs pa las byung ba zhes bya'o/_/de yang rigs pa ni 'di dang 'di ltar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i tshul nges pa ste/_de las byung ba'o/_/de bzhin du gzi mdangs bskyed pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba de yang rigs pa las byung ba yin te/_
[\[42a.5\]]gzi mdangs bskyed pa'i sbyor ba ni phal cher bcud kyis len pa dang /_ro tsa ba'i sbyor ba yin pas/_de gnyis las skyes pas na gzi mdangs bskyed pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya'o/_/yul phyogs shing ri chu nyung la/_/skams nad nyung skyed byed yin/_/rlan can de las bzlog pa yin/_/
[\[42a.6\]]cha mnyam thun mong yin par bshad/_/ces bya ba ni/_skam sa'i yul phyogs shing dang ri dang chu nyung zhing shas chung ba gang yin pa de ni nad nyung ba skyed cing nad med pa'i rgyu yin la/_yul sa rlan can dag ni skams las go bzlog pa yin te/_shing dang ri dang chu mang ba de nad skyed pa yin
[\[42a.7\]]no/_/de gnyi ga'i cha mnyam pa ni thun mong yin te/_gnyi ga'i cha yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rkang dang tshil dang zhag dang gcin/_/mkhris pa bad kan phyi sa khrag_/dwangs ma chu rnams lus gnas pa'i/_/snyim pa re res bskyed par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus dang rkang nas chu'i bar dag gang
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]yod pa ni snyim pa re res bskyed par bya ste/_de'ang /_rkang ni snyim pa gcig go/_/tshil ni snyim pa gnyis so/_/zhag ni snyim pa gsum mo/_/gcin ni snyim pa bzhi'o/_/mkhris pa ni snyim pa lnga'o/_/bad kan ni drug go/_/phyis ni bdun no/_/khrag ni brgyad do/_/dwangs ma ni dgu'o/_/
[\[42b.2\]]chu ni snyim pa bcu'o/_/mdangs dang klad rgyas khu chu ni/_/re re'ang rang gi khyor gang yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dwangs ma la sogs pa gsum po ni re re zhing yang rang gi khyor tshad kyi khyor re re yod par slob dpon dag gis bshad do/_/bud med nu zho snyim do dang /_/zla mtshan snyim pa bzhi
[\[42b.3\]]yod do/_/zhes bya ba la/_bud med rnams la nu zho ni rang gi tshad kyi snyim do yod la/_zla mtshan gyi khrag ni snyim pa bzhi yod pa yin no/_/'di ltar snyim pa dang khyor ba zhes smos pa ni/_rang rang gi lag pa'i tshad kyi che chung la bya'i/_srang tshad kyi yi ge las smos pa ltar srang bzhi dang srang
[\[42b.4\]]gnyis la mi bya ste/_'dir rang gi zhes smos pa'i phyir ro/_/de la snyim pa ni lag pa gnyis sbyar ba las byung ba'o/_/khyor ba ni lag pa gcig skyor te bzhag pa'o/_/lus zungs mnyam nas tshad 'di yin/_/de las 'phel dang zad ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gong du bshad pa'i tshul 'di ni/_
[\[42b.5\]]skyes bu lus zungs cha mnyam par gnas pa las tshad du bya ba yin pas/_tshad de la 'phel ba dang zad par gyur par shes shing rtogs par bya'o/_/khu chu khrag dang sbrum ma'i zas/_/spyod lam mngal gnas dus tshigs nas/_/gang zhig nyes pa lhag gyur des/_/rang bzhin rnam pa bdun du
[\[42b.6\]]bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_khu ba dang /_khrag dang /_sbrum ma'i zas dang /_spyod lam mngal gyi gnas dang /_dus tshigs de rnams las gang zhig nad kyis nyen pa'i dbang gis tshad las lhag par gyur pa des/_khu chu la sogs par gnas pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa bdun bshad de/_rlung gi rang
[\[42b.7\]]bzhin dang /_mkhris pa'i rang bzhin dang /_bad kan gyi rang bzhin dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi rang bzhin te de ltar bdun no/_/khyab dang myur bar byed phyir dang /_/stobs ldan pa dang gzhan ldang byed/_/rang dbang can dang nad mang phyir/_/nad
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]las phal cher rlung stobs can/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung nad kyi rang bzhin ni khyab cing kun tu 'gro ba dang /_myur zhing rengs bar nad skyed pa dang /_stobs dang ldan zhing mthu che ba dang /_mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad ldang bar byed pa dang /_bshang gci la sogs pa 'dren par
[\[43a.2\]]byed pa dang /_rang dbang can rang rgyud du gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du nad mang ba ste/_rlung nad brgyad cu skyed pa'i phyir nad gzhi gsum cha las kyang rlung nad ni phal cher zhes smos pa ni khyad par du byas pa'i tshig smos pa yin no/_/de nyid kyis na rlung gis bskyod pa'i mi rnams ni/_nad kyi bdag
[\[43a.3\]]nyid rdul can skra bshor pags pa gas/_/grang lhags mi bzod brtan dran blo gros spyod mdzad sred/_/blta dang 'gro ba g.yo zhing smra ba shin tu mang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyu de nyid kyis ni rlung gi nad kyis bskyod pa'i mi rlung gis khu chu dang khrag la sogs pa bskyod par 'gyur ba'i mi rnams ni/_nad
[\[43a.4\]]kyi bdag nyid can du gnas pa dang /_rdul gyis gtor ba lta bur skra dang lus la sogs par gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du grang lhags mi bzod cing dro bar 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du brten pa nas 'gro ba'i bar shin tu g.yo zhing brten pa ma yin te/_brtan pa ni sran thub pa'o/_/dran pa ni mi brjed
[\[43a.5\]]pa'o/_/blo gros ni shes rab bo/_/spyod pa ni rtsom pa'o/_/mdza' la sred pa ni yid gcugs par dga' ba'o/_/blta ba ni mthong ba'o/_/'gro ba ni kun tu 'phyan pa ste/_de dag g.yo zhing mi brtan pa'o/_/de bzhin du shin tu mang du smra zhing smra ba la dga' ba yin no/_/bad kan nor nyung tshe thung
[\[43a.6\]]gnyid srab dang /_/gcom chung tshig thogs g.yo zhing skad 'dzer dang /_/chad lta mang du za zhing sgeg dang bcas/_/glu dang dgod dang rngon las 'thab la dga'/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhan yang rlung can gyi mi'i mtshan nyid ni bad kan dang nor nyung ba la sogs pa yin te/_gcom chung
[\[43a.7\]]ba ni tshig phra ba'o/_/tshig thogs pa ni phyed lus pa'o/_/g.yo ba ni mi brtan pa'o/_/skad 'dzer ba ni skad gsang nyams pa'o/_/chad par lta ba ni med par lta ba'i gzhung la dga' ba'o/_/mang du za ba ni lto che ba'o/_/sgeg pa dang bcas pa ni bsgyings tshul dang bcas pa
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]dang glu dang dgod pa'o/_/rngon pa'i las ri dwags shor ba dang 'thab pa la dga' ba rnams dang ldan pa yin no/_/mngar skyur kha dang tsha ba'i ro goms sred/_/lus skem dbyibs reng 'gro tshe sgra dang bcas/_/mi brtan dbang po mi thul dam pa min/_/bud med mi chags bu mang skye mi
[\[43b.2\]]'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gi rang bzhin can gyi bu gang yin pa de ni ro mngar ba la sogs pa'i goms par sred pa dang /_lus skem zhing dbyibs ring ba dang /_'gro zhing rgyu ba'i tshe tshigs sgra 'khrol ba dang bcas pa ste/_'gro zhing 'chags mi brtan zhing g.yo ba dang /_dbang po mi
[\[43b.3\]]thul zhing zhi ba'i spyod pa med pa dang /_dam pa'i spyod pa med cing 'phags pa ma yin pa dang /_bud med rnams la mngon par mi dga' zhing rjes su chags par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bu tsha mang po skye zhing 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba yin no/_/de yi mig ni rtsub cing rdul gyis gang /_/zlum zhing
[\[43b.4\]]mi mdzes 'chi ba lta bu dang /_/phye gdangs gnyid log lta bur snang ba yin/_/de ni shing dang ri 'dzeg mkha' 'phur rmi/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gi rang bzhin gyi skyes bu mig rtsub cing snum pa med pa dang /_rdul gyis gang zhing phyag dar gtor ba ltar snang ba la/_mig gi dbyibs
[\[43b.5\]]zlum pa dang /_mi mdzes shing blta na mi sdug pa dang /_'chi ba'i mig dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba dang /_phye zhing gdangs par gyur ba dang /_gnyid kyis log pa 'dra bar snang ba yin no/_/de bzhin du rmi lam gyi nang du shing chen po la 'dzeg pa dang /_ri la 'dzeg pa dang /_nam mkha' la 'phur
[\[43b.6\]]ba rmi ba yin no/_/skal ngan ser sna che zhing khengs pa dang /_/rku zhing byin snying rtsa rings bcas pa dang /_/khyi dang wa dang bya rgod rnga mo khrag_/byi ba'i mtshan nyid ldan mi rlung can yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gi mtshan nyid can gyi mi ni skal ba ngan cing bkra mi shis pa dang /_ser sna che ba dang /_khengs
[\[43b.7\]]pa dang /_log par rlom pa dang /_rku 'phrog la dga' ba dang byin snying gi rgyab kyi rtsa mtho zhing rtse mo 'khyil zhing /_byin pa'i nywa glo zhing mtho ba yin no/_/de bzhin du khyi dang /_wa dang /_rnga mo dang /_bya rgod dang /_khra dang /_byi ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing de dag gi rang bzhin can gyi gzugs dang ro dang spyod
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]pa rjes su mthun pa gang dag yin pa dang ldan te/_de lta bu'i mi ni rlung gi rang bzhin can yin par shes par bya'o/_/mkhris pa me 'dra me las byung yin phyir/_/mkhris pa rgyas pa skom dang bkres shas che/_/mdog ser lus tsha rkang lag gdong yang dmar/_/skra
[\[44a.2\]]ser spu nyung dpa' zhing nga rgyal che/_/zhes bya ba la/_drang srong thang la 'bar gyi gzhung gis mkhris pa rang nyid me dang 'dra ste/_smin pa la sogs pa'i las byed pas me'i sgrar bshad do/_/me'i rang bzhin can gyi mtshan nyid yin pa'am/_me drod kyi gzhi yin par gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[44a.3\]]de las byung ba ni tshigs ma'i rang bzhin can gyi khrag ni mkhris pa yin la/_de'i phyir mkhris pa de rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i srog chags rnams ni skom pa dang bkres pa'i shas che ba dang lus kyang mdog ser ba dang /_lus tsha ba 'ur 'ur por gnas pa dang /_rkang pa dang lag pa dang gdong
[\[44a.4\]]gi kha dog dmar ba dang /_skra dmar ser du gnas pa dang /_spu'i tshogs 'byi zhing nyung ba dang /_dpa' zhing rtul phod pa dang /_nga rgyal che zhing khengs pa dang bcas pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/phreng ba byug pa rgyan la lhag par dga'/_/spyod bzang gtsang sbra che zhing mnyes gshin la/_/'byor
[\[44a.5\]]dang rtul phod blo gros stobs dang ldan/_/'jig rten dgra bo 'ang skyabs 'ongs skyob par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris pa can gyi mi ni/_phreng ba la sogs pa la mngon par dga' ba yin te/_phreng ba ni me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa'o/_/byug pa ni dri zhim pos bskus pa'o/_/rgyan ni mu tig gi
[\[44a.6\]]phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan cing bzhag pa'o/_/spyod pa bzang po ni byed spyod mdzes pa'o/_/gtsang sbra che ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid skyon med pa'o/_/mnyes gshin pa ni bran g.yog la sogs pa la byams pa'o/_/'byor pa ni longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/rtul phod pa ni nyams
[\[44a.7\]]kyis mi lcogs ba dag kyang byed par spro ba'o/_/blo gros kyi stobs ni shes rab kyi nus pa ste/_de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o/_/de bzhin du 'jigs shing skrag pas nyen pa'i dgra bo dag kyang skyabs su 'ongs shing 'dud par byed pas na/_skyob cing gnod pa las srung bar byed pa yin no/_/yid
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]gzhungs tshigs kyi mtshams dang sha ni rab tu lhod/_/bud med mi dga' khu ba dang ni 'dod pa chung /_/gnyer ma'i tshogs dang skra dkar mig sngo'i gnas gyur la/_/zas ni mngar dang bska dang kha bsil za bar dga'/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi ni yid gzhungs
[\[44b.2\]]shing blo dang ldan pa dang /_rus pa'i tshigs kyi 'brel mtshams sha'i tshigs lhod cing grims bag med pa dang /_bud med rnams de la dga' bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_khu ba'i shas chung ba dang /_'dod pa chung zhing 'khrig pa la mngon par mi gdu ba dang /_phags pa'i tshogs gnyer ma mang
[\[44b.3\]]ba dang /_skra dkar lhags pa dang /_mig sngo ba'i nad rnams su 'gyur zhing de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_kha zas kyang mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro dang ldan pa la sred cing dga' ba la longs spyod par 'gyur ba yin no/_/than pa mi bzod rngul zhing dri nga la/_/bshang gci bza' btung khro dang
[\[44b.4\]]phrag dog mang /_/rmi lam dong ka ba la sha'i me tog_/glog 'gyu phyogs tshig skar mda' nyi me mthong /_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhan yang mkhris pa can gyi mtshan nyid ni/_tshad pa mi bzod cing bsten mi nus pa dang /_rtag tu rdul 'byung ba dang /_lus dri nga zhing mnam pa
[\[44b.5\]]dang /_de bzhin du bshang gci la sogs pa mang zhing shas che ba dang /_gnyid log pa'i rmi lam gyi nang na dong ka'i shing dang /_de bzhin du pa la sha'i me tog dang /_de bzhin du glog 'gyu ba dang /_phyogs tshig pa dang /_skar mda' lhung ba dang /_nyi ma 'char ba dang /_me chen po 'bar ba
[\[44b.6\]]mthong ba yin no/_/'di yi lus phra mig ser g.yo ba dang /_/rdzi ma srab cing nyung zhing grang la dga'/_/khro dang chang dang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/_/mig ni myur bar dmar por 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu 'di'i mig dbyibs phra ba dang /_mig ser
[\[44b.7\]]skyar gnas pa dang /_rnam par g.yo zhing dgod pa dang /_de bzhin du mig gi rdzi ma'i phyogs srab cing grangs nyung ba dang /_grang zhing bsil ba la mngon par dga' ba dang /_khro zhing 'khrugs pa dang chang 'thungs pa dang /_nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis phog na de'i mig myur du dmar zhing sngo bar
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]'gyur ba yin no/_/tshe ni ran zhing stobs ni 'bring ba dang /_/mkhas shing sdug bsngal dag la sran chung 'gyur/_/stag dang dred dang sbre'u byi la dang /_/gnod sbyin rang bzhin ldan pa mkhris can yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de ni tshe'i tshad ran cing 'bring tsam du gnas pa dang /_stobs shin tu che ba ma yin gyi 'bring
[\[45a.2\]]tsam du gnas pa dang /_mkhas shing blo dang ldan pa dang /_sdug bsngal sran chung zhing nyon mongs pa la bzod par mi nus shing 'jigs pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/gzhan yang stag la sogs pa'i gzugs dang skad kyi nga ro dang /_spyod pa dang rjes su mthun par byed pa ni mkhris pa'i rang bzhin
[\[45a.3\]]can gyi mi yin par shes par bya'o/_/bad kan bsil bas bad kan can bsil zhing /_/rus tshigs mi mngon snum zhing sha rus 'brel/_/bkres skom nyon mongs sdug bsngal than pa bzod/_/blo ldan snying stobs che zhing dam bca' brtan/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir bad kan gyi
[\[45a.4\]]rang bzhin bsil ba yin pa'i phyir/_bad kan can gyi rang bzhin skyes bu yang bsil zhing khong drang ba yin te/_gang gi phyir na 'bras bu rnams ni rgyu dang rjes su mthun par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du bad kan can gyi skyes bu rus pa'i tshogs mi mngon par bags pa'i mdog snum
[\[45a.5\]]pa dang /_sha rus phan tshun 'brel cing gcig la gcig 'byor bar gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du bkres pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams bzod cing sran thub pa dang /_blo dang ldan zhing shes rab che ba dang snying stobs kyi rang bzhin shas che ba dang /_dam bca' ba brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba yin
[\[45a.6\]]no/_/pri yang ku dang dUr ba 'dam bu'i mdog_/tshon dang gi wang pad+ma gser mdog can/_/lag ngar ring zhing brang ni yangs la rgyas/_/dpral ba'i dbyes che skra ni mthug cing gnag_/ces bya ba la/_yang bad kan can gyi mi bri yang ku la sogs pa'i mdog dang ldan par 'gyur te/_la la ni pri yang ku
[\[45a.7\]]lta bu'i mdog can yin no/_/la la ni dUr ba lta bu'i mdog can nas/_la la ni gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba'i bar du 'gyur ba yin no/_/de yang de bzhin du lag ngar ring zhing pus mo'i bar du phyin pa dang /_brang phel che zhing yangs la sha rgyas pa dang /_dpral ba'i dbyes che zhing yangs pa dang /_
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]skra'i tshogs mthug cing mdog gnag par gnas pa yin no/_/lus 'jam snyoms shing yan lag mdzes pa dang /_/mdangs che khu bcud bu tsha g.yog 'khor mang /_/chos ldan tshig rtsub nam yang smra mi byed/_/dgra la zhe sdang 'dam ring sa kho na 'dzin byed/_/ces bya ba la/_yang
[\[45b.2\]]lus kyi sha mdangs 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang /_yan lag gi tshogs snyoms pa dang /_yan lag dbyes shing mdzes pa dang /_mdangs che zhing mang ba dang /_'khrig pa la dga' zhing khu chu'i bcud che ba dang /_brang phel che zhing yangs la shas rgyas pa dang /_de bzhin du bu tsha dang 'khor
[\[45b.3\]]g.yog mang zhing 'phel ba dang /_chos dang ldan zhing chos la dga' ba dang /_tshig rtsub cing zhe la phog pa'i tshig nam yang mi smra ba dang /_de bzhin du dgra bo la zhe sdang gi 'dam rings shing rgyun du 'jog pa kho na du 'dzin cing yid la 'jog pa yin no/_/glang po'i mchog dregs bcas pa lta
[\[45b.4\]]bur 'gro/_/rgya mtsho 'brug dang rnga sgra seng ge yi/_/sgra ldan dran dang brtson 'grus dul bar ldan/_/byis pa'i tshe na'ang ngu dang skom shas chung /_/zhes bya ba la/_glang po che'i mchog dam pa dag dregs pa dang bcas shing ra ro ba lta bu'i 'gros dang ldan par 'gro ba dang /_de bzhin du sgra'i skad gsang rgya mtsho dang 'brug sgra la sogs
[\[45b.5\]]pa lta bu zab pa dang ldan pa dang /_dran zhing brjed pa med pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi 'bad pas bya ba rnams sgrub par byed pa dang /_zhi zhing dbang po bsdams pa la sogs pa'i dul ba dang ldan pa dang byis pa'i gnas nyid na yang ngu ba'i shas chung ba dang /_de bzhin du
[\[45b.6\]]skom zhing zas la gdu ba'i shas chung ba yin no/_/zas ni kha bska tsha dang dro zhing rtsub/_/nyung ngu zos kyang de ni stobs dang ldan/_/mig ni mtha' dmar snum zhing dkyus ring yangs/_/dkar nag rab gsal rdzi ma snyoms dang ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi rang bzhin can gyi skyes bu des kha
[\[45b.7\]]zas kyi rnam pa kha zhing bska ba la sogs pa stobs 'bri bar byed pa dang /_tshad chung zhing nyung zhig zos par gyur kyang de stobs dang ldan par 'gyur gyi/_stobs 'bri bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_de'i mig mtha' dmar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/smra dang khro dang bza' btung
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]spyod pa nyung /_/tshe ring nor mang ring lta tshig 'jam smra/_/dad cing blo zab lta che bzod dang ldan/_/rang bzhin bzang zhing gnyid che las mtha' ring /_/zhes bya ba la/_smra ba'i tshig nyung ba dang /_'khrug pa'i shas chung ba dang /_bza' ba dang btung ba chung ngu za zhing 'thung
[\[46a.2\]]pa dang /_spyod pa ste lus kyi bya ba nyung ba dang /_tshe ring bar gnas pa dang /_nor mang zhing longs spyod che ba dang /_ring du lta ba ste phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don gyi legs nyes rnam par dpyod de 'di ltar byas na las kyi mtha' nges par 'dir 'gyur ro/_/zhes dpyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_tshig
[\[46a.3\]]snyan cing 'jam par smra ba'am/_gtong ba dang ldan pa ste/_gtong ldan snyan smra shes par bya/_/zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/yang de bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pa dad pa dang ldan pa dang /_blo zab cing gting ring ba ste/_de yang /_gang gis sems dga' spyod pa dang /_/khro dang mya ngan 'jigs
[\[46a.4\]]pa yi/_/gnas skabs shes par mi 'gyur ba/_/de ni zab pa yin zhes bya/_/zhes bshad pa dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin du lta ba che ba ste/_don che ba la gtsor 'dzin pa dang /_bzod pa dang ldan pa dang /_'khrug pa med pa dang /_rang bzhin bzang zhing dam pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_sdig pa
[\[46a.5\]]la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_gnyid che zhing stug pa dang /_las kyi mtha' ring zhing yun ring por rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/byas gzo drang mkhas skal bzang ngo tshar ldan/_/bla ma la gus mdza' bshes dag la brten/_/rmi lam pad+ma bya yi phreng bar bcas/_/chu yi gnas dang sprin yang
[\[46a.6\]]mthong ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_phan pa byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba dang /_bsam pa drang zhing g.yo chung ba dang /_mkhas shing bye brag phyed pa dang /_skal ba bzang zhing gzugs bzang ba dang /_ngo tsha dang ldan zhing 'dzem pa dang bcas pa dang /_bla ma la gus shing lus 'dud par 'dod pa
[\[46a.7\]]dang /_mdza' bshes la ngo brtan zhing dus thams cad du byams pas gnas kyi nam yang de'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed la byams pa bsten pa dang /_gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam gyi nang du yang me tog pad+ma dang bya'i phreng ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang bcas pa'i chu'i gnas mtsho la sogs pa
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]mthong ba dang sprin gyi tshogs 'dus pa dag mthong ba yin no/_/tshangs pa drag po dbang phyug chu lha dang /_/nam mkha' lding dang ngang pa glang po mchog_/de bzhin seng ge dang ni khyu mchog dang /_/bad kan can ni rang bzhin 'drar shes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi rang bzhin can gyi mi ni spyod
[\[46b.2\]]pa'i rang bzhin tshangs pa la sogs pa dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/glang po che'i mchog ni sa srung ngo /_/rang bzhin gnyis dang kun las 'byung /_/gnyis gnyis kun gyi yon tan bskyed/_/ces bya ba la/_nad gzhi gnyis po rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_
[\[46b.3\]]bad kan dang /_mkhris pa'am/_bad kan byung ba'i rang bzhin ni gnyis 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin la/_de ni rang bzhin gsum yin par shes par bya'o/_/rang bzhin bzhi pa ni thams cad las skyes pa yin no/_/de ltar na/_yon tan gnyis pa las byung ba de dang rjes su mthun pa'i
[\[46b.4\]]rang bzhin bskyed pa yin no/_/gtsang sbra yod par smra tshogs kyi/_/yon tan gyis ni de ldan bshad/_/ces bya ba rnams de dag gis na rlung la sogs pa'i rang bzhin re re dang gnyis gnyis dang /_kun las byung ba ni gtsang sbra dang yod par smra ba la sogs pa'i snying stobs la sogs pa'i
[\[46b.5\]]yon tan gyis rang rang gi mtshan nyid dang ldan par bshad cing bstan pa yin no/_/de yang gtsang sbra dang yod par smra ba la sogs pas ni snying stobs dang ldan pa yin no/_/mang du smra ba la sogs pas ni rdul dang ldan par bshad do/_/'jig pa la sogs pas ni mun pa dang ldan par
[\[46b.6\]]bshad do/_/de ltar so sor bshad pa dang rang bzhin gnyis dang ldan pas ni gnyis ka dang ldan pa dang /_rang bzhin thams cad kyis ni thams cad dang ldan par ston to/_/de ltar na sems snying stobs la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin bdun bstan pa yin no/_/na tshod bcu drug
[\[46b.7\]]par byis pa/_/de las lus zungs dbang po gzi/_/'phel 'gyur bdun cu'i bar bar ma/_/zad pa phan chad rgan po yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dus kyis byas shing de las byung ba'i lus kyi gnas skabs la ni na tshod ces bya la/_de yang byis pa dang /_bar ma dang /_rgan
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]po'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yin pa las/_skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa'i bar du byis pa yin la/_byis pa'i na tshod de la ni/_dwangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams dang /_mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams dang /_de bzhin du mdangs rnams 'phel zhing rgyas par
[\[47a.2\]]'gyur ba yin no/_/lo bcu bdun lon pa nas lo bdun cu'i bar du ni na tshod bar ma ste/_gnas skabs der lus zungs la sogs pa shas cher 'phel ba dang 'bri ba gnyis kar mi 'gyur ro/_/bdun cu rtsa gcig yan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rgan po yin no/_/na tshod de'i
[\[47a.3\]]skabs su ni lus zungs la sogs pa rim gyis zad cing 'bri ba yin te/_byis pa dang bar ma'i na tshod smos pa las ni gsum pa 'di don gyis ston pa yin no/_/rang rang khru ni phyed dang bzhi/_/lus ni tshe ring bde ba'i snod/_/ces bya ba la/_skyes bu rang rang gi khru'i tshad kyi phyed dang bzhi ni
[\[47a.4\]]skyes bu'i tshad yin pas de dang ldan pa'i lus ni tshe ring ba dang bde ba'i snod yin pas der srog gi dbang po dang /_nad med par legs par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/spu med gnag dang shin tu sbom/_/ring po nyid ni mi mthun bcas/_/smad pa brgyad dang rang nyid ldan/_/gang yin de ni snod
[\[47a.5\]]min 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi lus la rang bzhin gyis spu med pa la sogs pa smad par bya ba brgyad dang rang nyid ldan pa de ni tshe ring ba dang bde ba'i snod du mi 'gyur ro/_/smad pa brgyad ni shin tu sbu med pa dang /_shin tu sbu mang ba dang /_gnag ches pa dang /_dkar ches pa dang /_shin tu sbom pa dang /_
[\[47a.6\]]shin tu phra ba dang /_ring ches pa dang /_thung ches pa dang /_rnam pa brgyad do/_/skra ni rab snum 'jam pa dang /_/phra zhing rtsa ba ma 'dres brtan/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu'i skra kha dog gi mdangs snum pa dang /_'jam zhing mi bshor ba dang /_phra zhing mi sbom pa dang /_rtsa ba ma 'dres shing bu ga re re
[\[47a.7\]]nas skyes pa dang /_brtan zhing mi 'byi ba bsngags pa yin no/_/dpral ba mtho zhing mur 'gram 'byar/_/zla ba kha ma pa 'dra ba bzang /_/zhes bya ba la/_dpral ba ni dpangs mtho zhing dpral mtshams 'byes pa dang /_mur 'gram 'byar zhing legs par gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du zla ba kham pa ste/_
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]zla ba phyed pa'i dbyibs 'dra ba bzang ngo /_/rna ba rgyab phyogs rgya che mdzes/_/rna shal che zhing sha yis rgyas/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba'i rgyab kyi phyogs rgya che zhing mdzes pa dang /_rna shal che zhing sha rgyas pa bzang ngo /_/mig ni dkar nag 'byes pa dang /_/rdzi ma mthug cing snyoms pa bzang /_/
[\[47b.2\]]zhes bya ba la/_mig gi mtshan nyid ni mig 'bras dkar nag 'byes pa dang /_rdzi ma'i tshogs mthug cing snyoms pa dang ldan pa bzang ngo /_/sna yi rtse mo dbugs cher 'byung /_/sha rgyas drang zhing snyoms pa bzang /_/zhes bya ba la/_sna ni mtho zhing legs pa dang /_dbugs chen po
[\[47b.3\]]'byung zhing rgyu ba rung ba dang /_sha rgyas shing ma zhum pa dang /_drang zhing ya yo med pa dang /_snyoms shing mthon dman med pa bzang ngo /_/mchu ni dmar zhing ma 'phyangs pa/_/zhes bya ba la/_mchu bim pa ltar dmar ba dang /_'phyang zhing phyi rol du ldog pa med pa bzang ngo /_/'gram
[\[47b.4\]]pa yangs shing mi 'bur bzang /_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu'i 'gram pa gnyis ni yangs shing rgya che ba dang 'bar 'bur med pa bzang ngo /_kha che/_/zhes bya ba ni/_kha'i zheng ni che ba bzang ngo /_/so yi tshags dam la/_snum zhing 'jam la dkar zhing snyoms/_/zhes bya ba la/_so
[\[47b.5\]]tshags dam zhing legs par gnas pa dang /_mdangs snum pa dang /_'jam zhing snum bag med pa dang /_dkar zhing rnyog pa med pa dang /_snyoms shing mtho dman med pa bzang ngo /_/lce ni dmar zhing yangs la srab/_/ces bya ba la/_lce ni kha dog zangs bzhin dmar ba dang /_yangs
[\[47b.6\]]shing ring ba dang /_srab cing 'jam pa'o/_/kosko che zhing sha yis rgyas/_/zhes bya ba la/_kosko'i dbyibs ni lhun che zhing shas legs par rgyas pa bzang ngo /_/mgrin pa thung zhing sha rgyas zlum/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la mgrin pa ni mgo bo'i rten te/_mtshams thung zhing ha cang mi ring ba
[\[47b.7\]]dang /_shas legs par rgyas pa dang /_zlum zhing bum pa'i mgul pa ltar gnas pa bzang ngo /_/phrag pa mtho zhing sha yis rgyas/_/zhes bya ba la/_phrag pa'i dpangs mtho ba dang /_shas legs par rgyas pa bzang ngo /_/lto ba zlum zhing lte ba ni/_/zab cing mtho la g.yas su 'khyil/_/
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]zhes bya ba la/_lto ba'i dbyibs cung zad zlum pa dang /_lte ba zab cing dma' ba dang /_kun nas mdzes par mtho ba dang /_g.yas su 'khyil pa bsngags so/_/rkang pa lag pa legs gnas shing /_/sen mo 'jam zhing mtho la dmar/_/snum zhing kun
[\[48a.2\]]dmar sha rgyas pa/_/sen mo ring zlum bug med/_/ces bya ba la/_rkang pa dang lag pa'i phyogs ni sa la legs par gnas shing mthil mnyam par gnas pa dang /_sen mo 'jam zhing mnyen la cung zad mtho zhing dmar ba dang /_mdangs snum pa dang /_kun nas dmar la sha
[\[48a.3\]]rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /_sen mo'i dbyibs ring zhing zlum pa dang /_phan tshun 'byor zhing bu ga med pa bsngags so/_/rgyab zheng che zhing sgal tshigs nub/_/ces bya ba la/_rgyab ni zhing shin tu che zhing sgal tshigs rnams nang du nub pa lta bu bzang ngo /_/tshigs mtshams mi mngon
[\[48a.4\]]dam pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_tshigs rnams kyi mtshams phyir mi 'bur zhing mi mngon pa dang /_dam zhing brtan par rus pa'i tshigs thams cad gnas pa bzang ngo /_/tshigs gsang mtho zhing brtan pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_tshigs kyi gsang mtho zhing ring du 'gro ba dang /_
[\[48a.5\]]brtan zhing zhum bag med pa bzang ngo /_/mdog snum kha dog brtan par gnas/_/zhes bya bya la/_lus kyi mdog mdangs snum zhing kha dog mi 'gyur bar gnas pa bzang ngo /_/rang bzhin gyis 'byung snying stobs can/_/phongs pa'i tshe na'ang zhum pa med/_/ces bya ba la/_rang
[\[48a.6\]]bzhin gyis 'byung zhing rkyen gyis bskyed pa ma yin pas na rang bzhin gyis 'byung ba ste/_de lta bu'i snying stobs dang /_spyod pa brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba dang /_de nyid kyis na phongs shing rgud par gyur pa'i tshe na yang zhum zhing mi dga' ba med pa bzang ngo /_/'ang zhes smos pa ni phongs pa'i tshe na zhum
[\[48a.7\]]pa med pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i tshe na yang khengs pa med pa bsngags so zhes pa'i don to/_/mngal nas brtsams te nad med pa/_/gong nas gong du zhing bzang la/_/shes dang ye shes rgya cher ni/_/'phel zhing rim gyis dge bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dang po mngal du
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]zhugs shing skyes pa nas brtsams te/_gnas pa'i skabs su nad kyi skyon med pa'i rgyu gong nas gong du 'phel zhing gnas pa'i zhing bzang po la brten cing de bzhin du/_rtsol ba la sogs pas rim gyis bskyed pa'i lus ni dge bar 'gyur ba yin te/_de la shes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i bya ba cung zad cig shes
[\[48b.2\]]pa la mkhas pa'o/_/ye shes ni bstan bcos la mkhas par byas pa la sogs pa las skyes pa don dam pa'i ye shes rtogs pa'i bar te/_de dag kyang rgya cher 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar yon tan kun ldan pa'i/_/lus ni ston brgya'i bar dag tu/_/tshe dang dbang phyug 'dod pa yi/_/
[\[48b.3\]]dngos po thams cad rab tu gnas/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i rnam pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i lus ni ston brgyar gnas shing lo brgyar 'tsho ba dang /_de bzhin du dbang phyug gi 'byor ba dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du 'dod cing yid du 'ong ba'i dngos po thams cad rab tu
[\[48b.4\]]gnas pa dang /_yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ro/_/pags pa khrag tshogs snying stobs par/_/brgyad po phyi ma bzhin du mchog_/stobs dang tshad dang shes pa'i phyir/_/lus can rnams kyi snying por bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_pags pa dang sha dang khrag dang tshil dang rus pa dang rkang dang khu chu dang
[\[48b.5\]]snying stobs zhes bya ba'i bar gyi brgyad po ni phyi ma bzhin du mchog yin par bshad pa la/_de yang stobs dang tshad ji tsam pa shes par bya ba'i phyir lus can rnams kyi snying po brgyad po de dag bshad pa yin no/_/snying po kun dang ldan pa yi/_/mchog tu bkur bar bya bar 'gyur/_/rtsom pa kun la'ang re
[\[48b.6\]]bcas dang /_/bzod ldan blo bzang brtan par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar gong du smos pa'i snying po brgyad po thams cad dang ldan pa'i skyes bu ni mchog tu bkur zhing bla mar bya ba nyid du 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bya ba'i las kyi rtsom pa thams cad la re ba dang bcas par
[\[48b.7\]]'gyur ba ste/_bya ba'i las 'di dang 'di dag byas pas nges par 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes re ba dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du bzod pa dang ldan pa ste lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal gyis de zil gyis gnon par 'gyur zhing zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du blo gros bzang zhing
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]shes rab dam par 'gyur ba dang de bzhin du bya ba rnams la brtan zhing mi g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/dregs dang zhum pa med pa ni/_/bde dang sdug bsngal bsten 'gyur la/_/snying stobs can yin rdul can khengs/_/mun pa can ni de ltar min/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang snying
[\[49a.2\]]stobs dang ldan pa ni/_snying stobs kyi shas che ba ni bde ba la spyod pa na yang dregs shing nga rgyal med pas bde ba la brten pa yin la/_sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba na yang zhum zhing gdung ba med par de nyams su myong zhing bsten par byed pa yin no/_/skyes bu rdul can zhe sdang gi shas che ba dag ni/_
[\[49a.3\]]bde ba myong ba na yang khengs shing dregs pas bsten la/_sdug bsngal yang nga rgyal gyis bsten pa yin te/_bdag nyid 'ba' zhig gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba yin no/_/zhes sems pa dang rtag tu nga rgyal bas khengs pa sems la gnod pa'i phyir bdag 'ba' zhig gis
[\[49a.4\]]sdug bsngal mi bzad pa 'di lta bu nyams su myong ba yang bzod par nus so zhes khengs par byed pa bsten pa'o/_/skyes bu mun pa'am gti mug gi shas che ba dag ni/_bde ba yang de ltar bsten par mi byed la/_sdug bsngal yang de ltar bsten par mi byed de/_shin tu rmongs pa'i phyir/_de bde ba myong ba na yang bde ba myong bar mi sems la/_sdug
[\[49a.5\]]bsngal myong na yang sdug bsngal myong bar mi sems la/_gti mug pa'i phyir de'i rgyu bsgrub pa la yang bde ba dang sdug bsngal du 'dzin par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang na mun pa can ni dregs pa dang zhum pa dang bcas pas bde ba dang sdug bsngal la bsten par byed de/_bde ba myong na yang dregs pa'i shas che
[\[49a.6\]]la/_sdug bsngal myang na yang zhum pa'i shas che ba yin no/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims snying brtse ldan/_/tshangs par spyod dang byas pa gzo/_/byams ldan bcud kyis len bsten pa/_/tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba'i sde/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa sde tshan 'di ni tshe
[\[49a.7\]]dang bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa yin te/_de yang sbyin pa ni gser la sogs pa'i dngos po ci nus par gtong ba'o/_/tshul khrims ni nyes pa sdom pa'i bdag nyid do/_/snying brtse ba ni sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang ldan pa'o/_/bden pa ni brdzun med pa'o/_/tshangs par spyod pa ni mya ngan
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]'das pa thob pa'i don du spyod pa'o/_/'khrig pa'i chos spang ba'o/_/byas pa gzo ba ni phan du byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba'o/_/byams pa dang ldan pa ni sems can thams cad bdag dang 'dra bar bde ba dang ldan par byed pa'o/_/bcud kyis len ni tshangs pa dang 'phrog byed dang gnas 'jog la sogs pas
[\[49b.2\]]bshad pa'i tshul bcud kyis len gyi le'u las bshad pa lta bu ste/_sbyin pa la sogs pa 'di dag la brten cing goms par byas na la la ni bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa yin/_la la ni gnyis ka 'phel bar byed pa yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes
[\[49b.3\]]bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_lus kyi gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas lus kyi gnad kyi bye brag bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_yan lag gi bye brag bsten pa'i 'og tu gnad kyi bye brag brtsams pa ni/_gnad rnams kyang yan lag
[\[49b.4\]]la brten pa yin pa'i phyir 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/de yang gnad rnams kyi khyad par dbye ba ni bye brag bstan pa ste gong du bstan pa de bshad par bya'o zhes pa'o/_/gnad ni brgya las bdun lhag pa/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus 'dir gnad ni brgya rtsa bdun yod pas na brgya las bdun lhag pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[49b.5\]]de las bcu gcig brla dang ni/_/de bzhin lag ngar gnyis so sor/_/lto ba la gsum brang la dgu/_/rgyab la bcu bzhi nam tshong ni/_/yan chad sum cu rtsa bdun yod/_/ces bya ba la/_gnad de rnams brla gnyis dang /_de bzhin lag ngar gnyis ka so sor gnad bcu gcig gnas pa yin
[\[49b.6\]]no/_/lto ba la gnad gsum dang /_brang la dgu dang /_rgyab la bcu bzhi dang /_nam tshong yan chad du gnad sum cu rtsa bdun yod do/_/zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o/_/rkang pa'i mthil nas gung mo yi/_/thad ka yi ni mthil 'phrog pa'i/_/gnad yod ces ni rnam par bshad/_/de phug gnad
[\[49b.7\]]kyis 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rkang pa'i mthil gyi dbus na gung mo'i sor mo'i thad ka na/_mthil 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod do zhes sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyis bshad do/_/gnad de phug cing brtol na gzer ba la sogs pa'i nad des 'chi zhing lus dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]yin no/_/mtheb sor dbus na rgya tshigs te/_/de phug bskyod pa'i gnad kyis 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_rkang pa'i mthe bong sen mo'i dbus na rgya tshigs zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de/_/de phug na bskyod pa zhes bya ba'i rlung gi gnad kyis 'chi bar byed do/_/de gong sor gnyis
[\[50a.2\]]shes par bya/_/rkang pa 'khor zhing 'dar bar byed/_/ces bya ba ni/_rgya tshigs kyi gong nas sor gnyis kyis chod par pir zhes bya ba'i gnad yod do/_/de bcad dam phug na rkang pa 'khor zhing g.yo la 'dar bar byed do/_/long mo'i tshigs 'og pir mgo ste/_/de bcad skrang dang nad skyed
[\[50a.3\]]byed/_/ces bya ba la/_long mo'i tshigs kyi 'og na pir gyi mgo 'dra ba dang po'i 'og na pir gyi mgo drangs pa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod do/_/de phug cing bcad na skrang pa dang nad skyed par byed do/_/byin pa rkang pa gnyis kyi bar/_/long mo'i gnad rengs bem por byed/_/ces bya ba la/_byin pa
[\[50a.4\]]dang rkang pa gnyis kyi bar mtshams na long mo zhes bya ba'i gnad phug na na zhing gzer ba dang /_brla zug rengs pa bem por 'gyur zhing tshor ba med par 'gyur ro/_/byin pa'i nang na nywa zhes pa/_/khrag zad pa yis 'chi bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_byin pa'i nang na rting pa yan chad sor bcu gzhal
[\[50a.5\]]ba na/_byin nywa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod do/_/de phug na khrag zad pa'i nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/byin pa brla mtshams pus mo ste/_/de phug gson yang 'theng por 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_byin pa dang brla gnyis 'dus pa'i mtshams na pus mo zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de/_de phug na skyes bu
[\[50a.6\]]gson zhing srog dang ma bral na yang 'theng po nyid du 'gyur ro/_/pus gong sor gsum par gnyan gong /_/de phug brla rengs skrang bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_pus mo'i gong du sor gsum gzhal ba'i gnas na gnyan gong zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de/_de phug na brla rengs pa dang skrang bar byed pa yin no/_/
[\[50a.7\]]brla nang brla dbang zhes bya ba/_/de phug khrag zags brla skam 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_brla'i nang na brla dbang zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de/_de phug cing gtses pa na khrag gzags shing zad pas brla skam par byed par 'gyur ro/_/brla rtsa mig dmar zhes bya ba/_/khrag zad pas ni gzhogs phyed
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_brla'i steng dang chu so'i mtshams na mig dmar zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de/_de phug na khrag zad pas lus kyi gzhogs phyed 'joms shing zad par byed do/_/brla rtsa rlig pa'i bar gyi gnad/_/ljon shing zhes bya ma ning byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlig pa dang brla'i bar na
[\[50b.2\]]ljon shing zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de/_de phug na ma ning ste/_bu tsha med pa'am bud med la spyod pa'i nus pa med par 'gyur ro/_/de dag brla'i'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_de dag ces bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i tshig ste brla rtsa man chad na gnad ji snyed yod pa rdzogs par byas shing bstan zin to zhes bya ba'o/_/dpung de bzhin/_/
[\[50b.3\]]zhes bya ba la/_dpung pa gnyis kyi bar gyi gnad rnams kyang grangs de snyed yod pas na/_de bzhin zhes bya ba la/_de'i khyad par 'di yin te/_/mkhrig ma 'di ni long mor mtshungs/_/gru mo byin 'dra de gnyis phug_/ces bya ba la/_rkang pa dang byin pa'i mtshams su ni long mo zhes bya ba'i gnad
[\[50b.4\]]yod par bshad la/_de lag pa'i skabs su lag pa lag dar gyi mtshams kyi gnad ni mkhrig ma zhes pa'o/_/de bzhin du gru mo dang lag ngar gyi mtshams kyi dpung pa'i dbus kyi phyogs kyi gnas ni gru mo zhes bya'o/_/de ltar mkhrig ma dang gru mo'i gnad gnyis phug na sgur zhing zha bo nyid du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[50b.5\]]zha bo ljon shing 'dra ba ni/_/mchan khung nang na mchan khung 'dzin/_/de phug zha bo nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngar gyi ji ltar ljon shing zhes bya ba'i gnad la/_rlig pa dang brla rtsa'i bar na 'dug pa dang 'dra bar mchan khung gi dbus nas dpung mgo'i bar na mchan khung 'dzin pa zhes
[\[50b.6\]]bya ba'i gnad yod de/_gnad de phug na lag ngar zha zhing sgur ba nyid du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na de dag gis yan lag gi gnad rnams smras pa yin no/_/long kha'i gnad ni gzhang zhes bya/_/de phug gzhang rlung gis 'phral gsod/_/ces bya ba la/_long kha rgyu ma sbom po zhes bya ba dang
[\[50b.7\]]'brel pa ni gzhang kha zhes bya ste/_de phug na bshang ba dang rlung ngam 'phyen 'byung zhing zags pas 'phral du de'i mod la 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/lgang pa gzhu ltar yo ba yi/_/chu so'i gnad ni sha khrag nyung /_/dbus na kha cig thur du lta/_/rked pa'i dbus na srog 'phral 'joms/_/rde'u
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]'byin rma phug gnas ma gtogs/_/de yang ngos gnyis phug ste 'dra/_/gcin 'dzag gnas dang gcig tu phug_/rma ni 'tsho bar shin tu dka'/_/zhes bya ba la/_lgang ba'i gcin gyi gnas te/_de na gzhu'i dbyibs ltar yo ba'i gnad chu so zhes bya ba la/_sha dang
[\[51a.2\]]khrag nyung zhing shas chung bar gnas pa/_dbus na kha gcig yod pa kha thur du bltas pa rked pa'i dbus na yod de/_de phug na srog 'phral du de'i mod la 'jig cing 'jig par byed de gcin nad rde'us 'gags pa 'byin pa'i rma gang zhig byed pa de ma gtogs te/_rde'u 'byin pa'i rma'i skabs der yang
[\[51a.3\]]ngos gnyis su phug cing brtol na snga ma dang 'dra bar 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/chu so'i phyogs gcig tu phug na gcin 'dzag pa'i rmar 'gyur te/_de yang 'tshob cing 'byor pa ni shin tu dka' ba yin no/_/lus ni zhu dang ma zhu'i gnas/_/dbus la lte ba rtsa kun gyi/_/rten yin de yang 'phral
[\[51a.4\]]gsod byed/_/ces bya ba la/_lus kyi dbus su zhu ba dang ma zhu ba'i gnas na lte ba zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gnad yod de/_de yang rtsa thams cad kyi rten dang gnas yin la/_de phug par gyur na yang 'phral du gsod cing srog dang 'bral bar byed pa yin no/_/ma zhu ba yi gnas sgor gyur/_/'dod
[\[51a.5\]]chags sogs gnas snying zhes bya/_/brang dang nu ma lto dbus gnas/_/zhes bya ba la/_ma zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgor gyur pa 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi gnas su gyur pa snying zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de/_de yang brang dang nu ma dang lto ba'i dbus na gnas pa yin te/_de phug na yang 'phral
[\[51a.6\]]du 'chi ba yin no/_/nu 'jing nu ma'i rtsa zhes bya/_/steng 'og sor gnyis nu ma'i gnad/_/de phug bad kan khrag gis ni/_/rim gyis lto 'gengs 'jig par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_nu 'jing dang /_nu ma'i rtsa zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis/_nu ma gnyis kyi gong 'og na yod de/_nu ma
[\[51a.7\]]gnyis kyi gong gi sor gnyis dang /_/nu ma gnyis kyi rtsa ba'i sor gnyis kyi zabs na yod la/_nu 'jing dang nu ma'i rtsa'i gnad de nyid phug pa'i mi ni khrag dang bad kan gyis lto 'gengs nas 'chi bar byed de/_de yang rim bzhin khengs pa/_nu 'jing gi gnad phug pa ni bad kan dang khrag gis/_
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]lto gang ste 'chi la/_nu ma'i rtsa phug pas ni khrag gis khengs te 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/rengs bral brang gi ngos gnyis na/_/rtsa sbubs gnyis po rlung rgyu ba/_/de phug khog pa khrag gis khengs/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde bas 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_rengs pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i gnad
[\[51b.2\]]kyi bye brag brang gi ngos gnyis na rtsa sbubs gnyis po ni rlung rgyu bar byed pa yod la/_de phug cing brtol na khong pa khrag gis bkang nas lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyab kyi sgal tshigs brang gi bar/_/de nyid kyi ni ngos gnyis na/_/phrag pa gnyis kyi 'og na ni/_/mig gsal
[\[51b.3\]]zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod/_/de nyid phug pas khong pa ni/_/khrag khengs rnag ste 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyab kyi sgal tshigs dang mdun gyi brang gi bar te/_nang rgyab dang brang bar de nyid kyi ngos kyi nang na phrag pa'i mgo logs mi gsal ba zhes bya ba gnad gnyis yod par shes par bya ste/_
[\[51b.4\]]de nyid phug na khong pa'i byang khog khrag gis khengs shing /_khrag de nyid rnag tu gyur nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na/_/rked pa'i cha gnyis gnas pa dang /_/rkub tshos ltag gnas sgal tshigs brten/_/rked pa can dang gzhon nur bshad/_/de
[\[51b.5\]]snad khrag zad skya rbab dang /_/gzugs nyams pas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyab kyi sgal tshigs kyi ngos g.yas g.yon gnyis na rked pa'i dbyi zur gyi cha gnyis na gnas pa dang /_rkub tshos kyi ltag na gnas pa'i sgal tshigs rus pa la brten cing gnas pa dang /_rked pa
[\[51b.6\]]can na gzhon nu zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis yod do/_/gnad de gnyis snad cing phug na khrag zad pas skya bo bseng bseng por 'gyur zhing /_gzugs dang gzi mdangs zad pas kha dog mi sdug pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyab kyi sgal tshigs ngos gnyis kyi/_/rked pa'i mtshams ni gang
[\[51b.7\]]yin pa/_/ro smad kyi ni rgyab phyogs na/_/khung bu zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod/_/de snad bskyod pa nyams pa dang /_/ro smad tshor ba med par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyab kyi sgal tshigs ngos gnyis ni rked ba'i mtshams ro smad kyi phyi rol gyi rgyab kyi cha na khung bu zhes bya ba'i gnad
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]gnyis yod de/_de gnyis snad cing nyams pas lus kyi ro smad kyi bskyod cing 'gul ba nyams pa dang /_ro smad la tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig rtsib logs gnyis dang 'brel/_/sta zur rtse mo gnyis steng gi/_/gnas ni g.yogs par
[\[52a.2\]]gyur pa dang /_/ro smad gzhon nu'i rus par gnas/_/de snad ro smad skrangs pa dang /_/nyam chung 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnad gang zhig rtsib logs gnyis kyi gnad dang 'brel zhing rtsib logs kyi bar dang 'dab 'byor ba dang /_sta zur gyi rtse mo gnyis kyi steng gi gnas gang
[\[52a.3\]]yin pa de g.yogs shing bsgribs par gyur pa ni/_gnad ro smad ces bya ste/_de yang gzhon nu zhes bya ba'i gnad kyi rus par gnas pa yin la/_gnad de dag phug cing snad pas ni/_lus kyi ro smad kyi cha skrang ba dang /_nyam chung zhing stobs zhan pa nyid du gyur nas/_de'i 'og tu 'chi ba
[\[52a.4\]]kho nar 'gyur ro/_/rtsib logs gnyis kyi nang dang 'brel/_/rked pa'i ngos gnyis dbus gang gnas/_/thad ka dang ni gyen gnas pa/_/rtsib logs mtshams te de phug na/_/khong pa khrag gis gang ba dang /_/lus dang bral ba nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsib logs gnyis kyi
[\[52a.5\]]nang grol dang 'brel cing 'dab 'byor pa/_rked pa'i ngos gnyis kyi dbus na thad ka dang gyen du gnas pa'i gnad gnyis ni drang srong rnams kyis rtsib logs kyi mtshams zhes bshad de/_de gnyis phug cing snad par gyur na/_khong pa khrag gis gang nas lus dang bral te 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur
[\[52a.6\]]ro/_/nu ma gnyis kyi thad ka'i cha/_/rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la brten pa/_/rtsa chen zhes bya de phug na/_/khrag zad nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_nu ma gnyis kyi rtsa'i thad ka'i cha ni rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la brten cing gnas pa'i gnad ni rtsa bo che zhes bya ste/_de phug na khrag
[\[52a.7\]]zad nas 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/dpung mgo gnyis dang 'brel ba yi/_/sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na/_/phrag pa gnyis kyi sog pa ste/_/de snad bskams shing tshor bral 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dpung mgo gnyis dang 'brel ba'i gnas la/_sgal tshigs kyi ngos gnyis
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]dang yang 'brel pa ni/_sog pa zhes bya ba de la brten pa'i gnad yod do/_/de snad pas ni lag ngar bskams pa dang /_tshor ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/mgrin pa gnyis kyi ngos gnyis rtsa/_/dpung mgo dang ni mgrin pa'i bar/_/phrag pa phrag pa la brten gnad/_/da phug lag ngar bya ba
[\[52b.2\]]nyams/_/zhes bya ba la/_mgrin pa gnyis kyi ngos gnyis kyi mtshams gnyis na dpung pa dang /_mgo bo dang mgrin pa'i bar na gnas pa'i gnad phrag pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de yang phrag pa la brten cing gnas la/_de lta bu de phug na lag ngar gyi bya ba nyams shing 'jas te/_brkyang ba
[\[52b.3\]]ba dang bskum pa'i bya ba byed mi nus par 'gyur ro/_/srol gang gi ni ngos gnyis na/_/'gram pa la ni brten pa'i rtsa/_/bzhi ste de la sngon po gnyis/_/gnyis pa'ang mjing pa'i gnad du bshad/_/de phug skad 'gags mi sdug dang /_/lce yis ro ni mi tshor 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[52b.4\]]srol gong gi ngos g.yas g.yon gnyis na 'gram pa la brten cing gnas pa'i rtsa bzhi yod de/_rtsa de dag gi nang nas rtsa gnyis ni sngon po zhes bya ba'i gnad yin la/_gnyis ni mjing pa'i gnad yin par bshad do/_/de phug cing bcad na skad 'gags pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/de la skad
[\[52b.5\]]'gags pa ni skad thams cad nas thams cad du 'gags par 'gyur ro/_/yang na mi sdug pa ste skad gzhan du 'gyur ba dang /_ro mi tshor zhing lce bem bem por 'gyur ro/_/lkog ma'i sbubs kyi ngos gnyis nas/_/lce dang snar ni 'gro ba'i rtsa/_/so sor bzhi bzhi yod ma mo/_/de
[\[52b.6\]]bcad 'phral du srog 'joms so/_/zhes bya ba la/_lkog ma'i sbubs kyi g.yas g.yon gnyis nas lcer 'gro zhing rgyu ba'i rtsa dang /_de bzhin du snar 'gro zhing rgyu ba'i rtsa so so zhing bzhi bzhi yod de/_de ni ma mo zhes bya ba'i gnad yin te/_de phug na skad cig ma de nyid la 'phral du
[\[52b.7\]]srog 'joms shing 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/mgo bo ske mtshams ltag pa ste/_/de phug mgo bo ldem por 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mgo bo dang ske'i mtshams na ltag pa zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis tshigs mtshams kyi ngos gnyis na gnas te/_de phug na mgo bo ldem zhing 'dar bar
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/rna ba gnyis 'og lcong ba ni/_/rna rtsa zhes bya 'on par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba gnyis kyi 'og na lcong zhing dma' ba na rna rtsa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de/_de gnyis phug na sgra thos pa 'joms shing 'on par 'gyur ro/_/sna yi bu ga
[\[53a.2\]]gnyis dang ni/_/sna yi lam 'gro mgrin nang gnas/_/sbrul mgo zhes bya de bcad na/_/dri mi tshor bar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrul mgo zhes bya ba'i gnad kyi bye brag sna'i bu ga'i gnas g.yas g.yon gnyis dang /_sna'i bu ga'i lam du 'gro ba dang /_de bzhin
[\[53a.3\]]du mgrin pa'i nang na gnas shing brten par byed de/_de'i ming ni sbrul mgo can zhes bya ba ste/_de bcad na dri mi tshor zhing sna'i dbang po nyams par byed do/_/mig gnyis kyi ni phyi rol mtshams/_/smin ma skyes pa'i mtha' yi 'og_/mig zur smin steng dma' bar gnas/_/
[\[53a.4\]]'khyil pa phug pas long bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mig gnyis kyi phyi rol mur 'gram gyi phyogs kyi mtshams smin ma skyes pa'i rgyun chad pa'i mtha' 'og nas mig zur zhes bya ba'i rtsa'i gnad yod do/_/de bzhin du smin ma'i steng na dma' zhing lcong ba la 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i gnad
[\[53a.5\]]yod de/_mig zur dang 'khyil pa zhes bya ba ni gnad bzhi po de dag phug na skyes bu long bar 'gyur ro/_/rna mchan dpral ba'i mtha' na ni/_/mur 'gram zhes bya 'phral 'chi byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rna ba'i mchan dang dpral ba'i mtha' bar na mur 'gram zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis yod
[\[53a.6\]]de/_de phug na skyes bu de 'phral la 'chi zhing myur du dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/mur 'gram gnyis steng skra mtshams na/_/gdeg pa zhes bya gzhag bya yang /_/smin mtshams bar gnas gsum char la'ang /_/zug rngu dag ni ma phyung zhing /_/smin nas rang nyid byung na 'tsho/_/phyung na
[\[53a.7\]]'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mur 'gram gnyis kyi steng ma ltag skra mtshams kyi steng na gdeg pa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod la/_yang gzhag par bya ba'i gnad ni smin mtshams kyi bar na yod de/_gdeg pa gnyis po dang ldan pa ste/_gnad gsum char la
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]mtshon gyi zug rngus zug na/_de ma phyung bar dus gzhan zhig na smin nas rang nyid byung bar gyur na 'tsho bar 'gyur gyi zug de phyung na skyes bu de 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/lce mig sna dang rna ba yi/_/bu ga bzhi ni 'dus ba dag_/rkan dang sgo ru kha bzhi ste/_/bu ga'i gnad ni de rnams
[\[53b.2\]]kyi/_/gnad ni sum mdo ris zhes bya/_/de bcad srog ni 'phral du 'dor/_/zhes bya ba la/_lce dang mig dang sna dang rna ba'i bu ga ste/_rtsa sgo bzhi po 'du zhing 'phrad par gyur ba dag_/rkan gyi phyogs su kha bzhi par gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du bu ga dang 'brel ba'i gnad ni sum mdo
[\[53b.3\]]ris zhes bya ste/_gnad de rnams bcad na skyes bu'i srog 'phral du 'dor bar 'gyur ro/_/thod pa yi ni mtshams lnga po/_/thad ka gyen 'gro mtshams kyi mtha'/_/de snad pas ni mgo 'khor dang /_/smyo zhing dran pa nyams te 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_mgo bo'i thod pa'i mtshams lnga po ni/_
[\[53b.4\]]mtshams kyi mtha' zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de/_de thad ka dang gyen du 'gro bas gnas pa yin la/_mtshams kyi mtha'i gnad de rnams snad pas ni mgo 'khor ba dang /_smyo zhing dran pa nyams pa'i nad kyis skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/spyi bo'i steng na gtsug 'khyil ba'i/_/rtsa dang ldan sbubs
[\[53b.5\]]'dus pa na/_/spu 'khyil bdag po zhes bya ba'i/_/gnad kyis srog ni 'jig par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_mgo bo'i steng gi gtsug rtsa 'khyil pa'i mtshams 'dus pa spu 'khyil ba'i gnas kyi gnad ni ming bdag po zhes bya ste/_gnad de bcom pa na srog 'phral du 'jig cing 'dor bar 'gyur
[\[53b.6\]]ro/_/gang du mnan na shin tu 'gul/_/rab na de ni gnad ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di ni yang gnad rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin te/_lus kyi phyogs gang du mnan na shin tu 'gul zhing 'phar ba dang /_yang de bzhin du mnan par gyur na mi bzod par na ba de ni gnad yin par
[\[53b.7\]]shes par bya'o/_/sha rgyus rus pa rtsa chen dang /_/rtsa dang tshigs ni 'dus pa ru/_/gnad ces bya ste des na der/_/srog ni lhag par gnas pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha la sogs pa nas tshigs kyi bar rang rang gi rigs mthun pa la ltos pa 'dus shing phrad par gyur pa de ni gnad ces
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]bya ste/_de ni na zhing mi bde bar byed pa yin no/_/rgyu des na gnad rnams su srog lhag par gnas pa yin pas der gnod pa byas pas srog la lhag par gnod pa yin no/_/mang du rnam par bstan mod kyi/_/gnad ni rnam pa drug tu bstan/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnad grangs
[\[54a.2\]]mang du bstan mod kyi sha la sogs pa la gnas pa'i rnam pa 'dis gnad kyi grangs ni rnam pa drug kho nar bstan pa yin no/_/srog gi gnas su thun mong pas/_/gnad ni gcig tu gnas pa'ang yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na gnad ni drug tu yang rnam par mi dbye'i/_gzhan du na
[\[54a.3\]]srog gi gnas yin pa'i mtshan nyid du gcig pa'am/_thun mong yin pas gnad ni gcig kho nar bstan gyi/_drug tu rnam par mi gzhag go/_/shar gtogs bcu ste byin lag nywa/_/mthil 'phrog nu 'jing nu rtsa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnad la sha'i rigs su gtogs pa'i gnad ni
[\[54a.4\]]bcu ste/_de gang zhe na/_byin snying dang lag ngar gyi sha'i gnad dbang po'i chu so zhes bya ba bzhi dang /_mthil 'phrog pa zhes bya ba bzhi dang /_nu 'jing dang nu rtse gnyis te bcu yin no/_/rus pa'i gnad brgyad mur 'gram dang /_/rked pa can dang gzhon nu dang /_/ro smad dang ni sog pa'o/_/
[\[54a.5\]]zhes bya ba la/_rus pa la gnad brgyad yod de/_mur 'gram gyi gnad gnyis dang /_rked pa can dang gzhon nu zhes bya ba gnyis dang /_ro smad ces bya ba gnyis dang /_sog pa zhes bya ba gnyis te brgyad yod do/_/rgyus ba'i gnad ni nyi shu gsum/_/gnyan gong zhes bya'i pir dang ni/_/
[\[54a.6\]]pir mgo mig zur rgya tshigs dang /_/phrag pa gzhag dang chu so yi/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyus ba'i gnad ni nyi shu rtsa gsum ste/_gnyan gong gi gnad bzhi dang /_gru mo'i gong gnyis kyi pir zhes bya ba bzhi dang /_pir mgo zhes bya ba bzhi dang /_mig zur gyi gnad gnyis dang /_rgya tshigs
[\[54a.7\]]bzhi dang /_phrag pa gnyis dang /_gzhag ces bya ba gnyis dang /_chu so zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum mo/_/rtsa chen gnad ni rnam dgu ste/_/gzhang dang rengs bral rna rtsa dang /_/sum mdo ris zhes bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa chen po'i gnad ni rnam pa dgu yod par bshad de/_gzhang
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]zhes bya ba gcig dang /_rengs bral zhes bya ba'i gnad dang gnyis/_rna rtsa zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis dang /_sum mdo ris zhes bshad pa bzhi ste dgu'o/_/rtsa lag nas gnad sum cu bdun/_/rtsa chen gnyis dang ma mo sngo/_/'gram pa mchan khung 'dzin sbrul mgo/_/ljon
[\[54b.2\]]shing snying dang lte ba dang /_/rtsib logs mtshams dang nu ma'i 'og_/mi gsal gzhag dang brla dbang dang /_/dmar po zhes bya bzhi bo'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa la gnas pa'i gnad kyi bye brag ni sum cu rtsa bdun yod de/_rtsa bo che gnyis dang /_ma mo brgyad dang /_sngon po gnyis dang /_'gram
[\[54b.3\]]pa'i rtsa gnyis dang /_mchan khung 'dzin pa'i gnad gnyis dang /_sbrul mgo gnyis dang /_ljon shing gnyis dang /_snying gi gnyis dang /_lte ba'i gcig dang /_rtsib logs mtshams kyi gnyis dang /_nu ma'i 'og gi gnyis dang /_mi gsal ba zhes bya ba gnyis dang /_gzhag pa
[\[54b.4\]]gnyis dang /_brla dbang gnyis dang /_dmar po zhes bya ba bzhi'o/_/tshigs la nyi shu 'khyil ba dang /_/mkhrig ma gnyis dang khung bu dang /_/mtshams mtha' gru mo long mo dang /_/ltag pa pus mo bdag po'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshigs la gnas pa'i gnad ni nyi shu ste 'khyil pa zhes bya
[\[54b.5\]]ba'i gnad gnyis dang /_mkhrig ma gnyis dang /_khung bu zhes bya ba gnyis dang /_mtshams kyi mtha' zhes bya ba lnga dang /_gru mo'i gnad gnyis dang /_long mo gnyis dang /_ltag pa'i gnyis dang /_pus mo'i gnyis dang /_bdag po zhes bya ba gcig ste nyi shu'o/_/gzhan dag gzhang sha'i
[\[54b.6\]]gnad ces zer/_/mchan khung 'dzin dang ljon shing dang /_/rgyus pa la brten rna rtsa dang /_/sum mdo ris dang rengs bral dang /_/mig 'gram rtsa ni gnad yin te/_/rtsa chen gnas par de ma bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_slob dpon gzhan dag ni gzhang gi gnad ni sha'i nang du gtogs pas rtsa
[\[54b.7\]]bo che'i gnad ma yin no zhes zer ro/_/de bzhin du mchan khung 'dzin pa dang /_ljon shing zhes bya ba'i gnad bzhi bo ni rgyus pa la brten pa'i gnad yin gyi/_rtsa la gnas pa'i gnad ma yin no/_/zhes zer ro/_/de bzhin du rna rtsa yang rtsa la gnas pa yin gyi rtsa bo che la gnas pa ma yin no/_/
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]sum mdo ris kyi gnad bzhi dang /_rengs bral zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis dang /_mig 'gram gyi gnad gnyis po dag ni rtsa'i gnad yin gyi rtsa bo che dang rgyus pa'i gnad ma yin no/_/zhes zer ro/_/de bas na de dag ni rtsa bo che la gnas par ma bshad do/_/sha yi
[\[55a.2\]]gnad bcad khrag rgyun 'dzag_/sha bkrus 'drar 'gyur sla ba dang /_/skya zhing dbang po nyams pa dang /_/myur du 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_shar gtogs shing gnas pa'i khrag gi rgyun 'dzag pa sha bkrus pa lta bur gyur pa dang /_sla zhing rkyang rkyang por gyur pa dang /_mdog skya
[\[55a.3\]]ba dang /_dbang po'i tshogs nyams pa dang /_myur du 'chi ba kho nar 'gyur ro/_/rus gnas gnad bcad rkang bcas na/_/sla dang bar bar chad cing 'dzag_/ces bya ba la/_rus pa la gnas pa'i gnad bcad na rkang dang bcas pa'i khrag 'dzag pa dang /_shin tu na ba dang /_sla zhing dwangs
[\[55a.4\]]pa dang /_bar bar du rgyun chad cing 'dzag par 'gyur ro/_/rgyus pa'i gnad bcad na zhing 'khrug_/brkyang bskum mi shes gnod par 'gyur/_/'gro dang stan gnas nus pa chung /_/dbang po nyams pa'am 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyus par gnas pa'i gnad bcad na/_na
[\[55a.5\]]zhing kun tu shas cher 'khrugs pa dang /_brkyang ba dang bskum mi shes pa'i rlung nad kyi gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'gro ba la sogs pa la yang nus pa chung bar 'gyur te/_'gro ba ni 'gro zhing bskyod pa'o/_/gnas pa ni sdod pa'am stan la 'dug pa ste/_de dag mi nus par
[\[55a.6\]]gyur pa'am/_yang na dbang po nyams shing mi gsal ba'am/_srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/rtsa chen gnad bcad lbu ba dang /_/sgra bcas 'byung zhing dran nyams 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa bo che la gnas pa'i gnad bcad na khrag lbu ba dang sgra dang bcas pa 'byung zhing dran pa nyams
[\[55a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/rtsa yi gnad bcad khrag ska zhing /_/rgyun mi 'chad par mang du 'byung /_/de zad mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/_/skom rmongs skyigs bus 'debs pas 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa la gnas pa'i gnad bcad na khrag ska bar 'byung ba dang /_rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba dang /_
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]mang du 'byung bar 'gyur la/_des na khrag de zad pas mgo 'khor ba la sogs pas 'chi bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/lus ni gra ma lta bus khyab/_/'tshob kyang sgur po'am [(]'thing [,]'theng [)]por 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu de'i lus nas kyi gra ma lta bus khyab par snang ba dang /_rma de 'tshob
[\[55b.2\]]cing 'byor par gyur na yang lus sgur ba dang yan lag 'jas shing 'theng por 'gyur ro/_/tshigs gnad stobs dang spyod pa nyams/_/lus skem tshigs ni skrang bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshigs la gnas pa'i gnad bcad na stobs zad pa dang /_lus kyi g.yo 'gul gyi spyod pa
[\[55b.3\]]nyams pa dang /_lus kun skem zhing sbeg pa dang /_tshigs kyi tshogs rnams skrang bar 'gyur ro/_/lte ba mur 'gram bdag po gzhang /_/snying dang chu so sum mdo ris/_/ma mo brgyad dang bcu dgu po/_/'phral du srog ni gcod par byed/_/de rnams 'phral du mi 'chi yang /_/zhag
[\[55b.4\]]bdun gyis ni nges par 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_lte ba dang mur 'gram la sogs pa'i gnad bcu dgu phug cing bcad na 'phral du de'i mod la 'chi zhing gsod par byed la/_gal te tshe'i lhag ma yod na yang zhag bdun gyis nges par 'chi'o/_/de las lhag par ni nges par mi 'tsho'o/_/
[\[55b.5\]]rengs bral mthil 'phrog rtsib logs mtshams/_/rked pa can gzhon mtshams kyi mtha'/_/mur rtsa dbang po chu so'i gnad/_/rgyab tshigs mi gsal rtsa chen dang /_/ro smad nu 'jing sum cu gsum/_/zla ba'am zla phyed son nas ni/_/dus gzhan du ni 'chi bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_
[\[55b.6\]]rengs bral la sogs pa'i gnad sum cu rtsa gsum phug cing /_snad pa ni 'phral du 'chi bar mi byed na yang zla ba phyed dam zla ba gcig gis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/brdeg dang gzhag pa zhes bya gsum/_/der ni zug rngu byung gyur na/_/rlung gis sha dang tshil rkang dang /_/klad rgyas dag ni skems
[\[55b.7\]]par byed/_/mtshon phyung lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/'byung zhing srog ni 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_brdeg pa zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis dang gzhag pa zhes bya ba ste/_gsum po de dag tu mtshon gyis zug rngu zug pa phyung na 'chi bar 'gyur gyi/_/zug rngu ma phyung bar ni myur du 'chi bar
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir zug rngu phyung bas 'chi zhes bya/_de zug rngu phyung yang rlung byung ste/_des lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba bskyed nas srog 'joms par 'gyur la/_ci zhig byas nas 'joms she na/_sha la sogs pa bskams pas gsod par byed do/_/sbrul mgo
[\[56a.2\]]mig zur rna rtsa dang /_/sngon po 'gram gnas ltag pa'i gnad/_/phrag pa'am phrag sogs 'khyil pa dang /_/ljon shing brla dbang khung bu dang /_/mig dmar pus mo'i gnad dang bcas/_/mchan 'dzin pir 'dra gru mo'i gnad/_/de ltar gnad ni bzhi bcu bzhis/_/rkang lag 'jas
[\[56a.3\]]par byed 'gyur ram/_/gal te tshabs cher snad gyur na/_/des ni srog kyang 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sbrul mgo la sogs pa'i gnad bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi snad pas ni/_rkang lag 'jas shing 'phye bo la sogs pa'i gnod pa skyed par 'gyur la/_gal te de dag bsod nams ma
[\[56a.4\]]yin pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis snad tshabs chen srog 'joms shing 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ro/_/pir mgo 'dra dang long mo dang /_/mkhrig ma'i gnad brgyad nad tshabs skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_pir mgo 'dra ba la sogs pa'i gnad brgyad po phug pas ni shin tu nad tshabs chen po skyed
[\[56a.5\]]par 'gyur ba yin no/_/de las ljon shing mchan khung 'dzin/_/brla dang pir mgo lta bu ste/_/bcu gnyis sor gcig tshad yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnad de rnams las ljon shing la sogs pa gnad bcu gnyis kyi tshad ni rang gi sor tshad kyi sor gcig gi tshad du gnas pa yin no/_/
[\[56a.6\]]mkhrig ma dang ni long mo dang /_/nu ma'i rtsa ba sor gnyis tshad/_/ces bya ba la/_gnad de rnams la mkhrig ma'i gnad gnyis dang /_long mo'i gnad gnyis dang /_nu ma'i gnad gnyis te/_gnad drug po de dag gi tshad ni sor gnyis su gnad pa yin no/_/pus mo gru mo sor gsum
[\[56a.7\]]tshad/_/ces bya ba la/_pus mo'i gnad gnyis dang /_gru mo'i gnad gnyis te/_bzhi po'i tshad ni sor gsum yin no/_/gzhang dang chu so lte ba snying /_/sngon po mtshams mtha' ma mo dang /_/pir 'dra sum mdo ris 'gram pa/_/gnad ni nyi shu rtsa dgu'i tshad/_/rang gi lag mthil
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]tshad yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhang kha la sogs pa'i gnad kyi khyad par nyi shu rtsa dgu rang gi lag mthil tsam gyi tshad du gnas pa yin no/_/lhag ma gnad ni lnga bcu drug_/sor phyed kyi ni tshad du 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_de ltar tshad bshad pa'i gnad kyi lhag ma tshad ma bshad
[\[56b.2\]]pa dag ni lhag ma yin la/_de dag ni grangs lnga bcu rtsa drug yod de/_de dag gi tshad ni rang gi sor phyed yod par 'dod do/_/gzhan dag gnad de til 'bru ste/_/'bras tsam gyi ni tshad du 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_sman pa gzhan dag ni gnad de dag til 'bru tsam gyi tshad du gnas par
[\[56b.3\]]'dod la/_gzhan dag ni 'bras tsam gyi tshad du yod do/_/zhes 'dod do/_/rtsa bzhir bshad pa gang yin pa/_/lus kun brtas par byed pa rnams/_/de ni gnad la gnas pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngar gang rtsa bzhi por rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'dres pa dang /_nad med
[\[56b.4\]]pa ste rtsa bzhi po grangs bdun brgya yod par sngar bshad la/_gang yin pa des ni lus ma lus pa thams cad la brtas shing tshim par byed pa yin te/_de dag thams cad kyang gnad la gnas shing brtan pa yin no/_/des na de phug khrag drag 'byung /_/lus zungs rnams ni zad pa'i phyir/_/
[\[56b.5\]]rlung 'phel nad ni mi bzad 'debs/_/rlung gis mkhris pa rgyas par byed/_/mkhris pa rgyas par gyur bas na/_/skom dang mgo 'khor skam dang myos/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir rtsa thams cad gnad la gnas pa yin pa'i rgyu des na/_rtsa de phug cing khrag drag tu phyung zhing shas cher
[\[56b.6\]]brten na des na lus zungs bdun po rnams zad par byed par 'gyur la/_lus zungs de zad pas rlung nad skye zhing 'phel ba'i gnas skabs su gyur nas mi bzad pa'i nad kyis 'debs shing na ba dang /_gzer ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba de skye zhing 'debs la/_yang rlung de mkhris pa'i tshogs kyi nad
[\[56b.7\]]rgyas shing 'phel bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/mkhris pa des rgyas shing bdo bar 'gyur ro/_/skom dad dang mgo 'khor ba dang /_kha skams pa dang /_myos pa'i nad skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lus rngul tshigs 'bye lus lhod dang /_/de ni gshin rje'i dbang du 'gro/_/zhes bya ba la/_des na gnad du
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]phug cing snad pa'i skyes bu de lus rngul zhing tshigs 'bye ba dang /_lus lhod cing shig shig por gyur bas/_de gshin rje'i dbang du 'gro zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gnad gcod na ni myur ba ru/_/lus kyi tshigs ni chod 'gyur te/_/tshigs kyi phyogs su bcad pas na/_/rtsa
[\[57a.2\]]ni 'khums par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnad gcod cing snad par gyur ba na myur ba nyid du lus kyi rkang pa dang lag pa la sogs pa'i tshigs chod cing snad par 'gyur/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshigs kyi phyogs su bcad pa'i phyir/_rtsa thams cad kyang 'khums shing gcod par byed pa yin no
[\[57a.3\]]de la srog chags rnams kyi srog_/khrag gnas na ni gnas pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la srog chags rnams kyi srog ni shas cher khrag la gnas pa'i phyir/_de'i nang na gnas zhing skyon med na ni/_srog de yang gnas par 'gyur ba yin no/_/de bas gnad min legs phog ni/_/nges
[\[57a.4\]]par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir gnad de phug cing chod pas ni srog chags 'chi bar byed pa yin gyi/_gzhan du snad cing rma byung ba tsam gyis ni 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na gnad ma yin par log par phog cing snad par gyur na/_mda' brgya phog kyang 'chi bar mi
[\[57a.5\]]'gyur ba'i gnad ni yod pa kho na yin no/_/'ga' zhig sman pa'i yon tan dang /_/phyogs gcig tu ni phog pa yis/_/'tsho bar gyur yang de yi ni/_/dbang po ma tshang nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir srog chags 'ga' zhig gnad du phog pa yod na/_yang sman pa mkhas
[\[57a.6\]]pas bcos ba'i yon tan nam/_gnad kyi phyogs gcig gi mthar phog pas gnad du phog kyang 'tsho bar 'gyur mod kyi/_'on kyang de'i dbang po ma tshang zhing zha bo'am 'theng po nyid du 'gyur ba yin no/_/de bas 'bad de gnad du ni/_/thal sman me btsa' la sogs spang /_/zhes bya ba
[\[57a.7\]]la/_gang gi phyir gnad la phog cing snad pa ni gnod pa dang bcas shing srog la gnod pa byed pa yin pa de bas na thal sman rnon po dang /_me btsa' gdab pa la sogs pa yang gnad du mi bya bar spang bar bya'o/_/sogs pa smos pas ni bse shing gi 'bras bu dang /_ka pid tha'i khu ba la
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]sogs pa dag 'bad de gnad du ma phog par spang zhing dor bar bya'o/_/gnad du phog na chung ngus kyang /_/phal cher shin tu gnod pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir gnad du phog na tshabs chung ngus kyang phal cher zhes pa mang du shin tu gnod cing sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no/_/
[\[57b.2\]]de bzhin gnad la brten pa'i nad/_/rab tu 'bad pas gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnad du phog cing snad pa la 'ba' zhig gis gnod pa skyed par ma zad kyi/_gnad rnams kyang gnad rnams la brten cing gnas par gyur na/_mtshon gyis phog ba dang 'dra bar gnod pa skyed pa
[\[57b.3\]]yin pas/_de ni shin tu 'bad cing brtson pas gso dgos pa'am/_'bad pas gsos kyang 'tsho ba dka' ba yin par ston to/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba
[\[57b.4\]]las/_lus kyi gnad kyi le'u bzhi pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de la lus kyi 'gyur ba'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnad kyi bye brag shes par byas pa'i 'og tu 'di brtsams pa'i dgos pa ni 'di yin te/_'chi bar byed pa'i rgyu
[\[57b.5\]]yin pa'i phyir gnad ces bya ba la/_'chi ba de yang rang bzhin snga ma las 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid 'chi ltas kyi rnam par 'gro ba rnams sngar gnas pas na/_'dir smos pa yin no/_/lus kyi 'gyur ba ni rang bzhin snga ma las gzhan du 'gyur ba ste/_de'i bye brag gam khyad par shes shing rtogs
[\[57b.6\]]par bya na/_gang na yod pa de bshad par bya'o/_/zhes pa'o/_/'gyur ba de ji lta bu yin zhe na/_de'i phyir smras pa ni/_ji ltar 'bras bu me tog dang /_/me yi du ba char gyi sprin/_/phyis 'byung mtshan ma yin pa ltar/_/de bzhin 'chi ltas las nges 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul ji ltar 'bras
[\[57b.7\]]bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sngon du me tog 'byung ba dang /_me 'byung ba'i sngon du du ba 'byung ba dang /_char 'bab pa'i dus su sprin 'dus pa dag ni rgyu sngar byung ba 'bras bu phyis 'byung ba'i mtshan ma yin pa ltar/_tshul de bzhin du rang bzhin las gzhan du 'gyur ba las 'chi bar shes par
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]'gyur ba'i ltas sam mtshan ma yin pas/_de las phyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur bar ston pa yin no/_/'chi ltas med na mi 'chi la/_/'chi ltas snang na 'tsho mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang la sngar 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma'i ltas med na/_ltas
[\[58a.2\]]kyis mtshon pa'i 'chi bar yang med pas mi 'chi la/_de bzhin du 'chi ltas snang ba las kyang 'tsho bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/'chi ltas 'chi ltas min zhes pa/_/mi mkhas 'chi ltas med min shes/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang dag par na gang 'chi ltas nyid du ston par 'os pas de
[\[58a.3\]]la yang 'chi ltas ma yin par shes la/_'chi ltas med pa dag la yang 'chi ltas med pa mi shes te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi mkhas shing 'chi ltas dang 'chi ltas ma yin pa shes pa la ma byang bas/_'chi ltas yod med mi shes pa yin no/_/la la rten dang brten pa po'i/_/khyad par gyis
[\[58a.4\]]de gnyis su 'dod/_/nad kyi tshul ni mang po las/_/'chi ltas tshul du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/nad zhi na ni zhi 'gyur la/_/brtan par gnas na 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang sman pa gzhan dag ni 'chi ltas de rten gyi lus dang /_brten pa'i nad la sogs pa khyad par gyis
[\[58a.5\]]te/_rnam pa gnyis su 'dod la/_de yang rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi tshul rnam pa mang po las 'chi ltas kyi tshul du snang zhing 'byung bar 'gyur bde dag las rlung la sogs pa'i nad zhi bar 'gyur na/_de las byung ba mtshan ma yang zhi bar 'gyur la ma zhi bar brtan par gnas pa ni/_
[\[58a.6\]]de nges par 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur bas 'chi ltas zhes bya'o/_/zhes zer ro/_/gzugs dang dbang po skad dang mdog_/gzugs brnyan bya ba sogs pa dang /_/dngos po dag ni gzhan la yang /_/tha mal pa las rgyu med par/_/gzhan du gyur gang mdor gang ni/_/'chi ltas yin
[\[58a.7\]]par de shes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzugs ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi rnam pa'o/_/dbang po ni mig la sogs pa'o/_/skad ni nga ro'o/_/mdog ni 'byung ba chen po lnga'i rang bzhin rnam pa lnga'o/_/gzugs brnyan ni nyi ma dang chu dang me long la sogs par gang zhig snang ba'i gzugs dang mthun
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]par byung ba'o/_/bya ba ni/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las su bya ba'i rnam pa mang po'o/_/sogs pa zhes bya ba ni lus su gtogs pa'i dngos po gzhan dag kyang bsdu'o/_/de ltar na gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos por gtogs pa de dag dang /_'dir smos pa'i rnam pa gzhan dag ste/_/
[\[58b.2\]]blo dang dran pa dang rang bzhin brtan pa la sogs pa'i sems kyi spyod pa dag tha mal pa ste/_rang bzhin du gnas pa las rgyu med pa ste 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang med bzhin du glo bur gzhan du 'gyur zhing snang ba mdor bsdu na/_de lta bu gang yin pa de ni 'chi ltas yin pa shes par bya'i/_/rgyu gang yang
[\[58b.3\]]rung ba las gzhan du gyur pa ni 'chi ltas su ni gzung ngo /_/skra dang ba spu ma bskus par/_/snum gyis bskus ltar gang snang dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_'gro ba gang zhig skra dang spu rnams ma bskus par bskus shing byugs pa ltar snang ba de yang /_dus kyis bskus shing 'chi bar 'gyur
[\[58b.4\]]ba yin no/_/gang zhig mig ni rab g.yo dang /_/mi 'gyur phyir byung khung bur zhugs/_/yo dang bgrad dang 'dzums pa dang /_/bcum zhing smin ma smad pa dang /_/'khrul dang mthong ba nyams pa dang /_/sre mo'i mig ltar blta ba dang /_/thi ba 'dra dang mgal me 'dra/_/mchi ma 'dzag
[\[58b.5\]]cing rdzi ma 'khrugs/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du mi gang zhig mig rab tu g.yo zhing 'gul ba dang /_yang na mi 'gyur zhing har har por 'dug pa dang /_yang na phyir 'byung zhing glo ba dang /_yang na mig 'bras khong du zhugs shing gting du song bar snang ba dang /_yo zhing ma snyoms par
[\[58b.6\]]snang ba dang /_lhag par bgrad cing gdangs pa dang /_de bzhin du shas cher 'dzums shing mi 'byed pa dang /_smin ma bcum zhing 'dus pa 'gyur ba'am/_khyad par du smad cing dma' bar gyur pa dang /_yang de bzhin du 'khrul par mthong zhing log par mthong ba dang /_mthong ba
[\[58b.7\]]nyams shing rtul ba dang /_de bzhin du sre mo'i mig ltar blta ba dang /_thi ba'i mdog ltar snang ba dang /_mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba lta bur snang ba dang /_rgyu med par mchi ma 'dzag cing 'byung ba dang /_de bzhin du rdzi ma 'khrugs shing g.yo bar 'gyur ba ste/_de dag kyang nad la
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]sogs pa'i rgyu med par snang ba ni 'chi ltas yin no/_/sna ni shin tu gdangs pa dang /_/zhom dang 'brum phran gyis khyab dang /_/skrang dang gas dang rnyid pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du gang zhig gi sna rgyu med par glo bur du gdangs shing yangs par snang
[\[59a.2\]]ba'am/_yang na zhom zhing 'dus par 'gyur/_'brum phran rnams kyis kyang khyab cing gang ba dang /_skrang zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /_gas shing pags pa zhig pa ltar snang ba dang /_rnyid cing skams pa yang 'chi ltas yin no/_/gang gi ma mchu 'phyang ba dang /_/ya mchu gyen du
[\[59a.3\]]brdzes pa dang /_/gnyi ga 'dzam bu smin 'drar snang /_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang zhig ma mchu thur du 'phyangs pa dang /_ya mchu gyen du brdzes shing ldog par 'gyur ba'am/_yang na mchu gnyis ka 'dzam bu smin pa ltar kha dog nag por snang ba yang 'chi ltas so/_/so nag
[\[59a.4\]]gseg mar bcas pa dang /_/dmar zhing so zho nag nog can/_/glo bur rgyu ni 'byung ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhig so gnag par gyur ba dang /_gseg mar bcas pa ste/_rdo'i gseg ma phra mo lta bu byung ba dang /_yang na dmar zhing zangs ltar snang ba glo bur du so zho chags pa'am/_
[\[59a.5\]]'dam gyis bskus pa ltar nag nog tu gyur pa'am/_glo bur rgyu med par 'khrul zhing 'byung ba yang 'chi ltas so/_/lce ni yo dang rtag tu 'byin/_/skrang dang skams dang lci dang gnag_/gos dang rtsub dang tshor ba med/_/ces bya ba la/_gang gi lce glo bur du yon por gyur pa dang /_rtag tu
[\[59a.6\]]phyir 'byin pa dang /_skrang zhing spo ba dang /_skams shing ring pa dang /_lci zhing mthug pa dang /_kha dog gnag pa dang /_ljan ljin gyis gos pa dang bcas pa dang /_rtsub cing tsher mas khyab pa ltar gnas pa dang /_tshor ba med cing be+em por gyur pa yang 'chi ltas so/_/mjing pas mgo ni
[\[59a.7\]]mi theg dang /_/rang gi ltag rgya ba khur ltar lci/_/'gram pas kha na gnas pa yi/_/kha zas bldad par mi nus pa/_/zhes bya ba la/_mjing pa ni ske ba ste/_des mgo bo mi theg cing brten par mi nus pa dang /_gang rang gi ltag pa rgyab khur ltar shin tu lci bar sems pa dang /_gang gi 'gram
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]pas kha zas bldad cing mid par mi nus pa de yang 'chi ltas yin no/_/gang zhig rgyu med par yan lag_/shin tu lci ba'am shin tu yang /_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang zhig nad la sogs pa'i rgyu med par brla dang dpung pa la sogs pa'i yan lag shin tu lci ba'am/_yang na lan 'ga' zhig
[\[59b.2\]]tu yang bar sems pa yang 'chi ltas so/_/dug dang snad pa med pa yang /_/bu ga rnams las khrag 'byung dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang skyes bu gang dug 'thungs pa'am lus la snad pa med par gyur na/_mig la sogs pa'i bu ga rnams las khrag 'byung ba yang 'chi ltas yin no/_/
[\[59b.3\]]gang zhig pho mtshan nub pa dang /_/rlig pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi pho mtshan nub cing gyen du brdzes pa dang /_rlig pa thur du 'phyang ba'ang 'chi ltas so/_/de las go bzlog gyur pa rnams/_/thams cad 'chi bdag dbang du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang gi
[\[59b.4\]]pho mtshan dang rlig pa de las go bzlog pa ste/_pho mtshan 'phyang bar gyur la/_rlig pa nub par gyur pa yang 'chi ltas so/_/de ltar na/_skra dang ba spu ma bskus par/_/zhes bya ba nas/_de las go bzlog gyur pa rnams/_/zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis bstan pa'i mtshan ma de dag dang
[\[59b.5\]]ldan pa thams cad kyang 'chi bdag gi dbang du 'gyur zhing 'chi ba'i ltas yin no/_/zhes thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/_/gang gi rtsa ris sngon med par/_/zla ba tshes pa lta bu ni/_/dpral ba'am chu so'i steng na gnas/_/de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang
[\[59b.6\]]zhig nad med par gnas pa las rtsa ris sngon med pa'i sar pa snga na mi gnas pa/_zla ba tshes pa lta bu'i yon po dpral ba'am chu so'i steng na gnas par gyur na skyes bu de zla ba drug las mi 'tsho zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/lus can gang gi lus la chu/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma
[\[59b.7\]]lta bur ni/_/rkyal tshe chu la mi chags pa/_/de ni zla ba drug na 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus can de mi gang rkyal zhing chu'i nang na zhugs pa khrus byed pa na/_de'i lus la chu pad+ma'i 'dab ma la chu gtor ba'i tshul du/_chu de 'dril zhing chags par ma gyur pa de yang zla ba drug nas 'chi ba yin no/_
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]spyi bo du ba'am snum bcas snang /_/de ni zla ba gcig nas 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang gi spyi bor du ba lta bu'am/_snum dang bcas pa lta bur rgyu med par snang na/_de ni zla ba gcig nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/spyi bo'am smin mtshams
[\[60a.2\]]gsar du ni/_/mtshams bye ba'am gtsug 'khyil snang /_/nad med zhag ni drug gis 'chi/_/nad pa zhag gsum nas 'chi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_spyi bo ste mgo bo'am/_smin mtshams kyi gnas su gsar du mtshams bye zhing gyes pa ltar snang ba'am/_gtsug 'khyil
[\[60a.3\]]ba lta bur snang ba ste/_mtshams bye ba ni ri mo drang po'o/_/gtsug 'khyil ba ni ri mo zlum por 'khor ba'o/_/de lta bu snang na nad med cing bde bar gnas pa ni zhag drug gis 'chi la/_nad pa zhig yin na ni zhag gsum nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/lce gnag kha ni mnam pa dang /_/mig
[\[60a.4\]]g.yas phugs su bros pa'am/_/bya ni mgo la babs pa dag_/gang yin de ni yongs su spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhig gi lce'i mdog gnag pa dang /_kha'i dri mnam pa dang bcas pa dang /_mig g.yas phugs su bros shing khung bur zhugs pa dang /_yang na mgo la bya babs shing
[\[60a.5\]]'dug pa gang yin pa de ni gso bar mi bya zhing spang bar bya'o/_/gang zhig khrus byas byugs pa dang /_/lus kun gsher bar gnas bzhin du/_/snying ga bzhin du myur bar skams/_/de ni zla phyed las mi 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang zhig dang por khrus byas shing de'i 'og tu byug
[\[60a.6\]]pas byugs pa na lus thams cad gsher dang rlan dang bcas par gnas bzhin du snying ga'i phyogs cher myur du skams par gyur na/_mi de zla ba phyed las mi 'tsho'o/_/glo bur du ni lus kun mdog_/cig car tha mal pa las nyams/_/de bzhin du ni sogs pa dang /_/rtsub dang snum 'gyur 'chi
