[\[60a.7\]]ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_glo bur du rgyu med par lus kyi mdog thams cad cig car dus gcig tu tha mal pa las nyams te/_gzhan du gyur pa ste/_tha mal pa'i mdog ni dkar ba dang gnag pa la sogs pas yongs su myur ba'i mdog sngo ba dang dmar ba la sogs par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]lus thams cad dam/_de'i yan lag la nad la sogs pa dang rtsub pa dang /_snum par gyur cing grang ba dang dro ba la sogs pa cig car byung bar gyur na yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/gang gi sor mo drang ba na/_/sgra mi 'byung ba de mi 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang zhig gi sor mo'i phyogs
[\[60b.2\]]la drang ba'am mnan par gyur pa na/_sgra mi 'byung ba de yang 'chi ltas yin pas mi 'cho'o/_/de bzhin lud pa sbrid sogs la/_/gang zhig sngon med sgra 'byung ba'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang gi lud pa lu ba dang sbrid pa 'byung ba dang /_gcin gtong ba la sogs pa'i skabs su sngon med cing
[\[60b.3\]]tha mal pa'i rang bzhin las 'das pa'i sgra byung na de yang mi 'tsho'o/_/dbugs 'byin thung ba'am ring ba'am/_/dri mnam pa'am dri zhim 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang zhig dbugs 'byin pa ni shin tu thung ba'am/_shin tu ring bar 'gyur ba dang /_glo bur du dri mnam pa dang /_dri zhim par
[\[60b.4\]]gyur na yang mi 'tsho'o/_/lus ni khrus byas ma byas rung /_/mi ma yin pa'i dri byung ba'am/_/gos rma dri mar byung na yang /_/de ni lo gcig nas 'chi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang gis khrus byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung /_mi ma yin pa'i dri ste/_mi'i spyod yul las 'das pa'i dri
[\[60b.5\]]mi zhim pa'am/_dri nga ba yid du 'ong ba'am mi 'ong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang gi gos la rma'am dri ma la mi ma yin pa'i dri byung na de ni lo gcig nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/gang zhig shig dang sbrang ma sogs/_/dri zhim pas ni 'du ba'am/_dri nga ba yis spong gyur na/_/de ni
[\[60b.6\]]lo gcig las mi 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang zhig la shig dang sbrang ma la sogs pa dri zhim po bro bas 'du shing 'phungs par gyur pa'am/_yang na dri nga ba'i dbang gis spang zhing lus 'dor bar 'gyur ba de yang lo gcig las mi 'tsho'o/_/gang zhig rtag tu lus tsha ba/_/grang ba
[\[60b.7\]]nyid du snang ba dang /_/bsil ba shin tu tsha bar snang /_/rgyu med par ni rngul dang rengs/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang skyes bu gang zhig rgyu med par rtag tu lus tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa'am/_rtag tu grang zhing bsil bar snang ba dang /_lus bsil ba nyid la yang shin tu tsha ba dang /_de bzhin du
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]rgyu med par shas cher rngul ba dang /_grang zhing rengs pa de yang lo gcig las mi 'tsho'o/_/gang zhig grang ba'i chu bur 'byung /_/lus grang ba las tsha ba skye/_/grang gdungs than la mi dga' ba/_/de ni gshin rje'i dbang gyur yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[61a.2\]]skyes bu gang lus grang bar gyur kyang /_chu bur 'byung ba'am/_lus grang ba las tsha ba skyes pa dang /_grang bas gdungs kyang tsha ba'i than pa la mi dga' na/_de ni gshin rje'i dbang du gyur cing 'chi ba yin no/_/gang gi snying ga dro gyur la/_/lto ba shin tu grang gyur cing /_/bshang
[\[61a.3\]]ba 'khru zhing skom dad che/_/de ni ro dang 'dra ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang gi snying ga dro zhing tsha bar gyur kyang /_lto ba shin tu grang bar gyur pa dang /_bshang ba sla zhing 'khru ba dang /_skom dad che zhing skom pas gdungs pa de yang gson bzhin du ro dang 'dra ste 'chi ba yin par shes
[\[61a.4\]]par bya'o/_/bshang dang gci ba mchil snabs dang /_/khu chu chu nang nub gyur pa'am/_/mchil ma kha dog sna tshogs dang /_/gang yin pa de zla gcig 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_srog chags gang gi bshang ba la sogs pa chu'i nang du nub cing 'og tu 'gro ba'am/_gang gi mchil ma kha
[\[61a.5\]]dog mang zhing sna tshogs par snang na/_de yang zla ba gcig gis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/sa ni nam mkhar mthong ba dang /_/nam mkha' sar ni mthong gyur dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang gis sra zhing stug pa'i sa ni nam mkha'i bar snang du gyur par mthong ba dang /_nam mkha'
[\[61a.6\]]yang sa'i rnam pa ltar gzugs can du mthong ba gang yang rung ba de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes thog ma dang thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/gzugs med gzugs can lta bu dang /_/gzugs can gzugs med lta bur mthong /_/zhes bya ba la/_dngos po gang gzugs med cing bltar med pa
[\[61a.7\]]de gzugs can snang ba ltar mthong ba dang /_gzugs can gyi rnam pa la la gzugs med pa ltar gnas par mthong zhing 'khrul pa de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 'od chen 'od med mthong /_/dkar po gnag dang yod pa med/_/ces bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du me la sogs pa'i
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]'od can gang yin pa 'od med par mthong ba dang /_dkar po ni nag por mthong la/_nag po ni dkar por mthong ba dang /_yod pa ni med par mthong la/_med pa ni yod par mthong ba de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/mig nad med par zla ba ni/_/gzugs mngar ri med mthong dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[61b.2\]]mig la nad kyi skyon med bzhin du zla ba gzugs du mar mthong /_ra ri med pa ste ri bong gi mtshan ma med pa mthong na de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gnyid ma log pa dri za srin/_/yi dwags gzhan yang de 'dra zhing /_/gzugs mi sdug par mthong gyur pa/_/gang yin de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/
[\[61b.3\]]zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gnyid kyis ma log par dri za la sogs pa dang /_gzhan yang de 'dra ste mi'am ci dang /_sha za la sogs pa dang /_gzugs mi sdug pa 'dir ma smos su zin kyang /_skye gnas tha dad pa phye ba'i mi ma yin pa de mthong bar gyur pa gang yin pa de yang 'chi zhing dus
[\[61b.4\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/sme bdun dang ni nyer gnas pa'i/_/skar ma sgrib byed ma mthong dang /_/dgu tshigs gung tshugs ma mthong ba/_/de ni lo gcig mi 'tsho'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang skar ma sme bdun dang nye bar gnas pa'i skar ma sgrib byed ces bya ba chung ngu zhig ma mthong ba dang /_de
[\[61b.5\]]bzhin du dgu tshigs zhes bya ba nam mkha'i gang gA zhes grags pa dang /_skar ma gung tshugs ma mthong ba de ni lo gcig mi 'tsho ste lo 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'brug sgra chu bo'i sgra dang ni/_/gling bu pi waM rnga yi sgra/_/sgra gzhan med par thos pa'am/_/yod pa yang thos par ma gyur dang /_/
[\[61b.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_'brug sgra nas rnga'i sgra'i bar gyi sgra rnams dang /_sgra gzhan gang yin pa dag mi gzhan pa dag yod kyang ma thos pas de thos pa dang /_de bzhin du 'brug sgra la sogs pa sgra rnams dang /_sgra che ba gzhan dag grag par gyur ba gzhan yod du zin kyang mi thos pa ste/_de lta bu de ni
[\[61b.7\]]'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes 'og nas smos pa'i tshig dang sbyar ro/_/rna ba'i bu ga bkag pa yis/_/'ur 'ur po yi sgra mi thos/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhig rna ba'i bu ga sor mos bkag pa na/_'ur 'ur po'i sgra me 'bar ba'i sgra dang 'dra ba de mi thos pa yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin dri dang
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]ro dang reg_/gang zhig log par shes pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du dri la sogs pa phyin ci log tu shes pa ste/_dri zhim pa ni dri nga bar 'dzin la/_dri nga ba ni dri zhim par 'dzin pa'am/_de bzhin du ro mngar ba yin yang /_kha ba la sogs pa gang yang rung
[\[62a.2\]]bar 'dzin pa'am/_kha ba mngar ba la sogs pa gang yang rung bar tshor ba'am/_de bzhin du reg bya yang 'jam pa ni rtsub par shes la/_grang ba ni tsha bar shes pa dang /_de las go bzlog par shes pa'i 'khrul pa dang ldan pa de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na yong ye mi tshor dang /_/zhes
[\[62a.3\]]bya ba la/_yang rnam pa thams cad nas thams cad du dri la sogs pa mi tshor zhing yong ye mi shes pa de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/me mar shi ba'i dri mi tshor/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang zhig me mar shi bar gyur ba'i dri sna'i dbang pos mi tshor ba de yang 'chi ba'i ltas so/_/cho ga bzhin byas
[\[62a.4\]]nad skyes la/_/cho ga log pas bder gnas dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang la sman dpyad kyi gzhung las byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du gso bar byas kyang /_nad skyed cing thu bar 'gyur ba dang yang gang zhig sman dpyad kyi cho ga ltar ma byas par sbyor ba log par bsten du zin kyang bde bar gnas pa ltar byed
[\[62a.5\]]pa de 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi lus ni rdul g.yogs 'dra/_/lus la snad par mi tshor dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang zhig lus rdul gyis g.yogs shing phyag dar gyis khebs pa ltar rdul can gnas pa de yang mi 'tsho'o/_/yang gang gi lus la mtshon gyis snad cing bcad kyang tshor ba med pa
[\[62a.6\]]de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/dka' thub drag dang cho ga ni/_/sngon 'gro'i rnal 'byor med pa ru/_/dbang po las 'das shes pa skyes/_/de rnams 'chi bar shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dka' thub drag po'i sbyor ba med par dbang po las 'das shing mi shes pa'i yul ma yin pa lha yul la
[\[62a.7\]]sogs pa na yod cing shes pa'i shes pa skye ba dang /_yang de bzhin du bstan bcos ji lta ba'i yang dag pa'i man ngag cho ga sngon du 'gro ba'i sems nang du bsdus pa'i rnal 'byor sems rtse gcig pa med par dbang po las 'das pa'i shes pa skye ba de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i ltas yin no/_/skad 'gags
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]dman zhing mi gsal dang /_/gang zhig skad ni 'dzer gyur dang /_/smra 'dod pa ni 'phral du ni/_/brjed 'gyur de ni mi 'tsho'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang glo bur du rang bzhin gyis skad 'gags nas dman zhing zhum pa dang ldan pa dang /_mi gsal zhing brda sprod ma nus par gyur na de mi 'tsho 'o/_/yang de
[\[62b.2\]]bzhin du skad 'gyur zhing 'dzer ba dang /_gang smra bar 'dod pa ni rgyu med par 'phral du brjed par 'gyur zhing /_ci yang smra bar mi nus pa de yang mi 'tsho'/_/skad gsang shin tu nyam chung 'gyur/_/mdog dang stobs ni nyams pa dang /_/rgyu med par ni nad 'phel bar/_/snang ba dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya
[\[62b.3\]]ba la/_yang gang zhig smra ba'i skad gsang dma' bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin mdog dang stobs nyams shing bri ba dang /_zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa'i nad skye ba'i rgyu med par nad 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar snang ba dag kyang mi 'tsho ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/skad gsang nyams par gyur ba dang /_/bdag
[\[62b.4\]]nyid 'chi bar smra ba ste/_/de 'dra'i sgra ni thos pa dag_/ring du yongs su spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rang bzhin gyis skad gsang nyams te/_skad kyi gsang gzhan du gyur pa dang /_bdag nyid 'chi bar smra ba ste/_kho bo ni 'chi'o 'chi'o zhes rtag tu smra ba dang /_yang de lta bu'i sgra thos pa dang /_khyed 'chi'o khyed ni
[\[62b.5\]]'chi'o/_/zhes gzhan smra ba dag thos pa'i skyes bu de 'chi bar 'gyur bas ring du spang bar bya'i gso bar mi bya'o/_/lus kyi dbyibs dang tshad dang ni/_/mdog gam gzi mdangs gang dag gi/_/gzugs brnyan 'gyur ba'i rmi lam du/_/mthong na der ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus kyi dbyibs ni ring
[\[62b.6\]]thung la sogs pa ste/_de dag rang gi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan par mthong ba dang /_tshad ni chu zheng la sogs pa'o/_/mdog ni sngo bsangs la sogs pa'o/_/gzi mdangs ni kha dog de nyid 'byes par byed cing ring nas gsal bar snang ba'o/_/de ltar skyes bu'i dbyibs la sogs pa'i rnam pa de dag gi gzugs
[\[62b.7\]]gzhan du 'gyur zhing mi mthun par snang ba rmi lam gyi gnas skabs su mthong na yang skyes bu de 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin na/_gnyid kyis ma log pa'i gnas skabs su mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_nyi ma me long chu sogs la/_/gang zhig dbyibs dang tshad dang ni/_/lus kyi rnam pa snang gyur pa/_/gzugs
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]brnyan zhes ni de la bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_gang gi lus la nyi ma dang /_me long dang chu la sogs pa lus kyi dbyibs dang tshad kyi rnam pa gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs can du 'byung bar 'gyur ba la ni gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o/_/mdog dang gzi mdangs la brten gang /_/lus
[\[63a.2\]]gtogs gzugs brnyan lta bu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi mdog dang gzi mdangs kyi rnam pa la brten cing gnas pa gang yin pa de ni lus su gtogs pa nyid kyi gzugs brnyan ltar logs shig na snang ba ni ma yin no/_/gang gi gzugs brnyan bcad pa dang /_/gyes dang lhag dang 'khrugs
[\[63a.3\]]pa dang /_/mgo med mgo gnyis yon po dang /_/mi sdug gzhan du gyur snang ba/_/mtshan nyid las byung ma yin na/_/de ni tshe zad yin zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang zhig gi gzugs brnyan bcad cing du ma bu gnyis su byas pa lta bur snang ba dang /_de bzhin du gyes shing bkas pa lta bu dang /_de bzhin du
[\[63a.4\]]lhag pa ste tshad las che ba dang /_'khrugs pa ste rnam par g.yo zhing kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rang bzhin can dang /_mgo med cing bcad pa lta bur snang ba dang /_mgo gnyis yod pa dang /_mgo bo yon por snang ba dang /_yang na mdog mi sdug pa'i rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du snang ba'am/_'dir bshad pa las gzhan
[\[63a.5\]]pa ste/_rta dang glang po dang ba long dang bong bu la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i gzugs su nyi ma dang me long dang chu la sogs par snang na/_skyes bu de ni tshe zad pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/de yang gzugs brnyan te/_de'i mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin nam/_bcos pa'i rgyu la sogs pa las byung ba ma yin par de ltar
[\[63a.6\]]snang ba 'chi ltas yin par shes par bya'o/_/gang gi mig gi rgyal mor ni/_/gzugs brnyan snang bar ma gyur dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang gi mig gi rgyal mo zhes 'jig rten na grags pa'i mig gi dbang po dang bar gzhan gyi gzugs snang bar ma gyur na/_de yang tshe zad pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/nam
[\[63a.7\]]mkha' la sogs lnga bo yi/_/gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs lnga/_/zhes bya ba la/_nam mkha' la sogs pa'i 'byung ba chen po lnga la/_gzugs brnyan dbyibs dang kha dog gi rnam pa sna tshogs pa yod do/_/nam mkha' dwangs shing sngo ba dang /_/snum bcas mdog dang bcas pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]la nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan nam/_mdangs ni dwangs shing dri ma med pa dang kha dog sngo ba dang /_snum pa dang bcas shing rtsub bag med pa dang /_mdog dang bcas shing mdangs dang ldan pa nyid yin no/_/rlung las rdul can dmar dang gnag_/thal mdog rtsub cing mdog nyams yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung
[\[63b.2\]]gi gzugs brnyan la phyag dar gyis gtor ba ltar rdul can du gyur pa dang /_kha dog dmar ba dang /_kha dog gnag pa dang /_thal ba'i mdog tu snang ba dang /_rtsub cing mdog mdangs nyams pa yin no/_/me yi dmar zhing dwangs par snang /_/mdangs ldan blta na sdug pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_me'i gzugs
[\[63b.3\]]brnyan mdangs ni dmar zhing dwangs par snang zhing /_gser btso ma lta bu mdangs dang ldan zhing dmar ba dang /_blta na sdug cing mdzes pa yin no/_/chu skyes bai DUr+ya 'drar snang /_/dag cing rab snum bde ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_chu las skyes bu'i gzugs brnyan ni bai DUr+ya ltar snang zhing sngo ba dang /_dag cing
[\[63b.4\]]dri ma med pa dang /_/snum pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa dang /_/bde zhing nad med par skyed pa yin no/_/sa yi brtan snum dag pa dang /_/mthug cing dkar dang sngo bsangs yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sa'i gzugs brnyan brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba dang /_mdog mdangs snum pa dang /_dag cing dri ma med pa dang /_mthug
[\[63b.5\]]cing gsal ba dang /_kha dog dkar ba dang /_sngo ba la sogs su gnas pa yin no/_/rlung ni nad 'chi sdug bsngal skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_de dag gi nang nas rlung gi gzugs brnyan ni nad rnams skyed pa dang /_'chi ba dang sdug bsngal zhing nyon mongs pa chen po skyed pa yin no/_/gzhan dag bde ba skyed pa yin/_/
[\[63b.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_gzugs brnyan nam mdog mdangs de las gzhan pa'i phyi ma bzhi po ni bde ba skyed cing dge ba ston pa dang /_nad med pa skyed pa yin no/_/me yis thams cad mdog can te/_/de ni rnam pa bdun du bshad/_/dmar dang ser dkar nag po dang /_/ljang nag skyu dang gnag pa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdog
[\[63b.7\]]can thams cad ni me'i rang bzhin las byung ba yin par bshad de/_de yang dmar dang ser ba la sogs pa'i kha dog gi dbye bas rnam pa bdun yin no/_/de rnams las ni gang gsal 'gyur/_/snum dang dri ma med de dge/_/dri ma can dang rtsub pa dang /_/zhum pa sdug bsngal skyed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdog mdangs
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]de rnams kyi nang nas gang zhig snang zhing gsal bar 'gyur ba dang /_mdangs snum pa dang /_dri ma med cing nag nog dang bral ba de ni dge zhing bde ba skyed pa yin/_dri ma can dang kha dog rtsub pa dang /_zhum zhing rgyas pa ma yin pa rnams ni mi dge ste/_sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa yin no/_/
[\[64a.2\]]mdangs kyi mdog ni zil gyis gnon/_/'od ni kha dog gsal byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdog dang mdangs kyi khyad par ni 'di yin te/_mdangs kyi kha dog gi rnam pa nag po dang /_dkar po la sogs pa zil gyis mnan nas der gnas pa yin la/_'od kyi rnam pa ni lus kyi kha dog gsal shing
[\[64a.3\]]che bar gyur pa yin no/_/mdangs kyis nye bar snang ba yin/_/'di ni ring nas snang ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzi mdangs kyi rnam pa gang nye bar snang ba yin la/_'byung ba lnga'i 'od ni thag ring po nas snang ba ste/_de'i khyad par ni de yin no/_/gang zhig mdangs dang kha dog gi/_/mtshan ma'i khyad par med
[\[64a.4\]]min te/_/mi rnams mtshan ma bzang ngan 'byung /_/dus su mdangs la brten pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi rnams la ni mdangs med pa dang /_kha dog gi khyad par 'ga' yang med pa ma yin te/_thams cad kyang mdangs kyang mdog dang bcas pa yin pas de dang bral ba ma yin no/_/des na mi rnams kyi mtshan
[\[64a.5\]]ma'am/_ltas bzang po dang ngan pa 'byung ba'i dus su mdangs la brten cing gnas nas de'i khyad par ston cing gsal bar byed do/_/gang zhig rkang pa 'drud pa dang /_/phrag pa g.yo bas 'gro ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang zhig rkang pas sa la drud cing 'gro ba dang /_de bzhin phrag pa g.yo zhing 'gul bas
[\[64a.6\]]'gro ba de yang 'chi bdag gi dbang du 'gro ba yin no/_/gang zhig phan zas mang zos kyang /_/rtag tu stobs ni nyams 'gyur dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhig gis phan zhing rjes su mthun pa'i zas mang zhing lhag par zos su zin kyang rgyun mi 'chad par stobs nyams shing 'bri bar 'gyur ba yang 'chi ltas
[\[64a.7\]]yin no/_/gang zhig nyung zos bshang gci mang /_/mang zos bshang gci nyung ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang gang zhig zas nyung ba zos kyang bshang ba dang gci ba mang zhing 'byung ba dang /_de las go bzlog pa dag kyang 'chi ltas yin no/_/nyung zos bad kan gyis nyen cing /_/dbugs ring 'byin cing sa la
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]'gre/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhig zas nyung ngu zos kyang /_bad kan gyis nyen cing gzir ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba ring por 'byin cing sa la 'gre ldog na yang 'chi ltas yin no/_/gang zhig dbugs ring phyung nas ni/_/thung ngu rngubs te shugs 'byin dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang gang zhig dbugs
[\[64b.2\]]gyen du 'byin pa ring du phyung nas/_de'i 'og tu thung ngu rngubs te shugs 'byin cing sdug bsngal bar byed pa yang 'chi ltas so/_/thung ngu 'byin cing bsnun pa ltar/_/shin tu 'dar bar byed pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhig dbugs kyi rgyun thung ngu 'byin cing /_de'i 'og tu bsnun pa ltar shin tu 'gul zhing 'dar
[\[64b.3\]]bar byed pa yang 'chi ltas yin no/_/gang zhig lag ngar bskum nas ni/_/mgo ni dka' bas 'degs pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang gang zhig lag ngar bskum nas mgo bo shin tu dka' bas 'degs shing bskyod pa yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig dpral ba las rngul 'dzag_/tshigs mtshams lhod par gyur
[\[64b.4\]]pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang gang zhig dpral ba'i phyogs nas rgyu med par rngul 'dzag pa dang rus pa'i tshigs kyi bog re lhod par byed pa yang de bzhin no/_/nyams che ba'am nyam chung gyur pa gang /_/ldong ba'i tshe na mi dran 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhig nyams stobs dang ldan nam/_/nyam chung bar gyur kyang
[\[64b.5\]]rung ste/_mal nas ldang ba'i skabs su mi dran zhing myong bar 'gyur ba yang de bzhin no/_/gang zhig gan rkyal nyal nas ni/_/rkang pa rnam par bskyod pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhig glo gnyis mi 'bebs par gan rkyal du nyal zhing rkang pa rnam par bskyod cing 'gul bar byed pa yang 'chi ltas so/_/rtsig pa
[\[64b.6\]]mal stan la sogs par/_/gang zhig rtag tu snyes pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhig nyam chung bas rtsig pa la sogs par rtag tu snyes pa yang de bzhin no/_/rgyu med par dgod myos tshul gyis/_/mchu las ldags par byed pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_dgod pa la sogs pa'i rgyu med par shas cher dgod pa dang /_
[\[64b.7\]]myos shing mi dran pa'i tshul gyis mchu ldags par byed pa yang 'chi ltas so/_/ya mchu ldags par byed pa dang /_/sgra bcas par yang gang byed pa/_/zhes bya ba la/_lces ya mchu ldags par byed pa dang /_kha nas sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa yang 'chi ltas so/_/lus mdog nag po ser po dang /_/dmar po'i gzugs
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]brnyan snang ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang gi mdog nag po la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan du snang ba yang gshin rje'i dbang du 'gro ba yin no/_/sman pa sman dang kha zas dang /_/bla ma mdza' bshes la sdang gang /_/'di dag thams cad gshin rje yi/_/dbang gyur yin par shes par
[\[65a.2\]]bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang skyes bu gang zhig sman la sogs pa la zhe sdang ba gang yin pa dang /_sngar bshad pa thams cad kyang gshin rje'i dbang du gyur cing 'chi ba yin par shes shing rtogs par bya'o/_/gang zhig drod chung sems g.yengs dang /_/rtag tu mdangs ngan yid mi bde/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi
[\[65a.3\]]gang khong pa'i me drod chung zhing zhan pa dang /_sems g.yengs shing rtag tu 'khrugs pa dang /_mdog mdangs ngan pa dang /_yid mi bde zhing mya ngan gyis non pa de yang mi 'tsho'o/_/gang zhig gtor ma bya rog la/_/byin yang za bar mi byed dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang zhig gi phyir de'i ming nas smos te gtor
[\[65a.4\]]ma byin zhing gtor ma bya rog la sogs pas mthong nas za bar mi byed pa de yang gshin rje'i khyim du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig rgyu med yid gzhungs dang /_/mdzes shing lus rgyas dpal thob pa'am/_/de las nyams par gyur pa dag_/de ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug_/ces bya ba la/_yid gzhungs pa la
[\[65a.5\]]sogs pa'i rgyu bcud kyis len pa la sogs pa med par yid gzhungs shing blo rno ba dang /_mdog mdzes pa dang /_lus kyi sha rgyas pa dang /_dpal gyi 'byor pa glo bur du thob par gyur ba'am/_yang na yid gzhungs pa la sogs pa snga na yod pa las/_rgyu med par glo bur du nyams par 'gyur ba dag kyang yod de/_/
[\[65a.6\]]de dag ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug cing 'gro ba'i ltas yin no/_/tha mal ba'am nad pa yis/_/gang gi yon tan skyon rang bzhin/_/snga las gzhan du 'gyur bar snang /_/de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu tha mal par gnas shing /_nad med pa'am nad pa yang rung ste/_snying stobs la sogs pa'i
[\[65a.7\]]yon tan gyi rang bzhin dang /_rlung la sogs pa'i skyon gyi rang bzhin snga ma las gzhan du 'gyur te/_rang gi rang bzhin spangs nas dngos po gzhan du gyur na skyes bu de yang zla ba drug las mi 'tsho'o/_/dad dang tshul khrims dran dang sbyin/_/blo gros stobs ni rgyu med par/_/'di drug las ni ldog gyur ba/_/zla ba drug nas 'chi
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang gang zhig dad pa la sogs pa'i chos drug las rgyu med par ldog par gyur pa yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de la dad pa ni lha la sogs pa la yid dang zhing mnyes par byed pa'o/_/tshul khrims ni sdom pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/dran pa ni 'das pa'i dngos po mi brjed pa'o/_/sbyin
[\[65b.2\]]pa ni gtong ba'i ngang tshul can no/_/blo ni shes rab bo/_/stobs ni lus kyi nus pa'o/_/'gro dang tsheg ni smyo ba 'dra/_/'dar rmongs zla ba gcig na 'chi/_/skra byi ba na tshor ba med/_/zhag drug nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi 'gro ba'i tshul dang /_smra ba'i tshig smyon pa lta bur 'chol bar spyod
[\[65b.3\]]pa dang /_lus 'dar zhing sems rmongs par gyur pa dag ni zla ba gcig nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/yang de bzhin du skra byi zhing bregs pa na tshor ba med par 'gyur ba'i mi yang zhag drug nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig lkog nad med pa ru/_/mid par kha zas mi chud dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang zhig
[\[65b.4\]]lkog ma'i nad gang yang med par zas ma tshud cing thogs pa de yang 'chi ltas yin no/_/bran g.yog log par byed gyur pa/_/de ni 'chi ba dang 'drar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_yang mi gang zhig gi bran g.yog gam bsnyen bkur ba log par byed cing rgyu med par mi mthun par byed pa de 'chi ltas yin te/_'chi ba
[\[65b.5\]]dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/_/gang zhig rtag tu gnyid log pa'am/_/gnyid med de yang mi 'tsho'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang skyes bu gang zhig nyin mtshan rtag par gnyid log pa'am/_gnyid med pa de yang mi 'tsho'o/_/mchi mas gdong ni khebs pa dang /_/rkang pa shin tu rngul ba dang /_/mig ni mi sdug
[\[65b.6\]]par snang ba/_/gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhig rgyu med par mchi mas gdong khebs par ngu ba dang /_de bzhin du rkang pa shas cher rngul ba dang /_de bzhin du mig mi sdug cing rnyog pa can du snang ba de yang gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yin no/_/
[\[65b.7\]]sngon chad dga' ba'i dngos la gang /_/dga' mi 'gyur ba de mi 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la sngon chad dga' zhing rtsed mo nyams su myong ba las dngos po de nyid la 'phral du mi dga' bar 'byung ba de yang mi 'tsho'o/_/gang zhig 'phral du 'gyur ba yi/_/mtshan nyid thams
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]cad snang ba dang /_'phral du ldog par 'gyur ba dag_/de ni mod la 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang zhig rgyu med par 'phral du glo bur 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid rims la sogs pa mtshan nyid pa'am/_yang de lta bur 'gyur ba dag bcos shing zhi ba'i rgyu
[\[66a.2\]]med par ldog cing zhi bar 'gyur na skyes bu de ni ring po mi thogs par de'i mod la 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/rims ni stobs dang ldan pa dang /_/gting du zhen cing yun ring dang /_/bla bcas mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/_/rid cing skrangs dang me drod nyams/_/tshig mi gsal zhing thogs pa dang /_/mig
[\[66a.3\]]dmar snying ni gzer ba dang /_/snga dro lud pa skam po 'byung /_/phyi dro de las gzhan du 'gyur/_/bad kan lud par bcas pa dang /_/stobs dang sha ni zad nas 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims kyi nad ni stobs dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan nas skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de
[\[66a.4\]]yang stobs dang ldan pa'i nad tshabs che ba'o/_/gting du zhen pa ni lus zungs thams cad kyi nang du phyin pas gting ring ba'i mtshan nyid can no/_/yun ring ba'i dus lon pa'o/_/bla ba ni 'brel ba med pa'i tshig mang du smra ba de dang bcas pa'o/_/de bzhin mgo 'khor ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang
[\[66a.5\]]bcas pa dang /_rid cing lus zungs zad pa dang /_skrangs pa dang /_me drod nyams shing bri ba dang /_tshig mi gsal zhing brda sprod mi nus pa dang /_tshig thogs shing mi thon pa dang /_mig dmar ba dang /_snying ga na zhing gzer ba'i rims de lta bus ni nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rims
[\[66a.6\]]kyis thebs pa'i gang zhig snga dro lud pa skam po 'byung ba'am/_phyi dro de las gzhan pa'i bad kan gyi bdag nyid can gyi lud pa 'byung ba dang /_sha zad par 'gyur bas nad pa de 'chi bar byed pa yin no/_/khrag dang mkhris pa shin tu dmar/_/yang na gnag pa'am mtshon can nam/_/dmar dang ser dang
[\[66a.7\]]ljang mdog dang /_/khrag gi gzugs ni rab tu snang /_/ba spu'i bu ga nas 'dzag pa/_/lkog ma snying gar gos pa dang /_/gos la ma chags dri nga ba/_/shugs 'byung shin tu mang bar 'byung /_/rgan po skya rbab rims thabs skyug_/lud pa skrang dang tshad 'khru gsod/_/ces bya ba la/_khrag dang
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]mkhris pa'i nad ni tshul 'di 'dra na skyes bu gsod par byed do/_/shin tu dmar ba ni shas cher dmar ba'o/_/yang na shin tu gnag pa dang /_/tshon can de dag kha dog sna tshogs par snang zhing 'ja' ltar snang ba dang /_zangs ltar dmar ba la sogs pa'i gzugs su khrag gi mdog ltar
[\[66b.2\]]snang na 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/_/gsod par byed pa yin no/_/yang de bzhin du ba spu'i bu ga rnams las 'dzag cing 'byung ba dang lkog ma dang snying ga dang kha'i phyogs su cig car gos shing chags pa dang /_de bzhin du khrag mkhris pa gang gos la chags ba dang /_de bzhin du mi 'dod
[\[66b.3\]]pa dang /_de bzhin du shin tu dri mnam zhing mi zhim pa dang /_de bzhin du shugs kyis 'byung zhing 'chad nas kyang 'byung ba dang /_shin tu mang du 'byung na yang gsod par byed do/_/de bzhin du rgas shing na tshod yal ba dang /_skya rbab dang rims kyis btab cing skyug pa dang /_lud pa lu
[\[66b.4\]]zhing grang ba dang /_tshad pas 'khru ba'i bla brnan dang ldan yang gsod par 'gyur ro/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde rims skyugs/_/skom dang tshad 'khru 'or nad can/_/zhes bya ba la/_lud pa lu ba dang dbugs mi bde bas thebs pa'i skyes bu ni rims la sogs pa dang ldan na de 'chi bar 'gyur
[\[66b.5\]]ro/_/gcong chen sbos dang rtsib logs gzer/_/khrag sgyugs phrag pa tsha na 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen pos thebs pa'i nad pa ni/_/sbos pa la sogs pa dang ldan na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/skyugs pa shugs dang ldan pa dang /_/bshang gci dri yod tshon can dang /_/lud pa bshang
[\[66b.6\]]nag khrag dang bcas/_/dbugs mi bde yun ring na 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyugs pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i skyes bu ni/_skyugs pa'i shugs drag po la sogs pa dang ldan zhing yun ring du gnas pa yin na 'chi bar byed do/_/skom dad nad gzhan gyis nyams dmad/_/lce 'byung
[\[66b.7\]]dran pa stor na 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_skom dad can gyi nad pa ni gzhan gyis nyams dmad pa rims la sogs pas shin tu rmya bar bya ba dang /_lce phyir 'byin cing sdud mi shes pa dang /_dran pa stor zhing brgyal ba dang bcas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/chang nad shin tu grang bas nyen/_/sha zad
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]til mar gdong bskus 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_chang nad kyis btab pa'i mi ni shin tu grang bas nyen cing lhags pas gdungs pa/_sha zad cing stobs 'bri ba dang /_til mar gyis gdong bskus pa 'dra na 'chi'o/_/gzhang 'brum rkang lag lta ba dang /_/bshang
[\[67a.2\]]sgo rlig pa'i kha skrangs dang /_/snying ga rtsib logs yan lag na/_/slon bro gzhang rnams rims kyis 'debs/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhang 'brum gyis btab pa'i mi ni rkang pa dang lag pa la sogs pa skrangs pa dang /_snying ga na ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan na 'chi'o/_/tshad
[\[67a.3\]]'khru mcher ba'i dum bu dang /_/sha bkrus pa'am snum nag dang /_/til mar 'o ma mar 'dra yang /_/zho dang rkang zhag chang snying dang /_/klad pa snag tsha 'dra ba dang /_/sha brdungs chu dang sbrang rtsi dang /_/rab dmar gnag dang snum bag dang /_/rnag 'dra ska sla gnag dang bcas/_/lus
[\[67a.4\]]zungs sna tshogs 'byung ba dang /_/bshang ba med pa'am che ba'am/_/'byar bag sbrang ma lta bu dang /_/ri mo can dang tshon can dang /_/gzhang gi gnyer ma phyir 'byung dang /_/sgra gcan rus tshigs gzer ba dang /_/bshang sgo bye zhing stobs zad dang /_/zas ni ma nyams 'byung ba dang /_/
[\[67a.5\]]skom bcas rims dang skyugs pa dang /_/lus tsha lto sbos rgyun 'khru 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshad par 'khru ba ni/_mcher pa'i dum bu lta bu nas/_rgyun du 'khru ba'i bar gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan na skyes bu de ni 'chi zhing gsod par byed do/_/'di dag gi tshig gi don ni go sla'o/_/rde'u
[\[67a.6\]]'gags rlig pa skrangs pa dang /_/gcin 'gags nad kyis nyam thag gsod/_/ces bya ba la/_gcin nad rde'u 'gags pa'i nad ni rlig pa skrangs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan na/_skyes bu gsod par byed do/_/gcin snyi skom dad tsha 'brum bcas/_/sha rul tshad par
[\[67a.7\]]'khru bas 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin snyi ba la sogs pa'i nad ni skom dad la sogs pa dang bcas na nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/thor bu'i nad ni snying ga rgyab/_/nu ma phrag pa spyi bor byung /_/tshigs dang rkang pa lag la gnas/_/zhes bya ba la/_thor bu'i nad ni gnad dang snying
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]ga la sogs par byung na 'chi'o/_/gcin sri nad can stobs chung dang /_/sha rnams thams cad 'drul ba dang /_/skom dad tsha smyos rims btab 'chi/_/me dbal gnad ni 'gags pa dang /_/skyigs bu mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin sri ba'i nad ni stobs chung ba
[\[67b.2\]]la sogs pa dang ldan na 'chi'o/_/skran ni rgya che kun nas zlum/_/sra zhing rus sbal ltar mtho dang /_/rtsa mngon rims btab skyugs pa dang /_/skyigs bu lto sbos zug gzer bcas/_/lud pa cham pa snying 'phar dang /_/tshad 'khru skrang dang dbugs mi bde/_/zhes bya ba la/_skran ni rgya
[\[67b.3\]]cher gnas shing /_khyon che ba dang /_kun nas zlum zhing kha zheng che ba dang /_rdo ltar sra ba dang /_rus sbal ltar rgyab mtho ba dang /_rtsas khyab cing mngon pa dang /_rims kyis btab pa la sogs pa dang ldan na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/dmu rdzing bshang gci 'gags pa dang /_/dbugs mi bde
[\[67b.4\]]skrang skyigs bu dang /_/rims mgo 'khor brgyal slon cing 'khru/_/nyam chung mi ni gsod 'gyur zhing /_/mig skrang /_pa dang mchan khung dang /_/pags pa rul zhing srab pa dang /_/bkru sman gyis bkrus lto sbos shing /_/yang dang yang du 'phel ba 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_dmu rdzing can ni
[\[67b.5\]]bshang gci 'gags pa dang ldan zhing nyam chung ba yin na gsod par 'gyur ba yang de bzhin du gzhan mig skrang pa la sogs pa dang ldan na 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/skya rbab skrang dang bcas pa dang /_/mig dang sen mo ser por snang /_/snyoms tsha yig 'chus dang slon/_/brgyal dang lto sbos tshad
[\[67b.6\]]'khru 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_skya rbab kyi nad ni skrangs pa la sogs pa dang bcas pa yin na/_nad pa gsod cing 'chi ba yin no/_/skrangs nad bla brnan sna tshogs ldan/_/skyes pa rkang gnyis dang po skrangs/_/bud med mgo nas skrangs na 'chi/_/gnyi ga mtshan dang mchan khung
[\[67b.7\]]skrangs/_/zhes bya ba la/_skrangs nad ni rims nad dang dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i bla brnan sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_rkang pa gnyis su dang por skrangs pa na skyes pa 'chi la/_bud med kyi mgo na zug ste skrangs na 'chi'o/_/skyes pa dang bud med gnyi ga yang pho mtshan nam mo
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]mtshan nam mchan khung du skrangs na 'chi'o/_/ri mor bcas 'dzag skyugs pa dang /_/rims dang tshad 'khru dbugs mi bde/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang nad de nad gzhi sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i ri mo dang bcas pa dang /_nad gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzag pa
[\[68a.2\]]dang /_skyug pa la sogs pa bcas pa'i skrangs nad kyis kyang gsod par 'gyur ro/_/skrangs pa'i tha mar rims tshad 'khru/_/de gnyis zad mthar skrangs pa dang /_/lus can nyam chung gyur ba dag_/skrangs par gyur na 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skrangs pa'i nad
[\[68a.3\]]mtha' ma'am rjes la gang la rims sam tshad par 'khru ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/_yang rims dang tshad par 'khru ba zad pa'i mthar skrangs par gyur pa ste/_de lta bu'i skrangs pa dang /_rims dang tshad par 'khru bar bcas pa ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de las kyang khyad par du
[\[68a.4\]]nyam chung bar 'gyur ba dag skrangs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig skrangs pa rkang par gnas/_/byin pa'i nywar ni phyin pa dang /_/dpyi yi bar du gnod gyur pa/_/de ni sman pas spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang gi skrangs pa rkang par gnas pa de byin pa'i nywa zhes bya
[\[68a.5\]]ba byin pa'i rgyab kyi tshar phyin nas de bskyod par byas pa dang /_dpyi'i bar du gnod cing nyam thag par byed pa de lta bu'i nad pa sman pas spang zhing dor bar bya'o/_/gang gi gdong lag rkang pa ni/_/lhag par skams par gyur pa 'am/_/lus ma gtogs 'di shas cher skrangs/_/de ni zla ba
[\[68a.6\]]gcig na 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa gang gi gdong dang lag pa dang /_rkang pa rnams lhag par bskams shing sha bri bar gyur ba'am/_lus ma gtogs par gdong la sogs pa 'dir shas cher skrangs par gyur na/_de ni zla ba gcig nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/me dbal lud
[\[68a.7\]]pa kha dog nyams/_/rims brgyal yan lag bcag snyam sems/_/mgo 'khor kha skams snying ga na/_/lus snyom tshad par 'khru ldan spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_me dbal gyi nad la ni bla brnan lud pa la sogs pa dang ldan na 'chi bar 'gyur bas de spang bar bya'o/_/mdze ni yan lag
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]'drul ba dang /_/mig dmar skad ni 'gags pa dang /_/drod nyams srin bu rnams kyis gtses/_/skom dad tshad pas 'khru ldan 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze'i nad ni yan lag 'drul zhing 'chad pa nas/_tshad pas 'khru ba'i bar dang ldan na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung nad pags pas
[\[68b.2\]]tshor med byed/_/lus 'dar skrang dang nad kyis gzir/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung nad ni pags pas tshor ba med cing bem por 'gyur ba dang /_tshigs kyi mtshams bye zhing lhod pa dang /_lus 'dar ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis gzir na spang bar bya'o/_/dreg nad rmongs shing brgyal ba dang /_/myos
[\[68b.3\]]dang gnyid che rims mgo rengs/_/yi ga 'chus dang dbugs mi bde/_/'khums shing chu bur rul ba 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang khrag tu 'dres pa'i dreg nad ni/_rmongs pa la sogs pa dang ldan na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/mgo nad yig 'chus dbugs mi bde/_/rmongs bag 'khru
[\[68b.4\]]zhing skom mgo 'khor/_/skad 'gags lus zungs me drod zad/_/lus nyam chung nad kun gsod byed/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa'i nad thams cad ni mgo'i nad la sogs pas lus nyam chung bar gyur pa'i nad pa gsod cing 'joms par byed do/_/rlung gi nad dang brjed byed dang /_/mdze nad khrag
[\[68b.5\]]ni dmu rdzing gcong /_/skran can gcin nad ldan pa yis/_/sha zad nad tshabs chung yang spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gi nad la sogs pas sha zad cing lus shin tu nyam chung na 'phral du nad tshabs chung ba ltar snang yang de mi 'tsho bas spang bar bya'o/_/sha dang stobs ni shin tu zad/_/nad
[\[68b.6\]]'phel yi ga 'chus pa dag_/nad pa gang la snang 'gyur te/_/zla ba phyed dang gnyis na 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa gang zhig lus kyi sha dang stobs shin tu zad par gyur cing /_nad rab tu 'phel ba dang /_yig 'chus ba'i mtshan nyid nad pa gang zhig la snang bar gyur pa de ni zla ba phyed
[\[68b.7\]]dang gnyis nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung nad gtun 'dra 'phel 'gyur zhing /_/mi bzad snying gar gnas pa dang /_/skom dad kyis ni yongs gdungs pa/_/'phral du srog ni 'phrog par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung nad rdo 'am lcags kyi gtun 'dra ba 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur pa
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]dang /_brnag mi bzod par na ba snying gar gnas shing brten pa dang /_skom dad kyis yongs su gdungs shing khyab par byed pa ni 'phral du de'i mod la srog 'phrog par byed pa yin no/_/rlung nad nya ni lhod byed cing /_/sna ni yon por 'chus byed pa/_/gang gi 'gram pa zad par snang /_/
[\[69a.2\]]'phral du srog ni 'phrog pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rlung nad kyis byin pa'i nywa lhod par byed pa dang /_sna yon por byed cing 'chus par byed pa'am/_yang na 'gram pa zad cing bzhog pa ltar snang bar byed pa yang nad pa'i srog 'phral du 'phrog cing nyam chung bas 'chi bar byed pa yin no/_/
[\[69a.3\]]rlung nad lte ba gzhang khar song /_/yang na brla phrag gnyis na gnas/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du rlung gi nad lte ba dang gzhang gi bar du song zhing gnas pa'am/_yang na brla phrag gam chu sor gnas pa yang 'phral du srog 'phrog par byed pa yin no/_/stobs ldan rlung ni nyam chung ba/_/
[\[69a.4\]]gzhang dang snying gar gnas byed pa'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_stobs dang ldan pa'i rlung gi nad kyis mi nyam chung ba'i gzhang dang snying gar gnas par byed cing 'dzin par byed pa yang 'phral du gsod par byed pa yin no/_/dri ma chu so'i ltag lte ba/_/bkag ste nad ni skyed pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gis
[\[69a.5\]]bshang gci dri ma bkag pa dang /_chu so'i ltag dang lte ba bkag ste/_nad skyed par byed pa yang 'phral du srog 'phrog par byed pa yin no/_/chu sor gzer bar byed 'gyur la/_/skom dad 'khru bar byed pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang chu sor rlung drag tu gzer bar byed pa dang /_skom dad che zhing drag tu 'khru
[\[69a.6\]]bar byed pa de yang de dang 'dra'o/_/chu so bshang sgor gnas nas ni/_/rlung ni dbugs mi bde skyed dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rlung nad chu so bshang sgor gnas nas dbugs mi bde ba'i nad skyed par byed pa dag kyang 'phral du srog 'phrog par byed pa yin no/_/rtsib ma'i rtse mo 'degs byed cing /_/snying gar rlung ni
[\[69a.7\]]brten pa dang /_/mig bgrad 'gyur ba med byed dang /_/'phral du srog ni 'phrog par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_yang rlung nad rtsib ma'i rtse mo 'degs shing 'gyed par byed pa dang /_de bzhin snying gar brten cing gnas pa dang /_mig bgrad cing phan tshun 'gyur ba med par byed pa dag kyang de'i mod la 'phral du srog 'phrog
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]par byed pa yin no/_/'phral du rims dang tsha bas btab/_/skom dad brgyal dang stobs zad dang /_/tshigs mtshams bral bar gyur pa rnams/_/nye bar 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'phral du glo bur du rims dang tsha ba la sogs pa skye bar 'gyur ba yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i ltas yin no/_/nad par gang gi gdong ba las/_/
[\[69b.2\]]rngul ni shas cher byung gyur cing /_/khar chags rims kyis gdungs pa rnams/_/de yang 'tsho bar dka' ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nang par ba lang gzas la 'gyed ba'i dus su gang gi gdong las rngul shas cher mi zad par 'byung zhing 'dzag par 'gyur ba dang khar dri ma shas cher chags pa'i rims kyis gdungs pa de ni 'tsho bar
[\[69b.3\]]dka' ba yin no/_/gang gi lus la 'brum phran ni/_/byi ru'i mdog 'dra snang gyur pa/_/byung nas myur du mi snang 'gyur/_/de ni ring por mi thogs 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang gi lus la 'brum bu phra mo byi ru'i mdog ltar dmar bar snang bar gyur pa dang /_yang gang gi lus la 'brum phran byung nas de ma thag tu mi snang bar
[\[69b.4\]]gyur na de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/'brum pa sran chung bshus 'dra zhing /_/de bzhin byi ru'i mdog 'dra la/_/nang du kha blta tshad 'brum 'dra/_/'brum bus lus ni 'jig byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'brum pa sran chung pags pa bshus pa ltar dmar ba dang /_byi ru'i mdog ltar dmar ba dang kha nang du bltas pa 'bur ba dang /_
[\[69b.5\]]tshad 'brum gyi rnam pa shin tu phra bar gnas pa des kyang lus 'jig par byed pa yin no/_/mig ser gdong ser rgyas pa dang /_/mur 'gram gnyis kyi sha zad la/_/skrag cing lus ni tsha ba dag_/gang yin de ni spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mig gi phyogs ser zhing gdong yang ser la skrangs te rgyas pa ltar snang ba dang /_mur
[\[69b.6\]]'gram gyi phyogs kyi sha lhag par zad pa dang /_skrag cing 'jigs pa dang /_lus tsha ba shas che ba'i nad pa gang yin pa de yang spang bar bya'o/_/rgyu med phrugs pa dag las rma/_/'phel zhing mched par byed pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyu med cing glo bur du pags pa phrugs pa tsam las rma byung bar gyur la/_de yang
[\[69b.7\]]'phel zhing mched par byed pa de yang spang bar bya'o/_/rlung skyes gang zhig na ba med/_/mkhris pa las gyur tsha ba med/_/bad kan las gyur rnag med dang /_/gang zhig nad skye zug gzer med/_/phye mas khyab dang rnying par snang /_/gang du glo bur dag tu ni/_/rgyal mtshan mdung la sogs gzugs snang /_/rma de thams
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]cad spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rma gang zhig rlung las gyur pa yin du zin kyang na zhing zug med pa de yang spang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du mkhris pa las gyur pa yin yang de'i rang bzhin tshab med pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa yin yang 'drul zhing rnag pa med pa dang /_nad kyi gnas
[\[70a.2\]]su byung yang zug cing lhang lhang por na ba med pa dang /_yang rma gang phye mas gtor ba med pa phye mas khyab pa ltar snang ba dang /_rnying zhing rengs pa ltar snang ba dang /_yang rma gang glo bur du rgyu med par rgyal mtshan dang mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_dgra sta la sogs pa'i gzugs su snang bar gyur pa ste/_de lta
[\[70a.3\]]bu'i rma thams cad gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o/_/mtshan bar rdol ni bshang gci rlung /_/'byung zhing srin bus gtses pa dang /_/pus mo phan tshun 'byer ba dang /_/rkang pa bteg nas ltung gyur dang /_/yang dang yang du kha bsgyur ba'i/_/nad pa de ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshan bar rdol ba'i
[\[70a.4\]]nad kyis btab pa'i mi/_bshang ba dang gci ba dang 'phyen mang du 'byung ba dang /_srin bus shin tu gtses pa dang /_pus mos pus mo bcer zhing bskyod pa dang /_rkang pa bteg nas sa la ltung bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du kha yang dang yang du bsgyur ba'i nad pa de 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/_/so yis sen mo'i
[\[70a.5\]]rtse gcod cing /_/sen mos skra dang rtsa gcod dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_so yis sen mo'i rtse mo gcod cing za bar byed pa dang /_nad pa sen mos skra'am rtsa rnams gcod par byed pa yang mi 'tsho'o/_/sa la shing bus 'dri ba dang /_/bong bas bong ba brdeg pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang nad pa gang sa la shing
[\[70a.6\]]bus yi ge 'dri ba dang /_de bzhin du bong bas bong ba brdeg cing bsnun pa de yang mi 'tsho'o/_/spu ldang gcin ni ska ba dang /_/lud pa skams shing rims kyis 'debs/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang nad pa gang rgyu med par spu ldang ba dang /_gcin ska ba dang /_lud pa shas cher skams pa de yang mi 'tsho'o/_/skad cig
[\[70a.7\]]dgod cing sgyugs glu len/_/mal stan rkang pas brdeg pa dang /_/skad cig re res bu ga sol/_/nad pa gang yin de mi 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_skad cig skad cig cing dgod pa dang /_skad cig re rer sgyugs glu len pa dang /_/skad cig ma re re zhing mal stan la rkang pas brdeg pa dang /_de bzhin du skad cig
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]ma re re la sna dang rna ba dang kha la sogs pa'i bu ga sol ba'i nad pa gang yin pa de yang mi 'tsho'o/_/gdong la sme ba ngo khabs dang /_/mdzer skyes so sen thig le chags/_/lto bar sna tshogs rtsa snang ba/_/glo bur byung ba de mi 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang nad pa gang zhig gdong la glo bur ram 'phral du sne ba la
[\[70b.2\]]sogs pa skyes sam de bzhin du so dang sen mor thig le lta bur dkar po chags pa glo bur du byung ba dang /_lto la dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa'i rtsa sngon chad med pa du ma snang bar 'gyur ba glo bur du byung ba'i nad pa de mi 'tsho ste 'chi ltas yin no/_/zhes bya ba'i don no/_/gyen du dbugs rtseg drod yal zhing /_/
[\[70b.3\]]brla phrag gnyis su gzer gyis nyen/_/dpal dang rnam par bral gyur pa/_/blo dang ldan pas yongs su spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang nad pa gang gyen du dbugs mi 'byung ba yang dang yang du rtseg pa'am/_drod yal zhing bral ba dang /_brla rtsa gnyis su gzer gyis nyen cing na ba dang /_dpal gyi 'byor ba dang bral
[\[70b.4\]]bar gyur pa'i nad pa de ni sman pa blo dang ldan pas spang bar bya'o/_/gang gi nad ni 'phel 'gyur dang /_/rang bzhin yongs su nyams pa ni/_/gang la 'phral du 'byung 'gyur ba'i/_/de ni mod la 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang gi nad shas cher 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_/rang bzhin rnal ma las yongs
[\[70b.5\]]su nyams shing bri ba 'phral du glo bur du byung na de yang 'chi ltas yin no/_/sman pas nad pa gang zhig la/_/sman gyi bya ba byas gyur pa/_/'bad kyang sos par ma gyur na/_/de yi srog ni rnyed par dka'/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman pas nad pa gang yang rung ba zhig la/_sman mar la sogs pa'i sman gyi bya ba byas shing sbyor ba
[\[70b.6\]]byas pa 'bad cing sgrim pa ste byas par gyur kyang sos par ma gyur na/_de'i srog gam 'tsho ba rnyed par dka' ste 'chi ba yin no/_/mkhas shing mang du grub pa dang /_/cho ga bzhin du byin gyur kyang /_/sman gyi bya ba ma grub gang /_/de la gso ba'i thabs med do/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman gyi sbyor ba la mkhas shing ro dang nus pa dang
[\[70b.7\]]'ju ba'i khyad par la sogs pa la byang zhing lan mang du sbyar bar grub ste/_/bya ba byas pa yang yin la/_de bzhin du sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos las byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du/_dus dang yul dang tshad la sogs pa legs par brtags te/_nad pa la byin zhing sbyor ba byas su zin kyang sman gyi bya ba nad bsal ba'i las
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]ma grub pa gang yin pa de la ni nad gso ba'i thabs med pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/gang gi sman ni sbyor ba'i tshe/_/rgyu med par ni phyin ci log_/mdog dang ro sogs log gyur na/_/nad med yin yang de mi 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa gang gis sman mar dang /_phye ma dang /_lde gu la sogs pa
[\[71a.2\]]sbyor ba dang /_'bras chan la sogs pa kha zas g.yo ba na/_rgyu med par phyin ci log tu gyur cing /_glo bur du kha dog dang ro la sogs par rang bzhin gzhan du gyur na/_des nad med cing bde bar gnas pa yang mi 'tsho'o/_/gang gi gnas su shing bcas me/_/rlung med par ni shi gyur dang /_/nad pa gang gi khyim du ni/_/
[\[71a.3\]]snod ni shin tu mang po dag_/chag gam lhung bar gyur pa na/_/de yi srog ni rnyed par dka'/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang nad pa gang gi gnas su me shing dang bcas par yang gnas nas 'bar la/_rlung yang med par gyur la glo bur du chu blugs pa ltar shi bar gyur pa dang /_yang nad pa gang gi khyim du snod spyad shin tu mang
[\[71a.4\]]po yang dang yang du lhung bar gyur pa'am/_gang gi khyim du snod lag pa nas yang dang yang du lhung bar gyur ba na/_de'i srog kyang rnyed par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/mi gang nyam chung gyur pa yang /_/glo bur sos par snang gyur pa/_/de yi srog kyang ma nges pa/_/yin par rgyun shes bus bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang nad
[\[71a.5\]]pa gang shin tu nyam chung zhing stobs dang mi ldan pa glo bur du rgyu med par sos shing /_nad med pa ltar snang ba de'i srog kyang ma nges pa yin no/_/zhes rgyun shes kyi bus bshad pa yin no/_/nye du mdza' bo rnams kyis ni/_/dris kyang mnyan par mi bya la/_/sman pas smra bar mi bya zhing /_/de yi gso ba'ang khas mi
[\[71a.6\]]blang /_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa'i nye du dang dga' bshes pa rnams kyis nad pa de 'tsho ba 'am 'chi zhes dris kyang /_'chi ltas kyis mtshon pa'i 'chi ba de ni mnyan par mi bya zhing /_yid gdung bar byed pa'i rgyu yin pas sman pa des 'di ni 'chi bar 'gyur zhes smra bar mi bya ba/_tshe zad pa'i nad de gso dpyad kyis gso zhing
[\[71a.7\]]bcos pa khas blang bar yang mi bya ste/_de lta bu'i nad pa sman pas bcos su zin kyang ngal ba don med 'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i pho nya sha za sogs/_/gzhan gyis nye bar bsten pa gang /_/sman gyis stobs ni 'joms pas na/_/de phyir de ni yongs su spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir tshe zad pa la ni/_gshin
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]rje'i pho nya la sogs pas nye bar bsten cing gnas pa yin pas de'i phyir nad pa de yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/'o na des nyes pa ci zhig byed ce na/_sha za dang srin po la sogs pa de dag ni bcud kyis len pa la sogs pa'i sman gyis stobs nad med pa 'joms shing med par byed pas/_nad rnams ji lta ji lta ba
[\[71b.2\]]bzhin du zhi bar byed pa'i thabs gzhan du byed pas sbyor ba mi 'grub pa'i phyir spang bar bya'o/_/tshe yi rig byed 'bras bu kun/_/tshe shes pa la gnas pa yin/_/de bas 'chi ltas rnam pa kun/_/sman pas 'bad de shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshe'i rig byed kyi 'bras bu ni nad med pas byed pa la sogs
[\[71b.3\]]pa'i tshul te/_de lta bu ma lus pa kun tshe shes pa'i sman pa rnams la gnas shing rgyud la yod pa yin pas de bas na 'chi ltas kyi rnam pa thams cad de nad med par gnas pa dang /_nad pa'i mtshan ma gang dag yin pa kun sman pas 'bad par ldan pas shes par bya'o/_/de yang tshe'i rig byed kyi 'bras bu ni 'di
[\[71b.4\]]dag yin te/_gang tshe gnas pa'i tshad shes pa dang /_de'i tshe srung zhing bskyangs pa yin pas de gnyis ka yang shes par bya dgos so/_/tshe dang bsod nams gnyi ga zad/_/de gnyis zad par ma gyur kyang /_/yang ba ni ma spangs pas/_/srog chags rnams ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di ltar tshe zad cing 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni/_yang
[\[71b.5\]]dag pa'i don mthong ba'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis rgyu rnam pa bzhi bshad de/_tshe zad pa zhes bya ba rang gi las nye bar bsags pa'i tshe gnas pa'i tshe tshad zad cing mthar thug pa dang /_de bzhin du bsod nams zad pa ste/_sngon chad legs par spyad par byas pa'i 'bras bu zad par gyur pa dang /_gnyi ga zad pa de bshad ma
[\[71b.6\]]thag pa'i tshe dang bsod nams gnyis ka zad pa dang /_yang de bzhin gnyis ka ma zad cing gnas pa yin du zin kyang /_ya nga ba mtshon dang dug la sogs pa ma spangs shing chu dang g.yang sa la sogs par lhung ba ste/_bzhi po de dag gis srog chags rnams 'chi zhing srog dang bral bar bshad la/_de las go bzlog pa tshe dang
[\[71b.7\]]bsod nams la sogs pa mi zad pa yang ba spang bas ni 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_lus kyi gnas le'u lnga pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//_
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]de nas lus kyi gnas kyi pho nya la sogs pa bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di brtsams pa'i 'brel pa ni 'di yin te/_nad pa la brten pa'i 'chi ltas kyi mtshan nyid bshad nas/_pho nya 'am bang chen la sogs pa'i rigs kyi tshul dris ba las
[\[72a.2\]]sman pa chas pa la sogs pa'i tshe nad pa la dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i mtshan ma ston pa yin pas na de'i 'og tu 'di brtsam pa yin no/_/pho nya ni gzhan gyis bsgo ba byed pa'i mngag gzhug pa la sogs pa smos pas ni/_sman pa dang phrad pa'i tshul dag dang /_yid
[\[72a.3\]]kyis rtogs pa dang chas pa dang lam du zhugs pa dang /_khyim du 'jug pa'i skabs kyi mtshan ma bzang ngan mthong ba dang /_rmi lam mthong ba bsdu bar bya ste/_de lta bu shes par bya ba la phan 'dogs shing dgos pa'i don de bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i don no/_/ya
[\[72a.4\]]mtshan can dang dge sbyong dang /_/rigs mthun pas ni grub par 'gyur/_/de las go bzlog pho nya ni/_/las ni 'grub min rtags su 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_ya mtshan can ni brtul zhugs kyi bye brag la gnas pa'i phyi rol pa'o/_/dge sbyong ni rab tu byung zhing tshangs par
[\[72a.5\]]spyod pa'o/_/rigs mthun pa ni rigs 'dra ba ste/_de lta bu'i pho nya 'ongs par gyur na/_gso ba'i las 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no/_/de las go bzlog pa ste/_ya mtshan can la sogs pa'i pho nya de las go bzlog par rigs mi mthun pa yin na gso ba'i las mi
[\[72a.6\]]'grub cing don med pa'i mtshan ma yin no/_/dman dang 'jigs rengs dngangs pa dang /_/rtsub dang bkra mi shis smra dang /_/mtshon cha dbyug thogs mgo reg dang /_/ma ning sma ra ral pa can/_/bkra mi shis pa'i ming dang ldan/_/sdig las bud med dri ma can/_/mang po nad pa mi
[\[72a.7\]]sdug dang /_/phreng ba byug pa dmar pos brgyan/_/til mar 'dam bskus gos rnying dang /_/mdog ngan rlan can gos gcig gyon/_/bong bu rnga mo ma he zhon/_/shing dang bong ba nyed pa dang /_/ring nas 'bod pa'i pho nya 'ongs/_/sman pas yongs su spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_pho nya
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]rigs mthun pa yin du zin kyang /_'di ltar dman pa dang /_'jigs pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis phye ba yin na sman pa 'gro bar mi bya ste/_de dag gso ba don med par 'gyur ba'i las yin no/_/de la dman pa ni zhum zhing sgyid lug pa dang bcas pa'o/_/'jigs
[\[72b.2\]]pa ni skrag pa'o/_/rengs pa ni drag pa'o/_/sdangs pa ni sbrul la sogs pas sdangs shing bred pa'o/_/rtsub cing zhes bya ba ni snying rje med par smra ba'o/_/bkra mi shis par smra ba ni yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mi shes par smra ba'o/_/mtshon cha thogs pa ni dgra cha thogs pa'o/_/dbyug
[\[72b.3\]]pa thogs pa ni dbyug pa 'chang ba'o/_/mgo reg ni skra bregs pa'o/_/ma ning ni bu tsha med pa'o/_/sma ra dang ral pa can ni sma ra 'phyang ba dang /_ral pa skra 'phyang ba dang ldan pa'o/_/bkra mi shis pa'i ming dang ldan pa ni sdig cing mi shis pa'i ming can no/_/sdig pa'i
[\[72b.4\]]las can ni nges par spyod pa'i las byed pa'o/_/bud med ni mo rigs so/_/dri ma can ni gos dri ma can gyon pa'o/_/mang po ni cig car du ma 'ongs pa'o/_/nad pa ni nad kyis nyam thag pa'o/_/mi sdug pa ni yan lag mi mdzes pa'o/_/phreng ba dang byug pa dmar pos
[\[72b.5\]]brgyan pa ni/_me tog dmar po'i phreng ba dang byug pa dmar pos lus brgyan pa'o/_/til mar 'dam bskus ni/_til mar gyi lde gu 'dam 'dra bas lus la byugs pa'o/_/gos rnying pa ni dengs pa'o/_/mdog ngan pa ni mdog ngan pa'o/_/rlan can ni chus bangs pa'o/_/
[\[72b.6\]]gos gcig gyon pa ni/_stod g.yogs sam smad g.yogs gcig gyon pa'o/_/bong bu dang rnga mo dang ma he zhon pa ni de la zhon te 'ongs pa'o/_/shing dang bong ba la sogs pa nyed cing 'jig pa dang /_de bzhin thag ring po nas 'bod cing ku co 'don pa'i pho nya 'ongs na yang sman pa
[\[72b.7\]]'gro bar mi bya'o/_/de spang zhing dor bar bya'o/_/bkra mi shis pa sems dang smra/_/gcer bu gcod dang 'jig pa dang /_/mtshun gtor me la sreg pa dang /_/'chi ba rnams la ster ba dang /_/sar nyal skra bshig skud pa dang /_/ngu dang ma bsdams gnas skabs su/_/sman
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]pa gnas tshe pho nya 'ongs/_/mi ni 'chi bar ston pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman pa la pho nya 'ongs pa'i tshe/_bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po yid la sems sam/_kha nas smra ba'am/_gcer bur 'dug cing gos med par 'dug pa dang /_rtsa la sogs
[\[73a.2\]]pa gcod pa'i skabs su'am/_bong ba la sogs pa 'jig pa'i skabs su 'am/_mtshun gtor me la sreg cing gnas pa 'am/_yang 'chi ba rnams la mtshun gtor ster cing gtor la skabs su sa la nyal zhing gnas pa dang /_skra bshig cing bkrol ba dang /_mar gyis lus
[\[73a.3\]]bskud cing byugs pa'am/_ngu zhing mya ngan byed pa 'am/_ma bsdams shing mi gtsang bar gnas pa'i skabs su pho nya 'ongs par gyur na/_nad pa 'chi zhing srog 'dor ba ston pa'i ltas yin no/_/nad dang mtshan nyid mtshungs pa yi/_/yul lam dus su sman pa
[\[73a.4\]]gnas/_/bang chen 'bod du 'ongs mthong na/_/nad pa de ni gso mi bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa gang rims la sogs pa dag na ba dang /_yon tan nam mtshan nyid 'dra zhing mtshungs pa'i yul lam dus te/_de lta bu'i yul lam de'i dus su sman pa gnas shing
[\[73a.5\]]'dug pa na/_bang chen pho nya sman pa la 'bod cing sbron du 'ongs pa mthong na nad de sman pas bcos shing gso bar mi bya'o/_/nad pa dang yul dus mtshungs pa'i tshul 'di ltar bad kan las byung ba'i rims la sogs pa nad kyis btab pas pho nya sman pa chu mang zhing rlan gyi
[\[73a.6\]]yul na gnas pa 'am/_nang par gyi skabs su pho nya 'ongs na mi shis pa yin no/_/mkhris pa'i nad la me la sogs pa'i tsha ba'i yul dang /_nyi ma phyed kyi dus su pho nya 'ongs na mi shis pa yin no/_/rlung gi nad la ni rtsub pa dang /_grang ba dang /_rdo dang /_bye ma
[\[73a.7\]]dang /_gshag ma la sogs pa'i phyogs su dgongs ka pho nya 'ongs na mi shis pa yin no/_/lte ba kha dang sna reg dang /_/skra dang spu dang sen mo so/_/mtshan rgyab nu ma mgrin pa dang /_/lto dang srin lag dag dang ni/_/ras bal phub ma zha nye rtsa/_/rus pa gtun brdung phyags
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]ma rdo/_/zhabs ma gos kyi mtha' ma dang /_/thal ba sol ba kha tshar sogs/_/thag pa gtun dang zhags pa srang /_/gzhan yang thog gi zhags pa thogs/_/pho nya de 'dra mngon du mthong /_/'chi ba dag tu ston pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang pho nya de'i mtshan nyid 'di dag
[\[73b.2\]]dang ldan pa yang mi shis shing 'chi ba'i mtshan ma yin par ston te/_de na de'i tshe pho nya gang dag 'ong ba lte ba la sogs par reg pa de ni mi shis pa yin pas de yang spang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin mtshan phyed nyi ma'i gung /_/thun mtshams dang ni dus tshigs dang /_/tshes drug tshes
[\[73b.3\]]bzhi tshes dgu dang /_/sgra gcan mjug rings 'char dus sogs/_/bra nye smin drug skag chu stod/_/gre dang khrums stod snubs dang ni/_/gang du pho nya nad pa yi/_/mtshan nyid la ni brten pa'i tshig_/mi dge smra dang mi shis mthong /_/der ni sman pa 'gro mi bya/_/zhes bya ba
[\[73b.4\]]la/_yang de bzhin du sman pa nad pa'i gam du 'gro ba na/_mtshan phyed la sogs pa'i dus dang /_tshes drug la sogs pa'i tshes grangs gsum dang /_sgra gcan dang mjug rings 'char pa'i dus dang /_sogs pa zhes smos pas nyi ma dang /_zla ba gzas zin par
[\[73b.5\]]mthong ba'i dus dang bra nye la sogs pa'i skar ma la bab pa'i nyin zhag la sman pa 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/yang gnas gang du pho nya 'ongs pa de nad pa'i mtshan nyid dam rang bzhin la brten pa'i tshig gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa mi shis pa'i rnam par smra ba dang /_mi shis
[\[73b.6\]]pa mthong bar gyur na/_sman pas nad pa gso ba'i phyir 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/dbang po ma tshang mi ro 'am/_/mi rus kyis ni brgyan pa 'am/_/chad dang tshig dang nyams chag dang /_/de yi tshig tu smra ba 'am/_/ro ni tsha dang drag pa'am/_/dri ni shas cher rul ba 'am/_/
[\[73b.7\]]reg bya rgya cher mi bzad dang /_/gang yang de 'dra gzhan dag ni/_/de kun mdun du smra ba 'am/_/yang na de skad smra ba'i tshe/_/pho nya 'ongs par mthong na ni/_/nad pa de ni gso mi bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang dbang po ma tshang ba la sogs pa'i tshig mi shis pa 'di dag gam/_
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]gzhan yang 'di dang cha 'dra ba dag dang /_kyi hud kyi hud ces bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas bshad pa'i tshig dag gam/_mdor na nad pa la brten pa'i tshig mi shis pa ston par byed pa/_brdzun du smra zhing 'ongs par ram/_/yang na nad pa'i
[\[74a.2\]]tshig gleng slong ba'i skabs mi shes par zer ba'i tshe/_pho nya 'ongs shing de nyid kyi tshe bang chen lhags na/_bang chen bdag po nad pa gso bar mi bya'o/_/de la 'dir dbang po ma tshang ba ni mig la sogs pa dbang po gang yang rung ba nyams pa ste/_/zhar ba dang zha bo la
[\[74a.3\]]sogs pa'o/_/mi ro ni mi shi ba'o/_/mi rus kyis brgyan pa ni mi rus dang /_de'i khrag dang gos la sogs pas brgyan pa'o/_/chad pa ni thag pa la sogs chad pa'o/_/tshig pa ni gos la sogs pa'o/_/nyams shing chag pa ni snod spyad la sogs pa'o/_/de'i
[\[74a.4\]]tshig tu smra ba ni/_chad do chag go/_/nyams so zhes bya ba la sogs pa smra ba'o/_/ro tsha ba ni na le sham la sogs pa'o/_/rul ba ni mi ro la sogs pa'i dri'o/_/de bzhin du reg bya ni rgya che zhing yangs pa'o/_/mi bzad cing bzod par dka' ba dang /_gzhan yang de
[\[74a.5\]]dang cha 'dra ba'i tshig dag smra na de gso bar mi bya'o/_/kyi hud kyi hud tsho nges 'debs/_/'o dod dmod mo 'gyel sbrid sgra/_/gos dang gdugs dang lham 'jig dang /_/sdug bsngal ba dag mthong ba dang /_/shing chen rgyal mtshan gang ba'i snod/_/chu nang 'bying bar mthong
[\[74a.6\]]ba dang /_/gsod sogs yid du mi 'ong smra/_/thal ba phyag dar gyis gtor dang /_/byi la sram dang sbrul dang ni/_/spre 'us lam ni bcad pa dang /_/'bar ba'i phyogs su ri dwags bya/_/gdug pa sgra ni sgrogs pa dang /_/'bru gnag bu ram dar ba dang /_/lan tshwa chang
[\[74a.7\]]rnying pags pa dang /_/yungs kar zhag dang 'bru mar dang /_/rtswa dang 'dam bu bud shing dang /_/ma ning mi sru na sme sha can/_/rgya dag dang ni rnyi rnams dang /_/slon dang bshang ba gtong ba dang /_/rnag dang mtshan ma ngan pa mthong /_/snying po med dang 'khrig pa spyod/_/ras
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]ba la sogs dang dgra bo mthong /_/mal stan dang ni khyogs la sogs/_/kha spub tu ni gnas par mthong /_/nad pa dag dang gzhan dag dang /_/snod sogs ngan mthong mi shis so/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman pa 'gro ba'i tshe/_kyi hud ces bya ba la sogs pa thos shing mthong na
[\[74b.2\]]'ang mi shis pa yin no/_/de yang kyi hud kyi hud ces zer cing ngu ba ni/_kyi hud kyi hud kyi nga ro 'don pa ste/_'o dod 'bod pa'i mi snyan pa zer ba 'am/_ce spyang la sogs pa'i sgra'o/_/dmod mo ni rmo mo 'debs pa ste/_de dag gi sgra thos pa dang /_yang 'gyel zhing
[\[74b.3\]]chag pa dang /_sbrid pa'i sgra thos pa dang /_gos la sogs pa ral cing 'jig pa dang /_de bzhin du sdug bsngal zhing phongs par gnas pa mthong ba dang /_de bzhin du shing chen po dang /_rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang /_'bru la sogs pas gang ba'i snod chu'i
[\[74b.4\]]nang du nub cing 'bying bar mthong ba dang /_de bzhin du bsad pa la sogs pa'i cho ga yid du mi 'ong zhing bkra mi shis par smra ba ste/_gsad do bcom mo lhung ngo zhig go tshig go zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gsang mthon por smra ba dang /_de bzhin du sman pa lam du
[\[74b.5\]]'gro ba na/_thal ba dang phyag dar la sogs pas gtor cing gos pa dang /_yang sman pa lam du 'gro ba na/_byi la la sogs pas lam bcad pa dang /_yang de bzhin du 'bar ba'i phyogs te nyi ma phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de na ri dwags dang /_bya dang /_
[\[74b.6\]]stag dang /_khra la sogs pa gdug pa sgra sgrogs na/_de yang bkra mi shis pa yin no/_/yang sman pa lam du 'gro ba 'am/_nad pa'i khyim du 'jug pa na/_'bru nag po la sogs pa mthong ba yang bkra mi shis pa ston par byed pa yin pas/_ras la sogs pa ni/_ras
[\[74b.7\]]bal phub ma zha nye rtsa/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa pho nya ba 'ongs pa'i skabs su bsdu ste/_de dag ni mthong na yang mi shis pa yin no/_/dgra bo mthong ba ni 'dir de'i skabs su yin pas sman pa'i dgra bo bzung ste de mthong ba yang mi shis so/_/yang de bzhin du mal stan kha sbubs pa la
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]sogs pa mthong ba yang mi shis pa yin pas/_mtshan ma de dag mthong na yang gso ba'i las mi brtsam mo/_/skyes bu'i ming can bya g.yon nas/_/bud med ming can g.yas 'dug bzang /_/zhes bya ba la/_'di dag ni ltas bzang po ste/_
[\[75a.2\]]bya skyes pa'i ming can dang pa dang /_ti ti ra dang /_par pa ta ka la sogs pa ste/_de ni g.yon phyogs na gnas shing skad sgrogs pa bzang la/_bud med kyi ming can sha ri ba dang /_/ljon mo la sogs pa ni g.yas na 'dug cing sgra 'byin pa bzang ngo /_/bya dang ri
[\[75a.3\]]dwags g.yas skor bzang /_/khyi dang wa ni de lta min/_/zhes bya ba la/_bya dang ri dwags rnams ni g.yon nas g.yas su bskor te 'gro ba bzang ste/_bya ni tsa sha dang khu byug la sogs pa'o/_/ri dwags ni spra la sogs pa'o/_/khyi dang wa ni de ltar 'gro ba bsngags
[\[75a.4\]]pa ma yin te/_gzhan du g.yas nas g.yon du bskor te 'gro ba bzang ngo /_/ri dwags rnams ni zung min shis/_/zhes bya ba la/_ri dwags rnams ni zung du mi them pa gcig dang gsum dang lnga dang bdun la sogs pa 'gro ba bzang ngo /_/tso sha bya rgod khany+dza ri/_/ne'u
[\[75a.5\]]le dang rma bya rnams/_/mthong ba rtag tu shis pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_tso sha dang bya rgod la sogs pa mthong ba ni/_rtag tu shis shing bsngags pa yin no/_/'ug pa byi la sbrul mthong ba/_/rnam pa kun tu shis ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'ug pa la sogs pa
[\[75a.6\]]mthong ba ni rnam pa kun tu ste/_thams cad nas thams cad du dge ba ma yin no/_/go da dang ni ri bong sbrul/_/dza ba ka ni ming thos dge_/_mthong dang sgra sgrogs ma yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang 'gro ba'i tshe srog chags go da la sogs pa'i ming sgrogs pa thos pa ni/_
[\[75a.7\]]dge ba yin gyi/_mthong ba dang sgra sgrogs pa thos pa ni dge ba ma yin no/_/dred dang spre'u de las bzlog_/ces bya ba la/_dred dang spre'u dag ni gong ma de las bzlog pa ste/_mthong ba dang sgra sgrogs pa thos pa ni dge ba yin gyi/_mi sgrogs pa thos pa ni dge ba ma yin no/_/
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]dpral ba'i phyogs su 'ja' tshon mthong /_/mi shis rgyab tu mthong na shis/_/zhes bya ba la/_'ja' tshon dpral ba'i phyogs kyi drang thad na mdun na gnas pa ni mi shis pa yin la/_mdun du phyogs pa ma gtogs pa rgyab tu gnas shing 'char ba ni dge zhing shis pa yin
[\[75b.2\]]no/_/me yis gang ba'i snod dag ni/_/chag dang khong stong gnas pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_lam du 'gro ba na mes gang ba'i snod lhung zhing chag par gyur pa'am/_khong stong du gnas na ni mi shis pa yin no/_/nad pa 'chi 'gyur khyim du ni/_/sman pa 'jug par
[\[75b.3\]]byed pa'i tshe/_/zho sogs bkra shis 'og nas bshad/_/gang ba'i snod phyir byung mthong dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur zhing nye bar srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i khyim du sman pa 'jug par byed pa na/_dus de nyid kyi nad pa'i khyim nas zho dang 'bru la sogs
[\[75b.4\]]pas gang ba'i snod 'og nas 'byung ba'i bkra shis kyi rdzas gang yang rung ba phyir 'byung bar mthong na yang mi shis pa yin no/_/pho nya la sogs mi shis mthong /_/de lta'i nad pa spang bar bya/_/de las gzhan par snying rje'i rgyud/_/dag pas 'bad de gso bar bya'o/_/zhes
[\[75b.5\]]bya ba la/_pho nya la sogs pa ji skad smos pa lta bu bkra mi shis pa mthong na nad pa de sman pas spang bar bya zhing gso bar mi bya'o/_/de las gzhan pa pho nya la sogs pa bkra shis pa'i rnam pa mthong na/_sman pas snying brtse zhing phan par 'dod pas/_sems kyi rgyud dag cing
[\[75b.6\]]skyon med par bya ste/_ma yengs shing 'bad pas nad de gso bar bya'o/_/zho 'bru bu ram shing dang khre/_/sbrang rtsi zhun mar pri yang ku/_/nas thug dngul rdo bum pa dang /_/dril bu mar me chu skyes dang /_/dUr ba nya dang sha rlon dang /_/'bras yos 'bras bu kha zas dang /_/bum
[\[75b.7\]]pa rin po che yis gang /_/bu mo gzhon dang shing rta dang /_/mi ni go 'phang mtho ba dang /_/lha rnams dang ni rgyal po dang /_/gos dkar gyon dang me tog dkar/_/khyim dang rnga yab rta dkar mthong /_/dam pa bram ze gtsug tor dung /_/rta babs dang ni g.yung drung dang /_sa ni brkos
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]par gyur pa dang /_/me ni rab tu 'bar ba dang /_/bza' btung yid du 'ong ba dang /_/mi yis shing rta legs gang dang /_/ba ni be'u dang bcas pa 'am/_/rgod ma bud med bu btsas dang /_/shang shang te'u sha bkra dang /_/dang pa khu byug rma bya dang /_/sa ra sa
[\[76a.2\]]ni sgra snyan sgrogs/_/de bzhin phyugs gcig btags pa dang /_/gdu bu me long yungs kar dang /_/gi wang rnams ni mthong ba dang /_/byug pa dri zhim gyis byugs dang /_/khu ba dkar zhing mngar ba dang /_/khyu mchog de bzhin ba lang rnams/_/rjes su mthun pa'i sgra
[\[76a.3\]]sgrogs dang /_/ri dwags bya dang mi rnams ni/_/yid 'ong sgra snyan smra ba yi/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan bsgreng /_/mngon par bstod par byed pa dang /_/rdza rnga dung dang rnga bo che/_/sgra dang bkra shis sgra sgrogs pa/_/bram ze rig byed 'don pa dang /_/bde ba'i rlung ni
[\[76a.4\]]rjes mthun rgyu/_/lam dang khyim du 'jug tshe yod/_/nad sos mtshan nyid yin zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_zho la sogs pa'i bkra shis kyi rdzas mthong ba dang reg pa dang /_mis thogs pa dag lam du 'gro zhing rgyu ba dag khyim gyi nang du 'gro ba yod na/_nad pa de nad
[\[76a.5\]]sos pa'i mtshan nyid yin par shes par bya'o/_/'bru ni nas la bya'o/_/la la ni 'bras la bya'o/_/zhes zer ro/_/bu ram shing ni pon da la sogs pa spom phras phye ba'o/_/khre ni 'bru'i khyad par ro/_/chu skyes ni pad+ma la sogs pa'o/_/nya dang sha ni gnyi ga rlon pa'o/_/
[\[76a.6\]]kha zas ni zas gang yang rung ba'o/_/rin po che ni bai DUr+ya la sogs pa'o/_/mi go 'phang mtho ba ni shes rab dang /_thos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_dpa' rtsal dang /_rgyal pos bkur ba la sogs pa'o/_/nyin re zhing 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i skyes bu mthong na yang shis
[\[76a.7\]]pa yin no/_/de bzhin du lha'i sku gzugs mthong ba dang /_rgyal po mthong ba dang /_gos dkar po gon pa dang /_su ma na la sogs pa'i me tog dkar po mthong ba yang shis pa yin no/_/dam pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i skyes bu'o/_/gtsug tor ni mgo la sogs pa'o/_/
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]rta babs ni lha'i khang pa la sogs pa'i mdun du shing rgyan can bsgreng ba'o/_/g.yung drung ni bkra shis zhes bya ba'i mtshan ma'o/_/shing rta legs par gang ba ni bkra shis par gnas pa'o/_/phyugs gcig btags pa ni ra la sogs pa'i phyugs gcig brtod pa'o/_/
[\[76b.2\]]gdu bu ni rgyan gyi dam pa'o/_/khyu mchog dang ba lang rnams rjes su mthun pa'i sgra sgrogs pa ni/_khros shing 'khrugs pa'i sgra ma yin pa'i sgra 'don pa'o/_/yang de bzhin du ri dwags la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i skad sgrogs pa ni bkra shis par smra ba'o/_/gdugs la
[\[76b.3\]]sogs pa bsgreng ba ni gyen du gdegs pa'o/_/ba dan ni rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan no/_/de bzhin du mngon par bstod pa ni gang rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs bkra shis smra ba la sogs pa'o/_/rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs
[\[76b.4\]]pa smra ba'i sgra dang /_rdza rnga la sogs pa'i sgra grag pa dang /_de bzhin du bram ze rig byed 'don pa'i sgra grag pa dang /_de bzhin du rlung rtsub cing rdul can ma yin pa bde ba dang ldan zhing rjes su mthun par rgyu zhing ldang ba ste/_de dag thams cad mthong ba dang /_reg
[\[76b.5\]]pa dang /_smra ba'i sgra sgrogs pa bkra mi shis pa'i rnam pa bsal zhing spangs nas/_nad sos pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi mchog ston pa yin no/_/tshig gi don gzhan dag ni go bar zad do/_/de ltar pho nya dge bshad nas/_de 'og rmi lam bshad bya ste/_/zhes bya
[\[76b.6\]]ba la/_de ltar zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rdzogs pa'i tshig go/_/pho nya ni ya mtshan can la sogs pa'i pho nya'o/_/zho la sogs pa ni ltas dge ba ste/_de dag bshad nas/_de'i 'og tu rmi lam gyi mtshan ma dge ba dang /_mi dge ba ston par byed pa bshad par bya'o/_/zhes
[\[76b.7\]]bya ba'i don no/_/rmi lam shi ba'i mi rnams dang /_/lhan cig chang 'thung khyis drangs gang /_/mi de rims kyi gzugs can gyi/_/'chi bdag gis ni myur khyer 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang zhig legs par gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du sngon chad shi ba'i mi rnams
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]dang lhan cig tu chang 'thung zhing khyis drangs shing drud par rmis pa'i mi gang yin pa de ni/_ring po mi thogs par rims [(]gyi [,]kyi[)]gzugs can gyi 'chi bdag gis khyer zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/_/lus dang gos dang phreng ba dmar/_/bud med rgod pas drangs rmis
[\[77a.2\]]gang /_/de ni khrag mkhris dag gis 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang zhig lus kyi mdog dmar ba dang /_phreng ba dmar zhing bud med rgod pas dbang med par drangs par rmis na mi de ni khrag dang mkhris pa'i 'chi bdag gis khyer bar 'gyur ro/_/ma he rta phag
[\[77a.3\]]bong bu dang /_/rnga mo zhon te lho phyogs 'gro/_/de ni gcong chen nad kyis 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang zhig ma he la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la zhon te lho phyogs gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro na/_de ni gcong chen po'i nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/lcug ma
[\[77a.4\]]tsher can 'od ma'am/_/ta la snying gar skyes pa rmi/_/gang yin de ni skran gyis 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang lcug ma tsher ma can snying gar skyes pa rmi ba'am/_'od ma'am/_ta la'i shing snying gar skyes pa rmi na skran gyi gzugs can gyi 'chi bdag gis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[77a.5\]]gang zhig me ni mi 'bar la/_/sbyin sreg byed cing mar gyis bskus/_/gcer bur 'dug dang pad+ma ni/_/snying gar byung rmi mdze yis 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang zhig me mi 'bar ba ste/_me lce med pa la sbyin sreg byed par rmi ba dang /_mar gyis lus bskus shing
[\[77a.6\]]gcer bur 'dug la/_pad+ma snying ga nas byung zhing skye bar rmis na/_de mdze nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig sme sha can lhan cig_/snum mang 'thung bar rmi ba de/_/gcin nad kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang zhig rigs ngan sme sha
[\[77a.7\]]can gyi rigs dang lhan cig mar dang /_til mar la sogs pa'i snum mang po 'thung bar rmis na/_de gcin nad kyi gzugs can gyi 'chi bdag gis khyer zhing dbang du byas par 'gyur ro/_/srin po lhan cig gar byed cing /_/chu la bying rmi smyo byed 'dzin/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]yang mi gang zhig srin po rnams dang lhan cig gar gyi bya ba byed cing chu la nub pa rmis na/_smyo byed kyi gzugs can gyi 'chi bdag gis khyer bar 'gyur ro/_/ra ro gar byed shi ba yi/_/mis khyer rmi ba brjed byed 'dzin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang gang zhig rmi lam gyi nang
[\[77b.2\]]du ra ro zhing gar byed la 'chi ba'i mis khyer zhing khrid par rmi ba de brjed byed kyi gdon gyis bzung nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/bong bu rnga mo byi la spre'u/_/seng ge stag dang khwa dag dang /_/wa 'am mi ro la zhon rmis/_/de ni 'chi bdag khar song yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang
[\[77b.3\]]zhig rmi lam du bong bu la sogs pa la zhon pa rmis pa de ni 'chi bdag gi kha'i nang du son cing chud pa yin no/_/snum khur sha khu li zos rmis/_/sad nas de 'dra slon gyur pa/_/gang yin de ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang dag gi rmi lam du snum khur la sogs
[\[77b.4\]]pa zos pa rmis nas/_sad pa'i 'og tu snum khur la sogs pa de 'dra slon par gyur na de 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/nyi zla gzas zin rmis mig na/_/nyi ma zla ba ltung ba yi/_/rmi lam mthong na long bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang gang gi rmi lam du nyi ma dang zla ba gzas
[\[77b.5\]]bzung zhing dmar ba rmis na/_de mig nad kyis btab par 'gyur ro/_/yang nyi ma dang zla ba de nyid sa la lhung ba rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur na/_de gtan du long bar 'gyur zhing mthong ba nyams par 'gyur ro/_/spyi bor 'od ma'i lcug sogs skyes/_/de bzhin bya rog tshang 'cha'
[\[77b.6\]]dang /_/mgo bo chad par rmis pa dang /_/khwa dang bya rog sogs kyis bskor/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang dag gi rmi lam du 'od ma la sogs pa'i shing gi lcug ma skyes pa nas/_bya rog dang 'ug pa la sogs pa'i srog chags kyis bskor ba'i bar de dag kyang mi 'tsho'o/_/de bzhin
[\[77b.7\]]yi dwags sha za mo/_/byad ma sme sha can gyis bskor/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du yi dwags nas sme sha can gyis bskor ba rmi ba yang mi 'tsho'o/_/'od ma'i tshal dang tsher ma dang /_/rtswa yi tshang tshing nang du chud/_/ces bya ba la/_'od ma'i tshal la sogs pa'i tshang tshing shin tu
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]stug pa'i nang du chud cing nyam thag par rmis pa yang mi 'tsho'o/_/g.yang sar lhung dang dur khrod nyal/_/phyag dar thal ba'i nang du lhung /_/zhes bya ba la/_g.yang sa'i khrod du lhung ba dang /_dur khrod dang dur sa'i nang du nyal bar rmis pa dang /_
[\[78a.2\]]phyag dar ram thal ba'i phung po'i nang du lhung bar rmis pa de yang mi 'tsho'o/_/chu dang 'dam la sogs par nub/_/chu rgyun gyis ni myur du khyer/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang zhig chu la sogs pa'i nang du nub cing bying ba'am/_chu rgyun 'bab pa'i shugs kyis myur
[\[78a.3\]]du khyer bar rmi na de yang mi 'tsho'o/_/glu gar dang ni rol mo dang /_/gos dang phreng ba dmar po 'chang /_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa'i rmi lam du glu len pa la sogs pa rmi zhing gos la sogs pa dmar po 'chang ba yang mi shis te 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/lus 'phel na
[\[78a.4\]]tshod rgas pa dang /_/bag ma len zhing kha spu 'dreg_/ces bya ba la/_yang rmi lam du lus kyi yan lag 'phel ba dang /_na tshod rgas pa dang /_bag ma len cing 'dus pa dang /_skra dang kha spu 'dreg pa rmi ba yang mi shis pa yin no/_/zas btsos snum za chang 'thungs
[\[78a.5\]]dang /_/skyugs dang 'khru ba rmi ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du kha zas btsos pa dang /_snum bag za ba dang /_chang mang po 'thungs pa dang /_skyugs pa dang /_'khru ba rmi ba yang mi shis pa yin no/_/lcags dang gser dag rnyed pa dang /_/btsong dang rtsod las
[\[78a.6\]]pham pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rmi lam du lcags dang gser gnyis rnyed pa dang /_btsong ba dang /_rtsod cing 'thab pa las pham par 'gyur ba rmi na yang mi dge'o/_/mchil lham gnyis ni stor ba dang /_/rkang pags lhung ba rmi ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_lham mam
[\[78a.7\]]mchil lham gnyis stor ba rmis pa'am/_de bzhin du rkang pa gnyis kyi pags pa sa la ltung bar rmi ba yang mi dge ba yin no/_/shin tu dga' dang rab khros pa'i/_/shi ba'i gnyen gyis spyos pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rmi lam du shin tu dga' zhing rangs pa dang /_rab tu
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]khros shing 'khrugs pa'i sngon chad shi ba'i nye du pha ma la sogs pas yid spyos pa rmis pa yang mi dge'o/_/mar me gza' dang skar ma dang /_/so mig lha yi gzugs rnams ni/_/lhung ba 'am 'jig pa rmis pa 'am/_/ri bo ral bar gyur pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rmi lam
[\[78b.2\]]gyi nang du mar me la sogs pa lhung zhing 'gyel ba 'am/_'jig cing brlag par rmis pa yang shin tu mi dge ba yin no/_/de bzhin du ri bo ral zhing 'jig pa rmis pa yang mi shis pa yin no/_/nags tshal 'bar ba'i nang dang ni/_/sdig can khyim du 'jug pa dang /_/
[\[78b.3\]]ro bsregs pa dang mun par zhugs/_/ma yi mngal du zhugs pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_nags tshal me tog 'bar ba'i nang du 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin du rkun po la sogs pa sdig can gyi khyim du 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin du ro bsregs pa'i gnas dang /_
[\[78b.4\]]mun par zhugs shing chud pa dang /_ma'i mngal du slar zhugs shing gnas par rmis pa yang rmi lam mi dge ba yin no/_/brag dang khang par sar lhung dang /_/de bzhin nya yis mid pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_brag gi rtse dang khang pa brtsegs ma dang /_gzhan yang de
[\[78b.5\]]lta bu'i gnas mthon po nas lhung ba rmis pa dang /_de bzhin du nyas mid cing zos pa rmis pa yang shis pa ma yin no/_/chos gos gyon pa'i mi srun dang /_/gcer bu dbyug pa thogs pa dang /_/mig dmar kha dog gnag pa ni/_/mthong ba gang yang shis ma yin/_/
[\[78b.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_chos gos tshon can gyon pa dang /_gzugs shin tu mi sdug pa dang /_mi srun par ston pa dang /_gcer bu gos med pa dang /_lag na dbyug pa thogs pa dang /_skyes bu mig dmar zhing kha dog shin tu gnag pa'i gzugs rmi lam du mthong ba ste/_
[\[78b.7\]]de dag ni nam yang bkra shis shing dge bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/bud med sdig can gdong gnag dang /_/skra dang sen mo nu ma ring /_/gos dang phreng ba dmar po thogs/_/rmis pa dus mtshan yin par 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_rmi lam gyi nang du bud med sdig can mi srun pa'i
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]bzhin ras can snag tsha ltar gnag pa/_skra dang sen mo dang nu ma ring zhing 'phyang ba/_gos la sogs pa dmar po gyon zhing thogs pa rmi lam du rmis pa ni dus mtshan te/_de ni gshin rje'i 'khor dus mtshan zhes bya ba yin par slob dpon dag 'dod
[\[79a.2\]]do/_/nad ni stobs dang ldan pa yis/_/yid 'jug bu ga bkag pa'i phyir/_/mi bzad rmi lam mthong 'gyur te/_/nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/_/nad med the tshom bcas gyur zhing /_/'ga' zhig thar bar 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad
[\[79a.3\]]kan gyi nad kyi dri ma stobs dang ldan zhing shin tu shas che bar gyur pas/_yid ches par bya ba sems gang du 'jug cing rgyu ba'i bu ga'i rgyun srang nad kyis bkag cing /_gang gi phyir mi bzad cing gnod pa byed la/_bkra mi shis par 'gyur ba'i rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur la/_
[\[79a.4\]]de lta bu gang zhig mthong ba de nad kyis nyam thag pa'i nad pa ni 'chi bar 'gyur la/_gang zhig nad med cing tha mal par gnas pas rmi lam de lta bu mthong bar gyur na/_dus gzhan zhig na nad kyis btab nas 'chi ba 'am 'tsho ba gtol med pa'i the tshom dang bcas par 'gyur
[\[79a.5\]]la/_de las kyang 'ga' zhig rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu bsten pa'i shugs kyis 'chi ba las thar bar 'gyur zhing 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/mthong dang thos dang nyams myong dang /_/gsol ba btab dang brtags pa dang /_/'byung bar 'gyur dang nad las
[\[79a.6\]]byung /_/rmi lam rnam pa bdun du bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_rmi lam gyi dbye ba ni mthong ba la sogs pa'i rnam pas rnam pa bdun du yod do/_/de la mthong ba'i rmi lam ni gnyid kyis ma log pa'i gnas skabs su mig gis mthong zhing nyams su myong ba de rmi lam gyi
[\[79a.7\]]gnas skabs su de 'dra ba'i rnam par rmis pa mthong ba'o/_/thos pa ni rna ba'i dbang pos sgra tsam du thos pa'o/_/nyams su myong ba ni rig pa'i tshul gyis nyams su myong ba'o/_/gsol ba btab pa ni/_don du gnyer zhing yid la 'dod pa'i don gsol ba btab pa'o/_/
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]brtags pa yid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du brtags shing yid la byed pa'o/_/'byung bar 'gyur ba ni phyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/nad las byung ba ni rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang bad kan las byung bar gyur pa'o/_/de las dang po'i lnga po
[\[79b.2\]]dang /_/rang gi rang bzhin nyin mo brjed/_/shin tu ring thung 'bras bu med/_/cha 'dres pa yi rang bzhin can/_/zhes bya ba la/_rmi lam de dag gi nang nas/_dang po'i rmi lam lnga po mthong ba la sogs pa lnga ni 'bras bu med cing mi bden pa yin no/_/de bzhin du
[\[79b.3\]]rang gi rang bzhin gyi nad gzhi las byung ba dang /_rjes su mthun pa de yang 'bras bu med pa yin te/_rlung gi rang bzhin can la rlung gi rang bzhin dang mthun pa rmis pa'i rmi lam dang /_mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can la mkhris pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i rmi lam nas/_
[\[79b.4\]]cha 'dres pa'i rang bzhin can la/_cha 'dres pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rmi lam rmis pa yang don med pa yin no/_/de bzhin du nyin mo rmis pa yang rmis nas brjed pa dang /_shin tu yun ring ba dang /_shin tu yun thung ba yang 'bras bu med pa yin no/_/mtshan stod rmi lam
