[\[79b.5\]]'bras bu ring /_/mthong ba chung ngu byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshan stod phyed pa yan chad rmi lam rmis pa ni de'i 'bras bu thag ring ba yin la/_mthong ba de yang shas chung zhing mthong ba zhan pa yin no/_/nang par mthong dang gnyid ma log_/mi mthun gtam
[\[79b.6\]]gyis bar ma chod/_/de yi nyin par 'bras chen 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_nang par ba lang gzas la gtong ba'i tshe/_rmi lam mthong ba de ni/_de'i nyin par nyid 'bras bu chen po mthong ba yin no/_/yang rmi lam de mthong nas gnyid kyis ma log cing rmi lam gzhan gyis
[\[79b.7\]]bar ma chod pa dang /_de bzhin du de dang mi mthun pa'i tshig gis chod par ma gyur na/_de de'i nyin par mthong zhing 'bras bu dang yang bcas pa yin no/_/sbyin dang sbyin sreg la sogs kyis/_/rmi lam 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gal te rmi lam ngan pa zhig rmis na
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]de'i rjes la de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin sreg la sogs pa byas na/_rmi lam ngan pa de 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur ro/_/sogs pa smos pas ni brtul zhugs dang gtsang sbra dang sems nang du 'du zhing bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[80a.2\]]bkra shis kyi cho ga byas pa la sogs pa bsdu'o/_/gang zhig rmi lam ngan mthong nas/_/slar yang gnas skabs de nyid du/_/rmi lam bzang po mthong gyur na/_/'bras bu bzang po nyid thob 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhig gis rmi lam ngan zhing mi dge ba mthong zhing rmis nas yang
[\[80a.3\]]gnas skabs de nyid du rmi lam ngan pa'i rjes la rmi lam bzang zhing dge bar gyur pa mthong na/_skyes bu des 'bras bu bzang po nyid 'thob par 'gyur gyi/_rmi lam ngan pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur ro/_/lha dang bram ze khyu mchog dang /_/ba lang rgyal po mdza' bshes gson/_/skyes bu dam pa
[\[80a.4\]]grags ldan dang /_/me 'bar ba dang dwangs pa'i mtsho/_/bu mo khye'u ser ba dang /_/gos dkar gyon zhing mdangs dang ldan/_/skyes bus bza' dang lus 'bar dang /_/khrag gis lus kun byugs pa dag_/gang gis mthong bar gyur pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_lha la sogs pa'i rmi
[\[80a.5\]]lam bzang po 'di lta bu gang gis mthong ba de tshe ring ba la sogs pa'i yon tan thob par 'gyur ro/_/lha ni brgya byin dang chu lha la sogs pa'o/_/mdza' bshes ni mdza' bo ste de yang gson po'o/_/skyes bu dam pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i ngang tshul can no/_/grags ldan ni
[\[80a.6\]]snyan pas kun tu khyab pa'i mi'o/_/me 'bar ba ni shing mang po dang bcas shing 'bar ba'o/_/dwangs pa'i mtsho ni rnyog pa med pa'i mtsho'o/_/bu mo dang khye'u ni na tshod dang po la gnas pa ste/_de yang kha dog ser ba dang /_gos dkar po gyon zhing mdangs dang ldan zhing
[\[80a.7\]]gzugs bzang ba'o/_/skyes bu za ba ni mi'i zas za ba'o/_/lus 'bar ba ni lus me'i phung po ltar 'bar ba'o/_/khrag gis lus kun bsgos pa ni khrag gis bsgos shing byugs pa ste/_de lta bu'i rnam pa gang gis rmi lam du mthong ba de ni dge ba yin no/_/gdugs
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]dang sha rlon me long dug_/sna ma dkar pos gos pa dang /_/mi gtsang gis byugs 'bras bu rnyed/_/ces bya ba la/_yang skyes bu gang zhig rmi lam gyi nang du gdugs la sogs pa rnyed pa rmis pa des kyang tshe ring ba la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/dug ni ha la ha la
[\[80b.2\]]'am btsan dug la sogs pa'o/_/sna ma'i me tog dkar po ni bar bar na kha dog rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o/_/mi gtsang bas byugs pa ni bshang bas lus la byugs pa'o/_/'bras bu ni a mra'i shing thog dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_sta rga'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'o/_/
[\[80b.3\]]ri bo khang bzangs 'bras bcas shing /_/'dzeg dang seng ge glang chen rmi/_/rta dang ba lang dag la zhon/_/zhes bya ba la/_rmi lam du ri bor 'dzeg pa la sogs pa rmis pa yang bde ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/ri bo ni brag ri'o/_/khang bzangs ni khang pa brtsegs pa'i
[\[80b.4\]]steng ngo /_/'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing ni shing tog phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa ste/_de dag la 'dzeg pa dang /_chu bo mtsho bran rgya mtsho brgal/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang zhig rmi lam du chu bo la sogs pa las brgal zhing thar bar rmis pa de yang bde ba
[\[80b.5\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/shar dang byang du 'gro ba dang /_/bgrod min 'gro dang shi ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mi gang shar ram byang gi lam du rmi lam du 'gro ba rmi ba dang /_bgrod min 'gro ba ste/_rang dang ris mi mthun pa'am/_gdol pa la sogs pa spyod pa rmis pa
[\[80b.6\]]dang /_bdag nyid shi bar rmi ba de yang tshe ring ba la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/nyam nga las thar lha rnams dang /_/pha mas mngon par bstod pa dang /_/ngu dang lhung las ldang ba dang /_/dgra bo pham par byas pa ni/_/gang rmis tshe ring nad med dang /_/nor mang po ni rnyed
[\[80b.7\]]par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang gang zhig nyam nga zhing dogs pa'i gnas las thar zhing byung ba dang /_de bzhin du lha dang pham la sogs pas rmi lam gyi nang du bstod pa dang bkur ba rmi ba dang /_yang gang zhig ngu zhing mchi ma 'byin pa dang /_de bzhin du sa la lhung zhing 'gyel ba
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]las ldang ba dang /_de bzhin du sdang bar sems pa'i dgra bo pham par byas pa'i rmi lam skyes bu gang zhig rmis par byas pa de tshe ste srog gnas pa dang /_nad med pa ste bde bar gnas pa dang /_nor dang 'byor pa mang po rnyed cing thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[81a.2\]]de bzhin nad pa'i g.yog 'khor ni/_/bkra shis cho ga phun sum tshogs/_/dad ldan rjes su mthun pa dang /_/nor mang bsdus par gyur pa dang /_/snying stobs mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing /_/sman pa bram ze sogs la gus/_/gso dpyad rnams la skyo ba med/_/de ni nad med
[\[81a.3\]]'gyur mtshan nyid/_/ces bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du nye du dang chung ma dang bran la sogs pa'i g.yog 'khor yon tan dang ldan pa dang /_bkra shis shing dam pa'i spyod pa'i cho ga'i rjes su mthun pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_nad pa dad pa dang ldan
[\[81a.4\]]pas sman dpyad byas pas nga'i nad legs par sos so zhes yid ches pa dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du sman pa'i man ngag dang rjes su mthun par byed cing gus pa dang /_de bzhin du nor mang du bsdus shing yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_snying stobs
[\[81a.5\]]kyi mtshan nyid gtsang sbra dang yod par lta ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du sman pa dang bram ze la sogs pa la gus shing 'dud pa dang /_de bzhin du gso dpyad kyi sbyor ba sman btung ba la sogs pa la skyo zhing sgyid lug pa med pa ste/_'khor dang rang gi yon
[\[81a.6\]]tan de lta bu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni nad med cing bde ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam rtags yin no/_/rtag tu shis pa sdud pa dang /_/bkra mi shis pa rnam par spang /_/'di dag de nyid mthong ba yi/_/drang srong rnams kyis shis par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_yang dus
[\[81a.7\]]rtag tu bkra shis par 'gyur ba'i dngos po sdud cing nye bar bsags pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po nye bar spyod pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad nye bar spong zhing 'dor bar 'gyur ba ste/_sdud pa dang spang ba 'di dag ni de kho na nyid mthong zhing mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]srong rnams kyis bkra shis shing dge bar 'gyur bar bshad pa des kyang nad med pa'i mtshan nyid du bshad do/_/de ltar 'di ni skye dang 'chi/_/mtshan nyid gang phyir bshad pas na/_/de phyir lus kyi gnas yin pas/_/'di ni lus kyi gnas su bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_
[\[81b.2\]]de ltar zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rdzogs pa ste/_lus kyi gnas 'dir lus de'i skye ba dang 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa gang gi phyir bshad cing bstan pa nas/_rgyu de'i phyir lus kyi gnas kyi skye ba dang 'chi ba yin pas/_gnas 'di ni lus kyi gnas yin no zhes bshad
[\[81b.3\]]cing bstan pa yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_lus kyi gnas kyi le'u drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//lus
[\[81b.4\]]kyi gnas te gnas gnyis pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so//_//de nas nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di brtsams pa'i dgos pa ni 'di yin te/_gong du ni lus thams cad bshad pa yin la/_de la rims la
[\[81b.5\]]sogs pa'i nad thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur bas/_de rnam par 'jig pas nad gzhi'i gnas bshad pa yin no/_/de nas zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin to/_/nad kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas nad thams cad do/_/rgyu gang gis nges par 'byin zhing
[\[81b.6\]]bskyed la 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni nad gzhi ste/_de ltar na nad thams cad 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de bshad par bya'o zhes pa'o/_/de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
[\[81b.7\]]skras kyang /_nad dang sdig pa rims gnod byed/_/'gyur byed sdug bsngal ma zhu'i skyon/_/zad byed 'tsho dka' mkhun gnod skyed/_/ming gi rnam grangs sgras bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad la sogs pa'i sgra ni gcig gis gcig bshad pa'i rnam grangs tshig don
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]gcig ston par byed pa yin te/_ci'i phyir nad ces bya zhe na/_sdig pa la sogs pa'i ming gi rnam pas sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i don gyis na nad ces bya'o/_/nad gzhi sngar byung tshul dang ni/_/de bzhin tshul phyed goms byed dang /_/dkyil
[\[82a.2\]]gyur shes par byed pa ste/_/nad ni rnam pa lngar shes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad rnams kyi tshul ni nad gzhi las dkyel du gyur pa'i bar du rnam pa lngar shes shing rtogs par bya'o/_/de dag gi tshul yang ji lta bu zhe na/_gzhi dang rgyu dang skye mched dang /_/rkyen dang slong bar byed
[\[82a.3\]]pa'i rgyu/_/rnam grangs kyis ni nad gzhir bshad/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam grangs kyi sgra 'di dag gis dang po nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid drang srong chen po rnams kyis bshad cing bstan pa yin no/_/gang gis sngar byung tshul shes pas/_/nad ni 'byung bar 'dod 'gyur la/_/
[\[82a.4\]]bye brag phyed par ma gyur pa/_/nad kyi tshul ni ji bzhin par/_/chung phyir mtshan nyid mi gsal ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngar byung ba'i tshul lam/_rtags gang gis nad kyi gzhi sngar byung ba'i tshul shes shing rtogs par 'gyur ba ni nad 'byung zhing phyis mi ldang bar ni 'dod
[\[82a.5\]]par 'gyur la/_nad rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi bye brag phyed cing gsal bar ma gyur la/_rims la sogs pa'i nad kyi tshul phyis ji lta bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du de'i rtags dang mtshan nyid mi gsal zhing mngon du mi snang ba de ni sngar byung ba'i tshul zhes
[\[82a.6\]]bya'o/_/de nyid gsal ba nyid gyur pa/_/tshul phyed pa zhes bya bar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_sngar byung ba'i tshul de nyid gsal zhing bye brag phyed par gyur pa la ni nad kyi tshul phyed pa zhes bya bar bshad do/_/dbyibs dang gsal mngon rtags dang ni/_/mtshan nyid mtshan
[\[82a.7\]]ma rnams yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad kyi tshul phyed pa de'i ming gi rnam grangs sgra'i tshul gzhan gyis bstan pa ni/_/dbyibs dang gsal ba la sogs pa'o/_/rgyu dang nad dang mi mthun zhing /_/mi mthun pa yi don byed pa'i/_/sman dang zas dang spyod lam rnams/_/nye bar
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]bsgyur bas bde gyur pa/_/nyams brtas byed par shes bya ste/_/de ni goms pa zhes byar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_goms shing brten par byed pas na goms pa ste/_nye bar bsgyur ba gang gis lus bde bar 'gyur ba de la drang srong rnams kyis goms pa zhes bya bar
[\[82b.2\]]bshad do/_/gang gis nye bar bsgyur ba goms pa zhe na/_sman la sogs pa ste/_sman ni a ru ra dang /_sle tres la sogs pa'o/_/zas ni sA lu rtsa snar la sogs pa'o/_/spyod lam ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par te rtsol ba dang /_gnyid ma
[\[82b.3\]]log pa dang /_glu dang kha ton 'don pa dang /_bsam gtan la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o/_/de dag kyang nad kyi rgyu dang nad dang mi mthun pa'i don byed cing /_nad gzhir 'gyur ba'i tshul las go bzlog pa dang /_de bzhin du nad kyi rgyu de dag dang mi mthun pa'i don byed
[\[82b.4\]]pa'o/_/nad kyi rgyu dang mi mthun par bsten pa la/_rgyu dang mi mthun pa ni dper na rtas par byed pa las byung ba'i nad las nyams dmad pa dang /_nyams dmad pa las byung ba la rtas par byed pa dang /_rtsub pa las byung ba snum pa dang /_snum pa las byung ba la rtsub
[\[82b.5\]]par bya ba dang /_spyod lam mi mthun pa ni/_gnyid log pa las byung ba la gnyid ma log par bya ba dang /_gnyid ma log pa las byung ba la gnyid log par bya ba dang /_'dug pa las byung ba la brtsal bar bya ba dang /_brtsal ba las byung ba la 'dug par bya ba ste/_
[\[82b.6\]]de dag la sogs pa ni rgyu dang mi mthun pa'o/_/nad dang mi mthun pa ni dper na/_rims nad la gla sgang dang par pa ta la sogs pa sbyin pa dang /_gcin nad la skyer pa dang nas thug la sogs pa sbyin pa lta bu dang /_spyod lam ni snum gyi cho ga'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra
[\[82b.7\]]bar thams cad go bzlog pa'o/_/mi mthun pa'i byed pa ni dper na chang las byung ba'i nad la chang nyid byin na/_chang las byung ba'i nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur zhing sman du 'gyur ba dang /_zas ni dper na tshad pa 'khru ba'i nad la/_nas dang ma sha dang rgya sne'u la sogs pa byin pas
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_spyod lam ni dper na mes tshig pa la mes bsro ba nyid phan pa lta bu dang /_gzhan yang dper na skyugs pa'i nad la skyug sman btang ba dang /_kha zas kyang de 'byin par byed pas sA lu la sogs pa byin pa dang /_spyod lam
[\[83a.2\]]ni sor mo dang ut+pa la'i chu la sogs pas slon du gzhug pa lta bu de la ni nye bar bsgyur bas bde bar 'gyur ba'i goms pa zhes bya ste/_gang gi phyir de nyid goms pa ni nad zhi bar byed pas na goms pa zhes bya'o/_/de las bzlog pa'i ma goms nad/_/mi 'phrod nad
[\[83a.3\]]ces bya ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_gong ma de las bzlog pa ma gtogs pa ste/_goms pa'i mtshan nyid ji skad du bstan pa'i nye bar bsgyur ba de dang mi mthun pa dang /_sman la sogs pa bsten pas sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba las nyams par byed pa de la ni
[\[83a.4\]]mi 'phrod pa zhes bya ste/_de nyid ni ma goms pa'i nad ces bya'o/_/gang gis nad ni dkyel gyur pas/_/ji bzhin rjes su 'phel 'gyur zhing /_/nad rnams rdzogs shing mngon gyur pa/_/skyes shing 'ongs pa dkyel gyur yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rnam pa gang gis rlung la
[\[83a.5\]]sogs pa'i nad dkyel du gyur cing sogs pa dang /_ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'phel zhing shas cher skye bar 'gyur bas nad kyi tshul lam dbyibs kyi khyad par so sor skyes shing nad rnams rdzogs par gyur nas/_mngon du gyur pa de la ni dkyel skyes pa zhes bya'o/_/yang
[\[83a.6\]]de nyid ni skyes shing 'ongs pa zhes kyang bya ste/_de nyid mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ni grangs brtag gtso bo dang /_/stobs dang dus kyis phye ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dkyel skyes pa ni grangs la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lngar gyur pa yin no/_/grangs ni ji ltar 'di
[\[83a.7\]]nyid las/_/rim ni brgyad du bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dbye ba de yang ji ltar na nad gzhi bstan pa 'di nyid las rim rnam pa brgyad yod par bshad pa lta bu ni re zhig grangs kyi rnam pa bshad pa yin te/_de yang de bzhin du khrag dang mkhris pa ni rnam pa gsum dang /_
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]lud pa ni rnam pa lnga'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grangs yin par shes par bya'o/_/nad rnams spyir ni bsdus ba las/_/cha shas dbye ba brtag pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad tha mi dad pa spyir gcig tu bsdus pa las cha shas su dbye zhing cha re re bgos pa
[\[83b.2\]]ni brtag pa zhes bya'o/_/rang dbang gzhan dbang gnyis las ni/_/nad rnams gtso bor bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rang dang gzhan gyi dbang du zhes bya ba rjes su 'brel pa yod pa dang /_rjes su 'brel pa med pa'i tshul rnam pa gnyis las nad rnams la gtso bor gyur
[\[83b.3\]]pa zhes bshad pa yin no/_/rgyu sogs ma lus phyogs gcig las/_/stobs ni che chung shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad kyi rgyu ni nad gzhi sngar byung ba'i tshul dang /_tshul phyed pa dang /_goms pa rnams ma lus pa 'am/_phyogs gcig las stobs che chung
[\[83b.4\]]gi bye brag tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/_nad gzhi la sogs pa bzhi po de dag las ma lus pa'i khyad par tha dad par 'gyur ro/_/nad re re zhing bstan bcos rtsom par byed pas nad kyi rgyur bshad pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad nas thams cad du ma lus par
[\[83b.5\]]nad skyed par byed pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa yin nam/_'on te phyogs gcig gis kyang nad skyed par 'gyur/_de bzhin du mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad du rdzogs pa yin nam/_ma rdzogs pa yod ces rtogs na/_de'i phyir smras pa ni/_nyin mtshan dus dang zas
[\[83b.6\]]zos chas/_/nyes pa ji bzhin nad kyi dus/_/zhes bya ba la/_nyin mo dang mtshan mo dang dus dang zas zos pa ni nyin mtshan dus dang zas zos pa zhes bya ste/_de rnams kyi cha ni cha shas te/_des nyes pa ji ltar 'byung ba ni nad kyi dus yin par shes par bya ste/_de ltar na dus kyi
[\[83b.7\]]khyad par gyis phye ba yin no/_/de ltar nad gzhi'i don bshad nas/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar mdor bsdus pa'i rnam pa 'dis nad gzhi zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don bshad cing bstan pa yin no/_/de ni rgyas par bshad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi'i don de 'og nas gzhung
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]rtsom par byed pas rgya cher ston cing 'chad pa yin no/_/nad rnams kun gyi nad gzhi ni/_/nad ni 'khrugs par gyur pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnod par gyur pa'i nad ma lus pa kun gyi rgyu 'am gzhi ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan te/_nad kyi skyon
[\[84a.2\]]gsum po 'khrugs shing g.yos par gyur pa las ldang zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/de ni gnod 'gyur sna tshogs pa/_/bsten pas ldang bar 'gyur bar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_de rnams ldang ba'i rgyu ni zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa gnod par 'gyur ba rnam pa
[\[84a.3\]]sna tshogs pa bsten pas rlung la sogs pa'i nad ldang zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gsum po'i sbyor ba rnam pa gsum/_/gnod 'gyur sngar ni bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum po'i sbyor ba rnam pa gsum po chung ba dang /_log
[\[84a.4\]]pa dang /_drag pa'i mtshan nyid gnod par 'gyur ba sngar mdo'i gnas kyi skabs su bshad pa yin no/_/kha dang tsha dang bska cung zad/_/rtsub dang bcud med sra ba dang /_/bkag dang nan gyis btsir ba dang /_/mtshan mo mi nyal skad cher smra/_/sbyangs pa'i sbyor drags mya ngan
[\[84a.5\]]'jigs/_/sems las drag shul bud med drags/_/so ga nyin mtshan zas zhu'i rjes/_/rlung gi nad ni ldang bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la rlung gi nad ni kha ba dang tsha ba la sogs pas ldang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/_/chung ngu za ba ni cung zad za'o/_/bcud med
[\[84a.6\]]par za ba ni brnga zhing btu ba'i dus las yol ba'i 'bru gang yin pa de ni bcud med pa zhes bya ste/_de yang lung las/_'bru ni ma smin thal ches pa/_/bcud med zas ni yin zhes bya/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/bkag pa ni bshang gci la sogs pa 'byung ba'i shugs bkag
[\[84a.7\]]pa'o/_/nan gyis btsir ba ni de rnams mi 'byung bzhin du btsir ba'o/_/mtshan mo mi nyal ba ni mtshan mo gnyid ma log pa'o/_/skad cher smra ba ni gsang che zhing nga ro chen po dang smra ba'o/_/sbyangs pa'i sbyor ba drags pa ni slon sman la sogs pa'i sbyor ba drags pa'o/_/mya ngan ni
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]yid gdung ba ste/_de dag la sogs pas rlung nad ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/de yang dus ni so ga'i rjes te dbyar gyi dus dang /_de bzhin du nyin mo'i rjes te dgongs ka dang /_mtshan mo'i rjes te tho rangs dang /_zas zhu ba'i rjes te kha zas zhu zin pa'i rjes la rlung gi nad
[\[84b.2\]]ldang zhing 'khrugs par byed do/_/mkhris pa tsha dang skyur dang rno/_/lan tshwa bro dang lus tsha dang /_/ston ka nyin phyed mtshan phyed dang /_/tsha ba'i dus su ldang bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa sman tsha ba dang skyur ba la sogs pas ldang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[84b.3\]]tsha ba'i dus su ni kha zas tsha zhing smin te skyur por gyur pa'i skabs la bya'o/_/mngar skyur lan tshwa snum pa dang /_/lci dang bad kan skyed bsil dang /_/'dug dang bde dang gnyid ma zhu/_/nyin par gnyid log brtas drags dang /_/slon sogs sbyor ba nyes pa dang /_/zos
[\[84b.4\]]ma thag dang dpyid kyi dus/_/snga dro mtshan stod bad kan ldang /_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi nad ni ro mngar ba la sogs pas ldang zhing 'khrugs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/'dug bzhin pa ni las kyi bya ba spangs te gnas pa'o/_/slon pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba nyes pa
[\[84b.5\]]ni log par 'gyur ro/_/zos ma thag pa ni zas zos nas mngar por gyur pa'i skabs dang /_dpyid la sogs pa'i dus su yang bad kan ldang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/_/'dres pa la ni ldan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngar bshad pa'i rgyu de dag cha 'dres par gyur
[\[84b.6\]]pa las ldan pa ste/_rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan la sogs pa 'dren ma ldang ba yin no/_/thams cad bsten las 'dus par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngar bshad pa'i rgyu khab dang tsha ba dang mngar ba la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par bsten pa las rlung dang bad kan
[\[84b.7\]]dang mkhris pa gsum 'dus pa'i nad ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gzhan yang 'dres mar zos/_/ma zhu ma snyoms mi 'phrod dang /_/lhag par zos pa la sogs dang /_/chang dang btung ba nyes pa dang /_/tshod ma skam dang la phug rjen/_/til tshigs sa zhag so ba'i chang /_/
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]sha rul sha skam sha rid rnams/_/de dang de yis nyes gsum skyed/_/de bzhin kha zas sbos pa dang /_/dus tshigs log pa bdun gyi rlung /_/gdon zhugs dug dang dbyig dug zos/_/be'u snabs nad 'khrugs ri rtsar gnas/_/btsas skar la ni gza'
[\[85a.2\]]zhugs dang /_/log par sbyor ba thams cad dang /_/sdig pa'i las la brten pa dang /_/bud med bu btsas log par byung /_/gso ba log par byas las ldang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du sngar bshad pa de dag bsten cing spyad pa las 'dus pa'i nad ldang bar 'gyur
[\[85a.3\]]bar ma zad kyi/_'dren mar zos pa la sogs pa 'di dag gis kyang 'dus pa'i nad ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/zos pa ni tshig kun dang sbyar te 'dren mar za ba ni 'phrod pa dang mi 'phrod pa dang gnod pa can dri ma can zos pa'o/_/ma zhu ba ni kha zas snga ma ma zhu bar zos pa'o/_/
[\[85a.4\]]mi snyoms par za ba ni zas kyi dus la bab pa'am/_dus las ma yol ba'am/_tshad las lhag pa'am/_tshad las chung ngu zos pa'am/_mi 'phrod pa ni ri bong gi sha dang la bug rlon pa dus gcig zos pa'am/_nya dang 'o ma lhan cig zos pa la sogs pa'o/_/zas lhag
[\[85a.5\]]par za ba ni 'grangs shing zos pa'i rjes la zos pa'o/_/nyes pa'i chang ni kha dog dang dri dang ro la sogs pa'i nyes pa ste/_phal cher rul zhing dri mi zhim pa la sogs pa'o/_/de bzhin du btung ba'i rnam pa gzhan yang rul zhing kha dog la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang ldan pa'o/_/
[\[85a.6\]]tshod ma skam po ni rgya sne'u la sogs pa'i tshod ma skam po'o/_/til tshigs ni til gyi 'ba' tsha'o/_/sa zhag dang so ba'i chang ni sa dang so ba 'dres pa las chang du byas pa'o/_/yang sha'i rnam pa rul zhing zhig pa dang /_skam zhing khu bcud med pa dang /_rid pa ste rus pa
[\[85a.7\]]dang rtsa rgyus tsam lus pa zos pa dang /_gzhan yang 'dir ma smos su zin kyang de lta bu nad skyed par byed pa'i rnam pa 'di dag dang cha 'dra ba dag gis kyang nges par gsum 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i nad skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du kha zas spos pa ste sngar gang la goms
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]pa'i kha zas spangs nas gzhan zos pa'o/_/de bzhin du dus tshigs log pa ni dman pa dang log pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan no/_/mdun gyi rlung ni mdun phyogs nas ldang ba'i rlung ngam shar nas ldang ba'i rlung ngo /_/de bzhin du gdon zhugs pa ni lha dang lha ma yin dang dri za la
[\[85b.2\]]sogs pa'i gdon lus la zhugs shing kun tu 'dzin pa'o/_/yang de bzhin du dug dang dbyig dug ste/_ma sbyar ba dang sbyar ba'i dug zos pa'o/_/de bzhin du ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs kyi nad 'khrugs shing ldang ba dang /_ri'i rtsar gnas shing 'dug pa dang /_btsas
[\[85b.3\]]pa'i tshe skar ma gang bab pa la nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' zhugs shing gnod par byas pa dang /_de bzhin du kha zas log par zos pa la sogs pa log pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs bsten pa dang /_sdig pa'i las srog gcod pa dang /_rkub la sogs pa la bsten
[\[85b.4\]]zhing spyod pa dang /_bud med bu btsas pa'i dus su log par byung ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang /_de bzhin du gso ba log par byas shing legs par ma bcos pa dag las kyang nad du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar so so'i nad ldang bas/_/nad kyi
[\[85b.5\]]gnas su 'gro byed pa/_/rtsa sbubs rnams su phyin pa dang /_/nad rnams lus la myur du skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_de ltar gong du bshad pa'i rnam pas nad so so tha dad par ldang zhing 'khrugs pas rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams lus la myur du skyed cing 'byung bar
[\[85b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/ci zhig byas pas nad skyed ce na/_nad kyi gnas gang yang rung bar 'gro bar byed pa'i nad des rtsa'i sbubs bcud rgyu ba'i sar song zhing phyin nas/_gnod pa skyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/_dngos su na nad kyi gnas bcud rgyu bar byed pa'i rtsar gnod pa de dag zhugs
[\[85b.7\]]pas nad ldang bar byed pa yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//_
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]de nas rims nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi bshad pa'i 'og tu rims kyi nad gzhi bshad pa'i dgos pa ni/_rims de nad kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te/_nad rnams kyi gtso bo ni rims yin no zhes bshad
[\[86a.2\]]pas so/_/rims ni nad bdag sdig can dang /_/'chi bdag mdangs za 'chi byed yin/_/khros pas myur ba'i mchod sbyin brlag_/drag po dpral ba'i mig las byung /_/skye dang 'chi tshe rmongs byed pa/_/mi 'phrod sna tshogs bsten las byung /_/mi bzad ming ni sna tshogs
[\[86a.3\]]pas/_/skye gnas du ma rnams la gnas/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims de ni nad kyi bdag po ste/_nad thams cad kyi rgyal po 'am gtso bo yin no/_/sdig can ni sdig pa'i rang bzhin can no/_/'chi bdag ni srog chags thams cad 'chi ba la sbyor ba'o/_/mdangs za ba ni lus
[\[86a.4\]]la yod pa'i mdangs za zhing spyod pa'o/_/'chi bar byed pa ni srog chags rnams zad cing mthar phyin par byed pa'o/_/khros pa ni lha chen po khros pa'i dpral ba las byung ba'o/_/myur ba'i mchod sbyin brlag pa ni skye dgu'i bdag po myur ba zhes bya ba'i mchod sbyin brlag cing
[\[86a.5\]]'jig par byed pa'o/_/de yang lha chen po drag po'i mig gsum pa las byung bas/_khros pa'i dpral ba'i mig las byung zhes bya'o/_/skye dang 'chi zhes bya ba ni bcas pa na 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i tshe ste/_de dag gi skabs su rmongs par byed cing dang po skyes pa rjod
[\[86a.6\]]par byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du kha zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa mi 'phrod pa sna tshogs bsten pa las byung ba yin la/_yang de ni mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba yin zhing nad kyi ming sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rta dang glang po la sogs pa skye gnas du ma tha
[\[86a.7\]]dad pa rnams kyi lus la gnas te/_glang po che'i lus la ni smin ma 'dzin pa zhes bya la/_rta'i lus la ni so so'i zhes bya ba dang /_lug gi lus la ni tal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ming gis gnas pa yin no/_/de ni nad rnams so sor 'dres/_/'dus
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]dang glo bur las brgyad 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims de ni rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur te/_de yang rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan so so dang /_de bzhin du 'dres pa ste/_gnyis gnyis 'dres pa'i ldan pa dang /_nad gzhi gsum char 'dus shing tshogs pa dang /_de bzhin
[\[86b.2\]]du glo bur gyi rims ni brgyad pa yin no/_/de ltar nad gzhi so so'i gsum dang /_'dres pa'i gsum dang /_'dus pa'i gcig dang /_glo bur ba'i gcig ste brgyad du 'gyur ro/_/de la nad rnams rang rang ni/_/rgyu las 'khrugs te ldang ba yis/_/ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs
[\[86b.3\]]gyur pa/_/lhan cig gnas nas rtsa sgo bkag_/zhu ba'i gnas nas me drod ni/_/phyi rol du ni 'byin par byed/_/de dang lhan cig mngon khyab nas/_/lus kun tsha bar byed pa yin/_/yan lag shin tu tsha byed par/_/rims ni de yis skyed par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_de la
[\[86b.4\]]nad gzhi rnams ni nyes pa 'di dang 'di dag byed cing rims skyed cing 'byung bar byed do/_/de yang rang rang gi rgyu ji skad bshad pa las rnam par 'khrugs shing g.yos par gyur pa las ldang zhing nad 'byung bar 'gyur ba na/_rgyu des ma zhu ba'i gnas su song nas/_ma zhu
[\[86b.5\]]ba lus zungs kyi dang po dwangs ma zhes bya ba mas sbyin pa'i nang du zhugs nas de lhan cig gnas te/_dwangs ma dang rngul rgyu bar byed pa'i rtsa sgo rnams kyi kha bkag cing bcad nas/_zhu ba'i gnas lte ba'i phyogs nas khong pa'i me drod gang dag yin pa de phyi rol du 'byin
[\[86b.6\]]par byed cing phyung nas me'i drod de dang lhan cig tu mngon par rgyu zhing khyab par byas nas/_lus ma lus pa kun tsha bas khyab par byed cing /_kun tu gdung la lus shin tu dro zhing tsha ba nyid du byed par 'gyur ro/_/des na yan lag rnams kyang shin tu tsha bar byed cing lus
[\[86b.7\]]dang yan lag thams cad nas cher tsha ba bskyed pa'i rims su nad kyi dri ma des skyed par byed cing dkyel rdzogs par byed pa yin no/_/rtsa sgo bkag pas de 'og tu/_/rngul ni mang du mi 'byung ngo /_/zhes bya ba la/_nad des rtsa'i sgo bkag cing gags byas pa'i phyir/_de'i
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]'og gam rjes la lus tsha/_yang /_rngul/phyi rol du mang du mi 'byung ngo /_/de yi sngon tshul sgyid zhan dang /_/nyams mi dga' zhing lus lci la/_/ro mi tshor zhing yi ga 'chus/_/glal 'byung mig 'khrugs mchi mar bcas/_/yan lag na zhing 'ju
[\[87a.2\]]stobs chung /_/nyam chung gnyid ni che ba dang /_/spu ldang bya rmyang byed 'dod dang /_/byin pa'i nywa na lus snyom dang /_/phan par bstan pa mi bzod khro/_/skyur dang tsha dang drod la sred/_/kha zas mngar ba la mi dga'/_/byis pa la sdang skom dad che/_/sgra me grang lhags rlung dang
[\[87a.3\]]chu/_/grib ma nyin mtshan rgyu med par/_/dga' dang mi dga' dag tu byed/_/de rjes rims ni gsal bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims de'i sngon du 'byung ba'i tshul ni mi gsal ba'i rtags te/_de dag kyang gang zhe na/_ngal zhing sgyid ngan par 'gyur ba dang /_nyams
[\[87a.4\]]mi dga' ba ste stan dang gnas la sogs pa dang /_gcig tu sems mngon par dga' ba med cing sems so na mi gnas pa dang /_lus khong lci zhing gdegs par dka' ba snyam du sems pa dang /_khas ro mi tshor zhing bem por gyur pa dang /_kha zas yi gar mi
[\[87a.5\]]'ong zhing sred pa med pa dang /_glal zhing kha gdangs pa dang /_mig 'khrugs shing mi sdug la mchi ma 'byung ba dang bcas pa dang /_yan lag na ba ste yan lag rnams gcus pa snyam du sems pa dang /_brdungs pa'am bsdams pa snyam du sems pa dang /_
[\[87a.6\]]kha zas 'ju ba'i stobs chung zhing 'ju mi nus pa dang /_nyams stobs chung zhing nus pa zhan pa dang /_gnyid che zhing bying ba dang /_ba spu rnams ldang zhing bshor ba dang /_de bzhin du yan lag rnams bskyod pa la sogs pa'i bya rmyang byed 'dod pa dang /_byin pa
[\[87a.7\]]gnyis kyi nywa btsir ba ltar na ba dang /_lus snyom zhing lci ba dang /_zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa phan par bstan pa'i gdams pa mi bzod cing khro ba dang /_ro skyur ba dang /_tsha ba la sogs pa'i bye brag la dga' ba dang /_kha zas mngar po la sogs pa rnams
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]la mi dga' zhing 'dod pa med pa dang /_de bzhin du byis pa nu zho 'thungs pa skye bo ma lus pa'i yid dge bar byed pa dag la yang khro zhing 'khrugs pa dang /_de bzhin du skom dad che zhing skom dad kyis shin tu gdungs pa dang /_de bzhin du sgra la sogs pa'i yul rnams la
[\[87b.2\]]rgyu med cing dgos pa med par ched 'ga' ni dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_ched 'ga' ni mi dga' bar byed de/_lan 'ga' nyan par 'dod na yang zhe sdang bar byed la/_lan 'ga' ni 'dod pa skyed par byed pa dang /_me la sogs pa la yang rgyu med par ched 'ga' bsten
[\[87b.3\]]par dga' la/_ched 'ga' ni bsten par mi dga' ste/_de lta bu'i mtshan nyid byung na/_de'i rjes la rims kyi mtshan nyid gsal zhing dkyel skyes pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/rims thebs 'byang nye'i tshe nad tshabs/_/chung zhing tsha ba mi snyoms la/_/yan lag de dang der
[\[87b.4\]]'pho zhing /_/na ba de dang der g.yo 'gyur/_/rkang pa bem po rengs pa dang /_/byin snying na zhing ngal ba dang /_/tshigs rnams bye ba lta bur sems/_/brla dang rked pa na ba dang /_/rgyab ni brdungs pa lta bur sems/_/lto ba btsir ba snyam sems dang /_/rus pa bcad pa snyam
[\[87b.5\]]pa dang /_/rtsib ma lhag par na ba dang /_/snying ni btsir snyam sems shing zug_/brang du btsugs pa lta bur gzer/_/phrag pa brdungs snyam dpung pa ni/_/bcom snyam sems shing sgrog rus na/_/'gram pas kha zas bldad mi nus/_/glal 'byung rna ba sgra dang bcas/_/
[\[87b.6\]]mur 'gram zug cing mgo bo na/_/lce yis ro ni mi tshor ram/_/yang na kha bska bro bar 'gyur/_/dri ma rnams ni sri ba dang /_/lpags mig kha dang sen mo dang /_/bshang sogs rtsub cing dmar ba dang /_/mchil mang yig 'chus sred chung /_/zas mi 'ju zhing rngul mi
[\[87b.7\]]'byung /_/gnyid yar mchu dang gre ba skam/_/skom dad che zhing lud pa skam/_/lud pa lu zhing skyugs pa skam/_/sems zhum lus kyi ba spu ldang /_/pags pa so dag brtse ba dang /_/rkang lag 'dar zhing sbrid pa thogs/_/mgo 'khor tshig ni bla ba dang /_/drod bag la dga'
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]bya rmyang byed/_/rlung gi rims su shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gi rims kyis btab pa'i mtshan ma'am rtags ni 'di dag yin te/_rims kyis thebs pa ni dang po mgo zug pa ste/_tsha ba la sogs pa 'byung bar mgo rtsom pa'o/_/'byang
[\[88a.2\]]du nye ba ni 'brel zhing 'byang bar bskyod pa'o/_/nad tshabs ni nad kyi tshul sna tshogs pa'o/_/chung ba ni shugs dal ba'o/_/mi snyoms pa ni rims kyis thebs pa la sogs pa'o/_/de dag gi tshul mi snyoms shing rnam pa tha dad par gnas pa'o/_/yang na de dag
[\[88a.3\]]mgo la sogs pa'i yan lag de dang der rnam par tshor bar 'gyur zhing /_'og nas bshad pa'i nad kyi tshor ba de dang de dag rnam par g.yo zhing mal gcig na mi gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rkang pa bem po ni tshor ba med cing sems dang bral ba ltar gnas pa'o/_/rengs
[\[88a.4\]]pa ni lus shing ltar rengs shing gyong pa'o/_/byin snying na ba ni btsir ba snyam pa'am/_brud pa snyam sems pa'o/_/ngal ba ni dub pa'o/_/tshigs rnams bye ba lta bur sems pa ni/_gnyis su gshags pa ltar sems pa'o/_/brlan ba ni rang gi bya ba mi nus shing
[\[88a.5\]]zhum pa'o/_/rked pa na ba ni mnan pa'am zags pa snyam sems pa'o/_/rgyab brdungs pa snyam sems pa ni grugs pa snyam sems pa'am/_phyir btags pa snyam du sems pa'o/_/lto ba btsir ba snyam sems pa ni lag pas btsir zhing mnan pa ltar sems
[\[88a.6\]]pa'o/_/rus pa bcad pa ltar sems pa ni mtshon gyis bcad pa ltar tsha zhing na ba'o/_/de las kyang khyad par du rtsib logs su gtogs pa'i rus pa bcad pa snyam sems shing lhag par na ba dang /_snying ga btsir zhing bsdams pa lta bur sems shing nang du zhugs pa'i
[\[88a.7\]]tshul gyis na ba dang /_brang du lcag yu btsugs pa lta bur sems zhing gzer ba dang /_yang gzer ba de nyid kyis phrag pa'i phyogs khyab cing na ba dang /_dpung pa'i phyogs tho bas bcom pa lta bur sems shing na ba dang /_sgrog rus kyi phyogs su til btsir ba'i
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]'khrul 'khor gyis btsir ba ltar sems shing na ba dang /_'gram pas kha zas bldad mi nus shing nyam chung ba dang /_kha gdangs pa dang bcas pa'i glal dang bya rmyang byed pa dang /_rna ba 'bod pa lta bu'i sgra dang bcas pa dang /_mur 'gram gnyis su khab kyis
[\[88b.2\]]gtsags pa ltar na ba dang /_mgo bo'i phyogs gzer zhing na ba dang /_lces ro mi tshor ba ste lces ro'i khyad par mi shes pa dang /_yang de bzhin du khar ro bska ba'i bag tu za ba dang /_bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_rngul la sogs pa'i dri ma rnams sri ba dang /_
[\[88b.3\]]pags pa la sogs pa'i kha dog dmar zhing rtsub par 'gyur ba dang /_mchil ma mang zhing bad kan 'dzag pa dang /_yi ga 'chus shing zas la sogs pa'i blo mi skye ba dang /_sred pa chung ba ste zas la sogs pa la lhag par dga' ba med pa dang /_kha zas mi 'ju ba ste/_
[\[88b.4\]]zos pa'i zas kyang mi 'ju ba'i stobs chung ba dang /_rngul mi 'byung ba'i phyi rol du mi thon pa dang /_gnyid yar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_lud pa nas/_skyugs pa'i bar skam zhing kha zas la sogs pa mi 'byung ba dang /_sems
[\[88b.5\]]zhum zhing sdug bsngal bas yid zhum pa dang /_lus kyi ba spu ldang zhing bshor ba dang /_pags pa dang so gtsags pa snyam sems shing brtse ba dang /_rkang lag 'dar zhing 'gul ba dang /_sbrid pa thogs shing mi thon pa dang /_mgo 'khor zhing 'khor lo
[\[88b.6\]]bskor ba ltar sems pa dang /_tshig bla ba ste 'brel pa med pa'i tshig mang du smra ba dang /_drod bag la dga' ba ste me dang nyi tshan bsten 'dod pa dang /_bya rmyang byed pa ste yan lag brkyang zhing sdud 'dod pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/_de dag ni rlung las
[\[88b.7\]]gyur pa'i rims nad kyi mtshan ma yin par shes par bya'o/_/lus kun cig car khyab pa dang /_/bla zhing kha'i ro kha ba dang /_/bsil 'dod kha snar thor bu 'byung /_/mgo 'khor brgyal myos snying mi dga'/_/bshang sla mkhris pa slon pa dang /_/mchil ma khrag
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]bcas sgregs pa skyur/_/thor bu dmar po 'byung ba dang /_/pags pa la sogs ser rtsa sngo/_/rngul 'byung dbugs ni mnam pa dang /_/skom dad rab che mkhris pa'i rims/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan
[\[89a.2\]]ma ni/_lus kun cig car khyab pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_mgo la sogs pa'i yan lag dang /_lus kun tsha ba la sogs pa'i 'ur 'ur pos cig car dus gcig tu khyab ste na ba dang /_de bzhin du bla zhing tshig 'chol ba dang /_kha'i nang kha ba bro bar 'gyur
[\[89a.3\]]ba dang /_bsil ba 'dod cing grang ba la dga' ba dang /_kha dang sna'i nang na thor bu 'byung zhing shu ba smin pa dang /_brgyal zhing 'bogs pa dang /_myos pa ste 'og nas chang nad kyi skabs su bshad pa lta bu'i myos pa dang ldan pa dang /_sems mi dga' ba ste blo
[\[89a.4\]]mal na mi gnas shing 'phyo ba dang /_bshang ba sla zhing 'khru ba dang /_mkhris pa slon zhing skyugs pa dang /_kha nas mchil ma khrag dang bcas pa 'byung ba dang /_sgregs pa ro skyur por 'byung ba dang /_thor bu 'am 'brum phran dmar po tal til 'byung bar 'gyur
[\[89a.5\]]ba dang /_pags pa dang lce dang gdong dang gcin gyi mdog ser zhing rtsa sngo ba dang /_lus rngul 'byung zhing tsha ba dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i dri mnam zhing rul ba dang /_skom dad kyi shas shin tu che ba 'byung ste/_mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa ni mkhris pa'i
[\[89a.6\]]rims yin no/_/lhag par yi ga 'chus shing rmongs/_/bu ga 'gags shing rims shugs dal/_/mchil mang kha nang mngar ba bro/_/dang ga lci zhing dbugs mi bde/_/cham btab snying na skyug pa 'byung /_/lud pa lus rengs lpags sogs skya/_/yan lag
[\[89a.7\]]thor bu grang mo 'byung /_/snyom zhing lus 'dar bad kan rims/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims thams cad las bad kan gyi rims kyi mtshan nyid ni lhag par ram khyad par du yi ga 'chus par 'gyur ba dang /_sems rmongs bag tu 'gyur zhing bying ba dang /_bu ga'i
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]tshogs 'gags shing dri ma rnams 'byung ba thogs pa dang /_rims kyi shugs dal zhing nad tshabs chung ba dang /_mchil ma mang zhing ljan ljin che ba dang /_kha nang ro mngar ba bro ba dang /_snying ga lci zhing dang ga mer mer por 'dug pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_cham
[\[89b.2\]]pas btab cing sna chu 'dzag pa dang /_snying na zhing 'khyil pa dang /_skyug pa 'byung zhing bod pa dang /_lud pa lu ba dang /_lus kyi yan lag rengs par 'gyur ba dang /_pags pa la sogs pa ste/_pags pa dang /_sen mo dang /_gdong dang /_lce dang /_bshang
[\[89b.3\]]ba dang /_gci ba rnams skya zhing dkar ba dang /_mgo dang lag ngar la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams thor bu'am 'brum bu bad kan gyi rang bzhin can grang mo 'byung ba dang /_snyom pa ste gnyid kyis non pa ltar yul rnams nges par 'dzin par mi nus pa dang /_lus
[\[89b.4\]]'dar ba ste grang lhags kyis lus kyi khong 'dar bar gyur pa'o/_/de yang /_chu bsil dag gis reg pa dang /_/khyad par du ni dgun dus su/_/grang bas nyen te skrang 'gyur ba/_/bad kan las byung lus 'dar yin/_/zhes bshad pa yin te/_mtshan nyid de dag
[\[89b.5\]]dang ldan pa ni bad kan gyi rims yin no/_/rang gi dus su thams cad ni/_/'byung zhing 'phel ba nyid 'gyur ba/_/nad gzhir bshad pa'i mi mthun bsten/_/bsgyur bas bde bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims nad rang rang gi dus nyin mo dang mtshan mo dang /_
[\[89b.6\]]zas zos pa'i skabs dang 'brel pa'i dus der rang rang gi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rims thams cad 'byung zhing skye ba dang /_'phel zhing rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang /_nad gzhi nyid du bshad pa'i mkhris pa'i rims la tsha ba la sogs pa mi mthun pa bsten pas
[\[89b.7\]]ni sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa yin la/_de bsgyur zhing bde ba dang 'brel par byas pas ni bde bar byed pa yin no/_/rang rang mtshan ma 'dres pa ni/_/ldan pa'i rims yin/_zhes bya ba la/_sngar smos pa'i rang rang gi mtshan ma 'dres par gyur pa las ni de'i
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]mtshan ma ldan pa'i rims te/_nad gnyis gnyis las byung ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/de nas rlung dang mkhris pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma 'dres pa dang ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang ldan pa'i rims yin par shes par bya'o/_/
[\[90a.2\]]rlung dang bad kan gyi mtshan ma gnyis ka dang ldan pa ni rlung dang bad kan gyi ldan pa'i rims yin la/_mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis ka'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa ni mkhris pa dang bad kan dang ldan pa'i rims yin par shes par bya'o/_/gzhan yang ni/_mgo na brgyal
[\[90a.3\]]slon lus tsha rmongs bag 'gyur/_/gre ba kha skam mi dga' rus tshigs na/_/gnyid med mgo 'khor spu ldang skom dad che/_/kha glal tshig mang rlung mkhris 'dres pa'i rims/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba ste/_rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis 'dres
[\[90a.4\]]pa'i mtshan nyid ni mgo na ba la sogs pa yang yin no/_/zhes bya ba'i don no/_/mgo na ba ni mgo lhang lhang por na zhing zug pa'o/_/brgyal ba ni mi dran pa'o/_/slon pa ni skyug pa'o/_/lus tsha ba ni yan lag tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa'o/_/rmongs bag ni sems
[\[90a.5\]]rmongs pa'o/_/gre ba nang kha skam pa ni rlan med pa'o/_/rus tshigs na ba ni brdungs pa snyam du sems pa'o/_/tshig mang ba ni bla ba'o/_/tsha med yi ga 'chus shing klad tshigs na/_/cham pa lud pa dbugs mi bde bshang sri/_/khong bsil rmongs bag rab rib mgo
[\[90a.6\]]'khor rmya/_/bad kan rlung 'dres rims kyi mtshan ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhan yang bad kan rlung 'dres pa las byung ba'i ldan pa'i rims kyi mtshan nyid ni/_tsha ba me la sogs pa yang yin par shes par bya ste/_tsha ba med pa ni rims kyi tsha ba'i gdung ba chung
[\[90a.7\]]ba'o/_/gzhan dag ni go bar zad do/_/lus rngul rengs dang tsha ba sil sor mi gnas/_/skom dad lud pa bad kan mkhris bag 'byung /_/rmongs bag rmya dang kha bro khar dri chags/_/bad kan mkhris pa 'dres pa'i rims kyi rtags/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhan yang bad
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]kan dang mkhris pa las byung ba ldan pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/_lus rngul ba dang khong rengs pa la sogs pa las shes par bya'o/_/rengs pa ni yan lag rengs pa'o/_/tsha ba dang bsil ba dus la mi gnas pa yan lag grang zhing lan 'ga' tsha ste rgyud gcig tu mi
[\[90b.2\]]gnas pa'o/_/khar dri ma chags pa ni ljan ljin gyis gos pa'o/_/kun las 'byung ba rtags kun ldan/_/'dir yang thang re tsha ba dang /_/de bzhin grang dang nyin mo ni/_/gnyid che mtshan mo gnyid med byung ba'am/_/rtag par gnyid 'ong ba'am yang na yang /_/
[\[90b.3\]]rngul cher 'byung ba'am rngul mi 'byung /_/glu dang gar dang dgod sogs pa/_/spyod pa ngan pa la 'jug cing /_/mig dmar mchi ma 'dzag dang bcas/_/zhum zhing rdzi ma 'khrugs par snang /_/byin snying rtsib logs na ba dang /_/mgo bo rus tshigs na mgo 'khor/_/
[\[90b.4\]]rna ba sgra dang nad bcas dang /_/mgul pa gra mas gang snyam sems/_/lce rtsub kun nas bsregs ltar snang /_/lus lci tshigs ni 'bye snyam sems/_/mchil mar khrag mkhris bad kan 'byung /_/mgo bo g.yo zhing skom dad che/_/thor bu 'brum phran mtha'
[\[90b.5\]]'khor ba/_/dmar zhing gnag pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/snying na bshang gci sri ba 'am/_/yang na nyung ba'am rab mang 'byung /_/kha nang snum zhing nyams stobs chung /_/gcom chung 'gyur zhing bla ba dang /_/nad smin dka' zhing rmugs pa dang /_/rgyun du gre ba
[\[90b.6\]]'dzer ba ni/_/'dus pa'i rims te mngon rmugs byed/_/de ni mdangs 'phrog ces kyang bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_nad gzhi thams cad las byung ba yin pas na kun las byung ste/_de ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi rims kyi mtshan nyid du bshad
[\[90b.7\]]pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin la/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims 'dir mtshan nyid gzhan yang skad cig gam/_thang cig re re zhing yang dang yang du lus tsha bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du thang cig re re zhing grang bar 'gyur ba dang /_nyin mo ni gnyid cher
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]'ong zhing shas cher 'thibs par 'gyur ba dang /_mtshan mo ni gnyid med cing yar bar 'gyur ba'am/_yang na nyin mtshan rtag par rgyun du gnyid 'ong ba'am/_nyin mtshan rtag par gnyid med par 'gyur ba'am/_yang de bzhin du rngul
[\[91a.2\]]shas cher 'byung zhing mang du 'dzag la/_cung zad tsam gyi rngul yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_glu la sogs pa'i spyod pa ngan cing dman pa la 'jug par dga' ba dang /_mig kha dog dmar ba dang /_mchi ma'i rgyun 'dzag pa dang bcas shing mi sdug par
[\[91a.3\]]snang ba dang /_zhum zhing yo ba dang /_rdzi ma 'khrugs shing mig gi spu g.yos par snang ba dang /_byin snying la sogs pa na ba dang /_rna bar sgra drag pa dang bcas nas na zhing gzer ba dang /_mgul pa ste gre ba gra ma'i tshogs kyis gang zhing khyab pa snyam du
[\[91a.4\]]sems pa dang /_lce tsher ma ltar rtsub pa dang /_kun nas bsregs shing tshig pa ltar snang ba dang /_lus kyi khong lci ba dang /_yan lag gi tshogs bye zhing zhig pa snyam du sems pa dang /_mchil mar khrag dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi rnam par 'byung ba
[\[91a.5\]]dang /_mgo bo g.yo zhing 'dar ba thor bu dang 'brum phran mgo bo 'am pags pa mtha' 'khor ba zlum po 'byung zhing /_de yang mdog nag pa dang dmar bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_snying na zhing gzer ba dang /_bshang gci la sogs pa'i dri ma rnams sri zhing
[\[91a.6\]]mi 'byung ba'am/_yang na nyung zhing cung zad 'byung ba'am/_shin tu mang zhing shas cher 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_kha'i nang snum zhing 'byil ba dang /_nyams stobs chung zhing zad pa dang /_gcom chung zhing dma' ba dang /_bla zhing tshig 'chol pa mang du smra
[\[91a.7\]]ba dang /_nad smin par dka' zhing yun rings nas 'byang ba dang /_shas cher rmugs pa dang rgyun mi chad par rtag tu gre ba 'dzer zhing sgra mi gsal ba ngar ngar po 'byung ba ste/_mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan pa ni 'dus pa'i rims zhes bshad pa ste/_de nyid la ni ming
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]gi rnam grangs su mngon par rmugs par byed pa dang /_mdangs 'phrog par byed pa zhes bshad cing btags pa yin no/_/nad kyis bkag cing me drod nyams/_/mtshan ma thams cad rdzogs gyur pa/_/gsor mi rung ste de las gzhan/_/gso dka' 'am dbang
[\[91b.2\]]po ma tshang 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa'i nad kyi skyon gyis 'byung ba'i rgyun bkag cing me drod nyams par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du ji skad smos pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs par gyur na
[\[91b.3\]]gsor mi rung ste/_gso bar mi nus pa yin no/_/de las gzhan pa 'dus pa'i rims de nad kyi tshabs chung zhing mtshan nyid ma rdzogs na/_de gso dka' bar 'gyur ba'am/_dbang po ma tshang ba ste lus ngag gi las kyi rten nyams par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang
[\[91b.4\]]'dus pa las byung ba/_/gang du mkhris pa logs shig gnas/_/pags pa'am nang grol tsha ba dag_/'debs pa'am tsha ba snga phyis 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims snga ma las mtshan nyid gzhan du 'byung bar gyur pa ste/_'dus
[\[91b.5\]]pa'i rims gang las mkhris pa logs shig na gnas shing /_lan 'ga' ni pags par gnas pa 'am/_lan 'ga' ni nang grol na gnas nas tsha ba skyed par byed pa sngar byung ba'am/_phyis 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can ni gso dka' ba yin no/_/de bzhin bad
[\[91b.6\]]kan rlung grang ba/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du rlung dang bad kan logs shig tu tha dad par gnas shing snga phyir grang bar byed pa ni gso dka' ba ma yin no/_/de gnyis tsha snga gso dka' yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa'i nad de gnyis las tsha ba snga ba'i nad
[\[91b.7\]]ni gso dka' zhing bcos par dka' ba yin no/_/grang snga der ni mkhris pa yis/_/bad kan gsher ba skam pa dang /_/grang ba zhi byas kha skyur brgyal/_/myos dang skom dad skye bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_grang ba sngar byung ba'i 'dus pa'i rims der ni mkhris
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]pa'i tsha bas bad kan gyi gsher bag skam par gyur pa dang /_skyur ba la sogs pa'i 'gyur ba bzhir 'byung bar 'gyur la/_de bzhin du grang ba zhi bas kyang bzhi po de dag nyid skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tsha ba snga ma de rjes la/_/rmugs slon
[\[92a.2\]]mchil mang khong snyom 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dang po tsha ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'dus pa'i rims la tsha ba de'i rjes la rmugs pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/glo bur drag shul las byung dang /_/mngon zin byad byas dmod byung bzhi/_/zhes
[\[92a.3\]]bya ba la/_rims brgyad po glo bur ba zhes bya ba la ni drag shul las byung ba dang /_mngon par zin pa dang /_byad byas pa dang /_dmod pa las byung ba'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi yod do/_/de la smas bcad mes tshig sogs/_/ngal ba drag shul las byung yin/_/
[\[92a.4\]]zhes bya ba la/_glo bur ba'i rims kyis drag shul las byung ba zhes bya ba 'dir mtsho na gyis smas shing bcad pa la sogs pa las rims 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du ngal zhing lam gyis dub pa las byung ba'i lus nyon mongs pa las drag shul las
[\[92a.5\]]byung ba'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/der ni phal cher rlung nad kyis/_/khrag ni gnod cing 'khrugs byas pas/_/na bcas mdog nyams skrang dang bcas/_/zug gzer bcas pa'i rims skyed 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_drag shul las byung ba'i rims der phal
[\[92a.6\]]cher ram mang du rlung gi nad kyi dbang gis khrag la gnod par byas shing rnam par 'khrugs par 'gyur ba las na ba sogs pa dang bcas pa'i rims skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gdon zhugs sman gyi dri dang dug_/khros 'jigs mya ngan gdon las byung /_/mngon par zin
[\[92a.7\]]las byung rims yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdon zhugs pa la sogs pa las byung ba'i rims ni mngon par zin pa'am/_gzhan gyis byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i rims yin no/_/gdon ni lha la sogs pa'i 'og nas bshad pa rnams so/_/'dir gdon rgyu med
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]dgod cing ngu /_/zhes bya ba la/_rims kyi gnas skabs 'dir lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i gdon gyis ni rgyu med par glo bur du ched 'ga' ni dgod pa dang /_ched 'ga' ni ngu bar 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi dri skyes brgyal ba dang /_/sbrid pa klad nad skrangs par
[\[92b.2\]]'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman gyi dri las skyes pa'i glo bur ba'i rims ni brgyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dug las brgyal dang tshad par 'khru/_/mdog nag lus tsha snying nad 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_'dir dug las byung
[\[92b.3\]]ba'i rims ni brgyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/khros pas lus 'dar klad nad 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_shin tu khros pa las ni lus 'dar zhing g.yo ba dang /_de bzhin du klad nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mya ngan 'jigs
[\[92b.4\]]las bla bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mya ngan 'jigs pa las byung ba'i rims ni bla zhing bab col mang du smra bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod las mgo 'khor yid 'chus tsha/_/ngo tsha gnyid blo brtan nyams 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dod pas gdungs pa las
[\[92b.5\]]skyes pa'i rims mgo 'khor ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_lus dang snying ga tsha bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du ngo tsha shes pa dang /_gnyid dang /_blo gros dang /_brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba de dag nyams shing zad par 'gyur ro/_/gdon la sogs pa
[\[92b.6\]]'dus pa'i rims/_/'jig tshogs gsum ni rlung gi rims/_/khros pas mkhris pa ldang bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdon dang sman dang dug las byung ba'i rims gsum gyis ni nyes pa gsum 'dus pa'i rims su 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa dang mya
[\[92b.7\]]ngan dang 'dod pa gsum las byung ba'i rims kyis ni rlung 'khrugs pa'i rims su 'gyur ro/_/khros pa las byung ba'i rims kyis ni mkhris pa ldang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/_/dmod pa byad byas las byung gang /_/'dus pa'i rims ni mi bzad pa/_/de ni shin
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]tu bzod dkar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_dmod pa dang byad byas pa las byung ba'i rims gang yin pa 'dus pa'i rims mi bzod cing rno ba dang /_shin tu bzod par dka' zhing brnag mi nus par 'gyur ro zhes sman dpyad kyi gzhung rtsom pa'i
[\[93a.2\]]dang srong rnams kyis bshad pa'am/_bdag gi slob dpon la sogs kyis bshad do/_/ces pa'o/_/de la byad byas sngags kyis ni/_/sbyin sreg byas pa bzhin du byas/_/thog mar sems 'bab de 'og lus/_/de nas thor bu mgo 'khor skom/_/tsha bcas brgyal
[\[93a.3\]]bas zin gyur pa'i/_/rims ni nyin re bzhin du 'phel/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di dag gi nang nas byad byas pa'i sngags ni srid srung gi rig byed la sogs pa las bshad pa'i bram ze'i ngan sngags la sogs so/_/sbyin sreg byas shing sregs shig sregs shig ces
[\[93a.4\]]smra bzhin du me la bsreg rdzas 'dzud pa na/_gang la byas pa de thog ma kho nar de'i sems la 'bab cing tsha ba nyams su myong bar byed la/_de'i 'og tu ni lus tsha bar byed cing tsha ba'i rims kyis 'debs la/_de nas thor bu dang /_mgo 'khor ba la sogs pas zin
[\[93a.5\]]zhing rims de ni nyin gcig bzhin du 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rims ni brgyad du bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_de ltar rnam pa de dag gis nad gzhi dang glo bur ba las byung ba'i dbye bas rims ni grangs brgyad yod par tshe'i rig byed la mkhas pa rnams
[\[93a.6\]]kyis bshad cing bstan pa yin no/_/de dag mdor na rnam gnyis te/_/lus dang sems kyi rims dang ni/_/grang dang tsha dang phyi nang gnas/_/rang bzhin dang ni gyur pa dang /_/gsor rung gsor mi rung ba dang /_/smin dang ma smin zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang
[\[93a.7\]]rims 'di ni rnam pa gnyis yod de/_lus kyi rims dang sems kyi rims zhes bya ba gnyis dang /_grang ba dang tsha ba gnyis dang /_phyi rol na gnas pa dang /_nang na gnas pa zhes bya ba gnyis dang /_rang bzhin dang gzhan du gyur pa zhes bya ba gnyis dang /_gsor rung
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]ba dang gsor mi rung ba zhes bya ba gnyis dang /_smin pa dang ma smin pa zhes bya ba gnyis so/_/lus rims thog mar lus tsha byed/_/sems kyi dang por snying tsha 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus kyi rims ni thog mar te/_dang por lus tsha bar byed la/_de'i 'og
[\[93b.2\]]tu ni snying tsha bar 'gyur ro/_/sems kyi rims kyis ni dang por snying tsha bar byed la/_de'i 'og tu ni lus tsha bar byed do/_/rlung dang bad kan cig car ni/_/'byung tshe grang ba'i rims su 'gyur/_/mkhris pa dang ldan tsha ba ste/_/'dres pas 'dres pa'o/_/zhes
[\[93b.3\]]bya ba la/_rlung ni zung du 'jug pa yin pas bad kan dang lhan cig tu gnas shing cig car 'byung ba'i dus na ni grang ba'i rims su 'gyur la/_de bzhin du mkhris pa dang rlung du 'jug cing mkhris pa dang ldan pa'i tshe na ni tsha ba'i rims su 'gyur ro/_/'dres pa ste
[\[93b.4\]]bad kan dang mkhris pa gnyi ga dang rlung 'dres pa'i tshe na ni rlung de zung du 'jug pa yin la ched 'ga' tsha bar 'gyur ro/_/ched 'ga' grang bar 'gyur ro/_/nang gnas pa/_rims nad dkyel ni bskyed 'gyur nas/_/nang na na zhing bshang gci sri/_/zhes bya ba la/_nang
[\[93b.5\]]na gnas pa'i rims ni nang du chud cing brten pa yin pas nad kyi dkyel bskyed cing 'phel bar 'gyur nas/_nang de nyid na mi bzad par na ba dang /_bshang ba la sogs pa'i dri ma sri bar 'gyur ro/_/phyi rol rims ni tsha ba dang /_/phyi rol gnas pa gso bar sla/_/zhes
[\[93b.6\]]bya ba la/_phyi rol gyi rims ni tsha ba'i dngos po yang phyi rol na gnas pa yin gyi/_nang na gnas pa ma yin la/_de nyid ni gso bar sla zhing bcos par sla ba yin no/_/tshig 'dis ni nang na gnas pa'i rims ni don gyi shugs kyis gso dka' ba yin no zhes ston
[\[93b.7\]]to/_/dbyar dang ston dang dpyid dus su/_/rlung sogs rim 'byung rang bzhin rims/_/zhes bya ba la/_dbyar la sogs pa'i dus gsum du rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rlung la sogs pa rim bzhin du 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gyi rims zhes bya ste/_dbyar gyi dus su
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]ni rlung gi rims yin no/_/ston ni mkhris pa'o/_/dpyid ni bad kan gyi'o/_/gzhan du gyur pa de gso dka'/_/phal cher rlung ni rang bzhin rims/_/yin yang gso bar dka' ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar bshad pa las rnam pa gzhan pa
[\[94a.2\]]de ni 'gyur ba'i rims zhes bya ste/_de yang dngos su na dus tshigs rnams su rim bzhin du ma byung ba ste/_dper na dbyar gyi tshe mkhris pa dang bad kan las byung ba dang /_ston gyi tshe rlung dang bad kan las byung ba dang /_dpyid kyi dus su rlung dang mkhris pa las 'byung bar
[\[94a.3\]]'gyur ba'am/_de bzhin du dus tshigs thams cad du yang rlung las gyur pa'i zhes bya ba rang bzhin las gzhan du gyur pa'i rims de dag ni gso bar dka' ba yin pas/_de las phal cher rlung las gyur pa'i rims ni rang bzhin gyi rims yin yang gso dka' ba yin
[\[94a.4\]]na/_de las gzhan du gyur pa'i rims lta smos kyang ci dgos/_phal cher zhes pa ni ma lus par de ltar ma yin pa'i don te/_la lar ni bsod nams kyi dbang gis rlung las gyur pa yin yang gso sla ba ni yod do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/dbyar dus rlung nad
[\[94a.5\]]ldang gyur na/_/mkhris pa bad kan ldan rims 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi tshe dbyar gyi dus su rlung nad ldang zhing 'khrugs par gyur nas rims skyed par byed pa de'i tshe/_mkhris pa dang bad kan dang ldan pa'i rims su 'gyur gyi/_de dang mi ldan pa ma yin te/_
[\[94a.6\]]de'i tshe rims de rlung las gyur pa yin du zin kyang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang ldan pas mngon par ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don no/_/ston ka mkhris pas nad slong ste/_/bad kan de yi grogs byed 'gyur/_/der ni smyung ba byas gyur kyang /_/gnod par 'gyur ba
[\[94a.7\]]ma yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_ston ka'i dus su mkhris pa 'khrugs nas rims skyed par byed la/_rims skyed par rtsom pa'i mkhris pa de'i stobs sam grogs skyed pa ni bad kan yin pas/_des grogs byas nas skye bar 'gyur te/_rims ni ma zhu ba'i gnas la
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]brten nas 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/des gnas skabs der ni bad kan dang mkhris pa gnyis ni smyung bar byas pas gso bar bya zhing bcos dgos pa yin pas na/_gnas skabs 'dir smyung ba byas pa las gnod cing nad du 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa yod pa yin no/_/bad
[\[94b.2\]]kan dpyid ldang de yang ni/_/de rjes rlung dang mkhris pa 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_dpyid kyi dus su ni bad kan 'khrugs shing ldang nas rims skyed par byed pa yin la/_bad kan yang de'i rjes la rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis grogs byed cing stobs skyed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[94b.3\]]nyams stobs che zhing nad tshabs chung /_/bla brnan med rims gso bar sla/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa nyams stobs che ba dang /_de bzhin du nad tshabs kyi dkyel chung ba dang /_lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba'i bla brnan
[\[94b.4\]]med pa'i rims nad gang yin pa de ni myur du bde bar bya bar nus pas na gso sla ba yin no/_/rnam kun 'gyur ba zhes bya bar/_/gsor mi rung bar sngar bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_yong ye rnam pa thams cad du lus kyi 'gyur ba shes par bya ba'i lus kyi gnas
[\[94b.5\]]su gsor mi rung ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rims sngar bshad de/_rims ni tshabs che zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig sngar bshad pa yin no/_/rims kyi nad tshabs che zhing tsha/_/khong rmya nyam chung gcin mang dang /_/bshang sri kha zas mi 'ju la/_/bkres chung ma
[\[94b.6\]]smin rims mtshan nyid/_/ces bya ba la/_rims ma smin pa'i mtshan nyid 'di dag yin te/_rims kyi nad tshabs gnad dang tshigs la sogs pa na ba'i tshabs che zhing /_de bzhin du khong shin tu rmya zhing nyam chung ba yin te/_stobs dang srog par bcas pa gcin mang
[\[94b.7\]]du 'byung ba dang /_bshang gci sri zhing mi 'byung ba dang /_kha zas 'ju bar mi byed pa dang /_bkres pa med cing zas mi 'dod pa ste/_'di dag ni rims ma smin pa'i mtshan nyid yin par shes par bya'o/_/rims shugs stobs che skom dad che/_/bla zhing mgo 'khor
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]dbugs mi bde/_/bshang gci bder 'byung nad bskyod pa/_/smin par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims smin pa'i nye ba'i mtshan ma ni rims kyi shugs drag cing stobs che ba dang /_de nyid kyis na skom dad che ba dang /_bla
[\[95a.2\]]zhing tshig 'khyal pa dang /_bshang gci bde bar 'byung zhing mi sri ba dang /_nad bskyod cing bslongs pa ltar snang ba yin no/_/ma smin go bzlog mtshan nyid dang /_/zhag bdun smyung byas las smin bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_rims smin cing nad med pa'i mtshan
[\[95a.3\]]nyid ni rims nad tshabs che ba la sogs pa go bzlog pa las shes par bya ste/_rims nad kyi tshabs chung ba bri ba dang /_khong rmya zhing nyam chung ba dang /_gcin nyung ba dang /_bshang ba bde bar 'byung ba la sogs pa de ni rims ma zhu ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin
[\[95a.4\]]la/_de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du smyung ba byas pa las rims de smin te smin zhing 'ju ba nyid du 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/de yang drang srong tsa ra kas/_lus zungs kun gnas nad rnams ni/_/zhag bdun gyis ni smin par 'gyur/_/rims nad phal cher
[\[95a.5\]]nad rnams ni/_/smyung byas smin pa yin zhes bshad/_/ces bshad pa yin no/_/rims ni nad kyi dus dang ni/_/stobs chung che las rnam lngar bshad/_/phal cher 'dus par gyur pa yi/_/rims su mang du 'gyur bar bshad/_/rgyun dang rtag pa nyin gcig pa/_/
[\[95a.6\]]nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi pa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims nad kyi grangs ni 'og nas bshad pa'i rgyun la sogs pa'i rnam pa lnga yod do zhes drang srong chen po rnams kyis bshad do/_/de gang las ji ltar zhe na/_dus dang yul dang stobs che chung las gyur te/_rlung
[\[95a.7\]]la sogs pa'i rims nad stobs che ba dang stobs chung ba'i dbang dang /_yang de bzhin du rims nad 'byung ba'i nad gzhi 'khrugs pa'i dus dang /_yul stobs chung ba dang stobs che ba'i dbang gis sam/_yang na nad rnams kyi dus yin pas na nad kyi dus te/_nyin
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]mo dang mtshan mo dang dus tshigs dang zas zos pa'i cha de'i stobs che chung las nad zad pa dang /_'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba yin la/_de yang rnam lngar bshad do/_/de las kyang 'dus pa'i rims ni phal cher ram/_mang du nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las phal cher
[\[95b.2\]]'dus pa'i rims su 'gyur bar bshad do/_/phal cher zhes smos pa ni rnam par 'gyur ba yod pa'i don te/_de yang gzhung gzhan las/_rlung las phal cher rtag par 'gyur/_/mkhris las phal cher nyin gsum pa/_/phal cher bad kan las nyin gcig_/_
[\[95b.3\]]'dus pa las ni bzhi pa yin/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/rgyun dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lnga po'i ming bstan pa yin no/_/lus zungs bshang gci rgyu ba yi/_/bu ga nad kyis khyab byas pas/_/lus kun tsha bar gyur nas ni/_/gnod bya sogs dang
[\[95b.4\]]mnyam par 'phel/_/stobs che lus lci rkang lag rengs/_/khyad par du ni dwangs mar gnas/_/gnyen pos bcos dka' bzod par dka'/_/rgyun gyi rims su 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs pas na shin tu bzod par
[\[95b.5\]]dka' ba'i rgyun gyi rims su 'gyur zhing skyed par byed do/_/de yang lus zungs la sogs par rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed pa'i bu ga rnams nad kyis khyab par byas shing kun tu phyin par byas la/_der nad de lus ma lus pa kun du rims kyi tsha bas tsha bar 'gyur zhing tsha
[\[95b.6\]]ba'i gdung bas gzir bar byas pa dang /_de bzhin du gnod par bya ba dwangs ma dang /_dus tshigs dang /_yul dang /_rang bzhin de dang cha mnyam par 'phel zhing rgyas par byas pa ste/_gnod bya ni lus zungs bdun dang dri ma rnams so/_/dus tshigs ni
[\[95b.7\]]dbyar ka la sogs pa'o/_/yul ni rlan la sogs pa'o/_/rang bzhin ni bdun no/_/de yang stobs che ba ste nus pa dang ldan pa dus yun ring po la sogs pa dang /_de bzhin du lci zhing brnag dka' la/_lus kyis mi thegs pa snyam du sems pa dang /_yan lag
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]rnams rengs shing bskyod mi nus pa dang /_khyad par du yang lhag par dwangs ma zhes bya ba'i lus zungs la gnas pa'i gnyen pos bcos par dka' zhing gso ba'i thabs cis kyang bzlog tu med pa ste/_gnod bya la sogs pa dang cha
[\[96a.2\]]mnyam pa'i phyir ro/_/yang de bzhin du bzod par rab tu dka' ba ste/_sdug bsngal zhing brnag par mi nus pa'i rims la ni rgyun gyi rims zhes bya ste/_de lta bur 'gyur ba yin no/_/de yi drod kyis dri ma dang /_/lus zungs myur du zad par byed/_/de
[\[96a.3\]]'og rnam kun lus zungs sogs/_/dag pa'am ma dag rims kyis ni/_/rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhag_/bdun nam bcu'am bcu gnyis gnas/_/phal cher mtshams las mi 'da' bar/_/'tsho ba'am 'chi ba dag tu byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rims
[\[96a.4\]]de'i drod kyi tsha bas dri ma ste bshang ba la sogs pa dang /_dwangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams kyi nang du zhugs pa'i rgyus rims des dri ma rnams zad par byed pa'am/_lus zungs rnams kyang zad par byas nas de'i 'og tu rnam pa kun du ste/_thams
[\[96a.5\]]cad kyi thams cad du lus zungs bshang ba dang gci ba dang bcas pa dag ste/_rims kyi tsha bas dri ma med par byas pa'am/_yang na yan lag 'ga' lus zungs la sogs pa ma dag cing ljan ljin dang bcas pa'i rims kyis grangs ji lta ba bzhin du rlung la
[\[96a.6\]]sogs pa'i nad gzhi las zhag bdun nam bcu'am bcu gnyis kyi bar du phal cher gnas pa'i mtshams sam/_dus kyi nges pa las ni mi 'da' bar rjes su gnas te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_dus de tsam gyi nang du 'chi ba'am/_rims kyis gtong bar 'gyur ba'am/_
[\[96a.7\]]'chi zhing gsod par 'gyur te/_nyin zhag 'di tsam gyis gtong ba'am gsod par 'gyur ro/_/de yang gang rlung shas che ba las byung ba de ni phal cher zhag bdun gyis gtong ba'am 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mkhris pa shas che ba las byung ba ni zhag bcus so/_/
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]bad kan shas che ba las byung ba ni bcu gnyis kyis bye brag phyed par 'gyur ba ni rims kyis sbyar ba'i don no/_/de skad me bzhin 'jug gis bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_de lta bu de ni sman dpyad kyi gzhung rtsom par byed pa drang srong me bzhin 'jug ces bya bas bshad pa'i
[\[96b.2\]]gzhung yin no/_/ljang sngon gyis ni bshad pa'i gzhung /_/bdun pa nyis bldab gyur pa yin/_/de bzhin dgu dang bcu gcig bldab/_/'di ni nad gzhi gsum gyi tshigs/_/'tsho dang 'chi bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_drang srong ljang sngon zhes bya bas
[\[96b.3\]]bshad pa'i gzhung ni 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul 'dir ston pa yin te/_bdun pa ni nyis bldab tu brtsi ste/_rlung gi rims kyis zhag bcu bzhi na dwangs ma la sogs pa dang ma dag pa gang yin pa yang rung ste/_rnam pa thams cad du zhag bcu bzhis 'tsho ba'am 'chi
[\[96b.4\]]bar 'gyur ba bye brag phyed par 'gyur ba yin no/_/gnyis pa ni zhag dgu pa ste/_de yang nyis bldab tu brtsis la zhag bcwa brgyad du bya ste/_mkhris pa shas che ba'i rims ni zhag bcwa brgyad kyis 'tsho ba'am/_'chi ba'i bye brag phyed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du
[\[96b.5\]]gsum pa ni zhag bcu gcig pa yin te/_'di nyis bldab tu byas pas zhag nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyis bad kan gyi shas che ba'i rims kyi bye brag phyed par 'gyur te/_'di dag ni nad gzhi gsum las byung ba'i rims kyi dus tshigs kyi bye brag rnam par gzhag pa yin no/_/
[\[96b.6\]]rims dus dag dang ma dag las/_/yun ring dus su gnas pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la dag pa'i nad dang bshang ba dang gci ba legs par smin pa rtse zhil zhing ma smin pa'i skyon med pa yin la/_de las go bzlog pa ni ma smin pa yin te/_dag pa dang ma
[\[96b.7\]]dag pa de gnyis cha 'dres pa las ni dus yun ring mo zhig tu gnas shing sngar bshad pa'i dus las yun ring du gnas te/_gang gi tshe lus zungs kyi dwangs ma la la ni dag cing smin/_la la ni ma dag cing ma smin par 'gyur na/_de'i tshe rgyun gyi rims 'byang zhing 'dor
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]bar mi 'gyur gyi/_yun ring du gnas pa kho nar 'gyur ro/_/nad rtse zhil ba nyam chung dang /_/kha zas mi 'phrod sogs bsten pas/_/nad dkyel chung yang gnod bya sogs/_/brten te stobs che nyid gyur las/_/gnyen por bcas
[\[97a.2\]]shing 'phel 'bri gnas/_/mi bzad pa ni nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad kyi rtse zhil zhing nad las thar ba'i skyes bu nyam chung zhing lus rid par gyur pa dang /_kha zas mi 'phrod pa la sogs pa bsten pa ste/_zas dang skom dang sman dang spyod lam
[\[97a.3\]]mi mthun zhing mi 'phrod pa bsten pa'i rgyus rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang yang rung ba dkyel chung zhing stobs shin tu zhan pa yin yang mi bzad pa'i rims rgyun gyi rims la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/de yang tsha ba mi bzod pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis 'debs pa
[\[97a.4\]]na mi bzad pa'i rims zhes bya'o/_/de yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_gnod bya la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la brten zhing gnas pa ste/_lan 'ga' ni gnod bya la sogs pas khrag la sogs pa gang yang rung ba brten la/_lan 'ga' ni nyin mtshan la
[\[97a.5\]]sogs pa'i dus la brten la/_lan 'ga' ni rlung la sogs pa'i rang bzhin la brten te/_de ni tshabs chen por 'gyur ba'i stobs dang /_nus pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de yang gnyen po dang bcas pa yin zhing bcos pa'i thabs yod pa ma yin la/_yang
[\[97a.6\]]de ni 'phel ba dang 'bri ba gnyis po la brten zhing gnas pa yin no/_/de rnams kyis ni nad kyi stobs/_/rang gi dus su rims stobs skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_nyam chung ba la sogs pa de rnams kyi rang gi dus nyin mtshan dang /_dus kyi cha ni mtshan nyid can
[\[97a.7\]]du rims kyi stobs skyed cing 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/slar yang de dag bcos thabs kyi/_/stobs che chung las ldog par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_mi bzad pa'i rims kyi rtsom pa de slar ldog cing rang gi bya ba 'gag par 'gyur ba ni bcos thabs kyi
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]stobs che chung las ldog par 'gyur te/_bcos thabs ni gnyen po ste lus zungs dang dus la sogs pa cha mi mnyam pa ni gnyen po'am/_bcos thabs kyi stobs yin la/_de stobs chung bar byas pa ni nus pa zad par byas pa ste/_rgyu des ldog par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[97b.2\]]nad zad rims ni phrar gyur pa/_/bcud la sogs pa nyid la thim/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad zad pa ni nad kyi nus pa ni bri bar gyur la/_rims ni phra zhing shes par dka' bar gnas pa ni dwangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs nyid la thim zhing mi snang bar
[\[97b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/thim pas lus rid sha mdog nyams/_/rmongs bag la sogs de yis skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_rims de lus zungs la thim pas ni lus rid pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid skyed cing 'byung bar byed do/_/nye zhing kha ni bye ba'i phyir/_/dwangs
[\[97b.4\]]ma rgyu ba'i rtsa sgo nas/_/lus kun myur du khyab pa ni/_/nad kyis skye bar byed pa yin/_/des na rgyun du rtag rims 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa sgo bar gang nye bar gnas shing kha bye bar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir/_dwangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa'i sgo rnams las rlung la sogs
[\[97b.5\]]pa'i nad gang yang rung bas lus kun khyab cing phyin par byas nas/_nad des lus thams cad khyab pa'i phyir/_rgyu des rims de rtag cing rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin la/_de yang tsha ba la sogs pa'i rgyun ma chad par rgyun du 'byung bas na/_rgyun gyi
[\[97b.6\]]rims 'gyur ba yin no/_/de las bzlog pa tshul mi 'dra/_/mi snyoms rtsol ba mi mnyam pa/_/bya ba'i dus min mnyam yun ring /_/zhes bya ba la/_de las bzlog pa ni snga ma rgyun gyi rims de las bzlog pa ste/_tsha ba'i rgyun bar bar du chad pa la sogs pa'i
[\[97b.7\]]tshul mi 'dra ba bzhi las rtag pa'i rims su gzhag ste/_tshul mi mthun pa ni ring zhing shin tu ring ba dang /_kha bye zhing shin tu bye ba dang /_dwangs mas /bcud rtsa'i sbubs su nad kyis lus ma lus pa la myur du khyab par mi byed pa ste/_tshul de dag gi rgyun de dag
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]gis rtag pa la sogs pa'i rims kyi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa yin no/_/de yang rtag pa la sogs pa'i rims de dag ni cha mi snyoms pa yin te/_rgyu gang gis mi snyoms pa yin zhe na/_rtsom pa mi snyoms pa'i phyir te/_dus kyi
[\[98a.2\]]'gyur ba mi mnyam pa'i phyir ro/_/rtsom pa mi mnyam pa de yang mkhris pa dang rlung gnyis spyi nas 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa lta bu dang /_bya ba mi mnyam pa ni/_sha dang tshil gyi nus pa dro/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/dus mi mnyam pa ni
[\[98a.3\]]rims kyis 'debs pa'i nyin zhag ste/_de ni nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang /_/gzhan dag nyin re lan re yin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa de yang lan 'ga' ni nyin mo ldang /_lan 'ga' ni mtshan mo/_lan 'ga' ni nyi ma phyed/_lan 'ga' ni dgongs ka ldang bar
[\[98a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ni yun ring du 'brel pa can yang yin pas na yun ring ste/_dus yun ring zhig tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don no/_/phal cher nad ni khrag la brten/_/rtag pa'i rims ni byed par 'gyur/_/de yang nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang /_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[98a.5\]]phal cher zhes bya ba mang du rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang yang rung ba khrag la brten cing gnas nas rtag pa'i rims skyed cing 'byung bar byed par 'gyur la/_de yang nyin mtshan gcig gi nang du lan gnyis ldang bar 'gyur te/_'dir nyin par lan gnyis ldang la
[\[98a.6\]]mtshan mo lan cig ldang ngo zhes bya ba'i nges pa yod pa ma yin la/_gzhan du lan 'ga' ni nyin gcig la lan gnyis ldang bar 'gyur la/_lan 'ga' ni nyin mtshan gnyis la re re ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig nyin re lan re ldang /_/de ni sha yi rtsa la brten/_/
[\[98a.7\]]zhes bya ba la/_rims nyin gcig pa ni nyin zhag gcig gi nang du lan re re zhig ldang bar 'gyur la/_nyin gcig pa'i rims de ni sha'i bcud kyi dwangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa la brten cing gnas pa yin no/_/gsum pa tshil gyi rtsa la gnas/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]nyin gsum pa'i nad ni tshil gyi rtsa'i nad la gnas pas rims nyin gsum pa skyed par byed do/_/mkhris pa rlung gnyis spyi nas 'dzin/_/bad kan mkhris gyur sum mdo na/_/rlung dang bad kan rgyab nas 'dzin/_/de ni zhag gcig gis chod yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims
[\[98b.2\]]nyin gsum pa las gyur pa yin du zin kyang /_mkhris pa dang rlung gnyis shas che ba ni spyi bo ste mgo nas 'dzin pa yin la/_bad kan dang mkhris pa shas che na ni sum mdo zhes bya ba dpung pa gnyis dang /_gnya' ba 'dus pa'i mtshams sun zhing de nas zug par 'gyur
[\[98b.3\]]ro/_/rlung dang bad kan shas che na ni rgyab nas na zhing de nas 'dzin pa yin no/_/yang rims nyin gsum pa de ni zhag gcig gis chod pa yin no/_/nyin bzhi pa'i rims nad tshil dang /_/rkang dang rus pa'i nang na gnas/_/gzhan dag tshil nyid la gnas zer/_/
[\[98b.4\]]de yi nus pa bstan pa ni/_/bad kan gyis ni byin gnyis na/_/rlung gis klad pa na bar byed/_/rus rkang gnyis kar zhugs pa yin/_/nyin bzhi pa ni go bzlog pa'o/_/nyin gsum pas ni nyin gnyis na/_/nyin gcig na bar mi byed do/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims
[\[98b.5\]]nyin bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad rkang dang rus pa gang yang rung ba'i gnas su 'dug cing brten nas nad 'byung bar 'gyur te/_lan 'ga' ni rkang la gnas nas nad skyed do/_/lan 'ga' ni rus pa la gnas nas nad skyed pa yin no/_/yang
[\[98b.6\]]sman pa gzhan dag ni nyin bzhi pa'i rims kyi gnas kyang nyin gsum pa dang 'dra bar tshil nyid la gnas nas ldang ngo zhes zer ro/_/rims nyin bzhi pa de'i nus mthu ni rnam pa gnyis yod par bstan te/_gang gi tshe bad kan gyi shas che ba de'i tshe na dang po byin pa
[\[98b.7\]]gnyis nas zug cing na bar 'gyur la/_de rlung gi shas che ba yin na ni dang por klad pa na bar byed pa yin no/_/de yang res 'ga' ni rus pa la gnas la/_res 'ga' ni rkang la zhen cing gnas pa yin no/_/res 'ga' ni rus pa dang rkang gnyis ka la zhugs te/_/
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]gnas pa yin la/_gnyi gar zhugs pa de'i mtshan nyid ni nyin bzhi pa gcig la go bzlog pa yin no/_/de yang nyi ma gnyis kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad pa nas de'i 'og tu nyin gcig na bar byed la/_de ltar nyin gcig na ba med nas yang nyi ma
[\[99a.2\]]gnyis kyi bar du na bar byed pa yin no/_/'dis ni mtshan nyid gcig bstan pa yin la/_de las go bzlog pa'i rnam pa gzhan pa ni nyin gcig rims nad de thu nas nyi ma gnyis kyi bar du cung zad bya ste/_nyi ma gsum pa la yang thu bar byed pa'i rims kyis na
[\[99a.3\]]ba yin te/_de ni gnyis pa'o/_/nad rnams kyi ni stobs che chung /_/zas dang spyod pa las 'byung zhing /_/de bzhin rims rnams 'byung ba ni/_/yid dang las las skye bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang dus de'i tshe rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams kyi stobs
[\[99a.4\]]sam mthu che chung las 'byung ba dang /_zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa las rims nad du 'gyur la/_de bzhin du yid kyi stobs che chung dang /_las sngon chad spyod pa'i stobs che chung las rims rnams skye bar 'gyur la/_de yang lan 'ga' ni rtag
[\[99a.5\]]pa'i rims su 'gyur ro/_/lan 'ga' ni nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_de las go bzlog pa dag tu yang 'gyur la/_ched 'ga' ni nyin bzhi par gyur nas/_nyin gsum pa dang nyin gcig pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[99a.6\]]nad kyis lus zungs dkrugs gyur pa/_/nad sos nyi tshe zhu bar 'gyur/_/de tshe nad pa dbugs drag rngul/_/mkhun zhing slon byed 'gre ba dang /_/lus 'dar tshig mang tsha ba dang /_/lus grang bzhin mdog nyams pa dang /_/dran stor rims kyi shugs
[\[99a.7\]]kyis gzer/_/khros pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang /_/bshang ba nad dang sgrar bcas pa/_/sla ba shugs drag 'byung ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sogs pa'i nad gang yang rung bas dwangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs dkrugs shing glogs par gyur pa'i rims de nad
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]sos pa dang /_nye ba'i tshe na lus zungs de nyid la thim zhing zhu bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas nad de zhu ba'i dbang gis de'i tshe nad pa de la dbugs kyi rngam pa cung zad drag tu 'byung zhing rngul te ba spu'i bu ga rnams nas chu 'dzag pa dang /_de bzhin du mkhun zhing sgra mi gsal
[\[99b.2\]]bar 'don zhing slon pa ste/_bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa skyugs par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du mal lam sa'i steng du 'gre zhing lus 'gyur ba dang /_lus 'dar zhing g.yo ba dang /_tshig mang por smra ba ste/_dgos pa yod pa de dgos pa'i tshig mang
[\[99b.3\]]du smra ba dang /_lus tsha ba dang grang ba'i rnam pa dus gcig tu smra bar 'gyur ba dang /_mdog nyams shing gzi mdangs med pa dang /_dran pa stor zhing 'du shes mi gsal ba dang /_de bzhin du rims kyi shugs kyis gzir zhing rims nad kyi shugs lhag par skye
[\[99b.4\]]ba ltar byed pa dang /_khros shing 'khrugs pa lta bu'i tshul du sdang mig gis lta bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin du bshang ba yang rlung la sogs pa'i nad dang rlung gi sgra dang bcas pa sla bag tu shugs su 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/lus ni yang zhing rmya dang rmongs bag
[\[99b.5\]]tsha ba med/_/kha na thor bu 'byung dang dbang po brtas shing bde/_/yid ni sor gnas rngul sbrid bder 'byung yi ga 'byed/_/mgo bo g.ya' ba rims nad byang ba'i mtshan ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshan ma de dag gi rjes la rims nad byang ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i
[\[99b.6\]]mtshan ma ni lus yang bar 'gyur zhing /_khong lci ba'i bag med pa dang lus rmya ba dang /_/rmongs bag dang tsha ba med pa ste/_rmya zhing nyam chung ba dang /_rmongs bag gis 'du shes stor ba dang /_tsha zhing rno bar gyur pa'i rnam pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du
[\[99b.7\]]kha'i nang du thor bu smin pa phra mo 'byung ba dang /_mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams brtas shing rang gi las kyi bya ba bde blag tu byed par nus pa dang /_lus bde zhing nad kyi tshor ba med pa dang /_yid so la gnas pa dang /_sems kyi rang bzhin sngon chad snying
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]stobs can la sogs pa gang gi shas che ba de de bzhin du ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du rngul dang sbrid pa bde blag tu thon zhing 'byung ba dang /_de bzhin du bkres shing zas la 'dod pa skye ba'i yi ga 'byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[100a.2\]]mgo bo g.ya' zhing phrugs 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur te/_'di dag ni rims byang ba'i rtags sam mtshan ma yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar
[\[100a.3\]]ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas khrag dang mkhris pa dang lud pa'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims kyi tsha ba las khrag mkhris skye bar 'gyur bar bshad pas/_de'i phyir
[\[100a.4\]]de myur du gsod pa yin pas/_rims kyi nad gzhi'i le'u'i 'og tu khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad gzhi brtsams pa yin no/_/lud pa yang khrag dang mkhris pa dang 'dra bar gnod pa myur du skyed pa yin pas de yang le'u 'dir bshad pa yin no/_/rab dro rab rno
[\[100a.5\]]tsha dang skyur/_/lan tshwa la sogs tsha ba dang /_/khre rgod ut+pa la yi zas/_/de bcas shin tu bsten drags dang /_/mkhris pa can gyi mkhris nad ni/_/gsher dang khrag rgyas nad du 'gyur/_/de ni phan tshun 'dres gyur pas/_/lus kun khyab par byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[100a.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_zas dang spyod lam shin tu dro zhing tsha ba'i shas che ba dang rab tu rno zhing drags pa dang /_skyur ba'i ro shas cher bsten pa dang /_lan tshwa'i ro la sogs pa ro rno ba shas cher bsten pa dang /_tsha bag la gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du khre rgod la sogs pa'i
[\[100a.7\]]zas bsten par drags shing shas che ba dang /_yang de bzhin du tsha zhing rno ba la sogs pa mkhris pa skyed pa'i kha zas skom tshad las lhag par bsten zhing zos pas mkhris pa'i nad gsher ba dang /_khrag gi nad rgyas shing ldang bar 'gyur la/_khrag dang mkhris pa
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]de gnyis phan tshun gcig la gcig 'dres shing gcig pur gyur pa dang /_khrag gi mdog can nyid du gyur nas lus mgo nas rkang gi bar du ma lus par kun khyab cing byer bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/mkhris pa khrag las gyur pa dang /_/'dres dang gnod bya las dang
[\[100b.2\]]gcig_/mdog dang dri ni rjes mthun pas/_/khrag gi ming du bstan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa gang yin pa ste khrag gi ming du bstan te/_khrag dang mkhris pa gso ba la/_khrag ni thur song zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa tshul gyis de'i ming du 'gyur ba yin te/_
[\[100b.3\]]gang gi phyir mkhris pa ni khrag las gyur pa yin zhing khrag las skyes pa yin no/_/de yang gzhung 'di nyid las/_bad mkhris dri ma bu ga ru/_/rngul dang sen mo ba spu dang /_/snum dang mig dang pags pa tshil/_/rim bzhin lus zungs dri ma yin/_/zhes smos pa yin
[\[100b.4\]]pas na/_de'i phyir khrag gi snyigs ma ni mkhris pa yin la/_de bzhin du 'dres pa ste/_gcig la gcig cha 'dres pa'i gnad dang /_de bzhin du gnod bya las kyang 'byung ste/_gang gi phyir khrag ni mkhris pa nyid kyis myur du gnod par 'gyur la/_de bzhin du
[\[100b.5\]]khrag gis mkhris pa la gnod par 'gyur ba yin te/_de la gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang gzhung 'di nyid las/_'phel dang zad par bya ba'i sman/_/gcig gi gang yin de gzhan yin/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/mdog dang dri yang de gnyis rjes su mthun pa yin
[\[100b.6\]]te/_mkhris pa de ni kha dog dang dri yang khrag dang rjes su mthun pas de'i phyir/_mkhris pa yang dri dang kha dog khrag dang mtshungs pas khrag gi ming du bstan zhing bshad pa yin no/_/de ni khrag gnas mchin pa dang /_/mcher pa las ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes
[\[100b.7\]]bya ba la/_khrag dang mkhris pa de gnyis ni khrag gi gnas te/_khrag dang mkhris pa rgyu ba'i rtsa sbubs nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du mchin pa dang mcher pa yang khrag gi gnas yin pas de gnyis las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mgo bo lci zhing yi ga
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]'chus/_/bsil 'dod sgregs pa dud can skyur/_/skyug cing skyugs mdog btsog par snang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde mgo 'khor/_/khong snyom khrag dmar nya dri bro/_/kha dri mi zhim skad 'gags la/_/mig la sogs pa'i kha dog ni/_/
[\[101a.2\]]dmar dang ljang dang ser por snang /_/rmi lam du yang kha dog de/_/'dir ni mthong bar 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad 'di phyis 'byung bar gyur na/_nad kyi sngar byung ba'i tshul mgo bo lci ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mgo bo
