[\[101a.3\]]lci ba ni dang po mgo bo mi thegs pa snyam sems pa'o/_/sgregs pa du ba can ni sgregs pa du ba ltar dku ba 'byung ba'o/_/skyur ba ni sgregs pa'i ro skyur bag tu 'byung ba'o/_/skyug pa ni slon pa'o/_/skyugs pa'i mdog btsog pa ni kha dog mi sdug pa dang /_dri
[\[101a.4\]]nga ba dang /_ro mi zhim par snang ba'o/_/gzhan ni go bar zad do/_/khrag de nya dmar po ro hi ta zhes bya ba'i dri ltar shin tu dri mnam pa'am/_khrag nyid kyi mdog dmar la dri nga bar snang ba dang /_kha'i dri mi zhim zhing mnam pa sngar byung ba'i tshul las de shes par
[\[101a.5\]]bya'o/_/de bzhin du skad 'gags shing subs pa dang /_de bzhin du mig dang pags pa dang /_gdong dang /_lce dang /_bshang ba dang /_gcin la sogs pa kha dog dmar ba dang /_dud pa ltar ljang ba dang /_ser por snang ba las shes par bya la/_yang de bzhin
[\[101a.6\]]du rmi lam gyi nang du yang kha dog dmar po dang /_ljang gu dang /_ser por mthong bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/stod du sna mig rna ba kha/_/smad du bshang sgo pho mo'i mtshan/_/ba spu'i bu ga kun las kyang /_/khrag rab rgyas pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag
[\[101a.7\]]dang mkhris pa'i nad de stod du sna dang mig dang rna ba dang kha'i sgo bdun nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_smad du bshang sgo dang pho mtshan dang mo mtshan te bu ga gsum las 'byung bar 'gyur la/_de bzhin du ba spu'i bu ga ma lus pa kun las kyang 'byung ste/_rngul 'byung
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]ba'i rtsa sgo thams cad las kyang 'byung ba ste/_khrag rgyas pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sgo ni de dag yin no/_stod kyi bad kan yin gso sla/_/de ni bkru sman btang bas gso/_/sman mang yod cing mkhris pa yi/_/sman gyi mchog ni bkru sman yin/_/zla la yod pa'i
[\[101b.2\]]bad kan yang /_/der ni de yis sbyangs byas 'gyur/_/de la sman ni mngar dang bska/_/bad kan dag la phan pa la/_/gang gtogs dang gis bad kan sel/_/kha dang bska ba smos ci dgos/_/zhes bya ba la/_stod kyi char byung ba'i bad kan dang mkhris pa gang
[\[101b.3\]]yin pa de ni bad kan rgyas pa las gyur pa yin pa'i phyir/_gso sla zhing bcos par sla ba yin la/_de yang bkru sman btang bas lam bsgyur te gso dgos pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sman yang mang du yod pa ste/_sman ro mngar ba dang kha ba dang bska ba rnams phan
[\[101b.4\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/yang stod du byung ba'i khrag mkhris la mkhris pa'i nad la phan pa'i sman bya ba ni sman gyi mchog yin te/_stod du byung ba'i khrag dang mkhris pa'i zla la bad kan yod pa de bkru sman byas pas gang yin pa de sbyang zhing dag par 'gyur ro/_/bad kan sbyangs
[\[101b.5\]]shing dag pa'i skyes bu de la sman mngar ba rnams kyi khu ba la sogs pa rnams kyang bad kan la phan pa yin te/_don du bad kan gnod pa'i mngar ram/_bad kan la phan par gyur na bad kan 'ba' zhig yod pa de la rang bzhin gyis bad kan sel bar byed pa'i sman kha ba
[\[101b.6\]]dang bska ba dag byin na phan par 'gyur zhing bsngags pa yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_thur du 'byung ba'i rlung yin phyir/_/de ni skyug sman btang bas gso/_/mkhris pa'i sman ni nyung ba yin/_/sgyug sman mkhris pa'i sman mchog yin/_/zla la yod pa'i rlung nad kyang /_/
[\[101b.7\]]de ni de yis zhi mi 'gyur/_/de la ro ni mngar bskol ba/_/'ba' zhig phan par 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_thur du 'byung zhing ro smad kyi lam nas 'bab pa'i khrag dang mkhris pa ni rlung nad shas che ba las byung ba'i phyir/_de gso ba tsam du byas pa las gtan bsal
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]bar dka' ba yin la/_de yang skyug sman btang bas gso zhing slon du 'byung ba ni de'i gso ba yin no/_/khrag dang mkhris pa de ni sman shin tu nyung ba yin zhing mngar ba 'ba' zhig gis gso dgos pa yin la/_lam bsgyur ba'i skyug sman gtang
[\[102a.2\]]ba de ni mkhris pa'i sman gyi mchog kyang ma yin la/_zla la yod pa'i rlung nad gzhan dbang du byed pa de yang skyug sman gyis zhi bar mi 'gyur la/_'og tu 'bab pa'i khrag dang mkhris pa de la ni sman ro mngar ba kho na bskol ba la sogs pa phan pa yin gyi/_kha ba'i
[\[102a.3\]]sman khu ba la sogs pa ni ma yin te/_de rnams kyis rlung skyed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/bad kan rlung ni 'dres pa'i nad/_/gnyi gar 'byung ba gso dka' ste/_/bzlog pa'i thabs ni med phyir dang /_/sman yang yod pa ma yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag
[\[102a.4\]]dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang 'dres pa'i nad las byung bar gyur nas lus kyi stod dang lus kyi smad gnyis ka las 'byung ba de ni shin tu bcos par dka' ba yin te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzlog par mi nus pa yin te/_de'i phyir nad kyi lam bzlog cing bsgyur
[\[102a.5\]]nas bcos pa'i thabs med pa'i phyir dang /_de bzhin du de lta bu'i nad dang 'tsham zhing gnyi ga las mi 'byung ba'i sman yod pa ma yin pas/_gsor mi rung ba yin no/_/'di las bzlog par bya ba'i thabs/_/sbyang ba'ang yod pa ma yin te/_/sbyangs pas
[\[102a.6\]]bzlog par bya ba dag_/sman pas khrag mkhris gso ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad rgyas te byung ba 'di la smyung ba bya ba sman dpyad kyi thabs yin na/_sbyang ba de ni gang zhig btang na gnyi gnas 'byung ba'i khrag mkhris bad
[\[102a.7\]]kan dang rlung 'dres par gyur ba de dus gcig tu 'am gzhan du khrid cing sel bar byed pa de lta bu'i bzlog par bya ba'i thabs su gyur pa'i sbyang ba gang yang yod pa ma yin la/_khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad la ni sbyangs pas mi mthun par bzlog cing lam bsgyur ba nyid
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]kyis sman pas bcos dgos na/_lam gnyis nas 'byung ba 'di ni bzlog par nus pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir thur du 'bab pa las ltos te/_skyug sman btang na ni stod du 'byung ba bzlog par mi 'gyur la/_stod du 'byung ba las ltos te bkru sman btang na
[\[102b.2\]]ni thur du 'byung ba mi bzlog pas bcos pa'i thabs med pa yin no/_/mkhris pa nye bar zhi ba yang /_/'di las yong ye yod ma yin/_/'dres par gyur pa'i nad la ni/_/thams cad sel ba'i zhi bya phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di la sbyang ba nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i
[\[102b.3\]]thabs rnam pa thams cad du med pa de bzhin du zhi bar bya ba'i thabs kyang yod pa ma yin te/_gal te stod du byung ba'i bad kan dang 'brel pa la phan par 'gyur ba kha ba dang bska ba la sogs pa'i sman btang na ni/_de rlung la gnod pas thur du 'byung ba 'phel
[\[102b.4\]]bar 'gyur la/_gang smad du byung ba'i rlung las gyur pa la phan pa sman mngar ba byin na ni/_de bad kan la gnod pas stod du 'byung ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na lam gnyis ka nas 'byung ba'i khrag mkhris 'di la ni sbyang ba dang 'dra bar zhi bar bya ba'i
[\[102b.5\]]thabs kyang yong ye rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no/_/de yang gang gi phyir nad 'dres par gyur cing phyogs gcig tu gnas la bya ba cig rtsom par 'gyur ba'i nad la ni thams cad sel ba ste/_nad gzhi gsum char sel ba'i zhi bar bya bas phan pa yin na/_
[\[102b.6\]]stod smad kyi lam gnyis ka nas 'byung ba'i khrag dang mkhris pa la ni nad gzhi gsum char sel bar 'gyur ba'i sman yod pa ma yin te/_nad gzhi gsum tha dad par gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de la nad dang rjes mthun pa'i/_/gtar ga btab ste brtag par bya/_/
[\[102b.7\]]zhes bya ba la/_khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad de la ni gtar ga btab ste khrag phyung la/_khrag 'di ni rlung 'khrugs pa yin no/_/'di ni mkhris pa 'khrugs pa yin no/_/'di ni bad kan 'khrugs pa'o/_/'di ni 'dres pa'am ldan pa 'khrugs pa'o/_/'di ni 'dus
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]pa las gyur pa yin no/_/zhes gtar gas bton pa'i khrag nyid la brtag par bya ste/_rlung khrag gnag dang dmar dang rtsub/_/ces bya ba la sogs pas ni rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris khrag ser la rtsa gnag mnam/_/zhes bya ba la
[\[103a.2\]]sogs pas ni mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan khrag ni 'jam la skya/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bad kan las gyur pa nas/_nyes gsum dri ma rnyog pa can/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gyis 'dres pa dang 'dus pa las gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/bla brnan
[\[103a.3\]]byung bar gyur pa dag_/'gyur bar shes las rtogs par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag dang mkhris pa de bla brnan byung bar gyur pa dag ni lus kyi 'gyur ba'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u las/_khrag dang mkhris pa shin tu dmar/_/yang na gnag pa'am 'tsho ba'am/_/
[\[103a.4\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pa las rtogs par bya'o/_/de la lud pa myur gnod byed/_/de phyir de nyid bshad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad de rnams kyi nang nas lud pa ni gnod pa myur du skyed cing khyad par du mi bde bar byed pa yin pas/_de'i phyir lud pa de'i mtshan
[\[103a.5\]]nyid gang dag yin pa bshad par bya'o/_/lud pa rlung mkhris bad kan dang /_/glo rdol glo gcong la lngar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_lud pa ni rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga yod do zhes lha'i mig dang ldan pa'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis
[\[103a.6\]]bshad do/_/thams cad ma gsos zad byed 'gyur/_/phyi ma bzhin du stobs chen yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lud pa de dag thams cad ma gsos shing btang snyoms su bzhag na mthar zad byed kyi glo gcong chen por 'gyur ba'am/_mthar 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur
[\[103a.7\]]la/_lud pa de rnams kyang phyi ma bzhin du stobs che ste/_rlung gi lud pa bas ni mkhris pa'i lud pa stobs che la/_de bas ni bad kan lud pa stobs che/_de bas ni glo rdol ba'i lud pa stobs che/_de bas ni glo gcong zad byed kyi lud pa stobs che zhing shugs
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]drag pa yin no/_/de rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rtags/_/gre ba g.ya' zhing yi ga 'chus/_/gre nang gra mas gang snyam sems/_/zhes bya ba la/_lud pa de rnams phyis 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye ba la sogs pa'i rtags sam mtshan ma ni gre ba g.ya' zhing yi ga
[\[103b.2\]]'chus par 'gyur ba dang /_gre ba'i nang thams cad nas kyi gra mas gang ba snyam du sems shing rtsub par 'gyur ro/_/de la thur rgyu'i rlung gnod 'gyur/_/stod du song ste brang du phyin/_/de tshe mgul pa'i nang du zhen/_/mgo bo'i rtsa rnams bkang nas ni/_/de nas
[\[103b.3\]]yan lag 'degs pa ltar/_/g.yengs byed mig rdol tsam du na/_/rgyab brang rtsib logs na zhing zug_/kha ru 'byung zhing rgyu ba na/_/lud pa snod chag 'dra'i sgra 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_de la lud pa thams cad la thur du rgyu ba'i rlung gnod pa dang bcas shing
[\[103b.4\]]thur du 'byung du ma ster bas de stod du song ste brang du phyin par gyur pa la/_de'i tshe des shugs brgal ba las mgul pa yan chad kyi bar zhen cing gnas nas/_mgo bo'i rtsa sgo rnams nas zhugs te/_gnas de dag bkang zhing khyab par byed la/_de nas
[\[103b.5\]]de'i 'og tu lus kyi yan lag rnams gyen du bskyod cing 'degs pa ltar byed pas rnam par g.yengs par byed la/_de bzhin du mig gnyis phyung zhing rdol ba tsam du na ba dang rgyab dang brang dang rtsib logs kyi phyogs rnams kyang na zhing zug pa dang bcas pas rlung
[\[103b.6\]]de kha'i sgor rgyu zhing 'byung bar byed de/_/de'i tshe lud pa snod chag pa'i sgra 'byung zhing khar sogs bcag pa'i sgra dang bcas pa 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nad gzhi'i dbye bas nad kyang ni/_/tha dad shugs dang bcas pa yin/_/nad gang sgra ni mi snyoms pa/_/
[\[103b.7\]]de las lud pa 'byung ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi'i rgyu'i bye brag dbye bas rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir lud pa'i nad kyang rnam pa tha dad cing rlung de shugs sam stobs dang bcas pa yin la/_des na lud pa'i nad gang yin pa'i sgra yang mi snyoms shing sgra che ba
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]la sogs pas lud pa de 'byung ba yin no/_/de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te/_de la rlung ni rang bzhin gyi shugs dang bcas pa yin la/_shugs de yang rgyu sna tshogs pa'i dbang gis che ba'am chung bar 'gyur la/_gang de dang phrad pa'i sgra de
[\[104a.2\]]yang rgyu'i khyad par gyi dbang gis gnod pa sna tshogs pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/rlung nad skyed pa rlung 'khrugs pa/_/brang dang gre ba kha skam zhing /_/snying brang rtsib logs klad pa gzer/_/rmongs bag khong 'khrugs sgad 'gags shing /_/lud pa skam po 'byung
[\[104a.3\]]byed cing /_/na ba'i shugs drag sgra cher 'byung /_/lus kun brtse bcas bad kan skam/_/'thon par dka' zhing nyung ngu 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung nad skyed par byed pa'i kha zas dang spyod lam rtsub cing grang ba la sogs pa bsten pa dang /_lam
[\[104a.4\]]dang bud med la sogs pas dub pa dag gis rlung nad de 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur na/_brang dang gre ba dang kha shin tu skam par byed pa dang /_snying ga la sogs par gzer bar byed pa dang /_lud pa skam po bad kan dang mchil snabs med par
[\[104a.5\]]'byung bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin du tsha ba'i tshabs che ba dang /_shugs 'byung ba drag po dang /_sgra chen po 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin no/_/yang lud pa de ni lus dang yan lag brtse ba dang bcas pa dang /_bad kan nam mchil snabs nang nas
[\[104a.6\]]'thon pa shin tu dka' ba 'byung zhing nyung zhig 'byung ba yin no/_/mkhris pas mig dang bad kan ser/_/kha nang kha zhing rims mgo 'khor/_/khrag mkhris slon zhing skom dad che/_/skad 'gags dud 'dra skyur ba dang /_/lud pa'i shugs kyi rgyun
[\[104a.7\]]'byung ba/_/skar mda' 'phro ba lta bur snang /_/zhes bya ba la/_lud pa mkhris pa las gyur pa las ni mig ser ba dang /_bad kan 'byung ba ser bar 'byung ba dang /_de bzhin du kha'i nang khab bro ba dang /_rims la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]yang lud pa dud pa 'dra ba 'byung zhing dri skyur ba 'byung ba dang /_lud pa 'byung ba'i shugs kyi rgyun rtag tu 'byung zhing skar mda'i tshogs 'phro ba ltar mthong bar 'gyur ba'am/_rma bya'i sgro ltar kha dog sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan las brang nad
[\[104b.2\]]tshabs chung /_/mgo lci snying ga gang snyam sems/_/gre bar bskus 'dra snyom par byed/_/cham 'debs zas skyug yi ga 'chus/_/spu brtse lud pa skam pa dang /_/snum zhing dkar ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa'i
[\[104b.3\]]mtshan nyid ni brang du zug cing na ba dang /_na ba'i tshabs chung ba dang /_mgo bo lci zhing bem bem por 'dug pa dang /_snying ga mer mer por gang ba snyam du sems pa dang /_gre bar chags shing 'dam pa bskus pa snyam du sems pa dang /_lus dang yan lag
[\[104b.4\]]snyom zhing lci ba dang /_cham pas 'debs pa dang /_kha zas skyug cing slon pa dang /_spu bshor zhing brtse ba dang /_lud pa skam pa dang /_snum pa dang /_dkar bar 'byung ba ni bad kan gyi mtshan nyid yin no/_/stobs 'gyed la sogs drag shul rnams/_/mi
[\[104b.5\]]nus bzhin byas de dang des/_/rlung gis brang nang glo dral la/_/mkhris pa rjes 'brangs dkyel gyur pa/_/'khrugs te lud pa lu bar byed/_/de ni bad kan khrag bcas dang /_/ser zhing gnag la skam pa dang /_/ril ril por mnam mang du 'byung /_/'byung tshe
[\[104b.6\]]gre ba na ba dang /_/brang ni dral ba snyam du sems/_/khab ni rnon pos phug snyam sems/_/gzer gyis 'debs par byed pa dang /_/tshigs 'bye rims dang dbugs mi bde/_/skad 'gags lus 'dar skom dad che/_/phug ron lta bur mkhun 'byin to/_/rtsib logs
[\[104b.7\]]gzer 'gyur de nas ni/_/rim gyis stobs dang me drod dang /_/nus pa nyams ni 'bri bar 'gyur/_/zad byed kyis gcin khrag dang bcas/_/rgyab dang rkang pa na bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_stobs 'gyed pa ni lag stobs 'gyed cing rtsal bskyod pa la sogs
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]pa'o/_/la sogs pa zhes smos pa ni/_bud med bsten drags pa dang /_khur dang las kyis dub pa dang /_glang po che dang rta 'dul ba la sogs pa'i drag shul rnams mi nus bzhin du byas pa dag bsdu'o/_/de ltar stobs 'gyed pa la
[\[105a.2\]]sogs pa'i drag shul mi nus bzhin du nan gyis rtsom par byed/_/bsten par byas pa'i rgyu rnam pa mang po de dang des rlung 'khrugs pas brang gi nang gi glo dbral zhing gtses par byed pa yang rlung de mkhris pa dang 'brel zhing /_mkhris pa rjes su 'brangs pa zla la
[\[105a.3\]]yod na de stobs skye zhing dkyel du gyur pas lud pa lu bar byed pa yin no/_/de nas lud pa des bad kan khrag dang bcas pa dang /_kha dog ser ba dang /_rtsa gnag pa dang /_skam zhing ljan ljin med pa dang /_ril ril por gnas la mnam pa dag mang du 'byung zhing slon la
[\[105a.4\]]'byung ba'i tshe gre ba'i nang na zhing gzer ba dang bcas pa'o/_/brang gi phyogs dbral zhing gshags pa snyam du sems pa dang /_yang brang de nyid khab rnon pos phug cing gtsags pa snyam du sems pa dang /_gzer gyis 'debs pa
[\[105a.5\]]dang /_ji lta bu'i tshul du 'byung zhe na/_tshigs bye ba snyam du sems pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /_yang de bzhin du phug ron ltar sgra mi gsal ba'i tshig tu mkhun zhing 'byin pa dang /_rtsib logs kyi phyogs gzer ba dang
[\[105a.6\]]bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i 'og tu lud pa can gyi skyes bu des dus kyi rim gyis lus kyi stobs la sogs pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro/_/de la stobs ni khu chu'o/_/me drod ni zas 'ju zhing smin par byed pa'i pho ba'i me drod do/_/nus pa ni nyams stobs so/_
[\[105a.7\]]de zad cing nyams pas cir 'gyur zhe na/_gcin khrag dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /_rgyab dang rkang pa mi bzad par na bar 'gyur ro/_/gtso bo rlung ni 'khrugs pa yis/_/lus zungs zad byed nad rgyal po/_/glo gcong gi ni gnas byed cing /_/lud pa lu
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]zhing bad kan 'byung /_/rnag 'dra mnam zhing ser ba dang /_/rul zhing rtsa sngo dmar ba dang /_rtsib logs bton pa ltar sems shing /_/snying ni lhung ba snyam du byed/_/rgyu med dro dang grang ba 'dod/_/zas mang za zhing nyams stobs zad/_/bzhin ni snum zhing dang bar snang /_/mig
[\[105b.2\]]ni mdangs ldan blta sdug 'gyur/_/de nas de las zad byed 'gyur/_/thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_glo gcong dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la ni rlung gtso bor gyur pas/_'og nas bshad pa'i glo gcong gi nad kyi rgyu rnams kyis 'khrugs shing ldang
[\[105b.3\]]bar 'gyur la/_des lus zungs rnams zad par byas nas/_nad kyi rgyal po zad byed dam/_/glo gcong zhes bya ba'i gnas gzhir byung la/_rgyu des na lud pa lu bar 'gyur ro/_/des na skyes bu de bad kan 'byung zhing slon par phal cher rnag la sogs pa'i mtshan
[\[105b.4\]]nyid dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rtsib logs bton pa ltar sems pa ni gnas de dag bsgul zhing phyung ba snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/_/yang de bzhin du glo gcong gi lud pa de snying la gnas nas lhung zhing 'byung ba snyam byed pa dang /_rgyu med par glo bur
[\[105b.5\]]du tsha ba dang grang ba 'dod cing bsten pas dga' bar byed de/_grang bas nyen pa med par dro ba 'dod pa dang /_tsha bas nyen pa med par grang zhing bsil ba 'dod par 'gyur ba dang /_kha zas mang du zos su zin kyang nyams stobs 'bri zhing chung bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[105b.6\]]bzhin ras snum zhing cung zad dang ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_mig mdangs dang ldan zhing blta na sdug pa mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i 'og tu lud pa can gyi skyes bu de la zad byed kyi tshul thams cad de gcong chen po'i mtshan nyid ma lus par
[\[105b.7\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar glo rdol las byung lud/_/nyam chung lus ni 'jig byed de/_/stobs ldan gso ba tsam du rung /_/glo gcong las byung de dang 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid de ltar na glo rdol ba las byung ba'i lud pa 'dis ni
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]skyes bu nyam chung zhing stobs zad pa'i lus 'jig cing 'joms par byed pa yin la/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa la ni re zhig gso ba tsam du rung ba yin no/_/glo gcong las byung ba'i lud pa yang glo rdol gyi lud pa dang tshul 'dra ba yin
[\[106a.2\]]no/_/de gnyis gsar byung mgon ldan 'grub/_/ces bya ba la/_glo rdol ba dang glo gcong las byung ba'i lud pa de gnyis gsar du byung zhing nad kyis btab nas ring po ma lon par yang yin no/_/mgon dang ldan pa de gso ba'i yan lag bzhi car dang ldan pas
[\[106a.3\]]legs par gsos na 'grub cing 'tshor rung ba yin no/_/nad gzhi tha dad gsum gsor rung /_/zhes bya ba la/_lud pa de dag gi nang nas nad gzhi tha dad pa'i lud pa rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan las byung ba ni gsor rung ba yin no/_/gnyis 'dres kun
[\[106a.4\]]kyang rgan po ni/_/na tshod zad btab 'tsho ba tsam/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa las byung ba'i lud pa gang yin pa de ni gso ba tsam du byar rung ba yin la/_yang lud pa gsor rung bar bshad la/_nad gzhi tha dad pa las byung ba dag kyang mi
[\[106a.5\]]rgan pa las byung zhing /_na tshod dengs shing zad pa la btab na re zhig gso ba tsam du byar rung ba yin no/_/lud pa yal bar bor ba las/_/dbugs mi bde dang zad byed slon/_/skad 'gags la sogs nad 'byung 'gyur/_/de phyir de ni myur du gso/_/
[\[106a.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir lud pa yal bar bor zhing ma bcos pa las dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur bas/_de'i phyir lud pa gsar pa de myur du gso zhing sman dpyad kyis bcos par bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i
[\[106a.7\]]rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas dbugs mi bde ba dang skyigs bus btab pa'i nad gzhi
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di brtsams pa'i 'brel pa ni 'di yin te/dbugs mi bde ba ni lud pa las 'byung ste/_'di nyid las lud pa 'phel ba las dbugs mi bde ba 'byung bar gzhung rtsom pas bshad pa yin no/_/de bas na 'di'i 'og tu
[\[106b.2\]]dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gzhi bshad pa yin la/_skyigs bu yang de'i rkyen gyis 'byung bas dbugs mi bde ba'i zhar la skyigs bu yang bshad pa yin te/_lud pa 'phel ba'am sngar nad gzhi/_/'khrugs las dbugs mi bde 'byung 'gyur/_/ma zhu tshad 'khru
[\[106b.3\]]slon dug 'thungs/_/skya rbab rims btab las kyang 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_lud pa 'phel ba ni lud pa shas cher rgyas pa ste/_de las dbugs mi bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi bshad pa'i skabs su sngar bshad pa'i nad gzhi kha
[\[106b.4\]]ba dang /_tsha ba dang dro ba'i bag zos pa las nad gzhi 'khrugs pas dbugs mi bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ma zhu ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis btab pa las dbugs mi bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phran tshegs mun can chad pa dang /_/chen po gyen
[\[106b.5\]]'byung rnam pa lnga/_/zhes bya ba la/_dbugs mi bde ba ni phran tshegs la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga yod do/_/bad kan gyis ni rgyu lam bkag_/rlung ni sna tshogs khyab par gnas/_/srog dang zas skom rgyu ba'i lam/_/sbu gu nad kyis bkag pas
[\[106b.6\]]na/_/ma zhu'i gnas nas 'byung ba'i dbugs/_/brang gnas dbugs mi bde bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung gang bad kan gyi rgyu ba'i lam gyi sgo bkag nas/_rlung de sna tshogs par thams cad du khyab ste gnas nas ldang bar 'gyur la/_yang rlung de srog la sogs
[\[106b.7\]]pa rgyu ba'i lam gyi bu ga nad kyis 'khrugs par byas pas ma zhu ba'i gnas nas byung ba'i dbugs gang yin pa de brang na gnas shing brten nas dbugs mi bde bar byed pa yin no/_/de yi sngon tshul snying rtsib logs/_/gzer zhing srog rlung mi mthun rgyu/_/sbos dang mur
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]'gram na ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i sngon tshul ni dbugs de sngar byung ba'i nad kyi tshul lam rtags ni snying la sogs pa gzer ba dang /_srog ces bya ba'i rlung mi mthun pa rgyu zhing phyin ci log tu 'gro ba dang /_lto sbos pa dang mur 'gram
[\[107a.2\]]gnyis sun zhing zug par 'gyur ro/_/des ni drag shul 'grangs drags pas/_/bskyod pa'i rngam pa phran tshegs 'gyur/_/de ni rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la dbugs mi bde ba rnams kyi nang nas phran tshegs ni drag shul la sogs pas bskyod
[\[107a.3\]]pa'i rlung las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la drag shul ni lus dub par byed pa'i las khur 'degs pa la sogs pa'o/_/'grangs drags pa ni tshad las lhag par mang du zos pa'o/_/de dag gis bskyod pa ni ldang bar byed pa ste/_de lta bu'i rngam pa ni phran tshegs
[\[107a.4\]]yin la/_chung ngu phran tshegs de ni gso ba'i sman dpyad bya mi dgos par dus cung zad cig ngal bso ba tsam gyis rang nyid nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung gis rtsa sbubs log rgyu byed/_/bad kan slongs par gyur nas ni/_/klad pa mgul pa'i nad song ste/_/brang dang
[\[107a.5\]]rtsib logs na bar byed/_/lud pa'i ngar sgra 'dzer mi dran/_/cham pa mi bzad yi ga 'chus/_/mi bzad shugs ni skyed byed cing /_/dbugs mi bde ba de'i shugs kyis/_/srog la gnod 'gyur lud pa'i mthar/_/skad cig bde bar byed pa yin/_/nyal tshe shin tu
[\[107a.6\]]mi bde la/_/'dug na cung zad bde bar 'gyur/_/mig gdangs dpral ba'i phyogs nas ni/_/rngul 'dzag shin tu na bas nyen/_/kha skam dbugs ni bstud mar 'byung /_/dro ba 'dod cing 'dar dang bcas/_/char 'bab grang dang ser bus phog_/bad kan skyed
[\[107a.7\]]pas rnam par 'phel/_/mun can de ni 'tsho bya tsam/_/nyams ldan gsar du btab gso bla/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gis mi mthun pa rgyu zhing rtsa'i sbubs su log par rgyu bar byed/_des bad kan slongs shing stod du bskyod par 'gyur ba dang /_klad pa dang
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]mgul ba'i nang du song zhing kun tu khyab ste/_brang dang rtsib logs na zhing gzer bar byed nas lud pa la sogs pa'i shugs mi bzad pa skyed par byed do/_/dbugs mi bde ba yang shugs mi bzad pas srog la gnod cing 'tshe bar byed de/_gang gi srog ces bya ba'i
[\[107b.2\]]rlung la gnod cing gzer bar byed pa de ni srog la gnod pa'i dbugs mi bde ba zhes bya'o/_/yang na srog ni 'tsho ba'i dbang po'am stobs la bya la/_de dbugs mi bde ba'i shugs kyis gnod par byas pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/lud pa'i mtha' ni bad
[\[107b.3\]]kan dang /_snabs la sogs pa 'dor ba'i mthar skad cig gam thang cig tsam gyi bar du bde bar gnas par byed pa yin no/_/yang de ni mal na gnas shing nyal ba'i tshe shin tu mi bde zhing sdug bsngal bas dbugs 'byin par byed pa yin la/_de nas langs te tsog tsog
[\[107b.4\]]po la sogs pa'i tshul du 'dug na cung zad bde zhing shugs ngal ba yin no/_/mig gdangs pa ni gyen du blta ba'o/_/dpral ba'i phyogs nas rngul 'dzag pa ni rngul 'byung zhing dri ma rlan can du 'dzag pa'o/_/shin tu na bas nyen pas ni brnag par dka' ba'i nad
[\[107b.5\]]kyis nyam thag par 'gyur ro/_/kha skam pa ni khyad par du kha skam zhing rlan med pa'o/_/yang de bzhin du dbugs bstud mar 'byung zhing yang yang du rtseg mar 'gyur ba dang /_dro ba'i bag yid la 'dod cing bsten par dga' ba dang lus 'dar ba dang bcas pa yin
[\[107b.6\]]no/_/yang dbugs mi bde ba de ni char mi 'bab pa la sogs pa bad kan skyed pa'i kha zas dang spyod lam gyis rnam par 'phel zhing dkyel skye bar 'gyur ro/_/mun pa can gyi dbugs mi bde ba de ni gso bar bya ba tsam yin la/_de nyams stobs dang ldan pa'i skyes bu
[\[107b.7\]]de la gsar du btab pa yin na ni gso bla ba yin no/_/rims dang brgyal las byung grang ba'i/_/sman gyis zhi ste rab mun can/_/zhes bya ba la/_dbugs mi bde ba mun pa can zhes bya ba de nyid gang gi tshe rims dang brgyal ba las byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe grang zhing bsil
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]ba'i sman dang kha zas kyis de zhi zhing bsal bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_de la rab tu mun pa can zhes bya'o/_/dbugs chad dbugs 'byin rgyun chad pa'i/_/gnad gcod nad kyis gzir bar byed/_/rngul bcas brgyal dang sbos dang bcas/_/lgang
[\[108a.2\]]pa tsha zhing gcin 'gags byed/_/mig mi sdug cing thur du blta/_/mig gcig dmar zhing dran pa stor/_/kha skam smre zhing skad gdangs dma'/_/gzi mdangs nyams shing sems bral ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_dbugs rgyun chad pa zhes bya ba ni/_dbugs
[\[108a.3\]]rgyun chad pa'i tshul gyis 'byin par byed kyi/_bar mi chad par mi byed par mi 'byin zhing rngub pa ma yin pa ba dang /_gnad gcod pa'i tshul gyis gzir zhing nyam thag par byed pa dang /_rngul dang bcas par brgyal zhing de gnyis dang ldan pa dang /_stod smad du rlung
[\[108a.4\]]rgyu ba 'gags pas sbos pa dang bcas pa dang /_lgang pa tsha zhing chu so'i phyogs lhag par tsha ba dang /_gcin 'gags par byed pa dang /_mig mi sdug cing gcig tu song na mi gnas par gyur par byed pa dang /_thur du blta zhing sa la rtogs pa dang /_mig
[\[108a.5\]]gcig dmar bar snang ba dang /_dran pa stor zhing sems shas cher mi gsal ba dang /_kha skam pa dang /_smre sngags kyi tshig tu smra ba dang /_skad gdangs dma' zhing zhum pa dang /_mdog dang gzi mdangs nyams shing yal ba dang /_sems dang bral zhing
[\[108a.6\]]dran pa med pa yin no/_/chen po nga ro cher 'byung zhing /_/sgra cha sdur pa drag pa dang /_/bskyod pa bzhin du 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/khyu mchog rgyags pa'i nga ro 'dra/_/shes dang rnam shes rab nyams shing /_/mig 'khrul bzhin ni gyur pa dang /_/ro stod zhum par
[\[108a.7\]]'gyur ba dang /_/bshang gci 'gags shing skad gdangs nyams/_/mgul skam yang dang yang me smra/_/rna ba mur 'gram klad pa na/_/zhes bya ba la/_dbugs mi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba dbugs rgyu ba chen po 'byung zhing nga ro chen po dang ldan pas dbugs 'byung bar
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]'gyur zhing sgregs pa rab tu che ba dang /_sdur pa drag po sna nas 'byin par byed pa dang /_bskyod cing 'gul ba bzhin du rngam pa drag par 'gyur zhing dbugs mi rtsom pa'i shugs g.yo ba dang bcas pa las byung ste/_khyu mchog rgyags pa lta bu'i dbugs rgyun tu
[\[108b.2\]]'byung ba dang /_shes pa dang rnam par shes pa'i khyad par gang dag yod pa rab tu nyams par 'gyur/_shes pa ni khong du chud pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni khyad par gyi shes pa ste/_de dag kyang nyams pa'o/_/gzhan yang mig 'khrul ba dang /_
[\[108b.3\]]rang bzhin yongs su gyur cing mi sdug pa dang ldan pa dang /_ro stod zhum zhing rnam par 'gyur ba dang ldan pas dbugs 'byin pa dang /_de bzhin du bshang ba dang gci ba 'gags shing sri ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gyen 'byung dbugs ni
[\[108b.4\]]ring du 'byin/_/slar ni thur du rngub mi nus/_/bad kan gyis kha rtsa sgo 'gags/_/rlung ni 'khrugs pas gzir 'gyur ba/_/gyen du blta zhing 'khrul byed pas/_/mig ni kun tu lta byed pa/_/gnad rnams chad par byed bzhin du/_/skad 'gags smre sngags
[\[108b.5\]]'don par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_gyen du 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dbugs mi bde ba las/_dbugs ring ba gyen du ring du 'byin zhing gtong la/_dbugs de phyung nas slar thur du rngub cing sdud par mi nus te/_yang nang du sdud par mi nus zhes bya ba'i don no/_/
[\[108b.6\]]yang de'i rnam pa ni bad kan gyis kha dang rtsa'i sgo rnams 'gags shing bar mchod par byas pas rlung gi nad 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur bas gzir zhing shas cher gnod par byas pa dang /_mig gyen du blta zhing 'degs par byed la/_'khrul zhing nor bar
[\[108b.7\]]byas pas phan tshun kun tu lta zhing rtogs par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du gnad rnams chad par 'gyur ba bzhin du sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa'i smre sngags skad gsang 'gags shing nang du 'dus par gyur pa'i tshul gyis smre sngags 'don par byed do/_/'di dag ma tshang
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]gsor rung la/_/tshang na nges par srog 'phrog byed/_/ces bya ba la/_dbugs mi bde ba 'di dag thams cad kyang mtshan nyid 'di dag ma rdzogs na gsor rung zhing bcos su 'dod pa yin la/_gal te 'di dag rang rang gi mtshan nyid rdzogs
[\[109a.2\]]shing tshang ba yin na ni nges par gdon mi za bar srog 'phrog cing 'tsho ba gcod par 'gyur ba yin no/_/dbugs mi bde rgyu sngon tshul dang /_/grangs dang rang bzhin rten gcig yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la skyigs bu'i nad ni dbugs mi bde ba dang /_rgyu la sogs
[\[109a.3\]]pa'i nad gcig yin te/_'dir gcig ces bya ba ni mtshungs pa'i ming gi rnam grangs te/_des na skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba ni rgyu la sogs pa tshul 'dra bar gyur pa yin no/_/de yang lud pa'i rgyu ni lud pa 'phel ba'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/
[\[109a.4\]]sngar 'byung ba'i tshul ni snying rtsib logs zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/de ltar na de dag thams cad tshul gcig cing 'dra ba yin pas zhes bya ba'o/_/skyigs bu zas byung phran tshegs dang /_/zung dang chen por 'byung ba dang /_/za ba dag dang rnam pa lnga/_/zhes
[\[109a.5\]]bya ba la/_skyigs bu zas las byung ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas ming rnam pa lnga yin no/_/de la rlung gis ring zos dang /_/rtsub tsha sra dang ma goms pa'i/_/zas dang skom gyis btsir gyur pa'i/_/rlung gis skyigs bu nad med dang /_/sgra mi drag cing sbrid 'byung ste/_/
[\[109a.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_de la skyigs bu ni rlung gis bskyed par 'gyur la/_de yang kha zas ring bag tu zos pa dang /_de bzhin du rtsub pa dang /_tsha ba dang sra ba'i bag zas zos pa dang /_sngon chad ma goms shing ma bsten pa'i zas skom zos shing 'thungs pas btsir zhing
[\[109a.7\]]bsdams par gyur pa'i rlung gis skyigs bu'i rnam pa nad med cing sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba med pa sgra mi drag pa'i rjes la sbrid pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i skyigs bus 'debs par 'gyur te/_de ni zas las byung ba zhes bya'o/_/gang zhig goms pa'i zas skom
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]gyis/_/zhi 'gyur skyigs bu zas byung yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang skyigs bu gang sngar goms shing bsten pa'i zas dang skom gang yang rung ba btang bas zhi zhing chad par 'gyur ba'i skyigs bu de ni zas las byung zhes bya'o/_/drag shul gyis rlung cung zad bskyod/_/skyigs
[\[109b.2\]]bu phra mo 'byung bar 'gyur/_/nam tshong rtsa nas 'byung byed cing /_/de ni shugs dal 'jam pa yin/_/rtsol ba drag po 'phel 'gyur la/_/zas zos tsam gyis dal bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_drag shul gyi rtsol bas rlung cung zad cig bskyod de skyigs bu phra mo 'byung
[\[109b.3\]]bar 'gyur la/_de yang nam tshong gi rtsa ba nas 'byung zhing ldang bar 'gyur la/_de ltar chung ngu bskyod pa las phran tshegs 'byung ba'i phyir skyigs bu de'i shugs dal zhing tshabs chung la dal zhing shas cher na bar mi byed pa yin no/_/de yang rtsol ba drag po'i shugs
[\[109b.4\]]bsten pas ni 'phel bar 'gyur la/_kha zas gang yang rung ba zos pa tsam gyis ni de'i mod kho na la rgyu ba dal zhing shugs bul bar 'gyur ro/_/zung 'byung tshigs ni ring ba la/_/gang zhig zas las 'byung 'gyur ba/_/'ju bar nye ba'i tshe na 'debs/_/zas
[\[109b.5\]]zhu zin nas 'phel 'gyur ba'o/_/mgo dang mgul pa 'dar byed cing /_/sbo dang shin tu skom dad skyed/_/bla dang slon dang tshad par 'khru/_/mig gdangs gla la ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/skyigs bu zung 'byung shugs drag pa/_/gzhung dang bcas par de shes bya/_/zhes
[\[109b.6\]]bya ba la/_skyigs bu zung du 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni/_tshigs ring pos chod pa gang shugs gnyis gnyis bstud mar 'byung ba yin la/_de yang kha zas 'ju ba dang nye zhing smin pa la phyogs pa'i tshe 'byung bar 'gyur la/_zas zhu zin nas ni 'phel bar 'gyur ba
[\[109b.7\]]yin no/_/gzhan yang skyigs bus btab pa'i skyes bu'i mgo dang mgul pa 'dar zhing skyod par byed pa dang /_lto spo ba dang /_skom dad shin tu skye zhing skom gyis gdungs pa dang /_glal ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur la/_skyigs bu zung du byung ba zhes bya ba
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]de ni shugs drag pa dang zhu ba'i tshe na 'byung bas na zhu ba dang bcas pa zhes bya bar nges so/_/skyigs bu chen po 'byung ba'i tshul/_/smin ma mur 'gram gnyis rengs shing /_/mig nas mchi 'dzag har bar blta/_/lus rengs tshig ni thogs
[\[110a.2\]]byed cing /_/dran dang 'du shes 'khrul bar byed/_/med pa'am sbubs ni 'gags byed cing /_/gnad kyi tshogs ni skyod par byed/_/rgyab sgu lus ni khong skem byed/_/rtsa ba che zhing sgra che la/_/nad tshabs che zhing stobs cher 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_skyigs bu chen po zhes
[\[110a.3\]]bya ba 'byung ba'i tshul ni smin ma dang mur 'gram gnyis rengs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_smin ma gnyis dang mur 'gram gnyis na zhing bskyod mi shes pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_lus rengs shing bskyod mi shes par byed pa dang /_
[\[110a.4\]]de bzhin du tshig thogs shing lkugs par byed pa dang /_dran pa dang 'du shes te dngos po ma brjed pa dang /_sems 'khrugs shing nyams par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du zas rgyu ba'i lam med par 'gags pa dang /_snying la sogs pa'i gnad kyi tshogs
[\[110a.5\]]bskyod cing g.yo bar byed pa dang /_rgyab sgu zhing 'khyog pa dang /_lus kyi khong skem par byed pa yin la/_de ni rtsa ba che zhing rgyun ring ba dang /_sgra cher 'byung ba dang /_nad tshabs che zhing shugs drag pa dang /_stobs dang nus pa chen por 'byung ba yin
[\[110a.6\]]pas na de ni chen po zhes bya'o/_/zhu ba'i gnas sam lte 'og nas/_/snga ma 'dra bar gang zhig 'byung /_/de 'dra'i tshul ni bstud mar 'byung /_/glal dang rkang lag bya rmyang byed/_/brag ca zab 'byung zab mo'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyigs bu zab mo zhes bya ba ni zhu
[\[110a.7\]]ba'i gnas mkhris pa'i gnas sam/_lte ba'i 'og nas 'byung bar byed la/_de yang 'byung zhing rgyu ba'i tshul ni skyigs bu chen po'i mtshan nyid ji skad bshad pa dang tshul 'dra bar 'byung zhing /_smin ma mur 'gram gnyis rengs shing /_/rgyab sgu las ni khong skem byed/_/
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]ces bya ba'i bar gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur la/_de las kyang khyad par du de bstud mar 'byung zhing glal ba dang /_bya rmyang byed cing rkang lag skyod par byed pa dang /_brag ca'i sgra zab tu 'byung bar byed pas na 'di'i ming ni zab mo zhes bya'o/_/de rnams las ni dang po
[\[110b.2\]]yi/_/gnyis po gso bar bya ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyigs bu lnga po de rnams las zas las byung ba dang /_phran tshegs zhes bya ba'i skyigs bu gnyis ni gso sla ba yin pas gso bar bya la/_tha ma gnyis dang zung 'byung ba/_/mtshan nyid kun rdzogs shugs drag
[\[110b.3\]]spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_tha ma'i skyigs bu gnyis po dang /_skyigs bu chen po dang /_skyigs bu zab mo bya ba gnyis ni spang bar bya la/_de bzhin du zung du 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i skyigs bu rang gi mtshan nyid dam rtags kun rdzogs shing ma lus pa dang ldan la/_shugs
[\[110b.4\]]drag pa ni spang bar bya ste gsor mi rung ngo /_/'di dag thams cad yun ring bsags/_/rgan po bud med kyis dub dang /_/nad kyis nyam chung zas bcad pa/_/glo rdol nad can spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyigs bu 'di dag thams cad yun ring du bsags shing rgyun
[\[110b.5\]]ring po gnas pa dang /_mi rgan po dang /_bud med la nyal po drags pas dub pa dang /_nad kyis lus kyi nyams dmad cing stobs zad pa dang /_de bzhin du zas bcad cing smyung ba byas pa dang /_glo rdol ba'i nad dang ldan pa la skyigs bus btab pa spang bar bya ste
[\[110b.6\]]gsor mi rung ngo /_/nad kun gyis 'chi byed mod kyi/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba ltar/_/nad gzhan myur du gsod mi byed/_/'di dag 'chi tshe nges 'byung 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa de lta bu dag ni skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/_rims la
[\[110b.7\]]sogs pa nad thams cad kyis kyang 'chi bar byed mod kyi/_nad de dag las 'di gnyis kyi khyad par ni 'di yin te/_skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba gnyis kyis myur du gsod par byed pa de ltar nad kyi dngos po gzhan gyis myur du gsod cing 'chi bar mi byed de/_gang gi phyir
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]'di gnyis ni 'chi zhing srog dang bral ba'i tshe nges par gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/tshig 'di dag gis ni de gnyis myur du gso dgos par bstan pa yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig
[\[111a.2\]]gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas glo gcong chen po zad byed kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_lud pa btang
[\[111a.3\]]snyoms su bzhag cing ma bcos na dbugs mi bde ba dang zad byed 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas na/_de'i phyir de'i 'og tu 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/glo gcong chen po zad byed ces bya ba ni ming gi rnam grangs so/_/nad ni du ma rjes 'brang zhing /_/nad mang
[\[111a.4\]]sngon du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po zad byed skem byed dang /_/nad kyi rgyal po zhes kyang bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_zad byed kyi rjes su nad du ma mang po zhig 'brang zhing rgyu bar byed la/_de bzhin du nad mang po sngon du 'gro zhing thog mar rgyu bas nad de ni nad kyi rgyal po zhes
[\[111a.5\]]bya zhing ming gi rnam grangs bzhi po gnod pa'i rgyal po dang /_zad byed dang /_skem byed dang /_nad kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar bshad pa yin no/_/rgyu skar rnams dang bram ze yi/_/rgyal po'i gcong du sngon gyur cing /_/gang yang nad kyi rgyal por 'gyur/_/de phyir gnod pa'i
[\[111a.6\]]rgyal por bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_snar ma la sogs pa'i rgyu skar rnams dang /_bram ze rnams kyi rgyal po ni zla ba yin la/_de yang sngon bskal pa dang po'i tshe/_zla ba snar ma la mchog tu chags pas gcong chen po'i nad byung bar gyur la/_de bas na nad 'di la nad
[\[111a.7\]]kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/des ni rgyal po'i nad yin pas nad kyi rgyal po zhes drug pa'i mtshams sbyar bas bsgrub pa'am/_yang na zad byed kyi nad kyang yin la/_rgyal po yang yin pas nad kyi rgyal po ste/_nad rnams kyi nang na gnas shing rims la sogs pa'i nad
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]du mas yongs su bskor la/_bshad ma thag pa'i tshul du nad du ma rjes su 'brang zhing /_nad mang po sngon du 'gro bas gcong chen po la gnod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o zhes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bshad pa yin no/_/lus dang sman ni zad byed
[\[111b.2\]]cing /_/zad las 'byung bas zad byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus dang sman gyi dngos po gnyis zad pa ni med par byed pa ste/_de bas na lus dang sman zad par byed pa'i nad 'di la zad byed ces bya ste/_gang gi phyir nad 'di skyes par gyur na/_lus zad cing
[\[111b.3\]]'ju bar 'gyur ba dang /_sman mang po yang zad cing gtugs par byed pas na/_nad 'di la zad byed ces bya'o/_/yang na zad pa las byung bas na zad byed de/_lus zungs rnams zad pa'i rgyu las byung bas na ming zad byed ces bya ba'o/_/dwangs sogs skems pas
[\[111b.4\]]skem byed yin/_/de rnams de las gsal bas rgyal/_/zhes bya ba la/_dwangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs bdun po skem zhing rengs par byed pas na/_de la skem byed ces bya'o/_/yang nad de rnams kyi nang na rags shing gsal la nus pa che bas na
[\[111b.5\]]nad kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/drag shul bsten dang shugs bkag dang /_/khu chu dwangs ma snum zad dang /_/zas skom cho ga dang bral bsten/_/bzhi po 'di dag de yi rgyu/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen po'i rgyu ni ma lcogs bzhin du drag shul gyi las byed pa la
[\[111b.6\]]sogs pa bsten drags pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la drag shul gyi stobs 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i las nyams kyis lcogs par dka' ba bsten zhing /_lus dang ngag dang yid la gnod par 'gyur ba'i rtsol ba drag po byed pa'o/_/shugs bkag pa ni ngo tsha
[\[111b.7\]]la sogs pa'i rgyus bshang ba dang gci ba dang 'phyen la sogs pa bkag cing bsdams pa'o/_/khu chu la sogs pa zad pa ni rang gi rgyu las byung ba zad cing dengs par byed pa'o/_/zas dang skom gnyis kyi cho ga dang bral bar bsten pa ni sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos dang mi
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]mthun par bsten zhing /_de'i cho ga dang mi mthun par byas nas mi 'phrod pa za ba'o/_/de yis rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_/bad kan bslangs nas thams cad du/_/lus kyi tshigs kun la zhugs te/_/de yis rtsa sgo la gnod cing /_/bu
[\[112a.2\]]ga'i sgo ni bkag pa'am/_/yang na shin tu kha bye 'gyur/_/stod smad thad kar gnas nas ni/_/rang gi nad ni ji bzhin skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_drag shul la sogs pa de dag gis rlung bslang zhing 'khrugs par byas pas na/_rgyas shing 'phel bar byas pa
[\[112a.3\]]dang /_mkhris pa bslangs nas rang gi gnas las gyen du 'pho zhing rgyas par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du bad kan bslangs nas stod smad dang rtsib logs la sogs pa thams cad du khyab cing lus kyi tshigs kun gyi nang du zhugs te/_tshigs dag la gnod
[\[112a.4\]]cing rab tu na bar byed pa dang /_yang de bzhin du des lus thams cad khyab pa'i rtsa sgo la yang gnod cing bcom pa dang /_de bzhin du bu ga rnams kyi 'byung zhing rgyu ba'i sgo bkag nas gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/_yang lan 'ga' rtsa'i sgo'am/_kha bye zhing
[\[112a.5\]]rgyas par byas nas lan 'ga' ni stod du 'gro/_/lan 'ga' ni ro smad dam rtsib logs su thad kar song nas rang rang gi nad ji lta ba bzhin du bskyod de stod du rgyu na ni ro stod kyi nad skyed par byed la/_smad du rgyu na ni ro smad kyi nad skyed par byed/_thad kar 'gro na
[\[112a.6\]]ni rtsib logs kyi nad skyed par byed do/_/de 'byung 'gyur ba'i sngon tshul ni/_/cham 'debs sbrid pa shin tu mang /_/mchil ma kha nas ro mngar bro/_/lus dang me drod nyam chung byed/_/gzhong snod zas skom la sogs ni/_/gtsang yang mi gtsang nyid du mthong /_/phal
[\[112a.7\]]cher zas dang skom stsogs la/_/sbrang ma rtsa dang skra sogs 'bab/_/snying 'phar slon bro yi ga 'chus/_/kha zas zos kyang nyams stobs zad/_/lag par lta zhing rkang gdong skrang /_/mig ni shin tu dkar por snang /_/lag ngar dag ni 'jal bar 'dod/_/lus la
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]'jigs su rung bar mthong /_/bud med chang dang sha la dga'/_/smod dang klad pa 'gebs par byed/_/skra dang sen mo shin tu 'phel/_/rmi lam du ni phye ma leb/_/rtsangs pa sdig sbrul gcan gzan spre'u/_/bya rnams kyis ni gtses par mthong /_/skra rus phub ma thal sogs
[\[112b.2\]]kyi/_/phung po la ni 'dzeg pa dang /_/yul dang grong ni stong pa dang /_/chu klung skam par rmi lam mthong /_/skar mda' ri bo ltung ba dang /_/ljon shing rnams ni 'bar ba rmi/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen po zhes bya ba'i nad de 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_skye bzhin
[\[112b.3\]]pa'i tshul sngar byung ba'i rtags ni cham pa la sogs pa yin te/_cham pa ni sna nas 'dzag pa'i nad des 'debs so/_/sbrid pa shin tu mang ba ni sbrid pa drag tu 'byung zhing mang ba'o/_/mchil ma mang ba ni bad kan gyi ljan ljin kha nas mang du 'ong pa'o/_/kha'i nang
[\[112b.4\]]ro mngar bar bro ba ni mngar ba nyid yin no/_/lus dang me drod nyam chung ba ni lus khong rmya zhing zhum pa dang /_zas 'ju bar byed mi nus pa'o/_gzhong pa dang snod phra mo la sogs pa gtsang ba yang mi gtsang ba nyid du mthong ba ni de'i tshe log pa'i shes pa skye zhing
[\[112b.5\]]'khrul ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/yang phal cher zas skom la sogs par sbrang ma la sogs pa ltung zhing 'bab par 'gyur ba dang /_snying 'phar zhing rgal pa la sogs pa dang /_lag pa gnyis la yang dang yang du lta zhing rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[112b.6\]]rgyu med par rkang pa dang gdong skrang bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du mig gnyis shin tu dkar zhing skya bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du lag ngar gnyis 'jal bar 'dod cing nga'i lag ngar tshad ji tsam du song zhes shes par 'dod cing 'jal ba dang /_rang
[\[112b.7\]]gi lus mdzes shing skyon med la 'jigs pa'i bag med par gyur pa la yang mi sdug cing 'jigs su rung bar mthong ba'i log pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_bud med dang chang dang sha la dga' zhing mngon par 'dod pa bskyed pa dang /_yang de dag
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]nyid la smod par yang byed pa dang /_klad pa ste spyi bo gos kyis 'gebs par byed pa dang /_skra dang sen mo rnams shin tu 'phel zhing ring bar 'gyur ba dang /_rmi lam gyi nang du phye ma leb la sogs pas gtses shing mnan par mthong ba dang /_
[\[113a.2\]]de bzhin du skra la sogs pa'i phung po la 'dzeg par rmi ba dang /_yul dang grong stong zhing skye bo mi gnas pa rmi lam du mthong ba dang /_chu rnams skams shing grog po stong pa rmi lam du mthong ba dang /_skar mda' ltung ba dang /_ri bo ltung zhing bsnyil ba rmi ba dang /_ljon
[\[113a.3\]]shing bzang ba rnams las skyes pa de dag 'bar zhing me'i phung por 'gyur ba rmi ba ste/_mtshan ma de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/stod du gnas na cham pas 'debs/_/lud pa lu zhing dbugs mi bde/_/phrag pa spyi bo na ba dang /_/skad 'gags yi ga 'chus par
[\[113a.4\]]'gyur/_/smad gnas bshang sla rtug skam byed/_/nang grol nang gnas slon par byed/_/thad kar gnas pas rtsib logs zug_/tshigs la gnas na rims su 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen po'i nad ro stod du gnas na cham pas 'debs pa la sogs
[\[113a.5\]]pa nad bdun skyed par 'gyur ro/_/nad de ro smad du song bas ni bshang ba sla ba'am rtug skam du 'gyur te/_rtug pa sla ba ni zhig cing 'khru bar 'gyur ba'o/_/skam pa ni sra zhing 'gags te 'khren par 'gyur ba ste/_de las lan 'ga' ni sla bar 'gyur la/_
[\[113a.6\]]lan 'ga' ni ska bar 'gyur gyi/_de gnyis cha mnyam par mi 'gyur ro/_/nad de nang grol gyi nang na gnas pa ni slon zhing 'dor bar byed do/_/thad kar gnas pa'i nad kyis ni rtsib logs su zug cing na bar 'gyur ro/_/nad de ni tshigs la gnas pas ni rims
[\[113a.7\]]skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar nad tshul bcu gcig ni/_/gcong chen ldan las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen po'i nad de dang ldan pa la cham pa la sogs pa nad bcu gcig pa 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la rtsa sbubs rnams bkag pa
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]las ni skams par 'gyur ba yin la/_de rnams kha bye ba las ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/des na grangs kyis 'di gnyis gang yang rung ba gcig gis bzung gi/_gnyi ga dus gcig tu 'byung ba ni mi srid do/_/de rnams kyi grangs ni cham pa dang /_lud pa dang /_
[\[113b.2\]]dbugs mi bde ba dang /_phrag pa na ba dang /_spyi bo na ba dang /_skad 'gags pa dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_bshang bsla ba dang /_rtug pa skam pa dang /_slon pa dang /_rtsib logs zug pa dang /_rims te bcu gcig po 'di dag ni zad byed kyi
[\[113b.3\]]nad yin no/_/de rnams kyi ni bla brnan dag_/skad 'gags brang du na ba dang /_/kha glal lus grugs mchil snabs mang /_/drod nyams kha mnam yin zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_cham pa la sogs pa de rnams kyi bla brnan ni skad 'gags pa la sogs pa
[\[113b.4\]]bdun yin par shes par bya/_nad snga na gnas pa'i steng du nad phyi ma byung nas sdug bsngal dang rjes su 'brel par byed pa ni bla brnan zhes bya'o/_/de la rlung gyur klad pa dang /_/rtsib logs zug sha yan lag na/_/skad 'gags mgul pa subs par 'gyur/_/
[\[113b.5\]]zhes bya ba la/_de la rlung gi shas che ba las gyur pa'i gcong chen po ni/_klad pa na ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mkhris rgyas rkang lag phrag pa tsha/_/tshad 'khru khrag tu slon pa dang /_/kha mnam rims 'debs myos par 'gyur/_/zhes bya
[\[113b.6\]]ba la/_de la mkhris pa shas che ba las byung ba'i gcong chen po ni/_rkang pa dang lag pa dang /_phrag pa tsha ba la sogs pa'i nad kyi mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan las gyur yi ga 'chus/_/slon lud lus dang yan lag lci/_/mchil snabs mang
[\[113b.7\]]zhing cham pas 'debs/_/dbugs mi bde skad 'gags drod nyams/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan rgyas pa las gyur ba'i gcong chen po'i nad ni yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nad kyis me drod nyam chung bas/_/'byar bcas bad kan rgyas gyur
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]nas/_/rtsa spubs sgo ni 'gags pa dang /_/lus zungs drod ni chung gyur pas/_/dwangs ma rang gi gnas su ni/_/ma zhu bla brnan de dang de/_/skyed cing sha sogs mi 'gyur la/_/khrag ni gyen du 'byung bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung la
[\[114a.2\]]sogs pa'i nad me drod chung zhing nus pa bri ba la sogs pa'i rgyus 'byar bag dang bcas pa'i bad kan rgyas par 'gyur la/_rtsa sbubs kyi sgo rnams 'gags shing bkag par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du lus zungs kyi drod nyam chung bar gyur pas dwangs ma rang gi
[\[114a.3\]]gnas su legs par ma zhu zhing smin par nus pa'i dwangs ma de las bla brnan skad 'gags pa dang /_brang du na ba la sogs pa rang gi rgyu las byung ba de dang de skyed cing 'byung bar 'gyur la/_des na sha la sogs pa'i lus zungs su mi 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin
[\[114a.4\]]du khrag gyen du 'byung zhing mchil ma la sogs pa dang lhan cig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/khong pa nyid du zas 'ju bas/_/dwangs mar 'gyur bar mi byed cing /_/phal cher dri ma nyid 'gyur gyi/_/lus zungs 'phel bar mi byed do/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir gcong
[\[114a.5\]]chen po'i nad 'di yod pa la/_khong pa'i drod kyis kha zas 'ju bar byed kyi/_me drod gzhan gyis dwangs ma la sogs pa'i rim pa smin par mi byed do/_/de'i phyir 'phral du dri ma bshang gci nyid du 'gyur bas zungs rnams 'phel shing rgyas par mi byed de/_dwangs ma'i
[\[114a.6\]]bcud lus kyang brtas shing tshim par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don no/_/dwangs ma khrag tu mi 'gyur na/_/shar 'gyur ba lta smos ci dgos/_/zad byed can ni bshang 'phel ba/_/'ba' zhig gis ni gnas par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_gcong chen gyi skyes bu de'i
[\[114a.7\]]lus zungs dwangs ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de yang khrag tu mi 'gyur na/_sha'i lus zungs rgyas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_zad byed dang ldan pa'i skyes bu bshang ba 'ba' zhig nye bar 'phel bas gnas par 'gyur gyi/_dwangs mas khrag la sogs pa
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]'phel bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'ba' zhig gi sgra nges par bzung ba yin no/_/mtshan ma chung yang nyam chung zhing /_/nad kyis sman gyi stobs mi bzod/_/spang bya/_ces bya ba la/_cham pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams dang /_de bzhin du snying ga dang rtsib logs gzer
[\[114b.2\]]ba la sogs pa'i nad kyi mtshan ma chung du zin kyang /_mi mnyam stobs chung zhing nad kyis sman gyi stobs bsten par mi bzod pa gang yin pa de ni spang bar bya ste gsor mi rung ngo /_/de las gzhan pa ni/_/thams cad ldan yang gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[114b.3\]]de las gzhan pa'i nad kyis nyams kyi stobs bzod cing /_nyams stobs dang ldan pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin yang gsor rung ba yin pas nad pa nyams stobs dang ldan pa ni rnam pa thams cad du gso bar bya'o/_/de yan chad du gcong chen po'i
[\[114b.4\]]nad bshad zin nas/_de nas de'i 'og tu de'i yan lag tu gyur pa skad 'gags pa la sogs pa'i nad ston pa'i phyir smras pa ni/_nad ni sna re 'dus pa dang /_/zad byed tshil las gyur pa drug_/skad 'gags kyi ni dbye ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te/_
[\[114b.5\]]nad sna re re zhes pa rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang so so las gyur pa gsum dang /_gsum car 'dus pa las gyur te bzhi pa dang /_zad byed las gyur pa dang /_tshil las gyur pa ste/_drug po de dag ni skad 'gags pa'i dbye ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/
[\[114b.6\]]de las rlung g.yo nyam chung rtsub/_/gre ba grams gang snyam byed/_/de la snum dro 'o mas phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la skad 'gags pa drug gi nang nas rlung las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa ni g.yo zhing skad 'gyur te mi brtan pa dang /_lus nyam chung zhing khong rmya ba dang /_rtsub
[\[114b.7\]]bag tu gnas pa dang /_gre ba nas kyi gra mas gang ba snyam du byed cing na ba yin la/_de la snum bag dang /_dro ba dang /_'o mas phan pa yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur rkan lkog tsha/_/skam zhing smra bar mi nus 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skad
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]'gags pa ni/_rkan dang lkog ma'i phyogs su tsha bar 'gyur ba de dag nyid skam pa dang /_smra bar mi nus shing tshig mi thon pa yin no/_/bad kan mgul pa byugs snyam byed/_/skad kyi gsang dma' ngar ngar 'dzer/_/thogs bcas
[\[115a.2\]]'gyur ro thams cad kyi/_/mtshan ma thams cad ldan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de yang sgra ngar ngar por 'don zhing 'dzer ba dang /_thogs pa dang bcas pa ste/_bar bar du 'khrul zhing brjed par 'gyur ba yin no/_/thams cad kyi zhes nad gzhi gsum po
[\[115a.3\]]thams cad las byung ba'i skad 'gags pa ni mtshan ma gsum po thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/_/zad byed las ni drud snyam byed/_/du bas bdugs ltar shin tu na/_/zhes bya ba la/_zad byed ces te gcong chen po las byung ba'i skad 'gags pa ni lkog ma
[\[115a.4\]]drud pa snyam du sems shing na ba dang /_lkog ma dang rkan gyi phyogs du bas bdugs pa ltar shin tu na ba dang smra ba na yang du bas subs te smra ba snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/_/tshil gyur bad kan bdag nyid can/_/tshig gi brda sprod mi nus 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[115a.5\]]tshil las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa ni mgul pa byugs pa snyam du byed pa la sogs pa bad kan gyi skabs su bshad pa dang mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin no/_/yang de bzhin du tshig brda sprod par mi nus shing shin tu mi gsal bar smra ba yin no/_/'dir ni 'dus
[\[115a.6\]]dang tha mar spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_'dir skad 'gags pa 'di dag gi nang nas nad gzhi thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_tshil las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o/_/yi ga 'chus pa'i nad rnams ni/_/lce snying gnas
[\[115a.7\]]pa so so dang /_/'dus pa dang ni yid kyi ni/_/gdung ba las gyur lnga pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yi ga 'chus pa'i nad ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad lce dang snying ga las gnas pa so so ste/_gsum po so so las gsum du 'gyur la/_'dus pa'i nad lce dang snying la
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]gnas pa las bzhi par 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi gdung ba mya ngan dang khro ba la sogs pa rnam pa du ma gsungs pa las yig 'chus pa lnga par 'gyur ro/_/kha ni bska dang kha mngar bro/_/rlung sogs gsum dang rim bzhin sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa
[\[115b.2\]]las yi ga 'chus pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni rim bzhin kha bska ba la sogs par 'gyur te/_rlung las gyur pas ni kha bska bar 'gyur ro/_/mkhris pa las gyur bas ni kha kha bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan las gyur pas ni kha mngar bar 'gyur ro/_/kun las
[\[115b.3\]]gyur pa ro bro med/_/ces bya ba la/_nad gzhi thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa'i yi ga 'chus pa ni ro bro ba med pa ste/_dri nga ba yod med kyi nges pa 'di ltar bro zhes bya bar brda sprod mi nus so/_/mya ngan khro sogs nad ji bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mya ngan dang
[\[115b.4\]]khro ba la sogs pa las gyur pa'i yi ga 'chus pa la ni nad ji lta ba nyid las mi 'da' ba yin te/_ro bska ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la mya ngan dang 'jigs pas gdung ba'i yid las ni rlung 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing bska ba yin no/_/
[\[115b.5\]]khro ba las gyur pas mkhris pa skyed par 'gyur ba yin pas kha ba yin no/_/'dod pas gdung ba las ni bad kan 'khrugs pas mngar ba bro ba yin no/_/slon bro nad gzhi sna re kun/_/mi sdug yul las byung lnga ba/_/zhes bya ba la/_slon bro ba ni rnam pa lnga ste/_
[\[115b.6\]]nad gzhi gsum sna re las byung ba gsum dang /_kun 'dus pa las byung ba gcig dang /_mi sdug pa'i don nam yul yid du mi 'ong ba'i yul lam don gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams las byung ba ni lnga pa yin no/_/'di dag stod du rgyu ba'i rlung /_/
[\[115b.7\]]'khrugs pas nad ni thams cad phul/_/zhes bya ba la/_yi ga 'chus pa 'di dag ni stod du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'khrugs shing rang gi tha mal pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan du gyur pa des bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad gyen du slong zhing stod du
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]phul bas nam tshong yan chad nas kha'i bar du khyab par byed pa yin no/_/de rnams ba slongs na kha tsha bro/_/mchil mang yi ga 'chus sngon byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_slon bro ba de rnams la ni nad slong zhing bslongs nas kha tsha bro ba la sogs pa sngar
[\[116a.2\]]byung ba yin pas na/_sngon byung ba ste 'di dag ni nad kyi sngar byung ba'i tshul yin no zhes bya ba'i don yin no/_/rlung gyur lte ba rgyab tu zug_/rtsib logs na zhing zas slon nas/_/cung zad 'byung zhing chad pa dang /_/ro bska lbu ba can du skyug_/sgregs pa'i sgra bcas
[\[116a.3\]]mdog gnag la/_/sla zhing 'byung dka' sgra dang bcas/_/lud pa kha skam klad snying na/_/skad 'gags pa dang khong snyom bcas/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i slon bro ba ni lte ba dang rgyab kyi phyogs na zhing zug pa dang /_rtsib logs gzer ba dang /_skyug
[\[116a.4\]]pa kha zas gyen du 'byung ba dang /_de'i 'og tu cung zad 'byung zhing bar bar du chad pa'i tshul gyis ro bska ba'i rnam pa las lbu ba can skyug par 'gyur ro/_/sgregs pa sgra dang bcas par 'byung ba dang /_kha dog gnag pa dang /_sla zhing dwangs par 'byung ba dang /_
[\[116a.5\]]'byung bar dka' zhing sgra dang bcas par 'byung ba dang /_de bzhin du lud pa la sogs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/mkhris gyur thal chu 'dra ba la/_/dud kha ljang sngon mdog ser skyug_/khrag bcas ro skyur tsha zhing dro/_/skom dad brgyal tsha gdung bcas yin/_/
[\[116a.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i slon bro ba ni thal chu dang 'dra bar 'byung zhing kha dog dud khar gnas pa'am/_du ba ltar tsha zhing dku ba'i sgregs pa dang bcas pa kha dog ljang khu dang sngon po dang ser po skyug cing khrag dang bcas par 'byung la/_ro ni skyur ba dang tsha
[\[116a.7\]]ba dang ldan zhing dro ba'i bag tu slon la skom pa la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bad kan las gyur snum pa bsil/_/nal nal por 'dug dra ba ris/_/ro mngar lan tshwa bro tshabs che/_/chags shing ba spu brtse bar byed/_/gdong skrang kha nang mngar ba bro/_/snyom zhing snying na
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]lud pa can/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i slon bro ba ni snum bag tu slon zhing skrang pa dang /_bad kan gyi rgyun nal nal por 'dzag pa dang /_skyug pa dra ba ris sam skar khung gi tshul du gnas pa dang /_ro mngar zhing lan tshwa bro ba dang /_tshabs che zhing
[\[116b.2\]]mang du 'byung ba dang /_gre bar chags shing 'byar ba dang /_ba spu pags pa brtse zhing reg mi bzod pa dang /_gdong skrang ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/gsum char las byung rtags kun ldan/_/'chi ltas las bshad gang de spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung
[\[116b.3\]]la sogs pa'i nad gzhi gsum char las byung ba ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa ste/_de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o/_/yang 'chi ltas kyi skabs su bshad pa'i slon bro ba'i nad shugs drag pa dang /_bshang gci bro ba la sogs pa de yang spang bar
[\[116b.4\]]bya ste gsor mi rung ngo /_/rul dang mi gtsang btsog pa dang /_/skyug bro mthong dang thos sogs kyis/_/yid gdungs snying la phog gyur slon/_/mi sdug yul las byung ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rul pa la sogs pa'i dngos po mthong ba dang thos pa dang mnam pa
[\[116b.5\]]dang zos pa dang reg pa dang yid la byed pa la sogs pas yid gdungs shing sems bcom par 'gyur la/_snying la phog cing gnod par gyur nas/_slon pa gang yin pa de ni mi sdug pa'i yul las byung ba zhes bya ba ste/_mngon par mi 'dod pa'i yul dang phrad
[\[116b.6\]]pa las byung ba'o/_/yid mi bde skom srin be'u snabs/_/rlung sogs nyid la gnas par brtag_/ces bya ba la/_srin bu la sogs pa bzhi pa ni rlung la sogs pa slo na bro ba gsum pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du brtag cing dpyad la shes par bya'i/_rlung la
[\[116b.7\]]sogs pa med par de rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yid mi bde ba ni sbrum ma zla gnyis lon phan chad mngal bsal nas 'byung ba la bya'o/_/gzer dang 'phar dang snying na ba/_/bye brag tu ni srin bu'i nad/_/srin bu'i snying nad mtshan ma las/_/de ni shes par bya ba
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_srin bu'i nad las skyes pa'i slon bro ba ni gzer la sogs pa'i khyad par bshad pa yin la/_de bzhin du srin bu'i nad kyi mtshan ma mig gnag pa la sogs pa las shes par bya'o/_/snying nad nad ni re re 'dus/_/srin bu las
[\[117a.2\]]gyur rnam lngar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_snying nad ni rlung mkhris pa bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_srin bu las gyur pa ste/_rnam pa lnga yod par bshad do/_/rlung gis shin tu zug cing na/_/gas dang gshags pa snyam du sems/_/bcom
[\[117a.3\]]snyam sems shing skam la rengs/_/snying ga stong snyam zag par byed/_/rgyu med zhum zhing mi dga' la/_/'jigs shing sgra ni mi bzod cing /_/'phar zhing 'gre la gcus snyam byed/_/rmongs bag dbugs thung gnyid chung 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i
[\[117a.4\]]snying nad ni snying du zug cing gzer ba dang /_btsugs pa ltar na ba dang /_de bzhin du snying gas pa snyam du sems shing na ba dang /_tshal par gshags pa snyam du sems shing na ba dang /_grugs pa snyam du sems pa dang /_khong skam par gyur pa dang /_rengs
[\[117a.5\]]shing gang ba snyam du sems pa dang /_snying ga stong zhing med pa snyam du sems pa dang /_zag cing g.yos la sems 'phyo ba dang /_rgyu med par glo bur du sems zhum zhing mi dga' ste mya ngan du byed pa dang /_'jigs shing dngangs pa dang /_sgra mi bzod cing tshig
[\[117a.6\]]thogs pa la sogs pa la 'khrul pa dang /_'phar zhing 'gul ba dang /_sa la 'gre zhing ldog pa dang /_snying gcus pa snyam du dung dung por na ba dang /_rmongs bag tu gyur cing mi dran pa dang /_dbugs thung zhing 'tshubs pa dang /_gnyid chung zhing yar ba ste mtshan
[\[117a.7\]]nyid de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/mkhris gyur skom dad mgo 'khor brgyal/_/tsha rngul snying skyur lus snyom byed/_/mkhris pa skyur ba slon par byed/_/dud pa khar song ser rims 'debs/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i snying nad la ni skom dad la
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/snying ga skyur ba dang tsha zhing sgregs par skyur ba'o/_/bad kan las gyur snying ga rengs/_/khong na rdo bcug lta bur lci/_/drod nyams mchil mang lud pa lu/_/gnyid che snyom rims yi ga 'chus/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur ba'i snying
[\[117b.2\]]nad la ni snying ga rengs shing mi 'gul bar na ba dang /_khong na rdo bcug pa ltar sems shing nang na rdo yod pa lta bur lus lci ba dang /_de bzhin du me drod nyams pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nyes gsum mtshan nyid thams cad ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[117b.3\]]rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa gsum 'dus pa las byung ba'i snying nad ni de gsum char gyi mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/srin bus mig ni gnag pa dang /_/mun par zhugs snyam byed snying 'phar/_/lus skam g.ya' zhing bad kan 'dzag_/_
[\[117b.4\]]'di ni rtag tu sog le yis/_/snying la 'drud pa lta bur sems/_/mi bzad nad des myur gsod pas/_/de ni rings par gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_srin bu las gyur pa'i snying nad ni mig gnag par gyur pa dang /_mun pa'i nang du zhugs pa ltar mun
[\[117b.5\]]'thibs zhes byed pa dang /_snying 'phar zhing brgal ba dang /_lus skam zhing sha zad pa dang /_kha nas bad kan ljan ljin 'dzag pa dang /_yang rtag tu snying la sog les 'drud cing gshags pa lta bur sems te/_srin bu snying na ba zhes bya ba'i nad mi bzad pa
[\[117b.6\]]des ni myur du gsod cing 'chi bar byed pas ring zhing myur bar gso bar bya ste/_gnad chen po snying zhes bya ba 'bus zos pa ni bsad pa chen po skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar snying nad kyi mtshan nyid bshad nas/_da skom dad kyi nad bshad par bya ste/_
[\[117b.7\]]skom dad rlung mkhris bad kan dang /_/'dus pa dwangs ma zad pa dang /_/nad 'dres pa las drug tu 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i dbye bas skom dad rnam pa drug yod do/_/nad dang 'dres pa ni rims la sogs pa nad gzhi gzhan dang 'dres pa'i rkyen
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]las skom dad du gyur pa'o/_/de ltar gyur pa thams cad la/_/rlung mkhris gnyis ni rgyu yin te/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar skom dad thams cad ldang zhing 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rnam pa gnyis te/_mkhris pa dang rlung yin par shes par bya'o/_/de 'khrugs
[\[118a.2\]]lus zungs bsil ba ni/_/skams nas ldang bar 'gyur ba yin/_/lus kun 'dar zhing mgo 'khor tsha/_/skom dad khong tsha rmongs par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung dang mkhris pa de dag ldang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba ni lus zungs bsil ba ste/_dwangs ma'am
[\[118a.3\]]bad kan skams nas ldang zhing 'byung bar 'gyur la/_rlung dang mkhris pa 'khrugs par byed pa de yang lus thams cad 'dar zhing mgo 'khor ba la sogs pa byed pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/lce drud mgul ba glo ba dang /_/skam dang skom 'thungs rgyu ba dang /_/
[\[118a.4\]]skam pas skom dad skye bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skom dad thams cad ni lce drud pa la sogs pa skam nas 'byung ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/de rnams kyi ni spyi mtshan nyid/_/kha skam skom gyis mi ngoms dang /_/zas la mi dga' skad 'gags dang /_/gre ba
[\[118a.5\]]lce mchu rtsub par 'gyur/_/lce 'byin byed cing khong snyom la/_/bla zhing sems ni myos pa dang /_/de bzhin skom gdungs nad du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skom dad de rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de thun mong gi mtshan nyid de skams pa nas skom dad du gyur pa'i bar gyis
[\[118a.6\]]bstan pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/de la skom gyis gdungs pa'i nad ni nad mi 'byung bar bya ba'i le'u las bshad pa yin no/_/lus skams rmya zhing 'on pa dang /_/rmongs bag mgo 'khor snying nad de/_/'di lta bu yi nad rnams ni/_/skom pas gdungs las skye bar
[\[118a.7\]]'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang skom dad kyis gdungs pa las lus skams pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung gyur khong rmya nyam chung la/_/mur 'gram zug cing klad pa 'khor/_/sna lces dri dang ro mi tshor/_/'on zhing gnyid med nyams stobs
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]zad/_/chu grang 'thungs na skom 'phel 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skom dad kyis gdungs pa lus skams pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung las gyur pa'i skom dad ni khong rmya ba la sogs par 'gyur te/tshig gi don ni go bar zad do/_/
[\[118b.2\]]mkhris pa kha nang ro kha brgyal/_/mngar por mthong zhing rtag par ni/_/kha skam khong tsha dbugs mnam pa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skom dad ni kha'i nang gi ro kha ba nas dbugs mnam pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/bad kan ldang bas skom rgyu'i
[\[118b.3\]]rtsa/_/bkag pas rlung ni 'khrugs gyur nas/_/de tshe de yis bad kan ni/_/'dam bzhin de yis skem par byed/_/mgul pa gra mas gang snyam sems/_/gnyid che kha nang mngar bar bro/_/lto ba mgo bo tshor ba chung /_/rmongs bag slon gyur yi ga 'chus/_/
[\[118b.4\]]lus skam kha zas mi 'ju'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan 'khrugs shing ldang bas chu rgyu bar byed pa'i rtsa sgo rnams su rlung rgyu ba bkag cing g.yogs pa dang /_de'i tshe rlung des bad kan de skam par byed pa ni 'dam ltar skem par byed do/_/dper na phyi'i rlung gis
[\[118b.5\]]'dam skem par byed pa bzhin du rlung gis bad kan skem par byed de/_de nas bad kan skams pas mgul pa gra mas gang ba snyam du sems shing tshal rtsub par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang gnyid che zhing kha'i nang mngar bar bro bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
[\[118b.6\]]rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun las gyur pa rtags kun ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi gsum char gyis bskyed pa'i skom dad ni 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/be'u snabs las gyur kha zas ni/_/mid dka' rlung mkhris
[\[118b.7\]]las gyur yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_be'u snabs las gyur pa'i skom dad ni kha zas mid par dka' zhing thogs par 'gyur ba de las ni mkhris pa dang rlung las gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/tsha bas ngal bas 'phral du na/_/chu grang bsten gyur skom dad
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]che/_/khong par tsha ba bsdus pa yin/_/skom dad de ni mkhris skyes yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu tsha bas ngal zhing dub par gyur la/_de 'phral du de'i mod la chu grang bsten zhing khrus la sogs pa byas pas/_phyi rol gyi tsha ba khong pa'i nang du
[\[119a.2\]]bsdus te/_de'i dbang gis skom dad skyes pa gang yin pa de ni mkhris pa las skyes pa 'byung ba yin no/_/gang yang chang drags me drod rno/_/snum zos skyes pa'ang mkhris 'byung yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang skom dad gang chang mang du 'thungs shing drags pa las
[\[119a.3\]]gyur pa de yang mkhris pa las gyur pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o/_/yang de bzhin du me drod rno zhing shas che ba las snum zos pa las byung ba'i skom dad de yang mkhris pa las byung bar shes par bya'o/_/snum zhing skyur dang lan tshwa'i bag_/zos pas bad kan
[\[119a.4\]]las skyes 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha zas snum bag la sogs pa zos pa las skom dad skyes pa ni bad kan las byung ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/zad byed las ni skom dad 'gyur/_/dwangs ma zad dang mtshan nyid 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_zad byed las skom dad du
[\[119a.5\]]gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dwangs ma zad pa'i mtshan nyid de/_dwangs ma zad nas rtsub la skem/_/nyam chung sgra ni zhes bya ba smos pa yin pas 'di nyid las shes par bya'o/_/khong skam gcin nad rims nad sogs/_/yun ring nad ni rims skom nad/_/gang zhig skom dad mi
[\[119a.6\]]bzad skyes/_/de ni 'dres las byung bar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_khong skam pa la sogs pa dang 'dres pa dang skom dad gang mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba skyes pa de ni 'dres pa las byung ba'i mtshan nyid can yin par drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/yan lag
[\[119a.7\]]brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas chang nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa ldang zhing 'khrugs pa'i gzhi gcig pa dang /_nyes pa gsum las byung bar tshul mthun pas gcong chen po'i 'og tu 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/chang gi nad du gyur pas na chang gi nad dam/_chang las myos pa la sogs pa'i
[\[119b.2\]]nyes par gyur pas na chang nad de/_myos pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i nad ces bya ba'i don no/_/de yang myos pa ni sems dang lus zungs 'gyur bar byed pa yin la/_de yang chang la sogs pas myos par gyur pas na/_de'i rgyu ni chang yin par bshad do/_/rno dang drod
[\[119b.3\]]che rtsub drag skyur/_/nyal po 'dod myur byed dang yang /_/gsal dang dang bar byed par bshad/_/mdangs ni 'di las go bzlog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_chang ni rno ba la sogs pa yon tan bcu dang ldan par bshad la/_mdangs ni chang gi yon tan ji skad du bshad pa 'di
[\[119b.4\]]las go bzlog pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin te/_rngul ba dang grang ba dang snum pa dang rags pa dang mngar ba dang brtan pa dang /_yun ring por byed pa dang /_lci ba dang /_'jam pa dang /_'byar bag can yin no/_/dug kyang rno stsogs yin mod kyis/_/sems la
[\[119b.5\]]gnod par byed pa yin/_/nus pas 'chi bar byed pas na/_/dug ni lhag par mthu che'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_chang gi yon tan rno ba la sogs pa bcu po 'di dag ni chang 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi dug la'ang yod mod kyi/_de'i khyad par ni sems la lhag par gnod
[\[119b.6\]]cing 'khrul par byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi nus pa dug la yod pas na/_gang gis 'chi bar byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nus pa dug la yod pa'i phyir/_dug gi nus pa chang bas lhag par mthu che zhing nus pa lhag pa yin no/_/chang ni rno sogs yon tan gyi/_/
[\[119b.7\]]mdangs kyi yon tan rtul la sogs/_/bcu po bcu yis 'khrugs byas nas/_/sems ni sgyur bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_chang gi yon tan rno ba la sogs pa bcus mdangs kyi yon tan rtul ba la sogs pa bcu po zil gyis mnan zhing 'khrugs par byas shing
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]kun du dkrugs nas sems sgyur zhing rnam pa gzhan du gyur par byed pa yin no/_/ra ro dang po gnyis pa yis/_/bag med pa yi gnas la gnas/_/rnam rtog ngan 'joms rmongs pa rnams/_/bde ba yin snyam sems par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba
[\[120a.2\]]la/_ra ro ba'i shugs dang po dang ra ro ba'i shugs gnyis pas ni bag med pa'i gnas la gnas pa ste/_bag med pa'i nyes par spyod pa rnams 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin no/_/de nyid kyis ni rang gi rnam rtog ngan pa bcom zhing sems kyi kun du rtog
[\[120a.3\]]pas brlag par gyur pa yin la/_de nyid ni rmongs pa ste/_bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa mi byed pa ste/_de rnams ni ra ro ba'i shugs dang po dang /_gnyis pa'i skabs la gnas pas na/_de bde ba yin par shes shing shin tu bde ba kho nar 'dzin gyi/_de lta bu'i
[\[120a.4\]]bdag nyid can gyi bde ba yin par ni mi rtogs so/_/'dir bag med pa ni tshe phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las mi dge ba rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu las bya la/_de 'byung ba'i gnas la gnas pa ni ra ro ba'i shugs dang po dang gnyis pa las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don no/_/
[\[120a.5\]]'bring dang chen po bar gyi tshe/_/rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin can/_/glang chen lcags kyu med pa ltar/_/rmongs pas mi bya ci yang med/_/ces bya ba la/_'bring dang chen po ste ra ro ba'i shugs gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa'i bar mtshams su phyin pa'i skyes bu de
[\[120a.6\]]rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin du thob pas na/_mi bya ba ci yang med de mi dge ba thams cad mi bya ba ci yang med do/_/rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin can/_/smos pas ni skyes bu snying stobs can ni nam mkha' yang 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs can du mi 'gyur ro zhes ston pa
[\[120a.7\]]yin no/_/glang chen lcags kyu med pa ltar/_/zhes bya ba bstan pa ni rang dbang can du ci dgar spyod pa yin te/_dper na glang po che myos pa lcags kyu med pa dag ni mi srun pa'i spyod pa thams cad ston par byed pa dang 'dra bar ra ro ba 'bring dang chen po'i bar tshigs su
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]phyin pa ni skyes bu rmongs pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci yang mi bya ba med de thams cad byed do ces bya ba'i don no/_/'di ni kha na ma tho'i gnas/_/'di ni tshul khrims 'chal ba'i gzhi/_/zhes bya ba la/_ra ro ba 'bring dang chen po'i bar tshigs ni kha na ma tho ba ste/_smad
[\[120b.2\]]par bya ba yin pas brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sdig pa rnams kyi gnas dang gzhi ni 'di dag nyid yin no/_/yang 'di nyid ni tshul khrims 'chal zhing bslab pa nyams pa'i gnas sam gzhi yang 'di dag yin no/_/'di gcig ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i lam/_/mang po ston
[\[120b.3\]]par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ra ro ba'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par 'di nyid ni ngan song gsum du 'gro ba'i lam du ma'i rgyu yin zhing lam mang po de dag tu khrid cing ston par byed pa'i slob dpon yin no/_/ra ro gsum pa'i tshe na ni/_/sems med par ni ro ltar nyal/_/
[\[120b.4\]]zhes bya ba la/_ra ro ba'i shugs chen por phyin cing /_de la gnas pa'i tshe na ni sems med par ro ltar nyal te/_tho yor ram/_rtsig pa'am/_mi ro dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i don no/_/nyes pa'i bdag nyid shi ba las/_/shin tu ma rungs gnas skabs thob/_/ces bya ba la/_
[\[120b.5\]]nyes pa'i bdag nyid de shi ba las kyang ches thu ba'i ma rungs pa'i gnas skabs thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos dang chos min bde dang sdug_/don dang don min phan dang gnod/_/gang la chags pa mi shes pa/_/de la mkhas pas ji ltar bsten/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang
[\[120b.6\]]la chags shing mngon par zhen na chos dang chos ma yin pa la sogs pa shes shing rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i chang de la mkhas pa blo dang ldan pas ji ltar bsten par bya ste/_bsten par mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/de la chos ni sbyin pa gtong ba dang /_dkon mchog
[\[120b.7\]]mchod pa la sogs pa'o/_/chos ma yin pa ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las byed pa'o/_/bde ba ni mtho ris la sogs pa'i bde ba'o/_/sdug bsngal ni sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'o/_/don ni rgyal po'i khrims su bya ba'am/_don du bsgrub par bya'o/_/
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]don ma yin pa ni gzhung lugs 'chol ba'o/_/phan pa dang gnod pa ni bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa ste/_de dag gi bye brag mi shes pa'o/_/chang las myos 'jigs mya ngan dang /_/khro dang srog dang bral ba nas/_/smyo byed myos dang brgyal bar
[\[121a.2\]]bcas/_/brjed byed bcas pa kun song nad/_/ces bya ba la/_chang la ni myos pa la sogs pa gnas te/_de dag gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kun song nad ces bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'i nad ro dang 'dra bar byed pa ste/_ming gi rnam grangs su na ltung bar byed
[\[121a.3\]]pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/gang du dran pa nyams gcig yod/_/der ni mi dge thams cad 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_mang du smras pas ci zhig bya ste/_gang du chang gang la dran pa nyams pa gcig pu yod pa der ni/_dngos po gang dang gang dag yod pa thams cad
[\[121a.4\]]mi dge ba'i tshul thams cad 'byung zhing chos ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/mi 'phrod zas ni zos pas kyang /_/nad dam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir mi 'phrod pa'am mi rigs par sbyar ba'i zas zos pas/_zas de srog gi rten yin
[\[121a.5\]]yang nad nyid skyed par 'gyur ba 'am/_'chi bar 'gyur ba yin na chang lta smos kyang ci dgos/_chang gi sde tshan gsum blo ldan/_/ngo tsha sogs kyang 'jig par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_gang yang chang gi nyes dmigs ni shas cher bsten pas sde tshan gsum la sogs pa
[\[121a.6\]]nyams shing 'jig par byed pa yin te/_sde tshan gsum ni skyes bus btsal bar bya ba'i chos dang nor 'dod pa'o/_/blo ni shes rab bo/_nyams stobs ldan dang zas zos dang /_/zas cher za dang snum bag za/_/snying stobs lang tshor ldan pa dang /_/rtag tu chang
[\[121a.7\]]'thung de'i rigs skyes/_/tshil dang bad kan shas che la/_/rlung dang mkhris pa shas chung dang /_/me drod che zhing brtan pa rnams/_/shas cher ra ror mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan zhing nyams 'tshag bzang ba dag gis chang 'thungs na shas cher
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]ra ro bar mi 'gyur zhing de'i 'gyur bar mi skye'o/_/yang de bzhin du kha zas legs par zos zin pa'i rjes la 'thungs pa dang /_zas cher za zhing mang du zos pa dang /_snum bag dang ldan pa'i kha zas zos pa 'am/_rang bzhin gyis snying stobs che ba dang /_lang tsho dang
[\[121b.2\]]ldan zhing dar la bab pa dang /_rtag tu chang 'thungs shing goms pa dang /_de'i rigs las skyes pa ste/_chang 'thungs shing sred pa'i rigs rgyud du byung ba dang /_bad kan dang tshil gyi shas che zhing mang ba dang /_rlung ngang mkhris pa shas che zhing brtan pa ste/_de
[\[121b.3\]]thams cad kyis chang 'thungs su zin kyang ra ro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de las bzlog pa chang dad can/_/khros dang chang rtsub skyur shas che/_/ma zhur bcas dang mang 'thungs pa/_/gang yin shas cher ra ror 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar ji skad bstan pa las go
[\[121b.4\]]bzlog pa nyams stobs chung ba dang /_kha zas ma zos pa dang /_kha zas nyung du zos pa dang /_rtsub bag zos pa dang /_snying stobs chung ba dang /_dar la bab pa las yol ba dang /_rtag tu chang mi 'thung ba dang /_chang 'thungs pa'i rigs su ma skyes pa dang /_
[\[121b.5\]]tshil dang bad kan zad pa dang /_/rlung dang mkhris pa shas che ba dang /_khong pa'i me drod chung zhing mi brtan pa dag gis chang 'thungs na shas cher ra ro bar 'gyur/_yang de bzhin du chang dad can te chang la sred cing yid rton pa dang khros shing 'khrugs pa dang /_chang skyur
[\[121b.6\]]zhing rtsub pa shas che ba dang /_de bzhin du chang ma zhu ba ste/_snga de zhag 'thungs pa'i chang ma zhu ba'i rjes la 'thungs pa dang /_de bzhin du shin tu mang du 'thungs pas shin tu ra ro bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung mkhris bad kan kun las byung /_/chang nad rnam pa bzhir
[\[121b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi re re dang /_kun 'dus pa las gcig ste chang nad rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/_/kun kyang kun las skyes mod kyi/_/shas che ba las ming du btags/_/zhes bya ba la/_chang nad kun kyang nyes pa gsum char
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]las byung mod/_'on kyang nad gzhi gang dang gang shas che ba de dang de las phye ste ming du btags pa yin no/_/de rnams kyi ni spyi mtshan nyid/_/rmongs dang snying ni na ba dang /_/'khru zhing rtag tu skom dad che/_/tsha grang rims 'debs
[\[122a.2\]]yi ga 'chus/_/mgo bo rtsib rus na dang 'dar/_/gnad 'jig ltag pa na ba dang /_/brla rengs rab rib khyer ba dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde gnyid med/_/rngul cher 'byung zhing bshang ba 'gags/_/skrang zhing sems ni 'khrul ba dang /_/bla zhing slon par byed pa
[\[122a.3\]]dang /_/mgo 'khor rmi lam ngan mthong ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_chang nad de rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de rnam par dbye ba med par thun mong gi rtags ni 'di dag yin no/_/sems rmongs shing shin tu blun bag tu 'gyur ba dang /_snying na zhing 'phar ba dang /_
[\[122a.4\]]'khru zhing bshang ba sla ba dang /_rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par skom dad che ba dang /_rims tsha ba dang grang ba'i bag dag gis btab par 'gyur ba'am/_yang na tsha grang ste mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_mgo la sogs par na ba
[\[122a.5\]]dang /_lus 'dar zhing 'gul ba dang /_gnad rnams 'jig cing 'bye ba snyam du sems pa dang /_ltag pa'i phyogs na zhing zug pa dang /_brla rengs shing 'gyur ba mi bde ba dang /_mig rab rib khyer zhing mi gsal ba dang /_lud pa la sogs pa 'byung
[\[122a.6\]]ba dang /_sems 'khrul zhing nyams pa la sogs pa'o/_/rlung gyur khyad par gnyid mi 'ong /_/dbugs mi bde zhing klad na 'dar/_/rmi lam du ni 'phyan zhing 'phur/_/gshin po rnams dang gtam smra rmi/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i chang nad ni khyad
[\[122a.7\]]par bye brag tu gnyid mi 'ong ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du rmi lam gyi nang na 'phyan zhing yul gzhan nas gzhan du 'gro bar rmi ba dang /_nam mkha' la 'phur zhing lding bar rmi ba dang /_sngon chad shi ba'i nye du la sogs pa gshin po rnams dang lhan cig
[\[122b\]]
