[\[122b.1\]]gtam smra ba rmi bar 'gyur ro/_/mkhris las lus tsha skad 'gags dang /_/rmongs bag tshad 'khru skom mgo 'khor/_/lus mdog ljang dang ser ba dang /_/mig dang mkhur tshos dmar bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa rgyas pa las gyur pa'i chang nad ni lus
[\[122b.2\]]tsha ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/bad kan gyis slon snying na dang /_/gnyid che grang 'dar yan lag lci/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan shas che ba las gyur pa'i chang nad ni slon pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/grang 'dar ni grang lhags kyis phog pa'i lus
[\[122b.3\]]'dar ba'o/_/kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las byung ba'i chang nad ni mtshan nyid kun 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin no/_/chang spangs pa las 'phral du ni/_/mang du 'thung ngam ma goms 'thungs/_/de las 'joms dang
[\[122b.4\]]lus skam nad/_/rlung las sdug bsngal ldan pa 'byung /_/nyam chung ba la mchog tu 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_chang dang 'phrod par gyur pa las kyang de spangs te dus yun ring por lon pa las chang de nyid mod la mang du 'thungs pa'am/_yang na sngar ma goms pa'i chang
[\[122b.5\]]gzhan 'thungs par gyur na/_rgyu de las 'joms byed ces bya ba'i nad dang lus skam zhes bya ba'i chang nad gnyis po rlung la sogs pa las sdug bsngal zhing gso bar dka' ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa de gnyis ni skyes bu nyams stobs chung ba la mchog tu shas cher
[\[122b.6\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'joms pas bad kan mchil ma mang /_/lkog ma skams shing gnyid rab che/_/sgra grag mi bzod glong bag 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_chang nad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan ma bad kan dang mchil ma'i ljan ljin mang du 'byung bar
[\[122b.7\]]'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin lkog ma skam pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lud skam yan lag mgo rab na/_/snying nad mgul nad rmongs bag dang /_/lud pa skom dad slon rims 'debs/_/zhes bya ba la/_chang nad lud pa skam pa zhes bya ba byung bar gyur na/_de'i
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]mtshan ma ni yan lag dang mgo bo shas cher na zhing mi bde ba nas rims kyis 'debs pa'i bar du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig chang rnams spangs pas ni/_/dbang po thul zhing brtags te byed/_/nam yang de la lus sems kyi/_/skyon
[\[123a.2\]]rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang zhig chang spangs shing chang mi 'thung ba'i brtul zhugs blangs pa de ni dbang po thul zhing zhi la brkam shas chung ba dang /_brtags te byed pa ste bya ba rnams la blo sngon du song bas 'jug par 'gyur
[\[123a.3\]]ba dang /_de bzhin du yang skyes bu de'i lus la dus nam yang lus dang sems kyi nad kyi skyon rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_lus las byung ba'i nad rims la sogs pa dang /_sems las byung ba'i nad brjed byed la sogs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing de'i
[\[123a.4\]]gnod pas nyen par mi 'gyur ro/_/rdul dang mun pa mi 'phrod zas/_/mchog tu bsten las nad gsum 'byung /_/dwangs ma khrag dang sems rgyu ba'i/_/rtsa sbubs bkag pa las byung ba/_/myos dang brgyal dang kun song nad/_/phyi ma bzhin du stobs rab che/_/
[\[123a.5\]]zhes bya ba la/_rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin la mchog tu bsten pa dang /_kha zas mi 'phrod pa za ba la mchog tu bsten cing gnas par byed pa mi la myos pa dang brgyal ba dang /_kun du song ba zhes bya ba'i nad de rnam pa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de yang dwangs
[\[123a.6\]]ma dang khrag dang sems rgyu bar byed pa'i rtsa sbubs lus la gang dag yod pa de bkag cing chod pa las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing rgyu byed pa yin la/_yang de dag ni phyi ma bzhin du stobs dang nus pa che ba yin te/_de na myos pa bas ni brgyal ba stobs dang ldan pa yin la/_
[\[123a.7\]]de bas ni kun du song ba stobs dang ldan pa yin no/_/'dir myos nad sna re re kun/_/khrag chang dug rnams las kyang 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_'dir myos pa dang brgyal ba dang kun du song ba zhes bya ba gsum gyi nang nas myos pa ni rnam pa bdun te/_nad gzhi re re las
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]gyur pa gsum dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_khrag dang chang dang dug las gyur pa rnams so/_/de dag kyang phyi ma bzhin du stobs che ba yin no/_/rlung las gtam la chags pa dang /_/mang smra nyung smra spyod pa 'khrul/_/lus ni rtsub gnag dmar ba yi/_/myos pa rlung
[\[123b.2\]]las skyes pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i myos pa ni gtam smra ba la chags par 'gyur ba dang /_mang du smra ba la dga' ba dang /_myur du smra zhing rings par smra ba dang /_spyod pa 'khrul zhing nyams pa dang /_lus rtsub pa dang /_dmar ba'i bag tu
[\[123b.3\]]gnas pa ni rlung las skyes pa yin no/_/mkhris pa las khro dmar ba dang /_/ser por snang zhing rtsod la dga'/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i myos pa ni lus kyi mdog dmar zhing ser bar snang ba dang /_rtsod cing 'thab mo la dga' ba yin no/_/bad kan
[\[123b.4\]]tshig nyung 'brel smra skya/_/sems las che zhing le lo che/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i myos pa ni tshig nyung zhing 'brel par smra ba dang /_kha dog dkar zhing skya ba dang /_sems las che zhing le lo che ba yin no/_/'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/
[\[123b.5\]]zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i myos pa ni mtshan nyid kun dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no/_/khrag las mig dang yan lag rengs/_/mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid ldan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag las gyur pa'i myos pa ni mig ser zhing har bag tu gnas
[\[123b.6\]]pa dang /_yan lag rengs shing 'gyur mi shes pa yin no/_/gzhan yang mkhris pas myos pa'i mtshan nyid khro ba dang /_mdog dmar zhing ser ba dang rtsad pa la dga' ba yin no/_/chang gis yan lag skad spyod 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_chang las gyur pa'i myos
[\[123b.7\]]pa ni yan lag dang skad dang spyod pa gzhan du 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_yan lag 'gyur ba ni lus rnams gzhan du 'gyur ba'o/_/skad 'gyur ba ni skad gdangs nyams shing 'gags pa'o/_/spyod pa 'gyur ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa nyams shing sngar
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]gnas pa las gzhan du gyur pa'o/_/dug gis 'dar zhing gnyid rab che/_/de ni kun las myos tshabs che/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gis myos par gyur pa ni 'dar zhing lus 'gul ba dang /_gnyid shin tu che zhing stug pa yin no/_/de ni myos pa
[\[124a.2\]]kun las shin tu tshabs cher myos pa yin te nad kyis gnod pa skyed par byed pa yin no/_/khrag sogs pa yis rlung sogs pa'i/_/mtshan nyid lhag par shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag dang chang dang dug las gyur pa'i myos pa las rlung la sogs pa'i nad
[\[124a.3\]]rang gi mtshan nyid lhag par mtshan nyid kyis shes par bya'o/_/de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te/_khrag dang chang dang dug gi mtshan nyid bshad mod kyi/_rlung la sogs pa gang yang rung ba lhag par gnas pa yin no zhes shes par ro/_/de ltar myos pa'i mtshan nyid
[\[124a.4\]]bshad nas/_brgyal ba'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/_brgyal ba rlung gi bdag nyid can/_/nam mkha' dmar sngo gnag par ni/_/mthong zhing mun par zhugs snyam sems/_/myur du sangs par byed pa dang /_/snying na 'dar zhing mgo 'khor la/_/skem zhing
[\[124a.5\]]bzhin mdog dmar nag 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_brgyal ba'i nad rlung las gyur pa'i bdag nyid can la ni/_skyes bus nam mkha'i me tog kha dog dmar ba dang sngo ba dang gnag par mthong bar 'gyur zhing mun par zhugs pa snyam du mun 'thibs zhes byed par
[\[124a.6\]]'gyur ba dang /_myur du sangs shing dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_snying na zhing 'dar ba nas/_bzhin ras dang lus kyi mdog dmar nag tu snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mkhris pas dmar ba'am ser por ni/_/nam mkha' mthong zhing mun 'thibs byed/_/sangs nas
[\[124a.7\]]rngul dang bcas pa dang /_/tsha skom gdungs pas nyen pa dang /_/'khru zhing kha dog ser dang dmar/_/mig dmar ser bar snang bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur ba'i brgyal ba ni nam mkha'i mdog dmar po'am/_ser po nyid du mthong par 'gyur
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]ba dang /_mun 'thibs zhes byed cing rmongs nas mi dran par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sangs nas dran pa rnyed pa dang /_lus rngul zhing tsha ba la sogs pas gdungs shing nyen par 'gyur ba dang /_bshang ba 'khru zhing sla ba dang /_kha dog ser zhing dmar bar snang ba dang /_
[\[124b.2\]]mig dmar zhing ser bar snang bas lta bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan gyis ni sprin lta bur/_/nam mkha' mthong zhing mun 'thibs byed/_/rings nas sangs par 'gyur ba dang /_/snying na bcas pas mchil ma mang /_/pags pa rlon pas g.yogs pa bzhin/_/yan
[\[124b.3\]]lag lci zhing tshor ba chung /_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las byung ba'i brgyal bar gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni nam mkha' gnyis par g.yogs pa lta bur mthong ba dang /_mun 'thibs zhes byed cing mi dran par 'gyur ba dang /_brgyal nas yun ring zhig nas sangs
[\[124b.4\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_snying 'phar zhing na ba dang bcas pa'i mchil ma dang bad kan gyi ljan ljin mang po 'byung ba dang /_pags pa rlon pas g.yogs shing dkris pa bzhin du yan lag dang bcas pa'i lus lci zhing tshor ba chung bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nyes pa
[\[124b.5\]]gsum gyi mtshan kun ldan/_/brjed byed gnyis pa lta bu ste/_/myur du 'gyel zhing brgyal 'gyur te/_/'jigs rung spyod pa med pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi'i nyes pa gsum char gyis bskyed pa'i brgyal ba ni mtshan nyid de dag thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[124b.6\]]brjed byed gnyis pa yin zhing dran pa nyams par 'gyur la/_brjed byed kyis zin pa ltar myur du 'gyel zhing dran pa med par brgyal bar 'gyur la/_khyad par ni brjed byed kyi gdon lta bu dang /_'jigs su rung ba'i spyod pa med par gzhan thams cad tshul mthun
[\[124b.7\]]pa yin no/_/lus can myos dang brgyal ba yis/_/nad la shugs yod gyur kyang ni/_/rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/_/kun zhugs sman med par mi zhi/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus can te mi rnams la myos pa dang brgyal ba'i rlung nad la sogs pa'i shugs drag po yod
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]du zin kyang /_rang nyid sman gyis bcos mi dgos par rang nyid zhi zhing ldog par 'gyur gyi/_kun du zhugs pa 'am kun du song ba zhes bya ba'i brgyal ba'i nad ni sman gyis ma bcos par zhi zhing ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun du zhugs pa zhes
[\[125a.2\]]gang zhig la bya zhe na/_de'i phyir smras pa ni/_nad ni shin tu stobs che ba/_/'dus pa las gyur kun zhugs pa/_/srog gi gnas la brten pa yis/_/lus dang ngag yid spyod pa 'phrog_/de yis skyes bu ro dang ni/_/shing dang rtsig pa 'dra bar byed/_/rings par
[\[125a.3\]]gso bar ma byas na/_/myur du 'chi bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad shin tu stobs che zhing dkyel cher sogs pa rang gi rgyu'i khyad par gyi tshogs pas nus pa thams cad 'dus par gyur cing gsum char bya ba'i rtsom pa gcig la
[\[125a.4\]]zhugs shing 'bras bu gcig 'byed par byed pa'i kun du zhugs pa'i nad srog gi gnas snying ga'i gnad la brten cing 'dug par gyur pa na kun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i brgyal ba'i nad du 'gyur te/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa 'phrog cing bsdus nas
[\[125a.5\]]kun du zhugs pa des skyes bu shi ba'i ro dang 'dra bar 'gyur gyi/_shing dang rtsig pa ltar sems med par byed pa yin la/_des na gal te nad de dag gso ba myur du ma byas na myur zhing rings pa nyid du srog dang bral bar byed pa yin no/_/mtsho zab chu srin mang po
[\[125a.6\]]can/_/chu 'jing 'jug ngogs med par ni/_/kun zhugs pa ni nub byed las/_/mi ni myur du gdon par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bas na sman pas kun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i nad mi bzad pas zin cing sdug bsngal de'i 'dam du bying ba'i mi myur du gdon par bya ste/_de
[\[125a.7\]]yang dper na mtsho shin tu zab cing rtogs par dka' la/_chu srin byis pa gsod la sogs pa'i srog chags gdug pa mang pos gang ba'i chu 'jing pha rol du byung ba'i 'jug ngogs med par nub par gyur pa dag ni/_nyam nga ba'i gnas yin pas myur du gdon dgos
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs pas brten dang bral ba'i chang 'thungs pas/_/myos dregs khro dang bral ba'i rang bzhin can/_/rang gi dgra bos yongs su 'khyud 'gyur zhing /_/rigs dang mi rigs mnyam par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_chang rigs shing 'os par brten
[\[125b.2\]]pa dang bral ba ste 'og nas smos pa'i stobs dang dus la sogs pa dang sbyar ba med pa ni/_rigs par brten pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ste/_de lta bu'i rigs par brten pa med pa chang 'thungs pas ni myos pa la sogs par ngang gis te/_lus dang lhan cig skyes pa'i
[\[125b.3\]]dgra bo 'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma'i yon tan 'joms shing 'phrog par byed pas dgra bo ltar gnod par byed pa'i dgra bo rnams yongs su 'khyud par gyur cing shin tu brtse bar gyur pha ma yin zhing /_de bzhin du rigs pa dang mi rigs pa cha mnyam zhing mtshungs pa nyid du
[\[125b.4\]]sems par 'gyur ba ste/_bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa'i bye brag phyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don no/_/stobs dang dus dang yul dang goms pa dang /_/rang bzhin grogs dang na tshod nad rnams ni/_/legs brtags de dang rjes mthun gang zhig 'thung /_/de ni bdud rtsi
[\[125b.5\]]'thungs dang mtshungs pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus kyi nyams stobs dang /_dus la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam rang bzhin blos legs par rtogs shing so sor phyed nas de dang mtshungs par skyes bu gang zhig chang ran zhing dus la bab par 'thungs pa de ni bdud rtsi
[\[125b.6\]]'thungs pa dang mtshungs pa yin te/_skyes bu rigs pa dang ldan par 'thungs pas gnod pa med par lus bde bar byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la
[\[125b.7\]]dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas gzhang 'brum gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar kun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i nad bshad ma thag pa de ni srog gi
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]gnas snying la brten cing 'byung ba de bzhin du/_'dir yang srog gi gnas gzhang la brten te 'byung bas na srog gi gnas la brten par chos mthun pa'i phyir/_de'i 'og tu 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/dgra ltar srog chags rnams kyi tshe/_/
[\[126a.2\]]gzhang 'brum byung bas gsod byed pas/_/de phyir bshang ba'i lam 'gegs pas/_/gzhang 'brum zhes ni bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhang 'brum ni gzhang khar sha'i mdzer pa sbom po skyes pa yin la/_de ni dgra bo ltar srog chags rnams kyi tshe 'phrog
[\[126a.3\]]cing gzhang 'brum du skyes pas gsod par byed pa'i phyir nges par tshig gi tshul gyis na gzhang 'brum zhes bya'o/_/nad kyis lpags tshil sha rnams ni/_/gnod byas dbyibs ni sna tshogs pa'i/_/sha yi myu gu gzhang sogs su/_/skyes de gzhang 'brum yin par
[\[126a.4\]]bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_nad ces bya ba ni rlung la sogs pa ste/_des pags pa dang tshil dang sha rnams la gnod cing ma rungs par byas nas/_dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs shing tha dad pa'i sha'i myu gu sha mdzer sbom po lta bu gnod pa sna tshogs skyed pa gzhang
[\[126a.5\]]la sogs par skyes shing byung bar gyur pa de la ni gzhang 'brum gyi nad ces bya ba yin par drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/lhan cig skyes dang phyis 'byung dang /_/skam dang khrag tu 'dzag pa yi/_/dbye bas mdor na rnam gnyis yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhang 'brum
[\[126a.6\]]gyi nad de ni mdor na rnam pa gnyis yin te/_la la ni lhan cig skyes te 'byung ba yin la/_la la skyes nas phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang de bzhin du skam pa dang gsher ba'i dbye bas kyang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/_la la ni skam por gnas pa yin la/_la
[\[126a.7\]]la ni khrag 'dzag pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/gzhang ni rgyu ma sbom por brten/_/sor ni phyed dang lnga yod do/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhang ni rgyu ma'i zhabs rgyu ma sbom po la brten cing gnas pa de'i tshad ni sor phyed dang lnga yod pa yin no/_/gnyer gsum sor ni phyed dang
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]gnyis/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhang de ni gnyer ma'i rim pa gsum re re zhing sor phyed dang gnyis gnyis yod do/_/rim pa de yi nang ma ni/_/phyir 'phul bar ma sel ba yin/_/de yi phyi rol 'dzums pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rim pa de rnams kyi rim pa nang ma'am/_
[\[126b.2\]]phugs ma ni dri ma rnams phyir 'phul zhing 'bab par byed pa yin la/_gnyer ma'i rim pa bar ma ni dri ma rnams sel zhing phyir 'byin pa yin pas na sel ba zhes bya la/_phyi rol gyi gnyer ma ni dri ma la sogs pa mi 'byung bar sdom zhing 'dzums par byed pas na
[\[126b.3\]]'dzums pa zhes bya'o/_/de yi phyi rol sor gcig kha/_/nas ni phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad/_/de phan chad ni spu skye 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dzums pa de'i phyi rol sor gcig ni gzhang kha zhes bya la/_gzhang kha de'i tshad ni nas phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad yin no/_/gzhang
[\[126b.4\]]kha'i tshigs de thams cad ni rkub tu spu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu/_/gnyer ma'i sa bon gnod 'gyur nyid/_/gzhang 'brum/_zhes bya ba la/_de la lhan cig skyes pa dang phyis 'byung ba'i gzhang 'brum gnyis las/_lhan cig skyes pa'i gzhang
[\[126b.5\]]'brum 'byung ba'i rgyu ni gnyer ma de 'byung zhing dang por skyes pa nyid kyi tshe/_de'i sa bon khu khrag la sogs pa la rlung las gos par gnod par gyur pa de nyid las gzhang 'brum 'byung ba'o/_/sa bon gnod pa yang /_pha mas mi 'phrod zos pa dang /_/sngon las/_zhes
[\[126b.6\]]bya ba la/_sa bon de la gnod par byed pa'i rgyu ni rnam pa gnyis te/_pha dang mas kha zas mi 'phrod pa gzhang 'brum skyed pa'i rgyu zos pa dang /_sngon bdag nyid kyis de lta bu'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa'o/_/de gnyis dang 'dus pa/_'khrugs
[\[126b.7\]]pa las gyur de dag ni/_/gsor mi rung ba nyid du bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_pha dang ma'i gnod pa'i rgyu dang /_sngon gyi las de gnyis dang /_nad gzhi 'dus par 'khrugs pa gang yin pa las gyur pa de dag ni gang gi phyir gsor mi rung ba nyid yin te lhan cig skyes pa yin pa'i
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]phyir ro/_/rigs 'byung nad kun de dang 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhan gang yang rung ba kun kyang de dang 'dra ste/_dang po lhan cig skyes pa ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes tshig 'dis ston pa yin no/_/lhan cig skyes pa khyad par du/_/rtsub cing brta bar
[\[127a.2\]]dka' ba dang /_/nang du kha bltas dkar ba dang /_/bla brnan mi bzad can gso dka'/_/zhes bya ba la/_lhan cig skyes pa'i gzhang 'brum de yang khyad par 'di dag dang ldan na lhag par gso dka' ste/_reg pa rtsub par gnas pa dang /_brta zhing brtags par
[\[127a.3\]]dka' ba dang /_kha nang du blta zhing phyir mi phyogs pa dang /_kha dog dkar ba dang /_bla brnan gyi nad mi bzad pa yod pa ni gso dka' zhing bcos su mi rung ba yin no/_/cig shos drug ste nad tha dad/_/'dres dang 'dus pa khrag las byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_lhan
[\[127a.4\]]cig 'byung ba las cig shos su gyur pa'i phyir 'byung ba'i gzhang 'brum ni rnam pa drug yod de/_nad tha dad pa las byung ba gsum dang 'dres pa las byung ba dang 'dus pa las byung ba dang khrag las byung ba'o/_/rlung dang bad kan gnyis las skam/_/khrag
[\[127a.5\]]dang mkhris pa las rlan can/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la gzhang 'brum skam po khrag mi 'dzag pa ni rlung dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pas zin pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhang 'brum rlan can khrag 'dzag pa ni khrag dang mkhris pa 'dres pas zin pa las
[\[127a.6\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nad rnams ldang rgyu sngar bshad pa/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad rnams ldang zhing 'khrugs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa ni sngar nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi bshad pa'i skabs su bshad cing bstan pa yin no/_/'khrugs pa de yis khong pa yi/_/me drod
[\[127a.7\]]nyams shing bshang ba 'phel/_/gzhan yang nyal po rab drags dang /_/bzhon pas khong 'khrugs stan dag ni/_/ma snyoms sra dang tsog pur 'dug_/'jam rtsi gce'u sa dang ni/_/rdo dang gos kyis brud pa dang /_/shin tu grang ba'i chus bkrus dang /_/rtag tu 'khru bar
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]byed pa dang /_/bshang dang gci dang 'phyen gyi shugs/_/bkag dang nan gyis btsir ba dang /_/rims dang skran dang tshad par 'khru/_/'or nad skya rbab be'u snabs kyis/_/skem byas gnod par 'gyur ba yi/_/spyod pa bsten las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bud med zla grangs ma tshang
[\[127b.2\]]'phyil/_/zla ba rdzogs pas gzir las 'byung /_/de 'dra dag dang gzhan yang rlung /_/thur sel 'khrugs pas dri ma ni/_/gzhang gi gnyer mar de gzhag pas/_/de ni mi mngon gyur pas gnas/_/gzhang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad ldang ba'i rgyu
[\[127b.3\]]des khong pa'i me drod nyams shing bri la bshang ba zhes bya ba'i dri ma 'phel bar byed pa dang /_rgyu gzhan yang bud med la 'khrig pa spyad pa'i nyal po drags par bya ba dang /_bzhon pa las khong 'khrugs pa ste/_rta la sogs pa'i bzhon pa mi srun pas g.yengs shing
[\[127b.4\]]'khrugs par byas pa dang /_stan mtho dman ma snyoms pa la 'dug pa dang /_stan srab pa la 'dug pa dang /_rtag tu tsog pur 'dug pa dang /_'jam rtsi gce'u legs par ma btang bas snad pa dang /_sa gzhi dang rdo la sogs pas brud de snad par byas pa dang /_
[\[127b.5\]]shin tu rgyun mi 'chad par chu grang mos bkrus shing reg par byas pa dang /_rtag par rgyun tu 'khru bar byed pa dang /_bshang ba la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba bkag cing brnag pa dang /_de dag nyid mi 'byung bzhin du nan gyis btsir ba dang /_rims la
[\[127b.6\]]sogs pa'i nad kyis skem zhing rid par byas pa dang /_lus la sogs pa la gnod cing gdung bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi spyod pa bsten pa de dag las gzhang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang bud med rnams la ni nad de dag gi steng du zla ba ma tshang zhing /_mngal
[\[127b.7\]]na gnas pa'i sems can skye ba'i dus la ma bab cing /_'phyil ba dang zla ba rdzogs shing tshang bar 'dug kyang de gzir ba ste gnod pa dang bcas par bu btsas pa las gzhang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nad kyi rgyu de 'dra ba de dag dang /_rnam pa gzhan yang thur du
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'khrugs shing gnod par 'gyur bas dri ma sogs par byed de/_/gzhang gi gnyer ma'i gnas su bkag nas gnas par byed la/_des na gzhang gi gnyer ma de rnams su ni mi mngon par gnas shing gseb tu zhugs
[\[128a.2\]]pa de dag rul bar 'gyur ba'i gnod pas nyen nas gzhang 'brum skye bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/de yi sngon tshul me drod nyams/_/brla ni rengs shing na ba dang /_/byin pa'i nywa na mgo 'khor zhing /_/yan lag na zhing mig gnyis skrang /_/bshang ba 'khru ba'am yang na sri/_/
[\[128a.3\]]rlung chen nang nas 'khyil ba dang /_/phal cher lte ba'i 'og nas rgyu/_/nad bcas bcad pa lta bur sems/_/dka' bar 'byung zhing sgra can 'byung /_/rgyu ma krul krul zer zhing spo/_/skem zhing sgregs pa mang du 'byung /_/gcin mang bshang nyung yi ga 'chus/_/sgregs
[\[128a.4\]]pa dud 'dra skyur ba 'byung /_/mgo dang rgyab dang brang du gzer/_/snyom zhing kha dog nyams pa dang /_/glong bag dbang po nyam chung dang /_/khro zhing bsnyen bkur dka' ba dang /_/ma zhu skem nad skya rbab dang /_/dmu rdzing rnams la som nyi skyes/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhang 'brum
[\[128a.5\]]de rnams kyi sngon byung ba'i tshul lam/_gzugs ni pho ba'i me drod nyams shing bri ba dang /_brla thog thag na ba dang /_byin pa gnyis kyi nya gcus pa snyam du sems shing na ba la sogs pa dang /_bshang ba ched 'ga' ni 'khru zhing sla la/_ched 'ga' ni sri zhing rtug skam
[\[128a.6\]]du 'byung ba dang /_rlung che zhing mang ba dang /_rgyu ma'i lam bkag nas nad nang du 'khyil zhing mi thon pa dang /_de nyid kyis na phal cher nad lte ba'i nang na rgyu zhing zug pa dang /_phan tshun gzer ba'i nad dang bcas pa dang /_rgyu ma'i nang kun du bcad pa snyam du sems pa dang /_
[\[128a.7\]]'byung bar dka' zhing thogs la phyir 'byung ba yang sgra can du 'byung ba dang /_rgyu ma'i nang phan tshun krul krul zer zhing 'khrog pa dang sbo ba dang /_skem zhing rid pa la sogs pa dang /_sgregs pa dud pa dang 'dra bar dku bar 'ong zhing skyur bar 'byung ba dang /_mgo la sogs
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]pa gzer zhing na ba dang /_snyom zhing na ba dang /_las la mi brtson pa dang /_kha dog nyams pa ste/_thal ba'i rang bzhin gyi kha dog las gzhan du gyur ba med pa dang /_spro ba med pa dang /_dbang po nyam chung zhing rang rang gi las la 'jug mi nus pa dang /_khro zhing sems
[\[128b.2\]]'khrugs pa dang /_bsnyen bkur dka' zhing sdug bsngal bas bsnyen bkur bya dgos pa dang /_ma zhu ba'i gnas dmu rdzing gi bar gyi gnas rnams yod par som nyi skyes shing dogs par 'gyur ba yin no/_/gzhang 'brum skye bar gyur pa la/_/'di dag nyid ni
[\[128b.3\]]'phel bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhang 'brum gyi nad skyes shing byung bar gyur pa la/_sngar byung ba'i tshul gyis rtags 'di dag nyid 'phel zhing de'i tshul gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ro/_/de yis 'og gi lam bkag pas/_/thur du sel ba'i rlung ldog ste/_/
[\[128b.4\]]lus dang dbang po kun gnas pa'i/_/rlung gzhan thams cad 'khrugs par byed/_/de bzhin bshang gci mkhris pa dang /_/bad kan lus zungs rten bcas pa/_/'khrugs shing me drod nyams par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_gzhang 'brum des 'og gi lam bshang
[\[128b.5\]]sgo zhes bya ba bkag pas thur du sel ba'i rlung 'byung bar ldog pa na lam bkag pa'i phyir rlung de slar ldog par byed la/_de ltar ldog pa des lus dang dbang po'i tshogs kun la gnas shing brten pa'i rlung dang me dang mnyam du gnas pa dang /_khyab byed dang stod du rgyu ba
[\[128b.6\]]dang /_srog cas bya ba thams cad 'khrugs shing g.yo bar byed la/_de bzhin du bshang gci la sogs pa rten nam gnas dang bcas pa dang 'khrugs shing g.yo bar byed la/_khong pa'i me drod kyang nyams par byed do zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/de nas gzhang 'brum nad
[\[128b.7\]]can la/_/phal cher thams cad nyer 'byung ba/_/skem zhing mchog tu bskyod mi nus/_/stobs zad khong rmya bzhin mdangs nyams/_/lus lhod snying po med 'gyur zhing /_/'bus zos pa yi shing 'dra la/_/bla brnan ma lus dag gis 'debs/_/ji skad bshad pa'i gnad
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]gzir zhing /_/lud pa skam dang skad 'gags dang /_/khas ro mi tshor cham 'debs spo/_/sgyid skyur rkang lag na zhing slon/_/sbrid pa skrang dang rims nad dang /_/khu ba zad cing rab rib slon/_/rde'u chags nad kyis gzir ba dang /_/skad 'gags zhum
[\[129a.2\]]la sems khong chud/_/mchil ma mang 'dor yi ga 'chus/_/rus tshigs kun dang snying lte ba/_/gzhang dang rna rtsar gzer dang bcas/_/gzhang nas 'bru ni ma smin btsos/_/khu ba lta bu'i sbyin bag 'dzag_/rtug skam sbyin pa'ang sla bar 'gyur/_/smin dang ma smin bar
[\[129a.3\]]bar 'khru/_/skya zhing ser dang sngon po yi/_/khrag ni sbyin bag 'khru bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas sngon po'i tshul gyi 'og tu gzhang 'brum gyi nad can la phal cher 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshul ni skem zhing sbeg pa dang /_mchog tu smra'am shin tu bskyod
[\[129a.4\]]par mi nus shing rtsol ba chung ba dang /_nyams stobs zad cing nus pa chung ba dang /_khong pa rmya zhing sgyid zhan pa dang /_bzhin mdangs nyams shing bzhin ras kyi mdog mi sdug pa dang /_lus lhod cing bya ba mi lcogs pa dang /_snying po ltar sra zhing mkhrang ba'i bag
[\[129a.5\]]med de/_de yang dper na 'bus zos pa'i shing ltar shin tu snyi zhing snying po med pa yin no/_/de bzhin du bla brnan gyi nad du ma gzhan ji skad bshad pa rnams kyis kyang 'debs par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du sngar ji skad bshad pa'i gnad rnams gzir zhing gnod par 'gyur
[\[129a.6\]]ba dang /_de bzhin du lud pa la sogs pas gnod cing nyen par 'gyur ba dang /_yang de bzhin du skad 'gags pa dang /_skad gsang zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_sems khong du chud cing yid la byed pas gnas pa dang /_mchil ma mang du 'byung zhing bad kan las kyis
[\[129a.7\]]ljan ljin mang du 'dor ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa'i nad dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du ma smin pa btsos pa'i khu ba lta bur sbyin bag tu 'dug cing 'byil ba gzhang kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du bar skabs bar skabs
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]su lan 'ga' ni bshang ba sri zhing 'gags pas rtug skam du 'gyur la/_lan 'ga' ni 'khru zhing sla bag tu 'byung bar 'gyur la/_de bzhin du lan 'ga' ni smin par 'khru/_lan 'ga' ni ma smin par 'khru ba nas sbyin bag tu 'khru bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhang 'brum rlung
[\[129b.2\]]shas che las gyur/_/skem zhing tseg tseg tsha ba dang /_/rnyid cing dmar nag rengs pa dang /_/mi snyoms rtsub cing sra ba dang /_/phan tshun mi 'dra yo ba dang /_/rtse mo rno zhing gas pa dang /_/bim pa rgya shug khardzu ra/_/ras bal sa bon dang 'dra zhing /_/la la ka dam me tog
[\[129b.3\]]'dra/_/la la yungs kar lta bur skyes/_/mgo dang phrag pa rtsib logs brla/_/chu so dag tu lhag par na/_/sbrid pa sgregs pa bshang ba sri/_/snying 'phar yi ga 'chus pa skyed/_/lud dbugs mi bde me drod nyams/_/rna ba sgra bcas mgo 'khor byed/_/des nyen
[\[129b.4\]]rtug skam nyung ngu ni/_/sgra bcas ska sla 'dren ma dang /_/na zhing lbu ba 'byar bag can/_/rtug skam tshul gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/_/pags pa sen mo bshang gci dang /_/mig dang gdong ni gnag par 'gyur/_/skran dang mcher pa dmu rdzing dang /_/gtun 'dra de nyid las
[\[129b.5\]]'byung 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhang 'brum gyi nad rlung gi shas che zhing rgyas pa las ni gzhang 'brum skam zhing khrag mi 'dzag cing skam pa dang /_yungs kar gyi lde gus bskus pa ltar tsha ba'i bag tseg tseg por byed pa dang /_rnyid cing rtse mo yo ba dang /_mdog dmar
[\[129b.6\]]nag tu 'dug pa dang /_phur pa ltar rengs shing 'greng ba dang /_dbyibs mtho dman mi snyoms pa dang /_sog le'i kha ltar rtsub pa dang /_rdo la reg pa ltar sra ba dang /_dbyibs phan tshun gcig la gcig mi 'dra ba dang /_yo zhing gzhu ltar gug pa dang /_rtse mo ltar rno ba dang /_
[\[129b.7\]]rtse mo gas shing kha bye ba dang /_bim pa zhes bya ba 'bras bu dmar po zhig yod pa'am/_rgya shug phra mo'i 'bras bu'am shing kha rdzu ra'i 'bras bu'am ras bal gyi sa bon dang 'dra zhing mtshungs par skye ba dang /_yang la la ni ka dam pa'i me tog dang 'dra bar skye la/_gzhang
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]'brum la la yungs kar gyi tshad tsam du phra ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang de bzhin du mgo bo la sogs pa lhag par na zhing zug pa dang /_sbrid pa la sogs pa mang ba dang /_bshang ba sri ba la sogs pa nas/_rtug skam gyi tshul gyis bshang ba
[\[130a.2\]]'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_pags pa la sogs pa gnag par 'gyur ba dang /_yang rlung gi gzhang 'brum de nyid las skran la sogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/mkhris shas che la rtse mo ni/_/sngo zhing dmar ser dkar bar snang /_/phra zhing dri mnam
[\[130a.3\]]khrag sla 'dzag_/srab cing 'jam la lhod pa yin/_/mcher pa'i dum bu ne tso'i lce/_/srin pu pad pa'i mchu 'drar snang /_/tsha zhing rnags la rims dang rngul/_/skom dad yi ga 'chus rmongs skyed/_/bshang dro sla zhing sngo la tsha/_/ser zhing dmar bar 'khru bar 'gyur/_/
[\[130a.4\]]nas rul nang 'dra pags pa dang /_/sen sogs sngo ser ljang bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa shas che ba las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum ni 'brum bu'i rtse mo sngon po dang /_kha dog dmar ser dang dkar por snang ba dang /_phra zhing chung ba la sogs pa dang /_
[\[130a.5\]]mtsher pa'i dum bu la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rnam pa 'dra ba tsha ba la sogs pa'i bla brnan rked pa dang /_bshang ba dro zhing sla ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rnam par 'khru ba dang /_nas rul ba'i nang gi dbyibs 'dra ba dang /_pags pa dang sen mo dang
[\[130a.6\]]mig dang bzhin dang dri ma rnams sngo zhing ser ba dang ljang bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan shas che rtsa ba sbom/_/mthug cing nad kyi shugs dal dkar/_/skrangs shing rgyas la snum pa dang /_/'greng zhing zlum la lci zhing brtan/_/'byar bag tshor ba chung zhing 'jam/_/g.ya'
[\[130a.7\]]zhing reg na dga' bar byed/_/ka ri ra pa na sa yi/_/rus pa ba yi nu sor 'dra/_/chu sor zug cing sbo gzhang na/_/lte ba lgang pa bcad snyam sems/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde snying na/_/mchil mang cham 'debs yi ga 'chus/_/gcin sri mgo bo tshor ba med/_/grang ba'i
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]rims ni skyed par byed/_/kha chu 'dzag cing me drod nyams/_/slon zhing ma zhu'i nad kun skyed/_/bshang ba tshil 'dra bad kan mang /_/'khru dang bcas pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'dzag par mi byed rdol mi byed/_/pags pa la sogs snum zhing dkar/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[130b.2\]]gzhang 'brum bad kan shas che zhing bdo ba las gyur pa'i nad ni rtsa ba sbom zhing che ba dang /_mthug cing lhun che ba dang /_nad kyi shugs dal zhing mi drag pa dang /_mdog dkar ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa nas reg na dga' ba'i bar gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /_shing ka ri
[\[130b.3\]]ra'i 'bras bu'i rus pa'am/_pa na sa'i 'bras bu'i rus pa dang dbyibs 'dra ba dang /_de bzhin du ba'i nu sor gyi dbyibs 'dra ba yin la/_de bzhin du chu sor zug pa la sogs pa'i nad skyed pa dang /_bshang ba tshil la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[130b.4\]]khrag la sogs pa 'dzag par mi byed cing /_rdol ba'am kha bye bar yang mi byed pa dang /_pags pa dang mig dang sen mo la sogs pa snum zhing mdog dkar bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/'dres las mtshan nyid 'dres ma yin/_/'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/
[\[130b.5\]]zhes bya ba la/_gnyis pa 'dres pa las byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni gang dag las byung ba de dag 'dres mar snang ba yin la/_nad gsum 'dus pa las byung ba ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/_/khrag shas che las gzhang 'brum ni/_/mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid
[\[130b.6\]]'dra ba la/_/n+ya gro d+ha yi myu gu 'dra/_/byi ru 'ol ma se mdog 'dra/_/shin tu tsha dro na ba dang /_/bshang ba shugs kyis rab btsir las/_/'phral du khrag ni 'byung ba dang /_/de nyid shin tu 'dzag par 'gyur/_/sbal ba 'dra zhing khrag zad las/_/byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen
[\[130b.7\]]'gyur/_/mdog stobs spro ba nyams pa dang /_/mdangs 'phrog dbang po zhan par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag shas che zhing rgyas pa las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum ni mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa dang 'dra bar 'byung ba dang /_dbyibs shing n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu dang 'dra zhing /_
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]mdog byi ru'am 'ol ma se ltar dmar ba yin la/_gzhang 'brum de ni tsha zhing dro ba dang /_na ba dang bshang ba shugs kyis rab tu btsir ba las 'phral du khrag 'byung zhing /_khrag de nyid yang dang yang du shin tu 'dzag par 'gyur ba dang /_dbyibs
[\[131a.2\]]sbal ba 'dra ba dang /_khrag zad pa las byung zhing skyes pa'i sdug bsngal brnag par dka' bas nyen cing gzir bar 'gyur ba dang /_mdog la sogs pa nyams shing bri bar gyur pa dang /_mdangs phrogs shing nyams pa dang /_dbang po nyam chung shing nus pa zhan
[\[131a.3\]]par 'gyur ba yin no/_/mung+ga ko dra ba'i phye ma/_/tsa na ka ri ra sogs pa/_/rtsub dang bshang ba sri bas rlung /_/rang gnas 'khrugs pa stobs ldan pas/_/thur du rgyu ba'i bu ga ni/_/bkag ste smad du rab skams nas/_/bshang ba gci ba 'phyen rnams ni/_/'gags
[\[131a.4\]]pas nad ni mi bzad skyed/_/de yis khong pa rgyab rtsib logs/_/snying gar nad ni shin tu skyed/_/lto sbos gsus pa na ba dang /_/snying gcu rgyu ma bcad snyam sems/_/chu sor shin tu zug pa dang /_/mkhur bar skrang pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rlung ni gyen du song gyur na/_/de
[\[131a.5\]]la slon rims yi ga 'chus/_/snying nad be'u snabs ma zhu dang /_/gcin sri bshang ba 'khru ba dang /_/'on dang rab rib dbugs mi bde/_/mgo nad lud pa cham pas 'debs/_/yid kyis 'gyur ba skom dang khrag_/mkhris pa skran dang dmu rdzing sogs/_/rlung
[\[131a.6\]]gi nad gtogs de dang de/_/shin tu mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gzhang 'brum gyen du 'khyil gyur pa/_/'di ni mchog tu gnod byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sran mung+ga dang /_rtsa 'bru ko dra ba la sogs pa rtsub pa dang /_bshang ba sri bar byed pa'i zas kyis thur du
[\[131a.7\]]sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlung gi gnas 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur pa stobs dang ldan zhing nus pa che bas thur du rgyu zhing 'bab pa'i bu ga gang yin pa de bkag cing bcad nas/_ro smad du bshang ba de dag rab tu skams nas/_bshang ba dang gci ba dang 'phyen rnams bkag
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]cing phyir ma 'thon pa'i nad shin tu mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba skyed par 'gyur la/_bshang ba la sogs pa 'gags pa des khong pa la sogs par nad shin tu gnod pa skyed la/_lto sbos pa dang gsus pa gcus pa lta bur na ba dang /_snying gcus pa snyam
[\[131b.2\]]du sems shing mchil ma 'byung ba dang /_rgyu ma'i nang gris bcad pa snyam du sems pa dang /_chu so'i phyogs su zug cing na ba dang /_mkhur ba gnyis la skrang pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_rlung de ro stod du gyen du song bar gyur na/_rgyu de las slon pa la sogs pa'i
[\[131b.3\]]nad rlung las gyur pa'i nad grangs med pa mi bzad pa du ma dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzhang 'brum gyi rgyus rlung gyen du 'khyil pa las gyur pa'i nad 'di ni mchog tu mi bzad par gnod cing sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no/_/rlung shas che ba'i khong par ni/_/de med par
[\[131b.4\]]yang de 'byung 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_khong pa rlung gi shas che zhing lto bar rlung nad rgyas par gyur pa'i srog chags rnams ni gzhang 'brum gyi rgyu de med par yang gyen du 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i rlung nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lhan cig skyes dang nad gsum ldan/_/phugs
[\[131b.5\]]ma'i gnyer mar gang gnas pa/_/de dag gsor mi rung ba yin/_/me drod stobs che sogs kyis 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi lus la gzhang 'brum lhan cig skyes par gyur pa de ni gsor mi rung ba yin la/_phyis 'byung ba yin du zin kyang nad gzhi gsum char
[\[131b.6\]]las skyes pa dang /_gnyer ma phugs mar gnas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang gsor mi rung ba yin la/_yang de ni me drod kyi stobs che ba la sogs pas re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du gnas su rung ste/_sogs pa zhes smos pas lus kyi stobs dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba dang /_
[\[131b.7\]]goms pa dang /_sngon gyi las la sogs pa bsdu'o/_/'dres las gyur dang gnyer ma ni/_/bar mar gnas pa gang yin pa/_/lo gcig yan chad lon gyur pa/_/de dag gso dka' yin par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_yang gzhang 'brum nad gzhi gnyis 'dres par
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du gnyer ma rim pa gnyis par brten zhing gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du lo gcig yan chad lon zhing lo 'das par gyur pa de dag ni gso dka' ba yin par bshad do/_/phyi rol gnyer mar byung ba dang /_/nad gcig shas che las
[\[132a.2\]]byung dang /_/skyes nas ring por ma lon gang /_/gzhang 'brum de ni gso bar sla/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang gzhang 'brum gang phyi rol gyi gnyer ma'i rim par brten zhing byung ba dang /_de bzhin du nad gzhi gcig shas che zhing rgyas pa las byung ba dang /_de bzhin du skyes nas
[\[132a.3\]]yun ring por ma lon zhing lo gcig man chad kyi nang du byung bar gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum de ni gso sla zhing bcos su rung ba yin no/_/pho mtshan sogs kyi 'og nas ni/_/rang rang skabs bshad/_ces bya ba la/_pho mtshan dang /_mo mtshan dang /_rna ba dang sna gong la sogs par
[\[132a.4\]]yang 'brum bu 'byung mod kyi/_de dag ni 'og nas lba ba'i nad kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya ba la sogs pa rang rang gi le'u las bshad do/_/lte bar skyes/_rta bla ba yi kha 'dra zhing /_/'byar bag can la 'jam pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lte bar skyes pa'i 'brum bu ni
[\[132a.5\]]srog chags rta bla ba zhes bya ba'i 'bu zhig yod pa'i kha dang dbyibs 'dra zhing 'byar bag can la reg na 'jam pa yin no/_/pags pa'i mdzer pa smras pa ni/_/khyab byed kyis ni bad kan bsdus/_/pags pa'i phyi rol thor bur byed/_/mdzer pa 'dra zhing rtsub par
[\[132a.6\]]gnas/_/pags pa'i mdzer pa yin par shes/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te/_rlung khyab byed kyis bad kan gyi tshogs bsdus nas thor bur 'byung bar byed de/_de yang pags pa'i phyi rol du gnas par byed cing sha'i mdzer pa 'dra bar rtsub cing reg na mi bde bar gnas
[\[132a.7\]]pa yin la/_de ni mdzer pa dang 'dra bas na/_pags pa'i mdzer pa yin par mngon shes can gyi drang srong rnams kyis shes shing khong du chud pa yin no/_/rlung gis zug cing rtsub par 'gyur/_/mkhris pas gnag la dmar rtsar 'gyur/_/bad kan gyis ni snum nyid
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]dang /_/rmen bu'i mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_pags pa'i mdzer pa de rlung las gyur pa yin na/_zug cing na la reg pa rtsub par 'gyur ro/_/mkhris pa las gyur na mdog gnag la rtsa dmar bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan las gyur pa yin na ni pags pa'i mdzer pa
[\[132b.2\]]de snum pa nyid dang /_rmen bu'i mdog dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin no/_/blo dang ldan pas myur bar ni/_/'bad de gzhang 'brum gso bar bya/_/de yis gzhang ni myur bkag nas/_/dmu rdzing nad ni skye bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa'i sman pas myur
[\[132b.3\]]zhing rings par 'bad pa dang ldan pas gzhang 'brum gyi nad gso bar bya'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhang 'brum gyi nad des gzhang gi sgo myur du 'gags par byas nas/_'og nas bshad pa'i dmu rdzing gi nad gang yin pa des skyed cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin pas/_de'i
[\[132b.4\]]phyir nad de shin tu myur ba kho nar gso bar bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//_
[\[132b.5\]]de nas tshad par 'khru ba dang pho ba'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhang 'brum gyi nad gzhi'i 'og tu 'di brtsams pa'i 'brel pa ni/_zas dang rlung dag shugs dgag pa la sogs pa rgyu thun mong yin pas bshad pa yin no/_/nad gzhi sna re kun dang ni/_/
[\[132b.6\]]'jigs dang mya ngan las gyur pa'i/_/tshad par 'khru ba rnam drug yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshad par 'khru ba'i nad ni rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi sna re las gyur pa dang /_kun 'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du 'jigs pa las gyur pa dang /_mya ngan las gyur pa
[\[132b.7\]]ste/_tshad par 'khru ba ni rnam pa drug tu 'gyur ro/_/de ni chu 'thungs drags pa dang /_/sha rid sha skam ma goms pa'i/_/til gyi khu ba ma smin 'bru/_/chang rtsub kha zas tshod ma zin/_/gzhang 'brum snum bag drags pa dang /_/'bu dang shugs ni bkag las 'byung /_/zhes bya ba
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]la/_yang tshad par 'khru ba de ni chu 'thungs drags pa la sogs pa las shin tu skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang de bzhin du sha rid dang /_sha skam rul bag zos pa dang /_de bzhin du sngar za ma myong zhing ma zos par til btags pa'i khu ba zos
[\[133a.2\]]pa dang /_de bzhin du ma smin pa'i 'bru las byas pa'i kha zas zos pa dang /_chang rtsub cing mang bar 'thungs pa dang /_de bzhin du zas kyi tshod ma zin par gsud bag tu zos pa dang /_gzhang 'brum gyis btab pa dang /_snum bag mang du zos shing drags pa dang /_lto
[\[133a.3\]]na srin bu yod pa dang /_bshang ba la sogs pa'i shugs bkag pa las kyang chad par 'khru ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de 'dras rlung ni 'khrugs pa yis/_/chu khams thur du bskyod gyur la/_/de nyid kyis ni me drod nyams/_/de 'og khong pa khyab nas ni/_/bshang ba sla ba nyid
[\[133a.4\]]du byed/_/de ltar tshad 'khru 'byung bar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_'dir ma bshad pa de dang tshul mthun pa dag gis rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur nas/_chu'i khams lus la gang yod pa thur du bskyod cing 'byung bar byed par 'gyur la/_de'i 'og tu de'i khams
[\[133a.5\]]de nyid kyis pho ba'i me drod shin tu nyam chung bar byas nas/_de nas de'i 'og tu chu'i khams de nyid kyis lto ba'i nang bshang bas khyab par byas nas/_de nas bshang ba de sla zhing gsher bag nyid du byed par gyur te/_tshad par 'khru ba ni tshul de ltar 'byung ba yin
[\[133a.6\]]par bshad cing brtags pa yin no/_/de yi 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma ni/_/bshang lam snying ga lto bar zug_/lus snyom bshang ba sri ba dang /_/sbo zhing kha zas mi 'ju ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshad par 'khru ba de phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma'am rtags ni
[\[133a.7\]]bshang ba las gzhang kha'i phyogs dang snying ga dang lto ba'i phyogs su zug cing na ba dang /_lus dang yan lag snyom zhing lci ba dang /_bshang ba sri ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de las rlung gyur bshang chur bcas/_/nyung zhig 'byung zhing gzer sgra bcas/_/'gags
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]shing 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_/rtsub sla lbu bar bcas pa'am/_/gong bur yang dang yang du 'byung /_/de bzhin bu ram tshig pa 'dra/_/sbyin bag bcas shing bcad snyam sems/_/kha skam gzhang ni snad pa dang /_/spu langs pa dang 'khru ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshad par 'khru
[\[133b.2\]]ba de dag gi nang nas rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba ni bshang ba na ba dang chur bcas te/_chu rul ba lta bu 'byung ba dang /_mkhregs shing nyung zhig 'byung ba dang /_sgra dang bcas shing gzer ba dang bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_'gags shing ska bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba
[\[133b.3\]]dang /_mdog rtsub pa dang /_sla zhing rkyang rkyang por 'byung ba dang /_lbu ba dang 'dren mar 'byung ba dang /_gong bur chags shing bar bar na mdud pa yod pa 'dra bar 'byung ba dang /_yang dang yang du skad cig ma re rer 'byung ba dang /_de bzhin du bu ram tshig pa'i mdog 'dra
[\[133b.4\]]bar 'byung ba dang /_sbyin bag la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang ldan par 'khru ba yin no/_/mkhris pas ser zhing gnag pa dang /_/sngo zhing du ba'i mdog 'dra la/_/khrag bcas shin tu dri mnam pa/_/skom dad brgyal tshe rngul dang bcas/_/gzer bcas gzhang kha tsha dang bcas/_/
[\[133b.5\]]gzhang khar thor bu 'byung ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i tshad par 'khru ba ni/_'khru ba'i mdog ser po la sogs par 'khru bar 'gyur te/_tshig gi don ni go bar zad do/_/bad kan las gyur ska ba dang /_/'byar bag ska zhing nal nal po/_/snum zhing
[\[133b.6\]]be'u snabs bad kan bcas/_/rgyun du 'khru zhing lci la mnam/_/ska zhing nad rjes 'brang ba dang /_/gnyid che khong snyom yi ga 'chus/_/nyung zad nyung zad 'khru dang bcas/_/ba spu brtse zhing glongs bcas dang /_/chu so lto ba gzhang kha lci/_/bshang yang bshang ba ma btang snyam/_/zhes
[\[133b.7\]]bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i tshad par 'khru ba ni 'khru ba ska zhing gar gar por 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_'byar bag la sogs pa dang bcas par 'byung ba dang /_khong snyom pa ni bya ba rnams la spro ba chung ba'o/_/glongs pa ni nad rnams bskyod par gyur pa'o/_/lci ba ni chu so dang
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]lto ba dang gzhang kha kun tu lci zhing sbom pa snyam du sems pa'o/_/bshang yang bshang ba ma btang ba snyam du sems pa ni bshang ba bshang zhing 'dor du zin kyang khong lci bsam bshang ba snyam du sems shing yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun skyes
[\[134a.2\]]mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las skyes pa'i tshad par 'khru ba ni nad gzhi gsum char gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/'jigs pas sems ni 'khrugs gyur pa/_/rlung gis mkhris bcas bshang ba ni/_/sla byed de nas 'khru ba ni/_/tsha
[\[134a.3\]]zhing sla la 'phyo ba dang /_/mtshan ma rlung mkhris las byung 'dra/_/mya ngan las byung de dang 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_'jigs pa'i rgyus sems 'khrugs shing glongs par gyur pa rlung gis mkhris pa dang bcas pa'i bshang ba sla zhing gsher bar byed la/_de nas de'i 'og tu tshad par
[\[134a.4\]]'khru ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'khru ba'i rang bzhin tsha zhing dro ba dang /_sla zhing gar bag med pa dang /_'phyo zhing chur mi 'bying ba dang /_mtshan ma rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba dang 'dra ba yin par slob dpon rnams kyis bshad do/_/mya ngan las byung ba'i tshad par 'khru ba'i
[\[134a.5\]]mtshan nyid kyang rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i tshul de dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin par bshad do/_/mdor na tshad 'khru rnam gnyis te/_/ma zhur bcas dang ma zhu med/_/khrag bcas khrag med/_ces bya ba la/_tshad par 'khru ba ni mdor na rnam pa gnyis yin te/_smin
[\[134a.6\]]pa dang ma smin pa'i rnam pa'am/_khrag dang bcas pa'am khrag med pa'i rnam pas so/_/de las ni/_/dang po bshang gci chur 'bying 'gyur/_/dri mnam lto ni sbo ba dang /_/mkhregs shing mchil snabs shin tu mang /_/zhes bya ba la/_tshad par 'khru ba smin pa dang ma smin pa
[\[134a.7\]]de gnyis kyi nang nas/_dang po ma smin pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'khru bar 'byung ba'i bshang ba de rang bzhin lci zhing /_chu la bcug na nang du 'bying zhing nub par 'gyur ba dang /_dri mnam zhing nga ba dang /_lto sbo ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no/_/smin pa de las bzlog
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshang ba smin pa'i mtshan nyid de las go bzlog pa yin te/_bshang ba yang zhing chur mi 'bying ba dang /_lhag par dring ba med pa dang /_lto sbo ba la sogs pa med pa yin no/_/bad kan smin pa'ang chu nang 'bying /_/zhes bya ba la/_bad
[\[134b.2\]]kan gyi rgyu las tshad par 'khru ba ni/_smin zhing ma zhu ba med pa yin yang chu'i nang du 'bying bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/gang zhig tshad 'khru 'bad pa ni/_/med des pho ba'i nad du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang la tshad pa'i nad kyis thebs par gyur nas spang bar
[\[134b.3\]]bya ba'i dngos po spang bar bya ba la 'bad pa med par gyur na/_des grang ba la sogs pa'i pho ba'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/me drod nyams par byed pa yi/_/zas bsten pa yis me drod nyams/_/zhes bya ba la/_pho ba'i nad de yang khong pa'i me drod nyams par byed pa'i kha zas
[\[134b.4\]]dang btung ba bsten zhing longs spyod pa las me drod nyams shing grang ba'i pho ba'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/pho ba'i nad dang tshad par 'khru ba la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na/_de'i phyir smras pa ni/_gang zhig zhu nas bshang ba ni/_/be'u snabs bcas dang be'u snabs med/_/'khru
[\[134b.5\]]ba de ni tshad 'khru ste/_/rang bzhin gyis ni myur gsod byed/_/ces bya ba la/_nad kyi khyad par gang dag gis zas zhu bar gyur nas bshang ba be'u snabs dang bcas pa'am/_be'u snabs med pa'i rnam par 'khru bar gyur pa ni tshad par 'khru ba zhes bya ste/_de ni rang gi rang bzhin
[\[134b.6\]]gyis myur du gsod cing gnod par byed pa yin no/_/ma zhu kha zas ma zhu dang /_/zhu ba smin pa'ang mi 'khru 'gyur/_/rgyu med yang dang yang sri ba'am/_/rgyu med yang yang sla bar 'byung /_/pho bar ma zhu sogs shing 'khru/_/yun ring na bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_pho ba grang
[\[134b.7\]]ba'i ma zhu ba'i nad ni bshang ba ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs sam/_zas dang bcas par nges par 'khru bar 'gyur la/_zas zhu nas ni bshang ba sri bar 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas ma smin par 'khru bar 'gyur ro/_/yang rgyu med par glo bur du bshang ba de yang dang yang du sri ba dang /_
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]yang lan 'ga' ni rgyu med par bshang ba de sla bar yang dang yang du 'byung zhing 'khru bar 'gyur ro/_/yang pho ba'i ma zhu ba de ni yun ring du sogs shing bshang ba 'khru ba dang /_yun ring por na bar byed cing myur du gsod par mi byed pa yin no/_/de ni nad sna re re
[\[135a.2\]]'dus/_/las byung rnam pa bzhi yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_pho ba ma zhu ba'i nad de ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi re re nas skyes pa dang /_'dus pa las byung ba'i bzhi yin no/_/de yi sngon tshul snyom pa dang /_/ring nas 'ju zhing skyur bag 'byung /_/mchil
[\[135a.3\]]mang kha yis dri mi tshor/_/rmya snyom skom zhing yi ga 'chus/_/lto sbo slon ni bro ba dang /_/rna ba rgyu ma sgra dang bcas/_/zhes bya ba la/_pho ba ma zhu ba grang ba'i nad de phyis 'byung ba'i tshul ni yan lag snyom zhing nyam chung ba dang /_pho ba'i me drod zhan zhing zas rid nas 'ju ba dang /_
[\[135a.4\]]de bzhin du sgregs pa skyur bag 'byung ba la sogs pa yin no/_/spyi yi mtshan nyid skem pa dang /_/du ba mun dang rims kyis 'debs/_/brgyal zhing mgo na bshang ba 'gags/_/rkang pa lag pa skrangs par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_pho ba'i nad bzhi char gyi spyi'i thun mong
[\[135a.5\]]gi mtshan nyid ni lus skem zhing rid pa nas rkang pa dang lag pa skrangs par 'gyur ba'i bar yin par shes par bya'o/_/de la rlung la rkan skams shing /_/rab rib rna bar sgra 'byung dang /_/rtsib logs brla dang chu sor na/_/bshang ba yang dang yang du 'byung /_/yang yang
[\[135a.6\]]sbo zhing gsud pa dang /_/ro rnams kun la brkam pa dang /_/bkres skom rgyu ma bcad snyam sems/_/zas zhu nas ni sbo ba dang /_/zas zos nas ni bde bar 'gyur/_/rlung gi snying nad skran gzhang 'brum/_/mdzer pa skya rbab 'byung bar dogs/_/bshang ba 'byung
[\[135a.7\]]dka' ska slar 'byung /_/de yang be'u snabs sgra can 'byung /_/gzhang na lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la pho ba'i nad bzhi po'i nang nas rlung la sogs pa'i pho ba'i mtshan nyid ni rkan skams par 'gyur ba dang /_mig rab rib kyis 'debs pa dang /_rna
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]bar sgra zi zi por 'byung ba dang /_rtsib logs la sogs pa na bar 'gyur ba dang /_mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro rnams kun la brkam zhing chags pa dang /_rgyu ma bcad pa bzhin du sems shing na ba dang /_zas zhu nas lto sbo bar 'gyur ba dang /_de ltar na na bas
[\[135b.2\]]kha zas zos shing longs spyad na sla bar 'gyur ba dang /_rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad la sogs pa 'byung bar dogs shing yid gnyis su 'gyur ba dang /_yun ring zhig na bshang ba 'byung zhing thogs la na bar 'gyur ba dang /_ska ba dang sla ba la sogs pa'i khyad par
[\[135b.3\]]ldan par 'byung ba yin no/_/mkhris pa sngo zhing ser ba dang /_/ser po sla bag 'khru bar 'gyur/_/mnam zhing sgregs skyur snying lkog tsha/_/yi ga 'chus zhing skom dad che/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i pho ba'i nad ni 'khru ba sngo zhing ser ba 'dres mar 'byung ba'am/_
[\[135b.4\]]ser por 'byung ba la sogs pa yin no/_/bad kan las gyur 'ju dka' zhing /_/zas slon yi ga 'chus pa dang /_/khar chags mchil ma mang ba dang /_/lud pa snying nad cham pas 'debs/_/snying ga mer mer por sems shing /_/lto ba chor ba chung zhing lci/_/sgregs pa
[\[135b.5\]]dri mnam mngar 'byung snyom/_/bud med mi dga' me drod chung /_/be'u snabs bad kan 'dres par 'khru/_/bshang ba lci bar 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rid pa min yang nyams stobs chung /_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i pho ba ma zhu ba'i nad kyis 'khru ba ni/_kha zas 'ju
[\[135b.6\]]bar dka' zhing ring zhig nas 'ju bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs pa dang /_snying mer mer por gyur cing khengs pa snyam du sems pa dang /_lto bar tshor ba chung zhing lus lci ba dang /_sgregs pa mnam zhing shas che ba'i legs par mi 'byung ba dang /_yan lag
[\[135b.7\]]snyom pa dang /_bud med la dga' ba med cing nyal po la mi gdung ba dang me drod chung zhing bshang ba be'u snabs la sogs pa dang ldan par 'byung ba dang /_rid pa ma yin zhing sha ma zad kyang nyams stobs chung zhing nus pa zhan par 'gyur ba yin no/_/kun skyes mtshan nyid
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]'dren mar ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi gsum char las byung ba'i pho ba'i nad ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan zhing rtags kun tu 'dres pa yin no/_/ma snyoms la sogs me drod gsum/_/yan lag char phye gang bshad pa/_/de yang pho ba'i nad du 'gyur/_/
[\[136a.2\]]zhes bya ba la/_ma snyoms pa la sogs pa'i me drod gsum po ste/_me drod ma snyoms pa dang /_me drod shas che zhing rno ba dang /_zhan zhing rtul ba gsum po lus kyi gnas su yan lag char phye ba'i skabs su bshad pa gang yin pa de yang pho ba'i nad du 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin no/_/
[\[136a.3\]]snyoms pa bder gnas rgyu yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang me drod ma nyams shing snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni lus bde bar gnas shing nad med pa'i rgyu yin no/_/rlung nad rde'u nad mdze nad dang /_/gcin snyi dmu rdzing mtshan par rdol/_/gzhang 'brum pho nad ces bya brgyad/_/nad
[\[136a.4\]]chen gso bar dka' ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_pho ba'i nad kyi zhar la rlung nad la sogs pa brgyad po ni nad chen po yin zhing shin tu gso dka' ba yin par bshad pa yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'brel ba tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_
[\[136a.5\]]slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas gcin 'gags pa'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di brtsams pa'i 'grel pa ni 'di yin te/_dri ma reg pa'i
[\[136a.6\]]nad gzhi'i le'u bshad nas/_gci ba zhes bya ba'i dri ma dwangs pa'i nad gzhi'i le'u gnyis kyis bshad pa yin te/_gcin 'gags pa ni gcin sri ba la sogs pa ste/_de'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o zhes pa'o/_/lgang pa lgang pa'i mgo pho mtshan/_/rked pa rlig pa gzhang
[\[136a.7\]]kha ni/_/gzhang kha'i rus par brten gyur zhing /_/gcig tu 'brel ba yin par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_lgang pa la sogs pa lus kyi char gtogs pa rnams ni 'brel ba gcig cing mdor bsdus pa gcig yin par bshad la/_de dag gi gnas sam rten ni gzhang gi
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]nang na gnas te de dang 'brel lo zhes bya ba'i don no/_/lgang pa kha ni thur bltas kyang /_/gcin 'dzag pa yi rtsa sgo nas/_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag pa yis/_/ngos gnyis nas ni phre'us 'gengs/_/zhugs pa gang yin de yis ni/_/gcin 'gags pa dang gcin snyi
[\[136b.2\]]ba'i/_/gso dka' gnad la brten pa'i nad/_/nyi shu skyed par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir lgang pa de ni kha thur du bltas te gnas pa yin du zin kyang /_gcin 'dzag cing rgyu bar byed pa'i rtsa'i sbubs phra mo las rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag cing 'bab
[\[136b.3\]]par byed pa'i rtsa'i ngos gnyis na gnas pa de las gcin gyi phre'u 'dzag pas lgang pa 'gengs par byed la/_gang las zhugs pa'i rtsa de nyid kyi sgo nas rlung la sogs pa'i nad zhugs nas/_de las gcin 'gags pa'i nad nyi shu dang /_gcin snyi ba'i nad nyi shu gso zhing
[\[136b.4\]]bcos par dka' ba'i gnad kyi nad skyed par 'gyur ro/_/lgang pa chu so pho mtshan na/_/cung zad yang dang yang du 'byung /_/sri ba rlung las gyur pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba'i mtshan nyid ni/_skyes bu lgang pa dang chu so'i phyogs pho mtshan lhag par
[\[136b.5\]]na zhing /_/gcin cung zad yang dang yang du 'byung ba yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur ser tsha na/_/mdog dmar/_zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba'i gcin gyi mdog ser por 'byung ba'am/_mdog dmar zhing khrag 'dra bar 'byung la/_de dag
[\[136b.6\]]kyang tshab dang na ba dang bcas par 'byung ba yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa/_lgang pa pho mtshan lci zhing skrangs/_/'byar bag dal gyis 'byung zhing thogs/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin 'gags pa ni/_lgang pa dang pho mtshan gnyis lci ba dang /_
[\[136b.7\]]skrangs par 'gyur ba dang /_'byar bag dang bcas shing thogs pa dang bcas pas 'gags shing gcin 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nad kun las byung mtshan kun ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa'i gcin sri ba ni nad kyi mtshan nyid gsum car dang
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]ldan pa yin no/_/gang tshe rlung gis lgang pa'i kha/_/bkag pa de tshe gcin mkhris pa/_/bad kan khu chur bcas pa ni/_/rim gyis skams par byas pa las/_/mi bzad rde'u chags 'gyur te/_/ba lang mkhris par gi wang ltar/_/thams cad bad kan
[\[137a.2\]]la brten 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi tshe rlung gis nad 'khrugs par gyur nas/_lgang pa'i kha bkag nas gnas pa de'i tshe gcin mkhris pa dang bcas pa'am/_bad kan dang bcas pa'am/_khu chu dang bcas pa rim gyis skam par byed kyi/_gcin 'ba'
[\[137a.3\]]zhig skam par ni mi byed la/_de'i tshe ni rde'u chags par 'gyur te/_de yang mi bzad par na la/gso dka' zhing thogs par 'gyur ro/_/de yang dper na ba lang gi mkhris pa skam zhing 'thas pas rim gyis gi wang skye ba dang 'dra bar rde'u chags par 'gyur ro/_/de yang
[\[137a.4\]]thams cad bad kan la brten zhing gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'di yi sngon tshul mtshan nyid ni/_/lgang pa sbo zhing de yi ni/_/nye 'khor kun tu rab tu na/_/gcin yang lhag par dbre bro zhing /_/gcin 'gags rims 'debs yi ga 'chus/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas rde'u chags
[\[137a.5\]]pa 'di'i sngon byung ba'i mtshan nyid dam rtags ni lgang pa sbo zhing rgyas pa dang /_de bzhin du de'i nyen kor lgang pa'i mgo dang /_pho mtshan dang rlig pa la sogs pa kun tu thog thag rab tu na zhing zug pa dang /_gcin dbre ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/spyi yi mtshan nyid lte ba dang /_
[\[137a.6\]]lgang mgo lgang pa'i srubs na zhing /_/de yis gcin 'byung sgo bkag pas/_/gcin gyi rgyun ni 'chad cing 'byung /_/de byung zin nas bde bar byed/_/sla zhing ba lang tshil 'dra la/_/de bskyod pa yis khrag tu 'gyur/_/drag shul spyod pas rab tu na/_/zhes bya ba la/_spyi'i mtshan nyid
[\[137a.7\]]dang thun mong gi rtags ni lte ba la sogs par na zhing zug pa dang /_rde'u chags pa des gcin 'byung ba'i rgyun srang gi sgo bkag pas/_gcin gyi rgyun chad cing srus srus 'byung ba dang /_de byung zin zhing de dang bral nas bde bar byed pa yin pa'am/_yang na rde'u sa bkag pa
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]de bzhin du gyur na bde bar 'byung ba yin no/_/gcin 'byung ba de yang dwangs shing sla la ba lang gi tshil 'dra ba 'byung ngo /_/yang de bskyod cing rta la sogs pa'i bzhon pas g.yengs par gyur na khrag tu 'byung bar 'gyur la/_drag shul gyi spyod lam tshar bcad de rgyug pa'am/_smyung
[\[137b.2\]]ba byas pas rab tu na zhing mi bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de la rlung gyur shin tu na/_/so 'thams sdom zhing lus 'dar la/_/pho mtshan nyed cing lte ba 'tshir/_/rgyun du na zhing mkhun par byed/_/bshang ba 'phyen dang bcas par 'byung /_/gcin gyi thigs pa yang yang 'ong /_/rde'u gnag
[\[137b.3\]]cing rtsub pa dang /_/chu sor tsher mas gang snyam byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rde'u chags pa de rnams kyi nang nas rlung las gyur pa'i rde'u chags par gyur pa ni/_shin tu na bas gzir zhing de nyid kyis na so 'thams par sdom zhing krig krig 'cha' bar 'gyur ba dang /_lus 'dar zhing
[\[137b.4\]]bskyod pa dang /_pho mtshan nyed par byed pa dang /_lte ba'i phyogs lag pa gnyis kyis 'tshir par byed pa dang /_nyin mtshan rgyun du mkhun zhing nga ro 'byin pa dang /_bshang ba 'phyen dang bcas par 'byung ba la sogs pa yin no/_/mkhris pas lgang pa tsha ba dang /_/btsos pa
[\[137b.5\]]snyam byed rab tu dro/_/go bye'i 'bras bu'i dbyibs 'dra la/_/rde'u mdog dmar zhing ser la gnag_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rde'u chags pas ni lgang pa shin tu na zhing btsos pa snyam byed la/_de bzhin du rab tu dro ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rde'u'i
[\[137b.6\]]dbyibs kyang bse shing gi 'bras bu'i dbyibs dang 'dra la/_rde'u'i kha dog kyang dmar ser du 'dug cing rtsa gnag pa yin no/_/bad kan gyis bsil lci ba dang /_/lgang pa'i nang du zug cing na/_/rde'u che zhing 'jam pa la/_/sbrang rtsi'i mdog gam yang na dkar/_/zhes bya ba
[\[137b.7\]]la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i rde'u chags pas ni reg na bsil ba dang rang bzhin lci ba dang /_lgang pa'i nang lag pas mnyes shing btsugs pa ltar na ba la sogs pa yin no/_/'di dag byis pa rnams la ni/_/phal cher 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/gnas dang
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]sha ni chung ba'i phyir/_/bzung dang dbyung ba bde ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rde'u chags pa gsum po 'di dag ni phal cher ram/_mang du byis pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/de yang byis pa rnams la 'byung ba ni rde'u bzung ba dang dbyung
[\[138a.2\]]ba bde ba yin no/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gnas dang sha chung ba'i phyir te/_lgang pa chung ba nyid kyi phyir dang /_sha chung zhing srab pa'i phyir bzung ba dang /_dbyung ba gnyis ka bde ba yin no/_/mi chen khu ba las byung rde'u/_/khu ba bkag pas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gnas las
[\[138a.3\]]'phos pa phyir ma byung /_/rlig par gnas pa rlung gis ni/_/skams nas nye bar bsdus gyur pa/_/de ni khu ba rde'u chags yin/_/lgang par gcin ni sri byed cing /_/tsha zhing skrang bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi chen po lta bu las byung ba'i rde'u 'byung bar 'gyur la/_de
[\[138a.4\]]yang khu ba bkag pa'i gzhi las byung la/_de yang khu ba gnas las 'phos par gyur cing /_nyal po spyad pa'i bar chad du gyur pas/_phyi ma lam log par song ba de rlig pa dag gi bar na gnas pas na/_rlung gis bsdus te khu ba de skams nas gong por byas pa de ni khu
[\[138a.5\]]ba'i rde'u chags pa zhes bya la/_de yang lgang par gcin sri ba la sogs par byed cing rlig pa skrang bar byed pa yin no/_/de ni skyes ma thag tu ni/_/khu ba zhu ste sla bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rde'u skyes ma thag ring po ma lon par khu ba zhu zhing sla bag tu 'byung bar 'gyur
[\[138a.6\]]ro/_/phyogs der mnan na zhu bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rde'u de phyogs gang du chags pa'i phyogs der mnan pa tsam gyis zhu zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rde'u gseg ma lta bur gnas/_/rlung gis phye mar bshig gyur pa/_/de 'dir tshul bzhin 'byung zhes bya/_/gcin
[\[138a.7\]]dang lhan cig phyir 'byung 'gyur/_/lugs bzhin mi 'byung rde'u chags/_/zhes bya ba la/_khu ba rde'u chags pa rlung gis phye mar bshig pa ni/_gseg ma lta bu zhes bya ste gseg ma phye ma lta bu de rlung tshul bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur bas ni gcin dang lhan cig phyir 'byung
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]bar 'gyur la/_rlung lugs bzhin mi 'byung ste/_'khyil na ni rde'u chags par byed kyi/_gcin dang lhan cig phyir 'byung bar mi byed do/_/gcin ni bkag par byas gyur pas/_/rlung gis lgang ba'i kha bkag nas/_/gcin 'gags na zhing g.ya' bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba
[\[138b.2\]]la/_skyes bus gcin 'byung ba nan gyis bkag par gyur pas de'i skyon gyis rlung gis lgang pa'i sgo bkag nas gcin 'gags shing g.ya' ba'i nad skyed par 'gyur ro/_/lan 'ga' rang gnas las spangs nas/_/lgang pa rgyas te kha che zhing /_/mngal 'dra sbom zhing
[\[138b.3\]]log par 'dug_/der ni na zhing tsha bar byed/_/'phar zhing gcus pa snyam du sems/_/thigs pa tsam du 'dzag pa dang /_/lgang btsir rgyun ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rnam pa gnyis po 'di dag ni/_/rlung gi lgang pa'i nad ces bya/_/gso dka' gnyis pa rlung gi yin/_/
[\[138b.4\]]mthu che shin tu gso dka' yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rlung lan 'ga' ste/_tshe 'di'am/_tshe rabs gzhan gyi rgyu'i dbang gis rang gi 'dug pa'i gnas las spangs shing bskyod de/_lgang pa de rgyas par byas nas kha'i zheng che ba mngal 'dra ba dang /_sbom zhing log par
[\[138b.5\]]'dug pa rang gi tshad las che la gnas las 'phos te log par 'dug par gyur na lgang pa der na ba la sogs par 'gyur la/_gcin thogs pa tsam du nyung zhig 'dzag par 'gyur la/_lgang pa btsir na rgyun du 'bab cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rnam pa gnyis po
[\[138b.6\]]de dag ni rlung las gyur pa'i lgang pa'i nad ces bya ba'o/_/de ni gso dka' ba yin la/_de gnyis las kyang gnyis pa ni rlung shas che ba'i phyir shin tu yang gso dka' ba yin no/_/bshang lam dang ni lgang pa yi/_/bar na rlung ni brten gyur pa/_/gtun 'dra sra zhing mtho
[\[138b.7\]]ba dang /_/mi 'gyur gnas byed mdud pa can/_/rlung nad gtun 'dra de sbos bcas/_/bshang gci 'phyen ni 'gag byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshang ba'i lam dang gzhang dang lgang pa'i bar na rlung brten zhing gnas par 'gyur ba de ni gtun 'dra zhing de'i rnam pa can
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]yin la/_gzhan yang mtho zhing mthug la mi 'gyur bar gnas pa'i mdud pa can lta bu de ni lto sbos pa dang bcas pa'i nad skyed par 'gyur ro/_/log rgyu 'khyil bar byed pa yi/_/rlung gis chu sor mi bzad gzer/_/gcin la zhugs te 'khyil
[\[139a.2\]]byed cing /_/rengs byed lci zhing gcus snyam byed/_/gcin ni nyung shas nyung shas 'byung /_/yang na bshang gci gtong tshe 'byung /_/'di ni rlung nad 'khyil ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung thur du rgyu ba'i lam 'gags te 'khyil nas zlum por gnas pa de chu sor brten
[\[139a.3\]]par gyur na/_mi bzad pa'i gzer bskyed de gcin la zhugs nas gcin de 'khyil zhing sri bar byed pa la sogs pa'i tshul byed pa'am/_yang na gcin nyung shas nyung shas 'dzag par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu'i rlung las gyur pa'i gcin nad de ni 'khyil pa zhes
[\[139a.4\]]bya ba yin no/_/gcin ni yun ring bkag gyur pa/_/sri zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/_/gcin thon nas ni nad tshabs 'bri/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang gcin yun ring zhig bkag cing brnag par gyur pa ni phyis gtong ba'i tshe sri zhing bde blag tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur la
[\[139a.5\]]de ni gcin thon nas nad tshabs 'bri ba'i gcin nad ces bya'o/_/gcin bkag pa yis gnod gyur pa/_/gang tshe rlung gis bzlog gyur pa/_/lte ba'i 'og nas lte ba'i bar/_/gcin gyis gang gyur de yi tshe/_/rab tu na zhing sbo pa dang /_/zas mi zhu zhing me drod 'gags/_/
[\[139a.6\]]de ni ltor gcin 'gags zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin bkag cing brnag pa'i skyon gyis nad du gyur pa de ni dus gang gi tshe rlung gis gyen du bzlog par gyur pa'i tshe lte ba'i 'og nas lte ba'i bar du na ba la sogs pa'i nad skyed par 'gyur te/_de ni lte bar gcin
[\[139a.7\]]'gags pa zhes bya'o/_/gcin 'byung bu ga 'chus pa 'am/_/rlung gis bkag nas gcin nyung 'byung /_/lgang pa mtshan sbubs nor bur ni/_/gnas nas de 'og rim gyis 'dzag_/nad bcas pa'am nad med pa/_/gcin ni chad dang bcas par 'byung /_/lhag ma
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]lus te mtshan lci yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin 'byung ba'i bu ga 'chus pa la sogs pa'i skyon nam/_yang na rlung gis bkag pas gcin nyung du 'byung zhing sri bar 'gyur ba dang /_de yang lgang pa'am mtshan gyi sbubs sam/_pho mtshan gyi rtse mo nor bu zhes
[\[139b.2\]]bya ba la gnas nas rim gyis 'dzag par 'gyur zhing /_de nad dang bcas pa'am nad med par gcin chad cing sri bag dang bcas pas 'byung la/_'byung ba'i lhag ma lus pas de mtshan lci bar 'gyur ba yin te pho mtshan khong lci ba'o/_/lgang pa'i kha nang zlum
[\[139b.3\]]zhing sra/_/cung zhig 'phral du 'byung 'gyur na/_/gcin sogs rde'u lta bu ni/_/gcin gyi mdud par de bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_lgang pa'i kha'i nang zlum por gnas la sra bar gyur cing cung zhig 'phral du 'byung la/_de lta bu'i nad de ni rde'u sa 'gags pa lta bur
[\[139b.4\]]na la/_mtshan ma de lta bur na ba la ni gcin gyi mdud pa zhes bya'o/_/gcin snyoms pa las nyal po byas/_/rlung gis khu ba bskyod gyur pa/_/gnas las bskyod cing gcin gtong tshe/_/sngon nam phyi nas thal chu dang /_/mdog 'dra 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/khu ba
[\[139b.5\]]'dres par de bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin snyoms shing 'byung bar 'dod pa dang /_skyes pas bud med la nyal po byas nas rlung gis khu ba bskyod cing g.yos par gyur pas gnas las bskyod cing 'phos par gyur pa de gcin gtong ba'i gcin gyi sngon du'am
[\[139b.6\]]gcin gyi phyi nas thal chu dang mdog 'dra bar gyur pa de ni khu ba dang gcin 'dres pa zhes bya'o/_/rtsub cing skem la rlung gis ni/_/gang tshe rtug skam nad gyur pa/_/gcin 'byung bu gar song nas ni/_/bshang ba dang 'dres de yi tshe/_/gcin ni bshang ba'i dri can 'byung /_/bshang
[\[139b.7\]]ba 'gags par de bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu khong rtsub cing skem por gyur pa dag rlung gi nad kyis gang gi tshe rtug skam gyi nad du 'gyur zhing gyen du bskyur bar gyur pa na/_de'i tshe gcin 'byung ba'i bu gar song zhing kun tu khyab pa dang /_bshang ba dang gcin 'dres
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]par gyur la/_des na gcin de bshang ba'i dri ma can du 'gyur zhing 'byung la/_de lta bu'i gcin sri ba de ni bshang ba 'gags pa'i gcin sri ba zhes bya bar bshad do/_/mkhris pa drag shul kha zas ni/_/rno tsha nyi tshan la sogs kyis/_/'phel zhing
[\[140a.2\]]rlung ni zhugs gyur pa/_/lgang pa'i nyen kor tsha zhing na/_/gcin ni ser por 'gyur ba'am/_/yang na khrag bcas khrag nyid 'byung /_/tsha zhing sri la yang yang 'byung /_/de ni tsha rlung zhes byar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris pa'i shas che zhing rtsol ba drag po la sogs
[\[140a.3\]]pas rlung zhugs pas bskyod par gyur pa la ni lgang pa'i nyen kor tsha ba la sogs pa'i nad 'byung ste/_de ni gcin sri ba'i tsha rlung zhes bya ba yin no/_/rtsub cing lus ni rmya ba yi/_/lgang par gnas pa'i mkhris pa rlung /_/gcin zad tsha dang na bar bcas/_/skyed pa de
[\[140a.4\]]yang de skad bshad/_/bad kan mkhris pa gnyis ka la/_/rlung gis bskyod par gyur na ni/_/de tshe gcin sri ser ba dang /_/dmar zhing dkar la ska ba 'byung /_/de ni tsha bcas gi wang ngam/_/dung gi phye ma'i mdog 'dra 'am/_/yang na skam zhing mdog kun ldan/_/de ni
[\[140a.5\]]gcin nyams nad du bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_skyes bu khong rtsub cing lus rmya zhing nyam chung bar gyur pa la/_gang gi tshe lgang par gnas pa'i mkhris pa dang /_rlung gnyis ni gcin zad pa la sogs pa skyed par byed de/_de yang mkhris pa dang rlung las gyur pa'i gcin
[\[140a.6\]]sri ba'i nad ces bya bar de skad du bshad do/_/yang gang gi tshe mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis la yang rlung gis bskyod cing g.yos par gyur pa de'i tshe/_gcin shas cher sri zhing kha dog ser po la sogs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de yang tsha ba dang bcas shing gi wang la
[\[140a.7\]]sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i mdog gam/_yang na skam zhing mdog thams cad dang ldan par 'byung ste/_de ni gcin nyams pa'i nad ces bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/de ltar gcin 'gags las byung ba'i/_/mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad nas ni/_/
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]de 'og gcin snyi las byung ba'i/_/nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis sngar rnam par spyad pa'i tshul gyis gcin 'gags shing sri ba las byung ba'i nad kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad cing bstan nas/_/de'i
[\[140b.2\]]'og tu gcin snyi zhing 'dzag pa las byung ba'i nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid drang srong rnams kyis bshad pa yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_
[\[140b.3\]]nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas gcin snyi ba za khu'i nad dmigs bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di brtsams pa'i 'brel pa ni/_de 'og gcin snyi ba las byung ba'i nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid bshad
[\[140b.4\]]pa yin no zhes gzhung rtsom pa nyid kyis bshad pa las shes par bya'o/_/gcin snyi'i nad ni nyi shu ste/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin snyi ba'i nad ni nyi shur 'gyur ro/_/ste zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o/_/de la bad kan las gyur bcu/_/mkhris pa las drug rlung gyur bzhi/_/
[\[140b.5\]]zhes bya ba la/_de la gcin snyi ba'i nad nyi shu las/_gcin nad za khu bcu ni bad kan las gyur pa yin te/_chu 'dra ba dang /_bu ram shing gi khu ba 'dra ba dang /_gar po dang /_chang 'dra ba dang /_'bras btags pa'i chu 'dra ba dang /_khu chu 'dra ba dang /_bye ma
[\[140b.6\]]lta bu dang /_bsil mo dang /_bags kyis 'byung ba dang /_kha chu ltar 'byung ba'i za khu zhes bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa ni drug ste/_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal chu 'dra ba dang /_sngon po dang /_nag po dang /_skyer pa 'dra ba dang /_btsod khu 'dra ba dang /_khrag
[\[140b.7\]]'dra ba ste rnam pa drug yin no/_/rlung las gyur pa ni bzhi ste/_zhag dang /_rkang dang /_glang po che'i za khu dang /_sbrang rtsi lta bu'i gcin snyi ba'i nad do/_/de rnams tshil gcin bad kan skyed/_/zas dang skom gyi tshul las ni/_/phal cher de dag 'byung bar byed/_/mngar
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang /_/lci zhing 'byil la bsil ba dang /_/'bru mar chang dang gsher ba'i sha_/dar ba bu ram bu ram shing /_/gnas gcig stan gcig la rtag gnas/_/mal stan cho gar mi ldan la/_/brten nad gcin snyi'i nad skyed
[\[141a.2\]]byed/_/ces bya ba la/_gcin snyi ba'i nad nyi shu po de dag ni las dang kha zas dang /_spyod tshul dang gcin dang bad kan skyed par byed pa de las byung zhing /_phal cher te mang du de dag 'byung zhing /_gcin snyi ba'i nad skyed par byed pa'i rgyu yin la/_gzhan yang
[\[141a.3\]]mngar ba nas bu ram shing gi bar gyi dngos po ming gis smos pa'i zas dang skom yang de 'byung bar byed pa yin la/_spyod lam gyi rnam pa gnas gcig dang stan gcig la rtag tu gnas pa la sogs pa'i bya ba des bskyed par gtogs pa dang /_mal stan cho ga dang mi
[\[141a.4\]]ldan pa ste stan rlan can dang grang ba la sogs pa'i lam na gnas pa las gcin nad skyed par byed par 'gyur ro/_/bad kan 'khrugs pas lgang bar gcin/_/snyi 'gyur lus gsher rngul tshil dang /_/sha glongs lgang par brten gcin snyi/_/mkhris pas khrag
[\[141a.5\]]kyang zad byas nas/_/bad kan sogs zad gcin nad skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan 'khrugs par gyur pa las lus kyi gsher ba ga dang rngul la sogs pas glongs shing gnod par byas la/_khrag kyang zad par byas nas bad kan las gyur pa yang zad par byas
[\[141a.6\]]te/_gcin la gnas pa'i mkhris pas gcin nad za khu skyed par byed do/_/rlung 'khrugs pa dang de zad las/_/lus zungs lgang par 'khus te skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_lus zungs rnams la rlung 'khrugs shing ldang ba dang /_mkhris pa la sogs pa zad pas
[\[141a.7\]]dwangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs lus kyi bcud du gyur pa lgang par 'khus shing 'dus par byas nas gcin snyi ba'i nad skyed par byed do/_/de byung gso bya 'tsho tsam dang /_/spang bya gcin nad rnam gsum 'gyur/_/mdor na mi mthun bya ba dang /_/nad dmigs
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]chen po nyid kyis 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan dang mkhris pa dang rlung de dag las byung ba'i gcin snyi ba'i nad ni gso bar bya ba dang /_re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du gnas pa dang spang bar bya ba ste/_rnam pa gsum du 'gyur la/_de yang mdor na mi mthun par bya ba ste/_
[\[141b.2\]]gang gi phyir snum pa la sogs pa rlung nad la phan pa de ni bad kan la gnod la/_gang kha ba dang bska ba la sogs pa bad kan la phan pa de ni rlung la gnod do/_/de bzhin du mkhris pa la phan pa bsil ba dang /_mngar ba dag ni rlung dang bad kan la gnod de/_gzhan
[\[141b.3\]]yang nad dmigs chen po'i dpyad kyis kyang 'byung ste/_mi mthun pa gso bas lus zungs zad cing skem pa'i lus 'jig par byed pa'i nad dmigs chen po'i tshul gyis kyang 'byung ngo /_/de rnams kyi ni spyi'i mtshan nyid/_/gcin ni rnyog ma can du 'byung /_/gnod
[\[141b.4\]]dang gnod bya khyad med kyang /_/de dus khyad par nyid dang ni/_/gcin gyi mdog sogs dbye ba yis/_/gcin snyi'i dbye ba brtag par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad de thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid dang /_rtags ni gcin rnyog ma can dul dul po mang du 'byung
[\[141b.5\]]bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/gcin snyi'i dbye ba du mar 'gyur ba de ni 'dus shing phrad pa'i khyad par nyid de/_gnod pa dang gnod par bya ba'i 'phel 'bri'i khyad par nyid dang /_gcin gyi mdog dang ro dang dri dang reg bya'i khyad par las gcin snyi ba'i dbye ba brtag par
[\[141b.6\]]bya zhing yongs su shes par bya'o/_/dang zhing mang la dkar zhing bsil/_/dring med cing chu 'dra la/_/gcin snyi chu yi za khu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin snyi ba'i nad chu'i za khu zhes bya ba ni dang zhing rnyog ma med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i chu'i rnam
[\[141b.7\]]pa dang 'dra ba'i gcin 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/cung zad rnyog can sbyin bag can/_/bu ram shing khu lta bur mngar/_/za khu bu ram shing khu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad za khu bu ram shing khu lta bu ni cung zad rnyog pa yod pa la sogs pa la bu ram shing
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]gi khu ba ltar shin tu mngar ba'i gcin 'byung ba yin no/_/zhag lon na ni ska bar 'gyur/_/za khu gar po zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad za khu gar po ni gcin mtshan mo 'das kyi bar du ma gcis par bzhag pa ste ska ba
[\[142a.2\]]gar por 'byung ba yin no/_/steng na dwangs ma 'og na ska/_/chang 'dra chang gi za khu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad chang gi za khu zhes bya ba la phyir 'byung ba na steng gi phyogs dwangs mar gnas shing 'og ska bar 'gyur ba yin te/_de lta bu'i gcin 'byung ba la
[\[142a.3\]]bya'o/_/ba spu ldang zhing 'bras btags 'dra/_/dkar zhing mang 'byung 'bras phye 'dra/_zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad za khu 'bras phye 'dra ba ni/_gcin 'byung ba na ba spu ldang zhing ba shor la/_gcin nyid 'bras btags pa 'dra ba dkar por 'byung zhing mang du
[\[142a.4\]]'byung ba yin no/_/khu chu 'dra ba'am khu ba 'dres/_/khu ba 'dra ba'i za khu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad za khu khu chu 'dra ba ni gcin khu ba dang bcas par 'byung ba'am/_khu ba dang 'dra bar gcis pa la bya'o/_/gcin ni bye tshigs dri ma can/_/bye ma'i
[\[142a.5\]]za khu zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad bye ma'i za khu zhes bya ba ni bye ma'i tshigs ma 'dra bar dri ma lus pa'i gzugs can 'dra ba dag tu 'byung ba yin no/_/gcin snyi mang du 'byung zhing bsil/_/mngar ba de bsil za khu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin
[\[142a.6\]]nad bsil ba'i za khu zhes bya ba ni gcin 'byung ba'i reg pa bsil zhing mang du 'byung la/_ro mngar ba dag tu 'byung ba yin no/_/dal gyis nyung zad nyung zad 'byung /_/bags kyis 'byung ba'i za khu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad bags kyis 'byung ba'i za khu
[\[142a.7\]]zhes bya ba ni gcin 'byung ba'i rgyun dal gyis nyung zad nyung zad du chad cing chad cing 'byung ba yin no/_/kha chu 'dra ba'i nal nal po/_/'byil bag kha chu'i za khu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad za khu 'dra ba ni kha chu 'dra bar za khu nal nal por 'byung zhing 'byar bag
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]can du 'byung ba yin no/_/de ltar bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba bcur bshad pa yin no/_/dri ro kha dog reg bya ni/_/nas tshig 'khus 'dra nas tshig can/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba 'dra ba ni nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba'i chu dang dri
[\[142b.2\]]dang ro la sogs pa 'dra zhing mtshungs pa la bya'o/_/za khu sngon po kha dog sngo/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad za khu sngon po zhes bya ba ni 'dab ma sngon po'i khu ba 'dra ba'i gcin 'byung ba la bya'o/_/za khu nag po snag tsha 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_za khu nag po ni snag tsha'i
[\[142b.3\]]mdog ltar gcin nag po 'byung ba la bya'o/_/gcin snyi tsha zhing mdog ser ba/_/de ni skyer pa 'dra ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad za khu skyer pa 'dra ba ni gcin tsha zhing gcin gyi mdog skyer pa'i khu ba 'dra bar 'byung ba yin no/_/mnam zhing btsod kyi khu ba 'dra/_/
[\[142b.4\]]btsod kyi za khu zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_za khu btsod 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni dri mnam zhing btsod kyi khu ba 'dra ba mnam pa'i gcin 'byung ba la bya'o/_/dri nga tsha zhing lan tshwar bcas/_/khrag 'dra khrag gi za khu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_za khu khrag 'dra ba ni dri nga
[\[142b.5\]]zhing mnam la tsha tseg tseg byed pa dang /_cung zad lan tshwa bro ba dang /_khrag gi mdog 'dra bar 'byung ba yin te/_de ltar na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad drug bshad pa yin no/_/zhag gi za khu zhag dang 'dres/_/zhag nyid gcin du 'byung ba yin/_/
[\[142b.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_za khu zhag 'dra ba ni zhag 'dren mar 'byung ba'am/_zhag nyid gcin gyi rnam par 'byung ba yin no/_/rkang 'dres pa'am rkang nyid ni/_/yang dang yang 'byung rkang za khu/_/zhes bya ba la/_za khu rkang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni rkang dang 'dres pa dang /_
[\[142b.7\]]rkang nyid yang dang yang du gcin du za khur 'byung ba ni gcin nad rkang 'dra ba'i za khu zhes bya'o/_/glang chen myos ltar rgyun du ni/_/gcin shugs dal bar 'byung 'gyur la/_/chu ser bcas shing rnyog bcas 'byung /_/glang chen za khu zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]glang po che'i za khu ni glang po che dregs pas myos pa ltar rgyun du 'byung zhing gcin gyi shugs dal gyis 'dzag cing 'byung bar 'gyur la/_chu ser dang bcas par 'byung zhing 'dzag par 'gyur ba la bya'o/_/sbrang rtsi'i za khu sbrang rtsi 'dra/_/zhes bya ba
[\[143a.2\]]la/_za khu sbrang rtsi 'dra ba zhes bya ba sbrang rtsi dang 'dra zhing ro yang bska ba dang mngar bar 'byung ba yin no/_/de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/_/lus zungs zad pas rlung 'khrugs pa'am/_/nad kyis rtsa sbubs bkag ste 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i
[\[143a.3\]]za khu de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes grags te/_lus zungs rnams zad pa las/_rlung 'khrugs pas nad du gyur ba ni rnam pa gcig yin no/_/yang na nad gzhi gsum gang yang rung bas rtsa sbubs bkag ste/_rlung rgyur ma ster ba
[\[143a.4\]]las byung ba ni rnam pa gnyis yin no/_/nad kyis bkag pa'i mtshan ma dag_/de ni rgyu med par 'byung zhing /_/skad cig zad stong gang 'gyur ba/_/gso bar dka' ba nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_za khu sbrang rtsi 'dra ba zhes bya ba de rlung la sogs pa'i
[\[143a.5\]]nad kyis lgang pa'i kha bkag cing /_sbu gu 'gags par byas pa'i mtshan ma'am/_rtags ni 'byung zhing skye ba'i rgyu med par skad cig cing stong par 'gyur la/_stong pa nyid las kyang ched 'ga' 'gengs shing gang ba lta bur snang bar 'gyur te/_de ni gso
