[\[143a.6\]]bar dka' ba nyid yin no/_/thams cad dus sum bcos na/_/sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i za khur 'gyur/_/gang zhig thams cad mngar 'gyur bas/_/phal cher sbrang rtsi'i za khu yin/_/sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya kun/_/mngar ba las ni bshad pa yin/_/zhes
[\[143a.7\]]bya ba la/_gcin nad za khu thams cad kyang sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_de thams cad dus su ma bcos shing ma gsos na sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i za khur 'gyur ba dang /_yang gang zhig gcin nad thams cad mngar ba'i bag las mngar
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]ba las 'gyur zhing /_phal cher sbrang rtsi lta bu'i mdog can yin pas sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya ba'i sgrar bshad do/_/zas mi 'ju zhing yi ga 'chus/_/slon lud gnyid che cham pas 'debs/_/bad kan las byung za khu la/_/bla brnan de dag 'byung
[\[143b.2\]]bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las byung ba'i za khu la ni zas mi 'ju ba la sogs pa'i bla brnan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/pho mtshan lgang par zug pa dang /_/rlig 'bras bye zhing rims kyis 'debs/_/tsha skyur skom dad brgyal dang 'khrugs/_/
[\[143b.3\]]mkhris pa las gyur bla brnan yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin nad la ni pho mtshan dang lgang pa'i phyogs su khab kyis phug pa ltar zug pa dang /_rlig 'bras bye bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i bla brnan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung las skyes
[\[143b.4\]]pa'i snying 'phar zhing /_/lus 'dar snying na zas la brkam/_/gzer zhing gnyid med skem pa dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i za khu'i nad la ni snying 'phar ba la sogs pa'i bla brnan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kham
[\[143b.5\]]phor rus sbal 'dra ba can/_/sgu bo me dbal phra mo dang /_/sran chung 'dra dang yungs kar 'dra/_/bu bcas 'byung dang bi da ri/_/khong 'bras zhes bya'i 'bras 'brum bcu/_/gcin nad ma bcos pa las 'byung /_/tshigs dang gnad dang sha che ba'i/_/srog
[\[143b.6\]]gi gnas su 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad za khu de ma bcos pa las ni kham phor 'dra ba la sogs pa'i 'bras kyi nad bcu po 'byung bar 'gyur la/_de yang khyad par du ni tshigs dang gnad rnams dang /_sha che ba la sogs pa srog gi
[\[143b.7\]]gnas su 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/_/mtha' ma mtho zhing dbus ma dma'/_/gnag cing rnag dang nad bcas pa/_/dbyibs dang tshad ni kham phor 'dra/_/nor bu kham phor zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bras gang mtha' ma kun nas mtho zhing
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]dbus ma dma' bar 'dug pas kham phor gyi dbyibs 'dra la/_kha dog gnag cing rnag dang nad du bcas pa ni 'bras sam thor bu kham phor lta bu zhes bya'o/_/nang du zug cing na byed la/_/nye 'khor dag tu cher mched cing /_/
[\[144a.2\]]'jam zhing rus sbal rgyab 'dra ba'i/_/'bras nad rus sbal can zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rus sbal can zhes bya ba'i 'bras nad ni nang du shas cher zug cing na bar byed la/_rtsa'i nye 'khor du mched cing sbom pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa
[\[144a.3\]]yin no/_/sra zhing rtsa yi dra ba can/_/snum zhing 'dzag la khyon che ba/_/na zhing nang zug bu ga ni//phra mor ldan pa dra ba can/_/zhes bya ba la/_thor bu du ba can zhes bya ba ni/sra zhing rtsub pa dang /_rtsa ris kyi dra bas khebs pa dang /_snum pa
[\[144a.4\]]la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yin no/_/nang du zug cing na la rnags/_/rgyab bam lto ba dag tu ni/_/thor bu chen po kha dog gnag_/sgu bor 'dug pas sgu bor bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_'bras nad sgur po zhes bya ba ni/_nad tshabs che
[\[144a.5\]]zhing nang du zug la rnag kyang nang du rnags pa ni/_rgyab la sogs pa'i phyogs gang yang rung bar skye ba yin no/_/skyes ma thag tu pags pa tsha/_/shin tu na byed me dbal te/_/dmar zhing gnag la gas pa dang /_/tsha zhing rmugs byed me dbal phra/_/
[\[144a.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_me dbal phra mo zhes bya ba'i nad ni skyes ma thag gi rjes thogs nyid la pags pa tsha zhing bsregs pa snyam du sems la/_shin tu na ba'i me dbal kun tu mched par byed cing mdog dmar ba la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yin
[\[144a.7\]]no/_/sran chung 'dra ba'i tshad dang dbyibs/_/mnyam pas sran chung can yin te/_/tshad dang dbyibs ni yungs kar 'dra/_/myur du smin zhing nad tshabs che/_/zhes bya ba la/_'brum bu sran chung zhes bya ba ni tshad dang dbyibs sran chung dang 'dra ba
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]yin no/_/de bzhin du tshad dang dbyibs yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran yang yod de/_de ni myur du smin zhing nad tshabs che ba yin no/_/yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis/_/yongs su bskor bas chu bur can/_/bu bcas che zhing mang
[\[144b.2\]]ba la/_/rab phra'i 'brum bus khyab gyur pa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bras nad bu bcas zhes bya ba ni yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis yongs su bskor cing /_de bzhin du lhun che ba dang /_mang zhing shin tu phra ba dang /_du mas
[\[144b.3\]]khyab cing g.yogs pa yin no/_/ldum bu bi da ri ltar zlum/_/sra ba bi da ri zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bi da ri zhes bya ba'i 'bras nad ni ldum bu bi da ri zhes bya ba'i dbyibs ltar zlum por gnas la/_rdo ltar shin tu sra ba yin no/_/khong
[\[144b.4\]]'bras gzhan du bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khong 'bras zhes bya ba'i nad ni skabs gzhan du bshad de/_'di'i rjes thogs kyi le'u las bshad pa yin no/_/de la dang po'i 'bras nad gsum/_/bu bcas dang ni bi da ri/_/tshil
[\[144b.5\]]chen las byung brnag dka' yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la 'bras kyi nad 'di dag gi nang nas dang po'i gsum po khar thor zhes bya ba dang /_rus sbal zhes bya ba dang /_dra ba can zhes bya ba gsum dang /_bu bcas dang bi da ri zhes bya ba lnga po
[\[144b.6\]]gal te tshil che ba'i mi la byung na brnag par dka' zhing nad tshabs che ba yin no/_/gzhan dag mkhris pa shas che zhing /_/tshil chung las byung brnag nus 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_snga ma las gzhan pa'i 'bras nad lhag ma lnga po mkhris pa'i nad
[\[144b.7\]]las byung zhing /_mi tshil chung ba las byung ba yin na/_de ni brnag nus shing nad tshabs chung la gso sla ba yin no/_/de rnams nad shas ji ltar che'i/_/gcin snyi ba yi dbang las 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_'bras bu'i nad de rnams ni gcin snyi
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]ba'i nad kyi dbang las byung zhing /_rang rang gi nad ji ltar shas che ba bzhin du de'i rnam par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan gyi za khu la ni bad kan shas che bar 'gyur la/_rlung dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i za khu las
[\[145a.2\]]kyang rlung dang mkhris pa'i 'bras nad du 'gyur ro/_/'di dag za khu med par ni/_/gnod gyur tshil las 'byung 'gyur te/_/ji srid dngos po mi snang ba/_/de srid shes par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba la/_thor bu'i nad 'di dag ni za khu'i
[\[145a.3\]]nad med par mi tshil ches pa las nad du gyur pa dag las 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ni ji srid rang gi dngos po lto dang rgyab la sogs pa gsal por mi snang ba de srid kyi bar du shes shing rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/kha dog ljang ba'am dmar ba'i gcin/_/
[\[145a.4\]]za khu'i sngon tshul med pa yis/_/gcin 'byung gang de za khu min/_/de ni khrag mkhris yin zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhig gcin gyi mdog ljang ba la sogs par byung la/_sngon du byung ba'i tshul med pa de ni za khu'i nad yin par slob
[\[145a.5\]]dpon gyis ma bshad de/_gcin ni khrag mkhris kyi rang bzhin can yin par shes par bya'o/_/lus rngul yan lag mnam zhing lhod pa dang /_/stan dang mal dang gnyid kyi bde la chags/_/snying mig rna ba kha lce byugs snyam byed/_/lus
[\[145a.6\]]sbom skra dang sen mo ring ba dang /_/bsil bag dga' zhing gre ba rkan skams shing /_/kha nang ro mngar rkang mthil lag mthil tsha/_/gang du gcis par grog ma 'du 'gyur ba/_/gcin nad za khu'i tshogs ni phyis 'byung tshul/_/zhes bya
[\[145a.7\]]ba la/_gcin nad za khu'i tshogs nyi shu po phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rtags sam tshul sngon du 'byung ba ni/_lus la rngul 'dzag pa dang /_yan lag dring zhing mnam la lhod cing rmya ba dang /_stan la sogs pa la 'dug pa'i bde ba la chags shing
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]sred pa dang /_snying ga la sogs pa lus kyi bu ga rnams su dri ma 'phel bas byugs shing rkyang nul byas pa snyam du sems pa dang /_lus mthug cing sbom pa dang /_de bzhin du skra la sogs pa shin tu ring zhing 'phel ba dang /_bsil bag la
[\[145b.2\]]dga' zhing grang ba 'dod pa dang /_gre ba dang rkan skams par 'gyur ba la sogs pa yin no/_/za khu sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra 'byil ba dang /_/sbrang rtsi'i ro 'dra ba la gnyis su rtog_/lus brtas bad kan can gyi za khu'am/_/nyes
[\[145b.3\]]pa zad pas rlung gi bdag can yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin nad za khu sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra ba la/_lci zhing 'byil ba shal ma li'i khu ba 'dra bar gnas pa/_sbrang rtsi'i ro ltar mngar ba la/_skyes bu blo dman pa dag tshul gnyis su
[\[145b.4\]]rtog cing dpyod par byed de/_lus kyi nyams brtas par byas pa'i dbang gis ci 'di bad kan las byung ba yin nam/_yang bad kan la sogs pa'i nyes pa zad par byas pa'i nyams dmad pa las byung ba'i rlung gi bdag nyid can yin no/_/zhes
[\[145b.5\]]blo zhan pa dag rtog par byed par 'gyur ro/_/sngon tshul bcas pa'i bad mkhris za khu dang /_/gang yang rim gyis rlung nad za khur 'gyur/_/mkhris pa las gyur gang yin gso bar dka'/_/gal te tshil nad shas chung gyur gso sla/_/
[\[145b.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_sngon byung ba'i tshul gyis lus rngul ba la sogs pa dang bcas par 'byung ba'i bad kan dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i za khu ni gso dka' ba yin la/_de bzhin du gang yang rim gyis bad kan la sogs pa las 'byung
[\[145b.7\]]ba'i rlung nad kyi za khu de yang gso dka' ba yin no/_/de bzhin du mkhris pa las rim gyis byung ba'i za khur gyur pa ni gso bar dka' ba yin la/_gsor rung ba ni mkhris pa las gyur pa yang yin la/_tshil gyi nad shas che ba yang ma yin na
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]gso bar sla ba yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'i rnam par
[\[146a.2\]]'grel pa'o//_//de nas khong 'bras dang rgyu rlugs dang skran nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin snyi ba'i nad gzhi'i le'u'i skabs su slob dpon gyis/_khong 'bras gzhan du bshad pa yin/_/zhes
[\[146a.3\]]bya ba la/_de'i phyir 'di brtsams pa yin la/_rgyu rlugs dang skran nad dag de dang tshul mthun par le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/kha zas khengs bu rab tsha dang /_/rtsub dang skam dang tsha gyur zos/_/nyal ba'i spyod pa mi bde bas/_/khrag nad
[\[146a.4\]]skyed 'gyur de dang des/_/pags pa sha tshil rus pa dang /_/khrag dang chu ba chu ba che/_/phyi dang nang du skrangs gyur pa/_/rtsa ba che zhing nad tshabs che/_/zlum pa'am 'jong par gnas pa gang /_/khong 'bras de ni rnam pa drug_/nad dmigs sna re
[\[146a.5\]]'dus pa dang /_/khrag dang smas pa las byung ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha zas g.yos zin nas mtshan mo 'das shing zhag lon pa'i khengs bu la sogs pa rgyud du zos pa dang /_khrag nad skyed par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gzhan dag tu bsten pa de dang des nad
[\[146a.6\]]bskyed pas pags pa la sogs pa'i phyi dang nang gi cha la brten te skrangs par gyur pa gang yin pa de rtsa ba che zhing dbyung bar dka' la/_nad tshabs che zhing brnag par dka' ba'i skrang pa zlum zhing kha zheng che ba'am/_'jong par gnas shing dpangs ring
[\[146a.7\]]ba gang yin pa de ni khong 'bras zhes bya la/_khong 'bras de ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad sna re re 'dus pa dang /_khrag dang smas pa las byung ba ste rnam pa drug yin no/_/'dir phyi'i yan lag de dang der/_/rab na mdud pa 'dra la mtho/_/zhes bya ba
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]la/_'dir khong 'bras gnyis yod pa'i nang nas phyi ni lte ba dang /_gzhang la sogs pa'i yan lag de dang der mi bzad par rab tu na ba dang /_mdud pa byas shing brgyus pa ltar rdog rdog por 'dug pa dang /_mtho zhing 'phags pa yin no/_/nang gi shin tu mi
[\[146b.2\]]bzad cing /_/gting ring skran ltar sra ba yin/_/grog mkhar lta bur mtho ba dang /_/me dang mtshon ltar myur gsod byed/_/ces bya ba la/_nang gi khong 'bras ni shin tu mi bzad cing brnag par dka' bar na ba dang /_gting ring zhing nang du nub pa dang /_
[\[146b.3\]]skran ltar sra zhing rem rem por gnas pa dang /_grog mkhar gyis spungs pa'i rtse mo ltar mtho bar gnas pa dang /_phyi'i khong 'bras pas nang gi khong 'bras myur du gsod par byed pa yin te/_de yang me dang mtshon gyis myur du gsod par byed pa dang 'dra ba 'dar
[\[146b.4\]]yang myur du gsod par byed pa yin no/_/lte ba chu so mchin mcher pa/_/glo dang snying lto brla rtsa dang /_/mkhal ma gnyis sam gzhang du'ang 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_khong 'bras de ni lte ba dang chu so la sogs pa'i gnas gang yang rung ba'i lus kyi phyogs
[\[146b.5\]]gcig tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/de la rlung gyur nad tshabs drag_/dmar nag ring zhig lon nas ni/_/'byung zhing smin pa dbyibs mi snyoms/_/ran zhing mgo 'khor sbo ba dang /_/g.yo zhing 'pho la sgra dang bcas/_/zhes bya ba la/_khong 'bras
[\[146b.6\]]de rlung las gyur pa ni nad tshabs drag cing rno ba dang /_mdog dmar nag tu gnas pa dang /_yun ring zhig lon nas 'byung zhing smin pa yin gyi/_myur du 'byung zhing smin pa ma yin pa dang /_nad kyi dbyibs mtho dman dang che chung mi snyoms pa dang /_tshad
[\[146b.7\]]ha cang mi che zhing ran pa la sogs pa yin no/_/mkhris gyur zangs ltar dmar rtsa gnag_/skom dang tsha rims rmongs bag skyed/_/ldang zhing smin pa myur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rmongs pa ni/_mdog dmar ba la sogs pa gang
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]yang rung ba dang ldan pa dang /_skom pa la sogs pa dang ldan par ldang zhing 'byung ba dang smin zhing rnags pa myur ba yin no/_/bad kan las skya g.ya' dang bcas/_/slon zhing bsil la sla ba dang /_/glal zhing lci la yi ga 'chus/_/
[\[147a.2\]]'byung zhing smin pa yun ring thogs/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la bad kan las gyur pa'i khong 'bras ni kha dog dkar zhing skya ba dang /_g.ya' ba la sogs pa'i nad dang bcas pa dang /_'byung ba dang smin pa'i dus yun ring du 'gor ba yin no/_/'dus pa
[\[147a.3\]]las gyur 'dren ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i khong 'bras ni mtshan nyid 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin par khong du chud par bya'o/_/'dir ni phyi nang gnyis mtshan nyid/_/don gyi dbang las shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khong 'bras bzhi
[\[147a.4\]]po 'dir rab tu na ba dang /_shin tu mi bzad par na ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyis phyi dang nang gnyis kyi mtshan nyid don gyi dbang las shes par bya ste/_rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa las phyi nang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dbye bar bya zhing
[\[147a.5\]]shes par bya'o/_/de ni 'di skad ston te/_rlung las gyur pa'i khong 'bras kyi mtshan nyid phyi dang nang du rnam par phye ste ma bshad mod kyi/_'on kyang dmar ba nyid la sogs pa phyi rol du snang bar rig pa de ni de nyid las shes par bya la/_gang yang lto sbo ba dang
[\[147a.6\]]yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa nang gi rnam pa yin par 'thad pa de ni de nyid kyi mtshan ma yin par shes par bya'o/_/'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gnag_/rab tsha na zhing rims kyis 'debs/_/mkhris pa'i rtags ldan phyi'am nang /_/khrag gyur bud med nyid
[\[147a.7\]]la 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag las gyur pa'i khong 'bras gang yin pa de ni 'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gang ba yin la/_mdog ni gnag pa yin zhing rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_mkhris pa'i rtags zangs ltar dmar ba la sogs pa
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]dang ldan pa de ni phyi'i yin yang rung nang gi yin yang rung ste/_de ni bud med kho na la 'byung gi skyes pa la ni ma yin no/_/mtshon la sogs pas smas pa yis/_/rma byung mi 'phrod bsten pa las/_/rma kha'i tsha ba rlung gis phul/_/khrag bcas mkhris pa 'byung
[\[147b.2\]]bar byed/_/khong 'bras bla brnan nad mang zhing /_/khrag mkhris mtshan nyid can dag byed/_/ces bya ba la/_gang mtshon dang rdo la sogs pas smas shing snad par gyur pa des rma byung ba dang /_mi 'phrod pa'i kha zas bsten cing longs spyad pas rma kha'i tsha ba
[\[147b.3\]]rlung gis phul zhing bskyod pa dang bcas pa'i mkhris pa 'byung zhing 'dzag par 'gyur ba de las khong 'bras bla brnan gyi nad mang zhing khrag dang mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bla brnan de yi dbye ba yang /_/gnas kyi dbye ba las bshad
[\[147b.4\]]do/_/zhes bya ba la/_khong 'bras de rnams kyi bla brnan nad bslangs thabs su byung ba de'i dbye ba ni/_rang rang gi gnas sam rten gyi dbye ba las tha dad par gyur bar drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/lte bar byung na skyigs bu ste/_/zhes bya ba la/_khong 'bras de lte
[\[147b.5\]]bar byung na bla brnan skyigs bu zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chu sor gcin 'gags rnag tu 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_chu sor khong 'bras byung na gcin 'gags shing 'byung dka' la/_rnag dang bcas shing dri mnam par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mcher pa dbugs
[\[147b.6\]]mi bde/_zhes bya ba la/_mcher par khong 'bras byung na dbugs mi bde ba'i bla brnan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mchin par/_/dbugs 'byung 'gags skom mgo 'khor 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mchin par khong 'bras byung na dbugs 'byung ba 'gags shing
[\[147b.7\]]skom dad dang /_mgo 'khor ba'i nad kyis 'debs pa'i bla brnan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/glo bar byung na lkog nad 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_khong 'bras glo bar byung na lkog ma'i nad rnams su 'gyur ro/_/snying byung yan lag kun gzir snyam/_/rab rmongs mun
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]sros snyam du byed/_/snying 'phar na bar 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khong 'bras snying la byung na lus kyi yan lag kun dang snying ga shin tu gzir ba snyam sems shing bskyod mi nus pa lta bur 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du rab tu rmongs shing
[\[148a.2\]]'du shes stor bar 'gyur ba dang /_mun par zhugs pa snyam du sems pa dang /_snying 'phar zhing g.yo ba dang /_na ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/lto brtsi ba logs phrag pa'i bar/_/na zhing lto sbos 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_khong 'bras lte
[\[148a.3\]]bar byung na lte ba dang /_rtsib logs kyi bar dang /_phrag pa gnyis kyi bar du na ba dang /_lto ba de nyid sbos shing khrul khrul zer ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chu so mdoms par byung brla na/_/zhes bya ba la/_khong 'bras chu so dang mdoms bar du byung na brlan zhing
[\[148a.4\]]'gul mi shes par 'gyur ro/_/mkhal mar byung na rked pa rgyab/_/rtsib logs su ni na bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_khong 'bras mkhal ma gnyis su byung na rked pa dang rgyab dang rtsib logs su na zhing zug par 'gyur ro/_/gzhang du rlung ni thur 'byung 'gags/_/zhes
[\[148a.5\]]bya ba la/_gzhang gi nang du khong 'bras byung na rlung thur du 'byung ba'i gags byed cing nang du 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/_/zhu dang ma zhu phyed nyid zhu/_/de dag 'or nad lta bur bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_zhu ba'i gnas dang ma zhu ba'i gnas dang phyed tsam zhu ba ste/_legs par
[\[148a.6\]]ma zhu ba'i gnas su byung ba de dag ni 'or nad dam skrang bag gi nad kyi mtshan nyid dang 'dra bar bshad de/_skrang pa chung ba nad tshabs chung /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis ston to/_/lte ba yan chad smin khar 'dzag_/ces bya ba la/_khong 'bras lte ba yan
[\[148a.7\]]chad kyi nang na yod pa de dag smin par gyur na/_kha'i sgo nas rnag la sogs pa'i nad rnams 'dzag cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lte ba man chad gzhang du 'dzag_/ces bya ba la/_lte ba man chad kyi nang na khong 'bras gnas pa las smin par gyur pa gang dag yin pa
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]de gzhang gi sgor rnag la sogs pa 'dzag par 'gyur ro/_/lte bar gnas pa gnyis kar 'dzag_/ces bya ba la/_khong 'bras lte ba'i nang du byung na lus kyi dbus na gnas pa yin pa'i phyir kha dang gzhang gnyis ka nas 'byung zhing 'dzag pa yin no/_/khong 'bras
[\[148b.2\]]kyi ni nad dmigs rnams/_/'dzag las rma ltar shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khong 'bras kyi nad gzhi rlung la sogs pa ni rang gi 'dzag pa ji lta ba las rma'i tshul bzhin du shes par bya'o/_/ji ltar rma la rnag dang gsher bag 'dzag pa'i tshul las nad gzhi'i
[\[148b.3\]]tshul shes par bya ba mdo'i gnas su ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang tshul de dang 'dra bar brtag par bya'o/_/de las 'dus pa las gyur dang /_/snying dang lte ba chu sor gnas/_/phyi 'am nang du bye ba'am/_/smin te kha nas 'dzag pa ni/_/nyam chung bla brnan ldan pa
[\[148b.4\]]spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i khong 'bras gang yin pa de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du rlung la sogs pa 'ba' zhig las gyur pa yin yang snying ga dang lte ba dang chu sor gnas pa yang spang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du nang ngam phyir
[\[148b.5\]]kha bye zhing smin te zag pa yang spang bar bya'o/_/yang snying ga la sogs par gnas pa smin te kha nas 'dzag par gyur pa nyam chung ba'i nad pa la byung ba yang spang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bla brnan gyi nad yod pa dag kyang spang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin bud med bu btsas
[\[148b.6\]]pa'am/_/sbrum ma'am nu zho yod pa dang /_/nu zho med pa'i nu ma yi/_/rtsa sgo kha byer phyin gyur nas/_/phyi yi khong 'bras mtshan nyid can/_/skrangs shing sra ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar khong 'bras zhes bya ba'i nad khong du zos pa la sogs pas skye ba
[\[148b.7\]]bzhin du bud med bu btsas pa'am/_sbrum ma nu mar nu zho dang bcas pa'am/_nu zho med pa'i nu ma'i rtsa kha bye bar phyin nas phyi'i khong 'bras kyi mtshan nyid rab tu na ba dang /_mdud pa 'dra zhing mtho ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de yang skrang pa dang 'dra ba'i rang
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ni nu ma'i khong 'bras zhes bya ba yin no/_/bu mo rnams kyi nu rtsa'i sgo/_/phra bas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba la/_nu ma'i khong 'bras de ni bu mo gzhon nu la 'byung bar
[\[149a.2\]]mi 'gyur te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni nu ma'i rtsa sgo shin tu phra bas de 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba yin no/_/rlung ni rgyu lam 'gags pas 'khrugs/_/skrang dang gzer ni skyed cing rgyu/_/chu so rlig par phyin pa dang /_/rlig par rgyu ba'i rtsa dag ni/_/btsir
[\[149a.3\]]nas rlig pa pags pa dag_/'phel zhing rlig rlugs nyid du byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung rang gi rgyu ba'i lam 'gags shing phan tshun rgyu ba'i go skabs su chud par gyur pas 'khrugs shing nad skyed pas na skrang ba dang /_gzer ba'i nad skyed cing
[\[149a.4\]]rgyu nas rlig pa skrang bar byed cing /_chu so dang rlig par phyin nas de la brten te/_rlig pa'i gnas su rgyu ba'i rtsa dag rab tu btsir zhing gnod par byas nas/_rlig pa dang pags pa 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i rlig rlugs nyid byed par 'gyur ro/_/nad
[\[149a.5\]]khrag gcin tshil rgyu ma las/_/rlig rlugs de ni rnam bdun 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlig rlugs zhes bya ba'i nad de ni nad dmigs so so dang /_khrag las byung ba dang /_gcin dang /_tshil dang /_rgyu ma las byung ba ste rnam pa bdun yin no/_/
[\[149a.6\]]rgyu ma gcin skyes pa'am rlung /_/rgyu ma'i dbye ba 'ba' zhig gzhan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyu ma'am/_gcin las skyes pa'i rlig rlugs dag kyang rlung las gyur pa dang 'dra mod kyi/_rgyu ma 'ba' zhig gi dbye bas tha dad pa yin zhing gzhan yang
[\[149a.7\]]ma yin no/_/rlung gyur rkyal pa gang 'dra zhing /_/reg na rtsub cing rgyu med na/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs ni rkyal pa rlung gis gang ba 'dra zhing /_reg na rtsub pa dang /_de bzhin du rgyu med par glo bur du na bar byed pa
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]yin no/_/mkhris gyur u dum+WA ra yi/_/'bras bu smin 'dra tsha dro 'drul/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad ni u dum+WA ra'i 'bras bu smin pa dang mdog 'dra la/_de bzhin du tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/
[\[149b.2\]]bad kan las bsil lci zhing snum/_/g.ya' zhing sra la nad tshabs chung /_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad ni/_bsil ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/khrag gyur gnag cing 'brum bus
[\[149b.3\]]khyab/_/mkhris pa'i rlig rlugs mtshan nyid ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs ni snag tsha ltar gnag cing /_'brum bu nag pos khyab pa dang /_mkhris pa'i rlig rlugs kyi mtshan nyid u dum+WA ra'i 'bras bu smin
[\[149b.4\]]pa dang 'dra ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/tshil gyur rlig rlugs bad kan 'dra/_/'jam zhing tA la'i 'bras bur mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshil las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad ni/_bsil zhing snum pa la sogs pa bad
[\[149b.5\]]kan gyi mtshan nyid dang 'dra ba dang /_yang de 'jam zhing tA la'i 'bras bu dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin no/_/gcin brnag pa la brten pa rnams/_/gcin las 'byung bar de 'gyur te/_/rkyal pa chu yis gang ba ltar/_/g.yo
[\[149b.6\]]'gyur nad dang bcas shing 'jam/_/gcin 'gags pa dang rlig pa yi/_/'og tu skrang bar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin snyoms la brnag cing nan gyis 'geg par byed pa la brten pa'i skyes bu rnams la ni/_gcin
[\[149b.7\]]las byung ba'i rlig rlugs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ni rkyal pa chus gang ba ltar g.yo zhing 'gul bar 'khrug par 'gyur la/_de yang nad dang bcas shing 'jam zhing mnyen par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du gcin 'gags shing sri ba dang /_
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]de bzhin du rlig pa'i 'og tu gdu bu ltar skrang bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/rlung 'khrugs pa yi zas dang ni/_/chu grang la ni rkyal ba dang /_/shugs bkag btsir dang khur dang lam/_/yan lag log par gcus pa dang /_/
[\[150a.2\]]rlung 'khrugs pa ni gzhan gyis kyang /_/gang tshe rgyu ma phra mo'i cha/_/rlung gis log par phul 'gyur te/_/rang gi gnas nas thur du bskyod/_/chu so'i tshigs su phyin pa dang /_/de tshe mdud pa ltar glo 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung
[\[150a.3\]]'khrug par byed pa'i kha zas rtsub pa dang /_bska ba la sogs pa bsten pa dang /_de bzhin du chu grang mo la rkyal gyis brgal ba dang /_de bzhin du bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba bkag pa dang /_nan gyis btsir ba dang /_
[\[150a.4\]]khur la sogs pas gnod par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gzhan dag gis rlung 'khrugs par gyur pa'i dus gang gi tshe rgyu ma phra mo'i cha ste/_rgyu ma phre'u phyogs gcig log par phul te/_rang gi gnas nas thur du bskyod cing chu so'i tshigs su rlung gnas pa
[\[150a.5\]]de'i tshe/_mdud pa ltar glo ba'i skrang bag skyed par 'gyur ro/_/yal bar bor na rlig pa cher skye zhing /_/sbo zhing na la rengs par rlung gis byed/_/rab tu gzer zhing nang na sgra dang bcas/_/gang bar byed cing bcug kyang slar 'byung byed/_/
[\[150a.6\]]ces bya ba la/_nad de yal bar bor zhing gso ba ma byas na/_rlig pa skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_lto sbo zhing rengs par rlung des skyed par byed pa dang /_yang rlung des rab tu gzer zhing nyen pas rlung sgra dang bcas shing krul krul zer ba dang /_
[\[150a.7\]]yang rlung gis gang bar byed cing phyung ba de bcug kyang slar 'byung bar byed pa yin no/_/rgyu rlugs 'di ni gso dka' ste/_/rlung gi rlig rlugs 'dra ba yin/_/rtsub cing gnag la dmar ba'i rtsa/_/phra mo'i dra bas khebs pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyu
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]rlugs zhes bya ba'i nad 'di ni gso dka' zhing bcos par mi nus pa yin la/_yang de ni rlung gi rlig rlugs dang mtshan ma 'dra ba yin te/_rlung gyur rkyal pa gang 'dra zhing /_/reg na rtsub cing rgyu med na/_/zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin
[\[150b.2\]]no/_/yang de bzhin du rtsub cing mdog gnag la dmar ba'i rtsa'i tshogs phra mo'i dra bas khebs shing khyab par 'gyur ba yin no/_/skran brgyad nad ni so so dang /_/'dres dang 'dus pa las gyur dang /_/zla mtshan gyi ni nyes pa yis/_/brgyad pa
[\[150b.3\]]bud med rnams la 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_skran ni rnam pa brgyad yod de/_de yang rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi so so las byung ba gsum dang /_nad gzhi gnyis gnyis dang 'dres pa'i ldan pa las gyur ba gsum dang /_nad gzhi gsum
[\[150b.4\]]car 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig dang /_bud med rnams la zla mtshan gyi nad kyi nyes pa las byung ba gcig ste/_de ltar na spyir brgyad yin no/_/rims dang slon dang tshad 'khru sogs/_/skyug sman sogs dang las rnams kyis/_/skem gyur
[\[150b.5\]]rlung skyes zas za dang /_/bkres te chu grang 'thungs gyur pa'am/_/skom 'thungs rjes la gang zhig ni/_/rkyal dang mchod pa la sogs pa/_/bsten pas lus ni dkrugs byas dang /_/slon mi bro yang skyugs pa dang /_/rlung la sogs pa 'byung
[\[150b.6\]]ba yi/_/shugs bkag pa'am gcin btsir ba'am/_/snum dang dugs ni ma bsten par/_/sbyang ba'i las ni byed pa dang /_/sbyangs zin myur du tsha ba dang /_/bad kan skyed pa'i zas skom spyad/_/rlung rgyas pa yi nad rnams ni/_/so so'am 'dres pa'am
[\[150b.7\]]'khrugs gyur pa'am/_/kun nas khrag dang bcas 'khrugs pas/_/sbubs can la ni brten gyur nas/_/steng 'og lam ni bkag nas su/_/gzer sngon 'gro zhing reg tu rung /_/shin tu mtho zhing mdud pa'i gzugs/_/skran ni skyed par 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]skran 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang /_de bzhin du skyug sman la sogs pa ste/_skyug sman dang bkru sman dang /_bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba dang /_'jam rtsi dang /_mgo bo'i bkru sman zhes bya ba'i dpyad kyi sbyor ba nyes pa dang /_
[\[151a.2\]]de bzhin du drag shul gyi nad rnams kyis skem zhing sbegs par gyur pa dang /_rlung skyes pa'i zas rtsub cing kha ba la sogs pa za ba dang /_de bzhin du bkres shing zas za bar 'dod pa'i skabs su zas ma zos par chu grang mo 'thung ba'am/_yang na skom 'thungs pa'i rjes la rkyal ba dang
[\[151a.3\]]mchong ba dang nyal po bsten pa dang /_rta rgyug pa la sogs pa la brten cing /_lus 'khrugs shing bskyod par byas pa dang /_yang na slon mi bro ba bzhin du nan gyis slon zhing skyugs pa dang /_rlung dang bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung bar ldog bzhin du
[\[151a.4\]]nan gyis bkag cing brnag pa dang /_de dag nan gyis btsir ba dang /_yang na snum dang dugs kyi cho ga yang dang yang du bya ba ma bsten cing goms par ma byas par sbyang ba'i las skyug sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa gtang ba dang /_yang na sbyangs zin cing skyug sman btang ba la
[\[151a.5\]]sogs pa byas zin pa'i rjes thogs nyid la myur bar lus tsha bar byed pa'i zas skom la bsten pa dang /_de bzhin du bad kan skyed pa'i ljan ljin 'phel ba'i zas skom longs spyad pa dang /_de bzhin du rlung rgyas shing 'phel ba'i nad kyi dri ma rnams so sor 'khrugs par 'gyur ba 'am/_
[\[151a.6\]]gnyis pa'i ldan pa 'khrugs pa'am/_yang na gzhi thams cad 'khrugs pa'am/_khrag dang bcas pas 'khrugs shing g.yos pas sbubs chen po ste/_lto ba zhes bya ba'i lus kyi dbyibs kyi cha de la brten cing gnas nas de'i 'og tu rtsa bo che'i nang du zhugs te/_steng dang 'og gi lam
[\[151a.7\]]bkag nas skran skyed par 'gyur la de yang gzer sngon du 'gro ba'i sgo nas nad skyed par 'gyur zhing /_reg tu rung ba shin tu mtho zhing 'bur bar mdud pa'i gzugs can ltar ril ril por gnas pa'i skran zhes bya ba skyed par 'gyur ba yin no/_/skem pas bad kan mkhris bshang
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]ba'i/_/rgyun srang 'gags par gyur pa yis/_/rlung ni khong par gnas bcas pa/_/rtsub pas sra bar gyur pa yin/_/rang gnas ldang gyur rang dbang can/_/gzhan gnas la brten gzhan dbang can/_/gong por gyur pas gzugs med kyang /_/gzugs can ltar
[\[151b.2\]]gnas skran zhes bya/_/chu so lte ba snying ga dang /_/rtsib logs la ni gnas pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_skem zhing lus zungs zad pas lan 'ga' zhig rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur la/_lan 'ga' zhig ni bad kan dang mkhris pa dang bshang ba rgyu ba'i bu ga'i lam
[\[151b.3\]]srang 'gags par 'gyur bas 'khrugs par 'gyur la/_'khrugs pa'i rlung de khong pa'i nang du gnas bcas shing brten par gyur pa yin la/_des na rtsub pa'i rgyus sra zhing mkhrang bar gyur pa yin la/_rlung de rang gi gnas na gnas pa'i tshe na ni rang dbang can zhes
[\[151b.4\]]bya ba la/_rang gi gnas bad kan dang mkhris pa'i gnas la brten pa'i tshe na ni gzhan dbang can zhes bya'o/_/yang nad de ni gong por gnas pas na reg tu rung bar gyur pas/_rlung de gzugs med pa ste sra ba ma yin du zin kyang gzugs can lta bur gnas shing mdud pa'i
[\[151b.5\]]gzugs su 'dug pas ming skran zhes bya bar btags pa yin no/_/de yang chu so la sogs pa'i gnas su gnas pa yin te/_chu so dang lte ba snying ga dang rtsib logs g.yas g.yon te lngar gnas pa yin no/_/rlung las mjing pa klad pa gzer/_/rims 'debs
[\[151b.6\]]mcher na rgyu ma 'khrug_/bshang sri khab kyis gtsags snyam na/_/dbugs 'byin yang dang yang mi phyin/_/lus rengs kha ni skam pa dang /_/skem zhing me drod mi snyoms dang /_/lpags sogs gnag cing rtsub pa dang /_/rlung skran g.yo ba yin pa'i phyir/_/
[\[151b.7\]]dbyibs ni brtag par mi mngon zhing /_/gnas 'phel 'bri dang na ba dang /_/grog mas khyab pa lta bur ni/_/skran ni 'gul zhing zug pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i skran nad ni mjing ba dang klad pa gzer ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs par
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]'gyur ba dang /_khab kyis gtsags pa snyam du na zhing zug pa dang /_dbugs 'byin par dka' zhing yang dang yang du mi thon pa dang /_lus rengs shing 'gyur mi shes pa dang /_skem zhing rid pa dang /_pags pa dang mig dang sen mo
[\[152a.2\]]dang gdong dang lce la sogs pa gnag pa dang /_rlung gi rang bzhin g.yo zhing mi brten pa yin pa'i phyir dbyibs dang rang bzhin brtag par dka' zhing gnas gcig na mi 'dug pa dang /_'phel ba dang 'bri bar snang ba dang /_na zhing zug pa dang grog mas khyab cing gang ba
[\[152a.3\]]lta bur skran de 'gul ba dang /_zug cing na ba yin no/_/mkhris las tsha zhing sgregs skyur brgyal/_/'khru zhing lus rngul skom rims 'debs/_/pags pa la sogs ser por snang /_/skran ni reg par mi bzod dang /_/tsha zhing 'bar la dro ba dang /_/rang
[\[152a.4\]]gi gnas ni bsregs snyam byed/_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran ni tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /_skran mang zhing reg par mi bzod cing na ba dang /_tsha 'ur 'ur po la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/bad kan slon bag yi ga
[\[152a.5\]]'chus/_/me drod nyams shing grang rims 'debs/_/cham pa khong snyom dang ga lci/_/lud pa lu zhing lpags sogs dkar/_/skran phugs ring zhing sra ba dang /_/lci zhing rang gnas brtan nad chung /_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i skran nad ni slon
[\[152a.6\]]bag la sogs pa dang ldan par na zhing pags pa dang sen mo la sogs pa dkar zhing skya ba dang /_de bzhin du skran phugs ring zhing rdo ltar sra ba dang /_lci zhing tshor ba med pa lta bu dang /_rang gi gnas na brtan par gnas shing mi 'gyur ba dang nad tshabs chung zhing rgyu
[\[152a.7\]]ba dal ba yin no/_/phal cher rang gnas 'dug pa dang /_/rang gi dus su nad skyed byed/_/ces bya ba la/_skran de dag ni phal cher nad rang rang gi gnas na 'dug cing brten la/_rang rang gi ldang ba'i dus su nad skyed par byed pa yin no/_/de yang rlung
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]las gyur pa'i skran nad phal cher ni dku'i phyogs su gnas la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran ni phal cher lte ba la gnas so/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i skran ni phal cher rtsib logs gnyis dang snying gar gnas so/_/rang gi dus ni nyin mtshan dang zas zos pa la
[\[152b.2\]]sogs pa nad rang rang 'byung ba'i dus su rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur pa'i skran lhag par ldang zhing na bar 'gyur ro/_/gnyis las byung ba'i skran gsum po/_/mtshan nyid 'dren mar ldan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa las byung ba'i
[\[152b.3\]]skran gsum ni mtshan nyid gnyis po gang dag yin pa de'i cha 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin no/_/kun skyes mi bzad na zhing tsha/_/myur smin sra mtho de gso dka'/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi gsum po kun 'dus pa las skyes pa'i skran ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan
[\[152b.4\]]zhing mi bzad par na ba dang /_lhag par tsha ba dang /_myur du smin pa dang sra zhing dpangs mtho ba yin te/_de ni gso dka' ba yin pas gso dpyad kyis bcos kyang mi 'tsho'o/_/khrag gi skran ni gang yin pa/_/de ni bud med nyid la 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_skran
[\[152b.5\]]brgyad pa khrag las gyur pa'i skran ni bud med kho na la 'byung gi skyes pa la ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zla mtshan dus sam bu gsar btsas/_/yang na mngal gyi nad can gyis/_/bud med rlung skyed bsten gyur pas/_/rlung ni 'khrugs par gyur pa las/_/zla
[\[152b.6\]]re 'byung bar byed pa yi/_/zla mtshan mngal du bkag pas ni/_/de ni mngal chags 'drar snang zhing /_/mtshan ma gsal bar ston byed de/_/snying 'phar nu 'dzag yid mi bde/_/skem pa la sogs tshul du snang /_/zhes bya ba la/_zla mtshan dang ldan pa'am/_
[\[152b.7\]]zla mtshan gyi dus la bab pa gsar du btsas pa'am/_zla ba ma tshang bar 'phyil bar gyur pa dang /_yang na bud med mngal nad can gyis rlung skyed par byed pa'i zas dang skom bsten cing spyad par gyur pas/_bud med de'i rlung gi nad 'khrugs par gyur pa las
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]zla ba re re zhing rgyu bar byed pa'i zla mtshan bkag cing phyir 'byung du mi ster bas zla re 'byung ba de mngal na bu chags pa lta bu'i tshul de sogs shing 'phel bar gyur nas/_mngal du chags pa'i mtshan ma snang zhing gsal bar ston par byed de/_snying
[\[153a.2\]]'phar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma snang ba yin no/_/de nas rim gyis rlung 'dres dang /_/mkhris pa yi ni rgyu yis na/_/rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i/_/skran ni khrag de skyed byed yin/_/na zhing sra la tsha zhing 'khru/_/skom dad rims sogs bla brnan
[\[153a.3\]]'byung /_/nad kyi khrag la brten pas na/_/mngal gnas dag tu lhag par gzer/_/mngal nas dri nga 'dzag pa dang /_/na zhing 'phar la zug par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_dus kyi rim gyis rlung dang khrag de 'dres shing 'dus par gyur pa dang /_mkhris
[\[153a.4\]]pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyis nad khrag de rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i skran gyi nad khrag de skyed par byed cing bla brnan gyi nad na zhing sra ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du lhag par yang nad kyi khrag la brten cing gnas pas/_mngal gyi gnas su lhag
[\[153a.5\]]par gzer zhing na ba dang /_mngal nas dri nga ba 'dzag pa dang /_sogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/mngal chags 'dra yang yan lag med/_/'on kyang skran ni 'gul gzer ldan/_/de nyid der ni gong por gnas/_/lan 'ga' 'gul bar byed pa yin/_/'di
[\[153a.6\]]ni ltor 'phel mi byed kyi/_/skran nyid 'phel bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gal te khrag gi skran chags pa de mngal na bu chags pa dang cha 'dra na yang yan lag la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yod pa ma yin gyi/_'on kyang 'gul
[\[153a.7\]]zhing gzer ba dang ldan pa yin no/_/yang skran de nyid ni mngal gyi gnas der gong por gzugs can du gnas la/_lan 'ga' yun ring zhig nas 'gul bar byed pa yin no/_/yang 'di'i mngal du bu chags nas 'phel bar byed
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]pa ma yin gyi/_/gzhan du khrag las chags pa'i skran nyid 'phel bar byed pa yin no/_/rang gi nad gzhi la brten nas/_/des der skran nad thams cad skyed/_/yun ring nas ni smin 'gyur ba'am/_/yang na ma smin/_zhes bya ba la/_nad rang
[\[153b.2\]]rang gi nad gzhi'i tshul la brten cing gnas nas skran thams cad skye bar 'gyur ba yin la/_rgyu des na yun ring zhig nas smin par 'gyur ba'am/_yang na smin par mi 'gyur ro/_/khong 'bras kyang /_nad khrag la ni brten pa'i phyir/_/shin tu myur bar smin
[\[153b.3\]]par 'gyur/_/de phyir myur du tsha 'gyur bas/_/khong 'bras zhes ni de la bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_yang khong 'bras su gyur pa ni khrag nad shin tu gnod par byed pa la brten cing gnas pa yin pa'i phyir shin tu myur zhing rings par smin cing rdol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nad
[\[153b.4\]]kyi phyir myur du tsha zhing sreg par byed pas de la ming khong 'bras zhes bya bar bshad do/_/nang gnas skran ni chu so dang /_/lto ba mchin pa snying na zhing /_/me drod mdog nyams nyams stobs 'bri/_/shugs ni 'gag par 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nang na gnas
[\[153b.5\]]shing brten pa'i mtshan ma ni chu so la sogs par na ba dang /_me drod la sogs pa nyams shing 'bri ba ni bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba 'gag par 'gyur ba yin no/_/phyi rol de las bzlog pa ste/_/khong pa'i yan lag nad tshabs chung /_/phyogs de'i
[\[153b.6\]]mdog ni nyams pa dang /_/phyi rol du ni mthong zhing 'phags/_/zhes bya ba la/_phyi rol du byung ba'i skran ni nang du 'byung ba'i skran gyi mtshan ma de las go bzlog pa yin te/_chu so la sogs par na bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_me drod la sogs pa nyams par
[\[153b.7\]]mi 'gyur ba dang /_shugs mi 'gag cing bde blag tu 'byung ba dang khong pa'i yan lag lte ba la sogs par nad tshabs chung zhing shas che bar min pa dang /_skran chags pa'i phyogs de'i mdog nyams shing kha dog gzhan du 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du phyi rol du
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]lhag par mthong zhing 'phags pa yin no/_/lto sbo lhag par mi bzad na/_/rgyu ma'i sgra bcas mi bzad na/_/sbo bcas lto ba na ba dang /_/rlung gi nad kyis steng 'og bkag_/de ni hen gyi zhes byar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_lto sbo zhing sgra
[\[154a.2\]]dang bcas pa dang /_steng 'og tu rlung gi lam bkag pas lhag par mi bzad par na zhing /_brnag par dka' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de ni/_lto sbo hen gyi nad ces bya ba yin par slob dpon gyis bshad do/_/sra zhing gtun 'dra mdud pa can/_/gtun
[\[154a.3\]]'dra gyen du mtho bar gnas/_/hen gyi mtshan ldan/_zhes bya ba la/_nad gang sra zhing rdo'i gtun 'dra zhing mdud pa can du gnas la/_gtun rdo dang dbyibs 'dra zhing gyen du mtho bar 'jong bag tu gnas pa hen gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni gtun 'dra ba zhes bya'o/_/gtun
[\[154a.4\]]bu ni/_'phred gnas de dang tshul 'dra yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gtun bu zhes bya ba'i nad ni 'phred du thad kar gnas kyi/_gyen du 'gro ba ma yin la/_nad kyi tshul ni gtun 'dra ba dang mtshungs te/_de lta bu'i nad la ni gtun bu zhes bya'o/_/zhu ba'i gnas nas gzhang pho
[\[154a.5\]]mtshan/_/rlung ni mi bzad na zhing rgyu/_/thur du zug pa yin par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_zhu ba'i nad lte ba'i 'og tu gnas gzhang dang pho mtshan dag tu rlung rgyu zhing /_lhag par na bar byed pa de ni thur du zug pa zhes bya'o/_/de las bzlog pa gyen du zug pa'o/_/
[\[154a.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_gyen du zug pa zhes bya ba'i nad ni de las bzlog pa ste/_gzhang dang pho mtshan gyi gnas nas lte bar gyen du zug cing na la gyen du zug pa zhes bya'o/_/sgregs pa mang zhing bshang ba 'gags pa dang /_/'grangs za mi nus rgyu ma sgra dang bcas/_/sbo
[\[154a.7\]]zhing hen langs kha zas 'ju mi nus/_/skran ni nyer 'byung mtshan ma yin par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_mi gang la skran nye bar 'ongs par 'gyur ba'i sngar 'byung ba'i tshul ni sgregs pa mang po yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_bshang ba 'gags shing sri ba
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]dang /_/'grangs shing tshim par za ma nus pa dang /_rgyu ma sgra dang bcas shing mi gsal ba'i sgra krul krul zer ba dang /_sbo zhing lto rgyas la hen langs pa dang /_me drod zhan pas kha zas 'ju bar mi byed pa ste/_de dag ni skran ring po mi thogs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i
[\[154b.2\]]mtshan ma yin par slob dpon gyis bstan cing bshad pa yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'i rnam par
[\[154b.3\]]'grel pa'o//_//de nas dmu rdzing gi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di na khong 'bras la sogs pa dang tshul 'dra bas 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/nad kun me drod nyams las skye/_/lhag par dmu rdzing nad skye zhing /_/ma zhu dri ma can gyi zas/_/
[\[154b.4\]]dri ma sogs las skye bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir nad thams cad kyang pho ba'i me drod nyams pa las skye bar 'gyur ba yin mod kyi/_khyad par du 'am/_lhag par dmu rdzing gi nad ni/_pho ba'i me drod nyams pa las skye bar 'gyur la/_de bzhin du ma zhu ba
[\[154b.5\]]rnam pa bzhi dang /_dri ma can gyi zas rul pa dang /_zhag lon pa'i khengs bu dang /_'dren ma la sogs pa'i skyon dang ldan pa bsten pa dang /_de bzhin du nad kyi dri ma yun ring du sogs shing 'phel bar 'gyur ba las dmu rdzing gi nad skye zhing 'byung
[\[154b.6\]]bar 'gyur te/_de dag ni nad kyi rgyu bstan pa yin no/_/nad kyis chu ni rgyu ba'i rtsa/_/steng dang 'og tu bkag nas ni/_/srog dang thur sel la gnod de/_/pags pa sha yi bar gnas nad/_/lto ba bkang ste dmu rdzing skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung la
[\[154b.7\]]sogs pa'i nad kyis chu'am/_bad kan gyi tshogs rgyu ba'i rtsa lus kyi steng 'og tu rgyu ba bkag nas rgyu des srog ces bya ba'i rlung la sogs pas gnod cing 'khrugs par byas nas pags pa dang sha'i bar na yod pa'i nad drangs te/_lto ba bkang nas dmu rdzing skyed
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]cing 'byung bar byed pa yin no/_/de yang rnam pa brgyad 'gyur te/_/nad gzhi tha dad 'dus mcher pa/_/dri ma 'gags dang rgyu rdol dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_dmu rdzing de yang grangs kyi dbye ba rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur te/_rlung dang mkhris pa
[\[155a.2\]]bad kan gyi nad gzhi tha dad pa las byung ba gsum dang /_gsum char 'dus pa las byung ba gcig dang /_mcher pa las byung ba dang /_dri ma 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing dang /_rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing dang /_chu'i dmu rdzing ste rnam pa brgyad do/_/des gzir
[\[155a.3\]]rkan dang mchu bskams shing /_/rkang pa lag pa gsus pa skrangs/_/spyod pa kha zas nyams stobs 'bri/_/skem zhing gsus pa cher skyes la/_/mi ni yi dwags gzugs can 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dmu rdzing gi nad des gzir cing nyen pa'i mi
[\[155a.4\]]ni rkan dang mchu bskams par gyur pa dang /_rkang pa dang pags pa dang lto ba skrangs pa dang /_lus kyi spyod pa nyams pa dang /_kha zas za ba'i rtsol ba nyams pa dang /_lus kyi nyams stobs 'bri zhing zad pa dang /_skem zhing sha dang khrag zad pa dang /_
[\[155a.5\]]gsus pa cher skyes shing rgyas par 'gyur te/_mdor na mi de yi dwags kyi gzugs can lta bu'am/_'chi ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de ni 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma dag_/bkres pa med cing zas kun ni/_/ring nas tsha zhing skyur bcas 'ju/_/'ju dang
[\[155a.6\]]mi 'ju mi shes la/_/'grangs par za yang mi nus shing /_/stobs ni rtag tu zad par 'gyur/_/cung zad bskyod kyang dbugs mi bde/_/bshang ba 'phel zhing 'gags par byed/_/rkang pa gnyis su cung zad skrang /_/chu sor na zhing zas yang ba/_/cung zad
[\[155a.7\]]zos kyang gsus pa rgyas/_/rtsa rgyas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig_/ces bya ba la/_dmu rdzing de nye bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dam sngar byung ba'i tshul ni zas ma zos kyang bkres pa'i bag med pa dang /_/ro drug dang ldan pa'i kha zas kun kyang tsha ba dang bcas shing skyur bag
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gi rnam pas ring zhig lon nas gdod 'ju ba dang /_zas zos pa zhu bar gyur tam/_zhu bar ma gyur pa blos rtogs shing shes par mi 'gyur ba dang /_'grangs par za zhing longs spyad par mi nus pa dang /_lus kyi stobs nyin mtshan rtag tu zad cing 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang /_lus
[\[155b.2\]]bskyod pa'i g.yo 'gul gyi bya ba cung zad byas kyang /_dbugs mi bde zhing brtsegs pa dang /_bshang ba nang du 'phel zhing sogs la phyir mi 'byung bar 'gags pa dang /_de bzhin du rkang pa skrangs pa nas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig cing mi snang ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma 'byung bar
[\[155b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/dmu rdzing nad ni thams cad la/_/snyom zhing nyam chung 'gyur ba dang /_/dri ma sri zhing me drod chung /_/tsha zhing skrangs la gsus pa sbo/_/mjug tu chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dmu rdzing thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan ma ni snyom pa la sogs pa yin
[\[155b.4\]]te/_/snyom pa ni gnyid kyis myos pa snyam du yul 'dzin par mi nus pa'o/_/tsha ba ni lus tsha ba 'ur 'ur pos khyab pa'o/_/dmu rdzing de dag thams cad kyi mjug gam mthar ni lto ba'i nang du chu 'byung zhing des gang bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad chu med bar du smug_/skrang
[\[155b.5\]]med khur ltar lci ma yin/_/rtsa dra'i skar khung ris kyis khebs/_/rtag tu sgra ni 'ur 'ur zer/_/rlung gis lte ba rgyu mar zhugs/_/shugs bskyed nad ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/snying ga lte ba rked pa dang /_/gzhang dang chu so na bar byed/_/rlung ni sgra dang bcas par rgyu/_/
[\[155b.6\]]bshang ba 'gags shing gci ba nyung /_/me drod chung min skam pa min/_/kha ni ro bro med ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dmu rdzing gi nad thams cad ni/_dmu chur ma gyur par sha mdog smug cing dmar bar snang la/_skrang pa'i tshabs mi che zhing cung zad skrangs pa dang /_
[\[155b.7\]]khur bu ltar shin tu lci ba ma yin pa dang /_rtsa'i dra ba'i tshogs kyis skar khung ltar g.yogs shing khebs pa dang /_rtag tu dus thams cad du khong pa'i nang na sgra 'ur 'ur por grag cing bar snang gi 'brug ltar sgra grag pa dang /_rlung lte ba dang rgyu mar zug cing na bar byed pa nas/_
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]sgra'i shugs bskyed cing byung nas 'jig ste mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang rlung gis snying ga la sogs par na zhing zug par byed pa dang /_yang rlung de lto ba'i nang na sgra dang bcas shing rgyu zhing phan tshun 'gro ba dang /_bshang ba 'gags shing sri bar byed pa
[\[156a.2\]]dang /_gcin gyi tshogs nyung bar byed pa dang /_khong pa'i me drod shin tu chung ba ma yin pa dang /_skam zhing zas la gdu ba ma yin pa dang /_/kha'i nang na ro bro ba med pa ma yin te ro dang bcas pa yin no/_/de la rlung gi dmu rdzing ni/_/rkang lag rlig pa lto ba skrang /_lto ba rtsib
[\[156a.3\]]logs rked rgyab na/_/tshigs rnams bye ba snyam du sems/_/lud pa skam zhing yan lag snyom/_/ro smad lci zhing bshang gci 'gags/_/pags pa la sogs gnag la smug_/glo bur du ni 'phel zhing 'bri/_/gsus par zug cing na ba dang /_/rtsa bran nag
[\[156a.4\]]pos khyab cing rgyas/_/brdabs na rkyal pa dbugs kyis ni/_/gang ba lta bu'i sgra dang ldan/_/'dir rlung nad dang sgrar bcas pas/_/thams cad du ni rgyu bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_de la dmu rdzing rnams kyi nang nas/_rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni rkang pa
[\[156a.5\]]dang lag pa la sogs pa skrang par 'gyur ba dang /_rus pa'i tshigs na zhing zhig pa snyam du sems pa dang /_lud pa bad kan med par skam por 'byung ba dang /_yan lag snyom zhing grugs pa snyam du sems pa dang /_lus kyi ro smad lci zhing gdeg dka' ba snyam du sems pa
[\[156a.6\]]dang /_bshang gci dri ma 'gags shing sri ba dang /_pags pa dang sen mo dang mig dang lce dang bshang ba la sogs pa mdog gnag cing smug par snang ba dang /_rgyu med par glo bur du de'i lto ba cher 'phel zhing 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang /_zug cing shas cher na ba dang /_rtsa bran
[\[156a.7\]]gyi tshogs nag pos khyab cing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /_lto ba la lag pa la sogs pas brdabs shing bsnun na rkyal pa dbugs kyis gang ba la mnan pa lta bu'i sgra dang ldan pa dang /_dmu rdzing 'di la rlung sgra dang bcas pas thams cad du rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed pa yin no/_/mkhris
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]pa'i dmu rdzing rims 'debs rgyas/_/lus tsha skom dang kha ro kha/_/mgo 'khor tshad 'khru pags pa sogs/_/ser zhing gsus pa'i mdog rtsa sngo/_/rtsa ni dmar ser dag gis khyab/_/rngul dang tsha bar bcas pas sreg_/ngad 'byung reg na 'jam pa dang /_/
[\[156b.2\]]myur du smin cing nyer gdung 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa 'byung ba dang /_pags pa dang sen mo la sogs pa mdog ser ba dang /_gsus pa'i mdog rtsa sngo bar snang ba dang /_rtsa'i mdog
[\[156b.3\]]dmar po dang ser po dag gis khebs pa dang /_lus rngul zhing tsha ba dang bcas pas me ltar sreg par byed pa dang /_ngad 'byung zhing du ba 'thul ba lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_reg na 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang /_myur du smin cing tshos par mi 'gyur ba dang /_nye bar gdung zhing bsreg par
[\[156b.4\]]'gyur ba yin no/_/bad kan dmu rdzing lhu tshigs na/_/tshor ba med cing skrang la lci/_/gnyid che slon zhing yi ga 'chus/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde lpags sogs/_/skya zhing lto ba mkhrang la snum/_/rtsa yi ri mos khyab cing che/_/ring nas 'phel zhing sra ba dang /_/
[\[156b.5\]]reg na grang zhing gsus pa lci/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni yan lag gi lhu tshigs na zhing snyom pa dang /_tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'gyur ba dang /_skrang pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /_pags pa nas bshang gci'i
[\[156b.6\]]bar du skya zhing dkar ba dang /_lto ba sra zhing rem rem por 'dug pa dang /_/rtsa ris kyi mdog skyabs khyab pa dang /_che zhing sbom pa dang /_ring zhig nas 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /_rdo ltar sra ba dang /_reg na grang zhing bsil ba dang /_gsus pa lci zhing
[\[156b.7\]]brtan pa yin no/_/gnas gsum 'khrugs pa de dang de/_/bud med kyis byin dri ma rdul/_/dbyig dug dug sogs kyis gnod 'gyur/_/khag bcas dri ma bsags pa ni/_/ltor song gnod pa skyed byed de/_/kha skam mgo 'khor brgyal bcas pa'i/_/
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]rtags gsum ldan pa'i dmu rdzing skyed/_/myur du smin cing mi bzad na/_/de ni grang dang rlung dang char/_/phrad pas shin tu gnod par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi gsum char skyed par byed pa'i rgyu nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi'i skabs su
[\[157a.2\]]bshad pa rnam pa mang po de dang de dag dang /_de bzhin du bud med kyis dbang du byas pa'i phyir/_srog chags kyi yan lag las byung ba'i skra la sogs pa dri ma dang rdul 'byin par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du dbyig dug dang dug la sogs pa byin pas gnod par gyur pas
[\[157a.3\]]khrag dang bcas pa'i rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi dri ma bsal zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lto bar song zhing /_phyin nas gnod pa'i nad skyed cing 'byung bar byed de/_de kha skam pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dmu rdzing nad gzhi gsum gyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa skyed par byed pa de ni
[\[157a.4\]]myur du smin zhing brnag par dka' bar mi bzad par na ba yin no/_/yang dmu rdzing gi nad de ni grang ba la sogs pa dang phrad pas shin tu gnod cing nad 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/mang du zos pas bskyod pa dang /_/bzhon pa drag tu 'gro ba dang /_/las lam nyal po
[\[157a.5\]]drags pas dub/_/skyug sman drags dang nad kyis skem/_/g.yon logs gnas pa'i mcher pa ni/_/gnas las 'phos te 'phel ba dang /_/yang na dwangs ma sogs pas khrag_/rgyas byas de ni 'phel gyur dang /_/de ni gtun bu bzhin rab sra/_/de nas
[\[157a.6\]]rus sbal rgyab 'dra bar/_/rim gyis 'phel bar 'gyur nas ni/_/lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde skom dad/_/kha yis ro ni mi tshor zhing /_/lci zhing na la rims kyis 'debs/_/sha mdog skya zhing mi sdug la/_/brgyal zhing slon
[\[157a.7\]]par byed pa dang /_/tsha zhing myos dang ldan par 'gyur/_/rtsa mdog dmar ba'am mi sdug pa'am/_/sngo zhing ser la ri mor bcas/_/zhes bya ba la/_mang du zos shing ha cang 'grangs drags pas bskyod pa dang /_rta dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i bzhon pas
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]drag tu bskyod cing 'gro ba dang /_las dang lam gyis dub pa la sogs pas g.yon logs na gnas pa'i mcher pa gnas las 'phos te 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /_yang na dwangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams kyi khrag 'phel zhing rgyas par byas pa'i
[\[157b.2\]]dbang gis mcher pa de 'phel bas gnas las 'phos pa'am/_rang gi gnas nyid du 'phel bar gyur la/_de nas ni mcher pa de dang por gtun bu ltar sra bar 'gyur la/_de nas de'i 'og tu rus sbal gyi rgyab 'dra bar rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur gyi cig car
[\[157b.3\]]'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi/_de ltar lto bar dmu rdzing chags par 'byung bar byed la de yang dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa nas rtsa ris sngo zhing ser ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/de la rim gyis nad rnams ni/_/bshang 'gags nad dang lto sbos dang /_/rmongs bag skom tsha rims
[\[157b.4\]]kyis 'debs/_/lus lci lto sra yi ga 'chus/_/zhes bya ba la/_mcher pa'i skran de la rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams ni rim bzhin du bshang ba 'gags pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/de yang bshang ba 'gags pa dang na ba dang /_lto
[\[157b.5\]]sbos pa las ni rlung yin par shes par bya'o/_/rmongs bag dang skom dad tsha ba dang rims kyis 'debs pa las ni mkhris pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/lus lci ba dang lto sra ba dang yi ga 'chus pa las ni bad kan yin par shes par bya'o/_/mcher ba lta bur mchin g.yas
[\[157b.6\]]logs/_/gnas 'phos dmu rdzing skyed ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar mcher ba g.yon logs na 'dug ste/_rgyu'i khyad par gyis 'phos shing lhung nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mchin pa g.yas logs na gnas pa yang 'phos shing thur du lhung la 'phel
[\[157b.7\]]bar gyur nas dmu rdzing skyed par shes par bya'o/_/bya sgro spu dang bcas pa'i zas/_/zos pas bshang lam gnas 'gags te/_/gzhang 'brum dang ni rtug skam dang /_/rgyu mar chags pa'i zas kyis kyang /_/thur du sel ba'i rlung 'khrugs te/_/bshang bas bad mkhris
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]bkag nas ni/_/lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed/_/des ni tsha skom rims sbrid 'byung /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde brlan/_/klad snying lte ba gzhang kha na/_/dri ma 'gags slon yi ga 'chus/_/lto bar rlung ni 'khyims par byed/_/brtan zhing rtsa
[\[158a.2\]]ni sngo la smug_/rtsa ris snang ba'am mi snang 'gyur/_/phal cher lte ba'i 'og tu ni/_/ba lang mjug 'dra 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_bya sgro phra mo dang spu'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i zas zos shing longs spyad pas bshang ba'i lam gyi gnas 'gags shing 'byung du
[\[158a.3\]]mi rung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzhang 'brum gyis gzhang 'gags par byas pa'am/_rgyu mar chags shing thogs par byed pa'i zas sran ma ma sha dang zar ma la sogs pa zos pas thur du sel ba'i rlung 'khrugs par 'gyur te/_bshang ba la sogs pas bkag nas lto sra
[\[158a.4\]]bar dmu rdzing chags par gyur te/_ltor 'khyil zhing dri ma 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing des nad pa la tsha zhing skom pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_lto bar rlung 'khyims te rlung phyir 'byung bar mi byed cing nang du 'khyil bar byed pa dang /_brtan pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang
[\[158a.5\]]ldan pa dang /_yang dmu rdzing de ni phal cher mang du lte ba'i 'og tu dbyibs ba lang gi mjug ma 'dra bar 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rus sogs zug rngur bcas pa'i zas/_/zos sam shin tu drag zos pa/_/rgyu ma rdol lam gas gyur nas/_/bu ga de nas ma zhu bar/_/
[\[158a.6\]]spyir 'dzag bshang lam las 'byung zhing /_/bshang bcas nyung shas nyung shas ni/_/sha rul lta bur mnam pa ni/_/sbyin bag dmar ser 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lhag ma yis ni lto ba 'gengs/_/dmu rdzing mi bzad skye bar 'gyur/_/de ni lte ba man chad rgyas/_/chus
[\[158a.7\]]gang lta bur myur du 'gyur/_/nad kyi tshul ni shas cher ldan/_/dbugs mi bde skam mgo 'khor khyab/_/rgyu rdol dmu rdzing zhes bshad de/_/gzhan dag rgyu ma 'dzag ces zer/_/zhes bya ba la/_rus pa dang rtsa dang tsher ma dang rdo dang rwa dang shing gi tshal ba la sogs pa'i
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]zas zug rngu dang bcas pa'i kha zas zos par gyur pa'am/_yang na shin tu drag cing shas cher zos pas gang gi rgyu ma rdol cing bu ga dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /_gas par gyur nas rdol ba'am/_gas pa'i bu ga de nas phyir 'dzag cing zas ma zhu ba kho nar phyir 'dzag
[\[158b.2\]]par gyur cing bshang ba'i lam nas 'byung bar byed la/_de yang bshang ba dang bcas par nyung shas nyung shas 'byung zhing /_'byung ba de yang sha rul te mi ro'i dri ltar shin tu mnam par 'byung zhing /_shing shal ma li'i thang chu ltar sbyin zhing 'byar bag tu gnas pa la/_
[\[158b.3\]]mdog dmar zhing rtsa ser bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bshang ba'i lam las byung ba'i lhag mas ni lto ba 'gengs shing rgyas par byas nas dmu rdzing gi nad mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur la/_dmu rdzing de ni lte ba man chad rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur
[\[158b.4\]]la/_/de yang lto ba chus gang ba lta bu'i dmu rdzing du myur zhing ring por mi thogs par 'gyur ro/_/de ni nad kyi tshul shas che zhing nad kyi rtags stobs dang ldan pa'i tshabs po che dang ldan pa yin la/_dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pas kyang khyab cing zil gyis mnan pa yin no/_/dmu
[\[158b.5\]]rdzing de ni rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o/_/zhes slob dpon gyis bshad do/_/drang srong gzhan dag ni dmu rdzing de yongs su 'dzag pa'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o/_/zhes zer ro/_/snum 'thungs la sogs byas nas ni/_/'phral du chu grang 'thungs pa'am/_/me drod bri
[\[158b.6\]]ba'am ha cang ni/_/skom pas chu 'thungs drags pa'am/_/rlung dang bad kan 'khrugs chur 'dres/_/chu yi lam ni bkag gyur pas/_/de nyid gnas der 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de 'og dmu rdzing gyur pa yin/_/de nas dmu rdzing de las ni/_/skom dad rkub tu chu
[\[158b.7\]]'dzag bcas/_/dbugs mi bde lud yi ga 'chus/_/sna tshogs mdog ldan rtsa yis khyab/_/rkyal pa chus gang reg pa 'dra/_/bskyod na sgra grag lus 'dar la/_/dmu rdzing chen pos che zhing snum/_/brtan zhing de ni lte ba zlum/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang zhig snum
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]'thungs par gyur pa dang /_sogs pa zhes bya ba smos pas skyug sman dang /_bkru sman la sogs pa byas shing btang zin pa'i rjes la 'phral du ste ring po ma lon pa nyid du chu grang bskol ba ma yin pa 'thungs pa dang /_yang na chu grang la sogs pa
[\[159a.2\]]'thungs drags pas pho ba'i me drod bri zhing nyams pa dang /_yang na ha cang skom ches pa ste/_zas bcad pa la sogs pas rus pa dang rgyus pa tsam lus par gyur pas chu 'thungs drags te/_gnod pa de'i rgyus rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur ba dang /_bad kan kyang
[\[159a.3\]]'khrugs par gyur nas chu rgyu ba'i lam gyi rgyun srang bkag cing /_rlung dang bad kan de gnyis lto bar gnas shing chu de nyid der gnas shing de las 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur bas/_de'i 'og tu chu'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa yin no/_/de nas de'i 'og tu dmu rdzing de skom dad la
[\[159a.4\]]sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rkyal pa chus gang ba la reg pa dang 'dra bar chu'i dmu rdzing de phan tshun bskyod na sgra grag pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa dang /_lte ba kun nas zlum zhing 'khyil ba'i rang bzhin can du gnas pa yin no/_/thams cad yal bar bor na ni/_/
[\[159a.5\]]nad ni rang gnas las 'phos te/_/smin pas sla zhing zag 'gyur ba/_/tshigs dang rtsa sgo las kyang 'dzag_/phyi yi rtsa sgo nas rdul 'byung /_/'gags nas thad kar 'khyil zhing gnas/_/chu de nyid ni 'phel 'gyur zhing /_/sbyin bag gyur nas de'i tshe ni/_/lto ba lci zhing
[\[159a.6\]]sra la zlum/_/brdabs na sgra ni mi 'byung zhing /_/mdog 'jam rtsa ris mi snang la/_/lto ba dang ni rgyab du 'gro/_/de rjes chu yi dmu rdzing skye/_/lto bar 'phel zhing de las lhag_/rtsa nub gyur pa'i dmu chu ni/_/dmu rdzing bshad pa'i mtshan nyid ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[159a.7\]]dmu rdzing de thams cad kyang yal bar bor zhing gso ba ma byas na/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad rang gi gnas nas 'phos nas rang gi gnas spangs te/_smin cing gsher bas sla zhing rnag zag par byed par 'gyur bas tshigs dang rtsa'i sgo nas kyang zag cing 'byung bar 'gyur la/_phyi
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]rol gyi rtsa'i sgo ba spu'i bu gnas rngul 'byung ba 'gags shing 'byung du mi ster bas/_thad kar 'khyil cing yan lag tu 'gro bas gnas la sngar gnas pa'i chu de nyid 'phel zhing sogs par byas nas sbyin bag tu byed la/_de nas de'i 'og tu de'i tshe lto ba de lci ba la sogs par
[\[159b.2\]]'gyur la/_lag pas brdabs na yang sgra mi 'byung ba la sogs par 'gyur la/_de nas de'i rjes la dmu rdzing der chu'i dmu rdzing 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye bar 'gyur te chu de lto bar lci zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /_rtsa rnams nub cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /_chu'i
[\[159b.3\]]dmu rdzing bshang ba'i mtshan nyid/_/skom dad rkub tu chu 'dzag bcas/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan mcher/_/'dus pa'i chu yi dmu rdzing rnams/_/phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka'/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la
[\[159b.4\]]sogs pa'i dmu rdzing ni phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' ba yin te/_rlung gi dmu rdzing bas ni mkhris pa'i dmu rdzing gso bar dka' ba yin la/_de bas ni bad kan gyi dmu rdzing gso bar dka' bas na/_chu'i dmu rdzing ni shin tu gso bar dka' ba yin no/_/gzhan dag
[\[159b.5\]]phal cher zla phyed gsod/_/ces bya ba la/_dmu rdzing de las gzhan pa gnyis po dri ma 'gags pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing dang /_rgyu ma rdol ba las byung ba'i dmu rdzing dag ni phal cher te mang du zla ba phyed lon pa dang nad pa de gsod cing 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/
[\[159b.6\]]thams cad chur gyur 'chi ltas le'u/_/las bshad bla brnan ldan pa'ang gsod/_/ces bya ba la/_dmu rdzing thams cad de rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa kun kyang chur skyes pa ste/_chu'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du 'chi ltas las bshad pa'i bla brnan dang
[\[159b.7\]]ldan pa ste/_sna dang mig dang mtshan ma yo/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dmu rdzing yang gsod pa yin no/_/skyes nas dmu rdzing gyur pa dag_/phal cher gso bar dka' bar bshad/_/stobs ldan chur ni ma gyur zhing /_/gsar du byung ba 'bad pas gso/_/
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]zhes bya ba la/_skyes nas byung ba'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gso bar dka' ba yin no/_/mi stobs dang ldan zhing na tshod dar la bab pa la dam rdzing de skyes par gyur cing /_chur ma gyur te gsar du byung ba dag ni gsor
[\[160a.2\]]rung mod kyi/_spyir gso bar dka' ba'i nad yin pas 'bad pa dang ldan pa kho nas gso bar bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas
[\[160a.3\]]kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas skya rbab dang 'or nad dang me dbal gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_dmu rdzing gi nad gzhi'i 'og tu skya rbab kyi nad gzhi bshad pa ni/_dmu rdzing gi nad skyes na skya rbab la sogs pa yang
[\[160a.4\]]'byung bar 'gyur bas/_de'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/ji skad bshad pa'i nad 'khrugs pas/_/mkhris pa lhag par ldang gyur la/_/de la rlung ni stobs che bas/_/snying la gnas pa'i mkhris pa ni/_/gtor te rtsa chen bcu'i nang bkram/_/lus kun la ni
[\[160a.5\]]khyab gyur pas/_/bad kan pags pa sha khrag la/_/gnod byas bar du gnas nas ni/_/sha dang pags pa de dag las/_/lpags mdog tha dad dkar ba dang /_/ser zhing ljang sngon byed par 'gyur/_/de las skya ba'i shas che bas/_/de phyir skya rbab nad ces bshad/_/
[\[160a.6\]]ces bya ba la/_nad rnams ji skad bshad pa'i kha ba dang tsha ba dang mngar ba la sogs pa'i nad gzhi ldang ba'i rgyus 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur la/_mkhris pa lhag par shas che bar ldang zhing 'khrugs par gyur na skya rbab kyi nad skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de la nad de rnams
[\[160a.7\]]kyi nang nas rlung gi nad gang yin pa de ni stobs dang nus pa shin tu che ba yin pas/_snying gar gnas pa'i mkhris pa gang yin pa de gtor zhing byer bar byed la/_des na mkhris pa de snying la brten pa'i rtsa bo che bcur bkram zhing phyin par byas nas lus ma lus pa kun la khyab cing byer
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]bar gyur nas bad kan la sogs pa la gnod par byas nas/_de pags pa dang sha gnyis kyi bar du gnas te/_mkhris pa de pags pa'i mdog rnam pa tha dad cing du mar gyur pa skya zhing dkar ba dang ser po dang ljang sngon du byed par 'gyur ro/_/mdog de dag las gang gi phyir
[\[160b.2\]]skya zhing dkar ba'i shas che bas na rgyu de'i phyir nad de la skya rbab kyi nad ces bya'o zhes drang srong dag gis bshad do/_/nad des lus ni lci ba dang /_/lus zungs rnams ni lhod pa dang /_/mdangs kyi yon tan zad gyur cing /_/de las khrag dang tshil chung ste/_/snying po med cing
[\[160b.3\]]dbang po lhod/_/yan lag brdungs pa snyam byed cing /_/snying ni zag pa snyam du sems/_/mig phugs skrang zhing nyams la na/_/mchil mang skad gdangs dma' ba dang /_/zas mi 'dod cing grang mi bzod/_/spu 'byi me drod nyams pa dang /_/ro smad 'bying zhing rims
[\[160b.4\]]kyis 'debs/_/dbugs mi bde zhing rna sgra 'bod/_/mgo 'khor ngal bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_skya rbab kyi nad des lus kyi khong lci ba dang /_dwangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs lhod cing gcig tu 'dus pa zhig pa dang /_mdangs kyi yon tan gang dag yod pa de zad
[\[160b.5\]]cing nyams par 'gyur ba dang /_rgyu de dag gis mi'i khrag dang tshil chung ba la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /_snying po ni lus kyi stobs la bya ste de med par 'gyur ba dang /_dbang po'i tshogs rnams lhod cing bya ba'i sbyar ba las nyams pa dang /_lag ngar la sogs pa'i yan
[\[160b.6\]]lag rnams brdungs pa snyam du sems pa dang /_na bar 'gyur ba dang /_snying zag cing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang /_mig gi phugs skrang zhing glo ba dang /_mig nyams shing mi sdug pa dang /_mchil ma mang ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_ro smad 'bying zhing nang du zhum
[\[160b.7\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa 'byung bar shes par bya'o/_/de ni nad gzhi tha dad 'dus/_/sa zhag zos las rnam lngar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skya rbab kyi nad de rnam pa lnga yod de nad gzhi tha dad pa las gyur pa gsum dang /_gsum char
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]'dus pa las gyur pa gcig dang /_sa zhag zos pa las gyur pa ni lnga pa yin no/_/'di yi sngon tshul snying 'phar zhing /_/pags pa rtsub par gyur pa dang /_/yi ga 'chus shing gcin mdog ser/_/rngul med khong pa'i me drod nyams/_/lus rmya ngal
[\[161a.2\]]bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_skya rbab kyi nad 'di'i sngon du byung ba'i tshul ni/_snying cung zad 'phar ba dang /_la lar pags pa rtsub par gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/de la rlung gyur lus na zug_/rtsa sen mig dang bshang gci rnams/_/mdog gnag rtsub la
[\[161a.3\]]'dar ba dang /_/skrang sbo kha yis ro mi tshor/_/rtug skam rtsib logs klad pa na/_/zhes bya ba la/_skya rbab kyi nad de rlung las gyur pa ni lus na zhing mi bde ba dang /_khab kyis phug pa ltar zug pa dang /_rtsa dang sen mo la sogs pa mdog dmar zhing rtsub pa dang /_lus
[\[161a.4\]]'dar ba dang /_skom dad la sogs pas nyen par 'gyur ba yin no/_/mkhris las rtsa dang sen mo sogs/_/ljang sngon rims 'debs mun 'thibs byed/_/skom dad rdul brgyal bsil ba 'dod/_/lus mnam kha nang kha ba dang /_/'khru zhing sgregs pa skyur la tsha/_/zhes
[\[161a.5\]]bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi nad ni/_rtsa dang sen mo dang mig dang /_bshang ba dang /_gci ba ljang sngon la sogs pa'i mdog tu snang ba dang /_rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/bad kan rtsa sogs dkar ba dang /_/glongs shing kha nang
[\[161a.6\]]lan tshwa bro/_/ba spu ldang zhing skad 'gags la/_/lud pa lu zhing slon par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi nad ni/_/rtsa dang sen mo la sogs pa dkar ba dang /_ba spu ldang zhing brtse ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no/_/'dus gyur mtshan ma
[\[161a.7\]]'dres brnag dka'/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab ni nad gzhi gsum char gyi mtshan nyid 'dres ma dang ldan la/_de yang rnag cing bzod par dka' ba yin no/_/sa zhag bska bas rlung skyed la/_/tshwa bro mkhris pa mngar bad kan/_/dwangs ma la sogs
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]gnod 'gyur zhing /_/rtsub pas zas zos rtsub gyur nas/_/zhu bas rtsa sbubs 'gags byas te/_/snga ma bzhin du skya rbab skyed/_/de nas lte ba rkang pa dang /_/kha dang pho mtshan skrang bar byed/_/bshang ba srin bu dang bcas 'khru/_/bad kan khrag dang bcas pa 'byung /_/
[\[161b.2\]]zhes bya ba la/_sa zhag zos na de'i ro bska bas ni rlung skyed cing gnod par byed la/_lan tshwa bro bas ni mkhris pa skyed par byed/_/mngar bag las ni bad kan skyed par byed cing /_dwangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams la yang gnod cing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[161b.3\]]de'i rtsub pa'i rgyus kha zas zos pa rtsub por gyur nas sa zhag de zhu bar gyur pa dang /_des rtsa sbubs kyi sgo 'gag cing rgyur mi rung bar byas te rtsa sbubs de dag snga ma bzhin du skya rbab kyi nad skyed par byed do/_/de nas de'i 'og tu lte ba la sogs pa skrang bar byed pa dang /_bshang ba srin bu dang
[\[161b.4\]]bcas par 'khru zhing 'byung ba dang /_khrag dang bcas pa'i bad kan kha nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/gang zhig skya rbab nad kyis btab/_/de yis mkhris skyed zas zos pas/_/khong pa yan lag gnas mkhris gnas/_/bshang khrag bsregs te mig ser skyed/_/ces
[\[161b.5\]]bya ba la/_skya rbab kyi nad dang ldan pa'i mi gang zhig mkhris pa skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa'i zas dang skom la sogs pa bsten cing zos pas/_mi de'i khong pa dang yan lag la brten cing gnas pa'i mkhris pas mig ser skyed par byed do/_/ci zhig byas nas skyed par byed ce na/_khrag
[\[161b.6\]]dang sha bsregs shing tshig par byas pas mig ser skyed par byed do/_/des ni mig dang pags pa gdong /_/bshang gci sen mo kha dog ser/_/lus tsha skom dad zas mi 'ju/_/sbal 'dra dbang po nyam chung 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mig ser gyi nad des mig la sogs pa mdog
[\[161b.7\]]ser por 'gyur la/_de bzhin du lus tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_sngal ba ser po lta bu'i mdog dang ldan pa dang /_dbang po rnams nyam chung zhing rang gi yul 'dzin par mi nus pa yin no/_/de ni mkhris pa'i shas che na/_/skya rbab nad med par de 'byung /_/zhes bya
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]ba la/_mig ser gyi nad 'di ni mkhris pa skyed par byed pa'i dngos po bsten pa dang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin shas che bas mkhris pa shin tu rgyas par gyur pa ni/_skya rbab kyi nad med par yang khong ba dang yan lag la brten pa'i mkhris pa mig ser skyed
[\[162a.2\]]par byed do/_/yal bar bor na cher skrangs te/_/gso dka' mig ser 'or thabs yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mig ser gyi nad de nyid gso ba ma byas par yal bar bor na/_tshabs cher skrangs par gyur ba de ni mig ser 'or thabs zhes bya ste/_de ni gso dka' zhing bcos
[\[162a.3\]]par dka' ba yin no/_/ha li sa ni ljang nag ser/_/rlung mkhris mgo 'khor skom dad che/_/bud med la dga' rims chung 'debs/_/khong rmya me drod nyams stobs 'bri/_/ha li sa ka khrag ngan gyur/_/chu ser can zhes bya ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi
[\[162a.4\]]tshe skya rbab kyi nad mkhris pa shas che bas ldang zhing gnas la ser bar 'gyur la/_rlung dang mkhris pa shas che ba las mgo 'khor ba la sogs pa 'byung ba dang /_rims cung zad tsam gyis 'debs pa dang /_khong rmya ba la sogs par 'gyur te/_nad de'i ming ni ha li sa ka
[\[162a.5\]]zhes bya ba khrag ngan pa las gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du chu ser can zhes bya'o/_/zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/de rnams kyi ni bla brnan sngar/_/'or nad gtso bo yin par bshad/_/de phyir de nyid bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_skya rbab kyi nad de rnams
[\[162a.6\]]kyi bla ba rnan sngar 'chi ltas kyi le'u'i skabs su 'or nad skrangs pa kho na gtso bo yin par bshad cing bstan pas/_de'i phyir 'or nad skya rbab kyi 'og tu bshad cing bstan par bya'o/_/de yang /_skya rbab 'or nad bcas pa dang /_/rmig dang sen mo ser por snang /_/zhes bya ba la
[\[162a.7\]]sogs pa'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin no/_/rlung 'khrugs gyur pas bad kan dang /_/khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol rtsar/_/'phros byas de yang rgyun srang 'gags/_/pags pa sha la gnas gyur te/_/'or nad mthong zhing skrang bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung 'khrugs
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]shang ldang bar gyur pas bad kan dang khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol gyi rtsar 'phros shing bye bar byas nas/_bad kan la sogs pa de dag kyang phan tshun 'gro ba'i rgyun srang 'gags pas pags pa dang sha la gnas te 'or nad du 'gyur zhing mthong zhing mkhrang bar gyur pa'i skrang pa'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[162b.2\]]de bas thams cad 'dus gyur bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_rgyu de bas na 'or nad thams cad ni nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa yin no zhes rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/rgyu rnams kyi ni bye brag las/_/gzugs byed dgu yi bdag nyid
[\[162b.3\]]can/_/nad gzhi tha dad gnyis dang kun/_/snad dang dug gis phog las byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_'or nad kyi rgyu so sor nges pa'i bye brag gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba rnam pa dgu'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur te/_de yang rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi tha dad las gyur pa gsum dang /_
[\[162b.4\]]gnyis gnyis 'dres pa las gyur pa gsum dang /_thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig ste de ltar bdun dang /_snad pa las gyur pa dang dug gis phog pa las byung ba gnyis te spyir dgu yin no/_/yang na rang dang glo bur gnyis/_/yan lag kun skrang phyogs gcig
[\[162b.5\]]gnyis/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na 'or nad ni rnam pa gnyis te/_nang na rang la yod pa'i nyes pa'i gzhi las byung ba dang /_glo bur ba'i nyes pa dug dang snad pa las byung ba gnyis so/_/yang rnam pa gnyis te/_lus kyi yan lag kun skrang ba'i 'or nad dang /_yan
[\[162b.6\]]lag gi phyogs gcig tu 'byung ba'o/_/khyab dang mtho dang mdud pa yi/_/dbyibs kyi dbye bas gsum du'ang 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_yang 'or nad de ni khyab pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yin par drang srong rnams 'dod cing bshad de/_khyab pa ni rgya che ba'o/_/
[\[162b.7\]]mtho ba ni grog mkhar ltar bags kyis mtho ba'o/_/mdud pa can ni mdud pa ltar tog tog por 'dug pa'o/_/de ltar na khyad par de dag gi 'or nad ni rnam pa gsum yin par 'dod do/_/'or nad kyi ni spyi yi rgyu/_/nad las skyes pa khyad par nyid/_/nad las smyung sogs
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]kyis nyam chung /_/myur du lhag par zos las 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_lhan cig skyes pa dang glo bur ba'i 'or nad thams cad kyi spyi'i thun mong gi rgyu ni 'og nas bshad pa yin la/_nad gzhi las byung ba'i 'or nad kyi mtshan nyid ni rgyu'i khyad par lhag pa
[\[163a.2\]]gzhan yod de/_de bzhin du glo bur ba'i rgyu ni rims la sogs pa'i nad dang /_skyug sman la sogs pa'i las dang /_smyung ba byas shing zas bcad pa dang /_sogs pa zhes smos pa las kyis dub pa la sogs pa nyam chung zhing rid par gyur pa'i mis myur du ste/_de'i mod la zas
[\[163a.3\]]drag par zos na 'or nad skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzhan yang lci ba dang /_/skyur dang snum bsil lan tshwa dang /_/thal sman rnon po tsha ba dang /_/mya ngan chu gnyid drags dang yar/_/zas zos sha lci sha skam dang /_/ma zhu ngal dang bud med drags/_/rkang gis lam du
[\[163a.4\]]'gro ba'am/_/bzhon pas drag tu bskyod 'gyur yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas gzhan yang nad med par gnas pa dag gis zas dang skom lci ba la sogs pa shas cher drags pa bsten pas 'or nad skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ma zhu ba la sogs pas nad skyed pa yin no/_/
[\[163a.5\]]lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru/_/gzhang 'brum lto ba'i nad dang ni/_/mngal nas khrag zag rims kyis btab/_/gsud dang chu ser slon nyes dang /_/sbrum ma dang ni me dbal gyi/_/nad dang skya rbab dag gis btab/_/gzhan yang log par gsos gyur pa'i/_/
[\[163a.6\]]nad de brang du gnas na ni/_/stod skrang chu sor gnas smad skrang /_/dbus na gnas pa rab tu skrang /_/yan lag kun khyab thams cad skrang /_/nying lag la brten de skrang byed/_/ces bya ba la/_lud pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang /_de las gzhan pa'i nad rnams legs par gsos shing sman
[\[163a.7\]]dpyad kyi bstan bcos las ji skad bshad pa bzhin du gsos par gyur na 'or nad kyi rgyur 'gyur te/_rgyu des rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs par 'gyur ba de brang na gnas pa lus kyi ro stod kyi cha skrang bar byed la/_chu sor gnas na chu so man chad kyi ro smad skrang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]dbus te lte ba dang rked pa'i phyogs su gnas na lus kyi bar gyi phyogs su skrang bar 'gyur ro/_/lus kyi yan lag kun la khyab par gnas na thams cad skrang bar 'gyur ro/_/yan lag re re'i nying lag la gnas na gang la gnas pa'i nying lag nyid skrang bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[163b.2\]]de yi sngon tshul rtsa rnams tsha/_/yan lag snyom par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'or nad kyi sngon byung ba'i tshul ni mig la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams shin tu mi bzod par tsha ba dang /_yan lag rnams snyom zhing na bar byed pa yin no/_/rlung las skrang ba 'pho zhing rtsub/_/spu rtsub
[\[163b.3\]]smug cing gnag pa dang /_/lpags 'khums 'dar brtse reg na na/_/na zhing zug pa be+em be+em po/_/myur bar ldang zhing myur du zhi/_/skrang ba mnan na dma' bar 'gyur/_/snum dang dro bas mnyes na zhi/_/mtshan mo chung zhing nyin mo che/_/pags pa yungs kar lde
[\[163b.4\]]gu yis/_/bskus ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni/_'pho zhing gnas ma nges pa dang /_reg na rtsub pa dang /_spu rtsub par gnas pa dang /_mdog smug cing gnag pa dang /_pags pa 'khums shing gnyer ma yod pa la
[\[163b.5\]]sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du myur du ldang zhing 'byung la/_myur du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_skrang ba'i phyogs lag pas mnan na dma' zhing kung kung por 'gyur ba dang /_snum bskus shing drod bag tu byas te mnyes na zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_mtshan mo skrang ba bri
[\[163b.6\]]zhing chung la/_nyin mo skrang ba che zhing 'phel ba dang /_pags pa yang yungs kar btags pa'i lde gus bskus pa ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/mkhris pa rtsa ser dmar la gnag_/spu ni dmar ser gyur pa dang /_/myur du ldang dang zhi mi 'gyur/_/
[\[163b.7\]]dang por dbus su byung dang srab/_/skom bcas tsha zhing rims 'debs rngul/_/mnam zhing 'drul la snum mgo 'khor/_/bsil bag 'dod cing thur du 'khru/_/dri mnam reg na mi bzod 'jam/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni/_/mdog
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]ser po la sogs par snang ba dang /_spu'i mdog dmar ser du gyur pa dang /_myur du ldang zhing 'byung ba dang /_zhi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_thog mar dbus kyi phyogs nas skrangs shing mched pa dang /_pags pa srab pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa
[\[164a.2\]]dang /_/reg na mi bzod cing na la 'jam zhing mnyen pa yin no/_/bad kan g.ya' spu pags pa dkar/_/mkhrang zhing bsil la lci ba dang /_/snum zhing 'jam la brtan zhing 'thas/_/gnyid che slon zhing me drod nyams/_/mnan na mi 'bying ldang dka' zhing /_/zhi
[\[164a.3\]]dka' mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che/_/'od ma gtsags bu sogs dral yang /_/khrag mi 'byung bar sbyin bag 'dzag_/dro dang reg pa la mngon dga'/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni skrang ba g.ya' ba dang /_spu dang pags pa dkar zhing skya ba dang /_
[\[164a.4\]]mkhrang zhing sra ba dang /_reg na bsil ba dang /_snum pa la sogs pa dang ldan zhing /_gnyid che ba la sogs par byed pa dang /_mnan na 'bying zhing sbo bar mi byed pa dang /_ldang zhing skye ba dang zhi ba dka' ba dang /_mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che zhing nyin mo skrangs tshabs
[\[164a.5\]]chung ba dang /_'od ma'i tshal pa dang /_gtsags bu la sogs pas dbral ba yang khrag mi 'byung bar ring zhig na sbyin bag nal nal po 'byung ba dang /_dro ba la dga' ba dang /_reg cing byugs na dga' ba yin no/_/gnyis byung gsum por ji bzhin pa/_/rgyu dang
[\[164a.6\]]mtshan ma 'dren ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gnyis las byung ba'i 'or nad gsum ni rgyu dang dbyibs kyi mtshan ma 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin no/_/'dus pa kun gyi bdag nyid can/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni mtshan ma thams cad dang
[\[164a.7\]]ldan pa'i bdag nyid can yin no/_/mtshon la sogs pas snad gyur cing /_/bcad dam dbral lam smas la sogs/_/kha ba me dang rgya mtsho'i rlung /_/bse rtsi ka pi ka chu yi/_/khu ba gra ma sogs reg pas/_/skrang ba mched par 'gyur ba yin/_/shin tu tsha zhing dmar
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]bar snang /_/phal cher 'khris pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshon cha la sogs pas snad cing rma phyung la/_bcad pa dang dbral ba dang /_rma phug pa la sogs pa las byung ba'i 'or nad dang /_sogs pa smos pas brdungs pa dang /_bcag pa dang /_bsnun pa
[\[164b.2\]]dang /_lhung ba dang /_bcings pa dang /_dkris pa la sogs pa bsdu'o/_/de bzhin du kha bas phyid pa dang /_mes tshig pa dang /_de bzhin du rgya mtsho las byung ba'i rlung gis phog pa dang /_bse shing gi me tog dang thang chus phog pa dang /_ka pi ka chu'i zhes bya ba kha sral
[\[164b.3\]]phre'u ad ma kub ta zhes bya ba'i gra mas reg na yang skrang par 'gyur zhing /_skrang pa de phan tshun mched cing byer bar 'gyur ba dang /_shin tu tsha zhing dro ba dang /_mdog dmar por snang ba yin la/_phal cher te mang du mkhris pa dang mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin no/_/dug skyes srog
