[\[164b.4\]]chags dug can ni/_/lus la song dang gcin gyis phog_/srog chags dug med pa yi yang /_/so dang mche ba sen mos zug_/gcin rtug khu bas smes pa dang /_/dri ma can gyi gos kyis reg_/dug shing rlung la reg pa dang /_/dbyig dug phye mas reg las byung /_/mnyen
[\[164b.5\]]zhing g.yo la 'phyang ba dang /_/myur gsod tsha zhing na bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_dug las skyes pa'i 'or nad ni sbrul la sogs pa'i srog chags dug can gyis reg cing lus la song ba dang /_de bzhin du de'i gcin gyis phog pa dang /_srog chags dug med pa dag gi
[\[164b.6\]]yang gcin dang rtug pas phog pa dang /_yang zhes smos pa ni dug dang bcas pa bsdu ba ste/_de dag gi so dang mche ba dang sen mos zin cing zug pa dag kyang 'or nad du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gcin dang rtug pa dang khu chus smes par byas pa dang /_de bzhin du dri ma
[\[164b.7\]]dang bcas pa'i gos kyis reg pas kyang 'or nad du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dug gis shing la reg pa dang /_dug dang 'dres pa'i rlung la reg pa dang /_de bzhin du dbyig dug sbyar mar byas pa'i phye mas reg pa las kyang 'or nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/skrangs pa de ni mnyen
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]zhing 'jam pa dang /_g.yo zhing 'pho ba dang /_'phyang bag tu gnas pa dang /_myur du gsod par byed pa dang /_tsha bar byed pa dang /_na bar byed pa yin no/_/'or nad gsar byung bla brnan med/_/gso sla/_zhes bya ba la/_'or nad gsar du byung zhing
[\[165a.2\]]skyes nas ring por ma lon pa dang /_bla brnan gyi nad gzhan gyis ma gtses pa dag ni gso bar sla zhing sman dpyad kyis bcos par nus pa yin no/_/gso dka' sngar bshad zin/_zhes bya ba la/_'or nad gso bar mi rung ba ni sngar lus kyi 'gyur ba bshad pa'i le'u'i skabs su
[\[165a.3\]]bla brnan du mar ldan pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bshad cing bstan zin pa yin no/_/me dbal nad dang snad pa'i bar/_/gnod pa 'or nad mtshungs pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_me dbal gyi nad ni nad gzhi so so dang gnyis 'dres pa dang /_thams cad 'dus pa
[\[165a.4\]]las gyur pa dang /_/snad pa'i bar las byung ba ste/_/me dbal rnam pa brgyad yin no/_/de bzhin du gnod pa rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin no/_/de ni phyi nang gnyis ka ste/_/gsum na gnas pa yin par bshad/_/
[\[165a.5\]]ces bya ba la/_me dbal de ni phyi la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yod do zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad de/_la la ni phyi rol na gnas pa yin la/_la la ni nang na/_la la ni gnyi ga na gnas pa yin no/_/phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka'/_/zhes bya ba la/_me
[\[165a.6\]]dbal de yang phyi ma bzhin du gso zhing bcos par dka' ste/_de yang phyi rol na gnas pa bas ni nang na gnas pa rab tu gso bar dka' la/_nang na gnas pa bas ni gnyis ka na gnas pa mchog tu gso bar dka' ba yin no/_/de la nad ni ji bzhin du/_/'khrugs pa'i
[\[165a.7\]]rgyu yis ldang gyur la/_/khyad par du ni tsha ba yis/_/lus la myur du mched par byed/_/de yang nang gnas nang du mched/_/phyir gnas phyir mched gnyis kar gnas/_/gnyis kar mched par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_me dbal gyi nad de ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]rang rang gi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrugs shing g.yo bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu/_kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba la sogs pa'i rgyus ldang bar 'gyur la/_khyad par du ni tsha zhing sreg par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sman dang zas dang /_spyod lam gyis ldang zhing nad des lus la myur du mched cing
[\[165b.2\]]rgyas par byed do/_/de yang ji ltar mched ce na/_nang na gnas pa'i me dbal ni nang na mched cing rgyas par byed la/_phyi rol du gnas pa ni phyi rol nyid du mched la/_gnyis kar gnas shing brten pa ni phyi dang nang gnyis kar mched cing rgyas par byed pa yin no/_/de la nang na
[\[165b.3\]]gnas pa ni/_/gnad rnams tsha gdung myos par byed/_/bu ga rnams la gnod pa dang /_/skom dad rab che gcin nad sogs/_/mi snyoms par ni 'byung ba dang /_/me drod myur nyams las shes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la nang na gnas pa la sogs pa'i me dbal gyi
[\[165b.4\]]nang nas nang na gnas pa'i me dbal ni gnad rnams tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma las shes shing rtogs par bya ste/_snying la sogs pa'i gnad rnams tsha zhing sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dang /_myos shing rmongs bag tu byed pa dang /_nang du bu ga'i sgo rnams la gnod
[\[165b.5\]]cing gzir la khyad par du bskyod pa dang /_de bzhin du skom dad lhag par rab tu che ba dang /_bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa'i shugs mi snyoms shing legs par mi 'byung ba dang /_khong pa'i me drod dang lus kyi sbubs shin tu myur bar nyams pa las shes shing rtogs
[\[165b.6\]]par bya'o/_/phyi rol de las bzlog pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_phyi rol tu gnas pa'i me dbal gyi mtshan nyid ni nang na gnas pa'i me dbal gyi mtshan nyid las go bzlog par 'gyur ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/de la rlung gyur me dbal ni/_/rlung gi rims dang nad
[\[165b.7\]]thabs 'dra/_/skrang zhing 'gul la zug pa dang /_/yan lag snyom zhing ba spu brtse/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la me dbal gyi nad rlung las gyur pa ni rlung gi rims dang na ba'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin par shes par bya la/_/yang de bzhin du me dbal de ni skrang ba la sogs pa dang yang ldan
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]pa yin no/_/mkhris gyur myur du mched cing 'gro/_/mkhris rims rtags ldan shin tu dmar/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur ba'i me dbal ni lus la myur du mched cing khyab par byed pa dang /_mkhris pa'i rims kyi mtshan nyid ji skad smos
[\[166a.2\]]pa'i rtags dang ldan pa dang shin tu shas cher dmar ba yin no/_/bad kan las g.ya' reg na 'jam/_/bad kan las byung rims 'dar na/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las byung ba'i me dbal ni shas cher g.ya' ba dang /_reg na 'jam pa dang /_bad kan las byung
[\[166a.3\]]ba'i me dbal dang rims dang tshul 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin no/_/me dbal sogs kun yal bar bor/_/rang gi nad tshul bsags gyur na/_/de ni smin rdol rang rang gi_/_me dbal rma yi mtshan nyid 'dzin/_/zhes bya ba la/_me dbal thams cad yal bar bor zhing gso
[\[166a.4\]]bar ma byas na/_rang gi nad rlung la sogs pa'i tshul bsags shing 'phel bar 'gyur te/_rlung gi mtshan nyid kyis ni rlung gi me dbal 'phel bar 'gyur la/_mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ni mkhris pa'i me dbal 'phel zhing stsogs par 'gyur la/_bad kan gyi mtshan nyid kyis ni
[\[166a.5\]]bad kan gyi me dbal sogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du smin zhing rdol ba ste/_dang por smin nas phyis rdol bar 'gyur ba yin pas na smin zhing rdol ba zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa rang rang gi rma'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de 'dzin zhing 'phyang bar byed de/_rma'i le'u
[\[166a.6\]]las/_/de las/_rlung las sngo nag smug pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur smin zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas smos pa yin no/_/rlung mkhris las ni rims 'debs slon/_/brgyal zhing tshad 'khru skom mgo 'khor/_/rus tshigs chag
[\[166a.7\]]snyam me drod nyams/_/mun zhugs snyam sems yi ga 'chus/_/yan lag thams cad me mdag ni/_/'bar bas khyab pa lta bur tsha/_/phyogs ni gang dang gang du mched/_/khyab pas yan lag de dang der/_/me mdag zhi ba ltar gnag pa'am/_/sngo ba 'am dmar
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]bas khyab byed la/_/mes bsregs lta bur chu bur 'byung /_/myur du mched cing khyab par byed/_/gnad kyi rjes 'jug me dbal ni/_/de nas stobs rab skyes pa'i rlung /_/yan lag na zhing dran pa stor/_/gnyid yar dbugs kyi rngam pa drag_/skyigs bus 'debs shing
[\[166b.2\]]'di lta bu'i/_/gnas skabs des ni thob par 'gyur/_/sa dang mal khri stan sogs la/_/gang du'ang bde ba mi 'thob cing /_/'gre zhing sdug bsngal myong ba dang /_/lus sems ngal las byung ba yis/_/gnyid kyi rmongs bag sad dka' ba/_/de ni me 'dra'i me
[\[166b.3\]]dbal yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang mkhris pa las ni me dang 'dra ba'i me dbal du 'gyur la/_de yang rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_/lus kyi yan lag thams cad me mdag 'bar bas khyab cing gtor ba lta bur rab tu tsha ba dang /_yang
[\[166b.4\]]me dbal de lus kyi phyogs gang dang gang du mched cing khyab pa'i lus kyi yan lag gi phyogs de dang der me mdag 'bar ba zhi ba bzhin du gnag cing sngo ba dang dmar bas khyab par 'gyur ro/_/yang me dbal de ni mes bsregs pa lta bur chu bur gyis myur du mched par byed
[\[166b.5\]]cing kun tu khyab par byed par 'gyur te/_de yang rlung dang mkhris pa'i rgyu nyid kyis myur ba kho nar khyab par byed pa yin no/_/yang de bzhin du snying la sogs pa'i gnad kyi rjes su 'jug par byed cing me dbal des de'i 'og tu stobs rab tu skyes pa'i rlung des yan lag na zhing
[\[166b.6\]]gzer bar byed pa dang /_dran pa stor zhing brgyal bar byed pa dang /_gnyid yar zhing med pa dang /_dbugs kyi rngam pa drag tu 'byung ba dang /_skyigs bu'i nad kyis 'debs pa dang /_me dbal gyi nad dang ldan pa'i skyes bu de 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs 'thob cing
[\[166b.7\]]myong bar 'gyur te/_sems mal na bde bar mi gnas pa'i dbang du gyur bas sa dang mal khri dang stan la sogs pa gang du gnas su zin kyang lus dang sems bde ba mi 'thob pa yin la/_de ltar mi bde ba nyid kyis phan tshun 'gre zhing ldog la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]nyams su myong ba dang /_lus dang sems ngal zhing dub pa las byung ba gnyid kyi rmongs bag nyams su myong zhing /_de yang sad par shin tu dka' ba yin no/_/bad kan gyis ni bkag pa'i rlung /_/bad kan de brtol mang du byed/_/khrag 'phel
[\[167a.2\]]ba yis khrag brtol te/_/pags pa chu ba sha la gnas/_/gnon byas thor bu phra zhing rim/_/zlum zhing sbom la sra ba yi/_/mdzer pa'i phreng ba chags byed cing /_/mdog dmar rab na rims kyis 'debs/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru/_/kha skam skyigs
[\[167a.3\]]bu slon mgo 'khor/_/rmongs bag mdog nyams brgyal dang lus/_/yan lag na zhing me drod nyams/_/de ltar mdzer pa'i me dbal ni/_/bad kan rlung 'khrugs las gyur yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan dang rlung 'khrugs pa las ni mdzer pa'i me dbal zhes
[\[167a.4\]]bya ba'i nad du 'gyur te/_de yang bad kan gyi nad kyis rlung de bkag cing 'byung du mi ster ba dang /_rlung gis bad kan de brtol zhing phye nas dum bu mang du byas pa'am/_yang khrag 'phel bar gyur pa'i mi'i khrag phye zhing dum bur brtol nas mdzer pa'i phreng ba'am rmen bu'i phreng
[\[167a.5\]]ba skyed par byed do/_/de yang pags pa la sogs pa la gnas pa'i khrag gis gnod cing 'khrugs par byas nas/_thor bu phra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can dang mdog dmar ba'i phreng ba chags par byed la/_mdzer pa'i phreng ba de yang nang du na zhing rims kyis
[\[167a.6\]]'debs pa la sogs pa skyed par byed de/_de ltar bshad pa'i mdzer pa'i me dbal 'di ni bad kan dang rlung 'khrugs pa las gyur pa yin no/_/bad kan mkhris las rims 'debs rengs/_/gnyid che slon bag klad pa na/_/yan lag na zhing bya rmyang 'dod/_/
[\[167a.7\]]bla zhing mgo 'khor yi ga 'chus/_/rtsub cing drod nyams rus chag snyam/_/skam zhing dbang po mi gsal lci/_/be'u snabs 'khru zhing dang ga 'khyil/_/de ni rtsa sbubs rnams su 'gro/_/phal cher ma zhu gnas na zhugs/_/phyogs gcig tu ni rab mi na/_/
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]thor bu ser po dmar po dang /_/dkar pos phyogs kun khyab par byed/_/nor bu ltar snang gnag cing snum/_/dri ma can la skrang zhing lci/_/rnag pa'i zabs che rab tu tsha/_/reg na 'jig cing rnags pa dang /_/'dam ltar sha ni zhig gyur cing /_/rtsa rgyus gsal bar snang ba yin/_/
[\[167b.2\]]mi yi ro ltar mnam me dbal/_/de ni 'dam 'dra zhes byar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan dang mkhris pa las ni 'dam 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i me dbal 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/der yang mtshan ma rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa snang ste/_yan lag na zhing bya rmyang byed
[\[167b.3\]]'dod pa ni phan tshun rkyong zhing 'degs par byed pa'o/_/rus pa chag pa snyam sems pa ni rus pa dkrum pa snyam du byed pa'o/_/dang ga 'khyil ba ni zhal zhal byas snyam du sems shing bad kan la sogs pa 'khyil ba'o/_/me dbal de yang phal cher ma zhu ba'i gnas nu ma dang lte
[\[167b.4\]]ba'i bar du zhugs nas/_de'i phyogs gcig la brten te lhag par na bar mi byed do/_/yang na de bzhin du thor bu mdog ser po la sogs pas khyab cing gang bar byed pa dang /_nor bu'i mdog lta bur snang ba ste/_gnag cing ser skyar gnas pa dang /_phal cher mdog
[\[167b.5\]]nag po dang smug por gnas pa dang /_dri ma can la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_rnag pa'i zabs che zhing nang du nub pa dang /_shas cher rab tu tsha ba dang /_lag pa la sogs pas reg na 'jig cing nyams la rnags pa 'dam ltar gnas shing sha rnams zhig par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[167b.6\]]de nyid kyis rtsa rgyus la sogs pa gsal bar snang zhing gsal ba dang /_mi ro ltar shin tu mnam zhing dri nga ba'i me dbal gyi nad de ni 'dam 'dra ba'i me dbal zhes bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/lus zungs kun la rab khyab
[\[167b.7\]]byed/_/ces bya ba la/_me dbal nad gzhi kun las skyes pa nad gzhi gsum car gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin la/_yang des ni lus zungs thams cad la khyab cing mched par byed pa yin no/_/phyi yi rgyu yi smas las 'khrugs/_/khrag bcas mkhris pa skyed byed de/_/
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]me dbal du ni rlung gis byed/_/rgya sran ku lang+tha 'dra ba'i/_/'brum bus khyab skrang rims 'debs na/_/shin tu tsha la dmar zhing sngo/_/zhes bya ba la/_phyi rol gyi rgyu mtshon cha la sogs pas smas par gyur pa las/_rlung 'khrugs par gyur na
[\[168a.2\]]khrag dang bcas pa'i mkhris pa skyed cing 'phel bar byas nas/_me dbal gyi nad rlung gis skyed par byed la/_de yang rgya sran ku lang+tha 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis khyab cing khebs par byed pa dang /_skrang ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/nad dmigs
[\[168a.3\]]tha dad las gyur gsum/_/gnyis gyur bla brnan med gso bla/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad dmigs tha dad pa las gyur pa'i me dbal gsum skyed cing gso sla ba yin no/_/de bzhin du nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa las gyur pa'i me dbal bla brnan med pa dag kyang gso sla ba
[\[168a.4\]]yin no/_/de la bla brnan ni lus kyi 'gyur ba shes pa'i le'u las smos pa'i skem pa dang kha dog mi sdug pa la sogs pa yin no/_/rma dang 'dus pa las byung dang /_/thams cad gnad ni khyab pa dang /_/rtsa dang chu ba sha 'drul dang /_/mi ro'i dri 'dra rul gso dka'/_/
[\[168a.5\]]zhes bya ba la/_me dbal gnyis po rma 'am gnad pa'i nad las byung ba dang /_'dus pa las byung ba ni gso dka' ba yin no/_/thams cad de nad gzhi tha dad pa dang nad gzhi gnyis las byung ba'i me dbal thams cad kyang gnad rnams khebs shing khyab pa ni gso dka'
[\[168a.6\]]la/_de bzhin du rma la sogs pa 'drul zhing zhig pa yang gso dka'o/_/de bzhin du khyad par mi ro'i dri 'dra zhing shin tu mnam pa de yang gso dka' ba yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la
[\[168a.7\]]dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas mdze dang sha bkra dang gzi gu dang srin bu'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_pags pa'i nad du tshul gcig pas me dbal gyi rjes la mdze
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]nad la sogs pa bstan pa'i le'u brtsams pa yin no/_/kha zas spyod lam log pa dang /_/khyad par du ni mi 'phrod bsten/_/dam pa smod dang srog gcod dang /_/gzhan gyi nor 'phrog sogs bsten dang /_/sdig pa'i las ni 'phral byas dang /_/sngon chad byas pas nad
[\[168b.2\]]bslangs nas/_/rtsa la thad kar gram nas ni/_/sha dang pags pa chu ser khrag_/gnod byas sla bar gyur nas ni/_/de nas phyir ni 'byung 'gyur te/_/pags pa'i mdog ni mi sdug byed/_/mi bzad de ni mdze ru bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_zas dang spyod lam log pa ste/_/
[\[168b.3\]]zas grang ches pa dang tsha ches pa dang /_ya ba ka la sogs pa zos pa dang /_de bzhin du spyod pa la sogs pa ste/_gsod pa dang rku ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa byas pa dang /_khyad par du yang mi 'phrod pa'i kha zas dang nya dang 'o ma lhan cig bza' ba dang /_sbrang rtsi dang rlan can gyi sha lhan
[\[168b.4\]]cig zos pa la sogs pa mi 'phrod pa'i rnam pa zas kyi le'u las smos pa lta bu bsten pa dang /_de bzhin du khyad par du 'gal ba'i spyod pa byed cing /_rnam par 'tshe zhing gzhan la gnod pa dang /_tshig rtsub por smra ba dang /_gzhan la gnod par sems pa ste/_lus dang ngag
[\[168b.5\]]dang yid kyis mi dge ba byas pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa la smod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las 'phral du tshe 'dir byas pa dang /_yang na sngon chad byas shing bsags pa la goms par byas pas/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi tshogs rnams bslang zhing bskyed nas gnod par
[\[168b.6\]]gyur pa rtsa la thad kar gram zhing zhugs nas/_pags pa la sogs pa la gnod par byas shing nad bskyed nas sla zhing zhum par byas nas/_de nas de'i 'og tu nad de rnams phyi rol tu byung zhing thon par 'gyur te/_pags pa'i mdog mi sdug cing snga ma las gzhan du gyur pa'i
[\[168b.7\]]mdog du mar byed pa'i nad de ni mdze zhes bya'o/_/zhes drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pas bshad do/_/gang phyir dus las yal bar bor/_/de ni lus kun ma rungs 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_ci'i phyir mdze zhes bya zhe na/_gang gi phyir rang gi gso ba'i
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]dus la bab pa de las yal bar bor zhing gso bar ma byas na nad de las thams cad ma rung zhing gnod par byed pas na de'i phyir ming mdze zhes bya bar bshad do/_/lus zungs la zhugs nang du khyab/_/thams cad 'drul bar byed par 'gyur/_/rngul bcas
[\[169a.2\]]rul zhing mnam pa dang /_/srin bu phra mo mi bzad skyed/_/spu lpags chu ba rtsa chen dang /_/rus pa snyi ba rim bzhin za/_/de bas sha bkra phyi rol te/_/mdze las gzhan ni yin par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_mdze'i nad de dwangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs thams
[\[169a.3\]]cad du zhugs shing nang du khyab par byas nas lus zungs de dag thams cad 'drul zhing gsher bar byas nas lus la 'bu skyed par byed la/_'bu de yang shin tu phra ba dang /_mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba'i nad skyed par byed pa des spu la sogs pa za bar byed cing /_rus pa
[\[169a.4\]]snyi ba'i rna ba dang sna'i phyogs na gnas pa'i rus pa mnyen pa la bya ste de dag za bar byed do/_/de bas rgyu de'i phyir sha bkra la ni 'drul ba dang 'bu la sogs pa med de/_de pags pa'i phyi rol du gnas pa ni mdze las gzhan pa yin no zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/nad gzhi
[\[169a.5\]]gsum dang 'dres pa dang /_/'dus gyur mdze nad rnam pa bdun/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad ni rnam pa bdun yod de/_nad gzhi tha dad pa rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur pa gsum dang /_nyes pa de dag nyid sna gnyis gnyis 'dres pa las
[\[169a.6\]]gyur pa gsum dang /_de gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig ste de ltar bdun no/_/kun kyang nyes gsum las byung yang /_/de las lhag pa las ming 'dogs/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad kun kyang nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa yin mod kyi/_
[\[169a.7\]]de las nyes pa gang shas che zhing lhag par gnas pa las rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa'i ming du 'dogs pa yin no/_/rlung gi mdze ni thod pa 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gi shas che ba'i 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims ni thod pa 'dra ba zhes bya'o/_/mkhris
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]gyur u dum bA ra ste/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa shas che ba'i 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims nad ni u dum bA ra zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan las gyur zlum glang shu/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan shas che ba'i 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mdze ni mdze nad zlum
[\[169b.2\]]po zhes bya ba dang glang shu zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung mkhris las skyes ri sh+ya'i lce/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis shas che ba las ni ri sh+ya'i lce zhes bya ba'i mdze nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bad rlung las gyur pags pa gcig_/'brum phran dang ni
[\[169b.3\]]sha bkra dang /_/'bras byer chu ser zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan dang rlung shas che ba las ni mdze nad pags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan mkhris pa las byung ba/_/shu ba rma kha brgya pa dang /_/pad+ma dkar po 'brum bur bcas/_/
[\[169b.4\]]g.yan pa pags pa myags pa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan dang mkhris pa gnyis shas che ba las gyur pa'i mdze nad ni shu ba la sogs pa drug 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dus pa las gyur 'ol ma se/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi gsum char cha mnyam pa las ni 'ol ma se
[\[169b.5\]]zhes bya ba'i mdze nad 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na mdze nad bco brgyad du 'gyur ba yin no/_/dang po'i gsum dang shu ba dang /_/'ol ma se dang pad+ma dkar/_/ri sh+ya'i lce zhes bya ba ste/_/'di bdun mdze nad chen po yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad de dag gi
[\[169b.6\]]nang nas dang po'i gsum pa ste/_thod pa lta bu dang /_u dum bA ra dang /_zlum po ste gsum dang /_mdze nad shu ba dang /_'ol ma se dang /_pad+ma dkar po dang /_ri sh+ya'i lce zhes bya ba ste/_bdun pa 'di dag ni mdze nad chen po zhes bya ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/mdze
[\[169b.7\]]nad sngon byung mtshan ma ni/_/shin tu 'jam pa'am reg na rtsub/_/rngul 'byung mi 'byung mdog mi sdug_/lus tsha g.ya' zhing lpags tshor med/_/thor bu phra'u mtho ba dang /_/rma ni lhag par gzer ba dang /_/myur du 'byung zhing ring du gnas/_/'tshobs pa dag kyang rtsub
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]par 'gyur/_/rgyu chung gis kyang nad cher ldang /_/ba spu brtse zhing khrag mdog gnag_/ces bya ba la/_mdze nad thams cad la sngon du byung ba'i tshul ni 'di dag yin te/_pags pa'i mthar ched 'ga' ni 'jam/_ched 'ga' ni shin tu rtsub pa dang /_ched 'ga' ni rngul 'byung /_
[\[170a.2\]]ched 'ga' ni rngul mi 'byung ba dang /_mdog shin tu mi sdug par snang ba dang /_lus kyi yan lag thams cad tsha ba 'ur 'ur bos khyab pa dang /_thor bu tal til mtho bar chags pa dang /_rma gas pa dang /_tshig pa dang /_snad pa las
[\[170a.3\]]byung ba rnams lhag par na zhing gzer ba dang /_/yang rma de dag nyid myur du 'gyur zhing smin par byed la/_myur du 'byung zhing smin pa dang /_rma nyid du ring du gnas shing mi 'drubs pa dang /_gal te rma 'tshobs pa dag kyang reg na rtsub cing mi bde ba nyid du 'gyur ba dang /_rma
[\[170a.4\]]de 'jig par 'gyur ba'i rgyu chung ngu dag gis kyang slar zhig cing nad cher ldang bar 'gyur ba dang /_ba spu rnams brtse zhing bshor ba dang /_khrag gi mdog nag po nyid du snang bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/thod pa lta bu gnag cing smug_/rtsub sra tshor ba chung la srab/_/khyab
[\[170a.5\]]cing mtha' ma mi mnyam la/_/ba spu langs pas khyab par byed/_/shin tu zug cing g.ya' ba chung /_/myur du khyab byed thod pa 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad thod pa lta bu zhes bya ba ni thod pa'i rus pa smug nag lta bu'i mdog can du gnas pa dang /_lus reg na
[\[170a.6\]]rtsub pa dang /_sra zhing mkhrang ba dang /_pags pa tshor ba chung zhing bem bem por gnas pa dang /_srab cing zabs chung ba dang /_khyab cing rgya che ba dang /_mtha' ma mi mnyam cing ring thung du 'dug pa dang /_de bzhin du ba spu langs shing bshor bas khyab cing rgyas pa
[\[170a.7\]]dang /_shin tu zug cing nad tshabs che ba dang /_shas cher mi g.ya' ba la sogs pa yin no/_/u dum bA ra smin pa ltar/_/pags spu smug rtsa dkar bas khyab/_/shas cher mthug dang shas cher 'drul/_/tsha ba'i nad dang khrag shas cher/_/myur du smin cing 'drul
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]bar byed/_/'bu can u dum bA ra yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_u dum bA ra zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni u dum bA ra'i 'bras bu smin pa ltar pags pa dang spu nag por gnag pa dang /_rtsa dkar zhing skya la khyab cing khebs pa dang /_shas cher mthug cing lhun sdug pa dang /_shas
[\[170b.2\]]cher 'drul zhing rnags pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_nad kyi tshabs che zhing khrag gi shas che ba dang /_myur du smin pa la sogs pa yin no/_/brtan zhing 'thas la lci zhing 'jam/_/dkar dmar myur du mi mched la/_/phan tshun 'dab 'brel shu ba slon/_/g.ya' zhing rnag
[\[170b.3\]]che 'bus gang la/_/mtha' ma 'jam zhing ser por snang /_/gor gor por gnas zlum po yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad zlum po zhes bya ba ni/_kun nas zlum par gnas pa yin te/_de'i mtshan nyid ni brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba dang /_'thas shing sra bar chags pa
[\[170b.4\]]dang /_lci ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can dang /_phan tshun gcig la gcig 'dab 'brel bar skye ba dang /_shu ba slon zhing gyen du 'bur ba dang /_g.ya' ba la sogs pa tshabs che ba dang /_mtha' ma reg na 'jam zhing mdog ser bar snang ba dang /_zlum po'i dbyibs
[\[170b.5\]]gor gor po'i tshul du gnas pa yin no/_/g.ya' zhing phra tsag gnag pa dang /_/chu ser mang ba glang shu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad glang shu zhes bya ba ni/_g.ya' ba dang bcas shing 'brum phran phra mo tsag tsag pos khyab pa yin zhing /_mdog gnag pa dang /_chu ser
[\[170b.6\]]mang du 'dzag pa yin no/_/rtsub cing sra la mtha' ma dmar/_/nang na gnag cing mtho ba dang /_/zug cing tsha la na zhing rnag_/'brum bu rtsub pos khyab pa dang /_ri sh+ya'i lce ni dbyibs 'dra ba/_/'bu mang ri sh+ya'i lce 'drar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_ri sh+ya'i lce 'dra ba
[\[170b.7\]]zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni srog chags ri sh+ya'i lce 'dra ba yin la/_de'i mtshan nyid ni mdog shin tu rtsub cing reg na mi bde ba dang /_mtha' ma dmar ba dang /_nang gi dbus kyi kha dog gnag pa dang /_dbus ma de nyid mtho zhing glo ba dang /_/de bzhin du zug pa la sogs
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]pa dang ldan pa dang /_'brum bu phra mo rtsub pas khyab cing rgyas pa dang /_'bu'i tshogs shin tu mang ba yin no/_/glang po'i lpags 'dra reg rtsub lpags/_/zhes bya ba la/_pags pa zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni/_glang po che'i pags pa dang 'dra bar mthug cing
[\[171a.2\]]reg na rtsub pa yin no/_/gcig pur bshad la gzhi che ba/_/rngul mi 'byung zhing nya lpags 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcig pu zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni 'byung ba'i gnas kyi gzhi che zhing lhun sdug pa dang /_de bzhin du rngul mi 'byung ba dang /_nya'i pags pa dang 'dra ba yin no/_/'brum bu phra mo thug thug po/_/
[\[171a.3\]]reg na rtsub dang ldan pa dang /_/g.ya' zhing sra la gnag pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'brum bu phra mo zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni tug tug po zhes bya ba yan lag gi phyogs 'dar zhing drod pa las tug tug por 'byung ba ste/_de dang 'dra bar reg na rtsub pa dang /_g.ya' ba la sogs
[\[171a.4\]]pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/sha bkra nang rtsub phyi rol 'jam/_/phrugs na glog pa 'byung ba dang /_/reg na 'jam zhing srab pa la/_/ku ba'i me tog ltar dmar dkar/_/phal cher ro stod dag tu 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad sha bkra zhes bya ba ni nang na
[\[171a.5\]]rtsub par gnas pa la phyi rol gyi mtha' cung zad 'jam par gnas te/_de phrugs par gyur na glog pa'i rdul 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_reg na 'jam zhing mnyen pa la zabs chung bas srab cing ku ba'i me tog ltar rtsa dmar po shin tu dkar ba yin no/_/de yang phal cher shas cher ro stod
[\[171a.6\]]kyi rgyab la sogs par 'byung ba yin no/_/rmen bu dmar po g.ya' dang ldan/_/khyab par byed pa'i 'bras zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bras byer ba zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni rmen bu dmar po shin tu g.ya' ba dang ldan pas khyab cing khebs pa la bya'o/_/rkang pa lag pa gas
[\[171a.7\]]pa dang /_/mi bzad na zhing g.ya' tshabs chung /_/rkang lag zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_rkang lag zhig pa zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni lag pa dang rkang pa gas shing ser ka shas cher 'byung ba dang /_mi bzad par na zhing cung zad tsam g.ya' ba yin no/_/thor bu dmar
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]pos khyab pa dang /_/ring du mched cing dUr ba 'dra/_/pags pa zar ma'i me tog 'dra/_/g.ya' zhing brtan par gnas pa dang /_/zlum por 'byung ba shu ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_shu ba zhes bya ba'i mdze nad ni thor bu phra mo dmar pos kun tu khyab cing rgyas pa dang /_de bzhin du
[\[171b.2\]]ring du mched cing rgya cher 'phros pa dang /_/mdog rtswa dUr ba 'dra bar ljang ba dang /_pags pa zar ma'i me tog 'dra bar sngo ba dang /_g.ya' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/rtsa ba sbom zhing tsha bcas na/_/dmar zhing smug la rma kha mang /_/rnag cing 'bu
[\[171b.3\]]mang kha brgya pa/_/phal cher kun tu skye ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad rma kha brgya pa zhes bya ba la/_rtsa ba sbom pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin zhing /_rma'i tshogs kha mang du gnas pa la sogs pa yin te/_de yang lus phal mo cher kun tu skye zhing 'byung ba
[\[171b.4\]]yin no/_/mtha' ma dmar zhing dbus na dkar/_/g.ya' tsha na dang bcas pa dang /_/mtho zhing ri mo brtan pas khyab/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar rgyas shing /_/stug cing chu ser khrag mang la/_/phal cher myur rdol pad dkar yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i
[\[171b.5\]]mtshan nyid ni/_gang du 'byung ba'i mtshan ma thog thag dmar ba dang /_dbus na pad+ma dkar po ltar dkar ba dang g.ya' ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_glo zhing mtho ba dang rtsa ris brtan pas kun tu khyab cing pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar rtsa'i ri mo rtsa dmar bas rgyas pa dang /_de nyid
[\[171b.6\]]mthug cing zabs che ba dang /_chu ser dang khrag gi shas che zhing mang ba dang myur du rdol cing zhig par 'gyur ba yin no/_/pags pa srab pa'i 'brum bu dkar/_/dmar bas gang ba 'brum bu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad 'brum bu zhes bya ba ni pags pa srab pa'i 'brum bu
[\[171b.7\]]mdog dkar dmar du gnas pas gang zhing khyab pa yin no/_/g.ya' ba'i nad ni g.ya' ba dang /_/'drul zhing lhag par na ba dang /_/'brum bu phra gnag mang po ni/_/phal cher rkub lag gru mor 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad g.ya' ba zhes bya ba ni 'brum bu phra mo
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]mdog gnag pa mang por 'byung la/_/de yang gnas ni phal cher rkub dang lag sor dang gru mo la sogs par 'byung zhing lhag par g.ya' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/thor bu bcas shing reg mi bzod/_/g.ya'
[\[172a.2\]]zhing dro tsha na dang bcas/_/dmar la pags pa myags pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad pags pa myags pa zhes bya ba ni/_thor bu'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang /_lhag par yang reg na mi bzod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/'ol ma se ni
[\[172a.3\]]rab tsha na/_/stod ni dmar zhing gnag pa ste/_/'ol ma se yi 'bras bu 'dra/_/mdze yi mtshan ma kun dang ldan/_/de bas kha dog du mar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad 'ol ma se zhes bya ba rab tu mi bzad par na zhing na ba dang ldan pa dang /_stod dmar zhing smad gnag pas 'ol ma
[\[172a.4\]]se zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra ba yin no/_/'ol ma se 'dra ba'i mdze nad de yang mdze'i mtshan ma ma lus pa kun dang ldan pa yin la/_de bas na de ni kha dog gcig dang mi ldan gyi/_kha dog tha dad par 'gyur ro/_/mdze nad rnams mtshan ma de las mdzer gyur pa
[\[172a.5\]]ni mtshan ma de las zhes bya ba la/_thod pa lta bu la sogs pa'i mdze nad gzhir shas che zhing rgyas pa ni nad kyi dbye ba shes par bya ba de las bshad pa'i nad kyi mtshan ma dang las g.yo ba dang khyab pa bstan pa yin pa'am/_yang na mtshan ma yang yin la las kyang yin pas na
[\[172a.6\]]mtshan ma las te/_rlung gi ni g.yo ba la sogs pa dang /_mkhris pa'i dmar ba dang /_tsha ba la sogs pa dang /_bad kan gyi ni 'jam pa dang /_sra ba la sogs pa ste mtshan ma'i las de dag gis nad kyi shas rgyas pa rtogs shing khong du chud par bya'o/_/mdze nad nad gzhi
[\[172a.7\]]shas che ba/_/nad dbye shes las bshad pa yin/_/mtshan ma las kyis bstan pa yi/_/nad kun rgyas pa las byung dang /_/gang yang 'chi ltas las bshad dang /_/rus rkang khu chu la gnas spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad nad gzhi gsum gyi mtshan nyid rgyas pa las
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]byung ba ni spang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'chi ltas kyi le'u las/_mdze ni yan lag zhig pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa de yang spang bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang mdze gang yang rung ba la sogs par gnas pa de yang spang bar bya ste gsor mi rung ngo /_/tshil la gnas
[\[172b.2\]]pa 'tsho ba tsam/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshil la gnas pa'i mdze nad ni re zhig mi na bar 'tsho ba tsam du byar rung ngo /_/mkhris 'dres sha khrag gnas gso dka'/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad mkhris pa 'dres pa las byung ba gso bar dka' ste/_mkhris pa dang bad kan 'dres pa
[\[172b.3\]]las gyur pa'am/_mkhris pa dang rlung 'dres pa las gyur pa ni mkhris 'dres zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du sha dang khrag la gnas pa'i mdze nad kyang gso dka'o/_/rlung dang bad kan las gyur dang /_/lpags gnas nad gcig gyur gso sla/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad bad kan
[\[172b.4\]]dang rlung re re'am 'dres pa las gyur pa ni gso sla ba yin no/_/de bzhin du pags pa la gnas pa'i mdze nad kyang gso sla'o/_/de bzhin du nad gzhi gcig las byung ba'i mdze yang gso sla'o/_/de la pags par gnas pa'i mdze/_/zug cing rtsub la mdog mi sdug_/ces bya
[\[172b.5\]]ba la/_de la mdze'i nad de rnams kyi nang nas pags pa la gnas pa'i mdze nad ni zug cing na ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/khrag gnas rngul 'byung gnyid che sgang /_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag la gnas pa'i mdze nad ni rngul 'byung ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/sha la gnas pa
[\[172b.6\]]rkang pa dang /_/lag par 'brum bu 'byung ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_sha la gnas pa'i mdze nad ni rkang pa dang lag par 'brum bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshigs gnas lhag par tshigs 'drul skem/_/rkang pa 'jas 'gyur tshil gnas pa/_/yan lag zhig par byed par
[\[172b.7\]]'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshigs rnams la gnas pa'i mdze nad ni lhag par tshigs 'drul zhing rnag pa dang /_skem zhing rid pa dang /_rkang pa 'jas shing 'gro mi nus par 'gyur ro/_/tshil la gnas pa'i mdze ni lus kyi yan lag gi tshogs zhig cing 'drul bar 'gyur
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]ro/_/rus pa rkang gnas sna zhom zhing /_/mig dmar skad ni 'gags pa dang /_/rma la 'bu zhugs/_zhes bya ba la/_rus pa dang rkang la zhugs pa'i mdze nad ni sna zhom zhing nyams pa dang /_mig gnyis dmar zhing sle sle por 'gyur ba
[\[173a.2\]]dang /_/skad 'gags shing subs pa dang /_rma la 'bu zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/khu bar gnas/_bu dang chung mar bcas la 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad khu chu la gnas pa ni rang gi bu dang chung ma dang bcas pa la mdze 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/khrag sogs
[\[173a.3\]]la ni rim bzhin du/_/mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag la sogs pa ste/_khrag dang sha dang tshil dang rus pa dang rkang dang khu ba rnams la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/_khrag la sogs pa ni
[\[173a.4\]]khu ba'i gong na gnas pa yin te/_des na lus zungs gang la gnas pa'i mdze nad gong ma gang yin pa de la de'i mtshan ma 'byung ste/_des na khrag la gnas pa'i mdze nad la pags pa'i mtshan ma zug pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/_ma zhu ba'i gnas la gnas pa'i
[\[173a.5\]]mdze la ni pags pa dang khrag gi mtshan ma 'byung ngo /_/tshil la gnas pa ni pags pa dang khrag dang sha la gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin du khu ba la gnas pa'i mdze la mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mdze nad bshad
[\[173a.6\]]nas/_da ni sha bkra gzi gu'i nad bshad par bya ste/_gzi gu mdze dang gcig las 'byung /_/de ni sha bkra chu dang ni/_/yongs su 'dzag pa zhes byar bshad/_/nad gzhi gsum la brten zhing 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_sha bkra'i nad gzi gu ni mdze nad dang
[\[173a.7\]]nad gzhi gcig pa yin zhing /_de bzhin du gnod pa dang gnod bya la sogs pa rnams kyang gcig pa yin no/_/de'i ming ni sha bkra gzi gu dang /_chu dang yongs su mi 'dzag pa zhes bya bar slob dpon gyis bshad do/_/de yang rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad gzhi
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]gsum la brten cing nad gang khrag dang sha dang tshil gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dag la brten cing 'byung ba yin pas de skad ces bya'o/_/rlung las rtsub cing smug pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i sha bkra gzi gu ni reg na rtsub cing kha dog smug pa yin no/_/mkhris gyur
[\[173b.2\]]pad+ma'i 'dab ltar dmar/_/tsha zhing ba spu 'byi bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i sha bkra ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar shin tu dmar ba dang tsha ba dang bcas shing spu 'byi bar byed pa yin no/_/bad kan las skya stug cing lci/_/g.ya' bcas/_zhes bya ba la/_bad
[\[173b.3\]]kan las gyur pa'i sha bkra ni stug cing lci ba dang g.ya' ba dang bcas pa yin no/_/rim bzhin khrag dang ni/_/sha dang tshil la brten par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_sha bkra gzi gu de ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du sha la sogs pa la brten par bshad de/_de la rlung las
[\[173b.4\]]ni khrag la brten pa yin no/_/mkhris pa las ni sha la brten pa yin no/_/bad kan las ni tshil la brten pa yin no/_/'di dag mdog ni gnyis ka yin/_/de ni phyi ma bzhin gso dka'/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha bkra 'di dag gi mdog ni gnyis ka la brten pa'i dbye bas
[\[173b.5\]]phye ba yin te/_khrag la brten na ni kha dog gnag pa yin la/_sha la brten na ni zangs ltar dmar ba yin la/_tshil la brten na ni dkar ba yin no/_/de yang phyi ma bzhin du gso dka' ste/_khrag dang rlung las byung ba bas ni sha dang mkhris pa las byung ba gso dka'
[\[173b.6\]]la/_de bas ni tshil la brten pa nas/_bad kan las byung ba shin tu gso dka' ba yin no/_/spu dkar ma yin srab pa dang /_/phan tshun ma 'dres gsar du byung /_/mes ma bsregs pa gso bar sla/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha bkra'i nad gang spu dkar ba ma yin pa dang /_
[\[173b.7\]]srab cing zabs su chung ba dang /_phan tshun gcig la gcig ma 'dres pa dang /_skyes nas ring por ma lon pa dang /_mes bsregs pa las byung ba ma yin pa ni gso bar sla'o/_/de las gzhan pa gso dka' yin/_/mdoms dang lag mthil mchur byung ba/_/gsar
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]du byung yang gso bar dka'/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngar bshad pa de las gzhan pa ba spu dkar ba dang mthug pa dang phan tshun 'dres pa dang yun ring po lon pa dang /_mes bsregs pa las byung ba yin na ni gso dka' ba yin no/_/de bzhin du mdoms la
[\[174a.2\]]sogs par byung ba ni gsar du byung ba yin na yang gso bar dka' bas spang bar bya ba nyid yin no/_/nad rnams phal cher zas dang ni/_/mal gcig reg sogs la brten nas/_/thams cad 'go ste mig nad dang /_/mdze nad lhag par 'go ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad
[\[174a.3\]]phal cher te/_mang du 'go ba'i ngang tshul can yin zhing lus las lus su 'pho ba yin te/_ji ltar 'pho zhe na/_zas lhan cig zos pa la sogs pas 'pho ste/_gang gi che nad pa dang lhan cig tu za zhing mal gcig tu nyal ba dang reg pa la sogs pa byas na/_de'i tshe
[\[174a.4\]]nad med pa'i mi la yang nad thams cad ma lus par 'pho ba yin mod kyi/_de las kyang khyad par mdze nad la sogs pa pags pa'i nad dang /_mig gi nad ni shas cher 'pho zhing 'go ba yin no/_/sha bkra gzi gu'i nad bshad nas/_/da ni srin bu'i nad bshad de/_/phyi dang
[\[174a.5\]]nang gi dbye ba yis/_/srin bu rnam pa gnyis su bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_srin bu'i nad ni phyi na gnas pa dang nang na gnas pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis yod do/_/zhes bya ba mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/phyi yi dri mas bad kan khrag_/bshang
[\[174a.6\]]skyes dbye bas rnam bzhi yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_srin bu'i nad ni skye gnas kyi dbye bas rnam pa bzhi yod de/_la la ni phyi'i dri ma las skyes pa yin no/_/la la ni bad kan las skyes pa yin no/_/la la ni khrag las skyes pa yin no/_/la la ni bshang ba las skyes pa
[\[174a.7\]]yin no/_/ming las rnam pa nyi shur 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_ming gi dbye ba'i gnas bshang ba rnams kyis de rnam pa nyi shur 'gyur ro/_/de la phyi yi khrag las byung /_/tshad dbyibs mdog ni til 'bru 'dra/_/skra dang gos la brten pa yin/_/phra zhing rkang pa mang la
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]ming /_/shig dang sro ma zhes bya'o/_/gnyis kas thor bu 'brum bu dang /_/g.yan pa dag ni skyed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la srin bu de rnams kyi nang nas phyi'i srin bu ni khrag dri ma can las byung ste/_gang gi tshe khrus la sogs pas dag par ma byas pa de'i tshe shig la
[\[174b.2\]]sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de yang tshad dang dbyibs dang mdog ni til 'bru lta bu yin la/_gnas ni skra dang gos la brten cing 'dug la/_lus ni phra zhing rkang pa mang ba yin la/_de'i ming ni rnam pa gnyis te/_shig ces bya ba dang /_sro ma zhes bya ba yin no/_/
[\[174b.3\]]des kyang lus la thor bu la sogs pa skyed cing 'byung bar byed do/_/nang gi mdze dang rgyu gcig ste/_/zhes bya ba la/_nang gi 'bu ni mdze dang rgyu gcig cing mtshungs pa yin pas na kha zas dang spyod lam log pa dang kha zas mi 'phrod pa la sogs pa bsten pas yin no/_/de las
[\[174b.4\]]bad kan las mang skye/_/zas mngar bu ram 'o ma dang /_/tsha dang 'bras sar chan la dga'/_/zhes bya ba la/_nang na gnas pa'i srin bu de rnams las kyang phal cher ram mang du bad kan las skyes pa'i 'bu ni zas mngar ba la sogs pa la dga' zhing des 'phel
[\[174b.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/mi gtsang byung bcas bshang lam las/_/lo ma 'dab ma la sogs dga'/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshang ba las byung ba'i 'bu ni bshang ba mang ba dang lo ma la dga' zhing des 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan ma zhu'i gnas su byung /_/skyes nas
[\[174b.6\]]kun tu 'gro ba yin/_/la la 'breng pa 'dra ba yin/_/la la srin bu khol ma 'dra/_/kha cig myu gu 'bus pa 'dra/_/phra zhing ring la chung ba dang /_/dkar zhing dmar bar snang ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las ma zhu ba'i gnas lte ba yan chad du byung ba ni
[\[174b.7\]]skyes shing 'phel na yan man kun tu steng 'og tu 'gro ba yin la/_srin bu de dag kyang 'breng pa 'dra ba yin no/_/srin bu la la ni khol ma 'am rta bla ba 'dra ba yin no/_/kha cig ni 'bras kyi myu gu 'dra zhing dkar la sra ba yin no/_/de bzhin du kha cig ni phra zhing ring ba'i rnam
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]pa 'dra ba yin no/_/la la ni chung zhing phra ba yin no/_/mdog ni dkar ba dang dmar ba nyid du phal cher snang ba yin no/_/de yi ming ni rnam bdun te/_/rgyu ma zad dang lto na 'khyil/_/snying za ya mtshan chen po dang /_/mi mngon rgyu dang 'jag ma 'dra/_/
[\[175a.2\]]dri zhim zhes bya/_zhes bya ba la/_srin bu de rnams kyi ming gi dbye ba ni/_rgyu ma za ba la sogs pa rnam pa bdun yin te/_de rnams ni/_snying 'phar kha chu 'dzag pa dang /_/zas mi 'ju zhing yi ga 'chus/_/brgyal zhing mi dran rims 'debs slon/_/skom zhing sbrid pa
[\[175a.3\]]cham pas 'debs/_/zhes bya ba la/_srin bu de rnams ni snying 'phar ba la sogs pa byed par 'gyur te/_snying 'phar ba ni bad kan tshogs gyen du 'phar bar byed pa dang /_kha chu 'dzag pa ni kha nas bad kan 'dzag pa dang /_kha zas mi 'ju ba la sogs pa byed pa yin
[\[175a.4\]]no/_/khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa nang na/_/khrag las byung ba'i srin bu phra/_/zlum zhing rkang med zangs ltar dmar/_/phra zhing la la bltar mi snang /_/zhes bya ba la/_'di rnams kyi gnas ni khrag rgyu ba'i rtsa bo che'i nang nas rgyu zhing de yang srin bu shin tu phra ba dang zlum pa la sogs pa
[\[175a.5\]]yin la/_shin tu phra zhing chung ba yin pas na la la bltar mi snang ba yin no/_/skra rtsa za zhing spu 'byi byed/_/spu gling u dum bA ra 'dra/_/zhags pa bcas dang thong ka ste/_/drug po de dag mdze las gcig_/ces bya ba la/_yang srin bu de dag ni ming skra za ba zhes
[\[175a.6\]]bya ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa drug yin la/_yang de dag ni mdze dang las gcig ste/_spu ldang ba dang /_g.ya' ba dang /_zug pa la sogs pa dang /_skra dang kha spu la sogs pa 'byi ba dang /_chu ba dang /_sha dang rtsa dang rus pa snyi ba dang za bar las gcig pa
[\[175a.7\]]yin no/_/zhu ba'i gnas su mi gtsang skyes/_/'phel nas thur du rgyu bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bshang ba las byung ba'i srin bu ni zhu ba'i gnas su 'byung ste/_de 'phel zhing skyes par gyur pa na thur du rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed do/_/de ni cher 'phel gyur pa na/_/gang tshe ma zhu'i
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]gnas su zhugs/_/de tshe sgregs pa dbugs 'byung ba/_/phyi sa lta bur mnam par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_srin bu de rnams dus gang gi tshe ma zhu ba'i gnas su zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe mi de sgregs pa dang dbugs 'byung ba phyis lta bur shin tu mnam par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[175b.2\]]zlum zhing lus phra sbom po dang /_/smug dang ser dang dkar dang gnag_/ces bya ba la/_srin bu de dag gi dbyibs ni zlum pa dang phra ba dang sbom por 'gyur la/_mdog ni smug pa la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa yin no/_/srin bu de ming rnam lnga ste/_/kham gyis
[\[175b.3\]]za dang dal gyis 'gro/_/myong bar byed dang brkam pa dang /_/lus la gnod byed ces bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_srin bu de rnams kyi ming kham gyis za ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro/_/des 'khru gzer dang rtug skam byed/_/skem zhing mdog
[\[175b.4\]]ni skya ba dang /_/ba spu ldang zhing me drod nyams/_/lci g.ya' gzhang ni phyir 'byung byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bshang ba de las byung ba'i srin bu de rnams kyis ni 'khru ba nas/_gzhang phyir 'byung ba'i bar du skyed par byed do/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam
[\[175b.5\]]par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas rlung nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad chen po
[\[175b.6\]]yin par mtshan nyid mthun pas/_mdze nad kyi 'og tu rlung nad kyi nad gzhi bshad cing brtsams pa yin no/_/rlung ni phan dang gnod byed la/_/'di ni sna tshogs rgyu gcig pu/_/khyad par du ni lus kyi ni/_/nad dang nad med rgyu gcig pu/_/zhes bya ba la/_don
[\[175b.7\]]dang don ma yin pa'i dge mi dge'i las gnyis po de dag de byed cing rdzogs par byed pa'i gzhi de la rlung de ni srid pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa gcig pu kho na yin la/_khyad par ram lhag par ni lus la phan par byed pa dang /_nad dang nad med pa'i rgyu gcig pu nyid
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]yin no/_/de ni kun byed kun bdag nyid/_/sna tshogs gzugs can skye dgu'i bdag_/'byin byed 'dzin byed khyab 'jug gtso/_/sdud byed 'chi bdag gshin rjer 'gyur/_/de bas de ldang mi 'gyur bar/_/rtag tu 'bad pa nyid du gyis/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[176a.2\]]yang rlung de ni lus la sogs pa thams cad skyed pa dang /_sgrib pa yang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i bya ba kun byed pas kun byed ces bya'o/_/de bzhin du kun gyi bdag nyid kyang yin te/_de ni thams cad kyi srog yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can yang
[\[176a.3\]]yin te/_rnam pa tha dad pa'i rang bzhin can no/_/de nyid ni skye dgu rnams gnas par byed pas na skye dgu'i bdag go/_/de 'byin par byed pa yang yin te de phyi dang nang gi dngos po skyed par byed pa yang yin la/_sna tshogs pa 'dzin pas na 'dzin par byed pa yang yin no/_/
[\[176a.4\]]de bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas na khyab 'jug go/_/de bzhin du thams cad zil gyis gnon pas na gtso bo'o/_/'gro ba rnams sdud cing 'ching bar byed pas na sdud byed do/_/de nyid kyis na 'chi bdag ste 'gro ba 'jig par byed pa'o/_/
[\[176a.5\]]des na 'gro ba rnams mthar 'chi bar byed pas na gshin rje nyid dang 'dra bar bya ba'i phyir gshin rje'o/_/gang gi phyir rlung 'di'i rang bzhin de lta bu yin pa de'i phyir rlung de ni ldang zhing 'khrugs par mi 'gyur bar rtag par dus thams cad du 'bad pa kho nar bya'o/_/de yis
[\[176a.6\]]tha mal gzhan gyur bas/_/nad kyi bye brag shes par bshad/_/bsdus dang rgyas pa de ming gnas/_/rgyu ba'i lam ni re re lnga/_/nad tshul shes par bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung de'i las tha mal pa ni nad kyi bye brag shes par dbugs 'byung ba dang
[\[176a.7\]]rngub pa la sogs pa yin par bshad la/_de bzhin du gzhan du gyur pa'i las kyang /_rlung ni 'phel bar gyur pa yis/_/skem dang mdog nag dro bag dga'/_/'dar dang lto sbos bshang ba sri/_/stobs dang gnyid dang dbang po nyams/_/smra mang mgo 'khor zhom
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_'di ni 'gyur ba'i bshad pa yin no/_/de la tha mal ba ni rang bzhin gnas pa ste/_gzhan du ma gyur pa la bya la/_gzhan du gyur pa ni nad 'khrugs shing gnod par gyur pa la bya'o/_/de bzhin du rlung nad 'di mdor bsdus pa
[\[176b.2\]]dang rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas ming dang gnas gang dang gang yin pa dang /_rgyu ba'i lam gang dang gang yin pa yang re re zhing lnga lngar nad kyi bye brag shes par bshad cing bstan pa yin te/_de la ming ni srog ces bya ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga yin la/_
[\[176b.3\]]gnas kyang spyi bo la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga ste/_ji ltar srog ces bya ba'i rlung ni spyi bo la gnas pa yin pa dang /_gyen du rgyu ba ni brang na gnas pa dang /_khyab byed ni snying la gnas pa dang /_me dang mnyam du gnas pa ni pho ba'i me drod dang
[\[176b.4\]]lhan cig gnas pa dang /_thur du sel ba ni gzhang la gnas pa yin no/_/rgyu ba ni rnam pa lnga ste/_srog ces bya ba'i rlung ni brang dang lkog mar rgyu la/_de'i las ni glo ba la sogs pa brtan par 'dzin pa yin no/_/stod du rgyu ba ni sna dang lte bar rgyu la
[\[176b.5\]]las kyi bya ba ni tshig 'byin pa la sogs pa yin no/_/khyab byed ni lus ma lus pa la rgyu la las ni 'gro ba la sogs pa yin no/_/me dang mnyam du gnas pa khong par rgyu la bya ba'i las ni zas 'dzin pa la sogs pa yin no/_/thur du sel ba ni gzhang la sogs
[\[176b.6\]]par rgyu ste/_bya ba'i las ni bshang gci 'byin pa la sogs pa yin no/_/'dir ni nad kyi rnam gyur pa/_/de yi dbye ba nad gzhi dang /_/mtshan nyid bcas pa nyid du bshad/_/grangs med kyang ni brgyad cu yi/_/grangs su sngar ni bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya
[\[176b.7\]]ba la/_yang le'u 'dir ni rlung de'i rnam par gyur pa'i las tha dad par dbye ba'i tshul ni nad gzhi'i rgyu dang bcas pa dang /_de bzhin du mtshan nyid kyi tshul ji lta bu yin pa dang bcas pa bshad de/_de yang grangs med cing tshad bzung du med du zin kyang brgyad cu'i
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]grangs su nges par 'chad par sngar nad kyi bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u las bshad pa yin no/_/lus zungs zad byed bsten drags pas/_/rlung ni 'khrugs par byed 'gyur te/_/sbu gu stong par rgyu gyur pa/_/de nyid shin tu 'gengs par byed/_/
[\[177a.2\]]nad gzhan gyis ni gang ba der/_/khebs pas mthu can nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus zungs bdun po zad par byed pa'i sman dang zas dang spyod lam tshad las drags par lhag par bsten pas rlung nad 'khrugs nas ldang bar 'gyur te/_de ni stong zhing sbu gur gnas
[\[177a.3\]]pa'i rgyun srang dag tu rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed pas na sbu gu stong pa de dag shin tu 'gengs shing rgyas par byas nas ldang bar byed do/_/de las nad gzhan gyis gang ba der phyin zhing de dag khebs par byas nas/_rlung de mthu can mi bzad pa nyid du ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na rlung ni
[\[177a.4\]]rnam pa gnyis ldang ste/_lus zungs zad pa dang /_nad kyis khebs pa las ldang ba yin no/_/de la zhu ba'i gnas su zhugs/_/gzer dang rgyu ma sgra bcas sbo/_/bshang 'gags rde'u nad gzhang 'brum skye/_/rgyab dang rked pa mjug tor na/_/ro smad kyi ni
[\[177a.5\]]phyogs de ru/_/mi bzad gnod pa de de skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_de la zhu ba'i gnas su zhugs pa 'khrugs par gyur na/_gzer la sogs pa skyed par 'gyur la/_de bzhin du lte ba man chad lus kyi ro smad kyi phyogs de dang der mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba'i nad kyi
[\[177a.6\]]gnod pa'i bla brnan du ma de dang de dag skyed par byed do/_/ma zhu'i gnas zhugs skom dang slon/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde gsud nad/_/lkog ma 'gags shing sgregs mang na/_/lte ba yan chad skyed par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ma zhu ba'i gnas lte ba yan
[\[177a.7\]]chad du rlung zhugs par gyur na skom dang la sogs pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba sogs zhugs dbang por gnod/_/ces bya ba la/_rna ba la sogs pa dbang po'i bu ga rnams su rlung zhugs par gyur na mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la gnod cing ma
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]rung bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/pags zhugs gas shing rtsub par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung pags par gnas te 'khrugs pa ni pags pa shas cher gas shing rtsub par byed par 'gyur ro/_/khrag zhugs gnyid stug mi bzad na/_/tsha zhing dmar la mdog mi
[\[177b.2\]]sdug_/thor 'byung kha zas sra bar gnas/_/yi ga 'chus skom mgo 'khor na/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung khrag la gnas te 'khrugs na ni gnyid stug pa la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /_thor bu zhes bya ba tshigs rnams su rtsa sbom pa rmen bu ltar 'byung ba dang /_de
[\[177b.3\]]bzhin du kha zas khyad par du mi 'ju zhing sra ba rem rem por gnas pa dang /_de nyid kyis na yi ga 'chus par 'gyur ba dang /_skom pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/sha tshil la gnas rmen bu dang /_rab tu zug cing lus rtsub la/_lus lci rab na rengs pa dang /_
[\[177b.4\]]khu tshur dbyug pas phog snyam byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sha dang tshil la gnas nas 'khrugs pa'i rlung ni rmen bu la sogs pa skyed par byed pa dang /_khu tshur ram dbyug pas phog cing bsnun pa ltar na bar byed pa yin no/_/rus gnas brla dang rus tshigs na/_/
[\[177b.5\]]mi bzad gzer zhing nyams stobs zad/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung de rus pa la gnas te 'khrugs na brla la sogs pa mi bzad par gzer ba dang /_de bzhin du nyams stobs zad par byed par 'gyur ro/_/rkang gnas rus pa khong stong zhing /_/gnyid med rtag tu
[\[177b.6\]]na ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung rkang la gnas te 'khrugs pa ni rus pa khong stong du byed cing rkang zad pa dang gnyid med cing yar ba dang /_rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par na bar byed pa yin no/_/khu bar gnas pa myur 'byung la/_/'gags pa'am mdog 'gyur
[\[177b.7\]]nyid du 'gyur/_/mngal gyi khu bar gnas de bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khu bar gnas te rlung 'khrugs pa ni khu chu myur bar 'byin par byed pa dang /_yang na 'gags shing mi 'byung bar byed pa'am/_mdog gzhan du 'gyur bar byed pa nyid du byed par 'gyur
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]ro/_/mngal du gnas pa'i khu bar rlung zhugs pa'i nad kyang de dang 'dra ste/_myur du zag pa dang /_'gags pa dang /_mdog 'gyur bar byed de/_khu ba la gnas pa'i rlung 'khrugs pas mngal chags pa de 'jig cing tshul 'di ltar byed par 'gyur
[\[178a.2\]]ro/_/rtsa rnams stong zhing sbo bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa la gnas pa'i rlung 'khrugs par gyur na rtsa de nyid khong stong du gnas pa dang rlung gis rgyas shing sbos par byed do/_/chu bar gnas pa gzugs 'jas dang /_/sgur dang da rgan nad du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[178a.3\]]chu bar gnas te rlung 'khrugs par gyur na lhu gzugs 'jas shing 'theng ba dang sgur ba dang /_da rgan gyi nad skyed par byed par 'gyur ro/_/tshigs la gnas pa'i rlung skrang ba/_/rkyal pa rlung gis gang reg 'dra/_/brkyang dang bskum par byed pa yis/_/bskyod pa na dang bcas
[\[178a.4\]]par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshigs la gnas te rlung 'khrugs na ni skrang bar 'gyur zhing /_skrang ba de yang rkyal pa rlung gis gang ba la reg pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du rkang lag brkyang ba dang bskum par byed pa'i bskyod pa de dag na zhing zug pa dang
[\[178a.5\]]bcas par 'gyur ro/_/yan lag kun la brten pa ni/_/zug chag snyam sems 'gul ba dang /_/rengs dang tshor ba med pa dang /_/tshigs 'khums 'dar bar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_yan lag thams cad la brten te rlung 'khrugs par gyur pa na zug
[\[178a.6\]]pa la sogs pa'i nad skyed par 'gyur ro/_/gang tshe rtsa chen kun la gnas/_/yang dang yang du 'khrugs gyur pa/_/de tshe yan lag la 'jug pas/_/nad ni lus la 'jug ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dus gang gi tshe rlung rtsa bo che kun la gnas te 'khrugs par gyur pa de'i tshe
[\[178a.7\]]lus thams cad yang dang yang du 'khrugs shing gnod par byed cing yan lag thams cad la 'jug pas zil gyis gnon par byed pas na/_rlung nad de ni lus la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/ro smad du ni 'gags pa'i rlung /_/gyen du
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]song ste snying gar gnas/_/snying ga'i sbu gur zhugs nas ni/_/mgo bo yan lag bcas par zug_/lus ni kun tu zhugs gyur nas/_/de ni gzhu ltar sgu bor byed/_/dbugs 'byin dka' zhing mig rengs har/_/lhod cing 'dzums par byed 'gyur la/_/de nas phug
[\[178b.2\]]ron lta bur mkhun/_/dran pa med de gzhan dbang can/_/de nyid a ba ta nar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_ro smad du rlung zhugs par gyur cing rgyun srang gi lam 'gags par gyur na ro smad nas gyen du song ste snying gar gnas shing brten nas snying ga'i rtsa'i sbu gu'i nang du zhugs
[\[178b.3\]]nas snying dang mgo bo dang mur 'gram la sogs par zug cing na bar byed do/_/de bzhin du lus kun tu zhugs par gyur cing bsdus par gyur nas nad pa de'i lus gzhu ltar sgur po nyid du byed cing 'gugs par byed do/_/de lta bu'i mi de ni dbugs 'byung bar dka' zhing rngam pa
[\[178b.4\]]can du 'byung ba dang /_mig rengs shing har har por 'dug pa dang /_lhod cing gnas las 'chug pa dang /_'dzums shing 'byed mi shes par 'gyur la/_de nas de'i 'og tu phug ron ltar mkhun zhing sgra mi gsal bar 'byin par byed pa dang /_dran pa med
[\[178b.5\]]de 'du shes mi gsal ba nyid de nad de gzhan dbang can zhes bshad do/_/la la dag gi gzhung gis ni nad de nyid a ba ta na zhes bya'o zhes zer ro/_/rlung gis snying ni btang gyur na/_/skad cig tsam du bde la reg_/slar zhugs na ni na bar byed/_/ces
[\[178b.6\]]bya ba la/_gzhan dbang can zhes bya ba'i nad de la rlung gis snying ga btang zhing der mi gnas par gyur na skad cig tsam du bde ba la gnas shing nad med par 'gyur ro/_/yang de slar zhugs shing gnas par gyur na skad cig na zhing mi bde bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ni mngal
[\[178b.7\]]'jig las byung dang /_/khrag ni lhag par 'dzag gyur dang /_/snad pa dag las byung gyur pa/_/shin tu gso bar dka' bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhan dbang can zhes bya ba'i rlung nad de mngal 'jig pa la sogs pa'i rgyu gsum las
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]byung ba ni gso bar dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/mjing ba rengs pa'i rlung zhugs shing /_/gang tshe rtsa chen la gnas pa/_/lus kun khyab par gyur pa na/_/de tshe nam tshong 'gugs par byed/_/lus ni gzhu ltar nang du gug_/mig rengs shugs ni 'byin par byed/_/glal
[\[179a.2\]]'byung so ni 'cha' ba dang /_/bad kan skyugs par byed par 'gyur/_/rtsib logs zug cing tshig mi thon/_/'gram pa rgyab dang mgo bo na/_/'di ni nang du gug ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mjing ba ni gnya' ba la brten pa'i gnas nyid gnyis yod de/_de dag tu rlung zhugs nas gang gi
[\[179a.3\]]tshe rtsa chen por phyin nas gnas par gyur zhing lus thams cad khyab cing khebs par gyur pa de'i tshe nam tshong 'gugs shing yon por byed la/_de bzhin du lus kyang gzhu ltar nang du 'gugs par byed cing sgur por byed la/_mig gnyis rengs shing 'byed pa dang 'dzums mi shes pa dang /_
[\[179a.4\]]rang gi shugs chags pa dang /_gug por byed pa la sogs pa'i nad sna tshogs pa'i tshul skyed par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du glal mang du 'byung ba dang /_so krig krig 'cha' ba dang /_bad kan skyug cing slon par byed pa dang /_rtsib logs gnyis su zug cing na ba dang /_tshig mi thon pa dang /_'gram pa
[\[179a.5\]]la sogs pa na bar byed de/_'di lta bu'i nad 'di ni nang du gug pa'i rlung nad ces bya'o/_/phyi yi de dang 'dra ba la/_lus ni phyir dgye byed pa dang /_/mgo bo rgyab du 'dren byed cing /_/de la brang ni shin tu 'bur/_/gnya' ba bcom pa ltar na zhing /_/so dang kha ni mdog mi sdug_/rngul
[\[179a.6\]]zhing lus ni lhod par byed/_/phyir dgyed gzhu rengs zhes bya zhing /_/de la shugs drag ces kyang bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_phyir dgye ba zhes bya ba'i rlung nad gzhan dag ni tshul de dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa las/_'dir khyad par ni 'di yin te/_lus phyir dgye zhing rgyab tu sgu
[\[179a.7\]]bar byed la/_mgo bo rgyab du yo bar 'dren zhing 'gugs par byed pa dang /_phyir dgye ba zhes bya ba'i nad de la brang shin tu 'bur zhing mtho ba dang /_gnya' ba na zhing brdungs pa ltar sems pa dang /_de bzhin du so dang kha'i mdog mi sdug pa dang /_rngul shin tu mang du 'byung ba dang /_lus lhod cing shig shig por
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]'gyur bar byed de/_rlung nad de ni phyir dgyed pa zhes bya'o/_/zhes bshad pa la/_la la na re ni gzhungs rengs zhes bya'o zhes zer ro/_/gzhan dag ni de la shugs drag po zhes bya'o zhes kyang bshad do/_/gnad la gnas pa'i rmar zhugs te/_/rlung gis bskyod par gyur pa dang /_/rkang pa
[\[179b.2\]]nas ni mgo bo'i bar/_/lus la nad kyis khyab byed pa/_/skom zhing lus ni skya gyur pa/_/rma yi da rgan de spang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnad la gnas shing brten pa'i rmar zhugs pa'i rlung la sogs pa'i nad de rlung gis bskyod cing bsnan par gyur na/_rkang pa nas mgo bo'i bar gyi lus
[\[179b.3\]]thams cad la nad kyis khyab cing zil gyis gnon par byed de/_rma'i da rgan de lta bu de skom dad che zhing lus skya ba las byung ba de ni gso dka' ba yin pas spang zhing dor bar bya'o/_/lus la 'jug pa'i rlung kun ni/_/shugs dang bral nas bde bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngar
[\[179b.4\]]bshad pa'i rlung nad lus la 'jug pa la sogs pa de rnams la rlung gi shugs dang bral zhing /_shugs zhi bar gyur na de ni bde zhing nad med par 'gyur ba yin no/_/lce ni brud drags skam zos gnod/_/'gram pa'i rtsa bar gnas rlung 'khrugs/_/'gram pa gnyis ni bskyod byas nas/_/kha
[\[179b.5\]]ni gdangs par byed pa'am/_/yang na 'dzums par byed par 'gyur/_/'gram pa nyams par byed pa des/_/za dang smra ba dka' bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_lce brud drags shing so shing la sogs pas gnod par byas pa dang /_zas skam po zos shing bcas pa dang /_khu tshur dang rdo
[\[179b.6\]]la sogs pas snad pas 'gram pa'i rtsa bar gnas pa'i rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur nas/_'gram pa gnyis bskyod cing rang gi gnas nas 'gul bar byas nas/_kha rtag tu gdangs par byed pa dang /_yang na kha 'dzums shing 'byed mi shes par byed par 'gyur te/_nad de
[\[179b.7\]]ni 'gram pa la gnas nas nyams par byed pa zhes bya ste/_'gram pa bskyod cing nyams par byed pa des zas zab dang tshig tu smra ba shin tu dka' bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/smra bar byed pa'i rtsa gnas rlung /_/lce ni ldib par byed 'gyur zhing /_/lce ldibs des ni bza' btung dang /_/smra ba la sogs mi nus
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_smra bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rtsa gang yin pa la gnas par gyur pa'i rlung ni lce ldibs shing lkugs par byed par 'gyur te/_nad de ni lce ldibs pa zhes bya ba yin te/_nad des ni bza' ba la sogs pa la longs spyad par mi nus pa yin no/_/
[\[180a.2\]]mgo bos khur ni khyer ba dang /_dgod drags mang du smra ba dang /_/sdangs dang 'chus te sbrid pa gtong /_/gzhu sra 'dren par byed pa dang /_/sngas ni mi mnyam la nyal dang /_/sra ba 'cha' bar byed pa dang /_/rlung skyed pa ni de dang des/_/rlung 'phel ro stod la zhugs nas/_/
[\[180a.3\]]gdong gi gzhogs phyed yon por byed/_/smra dang dgod dang lta ba'ang yo/_/de nas de yi de yi mgo 'gul zhing /_/tshig mi phyin la mig rengs shing /_/so 'gul skad ni 'gags pa dang /_/sgra mi thos shing sbrid pa thogs/_/dri mi tshor zhing dran nyams rmongs/_/gnyid log pa na
[\[180a.4\]]sdangs par 'gyur/_/mchil ma g.yon du 'dor ba dang /_mig gcig 'dzums par 'gyur ba dang /_/nam tshong yan chad mi bzad na/_/gzhogs phyed dag gam ro smad na/_/la las de gzhogs phyed nad bshad/_/gzhan dag phyogs gcig gug ces zer/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[180a.5\]]mgo bos khur lci ba khyer zhing gnas gzhan nas gzhan du 'degs pa dang /_dgod drags pa la sogs pa dang lus 'chus te sbrid pa gtong ba la sogs pa dang sra ba'i zas 'cha' bar byed pa ste/_de dag gis ni rlung skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa yin la/_de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad
[\[180a.6\]]kyi 'dir ma bshad pa'i rlung skyed par byed pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de dang des rlung 'phel bar gyur nas lus kyi ro stod la zhugs te gnas pa dang /_des gdong gi gzhogs phyed yon por byed par 'gyur la/_de bzhin du tshig smra bar byed pa dang /_dgod par byed pa dang /_lta bar byed pa na yang yon
[\[180a.7\]]por byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i 'og tu mi de'i mgo 'gul zhing ldeg la 'dar bar 'gyur ba dang /_tshig mi phyin cing thogs pa dang /_mig rengs shing har har por lta ba dang /_so 'gul zhing g.yo ba la sogs pa mchil ma g.yon du 'dor gyin drang por mi 'dor ba dang /_mig gcig 'dzums par byed pa
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]dang /_nam tshong yan chad mgrin pa la sogs pa mi bzad par na ba dang /_lus kyi gzhogs phyed dam/_yang na ro smad du na bar byed de/_nad de ni gzhogs phyed na ba'i rlung nad ces bya'o zhes bshad la/_gzhan dag ni phyogs gcig gug pa zhes bya'o zhes zer ro/_/rlung ni khrag la
[\[180b.2\]]brten gyur te/_/spyi bo 'dzin pa'i rtsar zhugs pa/_/rtsub cing nad bcas mdog gnag byed/_/rtsa 'dzin de ni gsor mi rung /_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung ni khrag la brten nas rgyu ste song nas spyi bo 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rtsar zhugs par gyur pa ni rtsub cing na ba dang bcas pa dang /_mdog gnag par
[\[180b.3\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu'i nad de ni rtsa 'dzin pa zhes bya ste gso zhing bcos par mi nus pa yin no/_/rlung gis de la gzhogs phyed bzung /_/rtsa dang rgyus pa bskams byas nas/_/gzhogs phyed gang yang rung la gnod/_/tshigs kyi sbrel mtshams lhod par byed/_/de yis lus phyed
[\[180b.4\]]thams cad ni/_/lus sbyor mi nus tshor ba med/_/de ni phyogs gcig nad ces zer/_/gzhan dag phyogs gcig skams par 'chad/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung gis lus kyi gzhogs phyed bzung zhing der gnas par byas pa dang /_rtsa dang rgyus pa bskams par byas nas/_lus
[\[180b.5\]]kyi g.yas sam g.yon gyi gzhogs phyed gang yang rung ba la gnod cing mi shis par byed la/_tshigs rnams kyi bog re'i sbrel mtshams lhod cing shig shig por byed pa dang /_nad pa de'i lus kyi gzhogs phyed kun ma lus par lus la sbyor bar mi nus shing g.yo 'gul gyi bya ba byed
[\[180b.6\]]mi nus pa dang /_tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'dug pa'i nad de ni phyogs gcig gi nad ces zer ro/_/drang srong gzhan dag ni phyogs gcig skams pa zhes 'chad do/_/lus kun rlung nad de dang 'dra/_/yan lag kun la brtan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_phyogs gcig skams pa dang lus kun la
[\[180b.7\]]zhugs pa'i rlung nad ni tshor ba med pa la sogs pa tshul 'dra ba yin la/_de ni yan lag thams cad la brten pa'i nad ces bya bar shes par bya'o/_/rlung nad nyi tshes gzhogs phyed skams/_/shin tu gso dka' yin par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung nad nyi tshe nad gzhan dang ma 'dres pa gang
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]yin pa des gzhogs phyed skams par gyur pa ni shin tu gso dka' ba yin no/_/gzhan dang 'dres pa gso dka' yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhan bad kan dang mkhris pa gang yang rung ba dang rlung 'dres par gyur pa'i gzhogs phyed skams pa'ang gso dka' ba yin
[\[181a.2\]]no/_/zad byed rgyu can spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_zad byed kyi rgyu las byung ba'i gzhogs phyed skams pa ni spang bar bya ste gsor mi rung ngo /_/ma zhu bad kan ldan pa yis/_/rgyun srang bkag ste lus rengs pas/_/brkyang bskum kun las nyams gyur pa/_/shing 'dra shing ltar rengs
[\[181a.3\]]pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung nad ma zhu ba dang bad kan dang bcas pa dag gis rlung gi rgyu ba'i lam bkag ste/_lus rengs shing 'gyur mi shes par byas pas brkyang ba dang bskum pa la sogs pa'i lus kyi spyod pa kun las nyams par gyur pa ni dbyug ltar rengs pa yin pas na/_shing ltar
[\[181a.4\]]rengs pa zhes bya'o/_/phrag pa'i rtsa bar zhugs pa'i rlung /_/der gnas rtsa ni 'khums byas te/_/dpung pa bskyod par mi nus byed/_/dpung pa 'jas pa'i rlung nad yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung phrag pa'i rtsa bar gnas te/_de na gnas pa'i rtsa 'khums shing 'dus par byas nas/_dpung pa bskyod
[\[181a.5\]]bsgul mi nus par byed pa'i rlung nad skyed par byed do/_gang zhig lag mthil sor mor 'brel/_/chu ba rgyab tu 'khums byed cing /_/lag ngar bya ba nyams byed pa/_/rlung de bi sha tse ru bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_nad gang zhig lag pa'i mthil du phyogs shing de dang 'brel pa chu ba 'dus pa zhes
[\[181a.6\]]bya ba'i chu ba rgyab tu 'khums par byed cing /_lag ngar gyi rgyab tu rlung gis 'khums par byed nas lag ngar gyi bya ba'i las gang dag yin pa thams cad nyams par byed de/_g.yo 'gul gyi bya ba thams cad mi nus par byed pa'i rlung nad de ni ming bi sha tse zhes bya ba yin no zhes drang srong
[\[181a.7\]]rnams kyis bshad do/_/gang tshe rlung ni rked par gnas/_/brla yi chu ba'i nang du zhugs/_/de tshe mi de 'theng por 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi tshe rlung gi nad rked pa'i phyogs su gnas shing brten par gyur nas brla'i chu ba'i nang du zhugs shing zhen par gyur pa de'i tshe mi de 'theng por gyur te rkang
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]zug cing 'chal ba'i 'theng por 'gyur ro/_/brla gnyis la zhugs 'phye bor 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi tshe rked par gnas pa'i rlung de brla gnyis ka la zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe brla gnyis ka'i spyod pa nyams pas 'phye bor 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig 'gro bar rtsom pa na/_/
[\[181b.2\]]lus 'dar 'theng po ltar 'gro ba/_/tshigs kyi sprel mtshams lhod gyur pa/_/de ni sran ma'i 'theng por bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_skyes bu gang 'gro bar rtsom zhing 'gro ba'i bya ba 'dor zhing g.yo la 'theng po lta bur 'gro ba'i skyes bu de ni tshigs kyi bog re'i sbrel mtshams lhod cing nyams
[\[181b.3\]]par gyur pa yin te/_de ni ming sran ma ltar 'theng pa zhes bya'o/_/kha zas dro grang skam rlon 'dres/_/lci dang snum ches bsten pa dang /_/zhu dang ma zhu mi bdes bskyod/_/nyin nyal mtshan gnyid ma log pas/_/ma zhu shin tu sogs gyur te/_/gal te brla nang zhugs gyur na/_/bad kan
[\[181b.4\]]tshil dang rlung bcas pa/_/nad gzhan zil gyis mnan nas ni/_/brla rus nang du gang byas te/_/bad kan gyis te rengs gyur la/_/de tshe de yis brla rengs byed/_/'degs mi nus grang tshor ba med/_/gzhan gyi yin snyam sems shing lci/_/mi bzad par ni 'gro ba nyams/_/sems
[\[181b.5\]]khong chud cing yan lag na/_/snyom slon rims 'debs yi ga 'chus/_/rkang pa sgyid zhan 'degs par dka'/_/bem bem por 'dug ldan pa yin/_/de ni brla rengs nad ces bshad/_/gzhan dag phyug po'i rlung zhes zer/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha zas kyi bag dro grang la sogs par 'dren
[\[181b.6\]]mar bsten pa dang /_zhu ba dang bcas pa'i ma zhu ba ni zhu ba dang ma zhu ba ste/_la la ni zhu zhing smin pa yin la/_la la ni ma zhu zhing ma smin pa yin te/_legs par tshos pa dang /_ma tshos pa dag gis mi bde bar gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du mi bde zhing sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa la brten pas
[\[181b.7\]]bskyod cing 'khrugs par byas pas ma zhu ba shin tu shas cher sogs par 'gyur la/_de bzhin du nyin par gnyid log cing nyal ba dang /_gnyid ma log pa dag yun ring du bsten kyang ma zhu ba shin tu shas cher sogs par 'gyur te/_ma zhu ba de gal te brla dang
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]byin pa'i nang du zhugs par gyur na/_ma zhu ba de bad kan dang tshil dang rlung dang bcas par 'gyur ba yin gyi/_ma zhu ba de ni rlung dang bad kan gyi nad gzhan la ltos pa zil gyis mnan cing mthu chung bar byed la/_de'i phyir ma zhu ba des bad kan gyi g.yo
[\[182a.2\]]ba med par byas shing brla'i rus pa'i nang du gang bar byed pa na de'i tshe brla rengs shing bskyod mi shes par 'gyur te/_de bas de'i nad des brla rengs par byed cing 'gyur mi shes par 'degs shing bskyod mi shes mi nus pa dang /_grang zhing tshor ba med pa dang /_gzhan gyi yin par
[\[182a.3\]]snyam du sems shing rang gi lus las byung ba snyam du mi sems pa dang /_de bzhin du mi bzad par na zhing brnag par dka' ba la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /_sems khong du chud pa la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/_nad de ni brla rengs kyi nad ces bya'o zhes tshe'i rig byed shes pa'i
[\[182a.4\]]slob dpon dag gis bshad do/_/drang srong gzhan dag gis phyug po'i rlung nad ces bya'o zhes zer ro/_/rlung dang khrag las skyes pa'i skrang /_/pus mo'i steng byung nad tshabs che/_/ce spyang mgo ltar sbom gyur pa/_/ce spyang mgo 'dra yin zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang khrag
[\[182a.5\]]las skyes pa'i skrang pa pus mo'i steng du byung ba de ni nad tshabs shin tu che ba yin te/_de ni ce spyang gi mgo 'dra bar sbom zhing che bar skrang pa yin pas ce spyang gi mgo 'dra ba'i rlung nad ces bya'o/_/rkang pa na zhing mi mnyam 'dor/_/ngal ba las ni gang tshe rlung /_/long mor gnas te
[\[182a.6\]]nad skyed pa/_/de ni rlung nad tsher mar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_rkang pa sa la mi mnyam zhing mi mnyam par 'dor ba'am/_yang na ngal zhing dub pa las dus gang gi tshe rlung byin pa dang /_rkang pa la brten nas long mor gnas pa'i nad skyed par gyur pa'i rlung nad de ni tsher ma lta bu zhes bshad
[\[182a.7\]]do/_/rting pa sor mor 'brel pa yi/_/chu bar rlung gis gnod gyur gang /_/brla nas 'jug par byed pa de/_/gzugs 'khums zhes ni bya bar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_rting par gnas nas sor mo dang 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i chu ba'i tshogs gang yin par rlung des gnod
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]pa skyed par gyur nas/_brla'i bar du gyen du 'jug par byed cing bsdus shing 'khums par byed pa gang yin pa de ni drang srong dag gis gzugs 'khums pa'i rlung nad ces bya bar bshad do/_/bi sha tsi dang gzugs 'khums bshad/_/mi bzad na ba kha li ra bshad/_/
[\[182b.2\]]ces bya ba la/_sngar lag ngar du zhugs pa'i rlung nad kyi bi sha tsi dang /_'das ma thag pa'i gzugs 'khums pa'i rlung nad gnyis po mi bzad pa dang ldan par snang ba ni rlung nad kha li zhes bya bar bshad do/_/gang gi rkang pa brtse gyur zhing /_/bem bem por ni gyur pa dag_/bad
[\[182b.3\]]kan rlung 'khrugs las gyur pa/_/rkang pa brtse bar de bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang gi rkang pa gnyis brtse zhing tsha ba tsag tsag por byed pa'i sgo nas tshor ba med cing bem bem por gyur pa dag ni bad kan dang 'dres pa las gyur pa yin la/_nad de ni rkang pa brtse ba zhes bya'o
[\[182b.4\]]zhes bshad do/_/mkhris pa khrag dang bcas pa'i rlung /_/rkang pa gnyis su tsha byed cing /_/khyad par du ni 'gro tshe tsha/_/de ni rkang tsha zhes byar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung gi nad mkhris pa dang khrag dang bcas par gyur pa las rkang pa gnyis su tsha ba 'ur 'ur por gyur pa gang yin pa
[\[182b.5\]]dang /_khyad par du yang 'gro zhing 'chag pa'i tshe lhag par tsha bar gyur pa'i nad de ni rkang pa tsha ba zhes bya'o zhes bshad do/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi
[\[182b.6\]]le'u bco lnga pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas dreg nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa yin par chos mthun pa yin pas na/_rlung nad kyi 'og tu le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/de yang rlung dang khrag las skyes pa'i skrang zhes smos pa yin no/_/khrag
[\[182b.7\]]ni 'khrugs par byed pa'i zas/_/tsha ba dang ni mi 'phrod pa/_/bsten dang sbyor ba log pa dang /_/nyin nyal mtshan gnyid ma log dang /_/nyal po drags dang skyid par gnas/_/'chag pa'i spyod pa ma bsten dang /_/snad dang sbyang ba ma byas pas/_/mi yi khrag ni 'khrugs gyur cing /_/rlung skyed zos pas rlung nad ni/_/
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]'phel bas 'khrugs te lam gzhan zhugs/_/de bzhin khrag kyang lam 'gags la/_/dang por gnod par 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag 'khrugs shing skyed par byed pa'i zas 'bru dang srog chags chu na spyod pa'i sha dang /_rgya sran ku lang+tha dang /_mon sran
[\[183a.2\]]gre'u dang /_nim pa ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_chang dang dar ba dang /_zho skyur po la sogs bsten pa dang /_mi 'phrod pa'i zas gsher ba'i sha dang /_mon sran gre'u lhan cig bza' ba dang sbrang rtsi dang mar cha mnyam par za ba la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa dang /_'dir ma smos su zin kyang khrag skyed
[\[183a.3\]]par byed pa'i spyod lam dang /_kha zas la sogs pa de dag bsten cing goms par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyor ba log pa ste sman dpyad kyi gtsug lag las byung ba bzhin du bsten par ma byas pa'i sbyor ba log pa dang /_de bzhin du nyin par shas cher gnyid log pa dang /_mtshan mo'i dus su gnyid ma
[\[183a.4\]]log pa dang /_nyal po drags shing bud med bsten pa drags pa dang /_phal cher skyid de bar gnas shing rtag tu bde ba dang ldan la lus 'jam sha can du gyur pas 'chag cing 'gro ba'i spyod lam ma bsten gyi/_rtag tu dal bar 'dug la bskyod cing rtsol ba mi byed pa dang /_snad pa ste mtshon
[\[183a.5\]]cha'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang yang rung bas snad cing rma byung ba dang /_sbyang ba ma byas te dri ma'i tshogs ma bsal cing ma bton pas mi'i khrag 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur zhing rlung skyed cing 'khrugs pa'i zas kha ba dang /_khung bu dang /_bska ba la sogs pa zos pa la goms
[\[183a.6\]]shing mang du bsten pas rlung nad 'phel zhing dang po sogs par gyur la/_de'i 'og tu 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur nas/_lam log pa gzhan du zhugs pa dang /_khrag kyang de dang 'dra bar sogs shing 'phel ba dang /_'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur nas lam 'gag
[\[183a.7\]]par bya ba de nyid kyis dang por gnod cing skyed par 'gyur ba yin no/_/de ni phyug po'i rlung nad dang /_/'theng nad stobs 'jig rlung khrag 'dres/_/ming du de ni rnam par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_dreg nad de ni phyug po'i rlung nad dang 'theng po'i nad dang stobs 'jig pa dang /_
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]rlung khrag 'dres pa'i nad ces bya bar ming gi rnam grangs su slob dpon gyis bshad pa yin no/_/de yang dang por rkang par rgyu/_/mchog tu bzhon sogs 'phyang las byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_dreg nad de yang dang por rkang pa gnyis su rgyug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mchog
[\[183b.2\]]tu'am khyad par du ni rta la sogs pa'i bzhon pa la zhon te/_rkang pa 'phyang bar byas pa las de 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de yi 'byung 'gyur mtshan nyid ni/_/mdze ni 'byung 'gyur mtshan mar mtshungs/_/de bzhin lus nyams yan lag lhod/_/pus mo byin pa brla rked pa/_/lag pa rkang
[\[183b.3\]]pa'i tshigs rnams su/_/g.ya' zhing 'gul dang na ba dang /_/chag snyam sems shing tshor med lci/_/yang dang yang du ldang ba dang /_/slar yang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dreg nad de phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid sngar byung ba'i tshul ni mdze 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan
[\[183b.4\]]ma dang mtshungs pa yin te/_shin tu 'dar ba'am reg na rtsub/_/tshul 'byung mi 'byung mdog mi sdug_/ces bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin no/_/de bzhin du mtshan ma gzhan yang lus nyams shing shig shig por 'gyur ba dang /_yan lag rnams lhod pa dang /_pus mo
[\[183b.5\]]la sogs par g.ya' ba la sogs pa'i nad yang dang yang du ldang zhing yang yang du slar zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_de nas slar ldang du ba byed pa yin no/_/rkang pa gnyis kyi rtsa bar gnas/_/lan 'ga' lag pa dag du gnas/_/byi ba'i dug ni ldang ba ltar/_/lus kun la ni khyab par 'gyur/_/
[\[183b.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_dreg nad de rkang pa gnyis kyi rtsa bar gnas shing rten byas nas/_lan 'ga' ni lag pa gnyis kyi rtsa bar yang gnas par byed de/_byi ba'i dug ldang bar byed pa dang /_dang por lus kyi phyogs gcig tu gnas nas/_de'i 'og tu lus ma lus par khyab cing mched par byed do/_/thogs
[\[183b.7\]]mar pags pa khrag la gnas/_/byung ba rtogs par sla zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dreg nad de thog mar te dang por pags pa dang khrag la gnas shing brten nas byung ba de ni dreg nad rtogs par sla ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas rim gyis lus zungs kun/_/khyab ste rtogs par dka' zhes bya/_/
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]zhes bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu sngar bshad pa las gzhan pa'i lus zungs tshil la sogs pa kun khyab cing zhu bar gyur nas 'byung ba de ni gting na gnas te rtogs par dka' ba zhes bya'o/_/rtogs sla pags g.ya' la sogs ldan/_/zangs ltar dmar dang sngo ba dang /_bya rmyang
[\[184a.2\]]bcas shing rab dro tsha/_/zhes bya ba la/_dreg nad rtogs par sla ba ni pags pa g.ya' ba dang /_'gul ba dang /_gzugs la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du zangs ltar dmar ba dang /_sngo ba'i mdog tu snang ba dang /_bya rmyang byed 'dod pa dang bcas pa dang /_mi bzad par rab tu tsha ba
[\[184a.3\]]yin no/_/rtogs dka' sngar bas lhag par na/_/skrang zhing mkhrang la tshos par byed/_/gzhang dang tshigs dang rus pa rkang /_/bcad snyam sems shing nang du rgyu/_/shugs dang ldan tshe sgur po dang /_/zha bo 'theng por byed 'gyur la/_/lus ni kun tu rgyu ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dreg
[\[184a.4\]]nad rtogs par dka' ba zhes bya ba ni/_dreg nad snga ma rtogs par bla ba bas lhag par na zhing gting zab par skrang ba dang /_mkhrang zhing sra ba dang /_tshos shing smin par byed pa dang /_gzhang la sogs pa bcad pa snyam du sems shing nad nang du rgyu ba dang de shugs dang ldan zhing shas
[\[184a.5\]]cher bde ba'i tshe na sgur po'am 'jas pa'am 'theng por byed par 'gyur ba dang /_rlung de mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du lus thams cad du rgyu zhing 'byam pa yin no/_/de la rlung shas che gyur na/_/gzer 'gul zug pa'i shas che zhing /_/skrang pa rtsub cing gnag pa dang /_/sngo zhing 'phel la 'bri
[\[184a.6\]]bar 'gyur/_/rtsa chen sor mo'i tshigs rnams ni/_/'khums shing lus bcum shin tu na/_/grang la mi dga' reg na bde/_/rengs shing 'dar la tshor ba med/_/ces bya ba la/_de la dreg nad rlung gi shas che ba ni gzer ba la sogs par 'gyur te/_gzer ba ni rgyun mi 'chad par na ba'o/_/
[\[184a.7\]]zug pa ni bar bar du chad cing sdod de na ba'o/_/lus bcum pa ni yan lag dam du bcangs pa snyam sems pa'o/_/grang ba la mi dga' ba ni grang ba la sdang zhing mi dga' ba'o/_/reg na bde ba ni grang bde nyid kyis reg na bde bar 'gyur ba'o/_/khrag shas che skrang rab tu zug_/dmar
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]zhing tsha ba tseg tseg byed/_/snum dang rtsub pas zhi mi 'gyur/_/g.ya' dang 'drul bar ldan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag gi shas che zhing rgyas pa las byung ba'i dreg nad kyi mdog dmar ba dang /_yungs kar btags pa'i lde gus bskus pa ltar tsha ba tseg tseg byed pa dang /_
[\[184b.2\]]zas dang spyod lam snum pa dang rtsub pas zhi zhing bde bar mi 'gyur ba yin no/_/gzhan yang g.ya' ba la sogs pa dang ldan no/_/mkhris gyur tsha zhing rmongs bag dang /_/rngul zhing brgyal myos skom dad che/_/reg mi bzod cing na la dmar/_/skrang zhing smin la shin tu dro/_/zhes
[\[184b.3\]]bya ba la/_mkhris pa shas che zhing bdo ba las gyur pa'i dreg nad ni tsha zhing gdung pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /_rmongs bag la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bad kan gyis 'gul mi shes lci/_/tshor med snum zhing grang ba dang /_/g.ya' zhing cung zad na ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[184b.4\]]bad kan shas che bar gyur pa'i dreg nad ni 'gul mi shes pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/'dres pa'i mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa'i ldan pa las byung ba ni/_dreg nad kyi mtshan nyid 'dren ma dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/nad gcig las
[\[184b.5\]]gyur gsar gso sla/_/zhes bya ba la/_dreg nad de nad gzhi gcig las byung bar gyur pa dang /_gsar du byung zhing ring por ma lon pa ni gso sla ba yin no/_/nad gnyis las byung 'tsho btsam/_/zhes bya ba la/_dreg nad nad gzhi gnyis las byung ba ni mi la ba tsam du 'tsho bar nus pa tsam
[\[184b.6\]]yin no/_/'dus pa las gyur chu ser 'dzag_/rengs dang thor bu 'phyang ba spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_dreg nad de nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las byung ba dang /_chu ser 'dzag par byed pa dang /_rengs shing 'gyur mi shes pa dang /_thor bu 'phyang bar byed pa de ni spang zhing dor bar bya'o/_/rlung
[\[184b.7\]]ni yan lag tshigs gnas pa/_/khrag gi lam la myur gnod byed/_/de gnyis phan tshun 'dres gyur pa'i/_/nad kyis srog ni 'phrog par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung ni yan lag gi tshigs rnams kyi nang du zhugs te gnas nas khrag rgyu ba'i lam la myur du gnod cing 'joms par
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]byed de/_rlung khrag de gnyis 'dres shing 'khrugs par gyur na rlung gi nad kyis mi'i srog 'phrog cing 'joms par byed do/_/lnga yi bdag nyid can rlung las/_/srog rtsub drag shul smyung ba dang /_/'grangs drags snad dang lam gyis du ba/_/shugs bkag nan gyis
[\[185a.2\]]btsir ba yis/_/'khrugs nas mig la sogs pa la/_/nye bar gnod pa skyed byed cing /_/cham pa nyam thag skam lud pa/_/dbugs mi bde sogs nad mang skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_srog ces bya ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i rlung lnga yod pa las kyang /_srog ces bya ba'i
