[\[185a.3\]]rlung ni rtsub pa la sogs pas 'khrugs par gyur nas/_mig la sogs pa'i dbang po la gnod par byed de/_cham pa la sogs pa'i nad skyed par byed do/_/stod rgyu sbrid pa sgregs pa dang /_/skyug pa gnyid ni bkag pa dang /_/khur lci 'degs dang drag tu ngu /_/dgod drags
[\[185a.4\]]sogs kyis nad 'khrugs te/_mgul pa 'gags shing sems nyams la/_/cham 'debs slon zhing yi ga 'chus/_/mgul par lba ba sogs skyed cing /_/nam tshong yan chad rten nas skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_stod du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rlung ni srid pa bkag pa la sogs pas
[\[185a.5\]]'khrugs shing ldang bar byed de/_mgul pa 'gags pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang /_nam tshong yan chad kyi nad 'dir ma smos pa gzhan dag kyang skyed par byed do/_/khyab byed 'gro dang 'dug drags dang /_/rtsed mo drags dang mi bzod spyod/_/kha zas mi mthun rtsub 'jigs
[\[185a.6\]]dga'/_/yi mug sogs kyis 'khrugs par gyur/_/khu ba stobs dang spro ba nyams/_/skrang dang sems g.yengs rims kyis 'debs/_/yan lag kun la zug pa dang /_/spu brtse yan lag tshor ba med/_/mdze dang me dbal gzhan yang ni/_/lus kun khyab pa'i nad skyed
[\[185a.7\]]'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_khyab byed ces bya ba'i rlung ni 'gro drags pa dang 'dug drags pa la sogs pas 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur nas khu ba zad cing nyal po mi nus pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang /_lus kyi yan lag ma lus pa la khyab pa'i nad thams cad skyed par 'gyur
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]ro/_/mnyam gnas 'du ba ma snyoms dang /_/grang dang 'dren ma'i zas zos dang /_/dus min gnyid log mtshan mo ni/_/gnyid ma log la sogs kyis 'khrugs/_/gzer dang skran dang pho nad sogs/_/zhu dang ma zhur gnas nad skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_me dang mnyam du
[\[185b.2\]]gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ni gnas ma snyoms pa dang /_'du ba ma snyoms pa la sogs pas 'khrugs par gyur nas/_gzer la sogs pa'i nad zhu ba dang ma zhu ba'i gnas la brten cing gnas pa rnams skyed cing 'byung bar byed do/_/thur sel zas ni rtsub la lci/_/shugs bkag
[\[185b.3\]]pa dang mi srun bzhon/_/khyogs dang bzhon dang stan la gnas/_/'gro ba bsten ni drags pa yis/_/'khrugs nas gso bar dka' ba'i nad/_zhu ba'i gnas la brten pa skyed/_/gcin dang khu chu'i nad gzhang 'brum/_/gzhang 'byung la sogs mang po skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_
[\[185b.4\]]thur du sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlung ni zas rtsub pa la sogs pa dang bzhon pa dang /_khyogs la sogs pa bsten par drags shing yang dang yang du skyod par byed pa dag gis 'khrugs par gyur nas/_gso zhing bcos par dka' ba'i nad zhu ba'i gnas la brten pa dang gcin nad la sogs pa rnams
[\[185b.5\]]dang /_gzhan yang nad mang po skyed par 'gyur ro/_/rlung kun ma zhur ldan pa ni/_/snyom dang 'gul mi shes khong lci/_/snum dang sgyid zhan yi ga 'chus/_/grang skran me drod nyams byed cing /_/tsha dang rtsub pa mngon 'dod cing /_/de zos bde 'gyur las shes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_srog ces bya ba
[\[185b.6\]]la sogs pas zhugs pa'i rlung gi nad kun ma zhu ba dang ldan pa yin par ni snyom las shes par bya'o/_/'gul mi shes pa ni la la dag na re mun par zhugs pa snyam byed pa'i nad la bya'o zhes zer ro/_/tsha ba la sogs pa mngon par 'dod pa ni de la dga' ba dang /_de dag nyid zos pas bde ba dang /_rjes su
[\[185b.7\]]'brel pa yin pa las shes par bya'o/_/ma zhu ba dang mi ldan pa/_/snyom sogs go ni bzlog pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung thams cad ma zhu ba mi ldan zhing /_/bral ba'i mtshan nyid ni bshad ma thag pa'i snyom pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par shes par bya'o/_/de nas rlung gis 'dres pa yi/_/dbye ba
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]mang por shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu rlung mkhris la sogs pa'i mang po dang 'dres shing ldan par gyur pa las 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba mang po gang dag yin pa de shes par bya'o/_/mkhris pas 'dres rtags tsha ba dang /_/skom gzer mgo 'khor mun 'thibs byed/_/
[\[186a.2\]]tsha dro skyur dang lan tshwa bro/_/tshwa zhing grang ba 'dod pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung mkhris pa dang 'dres shing de dang ldan pa'i rtags ni lus tsha ba dang /_skom pa la sogs pa'i tshul las shes par bya'o/_/bsil zhing khong lci gzer ba dang /_/tsha ba sogs zos smyung ba dang /_/rtsol dang rtsub pas lhag par bde/_/drod 'dod bad
[\[186a.3\]]kan ldan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan dang 'dres pa'i rlung gi mtshan nyid ni bsil ba la sogs pa dang ldan zhing /_rtags ni tsha ba dang bska ba dang kha ba zos pa dang /_smyung ba la sogs pas lhag par 'gyur ba yin no/_/khrag bcas tsha zhing na dang bcas/_/pags pa'i sha nang shin tu zug_/skrang pa mdog
[\[186a.4\]]dmar 'gyur ba dang /_/thig le dmar po 'byung ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung khrag dang 'dres te 'khrugs pa ni tshab la sogs pa dang bcas pa dang /_skrang pa'i mdog dmar bar 'gyur ba dang /_thig le dmar po tal til 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/sha dang 'dres pa mkhrang ba dang /_/mdog 'gyur
[\[186a.5\]]'brum bu phra mo 'byung /_/spu brtse lus la grog ma ni/_/rgyu ba snyam du sems par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha dang 'dres nas 'khrugs pa'i rlung ni skrang pa sra zhing mkhrang ba dang /_mdog mi sdug par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du 'brum bu phra mo yang sra zhing mdog mi sdug par 'gyur ba dang /_spu brtse ba la
[\[186a.6\]]sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no/_/tshil dang 'dres pa gso dka' dang /_/g.yo zhing snum la 'jam grang bar/_/lus la grang zhing yi ga 'chus/_/de ni phyug po'i rlung nad yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshil dang 'dres ba'i rlung nad ni phyug po'i rlung yin no/_/zhes tshig 'dis shes par bya ste/_yan lag der
[\[186a.7\]]skrang pa dang g.yo zhing 'pho ba dang /_snum pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/rus pa dang ldan reg na tsha/_/btsir na mngon par dga' ba dang /_/khab kyis rab tu gtsags snyam byed/_/yan lag na zhing zug pa yin/_zhes bya ba la/_rus pa dang 'dres pa'i rlung nad ni reg na
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa dang /_lag pa gnyis kyis btsir zhing man nan mngon par dga' ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/rkang dang ldan la lus sgu zhing /_/glal mang dkris pa snyam du sems/_/rab tu na la lag gnyis kyis/_/btsir na bde bar 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rkang dang
[\[186b.2\]]'dres shing ldan pa las 'khrugs pa'i rlung ni lus gud cing sgur ba dang /_glal mang du 'byung ba dang /_ras la sogs pas dam du dkris pa snyam du sems pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/khu ba dang 'dres drag tu 'byung /_/yang na mi 'byung 'bras bu med/_/ces bya ba la/_khu ba dang
[\[186b.3\]]'dres pa'i rlung ni khu ba'i shugs drag tu 'byung bar byed pa'am/_yang na mi 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_khu ba'i 'bras bu mngal du chags bde med par 'gyur ro/_/zas 'dres khong par ma zhu na/_/zhu nas nad de bde bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung zas dang 'dres bar gyur na zos ma thag khong par na zhing
[\[186b.4\]]gzer bar 'gyur la/_zas de zhu nas ni med de bde bar 'gyur ro/_/gcin dang rlung 'dres lgang pa sbo/_/gcin ni 'gags par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin dang rlung 'dres te 'khrugs na ni lgang pa sbo zhing rlung gis gang ba dang /_gcin 'gags shing sri bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[186b.5\]]bshang 'dres thur du 'byung ba 'gags/_/rang gi gnas su yongs su gcod/_/snum zos myur du 'ju bar 'gyur/_/zas zos lto ni spos pa dang /_/zas kyis bshang ba phul nas ni/_/na zhing skam po rnyog can 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_bshang ba dang 'dres par gyur ba'i rlung ni thur du
[\[186b.6\]]'byung ba'i rgyu ba 'gags shing sri bar byed pa dang /_rang gi gnas su zhu ba'i gnas yongs su gcod cing gris gcad pa snyam du byed pa dang /_de la snum zos na myur du ju zhing smin par 'gyur ba dang /_zas zos na lto sbo zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /_de la zas kyis bshang ba phul zhing btsir nas de'i
[\[186b.7\]]'og tu na bar byed cing skam pa dri ma can 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung ni lus zungs kun dang 'dres/_/b.rA dang chu so rgyab tu na/_/rlung ni log song mi bde zhing /_/snying ni rab tu na bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung dwangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs kun dang 'dres par gyur na/_brla la
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]sogs pa na bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rlung ni lam log par song zhing mi mthun par rgyu ba dang /_shin tu mi bde bar byed pa la sogs pa rlung gis byed par 'gyur ro/_/srog dang mkhris pa 'dres gyur 'khrugs/_/mgo 'khor brgyal dang lus tsha 'gyur/_/legs par ma zhu slon par byed/_/
[\[187a.2\]]ces bya ba la/_srog ces bya ba'i rlung mkhris pa dang gcig tu 'dres te 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur na mgo 'khor ba la sogs pa skyed pa dang /_zas legs par ma zhu ba ste/_phyed tsam du zhu ba'am/_ma zhu ba nyid kyi gnas skabs na slon par 'gyur ro/_/stod rgyu mgo 'khor stsogs pa dang /_/nang du tsha zhing stobs
[\[187a.3\]]zad 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung stod du rgyu ba de mkhris par gyur na/_mgo 'khor ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa dang /_de bzhin du khong pa'i nang tsha zhing stobs zad par 'gyur ro/_/khyab byed rmongs bag lus kun ni/_/tsha zhing ngal la lus spyod 'gag_/lus tsha nad dang bcas pa yin/_/zhes bya
[\[187a.4\]]ba la/_khyab byed ces bya ba'i rlung mkhris pa dang 'dres par gyur na/_rmongs bag la sogs pa 'byung ba dang /_lus kyi spyod pa'i g.yo 'gul 'gags shing mi 'byung ba dang /_lus tsha ba dang bcas pa dang /_na ba dang bcas pa yin no/_/mnyam gnas drod kyis gnod rngul che/_/mi dga' skom dad
[\[187a.5\]]tsha bcas 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_me dang mnyam du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rlung mkhris pa dang 'dres par gyur na/_drod kyis lus la gnod par 'gyur ba dang /_rdul shas cher 'byung ba dang /_yid mi dga' ba la sogs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/thur du sel bas dri ma ni/_/kha dog ser po 'byung
[\[187a.6\]]ba dang /_/zla mtshan cher 'phel mo mtshan dang /_/pho mtshan rkub tu tsha bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_thur du sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlung mkhris pa dang 'dres par gyur na/_dri ma zhes bya ba bshang ba dang gci ba kha dog ser zhing ljang bar 'byung ba dang /_bud med kyi zla mtshan 'phel zhing mo mtshan dang rkub
[\[187a.7\]]tsha ba dang /_skyes pa'i pho mtshan dang /_rkub tsha bar 'gyur ro/_/srog ni bad kan 'dres gyur pa/_/lus lhod skom dad yi ga 'chus/_/mchil mang sgregs pa sbrid mang slon/_/dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub thogs pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_srog ces bya ba'i rlung bad kan dang 'dres par gyur na/_
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]lus lhod pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/stod rgyu lus ni lci ba dang /_/tshig thogs skad 'gags yi ga 'chus/_/stobs dang kha dog nyams par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_stod du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rlung bad kan dang 'dres par gyur na/_lus lci ba nas kha dog nyams pa'i bar du byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[187b.2\]]khyab byed rus tshigs rengs pa dang /_/yan lag thams cad lci ba dang /_/'gros ni shin tu 'khyor ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khyab byed ces bya ba'i rlung bad kan dang 'dres par gyur na/_rus pa dang tshigs rengs pa la sogs pa dang /_'gros shin tu 'khyor zhing 'khrul bar 'gyur ro/_/mnyam gnas
[\[187b.3\]]yan lag grang byed cing /_/rdul mi 'byung zhing drod chung 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mnyam du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rlung bad kan dang 'dres par gyur na/_lus kyi yan lag shin tu grang ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/thur sel bshang dang gci ba ni/_/bad kan bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_thur
[\[187b.4\]]du sel bzhes bya ba'i rlung nad bad kan dang 'dres par gyur na/_bshang ba dang gci ba bad kan dang bcas par phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rlung ni gzhan 'brel pa/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar na rnam pa de dag gi tshul ji ltar brtags pa 'dis rlung gi nad gzhan dang
[\[187b.5\]]'brel zhing 'dres pa las byung ba nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin par shes par bya ste/_de yang mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis dang khrag la sogs pa lus zungs drug dang zas dang gci ba dang bshang ba dang lus zungs kun dang 'dres pa dang /_srog la sogs pa lnga mkhris pa dang 'dres pa lnga dang /_bad
[\[187b.6\]]kan dang 'dres pa lnga ste/_de ltar nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin no/_/de bzhin srog la sogs pa'i rlung /_/phan tshun rim bzhin 'dres gyur pa/_/kun kyang 'khrugs par gyur pa de/_/nyi shur 'gyur ba yin zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga po phan tshun gcig cing
[\[187b.7\]]'dres par gyur pa ni rim bzhin du rnam pa nyi shu yin par shes par bya ste/_de la srog la sogs pa bzhi po dang /_rim bzhin du 'dres par gyur pa las rlung lnga po de dag re re zhing bzhi bzhir 'gyur te/_de ltar na nyi shur 'gyur ro/_/de yang srog ces bya ba'i rlung ni
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]stod du rgyu ba la sogs pa'i rlung dang so sor 'dres par gyur la/_stod du rgyu ba ni srog la sogs pa bzhi dang 'dres par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du thams cad la sbyar ro/_/srog dang stod rgyu lhan cig 'khrugs/_/dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub dka' ba
[\[188a.2\]]dang /_/cham 'debs mgo 'khor na bar byed/_/snying na kha ni skom par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_srog ces bya ba'i rlung stod du rgyu ba'i rlung dang lhan cig 'khrugs par gyur na dbugs dbyung ba dang /_rngub pa dka' zhing 'gags par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du
[\[188a.3\]]cham pas 'debs pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/stod rgyu'i rlung ni srog dang 'dres/_/mdog dang gzi mdangs stobs zad byed/_/ces bya ba la/_stod du rgyu ba'i rlung ni srog ces bya ba'i rlung 'khrugs par byas shing 'dres par gyur na mdog la sogs pa zad par byed do/_/
[\[188a.4\]]phyogs 'dis 'gres pa lhag ma rnams/_/sman pas nye bar sbyar bar bya/_/rlung gi gnas dang 'phel dang 'bri/_/las rnams legs par brtag par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_phyogs tsam bstan pa'i tshul 'dis rlung lnga po thams cad kyi 'gres pa'i tshul bshad pa yin no/_/de'i cha
[\[188a.5\]]sman pas nye bar sbyar bar bya zhing shes par bya ste/_srog la sogs pa rlung lnga po'i gnas/_nad kyi bye brag shes pa las bshad pa'i tshul gyis brtags shing nye bar dpyad pa dang /_de bzhin du de'i las mchil snabs 'dor ba la sogs pa las 'phel ba dang 'bri ba brtag par bya'o/_/
[\[188a.6\]]des na 'di skad ston te/_rlung 'di ni gnas 'di na gnas pa la/_de la gnas nas las 'di dag byed par bshad la/_de ni da ltar tshul 'dis 'phel ba'am 'bri bar snang bas na/_de'i phyir de ni 'dis bsgribs shing 'di dang 'dres pa yin no/_/zhes rjes su dpag par bya'o/_/
[\[188a.7\]]srog la sogs pa lnga po ni/_/'khrugs pas phan tshun 'dres pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_srog la sogs pa rlung lnga po dag ni phan tshun 'khrugs shing sgrib par byed pa dang /_'khrugs par byas pa'i tshul gyis nad skyed pas phan tshun gcig la gcig
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]'dres shing bsgribs la 'khrugs par byed pa yin no/_/mkhris pa la sogs bcu gnyis dang /_/'dres par gyur te 'dren ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_srog ces bya ba la sogs pa rlung lnga po de dag nad bcu gnyis lus zungs drug dang /_khrag dang zas
[\[188b.2\]]dang bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang 'dres pa ste/_rnam pa bcu gnyis yin no/_/'dres pa de ni 'dren ma yin te/_srog ces bya ba'i rlung de la sogs pa de dag gis 'dres par gyur na 'dren ma yin te/_phan tshun 'dre bar byed pa dang /_'dre bar bya ba'i ngo bor gnas
[\[188b.3\]]pa yin no/_/mkhris pa sogs las 'dres/_zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa la sogs pa gnyis la sogs par phrad pa'i 'dres par gyur pa'o/_/de bzhin/_/'dren ma rnam pa du ma yin/_/rab dang rab mchog brtags pa yis/_/'dres pa grangs med 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes
[\[188b.4\]]bya ba la/_de dang mtshungs pas na de bzhin te/_srog ces bya ba'i rlung la sogs pa dang /_mkhris pa la sogs pa de dang 'dres par gyur pa rnam pa mang pos nad kyi 'dren ma ni rnam pa du ma yin te/_grangs med par 'gyur ba dang /_rab dang rab mchog gi dbye ba'i brtags pas grangs med par 'gyur te/_
[\[188b.5\]]srog la sogs pa dang mkhris pa la sogs pa cung zad rab tu lhag pa dang /_rab mchog tu lhag pa ste/_de ltar brtags pa rnam pa du mar phye bas 'dres pa'i tshul ni grangs med par 'gyur te/_rtsis las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang /_/rim gyis bde bar 'gyur ba las/_/
[\[188b.6\]]rtogs dka' yin te yang yang brtag_/ma yengs pas ni shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dres pa'i nad de srog ces bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dpag tu med pa'i dbye bas phye ba ni shin tu rtogs par dka' zhing shes par mi nus pa yin du zin kyang /_rang gi mtshan nyid 'byung ba'i tshul rang rang gi nad kyi
[\[188b.7\]]rtags ji ltar byung ba dang /_rim gyis bde bar 'gyur ba ste/_zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa sna tshogs kyi nye bar sbyor ba dang /_rang nyid kyis goms par gyur pa las rtogs par dka' ba yin du zin kyang yang dang yang du brtag par bya zhing sman pas ma yengs shing de shes pa la
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]brtson par sems gzhan du ma 'phyos par shes shing rtogs par bya'o/_/khyad par srog ni 'tsho ba yin/_/stod du rgyu ba stobs zhes brjod/_/de gnyis gnod par gyur pa las/_/tshe dang stobs ni zad par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_khyad par ram mchog tu rlung thams cad las
[\[189a.2\]]srog ces bya ba'i rlung ni 'tsho ba zhes bya ba yin la/_stod du rgyu ba'i rlung ni stobs zhes bya ba yin par brjod do/_/gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa des ni srog ces bya ba dang /_stod du rgyu ba de gnyis las gnod par gyur cing 'dres par gyur na rang gi las nyams shing de bzhin du tshe dang stobs
[\[189a.3\]]zad par 'gyur ro/_/rlung ni 'dres pa ma shes pa'am/_/shes kyang lo gcig lon pa ni/_/'bad kyang gso dka' yin pa'am/_/gso ba'i thabs ni med pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_srog ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rlung phan tshun 'dres par gyur pa'am/_re re mkhris
[\[189a.4\]]pa la sogs pa dang 'dres pa las 'dren ma du mar gyur pa las de ma shes shing ma rtogs pa'am/_phyin ci ma log par shes su zin kyang 'khrugs nas lo gcig lon cing 'das par gyur pa ni rab tu 'bad pas gsos kyang gso bar dka' ba yin zhing tshegs chen pos bcos par
[\[189a.5\]]mi nus pa yin pa'am/_yang na rnam pa thams cad du gso ba'i thabs med pa yin no/_/de bas na 'dren ma de ni nges pas brtag cing shes par bya dgos so/_/'dres nad yal bar bor na ni/_/khong 'bras mcher pa snying nad dang /_/skran dang me drod nyams
[\[189a.6\]]la sogs/_/bla brnan de las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gi 'dren med dag yal bar bor zhing gso bar ma byas na/_khong 'bras la sogs pa'i bla brnan 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de bas na shin tu 'bad pas de bsrung zhing gso ba dang bcos pa kho nar
[\[189a.7\]]bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa ste gnas gsum pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so//_//_
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]de nas rims nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi 'og tu gso ba'i gnas brtsams pa'i dgos pa ni 'di yin te/_gang gi phyir nad yongs su brtags nas de'i rjes la gso ba bya dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang drang srong tsa ra kas/_dang po nad ni yongs brtags
[\[189b.2\]]la/_/de rjes sman ni brtag bya zhing /_/de nas las bya sman pa yis/_/shes pa sngon 'gros yang dag spyad/_/ces bshad pa yin no/_/rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces bshad do/_/zhes bya ba ni/_gzhung rtsam par byed pa bdag nyid sman dpyad kyi lung gi
[\[189b.3\]]rjes su 'jug pa yin par ston pa yin no/_/gang phyir ma zhu gnas ma zhu/_/rgyun srang bkag ste me drod nyams/_/rims kyis nyes pa skyed byed pas/_/sngon tshul byung dang rims sogs la'ang /_/de phyir smyung ba bya dgos la/_/stobs ni 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi
[\[189b.4\]]phyir ma zhu ba'i gnas la gnas pa'i nad rlung la sogs pa gang yin pa de ma zhu ba dang bcas par gnas pa na ma zhu ba ste/_des rgyun srang gi bu ga bkag cing rgyur mi rung bar byas nas khong pa'i me drod nyams shing 'bri bar byed nas rims skyed cing 'byung bar byed pas na/_de'i phyir rims la
[\[189b.5\]]ni dang po smyung ba bya dgos so/_/rims phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi tshul gsal bar 'byung zhing snang bar gyur pa'am/_rims la sogs pa gsal ba nyid du snang na yang smyung ba bya zhing /_nad pa'i nyams stobs 'bad pas bsrung zhing bskyang bar bya'o/_/stobs ni nad med pa
[\[189b.6\]]yi gnas/_/bya ba'i rims ni nad med don/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad med pa ni bde bar gnas pa ste/_de ni lus kyi nyams stobs la gnas shing brten pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/gang 'di nad bsal bar bya ba'i phyir gso ba'i dpyad du byed pa'i mtshan nyid can de yang nad
[\[189b.7\]]med pa'i don yin pa de'i phyir byed pa yin no/_/smyung byas nad ni nyams smad cing /_/me drod skyed dang khong yang 'gyur/_/bde zhing bkres skom yi ga 'byed/_/zas 'ju stobs dang mdangs skyed 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dang por smyung ba byas pas nad nyams smad par byas
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]pa dang /_de bzhin du pho ba'i me drod skyed cing 'byung ba dang nad nyams smad pas yang zhing rims bri bar gyur na bde zhing tha mal pa nyid du gnas pa dang /_bkres shing zas 'dod pa dang /_skom ste btung ba 'dod pa dang yi ga bye ste zas 'dod pa skye ba dang /_
[\[190a.2\]]zas 'ju zhing smin par 'gyur ba dang /_stobs de nus pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_mdangs zhes bya ba lus zungs thams cad brtas par byed pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la phal cher bad kan nad/_/glongs dang g.yos par gyur pa dang /_/dang gar 'khyil bcas mchil ma mang /_
[\[190a.3\]]zas la mi dga' lud pa gsud/_/zos ma thag tu rims 'debs pa/_/khyad par du ni ma zhur 'byung /_/skyug sman btang 'os skyug sman bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims de la dri ma ste phal cher bad kan la sogs pa nad gzhan la ltos na shas che zhing stobs drag pa dang /_
[\[190a.4\]]glongs shing bskyod pa dang /_g.yos pa ste phal cher phyir 'byung du nye bar gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du nad gang dang gar 'khyil zhing mer mer por gyur pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bad kan de la skyug sman btang ba bsngags pa yin la/_de yang gang zhig la gtang zhe na/_skyug sman
[\[190a.5\]]btang bar 'os pa ste/_sngar skyug sman btang ba'i cho ga'i skabs su bshad pa'i skyug sman btang bar 'os pa la gtang bar bya'o/_/de las gzhan du byas na ni/_/dbugs mi bde dang tshad 'khru slon/_/snying nad mi bzad rims kyis 'debs/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyug sman btang ba
[\[190a.6\]]dang /_de las gzhan pa ste nad ma glongs pa la sogs pa'i tshul btang bar gyur na dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/po son pi pi ling bcas pa/_/dug mo yungs sam shing mngar ni/_/chu dron sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am/_/yang na rgya mtshar ldan pa
[\[190a.7\]]blud/_/kar ka ta 'am pa to la/_/nim pa spa yi lo ma'i chu'am/_/'bras yos kyi ni skyo ma'am/_/bu ram shing khu'ang chang sbyar btung /_/zhes bya ba la/_de la po son cha ni ma dan pha la ste/_de pi pi ling la sogs pa dang bcas shing sbyar ba dang /_yang na dug mo nyung te/_in+d+ra
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]ya ba dang bcas pa dang /_yang na shing mngar zhes pa ma du yaSh+Ti dang bcas pa dang /_chu dron zhes pa chu dro 'jam tsam dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba blud pa'am/_yang na rgyam tsha dang bcas pa'i chu dron po dag blud par bya'o/_/yang na kar ka ta la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i lo ma bskol
[\[190b.2\]]ba'i chu dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o/_/yang na 'bras yos las byas pa'i skyo ma'am/_bu ram shing gi khu ba'am/_chang sna tshogs pa ji ltar 'os pa dang po son cha blud par bya'o/_/nyams stobs dus kyi dbye shes pas/_/cho ga'i gnas las bshad pa yi/_/skyug
[\[190b.3\]]sman dag ni rab tu gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_nyams stobs dang dus kyi dbye ba shes pa'i sman pa gang yin pa des cho ga'i gnas las bshad pa ste skyug sman dag gtang zhing sbyin par bya'o/_/skyug sman gyi ni sbyor ba dag_/byas par gyur tam ma byas kyang /_/rims nad can la rnam
[\[190b.4\]]sbyang bya/_/nad ni bskyod par gyur pa dag_/smin dang zhi bar bya phyir bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshad ma thag pa'i cho gas skyug sman gyi sbyor ba byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung rims nad can gyi skyes bu la smyung ba la sogs pa'i rnam par sbyang ba'i cho ga bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_rims skyed par byed pa'i
[\[190b.5\]]nad glongs shing bskyod par bya ba dag smin cing ma zhu ba med par bya ba'i phyir dang zhi zhing bsal bar bya ba'i phyir rnam par sbyang ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/thal bas g.yogs pa'i me bzhin du/_/ma zhus khebs zas 'ju mi 'gyur/_/de bas nyes pa smin bya'i phyir/_/rims dang ldan la
[\[190b.6\]]smyung ba bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_pho ba'i me drod rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi skyon gzhan gyis g.yogs shing khebs par gyur na zas 'ju bar byed mi nus pa ste/_dper na phyi rol gyi me thal bas g.yogs par gyur na dngos po 'tshed cing smin par byed mi nus so/_/de bzhin du nang gi me yang ma
[\[190b.7\]]zhu bas khebs shing g.yogs na zas 'ju bar mi nus so/_/de bas na rims dang ldan pa'i mi la ni dang po kho nar smyung ba bya ba gces te/_de yang nad kyi nyes pa smin par gyur gyi bar du bya zhing nad ma zhu ba med par gyur gyi bar du de la smyung ba bya'o/_/rlung dang bad kan rims skom dang /_/
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]chu tshan nyung shas nyung shas btung /_/des ni bad kan zhu gyur nas/_/skom dang myur du sel bar byed/_/me drod skyed cing bu ga'i rgyun/_/'jam par byas nas sbyong bar byed/_/zhen pa'i rlung mkhris rngul dang ni/_/bshang gci bde bar 'byin par byed/_/gnyid rmongs
[\[191a.2\]]yi ga 'chus pa sel/_/srog ni 'dzin par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang bad kan gyi rims la nad pa skom dad skyes par gyur na chu bskol btung bar bya ste/_de yang chu tshan nyung shas cung zhig btung bar bya'o/_/des ci zhig byed ce na/_chu tshan des rtsa sbubs kyi rgyun
[\[191a.3\]]srang 'gag par byed pa'i bad kan 'thas pa'i tshul du gnas pa des zhu zhing sla ba'i tshul du byas nas skom dad gang yin pa de myur du sel zhing ldog par byed do/_/de bzhin du pho ba'i me drod kyang bskyed cing sbar nas nang gi bu ga'i rgyun gang dag yin pa de 'jam zhing mnyen par
[\[191a.4\]]byas nas bu ga de dag nyid sbyong zhing dag par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du zhen cing bu ga'i sgo rnams su chags pa'i rlung la sogs pa bde bar 'byin par byed cing lugs dang mthun par 'byung bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin du gnyid dang rmongs bag la sogs pa sel bar byed pa dang /_
[\[191a.5\]]srog 'dzin cing gnas pa yin la de tshim par byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir ro/_/chu grang de las bzlog pa ste/_/nad kyi tshogs ni 'phel byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_chu grang ni chu tshan gyi yon tan de las go bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid can yin zhing /_nad kyi tshogs gang dag
[\[191a.6\]]yod pa de 'phel zhing rgyas par byed pa yin no/_/chu tshan yon tan de 'dra yang /_/gcig tu mkhris pas ldan rims dang /_/mkhris shas che dang phyogs gcig tsha/_/kun tsha rmongs bag tshad par 'khru/_/chang dub las byung so ga dang /_/gcong skem khrag mkhris can mi blud/_/ces
[\[191a.7\]]bya ba la/_chu tshan bshad ma thag pa'i yon tan bad kan zhu bar gyur pa dang /_me drod skyed pa la sogs pa'i yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa yin du zin kyang gcig tu mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims dang ldan pa'i mi dang nad gzhan dag mkhris pa shas che zhing rgyas pa dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]phyogs gcig tsha ba la sogs pa'i nad de/_de la phyogs gcig tsha ba ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po tsha ba dang /_kun tshab ste lus thams cad tsha ba dang /_de bzhin du chang dang dug gnyis las byung ba'i rims la chu tshan de blud par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du so ga'i dus su'ang rang bzhin
[\[191b.2\]]gyi chu tshan btung du mi rung ngo /_/de bzhin du gcong chen pos thebs te skems par gyur pa'i skyes bu dang /_khrag mkhris las gyur pa'i nad yod pa ste/_de dag la skom dad yod du zin kyang chu tshan blud du mi rung ngo /_/de dag la ci zhig sbyin zhe na/_de'i phyir smras pa ni/_de la gla sgang
[\[191b.3\]]tsan+dan dang /_/bca' sga par pa ta dang ni/_/pu shel tse dang ba le ka/_/bskol chu bsgrangs blud rims skom sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcig tu mkhris pa'i nad yod pa la sogs pa de dag la ni gla sgang la sogs pa dang /_bskol ba'i chu bsgrangs pa phan te/_de ni rims dang skom
[\[191b.4\]]dad sel ba yin no/_/'dir chu dang sman dag gi tshad ni gzhung gzhan dag las bstan te/_gang zhig chur bskol bsgrangs gyur pa/_/gla sgang la sogs pa to la/_/yan lag drug pa la sogs sbyar/_/de las zho re bcu gnas ni/_/chu ni bre gang nang du bskol/_/de nas bzhi cha
[\[191b.5\]]lus byas te/_/skom dad la sogs zhi phyir btung /_zhes bshad pa dang /_de bzhin du gzhan dag las kyang /_sman mang bskol ba ska ba yin/_/sman nyung chu bskol dwangs ma yin/_/zhes smos pa yin no/_/mkhris pa med par tsha mi 'byung /_/tsha ba med par rims yod min/_/
[\[191b.6\]]de bas mkhris pa la gnod spang /_/mkhris shas che bas lhag par spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rims nad thams cad la ni mkhris pa med cing de ma gtogs par tsha ba mi 'byung ste/_tsha ba ni mkhris pa'i rang bzhin las byung ba yin pa'i phyir rims la tsha ba gang dag yod pa de
[\[191b.7\]]ni mkhris pa las skyes pa yin no/_/tsha ba de med par yang rims yod pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir rims kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni dang po tsha ba 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na mkhris pa la gnod pa'i kha zas dang spyod lam dang sman mkhris pa skyed par byed pa'i rims
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]thams cad la yang phal cher spang bar bya ba nyid yin no/_/de las kyang mkhris pa shas che zhing mkhris pa rgyas pa las gyur pa'i rims la ni mkhris pa skyed par byed pa de lhag par yang spang bar bya'o/_/de nas lhag par zhes smos pa'i sgra 'dis ni rlung dang mkhris pa
[\[192a.2\]]las gyur pa'i rims la mkhris pa skyed par byed pa'i sman la sogs pa cung zad cig spang bar mi bya ba yang yod do/_/zhes ston pa yin no/_/khrus dang bsku dang byug pa dang /_/smyung ba lhag ma spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims thams cad la khrus bya ba la sogs pa spang
[\[192a.3\]]bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du smyung ba lhag ma rnams kyang spang bar bya ste/_gnas skabs kyi khyad par gyi dbang du bshad pa'i smyung ba ma gtogs par smyung ba gzhan dag spang bar bya'o/_/de yang gnas skabs su dgos pa ni/_smyung ba ni rims la skyug sman gtang ba dang /_zas bri zhing gcad
[\[192a.4\]]pa'i smyung ba yin te/_de ma gtogs bkru sman gtang pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag rims sar pa la spang bar bya'o/_/ma zhu gzer 'joms sman lta bu/_/ma zhu rims ni mi bzad la/_/sman btung mi bya de yis ni/_/lhag par ma zhu 'phel bar 'gyur/_/lto ba ma zhus
[\[192a.5\]]khyab pa la/_/'o ma sbrul la blud dang mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_ma zhu ba dang bcas pa'i rims mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba'i nad dang ldan pa la sman bskol ba dang /_bsgrangs pa dang /_skyo ma la sogs pa btung bar mi bya ste/_dper na ma zhu zhing zas kyi lhag ma lus pa/_
[\[192a.6\]]mi bzad par na ba la gsud pa la sogs pa'i nad la gzer 'joms pa'i sman rtsi bo che gsum pa la sogs pa blud par mi bya ste/_sman 'ju mi nus pas slar la gnod par 'gyur ba'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang mdo gnas las/_/ma zhu mi bzad pas nyen kyang /_/gzer
[\[192a.7\]]'joms sman ni btung mi bya/_/be'u snabs ma zhu me drod nyams/_/nad kyi sman ni btung mi nus/_/'di yis nad pa 'phral du ni/_/thu zhing 'chi ba dag tu 'gyur/_/zhes smos pa de dran pa'i phyir 'di skad smos pa yin no/_/de bas na gla sgang dang par pa ta la sogs pa'i sman
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]bskol ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas pa 'thungs pa des na lhag par yang ma zhu ba mang du 'phel zhing skyed par byed pa yin no/_/gang gis skyed ce na/_mi gang lto bar ma zhu bas khyab cing zil gyis mnan par gyur pa'i rims nad can de la blud na 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du
[\[192b.2\]]ma zhu bas khyab pa'i lto bar sman blud pa de ni ma zhu ba de nyid slar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang bad kan bdag nyid der/_/lkog nad cham pa dbugs mi bde/_/byin pa tshigs rus gzer gyur la/_/rngul 'byung ba ni rab bsngags te/_/rngul dang bshang gci phyen bder 'byung /_/
[\[192b.3\]]me drod skyed cing zas 'ju byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung dang bad kan gyi bdag nyid can gyi rims byung bar gyur pa la/_lkog ma'i nad la sogs pa ji skad smos pa'i nad byung bar gyur na/_rngul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gso bar bya ba rab tu bsngags pa yin te/_rngul 'byung ba'i cho ga de byas
[\[192b.4\]]na khong du zhen pa'i rngul la sogs pa bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du me drod skyed cing pho bas zas bde blag tu 'ju bar byed pa'i nus pa skyed par byed do/_/snum 'thungs cho gar bshad pa ni/_/rnam pa kun tu spyad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_snum 'thungs pa'i cho ga snum
[\[192b.5\]]'thungs pa'i le'u'i skabs su bshad pa dag_/chu dron dag gis nyer spyod bya/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa de thams cad bsten cing spyad par bya'o/_/smyung dang dugs bya dus dang ni/_/nas thug tig ta'i khu ba rnams/_/dri ma rnams ni smin byed pa/_/rim mam gnas skabs ji bzhin sbyin/_/zhes
[\[192b.6\]]bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i dri ma ma smin pa rnams ni smyung ba la sogs pa bsten pas smin par 'gyur te/_de yang ji skad du bshad pa'i rim gyis sam gnas skabs gang la bab pa de las mi 'gyur tshul gyis sbyin par bya ste/_de yang rim pa'i tshul ni dang por smyung ba bya zhing zas
[\[192b.7\]]bcad par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dugs bya/_de nas dugs de zhag drug gi bar du bya ba dang /_de nas nas thug sbyin no/_/de'i 'og tu tig ta'i khu ba blud par bya ste/_smin pa gsar du byung ba la bya'o/_/rlung nad nyi tshe zad byed dang /_/glo bur ba dang rims rnying la/_/smyung ba mi bya de la
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]ni/_/nyams mi smod pa'i zhi bya phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung nad nyi tshe las gyur pa'i rims na ba dang /_de bzhin du zad byed las gyur pa'i rims dang /_rims nad glo bur bas thebs pa dang /_rims rnying pa dag la ni smyung ba'i cho ga mi bya ste/_rlung nad nyi
[\[193a.2\]]tshe la sogs pa'i rims na ba de de dag la zhi bar bya ba'i sbyor ba phan la/_zhi ba de yang nyams smod cing skems par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhi bar bya ba'i thabs bsten na phan zhing bsngags pa yin no/_/de la ma zhu'i rims tshul ldan/_/nyams smad mi byar shes par bya/_/zhes
[\[193a.3\]]bya ba la/_rims de la ma zhu ba'i rims kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing /_de'i rang bzhin sngar smos pa rims kyi bla brnan mi bzad pa la sogs pa ldan pa la yang /_nyams smad par mi bya bar shes par bya'o/_/gso ba'i thabs gnyis shes pa las/_/brtags te smyung bar bya
[\[193a.4\]]ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gso ba'i thabs gnyis ston par bshad pa'i smyung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis yang dag par rtogs par bya ste/_de yang /_dbang po dang zhing dri ma dag_/bde bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smyung ba legs par byas pa rtogs par byas la/_shin tu
[\[193a.5\]]skems pa la sogs pa ni smyung drags pas shes par bya'o/_/smyung byas mtshan mar ldan pa ni/_/de la thug sla la sogs blud/_/rang gi sman dang ji bzhin bskol/_/dang por thug sla la sogs sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims nad can smyung ba byas zin pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan
[\[193a.6\]]pa de la ni thug pa sla ba ste 'bras thug rkyang rkyang po dang por blud par bya'i/_ska bar ni ma yin te/_de yang dang por ni thug pa sla ba 'bras thug rkyang rkyang po blud par bya'o/_/de nas thug pa yid tsam ska ba dang thug pa gar mo blud par bya'o/_/de yang drang srong tsa ra kas/_/bud shing gis ni me
[\[193a.7\]]bzhin du/_/de yi me drod des skyed de/_/de yang sman gyi sbyor ba las/_/yang dang me drod 'bar bar byed/_/gsher zhing dro bas rngul bar byed/_/sla bas skom dad rab zhi byed/_/kha zas yin phyir srog brten la/_/khu ba yin pas yang ba nyid/_/rims dang 'phrod pas rims
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]'joms byed/_/de bas dang por thug pa sogs/_/rims la blo dang ldan pas sbyin/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/dus ji srid kyi bar du bya zhe na/_zhag drug bar du'am gang tshe rims/_/rtse zhil gyur pa'i bar du sbyin/_/de yis shing gi me bzhin du/_/de yi me drod 'phel bar
[\[193b.2\]]byed/_/ces bya ba yin te/_rims kyis dang por btab pa nas brtsams te zhag drug gi bar du sbyin par bya ba 'am/_yang na gang gi tshe rims rtse zhil zhing tsha ba'i gdung ba la sogs pa cung zad zhi bar gyur pa dang /_shugs dal bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du rims nad na ba'i nad pa
[\[193b.3\]]de la thug pa de dag blud cing sbyin par bya'o/_/des na zhag drug gi gong yan chad du smyung ba byas zin pa'i mtshan nyid med par gyur cing gang la thug pa blud pa des rims rtse zhil bar gyur ba de srid kyi bar du de sbyin par bya'o/_/dang por 'bras yos thug 'ju sla/_/bca' sga pi pi ling
[\[193b.4\]]dang bcas/_/'u su rgyam tshar bcas pa sbyin/_/skyur 'dod se'u 'bru bcas pa btung /_/zhes bya ba la/_de yang dang por te thog mar 'bras yos kyi thug pa blud par bya'o/_/de nas legs par 'ju sla ba'i 'bras thug bca' sga la sogs pas btab pa rgyam tsha dang bcas pa blud
[\[193b.5\]]par byas la/_de bzhin du ro skyur ba 'dod pa'i skyes bu la ni se'u 'bru dang bcas shing btab pa'i thug pa blud par bya'o/_/'khru ba'am mkhris pa mang ba la/_/sbrang rtsi bca' sga btab bsgrangs blud/_/ces bya ba la/_'khru bas btab pa'am mkhris pa mang ba dag la ni thug
[\[193b.6\]]pa de sbrang rtsi dang bca' sga btab ste bsgrangs pa blud par bya la/_de yang thug pa sla ba nas brtsams te btung bar bya'o/_/chu so rtsib logs klad pa gzer/_/gze ma bya kri bskol ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_nad pa gang chu so la sogs par gzer ba'i nad yod par ni gze ma dang
[\[193b.7\]]bya kri ste/_kaN+Da ka ri dang bskol ba'i thug pa blud par bya'o/_/rims 'khrur kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang /_/ba la bil ba bca' sga dang /_/ut+pal 'u su bskol rims 'khrur/_/thug skyur smin dang drod skyed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims dang tshad par 'khru ba'i nad gnyis yod pa la ni
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]kr-iSh+Na par+Ni la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i thug pa se'u 'bru'i khu bas skyur por byas pa sbyin par bya ste/_des ni ma zhu ba rnams smin pa dang pho ba'i me drod skyed par byed pa yin no/_/skyigs bu lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/gzer can rtsa ba chung ngu lnga/_/zhes bya ba
[\[194a.2\]]la/_skyigs bu la sogs pa skyigs bu nas gzer gyi bar dang ldan pa'i nad pa la ni rtsa ba chung ngu lnga dang bskol ba'i thug pa sbyin par bya ste/_bri ha ti dang kaN+DakA ri dang a shu mi ti gnyis dang gze ma ste lnga dang bskol ba'i thug pa sbyin par bya'o/_/bad kan gyis nyen nas thug ni/_/rtsa ba
[\[194a.3\]]chen po lnga pa sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi nad kyis nyen pa'i nad pa la ni bil ba'i rtsa ba la sogs pa rtsa ba chen po lnga dang /_nas thug btsos pa'i thug pa blud par bya'o/_/rtug pa 'gags la nad bcas pa/_/pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra/_/btab pa'i nas thug mar dang brngos/_/
[\[194a.4\]]dri ma nad ni bde 'byung byed/_/ces bya ba la/_nad pa gang zhig rtug 'gags kyi nad kyis btab pa la ni nas thug blud de/_de yang pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra btab pa la nas de mar dang brngos pa las byas pa'i thug pa sbyin par bya ste/_des ni dri ma dang nad gang dag yod pa de bde bar 'byung
[\[194a.5\]]bar byed do/_/lto bar rtug 'gags nad bcas la/_/dbyi mo pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/rgun 'brum dong gra skyu ru ra/_/zhes bya ba la/_lto bar rtug pa 'gags par gyur cing de yang na zhing thug pa dang bcas pa la ni dbyi mo la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i thug pa blud par bya'o/_/khong pa
[\[194a.6\]]bcad pa snyam byed la/_/rgya shug da trig sa la par/_/kr-iSh+Na par+Ni bil ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_khong pa'i nang gris bcad pa snyam du sems pa'i nad la rgya shug la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i thug pa blud par bya'o/_/da trig ni br-ik+Sha aM pa la'o/_/rngul med gnyid med skom pas
[\[194a.7\]]nyen/_/kha ra dong gra skyu ru ra'o/_/rgya shug kha ra rgun 'brum dang /_/thal tres gla sgang tsan+dan ni/_/skom dang slon dang bcas pa blud/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa rims 'joms yin/_/de dag thug pa'i sman yin te/_/sha khu yu sha sogs pa'ang sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]rngul med pa dang gnyid med cing yang ba dang skom pas nyen cing gdungs pa la kha ra dkar po la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i thug pa blud par bya'o/_/thug pa dang sbyar ba bsten pa'i sman 'di dag ni sha khu la sogs pa dang yang sbyar te blud par bya'o/_/de yang bsdus pa las/_thug pa dang
[\[194b.2\]]sbyar sman gnyis kyis/_/sha khu yu sha la sogs pa'ang sbyar/_/zhes smos pa yin te/_sha btsos pa'i khu ba dang /_yu sha zhes bya ba mon sran sde'u mung+ga la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba las byas pa'i btung ba yin no/_/sogs pa smos pas ni btung ba gzhan dang zhog chu dang
[\[194b.3\]]dar ba dang /_rgun 'brum la sogs pa bskol ba'i btung ba na ka dang /_tshod ma la sogs pa dang yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de yang /_thug pa sha khu yu sha sogs/_/ro bzang btung ba la sogs las/_/sman gyi tshad ni sbyar bar bya/_/'jig rten grags dang ci rigs sbyar/_/
[\[194b.4\]]yang na ji srid sman gyis ni/_/de dang 'tsham pa nyid bya zhing /_/nad dang lto tshod na tshod stobs/_/rnam par brtags nas sbyar bya yi/_/tshad kyi nges pa yod ma yin/_/zhes bshad mod kyi/_'on kyang sman pa mkhas pa rgan po rnams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de byed pa gang dag
[\[194b.5\]]mthong ba de 'dir bstan par bya ste/_'bras yos kyi tshad ni srang gcig la bya'o/_/la lar ni 'bras srang gcig tsam las byed pa snang ngo /_/bskol ba'i sman ni srang phyed las bya'o/_/sbyar ba'i sman ni spyir zho gnyis so/_/chu ni srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bskol la lhag ma srang sum cu
[\[194b.6\]]lus pa dang /_de'i 'og tu 'bras yos la sogs pa dang thug par bskol bar bya'o/_/chang las byung dang chang rgyun bsten/_/bad kan mkhris pa'i gnas zhugs nas/_/de gnyis shas che 'am so ga 'am/_/skom dang slon dang tshad pas nyen/_/khrag ni stod du 'byung ba ste/_/de la
[\[194b.7\]]thug pa mi blud kyi/_/'bras phye'i skyo ma rims 'joms pa'i/_/'bras bu'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang /_/kha ra dkar bcas blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_chang 'thungs pa las rims su gyur pa la sogs pa la ni thug pa blud pa slob dpon gyis ma bsngags te/_'dod par bya ba ma
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]yin no/_/de yang chang las byung ba ni chang 'thungs drags pa las rims nad kyis btab pa'o/_/yang yang de bzhin du chang rgyun du bsten pa'i mi dang /_bad kan dang mkhris pa'i nad lta bar zhugs pa dang de gnyis te 'das ma thag pa'i bad kan dang mkhris pa
[\[195a.2\]]shas che ba dang /_so ga'i dus dang skom dad la sogs pas nyen pa dang /_khrag dang mkhris pa stod du 'byung zhing gyen du lud pa de de lta bu'i rims nad can de la thug pa blud pa'i skabs yin yang /_nas thug la sogs pa'i thug pa mi sbyin gyi/_de la ni skyo ma 'bras yos kyi phye
[\[195a.3\]]las byas pa blud par bya ste/_de yang rims 'joms par byed pa'i 'bras bu'i khu ba rgun 'bru skyu ru ra la sogs pa'i khu ba bskol te bsgrangs pa'am/_de ma rnyed na skam por chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang kha ra dkar po dang bcas shing sbyar ba de la blud par bya'o/_/
[\[195a.4\]]de nas skyo ma zhu nas ni/_/bkres na nas thug 'bras brngos pa'i/_/'bras chan dag ni bza' bya zhing /_/sha khu sla ba'i khu ba'am/_/mung+ga 'ur ba'i khu bcas bza'/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de ltar skyo ma 'thungs pa de zhu ba'i rjes la nyin zhag de nyid la bkres shing zas
[\[195a.5\]]'dod par gyur pa'i zas kyi dus gnyis par 'bras brngos pa las g.yos pa'i 'bras chan bza' bar bya ba'am nas thug btung bar bya'o/_/de yang gang dang lhan cig bza' zhe na/_sha nyung ngu dag gi sha khu shin tu sla zhing yang la bcud chung ba'am/_yang na sran mung+ga ste/_
[\[195a.6\]]mon sran sde'u dang bya 'ur pa zhes bya ba'i sha khu ba dang bcas pa bza' bar bya'o/_/de yang /_sha chung sogs kyi khu ba sla/_/sha nyung sla ba yin par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_la la dag gis/_sha khu tshad chen ma yin sla/_/sha khu sla ba yin par bshad/_/ces bshad
[\[195a.7\]]pa yin no/_/de ltar zhag drug 'di bzlas te/_/nyams stobs nad ni bsrung bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_thug pa la sogs pa'i rim pa'i tshul 'di lta bus rims kyis btab pa'i gnas skabs dang po 'di 'das shing bzla bar bya ste/_nad pas lus kyi nyams stobs
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]dang /_nad kyi 'phel 'bri'i tshul las bsrung bar bya ste/_nad ni 'dir rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang yang rung ba re re 'am gnyis 'dres pa 'am 'dus pa dag la bya'o/_/de nas smyung ba la sogs pas/_/smin pa'i nad ni lhag ma rnams/_/smin pa'am yang na zhi bya'i phyir/_/sman
[\[195b.2\]]khu'i sbyor ba'i bya ba bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas thug pa la sogs pa rim par spyad pa'i rjes la smyung ba la sogs pa ste smyung ba dang dugs bya ba dang dugs dang nas thug dang sman bskol ba'i khu ba kha bas rims rtsom pa'i nad smin par gyur pa dang /_nad lhag ma rnams smin pa
[\[195b.3\]]'am zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sman khu'i sbyor ba'i rnam pa lnga por rang gi khu ba'am/_lde gu 'am/_bskol te bsgrangs pa dang /_skyo mar bya ba'i rnam par phye ba dag bya ba ni nad phal po che la bsngags pa yin no/_/mkhris la mchog tu kha ba ste/_/bad kan la ni tsha ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_
[\[195b.4\]]sman bskol ba'i khu ba de yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims la ni khyad par ram mchog tu ro kha ba'i sman gyi khu ba blud par bya ste/_mchog tu zhes smos pas ni sman kha ba de ni bad kan la yang blud par bya'o/_/zhes ston pa yin no/_/tsha ba'i sman bskol ba ni bad kan gyi rims
[\[195b.5\]]kho na la sbyin par bya'i mkhris pa la ni ma yin no/_/bad kan mkhris pa sel byed kyang /_/bska ba bsngags pa ma yin te/_/rims sar dri ma 'gags byed pas/_/bska bas mi bzad rims skyed cing /_/dang ga 'khyil dang yi ga 'chus/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde yang skyed/_/
[\[195b.6\]]ces bya ba la/_/ro bska ba ni bad kan dang mkhris pa sel ba yin du zin kyang rims sar pa la ni btang ba bsngags pa ma yin te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_dri ma 'gags par byed pa'i rgyus ro bska ba blud pas ni mi bzad pa'i rims skyed par byed pa dang de bzhin du snying nad dang ga 'khyil pa
[\[195b.7\]]la sogs pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de yang rims sar pa la ni ro bska bas nad 'thas shing sra bar byed nas/_phyi rol du yang 'byin par mi byed la/_nang du yang smin cing 'ju bar byed de/_slar zhing yan man gyi rgyun srang ngam/_lam log par byas nas rims 'phel bar byed do/_/
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]de yang drang srong tsa ra kas/_/bska ba'i ros ni nad bkag ste/_/rims sar 'thas par byed 'gyur zhing /_/sra bar byed kyi smin mi byed/_/mi bzad rims ni skyed par byed/_/ces bshad pa dang /_sbyor ba'i dbang du byas nas ni/_/bska bas bkag pa ma yin
[\[196a.2\]]gyi/_/gang zhig bska bas bska 'gyur ba/_/de ni rims sar dag la spang /_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/la la zhag bdun nas sman gtong /_/gzhan dag zhag ni bcu lon nas/_/kha cig zas yang zos nas gtong /_/ma zhu shas che la mi gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_slob dpon la
[\[196a.3\]]las ni zhag bdun pa'i rjes la/_zhag brgyad pa'i zhag gi tshe sman gla sgang dang par pa ta ldum bu skra bzangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa rims 'joms pa'i sman gtang bar bya'o/_/zhes zer ro/_/slob dpon gzhan dag ni zhag bcu lon pa'i rjes la sman gtang bar bya'o/_/zhes zer
[\[196a.4\]]ro/_/yang srog 'tsho ba'i slob dpon/_cig na re gang gis kha zas yang bar zos par gyur pa dang /_de'i 'og tu sman sbyin te/_zhag drug lon nas sman gtang bar bya'o/_/zhes zer ba nas/_de yan chad bkag pa nyid yin no/_/tshad 'di dag thams cad ni nad kyi gnas skabs kyi
[\[196a.5\]]dbang gi sbyor ba dang 'tsham pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ma zhu ba shas che zhing rgyas par gyur pa la ni sman de zhag bcu 'das zin kyang sbyin par bya ste/_'di ni sngar smos pa'i phyogs gsum char la bkag pa yin no/_/ma zhu ba shas che ba la sman mi btang ba'i dgos pa gang yin pa 'dir
[\[196a.6\]]smras pa ni/_gang phyir mi bzad rims nyen la/_/nad kyi shugs ni 'byung 'gyur ba/_/ma smin pa la sman gyis ni/_/rims ni slar 'phel byed pa 'am/_/nad ni shin tu sogs pa yis/_/snyom dang rmongs bag skyed par byed/_/ces bya ba yin te/_rgyu gang gi phyir mi bzad pa'i rims
[\[196a.7\]]kyis nyen pa'i skyes bu la ni nad kyi shugs 'byung bar 'gyur bas na sman blud par gyur na ma smin cing ma zhu ba nyid kyis rims de slar 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang 'bar bar byed do/_/yang na rims sar pa shin tu sogs shing 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i nad la sman btang na snyom pa dang rmongs
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]bag gi nad skye bar byed cing slar rims de 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/'o na gang gi tshe sbyin par bya zhe na/_de'i phyir smras pa ni/_gang tshe rims rtse zhil lus yang /_/dri ma la sogs g.yos gyur pa/_/rims btab yun ring ma lon yang /_/de tshe sman ni sbyin par bya/_/zhes bya ba
[\[196b.2\]]yin te/_dus gang gi tshe rims rtse zhil zhing shugs dal ba dang /de bzhin du lus yang zhing ma smin pa'i nad kyis gnon pa dang /_dri ma bad kan dang mkhris pa bshang ba la sogs pa g.yos par gyur zhing gnas las 'phags te 'gags par ma gyur pa de'i tshe rims
[\[196b.3\]]kyis btab pa de yun ring po ma lon zhing zhag drug ma 'das su zin kyang sman sbyin par bya ba nyid yin no/_/gla sgang par pa tar bcas pa'am/_/bca' sga 'am yang na byi tsher ba/_/bskol ba bsgrangs pa'i khu ba blud/_/pa tha pu shel pa la ka_/blud pa'am de bzhin du ni ma
[\[196b.4\]]pa/_/sle tres gla sgang dong gra rnams/_/'di ni ci rigs par blud bya/_/nad smin byed pa'i sman khu ba/_/rims dang skom dad yi ga 'chus/_/khas ro mi tshor ma zhu 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad la sogs pa'i dbye bas par pa ta zhes bya ba skra bzangs lan 'ga' ni gla
[\[196b.5\]]sgang dang sbyar bar bya'o/_/lan 'ga' ni bca' sga dang sbyar te btang ngo /_/yang na byi tsher ba zhes bya ba dur la ba dang sbyar te bskol ba'i khu ba'am/_yang na bskol te bsgrangs pa blud par bya'o/_/yang na par pa ta dang pu shel tse dang ba la ka dang bcas pa gsum po de dag bskol
[\[196b.6\]]ba'i khu ba dro ba'am/_grang ba blud par bya'o/_/yang de bzhin du nim pa zhes bya ba rtsa mkhris dang sle tres la sogs pa sman bzhi po bskol ba dro ba'am/_grang ba blud par bya'o/_/'dir sman bskol ba'i tshad ni/_sman srang gcig chu srang bcu drug dang bskol te/_sman gyi khu ba
[\[196b.7\]]srang bzhi lus pa btung bar bya la/_bsgrangs pa ni sman srang gcig la chu srang drug lus par bya'o/_/gla sgang dang par pa ta la sogs pa'i sman gyi khu ba 'di nad la sogs pa'i tshul las brtags te/_sman gang rims gang dang gang la btang bar 'os pa ste/_de la ci rigs
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]par blud cing sbyin par bya ste/_sman gyi khu ba 'di ni nad smin par byed pa dang /_rims la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/dug mo nyung dang pa to la'i/_/lo ma dang ni bu tse shel/_/pa to la gla sgang thal tres dang /_/pa ta dang ni bu tse shel/_/pa to la ni ma
[\[197a.2\]]'bras bu gsum/_/rgun 'bru gla sgang dug mo yungs/_/ki ra tig ta sle tres dang /_/bca' sga dang ni tsan+dan dkar/_/sle tres gla sgang skyu ru sbrang /_/tshigs bcad phyed kyis rdzogs byas pa/_/lnga po 'di dag rtag rims sogs/_/lnga po zhi bar byed par 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_
[\[197a.3\]]dug mo yungs la sogs pa'i sman tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis rdzogs par byas pas rtag pa'i rims lnga po'i rgyun dang /_rtag pa nyin gcig pa/_nyin gsum pa dang bzhi pa zhes bya ba brtan pa rtag pa'i rims nas/_nyin bzhi pa'i rims kyi bar bzhi po de dag la ci rigs par
[\[197a.4\]]sbyar na rlung gi rims la phan pa yin no/_/rlung gi rims la byi tsher ba/_/bca' sga sle tres gla sgang phan/_/yang na pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/sle tres dang ni bca' sga 'am/_/rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rlung gi rims la byi tsher ba la sogs pa sman bzhi phan pa yin no/_/
[\[197a.5\]]yang na rlung gi rims la pi pi ling gi rtsa ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byin na phan pa yin no/_/yang na rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu'i sbyor ba phan pa yin no/_/mkhris rims gla sgang dug mo nyung /_/pu tse shel ni sbrang rtsir bcas/_/zhes bya ba la/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims la ni/_/
[\[197a.6\]]gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman gsum po sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa sman bskol ba'i khu ba'i sbyor ba byas te blud na phan no/_/de bzhin gla sgang par pa ta/_/byi tsher rtsa mkhris bcas pa phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du mkhris pa'i rims la ni/_gla sgang dang /_par pa ta dang /_
[\[197a.7\]]byi tsher ba dang /_rtsa mkhris zhes bya ba bu nim pa dang bcas pa bskol te blud na phan pa yin no/_/bad kan dug mo nyung sogs te/_zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi rims la dug mo yungs la sogs pa'i sde tshan phan te/_dug mo yungs la sogs pa'i sde tshan ni sngar skyug sman la
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi skabs su dug mo yungs dang mur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa yin no/_/yang na ba sha gla sgang dang /_/bca' sga byi tsher bskol ba phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na bad kan gyi rims la ni ba sha ka la sogs pa phan pa yin no/_/pi pi ling rtsa a ru ra/_/
[\[197b.2\]]dong ga gla sgang pu tse shel/_/bad kan rlung 'dres bshang 'gags pas/_/na ba smin zhing drod skyed byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bshang ba 'gags pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rims la ni/_pi pi ling la sogs pa'i khu ba bskol ba'i khu ba blud na smin pa dang /_drod skyed par byed
[\[197b.3\]]do/_/rlung mkhris las byung rims la ni/_/rgun 'bru shing mngar ma du ka/_/seng phrom tang pa la thal tres dang /_/gla sgang skyu ru ba le ka/_/pad+ma ge sar shug pa dang /_/pad rtsa tsan+dan u shi ra/_/ba ru sha ka ut+pal sngo/_/rgun sogs skyo ma'am bskol bsgrangs pa/_/me tog dzA ti'i
[\[197b.4\]]dris bsgos te/_/khar 'bras yos sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/rlung mkhris rims ni 'joms byed cing /_/chang nad slon brgyal tsha mgo 'khor/_/ngal dang stod kyi khrag mkhris nad/_/skom dad mig ser dag kyang sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgun 'bru dang shing mngar la sogs pa bskol ba'i
[\[197b.5\]]khu ba bsgrangs pa'am/_skyo ma la me tog dzA ti zhes bya ba sna ma'i dris bsgos pa dang khar dang 'bras yos dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims 'joms par byed cing /_de bzhin du chang nad la sogs pa las gyur pa'i rims la sogs pa sel bar byed
[\[197b.6\]]pa yin no/_/de la 'phral du btags te btsags nas sbyar ba'i sman ni skyo ma zhes bya la/_sman bskol ba'i khu ba mtshan mo bzhag pa ni bsgrangs pa zhes bya'o/_/pu tse shel btags snod sar pa/_/gtsang ma dag tu bskol nas ni/_/btsir ba'i khu ba mar dang sbyar/_/khu ba
[\[197b.7\]]des ni rims tshad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman pu tse shel btags pa rdza ma'i snod sar pa gtsang zhing ma smas pa dag tu khu ba bskol ba'i tshul du bskol nas/_de'i khu ba 'khrul 'khor gyis btsir te phyung ba'i khu ba mar dang sbyar ba 'thungs na rims dang tsha ba sel bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]bad kan rlung 'dris shu dag dang /_/pu tse shel dang pa ta dang /_/dong ga dung mo yungs bskol phan/_zhes bya ba la/_bad kan dang rlung 'dres pa las gyur pa'i rims la shu dag la sogs pa sman khu bar bskol ba'i sbyor ba phan no/_/yang na sle tres bskol ba yi/_
[\[198a.2\]]khu bar pi pi ling gi ni/_/phye ma btab ste 'thungs na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na bad kan dang rlung 'dres pa las gyur pa'i rims la sle tres bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du pi pi ling btags pa'i phye ma btab ste 'thungs na nad de sel zhing phan par 'gyur ro/_/bya g+h+ri bca' sga
[\[198a.3\]]sle tres bskol/_/pi pi ling gi phye mar bcas/_/bad kan rlung rims dbugs mi bde/_/lud pa cham pa gzer 'joms byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bya g+h+ri zhes bya ba kaN+Da ka ri la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du pi pi ling gi phye ma btab pa ni/_bad kan dang rlung
[\[198a.4\]]gi rims la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/gla sgang 'u su a ru ra/_/bca' sga skra lo pu ti ka_/shu dag ga bra kad pha la/_/thang shing shing kun sbrang rtsir bcas/_/rlung dang bad rims mchil ma mang /_/lto dang snying ga rtsi ba logs na/_/lkog nad kha ni skrangs
[\[198a.5\]]pa dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde rnams sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_gla sgang la sogs pa bskol ba'i sbyor bas khu bar bcas pa ni rlung dang bad kan gyi rims dang /_de bzhin du mchil ma mang ba dang /_lto na ba la sogs pa sel zhing 'joms pa yin no/_/bskol ba 'di dag la
[\[198a.6\]]sman pa rgan po dag ni shing kun zho gnyis dang nam gnyis dang sbyor ba bya'o/_/dong ga sogs te sbrang rtsir bcas/_/bad kan mkhris gyur rims 'joms so/_/zhes bya ba la/_dong gal sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar/_/dong ga dug mo yungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa bskol ba'i sbyor bas bskol
[\[198a.7\]]te sbrang rtsi dang bcas par blud pa ni/_bad kan dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims sel bar byed do/_/de bzhin pu tse shel dang ni/_/ba sha ka dang pu shel tse/_/kyi lce ba dang 'bras bu gsum/_/sle tres dang ni pa to la/_/bong nga dkar po nim pa dang /_/mur ba byi tshor ba yang phan/_/
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]zhes bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du pu tse shel la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa ni snga ma dang 'dra bar bad kan dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims 'joms so/_/kyi lce ba ni trA ya ma Na'o/_/bong nga dkar po ni a ti bi sha'o/_/'dus pa'i rims la bya g+h+ri dang /_/thang shing
[\[198b.2\]]skyer pa gla sgang dang /_/pa to lo ma nim pa'i shun/_/'bras gsum pu tse shel yang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims nad la ni bya g+h+ri la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba phan no/_/rlung dang bad kan shas che'i rims/_/lud dbugs mi bde rtsib logs zug_/_
[\[198b.3\]]dong gra puSh+kar mU la dang /_/sle tres kaN+Da ka ri phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang bad kan shas che zhing rgyas pa las byung ba'i rims lud pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni dong gra la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba phan no/_/rgun 'bru ma du ka'i me tog/_/pa ru sha ka kyi lce ba/_/pu shel tse dang pu
[\[198b.4\]]tse shel/_/'bras bu gsum dang tang pa la bcas/_/bskol te bsgrangs par gyur pa yi/_/khu ba de ni dus 'thungs na/_/rims ni thams cad sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rgun 'bru la sogs pa sman bskol ba bsgrangs pa'i khu ba de 'thungs na nad gzhi so so dang /_gnyis
[\[198b.5\]]'dres pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims thams cad 'joms pa yin no/_/dzA ti gla sgang skyu ru ra/_/byi tsher bskol ba de 'drar phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_dzA ti la sogs pa sman bzhi po bskol te bsgrangs pa 'thungs pa yang snga ma dang 'dra bar rims thams cad sel zhing
[\[198b.6\]]phan par 'gyur ro/_/bshang 'gags rgun 'bru pu tse shel/_/kyi lce bu ram 'bras bu gsum/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims nad can gang bshang ba 'gags pa'i nad kyis btab na de la ni rgun 'bru la sogs pa'i sman bskol te blud par bya'o/_/bskol ba 'di la bu ram ni
[\[198b.7\]]srang gcig tsam dang sbyar ba'i chu btsags pa dang sbyor bar byed do/_/sman zhu nas ni thug pa sogs/_/spyad bya/_zhes bya ba la/_sman zhu zhing smin par gyur nas thug pa la sogs pa'i kha zas spyad cing bsten par bya'o/_/bad kan can gyis min/_bad kan gyis brlan lus la ni/_/
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]rngul la char 'bab 'phel ba ltar/_/thug pa yis ni bad kan skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan dang ldan pa'i nad pas ni sman de blud nas zhu ba'i rjes la thug pa nas sogs zas su spyad par mi bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_bad kan gyis brlan cing bangs pa'i
[\[199a.2\]]rims nad can gyi lus dang ldan pa la thug pa byin na bad kan skyed cing 'phel bar byed de/_dper na sa rdul gyi tshogs 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o/_/de'i phyir thog ma nyid du yang /_/yu sha rgya sran tsa na ka/_/sran ma sogs byas yang ba dang /_/rtsub cing ro kha ldan yid 'ong /_/
[\[199a.3\]]yi ga 'byed byed g.yos legs sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i phyir bad kan dang ldan pa'i rims nad can la thog ma ste dang po'i zhag drug pa nyid la smyung ba byas pa'i rtags dang ldan pa'i 'og tu thug pa sbyin pa'i dus nyid yin du zin kyang /_rgya sran ku lang+tha la sogs pa las byas pa'i
[\[199a.4\]]yu sha ste sran khu yang ba zhes pa tshad chung ngur byas pa rtsub cing snum gyis ma btab pa ro kha ba dang ldan zhing des bsres pa yid du 'ong zhing sems dga' bar byed pa/_yi ga 'byed par byed cing zas len par byed pa/_g.yos legs shing legs par sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o/_/sA lu
[\[199a.5\]]rtsa snar sogs 'bru rnying /_/drug cu pa yang rims la phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du sA lu rtsa snar la sogs pa ste/_'bras shun pa dmar zhing nang shin tu dkar ba la/_rak+ta shA li zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas ni sA lu dang sA lu chen po dang ka la ma shA li zhes bya bar
[\[199a.6\]]bsdu'o/_/de dag ni rims rnams la shin tu phan pa yin la/_de bzhin du 'bras drug cu pa yang rims la phan pa yin no/_/bad kan shas cher de bzhin nas/_/phub ma med byas chag tshe'i chan/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan shas che zhing rgyas pa'i rims la ni nas so ba phub ma
[\[199a.7\]]grugs pa chag tsher byas te chan du btsos pa phan no/_/nad dang lus zungs stsogs stobs las/_/rims sel sman khur btsos 'bras chan/_/lan gnyis lan gsum btsags nas ni/_/ci rigs par ni sbyin par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bras de dag ni nad dang lus
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]zungs kyi cha las ltos te sngar bshad ma thag pa'i rims sel ba'i sman bskol ba'i khu bas nad dmigs ji lta ba bzhin du sman gyi khu bas 'bras chan btsos pa lan gnyis sam lan gsum gyi bar du bkrus shing gzags te/_rims la ci rigs par sbyin par bya'o/_/mung+ga
[\[199b.2\]]sogs dang ku lang+tha'i/_/yu sha yang bas rims nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_mung+ga la sogs zhes pa mung+ga dang /_sran chung dang /_tsa na ka dang /_rgya sran ku lang+tha dang /_mud kun ta zhes bya ba'i sran ma la sogs pa la yang zhing tshad chung bar byas pa'i sran khu yu shas kyang
[\[199b.3\]]rims nad 'joms shing sel bar 'gyur ro/_/tshod ma ka ra be la dang /_/kar ko ta dang la phug gzhon/_/par pa ta dang bar ta ka_/nim pa'i me tog pa to la'i/_/'bras bu dang ni lo ma las/_/legs par g.yos pa'i tshod ma bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims nad
[\[199b.4\]]la tshod ma ni ka ra bI ra la sogs pa las byas pa'i tshod ma phan no/_/shin tu yang ba'i sha dang ni/_/skam sa'i srog chags sha khu ni/_/kaN+Da ka ri pa ru sha/_/ag+ni man+tha rgun 'bru dang /_/skyu ru ra dang se'u 'bru dang /_/pi pi ling dang bca' sga dang /_/'u su zir rgyam tshar
[\[199b.5\]]bcas/_/phal cher kha ra sbrang rtsi cher/_/ldan pa'i g.yos byas ma byas pa/_/zhes bya ba la/_skam na gnas pa'i srog chags dgo ba dang /_ri bong dang /_sha bkra dang sreg pa dang /_ka bin dza la dang /_ku rung ga la sogs pa'i sha khu dag rims nad can la phan no/_/de
[\[199b.6\]]yang kaN+Da ka ri la sogs pa dang nad dmigs kyi tshul ji lta ba las sbyar ba phal cher la kha ra dkar po dang sbrang rtsi la sogs pa shas che zhing mang ba dang ldan pa'i g.yos su byas pa ste snum la sogs pa btab pa'am/_g.yos su ma byas pa ste snum la sogs pa ma btab
[\[199b.7\]]pa sha khu byas te/_de yang bsdus pa las/_g.yos byas ma byas de dag ni/_/snum sogs bcas dang med ces bya/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/mi skyur dar ba bskol ba dang /_/yi gar 'ong zhing sla ba dang /_/legs par bskol ba'i tshod ma phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]tshod ma de shin tu mi sgyur ba'i dar ba dang bskol zhing g.yos pa dang /_yi ga 'byed cing yi gar 'ong ba dang /_sla zhing dang ba dang /_legs par bskol ba ste/_mes tshos par btsos na phan pa'o/_/de ni btung ba'i phyir yang sbyin/_/chu bskol bsgrangs par gyur
[\[200a.2\]]pa dang /_/goms par gyur pa'i dbang las ni/_/chang yang blud par bya ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshod ma'i khu ba de btung ba'i phyir ram/_don du yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du chu bskol te bsgrangs pa gang yin pa yang btung ba ste 'tshal nan du sbyin par bya ba dang /_goms
[\[200a.3\]]shing rjes su mthun pa'i dbang du byas nas/_chang dag kyang btung ba'i don du blud cing sbyin par bya'o/_/rims dang bcas pa'am rims bral ba/_/dgongs ka kha zas yang ba sbyin/_/de tshe bad kan me drod 'phel/_/khong pa'i me drod stobs dang ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims dang
[\[200a.4\]]bcas shing rims kyi shugs yod pa'am/_rims dang bral zhing rtse legs par zhi ba dag la dgongs ka ste/_nyi ma'i dus su'ang sbyin par bya/_/nyi ma nub pa'i mthar kha zas yang ba sbyin par bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i tshe bad kan med cing zad pas me drod rnam par
[\[200a.5\]]'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur te/_khong pa'i pho ba'i me drod stobs dang ldan zhing nus pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na yul goms dbang las ni/_/ci rigs dus su'ang sbyin par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na ci rigs shing ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dus su zas sbyin par bya la/_
[\[200a.6\]]de yang yul gyi goms pa'i dbang du byas nas/_gang gi zas dus gang yin pa de yang sbyin du rung ngo /_/me drod chung la sngar zos na/_/zas ma zhu bas gzir bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_ci'i phyir dgongs ka zas sbyin zhe na/_gang gi phyir nang par gyi dus su me drod stobs chung
[\[200a.7\]]zhing zhan pas/_nyi ma'i cha dang po la sngar zan zos na zan ma zhu bas nad pa de gzir zhing gnon par 'gyur ro/_/sman bskol khu ba phan zas kyis/_/zhag bcu'i bar du smyung ba bya/_/bad kan bri nas rlung mkhris ni/_/shas che'i rims la zhun mar sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]gla sgang dang par pa ta la sogs pa sman bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_de bzhin du phan pa'i zas thug pa dang /_yu sha la sogs pas dang po rims kyis btab pa'i zhag bcu 'das par bya zhing /_tshul 'dis smyung ba byas par gyur nas/_/smyung ba'i rim pas bad kan bri zhing
[\[200b.2\]]chung bar gyur la/_rlung dang mkhris pa lhag par shas che zhing smyung ba nyid kyis de gnyis 'phel bar gyur nas de'i zhun mar sbyin par bya'o/_/nad smin pa la bdud rtsi yin/_/gzhan du de ni dug dang mtshungs/_/zhag bcu 'das par gyur kyang ni/_/rims kyi bla brnan 'phel bar
[\[200b.3\]]byed/_/ces bya ba la/_zhun mar de yang rims kyi nad smin cing ma smin pa'i skyon dang bral ba la blud na ni bdud rtsi dang 'dra bar phan pa yin no/_/de las gzhan du rims nad ma smin zhing bad kan dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i rims la mar gsar de byin pa ni dug dang mtshungs par gnod
[\[200b.4\]]par byed pa yin te/_zhag bcu 'das su zin kyang nad ma smin pa dang rlung shas med pa la byin pas ni rims kyi bla brnan ji skad smos pa'i lud pa dang /_yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa rnams 'phel zhing rgyas par byed pa yin no/_/de lta bas na ma smin pa'i gnas skabs der mar
[\[200b.5\]]byin na ni rims dang de'i bla brnan 'phel bar byed pa nyid yin no/_/de la smyung ba la sogs rims/_/bad kan zad kyi bar du bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la rims bad kan gyi shas che ba la ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul du smyung ba la sogs pa'i rims pha rol kha ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyi
[\[200b.6\]]sbyor ba bya la/_de yang bad kan zad kyi bar du bya ste/_rims skyed par byed pa'i bad kan rgyas pas dus ji srid kyis zad par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du smyung ba bya'o/_/lus dang lus zungs stobs zhan pas/_/rims rnying du yang 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus stobs
[\[200b.7\]]zhan pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_lus zungs stobs zhan pa nyid kyi rgyus rims rnying par 'gyur gyi/_rang gi rang bzhin gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don gyis ston pa yin no/_/me drod rtsub pas rims skyed byed/_/me drod rtsub par gyur pa la/_/skyug sman dugs dang dus dang chu/_/
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]bskol dang kha zas spangs pa yis/_/rlung gi khams ni grogs gyur pas/_/gang zhig stobs chen gyur pa la/_/de yi zhi byed zhun mar te/_/khang pa 'bar la chu blugs mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir me drod rtsub mo smin par byed pa'i me drod ces bya ba'i
[\[201a.2\]]mkhris pa gang yin pa de gsher ba dang bral bas me drod nyid du gyur pas rtsub pa yin la/_me drod rims skyed par byed pa rtsub par gyur pas nad pa yang rtsub par byed cing /_skyug sman la sogs pas nyams smad cing smyung ba byas pa'i gso bas rtsub por byas pa dang /_gang
[\[201a.3\]]rlung gi rang bzhin rtag tu rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed pas grogs dang gsos btab pas rlung gi khams gang yin pa de stobs chen por gyur pa la de zhi bar bya ba'i thabs ni zhun mar blud pa yin te/_ji ltar khang pa 'bar bar gyur pa la chu blugs pas zhi bar gyur pa dang mtshungs so/_/
[\[201a.4\]]rlung mkhris sel ba'i mchog tu ni/_/sbyor ba'i dbang las gyur pas na/_/de phyir rang gi sman dang ni/_/ji bzhin bskol ba de la sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_zhun mar de yang rlung dang mkhris pa sel ba'i mchog yin la/_de yang sbyor ba'i dbang las mchog tu gyur pa'am/_/yang na
[\[201a.5\]]bdag nyid mchog yin pa'i steng du sman gyi sbyor ba byas pa dang rjes su mthun zhing rang gi mtshan nyid kyi nus pa 'phel ba dang /_sbyor ba gzhan dang rjes su mthun par byed de/_sbyor ba gang dang 'dres pa de dang lhan cig rang gi bya ba byed do/_/de yang drang srong tsa ra kas/_ji ltar zhun
[\[201a.6\]]mar dang 'dra bar/_/snum gzhan dag ni gang yang rung /_/sbyor ba'i rjes su mthun pa yin/_/de bas zhun mar snum kun mchog_/ces bshad pa yin no/_/de ltar na zhun mar ni sbyor ba dang rjes su mthun pa yin pas/_de'i phyir zhun mar de nad gang yin pa de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i
[\[201a.7\]]rang gi sman dang sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du bskol ba'i rims rnying par gyur pa la bskol bar bya'o/_/rims dro mi mthun pas sel la/_/bsil bas mkhris pa'ang sel bar byed/_/snum pas rlung sel bad kan mar/_/mtshungs kyang sbyor dang g.yos pas sel/_/zhes bya ba
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]la/_rims kyi mtshan nyid dang mar gyi mtshan nyid mi mthun pa rtsub pa dang /_dro ba gang yin pa de mar gyi bsil ba'i yon tan snum pa dang /_bsil bas sel bar byed la/_mkhris pa'i rnam pa ni mar gyi bsil ba'i yon tan gyis sel bar byed kyi/_snum pa'i yon tan gyis
[\[201b.2\]]sel bar mi byed de/_mkhris pa ni snum pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/de bzhin du rlung ni mar gyi snum pas sel ba yin gyi/_bsil bas sel ba ma yin gyi/_/rlung gi rang bzhin bsil ba yin no/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/snum pa dang bsil ba la
[\[201b.3\]]sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyis bad kan dang mar yon tan mnyam pa yin du zin kyang /_sbyor ba dang g.yos su byas pa'i dbang las bad kan sel bar byed de/_de la sbyor ba ni bad kan 'joms par byed pa'i sman dang lhan cig sbyor ba'o/_/g.yos su byas pa ni/_ci nas
[\[201b.4\]]kyang bad kan 'joms par byed pa'i yon tan 'byung zhing skyed pa'i tshul du g.yos pa'o/_/sngar gyi sman khu mar bcas pa/_/thams cad nad dmigs ji bzhin gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyu de bas na gla sgang dang par pa ta la sogs pa rims kyi sman sngar ji skad bstan pa'i khu ba
[\[201b.5\]]dang mar du bskol ba de thams cad nad dmigs ji lta ba'i tshul las rjes su dpag ste gtang zhing sbyin par bya'o/_/'bras bu gsum dang nim pa'i shun/_/shing mngar bri ha ti gnyis dang /_/sran chung 'o mar bcas bskol ba/_/mar ldan rims dang lud pa 'joms/_/
[\[201b.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_'bras bu gsum dang nim pa'i shun lpags la sogs pa'i sman sran chung gi lo ma dang bcas pa bskol te/_sman khu'i sbyor ba byas pa dang mar dang bcas pa ni rims dang lud pa 'joms pa yin no/_/'dir yang sman pa rgan po mkhas pa rnams ni 'bras bu gsum
[\[201b.7\]]la sogs pa'i sman spyir srang gcig_/sran chung gi lo ma srang gcig_/mar srang phyed dang sbyar te ster bar byed do/_/bri ha ti gnyis ni kaN+Da ka ri dang /_bri ha ti ste gnyis so/_/pi pi ling dang tig ta dug mo yungs/_/kaN+Da ka ri pu tse shel thal tres/_/ta ma la ka skyu ru ra
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]bil ba/_/gla sgang tsan+dan kyi lce pu shel tse/_/rgun 'bru bong nga sa la par+Ni dang /_/bskol ba'i mar gyis rims kyi nad dang ni/_/me drod mi snyoms ha li sa ka dang /_/yi ga 'chus dang mi bzad tsha ba dang /_/snyom pa'i nad dang rtsib logs na ba dang /_/mgo
[\[202a.2\]]nad slon ni myur du 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sman btags pa'i lde gu mar gyi bzhi cha dang /_chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang bskol ba'i sman mar gyis ni rims la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed la/_me drod mi snyoms pa ni rlung gis me drod mi
[\[202a.3\]]mnyam par byas pa lus kyi gnas kyi skabs su bstan pa'o/_/ha li sa ka ni skya rbab kyi nad kyi skabs su rlung dang mkhris pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bshad pa yin no/_/gzhan ni go bar zad do/_/sman mar bskol ba'i tshad ni lde gu dang mar bzhi 'gyur du byas te/_
[\[202a.4\]]sman mar bskol ba'i tshad bshad pa sman las mar ni bzhi 'gyur zhes bshad pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas sman gyi lde gu'i bzhi 'gyur gyi mar bskol la/_'dir chu ma smos su zin kyang /_mar gyi bzhi 'gyur du bya ba dang thams cad du bskol bar bya'o/_/
[\[202a.5\]]de bzhin du sman btags pa'i chu dang sbrus pa la snum nyi tshe dang bskol ba chu med par bya'o/_/gang du tshad ni ma smos pa/_/der ni sman rnams cha mnyam bya/_/zhes smos pa'i tshig 'dis ni/_tshad kyi nges pa ma smos pa 'di dag tu ni cha mnyam par sbyar bar khong du chud par bya'o/_/
[\[202a.6\]]gang sbyor ba nges par ma smos pa der ni lde gu nyid bya'i bskol bar ni mi bya'o/_/des na sman gyi lde gu srang brgyad sbyar la mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang sbyar te/_chu srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang bskol bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du/_rlon pa nyis 'gyur gzhug par bya/_/zhes bya ba la
[\[202a.7\]]sogs pa yang 'dir shes par bya ste/_'di dag tshad ma smos pa'i sman mar thams cad la 'di ltar bya ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/tam la ka ni pa hu pa tra dang a dza dra zhes bya'o/_/sa la par+Ni sman s+thi ra zhes bya'o/_/dur byid ma gtogs seng phrom ma sogs bskol mar/_/
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]rlung las gyur pa'i rims la bsngags pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i rims la ni seng phrom la sogs pa'i sman mar rlung nad gso ba'i skabs seng phrom srang brgyad ces bya ba la sogs pa gzhung gis bstan pa'i sman mar las der smos pa'i nang nas dur byid ma
[\[202b.2\]]gtogs pa'i shing de bton te/_sman lhag ma bskol ba'i mar blud pa bsngags pa yin no/_/mkhris pa'i rims la pu tse shel dug mar/_/kyi lce bar bskol sman mar gang yin phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur ba'i rims la ni/_pu tse shel gyi sman mar mdze nad
[\[202b.3\]]gso ba'i skabs nas bshad pa dang /_dug gi sman mar khrag mkhris gso ba'i skabs nas bshad pa dang /_kyi lce ba'i sman mar khong 'bras gso ba'i skabs nas bshad pa'i sman mar gang yin pa de dag blud na phan no/_/byi dang ga dang dbyi mong kha ru tsha/_/pa tha tsha ba gsum
[\[202b.4\]]dang tsi tra ka_/lce myang tsha dang nas tshig 'khus thal ba/_/'di rnams cha ni srang rer byas pa dang /_/mar dang 'o ma cha ni mnyam byas pa/_/bre gang bskol bas bad kan rims rnying 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_byi dang ga la sogs pa'i sman bcu po cha srang rer byas pa srang bcu
[\[202b.5\]]dang /_mar bre gang ste/_srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'o ma yang bre gang ste srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang bcas par bskol ba'i sman mar ni bad kan la sogs pa'i rims rnying pa 'joms pa yin no/_/'dir chu ma smos su zin kyang bre gsum gzhug par bya ste/_de ltar na 'o ma
[\[202b.6\]]dang chu spyir bsdus na mar gyi bzhi 'gyur du 'gyur te/_chu med par 'o ma 'ba' zhig gis sman gyi bzhi 'gyur 'byin par mi nus te/_de yang bsdus pa las/_'o ma la sogs bcas bskol sman/_/khu ba legs par thon mi 'gyur/_/zhes smos pas na sman pa mkhas pa'i man
[\[202b.7\]]ngag gi rjes su 'brangs nas chus bskol ba'i sngon du 'gro ba dang /_'o ma la sogs pas bskol bar bya'o/_/sle tres khu ba lde gu dang /_/ba sha ka dang 'bras bu gsum/_/rgun 'bru dang ni ba la dang /_/bskol ba'i sman mar rims nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_sle
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]tres kyi khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gzhug par bya zhing /_de bzhin du chu dang bcas pa'i lde gu bya na yang mar gyi bzhi 'gyur bya'o/_/de bzhin du ba sha ka'i khu ba dang lde gu dang /_'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang lde gu dang /_ba le'i khu ba dang lde gu so sor mar dang
[\[203a.2\]]bskol ba'i sman mar ni rims nad 'joms par byed pa yin te/_sman mar 'di dag ni mar kho na dang sbyar bar bya ste/_des ni rims la phan pa yin pa'i phyir dang /_zhun mar gyi skabs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/mar zhu nas ni sha 'jam khu/_/kha zas bcas pa bza' bar bya/_/des
[\[203a.3\]]ni stobs rab skyed byed cing /_/nad ni shin tu zad byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngar smos pa'i sman mar de dag gang yang rung ba byin nas de zhu bar gyur cing legs par zhu zin pa dang /_sha 'jam zhing snyi ba las byas pa'i sha khu yang pa sbyin par bya ste/_gang gi phyir sha khu des
[\[203a.4\]]ni stobs rab tu skyed cing 'byung bar byed pa yin la/_stobs skyed pas ni nad zad par byed pa yin no/_/ka ra be la sogs khu dang /_/mung+ga bad kan mkhris 'joms pas/_/phal cher rlung shas che rims la/_/gzer dang bshang ba 'gags pa ni/_/skyed cing rims ni
[\[203a.5\]]'phel bar byed/_/de phyir de ni bsngags ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman kar be+e la la sogs pa'i khu ba gang dag yin pa de ni bad kan dang mkhris pa sel zhing shas cher rlung 'phel bar byed pa yin pas/_de'i phyir rims rnying pa rlung gi shas che ba la sbyin par mi bya ste/_de ci'i
[\[203a.6\]]phyir zhe na/_gzer la sogs pa 'phel bar byed pas de'i phyir bsngags pa ma yin no/_/gal te de ltar byas kyang ni/_/rims ni zhi bar ma gyur na/_/sbyang 'os la ni sbyang bar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar rim bzhin du bcos shing sman mar blud du zin kyang gal te rims zhi
[\[203a.7\]]zhing byang bar ma gyur na/_de'i 'og tu sbyang bar bya bar mi 'os pa sbrum ma dang /_khong rtsub pa dang /_me drod chung ba la sogs pa ma gtogs pa skyug sman la sogs pas sbyang bar bya/_skyug sman nam 'khru sman gang yin pa bya'o/_/de la skyug sman sngar bshad pa/_/ma zhu bar
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]ni gnas nad la/_/stobs can stobs ni bsrung ste gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rims nad can de la sngar bshad pa'i skyug sman/_po son cha yi snying por bcas/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas le'u 'di nyid kyi nang du sngar bstan pa dag blud par bya la/_de yang ma zhu ba'i gnas la
[\[203b.2\]]gnas shing /_de la brten pa'i nad phal cher bad kan gyi shas che ba'i nad la gtang bar bya la/_de yang nad pa nyams stobs dang ldan pa'i nyams stobs de ma nyams par bsrungs la sman gtang bar bya'o/_/smin zhing nad ni lhod gyur ba'am/_/chang dang dug las byung rims
[\[203b.3\]]la/_/sha ma dur byid 'bras bu gsum/_/pi pi ling dang ge sar dang /_/yang na tsha ba gsum sogs sman/_/kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas pa sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad smin cing ma zhu ba med pa dang /_lhod cing gnas las g.yos par gyur pa'am/_yang na chang nad dang dug
[\[203b.4\]]las gyur pa'i rims la/_sha ma dur byid la sogs pa'i phye ma las sbrus pa'i bkru sman sbyin par bya'o/_/yang na tsha ba gsum la sogs pa'i sman cho ga grub pa las/_tsha gsum dri bzang gsum gla sgang /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa'i sman sbrang rtsi dang kha ra
[\[203b.5\]]dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de bzhin du/_rgun 'bru skyu ru ra'i khu ba/_/a ru ra ni rgun chur bcas/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du bkru sman gyi phyir rgun 'bru'i khu ba dang /_skyu ru ra'i khu ba blud pa'am/_a ru ra'i phye ma rgun chu'i nang du btab ste blud par bya'o/_/dong ga 'o
[\[203b.6\]]mar bcas pa'am/_/rgun chu dang ni bcas pa blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na dong ga dang 'o mar sbyar ba'am/_rgun chu dang dong gar sbyar ba'i bkru sman blud par bya'o/_/'bras bu gsum mam kyi lce ba/_/'o ma rims dang ldan pas btung /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rims
[\[203b.7\]]dang ldan pa'i mis 'bras bu gsum dang 'o ma sbyar ba'am/_kyi lce ba dang 'o mar sbyar ba btung bar bya'o/_/bkru sman btang ba'i skabs su yang /_/thug sla la sogs rim bzhin blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bkru sman btang ba'i skabs su yang zhes bya ba'i yang gi sgras
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]skyug sman btang ba'i skabs su yang thug pa sla ba la sogs pa sbyin par bya ste/_de yang dang por 'bras thug sla ba rkyang rkyang por byin nas/_de'i 'og tu thug pa dang thug pa gar po la sogs pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin par bya'o/_/rim gyis dri ma glongs
[\[204a.2\]]g.yos tshe/_/de la rtag tu dgag mi bya/_/nad ni khong par gnas snyeg nas/_/smin kyang gnod pa skyed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims kyi tsha ba la sogs pas nad glongs shing bskyod pas stod dang smad du g.yos shing bskyod nas rim gyis bshang ba zhes bya ba'i dri ma 'byung
[\[204a.3\]]bar byed pa de la rtag tu dgag cing brnag par mi bya ste/_gang gi phyir nad smin par gyur kyang zhes bya ba'i sgras ma smin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de dag bkag par gyur na khong pa zhes bya ba lus kyi phyogs su gnas snyeg cing 'dug pa'i skabs rnyed pas des nges par nad kyis
[\[204a.4\]]gnod pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/shin tu tshabs cher byung gyur na/_/smin nas gcad par bya ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na bshang ba tshabs cher 'byung ba'i nad de shin tu tshabs cher byung bar gyur na ma smin pa smin par byas nas/_bcad cing dgag pa'i nyes pa bya'o/_/ma
[\[204a.5\]]smin bkag pa'i nyes pa ni/_/nad bcos thabs su bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'khru bam smin pa rang nyid 'byung bar gyur pa bkag cing bcad pa las/_nad kyi nyes pa gang dag byung ba de ni nad gso ba'i le'u'i skabs su bshad pa yin te/_de yang de las/_steng ngam
[\[204a.6\]]'og tu 'byung bar rtsom/_/nad ni rang nyid byung ba na/_/sman ni nad kyis mi dgag ste/_/bkag na de nyid nad skyed 'gyur/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/gang zhig rmongs pas ma smin pa'i/_/rims la nad 'byin sman gtong ba/_/de ni sbrul nag gnyid log la/_/
[\[204a.7\]]lag pa'i rtse mos reg dang mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman pa gang zhig rmongs shing mi shes pas nad ma smin pa'i rims la nad 'byin pa'i sman bkru sman gyi rnam pa gtong zhing ldud par byed na/_sman pa de ni bdag nyid phung krol bskyed pa yin te/_dper na sbrul nag po
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]nyid kyis gnyid log par gnas pa la/_lag pa'i rtse mos reg na de sad nas ma rungs par byed pa dang mtshungs so/_/rims zad pa la slon sman dang /_/bkru sman phan pa ma yin te/_/de la 'am dag gis ni/_/mas gtong bas ni nad bsal bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims kyis nyams
[\[204b.2\]]zad par gyur pa'am/_rims zad pa'i mi la slon sman dang bkru sman gtang ba dag phan pa ma yin te/_bkru sman gyis bcos dgos pa'i gnas skabs la bab na de la 'o ma mas gtong ba'i ni ru ha'am/_'jam rtsi mas gtong pas nad bsal bar bya'o/_/'o ma la goms bad kan
[\[204b.3\]]zad/_/lus tsha skom dad gnyis yod na/_/rlung dang mkhris pas nyen pa ni/_/tshad par 'khru yang 'o ma phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa 'o ma la goms shing de sbyin par 'os pa dang /_khyad par du bad kan zad cing byang ba gang yin pa de la lus tsha ba dang skom dad kyi nad gnyis
[\[204b.4\]]yod pa dang /_de bzhin du rlung dang mkhris pas nyen par gyur na de la 'o ma blud na phan te/_de ni gal te tshad par 'khru ba'i nad yod pa la yang phan na/_gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_/de lus smyung bas gdungs pa dag/_/mes tshig pa yi nags la ni/_/char chu 'bab pas skyed pa
[\[204b.5\]]ltar/_/rims ni myur du sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_'o ma des lus smyung bas gdungs shing len par gyur pa dag myur du 'tsho zhing brtas par byed de/_dper na mes tshig cing bsregs pa'i nags la char pa'i chu 'bab pas skyed cing slar myu gu skrun par byed pa dang 'dra bar 'o
[\[204b.6\]]ma blud par 'os pa'i nad pa rims kyis lus zad par byas pa la/_'o ma blud na ni rims de myur du sel zhing 'joms par byed do/_/de bas 'o ma sbyar te bskol/_/dro ba'am bsgrangs pa'am bzhos ma thag_/dus kyi dbye ba shes te sbyin/_/de las gzhan du rims can
[\[204b.7\]]gsod/_/ces bya ba la/_de bas 'o ma de ni rdzas gzhan dang sbyar te bskol ba dro ba'am bsgrangs pa/_yang na bzhos ma thag gang yin pa de ji ltar 'os shing rigs pa dang dus kyi dbye ba shes shing brtags pa byas la/_de lta bu'i tshul gyis sbyin par 'os pa'i yul la sbyin par
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]bya'i/_de las gzhan du de dang mi 'tsham zhing gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyin ci log gi yul la 'o ma blud par gyur na/_rims nad can gyi nad pa de gsod par 'gyur ro/_/'o ma bca' sga 'bra gor bcas/_/rgun 'bru kha ra mar ldan par/_/bskol te bsgrangs
