[\[224b.7\]]pa la ni na le sham dang gla sgang med pa'i kha ra la sogs pa'i sman de dag mar dang bcas pa sbyin no/_/mar dang til mar dang bu ram dang sha kha ra dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu ni nad gzhi la sogs pa'i tshul las ltos te tshad ci rigs su sbyar bar bya'o/_/rgun 'bru lnga bcu pi pi ling /_/
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]sum cu kha ra srang gcig sbyar/_/sbrang rtsi 'am ba yi lci ba'am/_/be'u gzhon lci khur lde gur sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgun 'bru ni go ta na zhes bya ba ba lang gi nu sor 'dra ba'i rgun 'bru sbom po zhig yod pa la bya ste/_de'i rdog ma lnga bcu dang /_pi pi ling rdog ma
[\[225a.2\]]sum cu dang /_kha ra srang gcig ste 'di dag sbyar ba sbrang rtsi dang lde gur byas pa sbyin pa'am/_ba'i lci ba'i khu ba'am/_be'u gzhon nu nu zho 'thungs pa'i lci ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o/_/shing tsha sug smel tsha ba gsum/_/rgun 'bru pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/ma nu 'bras yos gla
[\[225a.3\]]sgang dang /_/zur pa dkar dang ra sna dang /_/skyu ru ra dang ba ru ra/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi zhun mar sbyar/_/lde gus snying nad lud pa sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing tsha la sogs pa'i sman lde gur sbyar ba ni snying nad la sogs pa'i lud pa sel ba yin no/_/mngar ba'i sman dang srog
[\[225a.4\]]chags ni/_/skam sa'i sha dang nas dang ni/_/khre dang khre rgod mung+ga sogs/_/yu sha dang ni tshod ma dang /_/kha ba tshad ldan sbyar lde gu/_/kha ba dang ni sbrang rtsir bcas/_/bad kan shas che'i nad la phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan shas che ba'i lud pa la ni skam sa'i srog chags kyi
[\[225a.5\]]sha khu dang /_sman mngar po rgun 'bru dang /_bu ram shing gi khu ba la sogs pa dang /_nad la sogs pa'i tshad dang ldan par sbyar ba byin na phan la/_de bzhin du pu shel tse la sogs pa'i khu ba dang /_mon sran mung+ga zhes bya ba mon sran sde'u yu sha la sogs pa'i tshod ma dang /_de bzhin
[\[225a.6\]]du sman kha ba dang /_sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa phan pa yin no/_/bad kan shas chung sA lu dang /_/drug cu pa'i chan sha khu phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan shas chung ba'i mkhris pa'i lud pa la ni 'bras sA lu dang /_'bras drug cu pa'i sman sha khu dang bza' ba phan no/_/btung bar
[\[225a.7\]]kha ra'am rgun chu 'am/_/bu ram shing khu'am 'o ma blud/_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa la btung ba ni khar dang rgun 'bru bsres pa'i chu blud na phan no/_/de bzhin du rgun 'bru dang bu ram shing gi khu ba sbyar ba blud pa'am 'o ma blud pa phan no/_/mkhris pa'i lud par ra
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]mnye ba/_/bri ha ti gnyis me da gnyis/_/ba tsa ka dang li dong gra/_/sha khu dang ni 'o ma 'am/_/thug pa'am yu shar sbyar te blud/_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa la ni ra mnye ba la sogs pa'i sman dang sbyar ba'i sha khu blud na phan no/_/rgun 'bru dang ni pi
[\[225b.2\]]pi ling /_/rtsa yi rtsa ba lngar bshad dang /_/chur bskol ba yi khu ba dang /_/de dang 'o ma bskol te bsgrangs/_/sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas pa blud/_/yang na de yis thug pa bskol/_/legs bskol sbrang rtsir bcas pa sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i
[\[225b.3\]]lud pa la ni rgun 'bru la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i thug pa legs par bsgrangs pa la sbrang rtsi dang kha rar bcas pa'am/_thug pa blud par bya'o/_/zur pa dang ni ba le ka_/kha ra bca' sga bri ha ti/_/btags pa'i khu ba ras kyis btsags/_mar dang bsres te blud par
[\[225b.4\]]bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_zur pa la sogs pa'i sman chu btags su byas la/_de'i khu ba ras kyis btsags te zhun mar dang bsres te blud na yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/_/kha ra dang ni dzi ba ka_/mung+ga ma sha par+Ni dang /_/byi tsher ba ni lde gur byas/_/mar
[\[225b.5\]]dang 'o ma brgyad 'gyur bskol/_/de btung bza' dang bldag pa dang /_/sbyar bas mkhris pa'i lud pa sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha kha ra la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa la mar ji tsam yod pa'i brgyad 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang bsres pa'i nang du bskol la/_mar de btung ba la
[\[225b.6\]]sogs pa dang sbyar na mkhris pa'i lud pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/'di dag phye ma'i lde gu 'am/_/bskol ba'i khu ba blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman mar gyi sbyor bar smos pa'i sman bshad ma thag pa'i 'di dag gi phye ma lde gur byar yang rung ste/_de dag kyang sbrang rtsi dang lde
[\[225b.7\]]gur bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i don gyis shes par bya'o/_/yang na sman 'di dag bskol ba'i khu ba blud na yang nad de dag la yang phan par 'gyur ro/_/bad kan lud can gyis dang por/_/thang shing bsregs nas gzags pa'i snum/_/ba sha ka dang nas tshig 'khus/_/
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]thal ba'i phye ma btab pa gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa dang ldan pa'i mi ni dang por thang shing bsregs nas de'i snum gzags su bcug pa gang yin pa dang /_ba sha ka dang nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba'i phye ma btab pa de gtang
[\[226a.2\]]bar bya'o/_/snum bcas bkru sman gyis steng dang /_/'og dang spyi bor ci rigs par/_/nyams stobs ldan bkru sman rno gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_snum des snum gyi cho ga byas pa'i nad pa la bkru sman btang ste steng dang 'og dang spyi bo ste lan gsum nas ci rigs par nad
[\[226a.3\]]la sogs pa'i tshul las ltos la bkru sman gtang bar bya ste/_steng du ni skyug sman gyis slon par bya ba dang /_spyi bor sna nas bkru sman gtang ba dang /_'og nas ni bkru sman btang ste gsum char yang nad sbyong bar byed pas ni bkru sman zhes bya'o/_/de dag gis kyang skyes bu
[\[226a.4\]]nyams stobs dang ldan pa dag la khrus bya'i/_nyams stobs chung ba dag la ni ma yin no/_/thug pa sogs kyang 'di la blud/_/nas dang mung+ga rgya sran zas/_/rtsub dro na le sham gyis tsha/_/ka sa marda bar dag_/bya kri ya bak+Sha ra dang /_/pi pi ling dang bcas pa sbyin/_/skam
[\[226a.5\]]sa khung gnas sha khu snum/_/til dang yungs kar bil ba'i snum/_/sbyar ba'i thug pa sbyin par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar slon khrus byas pa'i bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa can la thug pa la sogs pa'i rim pa blud par bya'o/_/de nas nas la sogs pa las gzags
[\[226a.6\]]pa'i rtsub pa dang dro ba dang /_na le sham la sogs pa'i sman gyis tsha zhing rno bar byas pa dang /_ka sa marda la sogs pa'i tshod ma dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du skam sa dang khung na yod pa'i srog chags rnams kyi sha khu'i snum dang til la sogs pa las sman sbyar ba'i thug pa
[\[226a.7\]]sbyin par bya'o/_/skom na rtsa ba bcu bskol chu/_/chu tshan chang ngam sbrang chu blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa can de skom par gyur na rtsa ba bcu bskol ba'i chu blud pa'am/_yang chu 'ba' zhig bskol ba'i chu tshan mang la goms pa'i chang rnying blud
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]pa'am/_yang na sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i chu blud par bya'o/_/dong ga ma nu'i rtsa ba dang /_/pa to la yi rtsa bar bcas/_/nub gcig chur sbangs sbrang rtsi btab/_/zas dus gsum mam nang par blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang dong ga la sogs pa'i sman nub gcig chur sbangs la
[\[226b.2\]]sbrang rtsi btab ste nang par btung ba'i zas za ba'i dus gsum po zas kyi thog ma dang /_zas kyi bar dang /_zos pa'i mtha' ma ste gsum char du yang blud par bya'o/_/pi pi ling dang de rtsa ba/_/bca' sga dang ni ba ru ra/_/rma bya khyim bya'i mjug sgro ni/_/snag tshar byas dang nas
[\[226b.3\]]tshig thal/_/bi sha gla sgang pi pi ling /_/dur byid sbrang rtsir sbyar ba ste/_/tshigs bcad phyed kyis rdzogs lde gu/_/gsum po bad kan lud pa sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sman tshigs su bcad pa phyed phyed kyis rdzogs par byas pa'i lde gu
[\[226b.4\]]gsum po sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba byin na bad kan gyi lud pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/rma bya dang khyim bya'i mjug sgro'i snag tsha ni de gnyis bsregs pa las snag tsha ltar nag por byas pa'o/_/nas las byas pa'i thal ba yin pas na nas tshig thal ba'o/_/sbrang rtsi na le sham sbyar
[\[226b.5\]]ba ldag_/a ka ru sbrang rtsi nyid kyis/_/kaN+Da ka ri bar ta ka_/bring ga ra dza'i khu ba dang /_/ka sa marda rta sbangs ba tsir/_/khu ba'am bye'u rug nag po'i khu/_/sbrang rtsi so sor sbyar ba bldag_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa la ni sbrang rtsi dang na le sham sbyar te
[\[226b.6\]]lde gur byas pa bldag pa'am/_a ka ru'i phyi ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te bldag pa'am/_de bzhin du kaN+Da ka ri'i khu ba dang /_bar ta ka'i khu ba dang /_bring ga ra dza'i khu ba dang /_ka sa mar da'i khu ba dang /_rta sbangs kyi khu ba dang /_bye'u rug pa nag po'i khu ba gang yang rung ba'i khu ba
[\[226b.7\]]sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te bldag par bya'o/_/thang shing zur par sna dang /_/byi tsher kar ka ta sring gi/_/gla sgang bca' sga pi pi ling /_/kha ra a ru skyu ru ra/_/'bras yos kha ra dkar po dang /_/skyu ru ra yi pags pa rnams/_/sbrang rtsi til mar sbyar lde gu/_/gsum po rlung
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]'dres bad kan sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung nad 'dres shing rjes su 'brel ba'i bad kan gyi lud pa la ni lde gu gsum po sbrang rtsi dang til mar gnyis dang sbyar zhing bsres pa gtang bar bya la/_sman ni thang shing la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa phyed phyed kyis
[\[227a.2\]]rdzogs par byas pa'i mtshan gsum dang sbyar bar bya'o/_/skyu ru ra'i pags pa ni skyu ru ra bzang po skams par gyur pa'i pags pa ltar 'chus pa la bya'o/_/se'u 'bru srang gnyis bu ram ni/_/srang brgyad tsha ba gsum srang res/_/skad snyan drod skyed yi ga 'byed/_/lud pa
[\[227a.3\]]dbugs mi bde cham sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_se'u 'bru'i khu ba btsir ba srang gnyis dang /_bu ram srang brgyad dang /_tsha ba gsum srang re re ste/_srang bcu gsum po 'di dag bsres la phye mar byas pa ni/_skad snyan par byed pa nas cham pa sel ba'i bar du byed do/_/bu ram
[\[227a.4\]]ya bak+Sha ra dang /_/na le sham dang pi pi ling /_/se'u 'bru rim gyis srang gnyis dang /_/zho re srang phyed tsam du sbyar/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_bu ram srang gnyis/_ya bak+Sha ra zho gcig_/pi pi ling dang na le sham zho ri/_se'u 'bru srang gcig tu
[\[227a.5\]]byas pa phye mar sbyar ba des ni lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba sel bar byed do/_/rims kyi skabs bshad a ru ra/_/sogs dang ka ra ka ta sring gi_/bskol ba'i khu ba blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims kyi skabs su bshad pa'i sman gla sgang dang /_a ru ra dang 'u su'i
[\[227a.6\]]'bras bu la sogs pa dang /_kar ka ta sring gi dang bcas pa'i khu ba blud na yang lud pa sel bar byed do/_/yang na dur byid la la phud/_/gla sgang ma nu bi sha la/_/pi pi ling bcas ba gcin nam/_/chur bskol ba gcin lud pa sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na dur
[\[227a.7\]]byid la sogs pa sman pa gcin dang cho ga bzhin bskol ba la pi pi ling gi phye ma btab pa'am/_dur byid la sogs pa'i sman chu dang bskol te/_pi pi ling gi phye ma btab pa blud na yang bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa sel bar byed do/_/pi pi ling ni til mar brngos/_/
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]lde gu zho gnyis kha rar bcas/_/rgya sran bskol ba'i khu bar sbyar/_/blud na bad kan lud pa 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_pi pi ling gi lde gu zho gnyis kha ra dang bcas pa til mar brngos la rgya sran ku lang+tha bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar zhing bskol ba blud na bad kan las gyur pa'i
[\[227b.2\]]lud pa 'joms par byed do/_/rtsa ba bcu khu bre bzhi dang /_/mar bre gang dang ma nu dang /_/zur pa bil ba byi'u rug pa/_/shing kun tsha gsum zho gnyis pa skol/_/blud pa'i rjes la thug pa btung /_/de kun bad kan rlung nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa ba bcu pa sman
[\[227b.3\]]bskol ba'i khu ba bre bzhi ma nu zhes bya ba puSh+kar mU la la sogs pa'i sman zho gnyis lde gur byas pa dang bskol ba'i mar de blud la/_de'i rjes la thug pa 'thungs na de thams cad kyis rlung dang bad kan las gyur ba'i nad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/nir gun thi lo bskol ba'i
[\[227b.4\]]khu/_/mar bskol lud pa 'joms byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nir gun thi ni she phal gyi/_/zhes bya ba ste/_de'i lo ma bskol ba'i sman mar gyis ni lud pa sel bar byed pa yin no/_/byi dang ga yi khu ba'i nang /_/tsha ba gsum bcug mar bskol phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[227b.5\]]byi dang ga bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du tsha ba gsum gyi lde gu bcug pa'i mar gyis kyang lud pa sel bar byed do/_/ba spru ba gnyis bye'u rug pa/_/ka sa marda sle tres dang /_/pa to la dang bri ha ti/_/pha nid dza ka'i khu ba ni/_/'o ma mar dang bcas pa la/_/tsha ba gsum dang legs
[\[227b.6\]]bskol 'thungs/_/lud pa'i rims drag zad byed dang /_/gzhang 'brum nad kyi 'jigs pa med/_/ces bya ba la/_ba spru ba sin ti ka dang /_/bar sha pu shel bya ba rtsa ba dkar po can dang /_me tog dkar po gnyis ni pu na rna ba rnam gnyis te/_de ni ba spru ba gnyis yin te/_
[\[227b.7\]]de gnyis la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du 'o ma dang bcug la pi pi ling dang na le sha ma dang bca' sga gsum gyi lde gu bcug ste bskol ba'i sman mar 'thungs na lud pa la sogs pa'i nad kyi 'jigs pa med do/_de las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kaN+Da ka ri'i rtsa
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]ba dang /_/'bras bu lo mar bcas pa yi/_/khu ba bre bzhi'i tshad la ni/_/mar bre gang dang ba la dang /_/tsha ba gsum dang byi tang ka_/_shu dag dang ni se'u 'bru dang /_/kha ru tsha dang nas tshig thal/_/pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_/skyur ru ra dang ma nu dang /_/bri shi ba dang
[\[228a.2\]]bri ha ti/_/a ru ra dang ya ba ti/_/kru trug tres dang rgun 'bru dang /_/dbyi mo byi tsher bar sha pu/_/star bu kar ka ta sring gi_/tam la gi ga bra'i rtsa/_/ra sna gze ma'i lde gu dang /_/bskol ba'i mar des lud kun dang /_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde la'ang phan/_/kaN+Da ka
[\[228a.3\]]ri'i sman mar 'di/_/bad kan nad ni sel byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gaN+Da ka ri'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang lo mar bcas pa bskol ba'i khu ba bre bzhi'i nang du mar bre gang bcug la/_ba la dang /_tsha ba gsum la sogs pa'i sman lde gu'i tshad kyis spyir mar gyi bzhi cha gcig
[\[228a.4\]]bcug la bskol ba'i sman mar des ni lud pa la sogs pa lnga po kun dang /_skyigs bu lnga dang dbugs mi bde ba lnga po sngar bshad pa la phan pa yin no/_/'dir chu srang nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi nang du mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bcug la/_tsha ba gsum la sogs pa'i lde
[\[228a.5\]]gu mar gyi bzhi cha gzhug par bya'o/_/ma nu ni puSh+ka ra mU la'o/_/bri shi lci ba ni ba sbru ba rtsa ba dkar po can no/_/yang ba ni la la phud do/_/kru trug tres ni tsi tra ka'o/_/dbyi mo ni rtsa ba la bya'o/_/byi tsher ba ni dur la wa pa'o/_/bar sha bu ni ba spru ba me tog dmar po can no/_/
[\[228a.6\]]star bu ni aM la tse ta se'o/_/ta ma la gi ni a dza ta'o/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba ni bar gyi'o/_/gzem ni go k+Sha ra'o/_/bya kri srang brgyad brdungs chu srang /_/nyis stong bzhi bcu brgyad nang bskol/_/btsags par tsha ba gsum ra sna/_/sle tres kru trug phye ma dang /_/kar ka ta sring ga
[\[228a.7\]]bra'i rtsa/_/gla sgang pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/byi tsher ba rnams srang phyed phyed/_/zhun mar srang ni bcu drug dang /_/khar dkar po srang bzhi bcu/_/slar yang de ni bskol bar bya/_/gzar bu la chags bsgrangs na ni/_/pi pi ling dang smig rkang dang /_/sbrang rtsi rnying pa dag las ni/_/
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]srang ni brgyad brgyad gzhug par bya/_/lde gu 'dis ni snying nad skran/_/gzhang 'brum lud dbugs mi bde sel/_zhes bya ba la/_bya kri zhes bya ba kaN+Da ka ri srang brgyad brdungs pa chu srang nyis stong bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi nang du bskol la srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad lus pa ras kyi
[\[228b.2\]]tshags kyis btsags pa tsha ba gsum la sogs pa'i phye ma srang phyed phyed/_zhun mar srang bcu drug bcug la/_de'i 'og tu kha ra dkar po srang bzhi bcu bcug la de yang bskol la gzar bus dkrugs pas na lde gu ste gzar bu la chags par 'gyur ba dang /_pi pi ling srang
[\[228b.3\]]brgyad dang /_smig rkang srang brgyad dang /_sbrang rtsi rnying pa srang brgyad gzhug par bya'o/_/de lta bu'i lde gur sbyar ba 'dis ni snying nad dang skran la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/bad kan zhi ba dud pa brngub/_/shas cher sbyangs pa'i dud pa brngub/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las
[\[228b.4\]]gyur pa'i lud pa la zhi bar bya ba'i dud pa brngub pa'i cho ga'i skabs su bshad pa brngub par bya la/_gang gi tshe bad kan gyi shas che ba de'i tshe sbyangs pa'i dud pa brngub par bya ste/_sbyangs pa zhes bya ba ni bkru sman du bya ba ste/_de yang dud pa brngub pa'i cho ga'i skabs su bstan pa yin
[\[228b.5\]]no/_/ldong ros ba bla shing mngar dang /_/spang spos gla sgang i gu da'i/_/shun lpags du ba lud 'joms pa'i/_/cho gas dud pa brngubs nas ni/_/mchil mang mthar ni bu ram bcas/_/'o ma 'thungs pa'i dud brngubs des/_/rlung dang bad kan shas che ba'i/_/lud
[\[228b.6\]]pa rnying pa'ang myur du sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_ldong ros la sogs pa'i sman sbyar ba'i dud pa lud pa 'joms pa'i cho gar bshad pa'i tshul du dud pa brngubs pa las mchil ma mang po 'byung ba'i mthar yang bu ram dang 'o ma dro 'jam 'thungs na dud pa brngubs pa des ni rlung nad bad
[\[228b.7\]]kan gyi shas che ba'i lud pa rnying pa de yun ring du lon pa yang myur ba nyid du sel bar byed do/_/bad kan lud pa mun zhugs snyam/_/gal te mkhris pa rjes 'brel la/_/der ni gnas skabs ji bzhin du/_/mkhris pa'i lud gso'i sbyor ba bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]gyi lud pa mkhris pa dang rjes su 'brel pas mun par zhugs pa snyam pa de la mkhris pa'i lud pa gso ba'i sbyor ba 'di nyid nas bshad pa dag gnas skabs ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar zhing gtad bar bya'o/_/rlung ni bad kan 'brel ba la/_/bad kan bsal ba'i bya ba bya/_/zhes bya ba
[\[229a.2\]]la/_rlung gi lud pa bad kan dang rjes su 'brel pa las bad kan gyi lud pa bsal ba'i thabs sngar ji skad bshad pa dag bya'o/_/mkhris pa dang 'brel rlung bad kan/_/lud par mkhris pa bsal bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i rlung
[\[229a.3\]]dang bad kan gyi lud pa la ni/_mkhris pa gso ba sngar ji skad smos pa dag bya'o/_/rlung dang bad kan bdag nyid skam/_/gsher la snum dang rtsub chos bya/_/lud pa bad kan las gyur pa/_/mkhris par bcas pa kha bas gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang bad kan gyi bdag
[\[229a.4\]]nyid can gyi lud pa skam zhing bad kan gyi lud pa ljan ljin med pa la snum chos kyi bya ba'i las kyis gsol/_rlung dang bad kan gyi bdag nyid can gyi lud pa gsher zhing ljan ljin dang bcas pa la ni rtsub chos su byas pa'i las kyis gso bar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa
[\[229a.5\]]mkhris pa dang rjes su 'brel pa la ni sman kha ba dang ldan pa sbyor bas gso bar bya'o/_/glo nad 'grams la 'phral du ni/_/rgya skyegs sbrang rtsi'i 'o ma blud/_/zhu nas sA lu'i 'bras chan ni/_/'o mkhar ra bcas pa bza'/_/zhes bya ba la/_glo'i nad 'grams shing rdol bar
[\[229a.6\]]gyur pa 'phral du de nyid kyi tshe byung bar gyur na/_de la rgya skyegs 'o ma dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud par bya ste/_glo 'grams pa 'byor pa ni rgya skyegs gtso bor gyur pa yin la/_rgya skyegs sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma'i sman de zhu bar gyur nas/_sA lu'i 'bras 'o ma dang kha ra dang bcas pa bza'
[\[229a.7\]]bar bya'o/_/rtsib logs chu son bcas te/_/mkhris drod shas chung chang sbyar btung /_/zhes bya ba la/_glo 'grams pa'i rtsib logs dang chu so na ba dang bcas shing mkhris pa dang khong pa'i me drod shas chung ba yin no/_rgya skyegs de chang dang sbyar la btung bar bya'o/_/bshang 'khru gla
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]sgang bong nga dkar/_/pa ta dug mo yungs bcas btung /_/zhes bya ba la/_bshang ba 'khru zhing sla bar gyur pa na skyegs de gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman dang bcas pa'i chu btung bar bya'o/_/rgya skyegs zhun mar sbrang rtsi dang /_/'tsho byed sde tshan kha ra dkar/_/smig rkang kha ra mnyam 'o mar/_/
[\[229b.2\]]bskol ba me drod che la blud/_/ces bya ba la/_rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i sman cha mnyam par byas pa'o/_/mar bskol ba ni khong pa'i me drod che ba'i nad la blud par bya'o/_/'tsho byed kyi sde tshan ni dzi ban ti dang ra mnye ba la sogs pa skyug sman la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi nang du bshad
[\[229b.3\]]pa'o/_/smig rkang ni du k+Shi ra'o/_/bu ram shing dang pad+ma'i tshigs/_/pad+ma ge sar tsan+dan dmar/_/'o mar bskol ba sbrang rtsir bcas/_/glo 'grams 'byor bar bya phyir blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bur ma shing la sogs pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa glo 'grams pa'i rdol ba
[\[229b.4\]]'byor bar byed pa'i phyir blud par bya'o/_/nas rjen phye ni 'o ma ru/_/btsos te mar dang sbyar ba'am/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi 'o ma phye'i/_/skyo ma rims tshad ldan la blud/_/ces bya ba la/_nas rjen pa me la ma brngos pa'i phye 'o mar btsos te thug pa lta bur byas la mar dang kun tu sbyar
[\[229b.5\]]ba ni rims kyi tsha ba dang ldan pa'i glo 'grams pa la sbyin par bya'o/_/yang na kha ra dang sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma phye dang skyo mar byas pa blud par bya'o/_/lud pa can la sman mngar dang /_/bskol ba'i zhun mar blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lud pa zhes bya ba 'dir gnas skabs kyis na
[\[229b.6\]]glo rdol ba'i lud pa can la bya ste/_de la sman mngar ba zhes bya ba rgun 'bru dang shing mngar dang /_ma du ka la sogs pa mngar ba'i sde tshan du bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa'i sman dang bskol ba'i zhun mar blud par bya'o/_/yang na bu ram chu bskol bsgrangs/_/sbrang rtsi na le sham btab
[\[229b.7\]]blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na nad de lta bu la bu ram dang sbyar ba'i chu bskol te bsgrangs pa'i nad sbrang rtsi dang na le sham btab ste blud par bya'o/_/yang na skyu ru ra'i phye ma/_/'o mar bskol ba mar btab blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang glo 'grams ba'i nad lud pa can gyi mi la
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]skyu ru ra'i phye ma 'o mar bskol te mar btab la blud par bya'o/_/yang na bcud kyis len chogs/_/pi pi ling yang sbyin par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na bcud kyis len gyi le'u las bshad pa'i chogs pi pi ling gi sman glo 'grams pa'i lud pa
[\[230a.2\]]can de la sbyin par bya'o/_/lud pa can rus tshigs gzer la/_/rgun 'bru shing mngar ma du ka_/smig rkang ba la pi pi ling /_/zhun mar sbrang rtsir bcas pa sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_glo 'grams pa'i lud pa can kyi mi rus pa dang tshigs gzer ba'i nad dang ldan pa
[\[230a.3\]]la rgun 'bru la sogs pa'i sman zhun mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te lde gur byas la sbyin par bya'o/_/dri sna gsum ni zho re dang /_pi pi ling srang phyed kha ra/_/rgun 'bru 'bra gom du ka_/srang re zhib tu btags nas ni/_/sbrang rtsis ri lu byas pa yis/_/ro tsa byed cing khrag mkhris
[\[230a.4\]]dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde slon bro/_/brgyal myos skyigs bu mgo 'khor dang /_/glo rdol skad ni 'gags pa dang /_/mchil ma lus skem rlung 'khyil dang /_/mchil mar khrag 'byung rtsib logs na/_/snying nad skom dad rims nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_dri
[\[230a.5\]]sna gsum ni shing tsha dang /_/gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang sug smel zhes bya ba ste sman de dag zho re re dang /_pi pi ling srang phyed kha ra dang rgun 'bru ste go sta ni dang /_'bra go ste kha rdzu ra dang /_ma du ka ste bzhi po srang re'i char byas te/_de nas sman thams cad zhib tu btags te sbrang rtsis ri lu
[\[230a.6\]]byas la/_des ro tsa bar byed pa dang /_khrag mkhris la sogs pa'i nad 'joms par byed do/_/bar sha pu dang kha ra dkar/_/sA lu tsa snar btags pa'i phye/_/rgun chu 'o ma mar du bskol/_/mchil ma khrag tu 'byung la blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bar sha pu zhes bya ba ba spru
[\[230a.7\]]ba me tog dmar po can la sogs pa'i sman btags pa'i phye ma rgun chu la sogs pa dang lhan cig bskol ba ni mchil ma khrag tu 'byung ba'i nad pa la blud par bya'o/_/shing mngar dang ni ma du ka_/tan du li yi 'or btsos phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing mngar la sogs
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]pa'i sman btags pa tan du li ya zhes bya ba'i tshod ma'i khyad par gyi sman 'o mar btsos pa'i sman yang mchil ma khrag tu 'byung ba la phan no/_/khrag ni gang tshe drag tu 'byung /_/de bcos pa yi sman bsten bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_glo rdol ba'i nad pa 'di la gang gi tshe khrag drag tu 'byung
[\[230b.2\]]zhing kha dang sna dang mig gi bu ga'am/_bshang sgo la sogs pa nas steng dang 'og tu byung bar gyur na nad de la bcos pa'i thabs steng 'og gang nas 'byung ba'i dbang du byas nas khrag mkhris gso ba'i tshul du sman bsten par bya'o/_/rlung 'khyil pa lar tshil ni/_/chang
[\[230b.3\]]brngos rgyam tshar bcas pa sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_glo rdol pa'i lud pa can gang zhig gi rlung nang du 'khyil zhing lugs bzhin du 'byung bar mi byed de lam log par zhugs pa'i rlung nad stobs can de la ra'i tshil chang la brngos pa rgyam tshar bcas pa sbyin par bya'o/_/skem
[\[230b.4\]]zhing nyam chung glo 'grams dang /_/gnyid chung me drod che ba la/_/'o ma bskol ba'i spris mar chags/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi mar bcas sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa gang skems shing rid pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa la ra'i tshil dang 'o mar bskol ba las steng du spris ma
[\[230b.5\]]mthug por chags pa bshus pa dang kha ra dang sbrang rtsir sbyar te sbyin par bya'o/_/kha ra dkar dang nas dang gro/_/'tsho byed zangs rtsi sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/yang na 'o mar bskol te blud/_/glo 'grams nyam chung rid la sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa gang glo 'grams nyam chung la
[\[230b.6\]]rid par gyur pa la kha ra dkar po la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i 'o ma blud par bya'o/_/sha za'i sha yi khu ba ni/_/mar dang brngos pa'i pi pi ling /_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa de la blud/_/sha dang khrag ni 'phel byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_glo rdol ba'i nad pa skem pa la
[\[230b.7\]]sogs pa dang ldan pa de la zas su sha za ba'i srog chags kyi sha'i khu ba mar dang brngos pa la pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa blud par bya ste/_des ni sha dang khrag la sogs pa 'phel bar byed pa yin no/_/u du m+WAr n+ya gro d+ha/_/a shwad+tha dang p+la ga sha dang /_/
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]sA la'i shing dang pri yang ku/_/ta la'i rtse mo 'dzam bu'i shun/_/pi pi ling dang shug par bcas/_/a shwa kar+Na ra bcas pa ni/_/'o mar bskol ba las byung ba'i/_/mar dang 'bras chan bza' ba ni/_/glo 'grams khu ba nyams stobs dang /_/
[\[231a.2\]]dbang po'i nus pa zad la sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_u dum+WA ra la sogs pa dang bskol ba 'o ma las byung ba'i mar dang sbags te 'bras chan gyi bza' ba glo 'grams pa la sogs pa'i skyes bu la sbyin par bya'o/_/rlung mkhris kyis nyen yan lag zhig_/na la mar des
[\[231a.3\]]bskus pa bsngags/_/rlung nad kyis ni nyen pa la/_/rlung 'joms sman bskol til mar bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis yan lag zhig pa snyam du sems pa'i glo 'grams pa la ni rlung dang mkhris pa sel bar byed pa'i mar des bsku
[\[231a.4\]]ba yin no/_/rlung nad 'ba' zhig gis nyen cing gzir bas yan lag zhig pa ltar na ba la ni rlung nad 'joms pa'i sman dang bskol ba'i til mar gyis bsku bar bya'o/_/'tsho byed sde tshan zhun mar ni/_/snying dang rtsib logs na la blud/_/ces bya ba la/_snying dang rtsib
[\[231a.5\]]logs la sogs pa na ba la ni 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan dang bskol ba'i zhun mar blud par bya'o/_/yang na rlung nad 'joms pa dang /_/khrag mkhris sel ba gang yin bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rlung dang khrag mkhris sel ba'i sman btung ba dang las su bya ba de dag bya'o/_/shing
[\[231a.6\]]mngar nA ga pha la gnyis/_/'o ma dang mnyam mar bskol bar/_/pa ya s+ya dang pi pi ling /_/smig rkang lde gu bskol bas ni/_/glo 'grams pa yi nad la phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing mngar dang nA ga pha la gnyis kyi sman khu mar gyi nyis 'gyur dang /_'o ma de dang
[\[231a.7\]]mnyam ste/_spyir mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du ba ya s+ya la sogs pa'i lde gu mar gyi bzhi cha bcug la bskol ba'i sman mar ni glo 'grams pa'i nad la phan no/_/pa ya s+ya ni k+Shi ri ni zhes bya ba sman 'o ma can zhig go/_/'tsho byed sde tshan bca' sga dang /_nye'u shing pa dang ra
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]mnye ba/_/ba spru ba gnyis pa la dang /_/ga bra'i rtsa ba kha sral phre'u/_/ri di zur pa ka ma la/_/shring ga da ka ka ya s+ya/_/rtsa ba lnga ni chung ngu dang /_/rgun 'bru star ga'i 'bras bu sogs/_/mngar zhing snum la stobs skyed pa/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis btags lde gu/_/
[\[231b.2\]]de nang zhun mar bre gang bskol/_/'o ma ra sha skyu ru ra/_/bi da ri dang bu ram shing /_/khu ba ra sha'i khu bar bcas/_/bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi ni/_/bre phyed kha ra srang lnga bcu/_/na le sham dang sug smel dang /_/shing tsha gan d+ha b+ha dra dang /_/nA ga ge sar srang phyed phyed/_/
[\[231b.3\]]phye mar btags te bcug nas ni/_/'ju stobs rjes mthun tshad du blud/_/'di ni bdud rtsi'i sman mar te/_/mi rnams kyi ni bdud rtsi yin/_/bdud rtsi 'di ni zos nas su/_/'o ma sha khu ldan zos na/_/khu chu nyams dang glo 'grams dang /_/nyams stobs zad pa'i
[\[231b.4\]]gso ba yin/_/bud med la gdu lus skem dang /_/mdog skad nyams la gtang bar bya/_/lud pa dang ni skyigs bu rims/_/dbugs mi bde dang lus tsha dang /_/skom dad khrag mkhris sel byed cing /_/bu skyed byed cing slon dang brgyal/_/mngal nad gcin nad
[\[231b.5\]]'joms byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'tsho byed la sogs pa'i sman zho gnyis gnyis btags pa'i lde gu dang /_mar bre gang ste srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bskol bar bya ste/_'tsho byed kyi sde tshan du gtogs pa/_rtsa ba lnga chung ngu sman sna re re zhing zho gnyis gnyis gzhug
[\[231b.6\]]par bya la/_rgun 'bru la sogs pa'i sman gnyis gzhug par bya'o/_/'o ma dang skyu ru ra la sogs pa'i khu ba ni mar dang cha mnyam du sbyar bar shes par bya ste/_khu ba'i rdzas ni lnga po sogs/_/re re'ang mar dang mnyam par gzhug_/ces bshad pa yin no/_/de lta bu'i
[\[231b.7\]]sman mar bskol ba der sbrang rtsi bre phyed ces bya ba srang bcu drug gzhug par bya'o/_/sha khar ni srang lnga bcu gzhug par bya'o/_/na le sham la sogs pa'i phye ma srang phyed phyed ces pa zho bzhi bzhi gzhug par bya ste/_de dag phye mar zhib tu btags te gzhug par bya'o/_/
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]de bza' ba'i tshad ni 'ju stobs dang rjes su mthun par bya ste/_pho ba'i me drod kyis ji tsam 'ju ba'i tshad du blud par bya'o/_/sman mar 'di'i ming ni bdud rtsi'i sman mar zhes tshe'i rig byed rtsom pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bshad pa yin no/_/sman mar 'di ni
[\[232a.2\]]mi rnams kyi bdud rtsi yin te/_bdud rtsi ltar yon tan chen po skyed pa'i phyir mi'i bdud rtsi'i sman mar zhes bya'o/_/de yang ji ltar lha rnams kyi bdud rtsi lta bu'am/_klu rnams kyi bdud rtsi lta bu nyid yin no/_/de bas na yon tan chen po de lta bu dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi'i sman mar 'di
[\[232a.3\]]zos nas/_de'i rjes 'o ma dang sha khu btung bar bya zhing mar de bza' bar bya'o/_/de ltar me drod ji tsam gyis 'ju ba'i tshad du zos na mi'i khu chu nyams pa la sogs pa'i stobs skyed par byed pa yin pas/_de dag la nyams brta ba'i phyir blud par bya ste/_des ni yon tan de dag
[\[232a.4\]]bskyed pa dang /_de bzhin du lud pa la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed pa yin/_khu ba 'phel bar byed pa nyid kyis na bu skyed par byed cing slon pa la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/gze ma btsod dang pu shel tse/_/ba la tang phal bu ti ka_/_kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dUr ba'i rtsa/_/
[\[232a.5\]]thal tres sti ra pa la sha_/de rnams srang re bskol ba yi/_/'o ma sman khu'i bzhi 'gyur la/_/kha sral phre'u dzi ban ti/_/me da gnyis dang zangs rtsi ba/_/dzi ba ka dang nye'u shing ba/_/ri di rgun 'bru sha kha ra/_/sa ba dang ni pad+ma'i rtsa/_/mar ni bre gang bskol ba yis/_/rlung
[\[232a.6\]]mkhris snying 'dzag gzer nad sel/_/gcin sri ba dang gcin snyi dang /_/gzhang 'brum lud pa lus skem dang /_/zad byed rims ni sel byed cing /_/gzhu 'dren bud med chang dang lam/_/khur dub stobs dang sha zad skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_gze ma la sogs pa'i
[\[232a.7\]]sman khu ba bskol la kha ba srang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du 'o ma sman khu'i bzhi 'gyur bcug la/_kha srel phre'u zhes bya ba sran ad ma kub ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sman mar gyi bzhi cha gzhug par bya'o/_/bu ti ka ni kar+Na'o/_/kr-iSh+Na par+Ni ni bri thag par+Ni'o/_/sti ra ni sa la
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]par+Ni'o/_/gzhan rnams ni go bar zad do/_/shing mngar srang brgyad rgun 'bru ni/_/bre gang bskol bar mar btsos la/_/pi pi ling srang brgyad lde gu/_/bre gang bskol ba bsgrangs nas ni/_/khar sbrang rtsi re re zhing /_/srang brgyad dang ni bsres pa la/_/nas phye mnyam sbyar
[\[232b.2\]]zos pa yis/_/de ni glo 'grams zad byed dang /_/khrag gi skran la phan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/shing mngar srang brgyad dang /_rgun 'bru bre gang bskol ba'i khu bar mar yang bre gang btsos la/_pi pi ling gi lde gu srang brgyad bcug ste/_de bskol nas bsgrangs pa'i nang
[\[232b.3\]]du kha ra dang sbrang rtsi srang brgyad brgyad bcug pa de dang gcig tu byas pa'i mar de dang nas phye cha mnyam par sbyar la/_de zos na glo 'grams shing rdol ba la sogs pa'i nad la phan pa yin no/_/skyu ru ra dang bi da ri/_/bu ram shing khu 'tsho byed kyi/_/sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba mar/_/
[\[232b.4\]]ba dang ra yi 'o ma las/_/bre ni re re btso bar bya/_/bskol btsags kha ra sbrang rtsi ni/_/bre re der ni gzhug par bya/_/de ni zad byed brjed byed dang /_/khrag dang mkhris pa lud pa dang /_/lus skem pa ni sel byed cing /_/rgas sra tshe ni ring ba dang /_/sha dang khu chu stobs skyed
[\[232b.5\]]byed/_/ces bya ba la/_skyu ru ra'i khu ba bre gang /_bi da ri'i khu ba bre gang /_bu ram shing gi khu ba bre gang /_'tsho byed kyi sde tshan kun bskol ba'i khu ba bre gang /_mar bre gang /_ra'i 'o ma bre gang /_ba'i 'o ma bre gang ste/_de ltar bre bdun btsos nas mar tshos bar gyur pa dang /_ras gtsang mas
[\[232b.6\]]btsags te de'i nang du kha ra bre gang dang sbrang rtsi bre gang ste srang sum cu rtsa gnyis der bcug par bya'o/_/sman mar 'di 'thungs na zad byed gcong chen po'i nad dang /_brjed byed dang khrag dang mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad sel zhing 'joms par byed pa dang /_rgas sra zhing lang
[\[232b.7\]]tsho yun ring du 'jog pa dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_sha dang khu chu stobs skyed par byed pa yin no/_/mkhris pa shas ches mar bldag bya/_/rlung shas che bas btung bar bya/_/bldags pas mkhris pa zhi byed kyis/_/nyung bas rlung ni 'joms mi nus/_/'thungs na rlung ni
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]gnon byed cing /_/me drod nang du sdud par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_de ltar na mkhris pa shas che ba la ni mar bldag pa'i tshul gyis bsten par bya la/_rlung shas che bas ni sman mar btung bar bya'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_bldags pas ni mkhris pa zhi bar
[\[233a.2\]]byed kyi/_bldag pa nyung ba de tsam gyis rlung 'joms par ni mi nus la/_des na rlung gi nad la sman mar de dag 'thungs na rlung gnon par byed cing rlung las rgyal bar byed do/_/mar 'di dag grang mor bsten kyang rlung gnon par byed de mthu rtsal gyis gnon par byed do zhes bya ba'i
[\[233a.3\]]don no/_/yang mar 'thungs pas ni bud shing gi me la mar bcug pa ltar pho ba'i me drod nang du sdud par byed cing stobs can du byed do/_/skem zhing lus kyi sha zad pas/_/sman mar bshad pa 'di dag nyid/_/smig rkang 'bras yos pi pi ling /_/phye ma lde gur byas la sbyin/_/
[\[233a.4\]]zhun mar bu ram sbrang rtsi'i cha/_/bcug ste byin la 'o ma blud/_/ro tsa brtson dang lus rgyas stobs/_/'di yis myur du skyed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus skem zhing rid pas sngar bshad pa'i sman mar 'di dag smig rkang la sogs pa'i sman gyi phye ma dang bsres te khu ba zhu
[\[233a.5\]]bar ma gyur par lde gur byas la sbyin no/_/de yang phye mar dang bcas pa'i mar ska ba la/_bu ram dang sbrang rtsi'i cha bcug ste gong gong por byas la byin nas de'i rjes la skom du 'o ma blud par bya'o/_/des ni ro tsa zhing khu ba 'phel ba la sogs pa myur zhing ring por mi thogs par skyed cing
[\[233a.6\]]'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bum sha shun lpags sa bon bsal/_/srang brgyad rlangs par btsos nas ni/_/zhun mar bre gang nang gzhug dkrugs/_/sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'drar gyur pa dang /_/hwags ni srang brgyad pi pi ling /_/bca' sga zir srang gnyis dang /_/dri sna gsum dang 'u
[\[233a.7\]]su dang /_/na le sham ni re re zhing /_/srang ni phyed phyed tshad bcug la/_/phab ste bsgrangs par gyur ba dang /_/sbrang rtsi mar gyi phyed bcug la/_/gzar bus dkrugs te bzhag gyur ba/_/lud pa skyigs bu yi ga 'chus/_/dbugs mi bde dang khrag mkhris dang /_/glo 'grams
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]zad byed 'joms par byed/_/glo 'grams pa ni 'byor byed cing /_/blo dang dran pa stobs rab skyed/_/ku sman da yi bcud kyis len/_/yid du 'ong ba dam pa 'di/_/tha skar bu gnyis kyis bshad yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bum sha ni ku sman da zhes bya ba ste/_de'i phyi'i shun pa
[\[233b.2\]]bshus shing nang gi sa bon bsal ba srang brgyad rlangs par khu ba kha rlangs la tshod ma'i tshul ltar btso bar bya ste/_'og tu chus gang ba'i snod chen po bskol ba'i steng du snod bu ga can la bzhag ste de tshos par byas pa dang /_mar bre gang la'ang snod gcig tu blugs la gzar bus
[\[233b.3\]]dkrugs la de sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra bar gyur pa dang /_hwags srang brgyad dang /_pi pi ling dang bca' sga dang /_zir srang gnyis dang dri sna gsum zhes bya ba ming gi rnam grangs su dri bzangs gsum zhes bya ba shing tsha la sogs pa dang /_'u su dang na le sham bsnan na re re
[\[233b.4\]]zhing srang phyed phyed de zho bzhi bzhi bcug la phab pa bsgrangs par gyur pa dang /_lde gur sbrang rtsi srang bcu drug la gzar bus kun tu dkrugs te/_de'i 'og tu rdza snod gtsang mar bcug ste bzhag par gyur pa de ni bum sha'i bcud kyis len zhes bya ste/_de blud na lud pa la
[\[233b.5\]]sogs pa'i nad 'joms par byed pa dang /_glo 'grams pa 'chos par byed cing 'tsho ba dang blo la sogs pa rab tu skyed par byed pa yin te/_sman mar 'di ni ku sman da zhes bya ba bum sha'i bcud kyis len yin te yid du 'ong zhing snying dga' bar byed pa'i skyon med pa'i dam
[\[233b.6\]]pa 'di ni lha'i sman pa tha skar gyi bu gnyis kyis bshad pa yin no/_/de yang bcud kyis len zhes bya ba'i nges pa'i tshig ni/_dngas ma la sogs bdun thob pa'i/_/thabs gnas yin pas bcud kyis len/_/zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no/_/nA ga ba la'i rtsa ba ni/_/
[\[233b.7\]]zho gcig sogs kyis bskyed srang gcig_/'o mar bcas pa zla gcig btung /_/'o ma spyad cing zas mi bza'/_/sbyor 'dis tshe ni 'phel byed cing /_/stobs skyed kha dog bzang byed mchog_/ces bya ba la/_nA ga ba la'i rtsa ba srang gcig_/dang por zho gcig
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]nas bskyed cing 'o ma dang sbyar te btung bar bya ste/_nyin zhag dang po la zho gcig_/gnyis pa la zho gnyis/_gsum pa la zho gsum/_bzhi pa la zho bzhi/_lnga pa la zho lnga/_drug pa la zho drug_/bdun pa la zho bdun/_brgyad pa la srang gcig btung ste/_de
[\[234a.2\]]yan chad kyi nyin zhag lhag ma nyi shu rtsa gnyis la srang re 'o ma dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/_/de dag gi tshe nad pas 'o ma spyad cing bsten par bya'i/_kha zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o/_/sbyor ba 'di ni nA ga pa la'i rtsa ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya ste/_stobs la sogs pa 'phel
[\[234a.3\]]bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/man du ka par+Ni shing mngar/_/bca' sga'i sbyor ba'ang 'di yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_man du ka par+Ni zhes bya ba sbal pa'i dbyibs 'dra ba'i 'o ma yang yod do/_/de yang nA ga pa la'i rtsa ba dang 'dra bar zho gcig nas rim gyis bskyed pa zla ba
[\[234a.4\]]gcig gi bar du srang gcig 'o ma dang lhan cig btung zhing zas mi bza' ba la sogs pa dang /_de'i yon tan la sogs pa thams cad kyang mthun pa yin no/_/shing mngar dang bca' sga'i sbyor ba yang nA ga pa la'i sbyor ba dang mthun par byar rung ngo /_/nA ga pa la srang brgya
[\[234a.5\]]ni/_/chu srang lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis/_/nang du bskol te bzhi cha lus/_/sman khu de dang cha mnyam pa'i/_/'o ma mar dang bskol bar bya/_/ba la a ti ba la dang /_/shing mngar pur+Na rna ba dang /_/stag tsher ba dang tang pal dang /_/pi la ya dang kha sral phre'u/_/a shwa gan+d+ha
[\[234a.6\]]kha ra dkar/_/nye'u shing me da rnam gnyis dang /_/gze mar mnye ba gnyis dang /_/pa ya s+ya dang zi ra gnyis/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba sdong bu dang /_/'bra go sring ga ta ka dang /_/ke she ru ka srang phyed phyed/_/nA ga pa la'i sman mar 'dis/_/khrag mkhris glo rdol zad byed dang /_/skom
[\[234a.7\]]dad mgo 'khor sel byed cing /_/stobs ni skyed par byed pa'i mchog_/mdog snum mdangs bzang tshe 'phel zhing /_/skra dkar gnyer ma 'jig par byed/_/zla ba gcig gi bar bsten na/_/rgan po'ang gzhon nu nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman nA ga pa la srang brgya
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]chu srang lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis kyi nang du bskol te de'i bzhi cha lus pa dang sman khu de dang cha mnyam pa'i 'o ma dang /_mar srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad bcug la bskol bar bya'o/_/de'i nang du ba la dang /_a ti ba la la sogs pa srang phyed phyed bcug la de bzhin du bskol bar bya'o/_/de lta
[\[234b.2\]]bur bskol ba'i nA ga pa la'i sman mar 'dis ni khrag mkhris la sogs pa sel bar byed pa dang /_stobs skyed pa nas rgas sra ba'i bar gyi yon tan dang ldan pa yin no/_/cho ga 'dis ni drod skyed cing /_/me drod bri ba skyed 'ju byed/_/gcong chen bshad pa'ang glo rdol bsngags/_/
[\[234b.3\]]'khru na gcod par byed par phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshad ma thag pa'i sman mar gyi cho ga'i sbyor ba 'dis ni glo rdol dang zad byed kyi nad kyis btab pa'i stobs bskyed pas me drod skyed par byed cing 'byung ba dang /_pho ba'i me drod 'bri bar byed pa dag drod skyed cing zas 'ju bar
[\[234b.4\]]byed pa yin no/_/gzhan yang gcong chen po gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i sbyor ba de yang glo rdol ba'i nad la bsngags pa yin no/_/gang gi phyir glo rdol ba'i mi de 'khru bar gyur na/_gcod pa'i sbyor ba gang yin pa de byas na bsngags so/_/rtsa ba bcu pa kha sral phre'u/_/
[\[234b.5\]]shang ka puSh+pa zur pa dang /_/ba la hasti pi pi ling /_/a pa marga kru trug tres/_/ga bra pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/ma nu srang ni gnyis gnyis dang /_/nas srang drug cu rtsa bzhi dag_/a ru ra ni srang brgya dag_/chu srang drug brgya bzhi bcus bskol/_/nas tshos pa dang sman khu de/_/
[\[234b.6\]]btsags la a ru ra brgya der/_/bu ram srang brgya bcug la bskol/_/mar dang til mar pi pi ling /_/phye ma srang ni brgyad po dag_/bskol te bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsir gzhug_/rtag tu a ru ra gnyis bcas/_/lde gu bcud len 'di zos na/_/des ni skra dkar gnyer
[\[234b.7\]]ma med/_/tshe ring mdog stobs 'phel bar byed/_/lud lnga zad byed dbugs mi bde/_/skyigs bur bcas pa'i mi bzad rims/_/gcin snyi ba yi nad dang ni/_/gzhang 'brum skran dang snying nad dang /_/cham pa yi ga 'chus pa sel/_/bcud kyis len mchog dpal yon
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]can/_/'di ni drang srong ri byis bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_sman rtsa ba bcu pa la sogs pa'i sman sna re re zhing srang gnyis gnyis dang nas srang drug cu rtsa gnyis te bre do'o/_/a ru ra srang brgya ste 'di dag chu srang drug brgya bzhi bcu'i nang du bskol la legs par
[\[235a.2\]]tshos par gyur pa dang sman khu de btsags la a ru ra srang brgya bcug la der bu ram srang brgya bcug la mar la sogs pa las srang brgyad brgyad bcug la/_pi pi ling ni skam po yin pa'i phyir srang bzhi gzhug par bya ste/_de yang gzhung las/_/phul gang las ni gsher
[\[235a.3\]]ba'i rdzas/_/nyis 'gyur du ni gzhug par bya/_/zhes smos pa yin no/_/de ltar bskol ba de bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi srang brgyad brgyad bcug la/_lde gu de las a ru ra gnyis gnyis rtag tu zos na/_des skra dkar dang gnyer ma med par byed pa dang /_tshe dang stobs la
[\[235a.4\]]sogs pa 'phel bar byed pa dang /_sngar bshad pa'i lud pa lnga po 'joms par byed pa yin te/_bcud kyis len 'di ni dpal yon dang bcas shing bkra shis pa yin la/_'di ni drang srong ri byi zhes bya a ga stas bshad pa yin no/_/rtsa ba bcu ba ba la dang /_mur
[\[235a.5\]]ba ser po rnam gnyis dang /_/pi pi ling ni rnam gnyis dang /_/pa tha a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_/a pa marga kha sral phre'u/_/sle tres dan ti bong nga dkar/_/bil ba gzhon nu dur byid dang /_/tsi tra ka rtsa lo mar bcas/_/pa ya s+ya dang dug mo yungs/_/spang spos bi za ka'i snying po/_/
[\[235a.6\]]me tog bcas dang rkang mar dang /_/go bye byi dang ga ta dang /_/nye'u shing bu ti ka rany+dza/_/dong ga so ma ra dza dang /_/sa ha ra dza shi kru dang /_/nim pa'i shun lpags bu ram shing /_/phra mo'i khu ba srang re dang /_/a ru ra stong chig brgya dang /_/nas srang nyis brgya lnga bcu drug_/chu ni
[\[235a.7\]]brgyad 'gyur nang du bskol/_/nas tshos pa dang phog nas ni/_/btsags nas a ru ra bcas der/_/bu ram rnying pa srang brgya gzhug_/til mar zhun mar skyu ru ra'i khu/_/bre re bcug nas de rjes yang /_/me chung la ni btsos nas su/_/gzar bur chags nas thab las
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]dbab/_/bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi bre do dang /_/pi pi ling ni phul gang gzhug_/dri sna gsum ni phyer btags pa/_/srang gsum bcug nas de 'og tu/_/rdza snod rnying bcug 'bru nang du/_/bcu ga ste zla ba gcig gzhag bya/_/de nas snga ma bzhin du bza'/_/gnas 'jog gis
[\[235b.2\]]bshad bcud len 'di/_/sngon las yon tan lhag par che/_/nad med kyis bza' dgag pa med/_/dus kun tu yang bsngags pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa ba bcu la sogs pa sman sna re srang rer bya'o/_/ser po gnyis ni yung ba dang /_skyer pa'o/_/pi pi ling gnyis ni
[\[235b.3\]]pi pi ling dang ha sti pi pi ling ngo /_/kha sral phre'u ni ad ma kub ta'o/_/bil ba gzhon nu ni bil ba smin pa chung ngu'o/_/tsi tra ka ni tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba dang lo ma gnyis so/_/pa ya s+ya ni k+Shi ri ni'o/_/dug mo yungs kyi shun lpags la bya'o/_/pi za ka ni a sha na ste de'i ni snying po
[\[235b.4\]]dang me tog gzhug go/_/byi dang ga ta ni blugs gzar gyi shing ngo /_/so ma ra dza ni tsan tra re kha'o/_/bu ram shing phra mo ni rtsa lta bu'i bu ram shing ste sman de dag srang re dang a ru ra stong chig brgya nas srang nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug ste bre brgyad po de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus
[\[235b.5\]]nas sman dang nas kyi bar srang ji tsam yod pa de'i brgyad 'gyur gyi chu'i nang du bskol nas tshos par gyur pa dang phog nas ras gtsang mas khu ba btsags te a ru ra dang bcas pa'i khu ba der bu ram rnying pa srang brgya bcug la til mar dang zhun mar dang skyu ru ra'i khu ba bre re re bcug la/_de'i
[\[235b.6\]]rjes la slar yang me chung ngu la btsos nas dkrug cing bskol ba na gzar bur chags par gyur na lde gu de thab las dbab la/_de bsgrangs nas grang bar gyur pa dang /_sbrang rtsi bre do ste srang drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhug la pi pi ling phul gang ste srang bzhi gzhug par bya ste/_shing tsha
[\[235b.7\]]dang sug smel dang gan d+ha b+ha dra zhes bya ba dri sna gsum phye mar btags pa srang gsum gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas de'i 'og tu lde gu rdza ma'i snod rnying pa gtsang ma'i nang du bcug la 'bru'i nang du bcug nas zla ba gcig gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas snga ma bzhin du ste drang srong ri byis
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]bshad pa'i lde gu'i tshul ltar bza' zhing a ru ra gnyis gnyis dang bcas par rtag tu bza' bar bya ste bcud kyis len 'di ni drang srong chen po gnas 'jog gis bshad pa yin te/_snga ma las yon tan lhag par che ste/_drang srong ri byis bshad pa'i bcud kyis len
[\[236a.2\]]pas kyang 'di yon tan ches che ba yin no/_/gzhan yang nad med pa dag gis kyang bza' ba dang spyod lam bsrung ba la sogs pa dgag pa med pa dang /_dus tshigs drug char kun tu yang /_/bza' bar bsngags shing yon tan che ba yin no/_/rgyam tsha bca' sga srang re dang /_/
[\[236a.3\]]kha ru tsha ni srang gnyis dang /_/da trig se'u 'bru ardza ka_/de dag srang ni bzhi bzhi dang /_/na le sham gcig go snyod gnyis/_/'u su'i 'bras bu srang bzhi dang /_/tshad 'di las ni phye mar byas/_/zas dang skom la btab ste sbyin/_/des ni yi ga 'byed pa dang /_/me drod
[\[236a.4\]]skyed cing nyams stobs skyed/_/rtsib logs na dang dbugs mi bde/_/lud pa lu ba'i nad sel byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rgyam tsha dang bca' sga srang re/_kha ru tsha srang gnyis/_da trig la sogs pa srang bzhi bzhi phul re/_na le sham srang gcig_/go snyod srang gnyis/_'u su'i
[\[236a.5\]]'bras bu srang bzhi ste/_'di dag gcig tu bsres la phye mar btags te/_phye ma de las nad pa lus zungs dang me drod la sogs pa'i tshul las dpags te nad pa la nyin re zhing sbyin par bya ste/_phye ma des ni yi ga 'byed cing len pa dang drod skyed pa dang /_nyams stobs dang ldan
[\[236a.6\]]par byed pa dang /_rtsib logs na ba la sogs pa sel bar byed pa nyid yin no/_/'u su zho gnyis go snyod dang /_/la la phud la zho bzhi bzhi/_/se'u 'bru dang ni da trig dag_/de yi nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bya/_/kha ru tsha ni srang gcig dang /_/bca' sga zho gnyis bil ba'i rkang /_/
[\[236a.7\]]srang lnga dang ni sbyar ba la/_/kha ra srang ni bcu drug gzhug_/ro drug pa 'di bza' ba dang /_/btung ba snga ma bzhin du sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'u su'i 'bras bu zho gnyis go snyod dang la la phud zho bzhi bzhi ste/_se'u 'bru dang /_da trig la nyis 'gyur te/_de go snyod dang la la phud
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]las se'u 'bru dang da trig nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur byas te se'u 'bru nyis 'gyur dang da trig nyis 'gyur du byas te/_de ltar na se'u 'bru srang bcu drug_/da trig srang bcu drug kha ru tsha la srang gcig_/bil ba'i rkang la srang lnga gzhug bar bya ste/_de phye mar btags pa dang /_
[\[236b.2\]]kha ra srang bcu drug gzhug par bya'o/_/ro drug pa'i phye ma 'di ni snga ma bzhin du bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'i nang du byin na yon tan snga ma dang 'dra ba yin no/_/gcong chen las bshad cho ga gang /_/gnas skabs ji bzhin glo rdol phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen
[\[236b.3\]]po'i skabs su bshad pa'i cho ga glo gcong chen po zad byed kyi gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i cho ga gang yin pa yang skabs ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar na glo rdol ba'i nad la phan pa yin no/_/glo rdol nad ni byung gyur nas/_/bad kan skyes nas mgo bo brang /_/na ba'i lud pa
[\[236b.4\]]can gang yin/_/de la dud pa 'di brngub bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i brta ba'i cho gas glo rdol ba'i nad byang zhing bral bar gyur ba na/_brtas pa nyid kyis bad kan 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur na des lud pa skyes shing mgo bo dang brang na ba'i lud pa can gang
[\[236b.5\]]yin pa de la ni/_gnas skabs las bab pa las mi 'da' bar dud pa 'di brngub cing bdug pa'i cho ga bya'o/_/me da gnyis dang pa la dang /_/shing mngar sro ma'i shun lpags ni/_/lde gur byas la reng bu ni/_/byas te dud pa brngub par bya/_/rjes la 'tsho byed sman mar
[\[236b.6\]]btung /_/zhes bya ba la/_me da rnam gnyis la sogs pa'i sman mar chu btags su byas pa lde gu sro ma'i shun lpags sam sro dar dang bsres te reng bur byas la/_dud pa brngub par bya'o/_/de'i rjes la btung ba ni 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan dang sbyar ba'i sman btung bar bya'o/_/ldong
[\[236b.7\]]ros dang ni pa la sha_/a za gan+d+ha cu gang dang /_/dong ga las kyang de bzhin byas/_/de rjes kha ra bu ram dang /_/bu ram shing khu btung bar blud/_/ces bya ba la/_ldong ros la sogs pa'i lde gu yang de bzhin du sro ma dang bsres te reng bur byas la dud pa brngub par byas la/_
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]der btung ba ni kha ra'i chu dang /_bu ram shing gi khu ba'i chu blud par bya'o/_/ldong ros dang ni n+ya gro d+ha'i/_/myu gu rlon pa cha mnyam btags/_/zhun mar dang sbyar dud pa brngub/_/de 'og sreg pa'i sha khu btung /_/zhes bya ba la/_ldong ros dang n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu rlon
[\[237a.2\]]pa dang cha mnyam par byas pa zhib tu btags la/_zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i dud pa brngub par bya la/_dud pa brngub pa de'i rjes la ni sreg pa'i sha khu btung bar bya'o/_/glo rdol las byung lud pa la/_/thog mar stobs dang me drod skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_glo rdol ba las byung ba'i
[\[237a.3\]]lud pa la ni thog ma kho nar stobs skyed cing nyams brta ba'i sman bya zhing de bzhin du pho ba'i me drod skyed pa'i cho ga bya'o/_/nad gzhi mang la snum bcas pa'i/_/bkru sman 'jam po gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lud pa can gang nad gzhi mang zhing shas che ba yin na snum dang
[\[237a.4\]]bcas pa'i bkru sman 'jam po gtang bar bya'o/_/dong ga dang ni dur byid gnyis/_/rgun 'bru'i chu dang sbyar ba dang /_/seng phrom bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_/bi da ri yi khu bar sbyar/_/zhun mar la btsos ci rigs sbyin/_/lus zad pa la sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bkru sman
[\[237a.5\]]de yang dong ga la sogs pa'i sman zhun mar gyi nang du sman mar gyi sbyor bas btsos pa'i bkru sman de lus zad cing nyam chung ba la sbyang ba'i don du blud par bya'o/_/mkhris pa bad kan lus zungs rnams/_/zad pa'i zad byed lud pa can/_/mar dang kar ka ta sring gi_/'o ma ba
[\[237a.6\]]la gnyis bskol blud/_/ces bya ba la/_glo rdol zad byed kyi lud pa can nad skyed par byed pa'i mkhris pa yang zad/_bad kan yang zad/_dwangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams kyang zad par gyur pa la kar ka ta sring gi dang /_ba la rnam gnyis dang btsos pa'i 'o
[\[237a.7\]]ma'i bzhi 'gyur dang bskol ba blud par bya'o/_/bi da ri'am ka dam pa/_/ta la'i 'bras bu dang bskol ba'i/_/mar dang 'o ma gcin nad ni/_/mdog gyur sri bar byed la blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bi da ri la sogs pa'i sman dang bskol ba'i mar gcin nad mdog gyur cing
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]sdug par snang ba dang /_gcin sri bar byed pa la sbyin par bya'o/_/pho mtshan rkub dang chu so dang /_/brla dbrag mjug to skrang zhing na/_/mar gyi snying po yang ba 'am/_/til mar bsres pa'i 'jam rtsi gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_pho mtshan la sogs pa skrang zhing na ba dang ldan pa
[\[237b.2\]]la mar gyi snying po yang bar gyur pa'am/_yang na mar dang til mar bsres pa'i 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya'o/_/skam sa'i srog chags sha dang ni/_/byi'u sogs dang ni khung na gnas/_/de bzhin mthu rtsal gyis zas tshol/_/sha za'i sha yang rim bzhin sbyin/_/zhes bya ba
[\[237b.3\]]la/_'jam rtsi btang ba'i rjes la skam sa'i phyogs na gnas pa'i srog chags sha bkra dang dgo ba la sogs pa'i sha bza' zhing /_de nas rim bzhin byi'u la sogs pa bza' bar byas la/_de'i 'og tu khung na gnas pa ste phyi ba dang go da la sogs pa'i sha bza' bar
[\[237b.4\]]bya zhing /_de nas rim gyis mthu rtsal gyis bza' ba tshol ba stag dang khra la sogs pa srog chags gzhan gyi sha za ba'i sha dag rim bzhin du sbyin par bya'o/_/dro bas bad kan 'jig byed la/_/rtsa sbubs rnams ni dag byed cing /_/dwangs ma legs par rgyu byed pas/_/lus
[\[237b.5\]]ni rgyas par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_byi'u'i sha la sogs pa de dag ni dro bas bad kan gyi tshogs rtsa sbubs kyi nang nas 'dzag cing rgyu bar byed la/_de nas rtsa sbubs 'gags par byed pa'i bad kan sbyangs pas dag par byed pa yin la/_lus kyi bcud kyang lus kyi
[\[237b.6\]]bcud kyi dwangs ma legs par rgyu zhing bde bar 'gro bar byed pas/_lus rgyas par byed pa yin te/_lus sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid ni gzhung gzhan dag las bshad de/_rtsa sbubs nad kyis bkag ba rnams/_/rno bas sbyong zhing dag par bshad/_/ces 'byung ba yin no/_/
[\[237b.7\]]dbyi mo bar gyi 'bras bu gsum/_/rtsa ba bcu dang tsi tra ka_/rgya sran pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/pa ta rgya shug nas chur bskol/_/li dong gra dang byi tsher ba/_/zur pa ma nu pi pi ling /_/kar ka ta yi sring gi btags/_/mnyam pa'i zhun mar dag dang bskol/_/bskol ba'i mar
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]'di k+Sha ra gnyis/_/lan tshwa lnga ni btags te gzhug_/de las ran par 'thungs na ni/_/zad byed lud pas nyen pa sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_dbyi mo la sogs pa'i sman chur bskol ba dang /_li dong gra la sogs pa cha mnyam par btags pa'i lde gu dang mar
[\[238a.2\]]bskol la/_bskol ba'i mar 'dir k+Sha ra gnyis zhes bya ba ya bak+Sha ra dang /_swardzi ka k+Sha ra gnyis dang /_de bzhin du lan tsha lnga zhes bya ba lce myang tsha dang /_kha ru tsha bi da dang /_rtsal ru tsha dang rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa dang /_nad kyi tshul las dpags te ci rigs par bcug nas tshad ran par
[\[238a.3\]]'thungs na zad byed las gyur pa'i lud pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/ka sa mar da a ru ra/_/gla sgang pa ta kad pa la/_/dong gra pi pi ling tang pal/_/pu tse shel tshad zho gnyis gnyis/_/mar ni bre gang 'o ma dang /_/rgun chu bre bzhi'i nang du bskol/_/zad byed rims dang mchin pa'i
[\[238a.4\]]nad/_/lud pa kun sel dge ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ka sa mar da la sogs pa'i sman zho gnyis gnyis kyi tshad du byas pa mar bre gang dang /_'o ma dang rgun chu bsres pa bre bzhi'i nang du bskol ba'i mar des ni zad byed la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed pa dang /_dge zhing
[\[238a.5\]]dpal skyed par byed pa yin no/_/kaN+Da ka ri ba sha ka_/sle tres rtsa ba 'bras bu dang /_/myu gu lo mar bcas pa rnams/_/bskol ba'i khu ba mar du btsos/_/lud pa'i rims kyis btab pa dang /_/yi ga 'chus pa'i nad rnams sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_kaN+Da ka ri la
[\[238a.6\]]sogs pa sman sna re re'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang myu gu dang lo mar bcas pa bskol ba'i khu ba sman mar bskol ba'i tshad kyi mar dang bskol ba ni lud pa dang /_rims la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/se'u 'bru'i khu ba nyis 'gyur ram/_/tsha gsum ldan par bskol ba'ang
[\[238a.7\]]phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_se'u 'bru'i khu ba bskol ba tsha ba gsum dang ldan par bskol ba yang lud pa dang rims dang yi ga 'chus pa sel bar byed do/_/ya bak+Sha ra mar dang sbyar/_/zas zos pa yi 'og tu blud/_/ces bya ba la/_ya bak+Sha ra dang sbyar ba'i mar de
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]zan zos pa'i 'og tu blud na yang lud pa la phan no/_/pi pi ling dang bu ram bskol/_/ra yi 'o ma mar bcas phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_pi pi ling dang bu ram gnyis lde gur byas pa ra'i 'o ma dang mar bzhi 'gyur bskol ba blud na yang phan no/_/'di ni me drod sbyang phyir ro/_/
[\[238b.2\]]zad byed lus can gyis mar btung /_/nad kyis 'gags pa'i mid pa brang /_/rtsa sbubs rnams ni dag par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sngar bshad pa'i sman la sogs pa 'di dag dang bskol ba'i sman mar zad byed kyi lud pa can gyi nad pas 'thungs na me drod 'phel zhing rgyas par
[\[238b.3\]]'gyur la nad kyis 'gags shing gos pa'i brang dang /_lkog ma'i nang rtsa sbubs dag cing sbyong bar byed pa yin no/_/nas ni bre gang btsos pa ru/_/rnam par rgyal ba nyi shu btso/_/tshos nas de phyung mnyes nas der/_/bu ram rnying pa srang drug dang /_/pi pi ling ni srang gnyis dang /_/
[\[238b.4\]]ldong ros zho gnyis skyer khaN+Da/_/zho gcig tshad ni bcug nas ni/_/slar yang bskol ba'i lde gu des/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde sel byed/_/ces bya ba la/_nas bre gang bsal ba btsos pa'i nang du a ru ra rnam par rgyal ba rdog ma nyi shu bcug ste btsos la/_de tshos
[\[238b.5\]]shing bangs par gyur pa dang /_khu ba de'i nang du mnyes nas yang bskol bar bya ste/_'di'i nang du bu ram rnying pa srang drug_/pi pi ling srang gnyis/_ldong ros zho gnyis skyer khaN+Da zho gcig bcug la lde gu'i tshul du bskol bar bya'o/_/lde gu des ni lud pa la sogs pa'i nad
[\[238b.6\]]sel bar byed do/_/reg 'jam sgro rtsa bsregs nas ni/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar/_/yang na rma bya'i rkang pa bsregs/_/mar dang sbrang rtsir bsres pa yi/_/lde gu zos na lud pa dang /_/dbugs mi bde ba sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bya rog sha bi da zhes bya ba sgro
[\[238b.7\]]rtsa kham 'dra ba yod de/_de bsregs nas mar ngang kha ra sbrang dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na lud pa la sogs pa'i nad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/yang rma bya'i rkang pa bsregs te mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na yang lud pa la sogs pa'i nad sel to/_/e raN+Da yi
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]thal ba ni/_/til mar tsha gsum bu ram bcas/_/lde gu'am bye'u rug e raN+Da'i/_/lo ma'i thal ba de bzhin bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_e raN+Da'i lo ma'i thal ba til mar dang tsha ba gsum dang bu ram dang sbyar ba'i lde gu gcong chen po'i lud pa dang ldan pas bldag
[\[239a.2\]]par bya'o/_/yang na bye'u rug pa dang /_e raN+Da bsregs pa'i thal ba dag snga ma bzhin du tsha ba gsum dang til mar dang bu ram dang sbyar te lde gur byas la bldag par bya'o/_/tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma ni/_/bu ram rnying pa mar sbyar phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_pi pi ling dang na le sham
[\[239a.3\]]dang bca' sga gsum gyi phye ma bu ram rnying pa dang zhun mar lde gur byas te bza' bar bya'o/_/shug pa tsha gsum 'bras bu gsum/_/byi dang ga dang thang shing dang /_/ba la ra sna'i phye ma kun/_/de dang mnyam pa'i kha rar sbyar/_/yang na sbrang rtsi mar dang sbyar/_/lde gu lud pa
[\[239a.4\]]sel byed mchog_/ces bya ba la/_shug pa la sogs pa'i sman mar lus dang cha mnyam pa'i kha ra sbyar la zos na yang lud pa la phan no/_/yang na sbrang rtsi dang zhun mar cha mnyam du sbyar te lde gu zos pa yang lud pa sel ba'i mchog yin no/_/de bzhin na le sham gyi phye/_/
[\[239a.5\]]mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas/_/zhes bya ba la/_na le sham gyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang kha ra dang lhan cig zos pa yang lud pa sel ba'i mchog yin no/_/a ru ra dang bca' sga ni/_/bu ram dang ni bcas pa yi/_/ri lu khar ni bzhag gyur na/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde kun
[\[239a.6\]]sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na a ru ra la sogs pa'i sman bskol te ri lur byas la kha'i nang du bzhag na/_lud pa lnga po thams cad dang /_dbugs mi bde ba lnga po kun sel bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/yang na ba ru ra 'ba' zhig_/lud pa sel bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[239a.7\]]yang na ba ru ra 'ba' zhig khar bzhag cing mur na yang lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba thams cad sel bar byed do/_/seng phrom a mra kha ra dang /_/bcas pa'i lde gu mar dang brngos/_/thug pa zan dron nang du btab/_/slon bro skom dad lud pa dang /_ma zhu tshad 'khru sel bar byed/_/
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]ces bya ba la/_seng phrom gyi lo ma lde gur sbyar ba mar la brngos la khar dang bcas pa thug par byas pa'am/_yang na zan dron nam khur ba dang bsres pa'i nang du sman gong ma mar dang bcas pa zos na slon bro ba la sogs pa'i nad kun sel bar byed do/_/kaN+Da ka ri'i khu ba bskol/_/mung+ga'i khu bar
[\[239b.2\]]legs g.yos pa/_/skyu ru ra ser se'u 'brur bcas/_/lud pa kun gyi sman gyur yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_kaN+Da ka ri'i rang gi khu ba mung+ga'i khu bar bcug ste/_g.yos la skyu ru ra ser po dang se'u 'bru dang bcas pa btab ste sge 'u gsher dang bca' sga dang mar la sogs pa bcug
[\[239b.3\]]nas legs par g.yos su byas pa de ni lud pa kun gyi sman du 'gyur ba yin no/_/rlung 'joms sman bskol 'o ma 'am/_/mchu yis bzas tshol khron rko dang /_/khung na gnas pa'i sha khu ni/_/zad byed lud pa can la sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_zad byed kyi nad kyis btab pa'i
[\[239b.4\]]mi la rlung 'joms pa'i sman dang bskol ba'i 'o ma'am/_yu sha khu ba blud par bya ba'am/_yang na sha khu mchus bzas tshol ba'i sha las byas pa'am/_khron rko ba'i rigs kyi sha'am khung na gnas pa'i sha las g.yos pa'i sha khu sbyin par bya'o/_/glo rdol gyi dud
[\[239b.5\]]brngubs la gang /_/btung bar bcas pa bsten pa yang /_/zad byed lud par de gtang bya/_/gang yang gcong chen skabs su bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_glo rdol gyi lud pa'i nad gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i dud pa brngub pa dang bcas par gong du bstan pa gang dag yin pa de
[\[239b.6\]]yang zad byed kyi lud pa can la sbyin par bya'o/_/gang yang 'og nas gcong chen po gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i sbyor ba gang yin pa de yang sbyin par bya'o/_/stobs skyed me drod skyed pa dang /_/rtsa rgyun sbyong bar byed pa'i sman/_/rnam grangs zad byed lud can la/_/stobs
[\[239b.7\]]skyed thams cad bsngags pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_zad byed kyi lud pa can gyi nad pa la ni brta zhing stobs skyed pa'i sman gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin du gang pho ba'i me drod skyed pa'i sman dang rtsa rgyun dang bu ga'i sbubs sbyong bar byed pa'i sman de dag rnam grangs kyis byin na
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]yang zad byed kyi lud pa sel bar byed do/_/de bzhin du stobs skyed par byed pa'i sman thams cad kyang zad byed kyi lud pa la bsngags pa yin no/_/gang phyir 'dus pa las byung ba'i/_/zad byed lud pa mi bzad pas/_/de phyir nad stobs ji bzhin du/_/
[\[240a.2\]]'dus pa'i nad la phan pas gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyu gang gi phyir 'dus pa'i nad las byung ba'i zad byed kyi lud pa mi bzad cing brnag par dka' la sdug bsngal ba yin pas de'i phyir nad kyi stobs ji lta ba la ltos la/_rlung gi shas che ba'am/_mkhris pa'i shas che
[\[240a.3\]]ba'am/_bad kan gyi shas che ba'i 'dus pa'i nad la phan pa'i kha zas dang skom dang sman dang spyod lam phan pas gso bar bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_
[\[240a.4\]]gso ba'i gnas le'u gsum pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi'i gnas skabs su bshad pa'i go rims kyi rnam pas skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde
[\[240a.5\]]ba'i le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/gang phyir skyigs bu dbugs mi bde/_/rgyu sogs mtshungs pas de yi phyir/_/gso ba'ang gcig ste/_zhes bya ba la/_rgyu gang gi phyir skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba ni rgyu la sogs pa mtshungs pa yin te/_sngon du byung ba'i tshul dang
[\[240a.6\]]grangs dang rang bzhin dang rten gcig nyid yin pas/_de'i phyir skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba gso ba yang gcig tu bstan cing bshad pa yin no/_/des nyen la/_thog mar dugs kyi nyer spyad bya/_/snum dang lan tshwa til mar byug_/ces bya ba la/_skyigs bu dang
[\[240a.7\]]dbugs mi bde ba'i nad des nyen cing gzir ba thog mar te/_gso ba thams cad kyi nang nas dang po kho nar dugs nye bar spyad pas gso bar bya la dugs de yang snum pa ste/_snum gyi sman la sbyar ba'i dugs bya'i/_rtsub pas ni ma yin te/_rtsub pas ni rlung 'khrugs pa'i
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]skyon yod pa'i phyir ro/_/snum de yang phal cher rgyam tsha la sogs pa'i lan tshwa dang til mar sbyar bas byug cing bsku bar bya'o/_/de yis bad kan bu gar 'gags/_/shin tu zhen pa zhu nas ni/_/khong par gnas pa legs par 'byin/_/bu ga'i rgyun srang mnyen
[\[240b.2\]]gyur zhing /_/rlung ni lugs dang mthun par rgyu/_/zhes bya ba la/_dugs des ci zhig byed ce na/_bu ga'i sbubs rnams su shin tu zhen cing 'gags pa'i bad kan legs par zhu zhing lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba de'i khong par gnas pa legs par 'byin cing bde blag tu
[\[240b.3\]]thon par 'gyur la/_de bzhin du bu ga'i rgyun srang shin tu sra zhing bad kan nang du zhen pa dang /_rlung 'khrugs pa'i dbang gis rtsa sbubs shin tu sra bar gyur pa dag dugs kyis sbyangs na mnyen pa nyid du byed do/_/de bzhin du rlung lugs dang mi mthun par rgyu zhing rang gi lam las rgyu
[\[240b.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam zhing rlan gyur zas snum dang /_/rlan can shar bcas sbyin pa'am/_/yang na zho yi spris ma sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa dugs kyis lus rlan cing 'jam par gyur pa la kha zas snum bag dang rlan can gyi srog chags kyi sha dang bcas pa sbyin par bya
[\[240b.5\]]ba'am/_yang na zho'i spris ma dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas de la slon 'jam btang /_/mchog tu lud pa rnying nad dang /_/skad 'gags pa la skyug sman sbyin/_/rgyam tsha sbrang rtsi pi pi ling /_/sbyar ba'am rlung la phan pa gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas zhes bya ba dugs
[\[240b.6\]]byas pa'i rjes la skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde bas nyen pa'i nad pa de la slon sman 'jam po gtang bar bya la/_mchog khyad par du ni lud pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa la skyug sman gtang bar bya'o/_/skyug sman de yang rgyam tsha la sogs pa dang ldan pa'am/_gang
[\[240b.7\]]rlung la phan zhing gnod pa med pa de lta bu'i skyug sman gtang bar bya'o/_/bad kan gyis ni gnod byas pa/_/bsal na bde ba 'thob 'gyur la/_/bu ga rnam par dag gyur nas/_/rlung ni gnod pa med par rgyu/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi gnod pa dang bcas pa bsal
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]zhing sbyangs na mi de bde ba 'thob cing /_skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba zhi bar 'gyur la/_yang bad kan gyis gnod cing bkag par byas pa'i bu ga rnams dag cing sbyangs par gyur pas rlung gnod pa med par rgyu ste sus kyang gags byas pa med par bde
[\[241a.2\]]bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing /_srog gnas pa'i rgyun srang dag tu legs par 'gyur ro/_/lto sbos rtug 'gags mun 'thibs byed/_/ma du lung ga star bu dang /_/shing kun pi lu kha ru tsha/_/ldan zas sbyin na bde bar 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_lto sbos pa dang gnas skabs
[\[241a.3\]]der rtug pa 'gags pa las mun 'thibs zhes byed cing mun sros pa snyam du sems pa'i dbugs mi bde ba byung bar gyur na ma du lung ga zhes bya ba/_ba lu dang star bu la sogs pa'i sman dang ldan pa'i zas byin na dbugs bde bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyam tshar bcas pa'i 'bras
[\[241a.4\]]bu skyur/_/cung zad dro ba'i bkru sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na lto sbos pa dang /_rtug pa 'gags pa las byung ba'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad mun 'thibs zhes byed pa rgyam tsha dang 'bras bu skyur po ma du lung ga la sogs pa dang sbyar ba cung zad bsros te
[\[241a.5\]]dro 'jam tsam du byas pa'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/_/'di dag bad kan gyis lam bkag_/srog gi rlung ni 'khrugs las byung /_/de bas de lam bsal bya'i phyir/_/steng dang 'og tu sbyang byas phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba 'di dag
[\[241a.6\]]ni bad kan gyis rgyu ba'i lam bkag pa'i srog ces bya ba'i rlung de 'khrugs par gyur pa las 'byung ba yin la/_de bas srog ces bya ba'i rlung de'i lam bsal zhing dag par bya ba'i phyir steng dang 'og tu sbyang ba'i thabs skyug sman btang na phan no/_/ji ltar 'bab par gyur
[\[241a.7\]]pa'i chu/_/shin tu 'khyil zhing 'phel ba ltar/_/de bzhin rlung ni 'khyil gyur pa'i/_/de lam legs par sbyang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dper na ji ltar chu 'bab par gyur pa dag rgyu ba'i rgyun lam bkag par gyur pa na shin tu 'phel zhing mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]'dra ba de bzhin du rang bzhin gyis rgyu ba'i rlung de'i rgyu ba'i lam 'gags shing bde blag tu 'gro ba'i go skabs ma thob na shin tu 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na rlung de'i rgyu ba'i lam slon dang khrus kyis sbyang bar bya ste/_lam bsal na phan par 'gyur ro/_/sbyang ba byas
[\[241b.2\]]kyang ma dag pa'i/_/zhen pa'i dri ma du bas bsal/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar sbyang ba'i rnam pa byas su zin kyang lud pa dang dbugs mi bde bas nyen pa'i bad kan gyi nad kyi dri ma dag cing shin tu zhen pa'i nyes pa lhag ma yod pa gang yin pa de ni du ba brngub pa'i thabs kyis
[\[241b.3\]]bsal bar bya'o/_/yung ba'i lo ma e raN+Da'i/_/rtsa ba rgya skyegs ldong ros dang /_/thang shing ba la spang spos bcas/_/btags te reng bu nyid du bya/_/de ni mar bskus dud pa brngub/_/yang na mar sbrus nas bsregs brngub/_/ces bya ba la/_yung ba'i lo ma la sogs
[\[241b.4\]]pa'i sman chu btags su byas te bskams nas reng bu de mar bskus te me la bsregs pa'i dud pa brngub par bya'o/_/yang na mar dang nas sbrus nas bsregs pa'i dud pa brngub par bya'o/_/sbra tshil sra rtsi pog dag gam/_/a ka ru bzang mar sbyar brngub/_/ces bya ba la/_spra
[\[241b.5\]]tshil dang sra rtsi pog ces bya ba sardza ra gcig tu sbyar ba'i dud pa'am/_yang na a ka ru bzang po'i dud pa brngub par bya'o/_/de bzhin tsan+dan glang rwa 'am/_/spu 'am rgyus pa'i dud pa brngub/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na tsan+dan mer bsregs pa'i dud pa brngub par bya'o/_/yang na ba
[\[241b.6\]]lang gi rwa me la bsregs pa'i dud pa'am/_ba lang gi spu'am/_ba lang gi rgyus pa'i dud pa brngub pa yang skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba nang du zhen pa'i skyon sel bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/gtsod dang god ku rang ga_/dgo ba lpags mig ra yi 'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[241b.7\]]yang na gtsod la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi pags pa la sogs pa'i dud pa brngub na yang phan no/_/yang na gu gul ldong ros sam/_/yang na sA la'i thang chu nyid/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na gu gul gyi dud pa brngub pa'am/_yang na ldong ros kyi dud pa brngub pa'am/_shing sA
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]la'i thang chu'i du ba brngub par bya'o/_/mo rtsa gu gul a ga ru/_/shug pa mar dang sbyar dud brngub/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na mo rtsa zhes bya ba shing shal ma li'i thang chu dri zhim pa la sogs pa mngar ba'i spos mar dang sbyar ba'i dud pa brngub par bya'o/_/dugs
[\[242a.2\]]byar mi rung btang snyoms bzhag_/brang dang mid pa zhom pa la/_/bshol du med na 'jam dugs bya/_/kha ra dkar po'i 'o mas sam/_/dro 'jam tsam gyis dugs bya zhing /_/dkri dang ldan par bya ba'i dugs/_/dugs kyi le'ur bshad dugs bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dugs byar
[\[242a.3\]]mi rung ba'i nad pa mkhris pa dang tsha bas nyen pa dang /_nyams stobs dang lus zungs zad pa dang shin tu snum pa dang sbrum ma la sogs pa brang dang lkog ma zhom pa la sogs pa dugs byar mi rung ste bshol du med pa yin na dugs 'jam po bya ste/_de yang kha ra dkar po 'o ma dang
[\[242a.4\]]bcas pa'i snum bag dro 'jam tsam du byas pa blugs la dugs bya zhing /_de bzhin du dkris pa dang ldan pa'i dugs kyi le'ur bshad pa'i sman dang sbyar bas dugs bya'o/_/ma zhur de gso'i cho ga spyad/_/ces bya ba la/_ma zhu ba las skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba las gyur
[\[242a.5\]]pa la ni ma zhu ba gso ba'i cho ga smyung ba dang smin par byas pa la sogs pa spyad par bya'o/_/sbyor drags rlung shas che gyur na/_/rlung nad bsal ba'i sbyor ba bya/_/sha khu snum sogs rab tsha sbyin/_/bsku ba dag gis zhi bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyug sman la sogs
[\[242a.6\]]pa'i nyams smad pa'i cho ga'i sbyor ba drags pas rlung shas che zhing rgyas par gyur pa mthong na rlung nad de bsal ba'i cho ga bya la/_de yang sha khu dang snum gyi rnam pa mar la sogs pa dang /_'o ma la sogs pa dang /_bsku ba la sogs pas nad de zhi bar bya'o/_/bad kan ma
[\[242a.7\]]slong dugs mi bya/_/nyam chung ba la sbyang byas pas/_/rlung gi gnas rnyed gnas rnams ni/_/skams par byas nas srog 'phrog byed/_/de bas sman khu snum dang ni/_/lde gu sogs kyis de zhir bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshad ma thag pa'i skyug sman btang ba la sogs
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]pa'i sbyor ba ni bad kan ma slong ba la sogs pa la gtang bar mi bya'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba dang ldan pa rnams de lta bu dang ldan pa de la sbyang ba byas na rlung gi gnas rnyed cing brten pa'i gzhi rnyed pa snying zhes bya ba'i gnad kun tu skams par byas nas
[\[242b.2\]]myur ba kho nar srog 'phrog cing 'jig par byed do/_/rgyu de bas bad kan ma slong ba la sogs pa de rnams la sman bskol ba'i khu ba la sogs pas skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad zhi bar bya'o/_/skem zhing glo rdol ched 'khru dang /_/khrag mkhris tsha ba las byung ba'i/_/
[\[242b.3\]]skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba la/_/mngar snum bsil sogs dag gis gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_skem zhing rid pa la sogs pa las byung ba'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad la ni mngar ba la sogs pas nyams brta ba'i gso ba'i thabs kyis gso bar
[\[242b.4\]]bya'o/_/ku lang+tha dang rtsa ba bcu/_/bskol ba'i skam sa'i sha khu phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba dang ldan pa la rgya sran ku lang+tha dang rtsa ba bcu pa dang bskol ba'i skam sa'i sha khu blud na phan no/_/shi kru par ta ka dang ni/_/kas mar da ba sha ka/_
[\[242b.5\]]la phug lo ma'i khu ba dang /_/nim pa'i myu gu las byung dang /_/kha lung bri ha ti khu phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na shi kru la sogs pa'i sman btsos pa'i khu ba las yu shar byas pa yang phan pa yin no/_/kaN+Da ka ri byi tsher ba/_/bil ba'i rkang dang gze ma dang /_/sle tres
[\[242b.6\]]kar ka ta sring gi/_/tsi tra ka dang ku lang+tha/_/chur bskol ba yi yu sha bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na kaN+Da ka ri la sogs pa sman chur bskol ba'i yu sha yang phan no/_/yang na ra sna rtsa chung lnga/_/mung+ga tsi tra kar bcas blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na ra sna dang rtsa ba chung ngu lnga dang /_
[\[242b.7\]]mung+ga dang tsi tra ka bskol ba'i yu sha blud na yang phan no/_/tsi tra go snyod kha ru tsha/_/kar ka ta sring thug pa phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na tsi tra ka la sogs pa'i sman dang sbyar ba'i thug pa blud na yang skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba la phan no/_/yang na rtsa ba bcur sbyar ba'i/_/
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]thug pa blud na lud pa dang /_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rtsa ba bcu pa dang sbyar ba'i thug pa blud na lud pa la sogs pa'i nad sel to/_/rtsa ba bcu pa ra sna dang /_/zur pa ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_/bil ba gnyis dang ma nu dang /_/
[\[243a.2\]]kar ka ta sring pi pi ling /_/lca ba sle tres bca' sga ni/_/bskol ba'i khu ba blud zhu nas/_/de nyid dang btsos thug pa blud/_/sA lu drug cu pa dang gro/_/nas dang mung+ga rgya sran zos/_/lud pa snying nad rtsib logs zug_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa ba
[\[243a.3\]]bcu pa la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba blud na zhu bar gyur pa dang /_rtsa ba bcu pa la sogs pa de nyid kyi khu ba dang btsos pa'i thug pa blud par bya zhing 'bras sA lu la sogs pa las g.yos pa'i zas zos na lud pa la sogs pa'i nad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na arka'i
[\[243a.4\]]myu gu yi/_/'o ma dang sbrus nas kyi zan/_/sbrang rtsi dang bcas rtsa bcu sogs/_/bskol ba'i khu ba bcas pa blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na arka'i myu gu'i 'o ma dang sbrus pa'i nas zan sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa de rtsa ba bcu pa dang ra sna la sogs pa bshad ma thag pa'i
[\[243a.5\]]sman bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te blud na yang phan no/_/zas ni k+Sha ra shing kun mar/_/kha ru tsha dang se'u sbyar bza'/_/ma nu zur pa tsha ba gsum/_/star bu kha lung sbyar ba sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na kha zas ni nang du k+Sha ra la sogs pa'i sman nad kyi mtshan nyid la ltos la
[\[243a.6\]]gang yang rung ba dang sbyin par bya'o/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde skom dang /_/rtsa ba bcu bskol khu ba'am/_/yang na thang shing bskol khu'am/_/chang gi dwangs ma blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyis skom dad du gyur pa la rtsa ba bcu
[\[243a.7\]]bskol ba'i chu'am thang shing bskol ba'i khu ba'am/_chang gi dwangs ma blud par bya'o/_/pi pi ling dang de'i rtsa ba/_/a ru ra dang byi dang ga_/tsi tra ka rnams lde gur sbyar/_/mar snod bskus te bskams pa ru/_/snod du dar ba zla gcig bzhag_/de 'thungs me yi
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]drod skyed cing /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sman chu 'thags su byas pa mar gyi snod kyi bum par bskus pa de bskams par gyur pa dang /_der dar ba sar pa blugs la dar ba de snod der zla ba gcig lon pa dang /_de 'thungs na
[\[243b.2\]]me drod skyed pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/pa tha mur ba thang shing dang /_/sa ra la dang chang dwangs ma/_/nub gcig bzhag ste lan tshwa btab/_/de las khyor gang blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_pa tha la sogs pa mnyes shing btsags la nub gcig zhag bzhag ste lan tshwa nyung
[\[243b.3\]]zhig btab ste de las khyor gang tsam blud na yang skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba bca' sga'i phye'am/_/ya bak+Sha ra na le sham/_/bcas phye chu tshan blugs pa phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_chu bskol ba'i dro 'jam tsam gyi nang du ga bra'i rtsa ba dang
[\[243b.4\]]bca' sga dang btags te blud pa'am/_yang na na le sham dang ya bak+Sha ra'i phye ma dang bcas pa chu bskol ba dro 'jam tsam gyi nang du bcug ste blud na yang phan no/_/pa spri ka ni bskol ba'i chu/_/btags pa lde gur byas bsres blud/_/ces bya ba la/_pa spri ka ni hing ku pa tri ka ste
[\[243b.5\]]de bskol ba'i khu ba dang de btags pa'i lde gur byas pa dang bsres te blud na yang phan no/_/sap+ta par+Ni'i khu ba'am/_/shri sha yi ni me tog ni/_/pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/bad kan mkhris pa 'dres gyur pa'i/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad
[\[243b.6\]]kan dang mkhris pa 'dres pa las gyur pa'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba la ni khu ba pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba blud pa'am/_yang na shri sha'i me tog bskol ba'i khu ba pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bar bya'o/_/cu gang pi pi ling dang ni/_/'bras dang bca' sga mar dag las/_/
[\[243b.7\]]khu ba mkhris pa las gyur sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba la ni cu gang la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i khu ba ha thabs su bcos pa sbyin par bya'o/_/rlung dang ldan la reg 'jam sha_/ri bong sha dang pi pi ling /_/mar dang sha spya
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]ka yi khrag_/ces bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad la ni bya reg 'jam gyi sha dang /_ri bong gi sha la sogs pa dang /_sha spya ka'i khrag dang sbyar ba'i khu ba byin na phan no/_/lcam pa'i khu ba tsha ba gsum/_/mar dang 'o
[\[244a.2\]]mar sbyar ba dang /_/'bras chan zos la 'o ma blud/_/rlung mkhris 'dres pa las gyur sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang mkhris pa 'dres pa las gyur pa'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba la ni lcam pa la sogs pa'i sman dang sbyar ba'i mar dang 'o ma dang bcas pa'i 'bras chan
[\[244a.3\]]byin la de'i 'og tu ni 'o ma blud par bya'o/_/ra yi 'o ma bzhi 'gyur gyi/_/chu bskol bu ram dong gra btab/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na ra'i 'o ma bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol la chu gdus nas bu ram dang bca' sga btab ste blud par bya'o/_/pi pi ling rtsa shing mngar dang /_bu ram
[\[244a.4\]]lca ba rta sbangs khu/_/sbrang rtsi mar sbyar zos gyur na/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba la sogs pa dang bsres pa'i sbrang rtsi dang mar du sbyar ba zos na yang skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel bar 'gyur ro/_/rta dang glang po ba
[\[244a.5\]]lang phag_/rnga mo bong bu lug dang ra/_/gang yang rung ba'i rtug btsir khu/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bldags na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rta la sogs pa'i rtug pa gang yang rung ba btsir ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba yang skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba la phan no/_/bad kan
[\[244a.6\]]shas cher btung ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan gyi shas che ba'i nad pas ni rta spangs la sogs pa'i khu ba gang yang rung ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te btung ba blud par bya'o/_/rkang bzhi pa yi lpags rus spu/_/rmig pa bsregs la snag tshar byas/_/a shwa gan+d+ha'i lde gu ni/_/
[\[244a.7\]]sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bad kan shas/_/che ba'i dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_rkang bzhi pa'i pags pa la sogs pa bsregs nas snag tsha lta bur byas pa sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa'i lde gu zos na bad kan shas che ba'i dbugs mi bde ba sel bar byed do/_/yang a shwa
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]gan+d+ha bsregs pa'i lde gu sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa byin na yang de dang 'dra'o/_/zur pa ma nu skyu ru ra'am/_/ma nu pi pi ling bcas phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_zur pa dang ma nu dang skyu ru ra sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa'i lde gu zos na bad kan shas che ba'i dbugs mi bde ba sel bar byed do/_/
[\[244b.2\]]yang na ma nu dang pi pi ling du bcas pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang de dang 'dra'o/_/yug snam pi pi ling bcas pa'am/_/ka pid ta yi khu ba'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na btsag yug snam pi pi ling dang bcas pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos pa'am/_yang na ka pid
[\[244b.3\]]ta'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba zos na yang yon tan de dang 'dra'o/_/bil ba'i rkang khu skyu ru ra/_/pi pi ling dang rgyam tshar sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na bil ba'i rkang gi khu ba dang skyu ru ra dang /_pi pi ling dang rgyam char sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na yang de dang 'dra'o/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi a ru
[\[244b.4\]]ra'am/_/tsha ba gnyis dang kha ru tsha/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na mar dang sbrang rtsi dang a ru ra dang sbyar ba'i lde gu bza' ba'am/_yang na tsha ba ste pi pi ling dang na le sham dang kha ru tsha mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bza' bar bya'o/_/rgya shug 'bras yos sbrang rtsi dang /_/rgun 'bru pi pi
[\[244b.5\]]ling dong gra/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rgya shug la sogs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu bza' bar bya'o/_/bu ram rgun 'bru yung ra sna/_/pi pi ling dang na le sham/_/til mar dang ni sbyar ba phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na bu ram la sogs pa dang til mar sbyar ba'i lde gu
[\[244b.6\]]bza' bar bya'o/_/lde gu sman gyi phye ma yang /_/sha khu chu dron tsha sogs btung /_/zhes bya ba la/_lde gu'i don du sman gang dag bshad pa de dag gi phye ma dag kyang nad dmigs las dpags te sha khu dang chu dron dang chang dang zho ga chu dang dar ba rang skyur la sogs pa gang yang rung
