[\[244b.7\]]ba dang spyos te btung bar bya'o/_/dzi ban ti dang gla sgang dang /_/byi'u rug pa dang shing tsha dang /_/sug smel gnyis dang ma nu dang /_/lca ba ta ma ma li ka_/a ru ra dang ga bra'i rtsa/_/dong ga dang ni ba la ka_/zur pa kar ka ta sring gi_/nA ga ge sar pi pi ling /_/tsa rong ci
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]rigs sbyar nas ni/_/phye ma nyis 'gyur kha rar bcas/_/rtsib logs nad rims lud pa sel/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde 'joms mchog_/ces bya ba la/_dzi ban ti la sogs pa'i phye ma dang de'i nyis 'gyur gyi kha ra dang sbyar ba dag kyang bza' ba
[\[245a.2\]]dang btung ba dang lde gu la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas na rtsib logs la sogs pa'i nad 'joms par byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/dong ga bu ram cha snyoms pa/_/bza' ba'am sna nas btang sman bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bu ram dang dong ga cha snyoms pa bza' ba'am/_de'i khu ba
[\[245a.3\]]sna nas gtang bar bya'o/_/yang na sgog skya 'am kun dong ngam/_/gri rtsa na yi rtsa bas bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sgog skya la sogs pa'i rtsa ba'i khu ba yang sna sman bya'o/_/tsan+dan gyi ni khu ba dang /_/bud med nu zho snar blugs bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na tsan+dan gyi khu ba dang bud med
[\[245a.4\]]kyi nu zhor sbyar ba snar blugs par bya'o/_/sbrang ma'i rtug pa nu zhor sbyar/_/rgya skyegs khu ba dang sbyar blugs/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrang ma'i rtug pa bud med kyi nu zho dang sbyar ba snar blugs par bya ba'am/_yang na rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang sbyar ba'i sman sna nas blugs na yang phan no/_/
[\[245a.5\]]rgyam tsha zhun mar dang bcas pa/_/nu zho mar dang bskol ba'am/_/mngar ba'i sman dang lde gur byas/_/de btung ba'am sna nas gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rgyam tsha dang zhun mar dwangs ma dang bcas pa bud med kyi nu zho dang bskol ba'i sman btung ba'am/_sna nas btang ba'am/_
[\[245a.6\]]sman mngar ba'i sde tshan rgun 'bru la sogs pa dang lde gur byas pa'i mar dang rgyam tsha btung ba'am sna nas gtang bar bya'o/_/kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas pa ni/_/grang dro'i res kyis blugs pa'am/_/de bzhin 'o ma bskol ba ni/_/sman gyi phye ma mar sbyar blugs/_/zhes
[\[245a.7\]]bya ba la/_kha ra dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i sman grang dro'i res kyis gzhug cing bsten pa'am/_yang na de bzhin du 'o ma bskol ba'i sman gyi phye mar sbyar ba las btsir ba'i khu ba blugs na phan no/_/pi pi ling dang kha ru tsha/_/ya bak+Sha ra sle tres dang /_/shing kun tso ra bye'u
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]rug pa/_/mar dang zho ga chur sbyar zhing /_/rtsa bcu'i khu bar bskol ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa dang bskol ba'i mar la sogs pa 'thungs na yang skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba la phan no/_/yang na 'tsho byed bskol
[\[245b.2\]]ba'i khu/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'tsho byed kyi sman sna bcu dang mar du bskol ba dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba blud na de dag la phan no/_/te dzo ba ti a ru ra/_/pi pi ling dang pu tse shel/_/ru rta ma nu bu ti ka_/tsi tra ka dang pa la sha//_zung pa lan tshwa rnam
[\[245b.3\]]gnyis dang /_/dzi ban ti dang bil ba'i rkang /_/shu dag bal bu'i lo ma rnams/_/de dag zho ni gnyis gnyis bskol/_/shing kun zho phyed mar bre gang /_/bskol ba de ni 'thungs gyur na/_/rkang lag la ni zhen pa'i rlung /_/gzhang 'brum dang ni pho ba'i nad/_/skyigs bu
[\[245b.4\]]snying nad rtsib logs zug_/myur du sel bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_te dzo ba ti la sogs pa'i lde gu gnyis gnyis dang /_shing kun zho phyed de ma sha drug dang mar bre gang bskol la mar de 'thungs na rkang lag la zhen pa'i rlung la sogs pa myur du sel bar byed
[\[245b.5\]]do/_/te dzo ba ti zhes bya ba ni sman bzi can no/_/pu tse shel ni ka tu ka ro hi ni'o/_/lan tshwa gnyis ni lce myang tsha dang kha ru tsha'o/_/bil ba'i rkang ni bil ba mad dza'o/_/zhun mar cha phyed bcas pa yi/_/ya bak+Sha ra rgyam tsha sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na zhun mar gyi cha
[\[245b.6\]]phyed kyi ya bak+Sha ra sbyar ba blud par bya ba'am/_yang na mar gyi cha phyed rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba blud na yang de dag myur du sel to/_/thang la 'bar gyi'am dug gi mar/_/zho can ha pu sha'i mar blud/_/ces bya ba la/_drang srong thang la 'bar gyis bshad pa'i sman mar gcin nad gso
[\[245b.7\]]ba'i skabs su bshad pa'am/_dug gi sman mar khrag mkhris kyi skabs su bshad pa dang /_zho can gyi sman mar skran gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa dang /_ha pu sha la sogs pa'i sman mar de nyid du bshad pa ste sman mar de dag blud na yang skyigs bu dang dbugs mi
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]bde ba sel to/_/chu grang glo bur blugs pa dang /_/sdangs dang sprugs dang 'jigs pa dang /_/dga' dang phrag dog dbugs bsdams dang /_/gnod pa'i 'bu yis sos btab dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang skyigs bu'i nad la chu grang glo bur du 'phral la
[\[246a.2\]]blugs pa dang /_de bzhin du sdangs shing skrag par byas pa dang /_de bzhin du lus sprugs pa dang /_'jigs pas te sems zhum bag du gyur pa ngo tsha ba'i bag la brten pa dang /_dga' ba ste sems dga' zhing spro ba'i zhad byung ba dang /_phrag dog ste gzhan gyi yon tan
[\[246a.3\]]la mi bzod pa dang dbugs bsdams pa ste/_kha dang sna nas 'byung ba'i dbugs dgag pa dang /_de bzhin du gnod pa'i lus la tsha ba skyed cing 'jigs par nus pa'i 'bus sos btab pa la phan te/_de dag gis ni rlung gi shugs 'byung ba'i rgyun la gags byas pa'i
[\[246a.4\]]phyir ro/_/gang yang bad kan rlung 'joms sman/_/dro zhing rlung ni bde rgyu bsten/_/gang yang phal cher rlung gi nad/_/lhag par 'joms par byed pas spyad/_/ces bya ba la/_skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba dag la gang yang bza' ba dang btung ba dang sman la sogs pa bad
[\[246a.5\]]kan dang rlung 'joms par byed pa bsten pa dang /_de bzhin du dro zhing rlung bde bar rgyu bar byed pa gang dag yin pa de thams cad bsten par bya'o/_/de las kyang khyad par du rlung gi nad lhag par 'joms shing sel bar byed pa'i dngos po de bsten cing spyad par bya'o/_/thams cad la
[\[246a.6\]]ni brta byas pas/_/tshabs chung gso bar sla ba yin/_/lhag par nyams smad pa yis ni/_/zhi ba'i thabs su 'gyur ma yin/_/de bas zhi ba brta ba'i thabs/_/mang po de la spyad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba thams cad la brta ba'i cho ga byas
[\[246a.7\]]na nad tshabs chung bar 'gyur la/_de nas de gso sla bar 'gyur la/_lhag par nyams smad pa ni de zhi zhing bsal ba'i thabs su mi 'gyur te/_nyams smad par byas pas de gso ba dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na de zhi ba dang brta bar bya ba thabs mang po gang yod pa de la spyad
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]pas gso bar bya'o/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde gcong slon/_/skyigs bu'i sman ni phan tshun 'dre/_/zhes bya ba la/_lud pa la sogs pa'i sman gyis phan tshun gcig la gcig phan zhing 'dre ba yin pas lud pa'i skabs su bshad pa'i sman gyis dbugs mi bde ba la
[\[246b.2\]]sogs pa gsor rung la/_dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i sman gyis ni lud pa gsor rung bas na de'i phyir ji skad du bshad pa'i sman gyis 'di dag thams cad gso zhing bcos par bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_
[\[246b.3\]]slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_gso ba'i gnas le'u bzhi pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas gcong chen po gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyigs pu dang dbugs mi bde ba gso ba'i 'og tu gcong chen po
[\[246b.4\]]gso ba'i skabs su brtsams pa dgos pa ni/_sngar nad gzhi'i skabs su dgos pa bshad pa'i rim pas 'di'i gso ba bshad pa'i go rims la bab pa yin no/_/stobs ldan nad ni mang gyur la/_/snum chos dugs byas sbyang ba ni/_/snum med ma yin nyams smod min/_/
[\[246b.5\]]steng 'og gi ni sbyang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen po zad byed dang ldan pa'i nad pa nyams stobs ldan pa'i nad pa mang pos khyab par gyur pa snum gyi cho ga dang /_dugs byas nas sbyang ba zhes bya ba skyug sman dang bkru sman bya ba la de snum med cing rtsub chos su yang mi bya la/_
[\[246b.6\]]nyams smod cing 'bri bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sbyang ba bya'o/_/'o ma po son char bcas pa'am/_/sha khu mngar dang ldan pa'am/_/zhun mar btab pa'i nas thug ni/_/skyug sman bskol bas slon du gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_skyug sman ni 'o ma dang po son char sbyar bas
[\[246b.7\]]zad byed kyi nad kyis btab pa slon du gzhug pa'am/_yang na ro mngar ba dang sbyar ba'i sha khu dang po son char sbyar bas slon du gzhug pa'am/_yang na zhun mar btab pa'i nas thug dang sman po son cha la sogs pa dang sbyar te bskol ba blud la slon du gzhug par bya'o/_/sha ma
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]dur byid dong gar bcas/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/_/bcas pa'i 'o ma'am skyo ma'am/_/rgun 'bru tang pal bi da ri/_/yang na sha khur ldan pa yi/_/bkru sman 'jam po gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na bkru sman dam zhing nyams dma' bar
[\[247a.2\]]mi byed pa sbyar bar bya ste/_de yang sha ma dur byid la sogs pa'i khar dkar po dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman gtang ba'am yang na 'o ma dang bcas pa'i skyo ma zhes bya ba phye mar gyi skyo ma dang bkru sman du sbyar te gtang ba'am/_yang na rgun chu la sogs pa sman re re khu ba dang sbyar te bkru sman
[\[247a.3\]]'jam po gtang bar bya'o/_/lto sbyangs pa la brta ba dang /_/drod skyed cho ga spyad par bya/_/zas skom yi gar 'ong ba dang /_/rlung 'joms byed cing yang ba sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen gyi nad pa la de ltar slon nam khrus kyis lto sbyangs par gyur nas nyams brtab dang /_
[\[247a.4\]]drod skyed pa'i cho ga gang dag yin pa spyad par bya zhing /_de bzhin du zas dang skom gyi rnam pa yi gar 'ong zhing snying dga' bar byed la sred pa skyed par byed pa dang /_gtso cher rlung 'joms shing sel bar byed pa'i rang bzhin can dang yang ba ste rang bzhin gyis yang ba dang g.yos
[\[247a.5\]]su byas pas yang bar gyur pa gang dag yin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/sA lu drug cu pa dang gro/_/nas dang mung+ga lo gcig lon/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bras sA lu rtsa snar la sogs pa dang /_'bras drug cu pa la sogs pa'i 'bru lo gcig lon pa ni gcong chen po'i nad la phan no/_/
[\[247a.6\]]ra yi 'o ma mar dang sha_/sha za'i sha ni zad byed 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_ra'i 'o ma la sogs pa dang srog chags sha za ba rnams kyi sha gang dag yin pa ni/_lhag par nyams stobs skyed cing zad byed 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/bya rog 'ug pa spyang ki gzig_/ba lang
[\[247a.7\]]rta dang ne'u le sbrul/_/bya rgod rnga mong bong bu khra'i/_/sha ni sgyu yis byin na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_bya rog gi sha la sogs pa sgyu thabs kyis gsong ste gzhan gyi shar btsos nas byin na yang gcong chen po'i nad la phan zhing nad pa la cha yod pa mngon sum du ma yin no/_/de
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]yang drang srong tsa ra kas/_bya rog sha ni sreg par brjod/_/sbrul sha nya yi sha zhes brjod/_/rta bla ba ni rgyu ma'i sgras/_/sman pa mkhas pas sbyin par bya/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/shes na de las smod pas na/_/slon zhing mdangs dang stobs mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang
[\[247b.2\]]gi phyir bya rog la sogs pa'i sha ni 'jig rten na smad par bya ba yin pas nad pa des shes par gyur na de la smod pa'i sems skye bas slar slon zhing skyug par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du lus kyi mdangs dang nyams stobs dag tu yang mi 'gyur ro/_/bad mkhris ri dwags la
[\[247b.3\]]sogs sha_/rlung la mthu rtsal gzan tshol sha_/tsho khur sbyar zhing phan pa dang /_/sha khu sogs la'ang sbyar bar bya/_/yungs mar dag dang brngos pa'am/_/yang na ci rigs mar dang brngos/_/khu bar ldan zhing mnyen la snum/_/spod la sogs dang legs g.yos sbyin/_/
[\[247b.4\]]zhes bya ba la/_bad kan dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcong chen po la ni ri dwags la sogs pa'i sha ste phag rgod la sogs pa'i rigs chen po dang /_khron rko ba dang /_mchus gzan tshol ba'i sde tshan gyi sha brdungs shing btags pa'i sha khu blud na phan no/_/rlung las gyur pa la
[\[247b.5\]]ni mthu rtsal gyis zas tshol ba stag la sogs pa'i sha dang chu na gnas pa'i srog chags kyi sha brdungs pa las sha khur bya'o/_/de bzhin du sha khu dang thug pa la sogs pa dang tshod ma sna tshogs pa la sogs pa la yang de dag sbyar zhing g.yos su byas pa'am/_yungs mar dang
[\[247b.6\]]brngos shing g.yos pa'am/_yang na mar dang brngos pa dag ci rigs par rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa la sbyin par bya ba de yang khu ba dang ldan zhing zhim pa dang /_mnyen zhing tsha ba chung ngu bskol ba dang /_snum zhing rtsub bag med pa dang /_spod de sge'u gsher dang bca' sga dang /_
[\[247b.7\]]se'u 'bru la sogs pa'i spod dang legs par g.yos pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de bzhin la phug rgya sran las/_/g.yos pa'i yu shar sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du la phug rgya sran la sogs pa'i khu ba na le sham la sogs pa'i spod dang sbyar zhing snum pa'i
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]yu shar sbyar ba yang gcong chen po'i nad kyis btab pa la phan no/_/pi pi ling bcas nas dang bcas/_/rgya sran bcas shing dong grar bcas/_/se'u 'bru skyu ru ra dang bcas/_/ra sha'i khu ba snum can blud/_/des ni cham pa la sogs pa/_/gnod pa drug ni
[\[248a.2\]]sel bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_ra sha'i khu ba pi pi ling dang bcas shing de dag g.yos pa dang /_nas dang rgya sran dang dong gra'i khu ba dang bcas pa dang /_se'u 'bru dang /_skyu ru ra mar la sogs pa'i snum dang g.yos pa gang yin pa blud par bya ste/_de lta bu'i ra sha'i khu ba des
[\[248a.3\]]ni cham pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa sel bar 'gyur te/_cham pa lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/mgo nad skad 'gags ma zhur bcas/_/zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis bstan pa'i nad 'joms pa yin no/_/mkhris pa sogs las khyad par du/_/chang rnying rtsa sbubs sbyong byed pa/_/
[\[248a.4\]]ngoms pa nyid du blud par bya/_/rgun chang chang rnying chang dwangs blud/_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris pa la sogs pa las gyur pa'i zad byed kyi nad la khyad par du yang chang zhim chang shin tu rnying par gyur cing rtsa sbubs kyi bu ga sbyong bar byed cing ngoms pa nyid du blud par bya la/_de las kyang khyad par
[\[248a.5\]]du mkhris pa la sogs pa la rgun chang dang /_chang rnying dang /_chang dwangs ma blud par bya'o/_/rtsa ba chung ngu lnga bskol ba'am/_/ta ma la ka chur bskol ba'am/_/par+Ni bzhi dang bskol ba'am/_/'u su bca' sga bskol ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na rtsa ba chung ngu lnga dang
[\[248a.6\]]bskol ba'i chu blud par bya ba'am/_ta ma la ka dang chu bskol ba'am/_ma sha par+Ni la sogs pa par+Ni bzhi bskol ba'am/_'u su dang bca' sga'ang bskol ba'i chu blud par bya'o/_/de dang kha zas gtsang ma dag_/'bad pas btsos pa rjes mthun yin/_/zhes bya ba
[\[248a.7\]]la/_rtsa ba lnga'i chu la sogs pa de dang kha zas gtsang zhing sme bag med pa 'bad pas btsos na yang rjes su mthun zhing phan pa yin no/_/rtsa ba bcu dang 'o ma 'am/_sha khu'i nang du btso bar bya/_/ba la btab pa'i mar sbyar ba'am/_/sha za'i sha khur btsos
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]pa sbyin/_/ces bya ba la/_rtsa ba bcu dang 'o ma'am sha khur btsos la/_sman pa la'i lde gu btab pa'i sman mar sbyar te sbyin pa'am/_sha za ba'i sha khu dang btsos pa sbyin par bya'o/_/'o ma bcu 'gyur dag dang ni/_/mar bskol sbrang rtsir bcas pa'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[248b.2\]]yang na 'o ma bcu 'gyur dang mar bskol ba la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sman mar sbyin na yang phan no/_/dzi ban ti dang shing mngar dang /_/rgun 'bru dug mo yungs 'bras bu/_/ma nu zur pa pi pi ling /_/bya kri gze ma ba la dang /_/ta ma la ki ut+pal sngo/_/kyi lce ba dang byi tsher ba/_/lde
[\[248b.3\]]gur byas dang mar bskol ba/_/gcong chen sel ba'i dam pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dzi ban ti la sogs pa'i sman mar gyi bzhi cha'i lde gur byas pa dang /_chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur bsres pa dang /_mar bskol ba'i sman yang gcong chen po'i nad rgyal po'i nad ces bya ba sel
[\[248b.4\]]zhing 'joms par byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/'bra go rgun 'bru ma du ka_/pa ru sha dang pi pi ling /_/mar dang bskol bas skad 'gags dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde rims 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bra go la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu dang cho ga bzhin du bskol
[\[248b.5\]]ba'i sman mar gyis kyang skad 'gags pa la sogs pa'i nad 'joms par byed do/_/rtsa bcu 'o mar bskol ba las/_/byung ba'i mar gsar gang yin de/_/pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir bcas/_/skad 'gags sel ba'i dam pa yin/_/mgo brang rtsib logs gzer
[\[248b.6\]]'joms shing /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde rims sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa ba bcu ni rtsa ba lnga che chung gnyis bsdoms pa ste de dang bskol ba'i 'o ma bsrubs pa las mar gsar byung ba de pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas par zos na skad 'gags pa sel zhing
[\[248b.7\]]'joms pa'i dam pa yin no/_/de bzhin du mgo dang brang la sogs pa'i nad kyang sel bar byed pa yin no/_/rtsa ba lnga pa lngar bskol ba'i/_/'o ma las byung mar gang yin/_/rtsa ba lnga pa lnga yi ni/_/khu ba 'o ma'i bzhi 'gyur la/_/bskol ba yi ni
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]mar 'di yis/_/zad byed kyi ni stobs bdun 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa ba lnga bskol ba'i 'o ma las byung ba'i mar gang yin pa de rtsa ba lnga pa lnga pa'i khu ba 'o ma'i bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol ba'i mar 'dis ni zad byed kyi stobs cham pa la sogs
[\[249a.2\]]pa bdun 'joms par byed do/_/yang na gre bar dud pas brngub pa snyam sems pa la sogs pa nad kyi bla brnan bdun 'joms par byed do/_/ya bak+Sha ra tsha ba lnga/_/srang drug dang ni btsos pa'i mar/_/bre gang 'o ma cha mnyam byas/_/des ni bu ga dag byed cing /_/skran
[\[249a.3\]]dang dmu rdzing mcher pa dang /_/pho nad skya rbab cham pa dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde drod nyams/_/skrang dang stod kyi rlung nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_ya bak+Sha ra dang tsha ba lnga ste pi pi ling dang pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_dbyi mo dang bca' sga dang /_kru trug tres te lnga po
[\[249a.4\]]srang drug lde gur byas pa dang /_'o ma bre gang dang chu bre gsum dang mar bre gang bskol ba des ni bu ga'i rgyun srang dag par byed cing skran la sogs pa'i nad 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/ra sna ba la gze ma dang /_/sti ra bar sha bu'i chur/_/dzi ban ti dang pi pi ling /_/'o bcas
[\[249a.5\]]gcong chen 'joms pa'i mchog_/ces bya ba la/_ra sna la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba'i chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang /_mar dang 'o ma cha mnyam par bskol ba dzi ban ti dang /_pi pi ling btab pa'i sman mar ni gcong chen po zad byed ces bya ba 'joms pa'i mchog yin no/_/a
[\[249a.6\]]shwa gan d+ha 'o mar bskol/_/las byung mar 'o kha rar bcas/_/zhes bya ba la/_a shwa gan d+ha bskol ba'i 'o ma bsrubs pa las byung ba'i 'o ma dang kha rar bcas pa blud na zad byed kyi nad sel bar byed do/_/spyi yi sha ni srang brgyad dag_/chu bre sum cu gnyis nang
[\[249a.7\]]bskol/_/de yi brgyad cha lus pa ru/_/'tsho byed bcu ni srang rer gzhug_/zhun mar bre gang bcas bskol ba/_/sha yi sman mar 'di blud pa'am/_/sha khu dang sbyar ci rigs sbyin/_/rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur nad/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde skad
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]'gags/_/skem zhing rtsib logs zug pa 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_spyi'i sha khung na gnas pa dang mthu rtsal gyis gzas tshol ba la sogs pa'i srog chags gang yang rung ba'i sha srang brgyad dang chu bre sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes pa chu srang stong nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du bskol
[\[249b.2\]]ba de'i sha khu brgyad cha lus pa'i nang du mar bre gang ste srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bcug la/_'tsho byed bcu po ste dzi ban ti dang ra mnye ba la sogs pa srang re'i tshad du byas pa dang lde gur sbyar ba bcug ste bskol la sha'i sman mar de 'ba' zhig blud pa dang /_sha khu dang sbyar te byin
[\[249b.3\]]na rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/sug smel ti mu sa 'bras gsum/_/sa nag tsha ba gsum tsi tra/_/sa ra ni m+ba seng ldeng dang /_/sA la'i 'bras bu las byung dang /_/go bye dang ni byi dang ga_/srang ni brgyad brgyad tshad du byas/_/chu ni bcu drug 'gyur
[\[249b.4\]]byas par/_/bcu drug char gnas bar du bskol/_/slar yang de dang mar bre gang /_/bskol ba 'dir ni cu gang ni/_/srang drug khar srang sum cu bcug_/sbrang rtsi srang ni drug cu gzhug_/dri sna gsum ni srang re gzhug_/gzar bus dkrugs te lde gur byas/_/
[\[249b.5\]]snga dro zos la 'o ma btung /_/bcud len bsdams pa med pa yin/_/yid gzhungs mig rno tshe ring la/_/drod skyed skran dang gcong chen nad/_/skya rbab dang ni mtshan par rdol/_/myur du 'joms par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sug smel la sogs pa'i sman
[\[249b.6\]]bcu drug srang re'i tshad du byas pa dang /_sman spyir bsdoms pa'i bcu drug 'gyur gyi chu de srang nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug dang bskol la bcu drug cha lus kyi bar du gdus nas sman khu de dang mar bre gang bskol la mar tshos pa der cu gang srang drug kha ra srang sum cu sbrang rtsi mar
[\[249b.7\]]gyi nyis ldab ste srang drug cu bcug la/_dri sna gsum shing tsha dang sug smel dang gan+d+ha b+ha dra zhes bya ba spyir srang sum cu bcug la/_de'i 'og tu cha mnyam par 'dres par bya ba'i phyir gzar bus dkrugs la lde gur byas pa las ci ran tsam zhig snga dro zos la de'i rjes la
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]'o ma btung bar bya ste/_bcud kyis len de ni spyod lam bsrung zhing bsdams mi dgos pa yin la yid gzhungs pa dang drod skyed pa'i bar du byed cing skran la sogs pa'i nad ring po mi thogs par 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/gang yang zhun mar bu
[\[250a.2\]]ram bcas/_/glo rdol la bshad zad byed sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhun mar dang bu ram du bcas pa'i sman glo rdol zhing 'grams pa'i skabs su bshad pa gang yin pa de zad byed ces bya ba'i gcong chen po'i nad la sbyar zhing gtang bar bya'o/_/shing tsha sug
[\[250a.3\]]smel pi pi ling /_/cu gang khar rim nyis 'gyur/_/phye mar byas bza' 'am sbrang rtsi dang /_/mar dang sbyar te lde gur zos/_/skad 'gags lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/zad byed rtsib logs bad kan 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing tsha nyis 'gyur gyi sug
[\[250a.4\]]smel sug smel gyi nyis 'gyur pi pi ling /_pi pi ling gi nyis 'gyur gyi cu gang /_cu gang gi nyis 'gyur gyi kha ra ste shing tsha zho gnyis/_sug smel zho bzhi/_pi pi ling zho brgyad/_cu gang zho bcu drug_/kha ra zho sum cu rtsa gnyis te de dag phye mar byas la bza' ba'am/_
[\[250a.5\]]sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar te lde gur byas nas zos na/_skad 'gags pa dang lud pa'i nad la sogs pa 'joms par byed do/_/'di yi skad 'gags la khyad par/_/sna sman dud pa brngub sogs bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen po gso ba'i skabs su gso ba
[\[250a.6\]]gang dag bshad pa de nad kyi phyogs gcig pa'i gso ba yin du zin kyang /_spyir gso bar sbrel rung mod kyi de las kyang khyad par du gcong chen po 'di'i skad 'gags pa la dud pa brngub pa la sogs par sbyar bar bya'o/_/de la'ang rlung las gyur pa la/_/ka sa mar da
[\[250a.7\]]bar da ka_/bring gar dza'i khu ba mar/_/bskol ba'am ar da ga la bskol/_/dro 'jam zos rjes la blud na/_/lud pa lu dang skad 'gags sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen po las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa la rlung las gyur pa la ni ka sa mar da la sogs pa'i
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]khu ba dro 'jam tsam du byas pa zas zos pa'i rjes la blud na yang lud pa lu ba dang skad 'gags pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na ar da ga la zhes bya ba ming gi rnam grangs ru tsa ka ra zhes bya ba dang bskol ba'i mar blud na yang lud pa lu ba dang skad 'gags pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[250b.2\]]rgya shug lo ma'i lde gu ni/_/mar brngos rgyam tshar bcas pa'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rgya shug gi lo ma lde gur byas pa rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba de zas zos pa'i rjes la sbyar bar bya'o/_/shing mngar dang ni pi pi ling /_/byi dang ga dang rgun 'bru dang /_/han sa par+Ni'i rtsa ba rnams/_/
[\[250b.3\]]til mar bskol ba snar blugs bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing mngar la sogs pa'i sman lde gur btags pa til bskol te btsags pa snar blugs par bya'o/_/'bras chan mar dang bu ram bcas/_/zos la de rjes chu tshan btung /_/'o thug snum can blud pa dang /_/snum gyi dugs kyi
[\[250b.4\]]cho ga bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bu ram dang chang dang bcas pa'i 'bras chan zos la/_de'i rjes la chu bskol ba dro 'jam tsam btung bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'o thug la mar btab pa yang blud par bya ba dang /_de snum gyi dugs dag kyang rlung las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/mkhris
[\[250b.5\]]pa las gyur 'o ma'i shing /_/lde gu bskol ba'i zhun mar ni/_/sbrang rtsir bcas te de rjes ni/_/'o ma bskol te bsgrangs pa blud/_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa la ni 'o ma can gyi lde gu dang bskol ba'i zhun mar sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa blud la/_de'i rjes la 'o
[\[250b.6\]]ma bskol te bsgrangs pa blud par bya'o/_/shing mngar ma du ka 'o thug_/zhun mar bcas pa blud pa'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa la shing mngar dang ma du ka'i khu ba dang bcas par bskol ba'o thug la zhun mar btab pa byin na yang phan no/_/
[\[250b.7\]]ba la dri bzang bi da ri/_/shing mngar k+Sh-i ta bi da ri/_/rgyam tshar bcas pa bskol ba'i mar/_/skad 'gags sna sman bla med yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mkhris pa las gyur ba'i skad 'gags pa la ba la la sogs pa'i bi da ri rnam pa gnyis dang /_shing mngar sman gyi khu ba dang /_/
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]rgyam tsha dang bcas par bskol ba'i mar sna nas btang ba ni sna sman bla na med pa yin no/_/pra puN+Da rI ka shing mngar/_/pi pi ling dang bri ha ti/_/ba la 'o ma mar bskol te/_/skad 'gags pa yi sna sman mchog_/ces bya ba la/_pra puN+Da rI ka zhes bya ba stag tsher ba'i sman
[\[251a.2\]]dang 'o ma dang mar sar pa bskol ba'i sna sman de yang skad 'gags pa sel ba'i mchog yin no/_/mngar ba'i sde tshan phye ma ni/_/sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dzi ba ni la sogs pa mngar ba'i sde tshan gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i
[\[251a.3\]]skad 'gags pa sel to/_/bad kan las gyur tsha ba dang /_/zas rtsub ba gcin blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa la ni na le sham la sogs pa'i tsha ba dang zas rtsub pa bsten cing ba gcin dang bcas par blud par bya'o/_/kad pha la dang
[\[251a.4\]]skyu ru ra/_/tsha gsum til mar sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa la ni kad pha la la sogs pa'i sman til mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o/_/ya bak+Sha ra tsha ba gsum/_/kru trug tres dang dbyi mo dang /_/a ru ra dang sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/
[\[251a.5\]]zhes bya ba la/_yang bad kan las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa la ya bak+Sha ra la sogs pa'i sman sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o/_/nas thug til mar zhun mar dang /_/pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang nad de la nas thug pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra sbyar te g.yos pa'i
[\[251a.6\]]til mar dang /_zhun mar btab pa sbyin par bya'o/_/bca' sga dang ni pi pi ling /_/bza' ba'am skyug sman rnon po bsten/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad de la bca' sga dang pi pi ling bza' ba dang /_de'i rjes la zas gzhan bza' ba'am/_skyug sman rnon po gtang bar bya'o/_/sha kha ra
[\[251a.7\]]dang sbrang rtsir bsres/_/mngar ba'i sman dang lhan cig bskol/_/'o ma 'thungs pas skad gsang ni/_/chen por smras pa'i 'gags nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang skad gsang chen por smras pa'i dbang gis skad 'gags par gyur pa de la ni mngar ba'i sman sde dang bskol
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]ba'i 'o ma kha ra dang sbrang rtsi btab ste blud na sel bar byed do/_/yi ga 'chus la sna tshogs zas/_/phan pa'i sman dang sbyar ba sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yi ga 'chus pa'i nad la phan zhing yang ba'i zas sna tshogs sbyin zhing de yang de la phan pa'i sman dang sbyar te sbyin par bya'o/_/phyi dang
[\[251b.2\]]nang ni sbyang ba dang /_/sems dga' yid dang mthun sman sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang yi ga 'chus pa'i nad la ni sbyang ba khrus la sogs pa bya ba dang /_nang gi sbyang ba bkru sman dang skyug sman btang ba phan pa de bzhin du sems dga' zhing yid dang mthun pa sman dbang po tshim par byed
[\[251b.3\]]pa sbyin par bya'o/_/dus gnyis su ni so shing dag_/bca' zhing kha ni sbyang bya zhing /_/bska bas kha ni bkru ba dang /_/rjes su mthun pa'i dud pa brngub/_/ces bya ba la/_dus gnyis su zhes pa nang par dang zos pa'i rjes la so shing bca' bar bya ba la/_ji ltar bca' ba'i tshul ni kha
[\[251b.4\]]bska ba'i kha nad sbyangs pa'i skabs nas bshad do/_/de bzhin du rjes su mthun pa'i dud pa yang brngub par bya'o/_/da lis kyi ni ri lu dang /_/kha ra ga bur bcas pa sbyin/_/'bras khu zla ba'i zer ltar dkar/_/bza' ba yi ga 'byed pa'i mchog_/ces bya ba la/_da lis kyi phye mar bshad pa
[\[251b.5\]]gang dag yin pa dang /_ri lu'i sbyor ba byas pa de yang mchog tu yi ga 'byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du 'bras btags pa sprus pa mar la btsos pa'i khu ba zla ba'i 'od zer ltar dkar ba bza' ba yang yi ga 'byed pa'i mchog dam pa yin no/_/de las rlung gyur yi ga 'chus/_/ha re Nu
[\[251b.6\]]dang pi pi ling /_/byi dang ga dang ra sna dang /_/rgyam tsha dang ni dong gra dang /_/sug smel ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_/nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_/shing kun bcas pa mar ram ni/_/chang gi dwangs mar sbyar te btung /_/zhes bya ba la/_yi ga 'chus pa de rnams kyi nang nas rlung las
[\[251b.7\]]gyur pa'i yi ga 'chus pa la ni ha re Nu la sogs pa'i sman gyi phye ma mar dang sbyar ba'am/_chang gi dwangs ma dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/_/shu dag chus ni slon du gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_yang na rlung las gyur pa'i yi ga 'chus pa la ni shu dag gi chu blud la slon du gzhug
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]go/_/mkhris gyur bu ram chus slon gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i yi ga 'chus pa la ni bu ram dang sbyar ba'i chu blud la slon du gzhug go/_/kha ra dang ni zhun mar dang /_/rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir bcas pa sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris
[\[252a.2\]]pa las gyur pa'i yi ga 'chus pa la ni kha ra dang mar du bcas pa'am/_rgyam tsha dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud par bya'o/_/bad kan nim pa'i chus slon gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i yi ga 'chus pa la ni nim pa bskol ba'i chu blud la slon du gzhug go/_/la la phud
[\[252a.3\]]dang dong gra'i chu/_/sbrang rtsi'am chang rnying rno sbyar ba/_/bu ram sbrang rtsi chang bcas blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i yi ga 'chus pa la ni la la phud ces bya ba ti mu sa dang dong gra'i chu sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na chang rnying pa rnon po dang sman rnon po bskol ba bu ram dang sbrang rtsi
[\[252a.4\]]dang sbyar ba blud par bya'o/_/ha re Nu sogs phye ma ni/_/sngar bshad chu tshan sbyar ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na sngar bshad pa'i phye ma ha re Nu dang pi pi ling dang byi dang ga la sogs pa de chu dron dang sbyar te blud par bya'o/_/sug smel dang ni shing tsha dang /_/nA ga puSh+pa na le sham/_/pi pi ling dang
[\[252a.5\]]bca' sga rnams/_/rim bzhin cha res bskyed phye ma/_/kha ra dag dang mnyam sbyar bas/_/mchil mang yi ga 'chus pa dang /_/snying dang rtsib logs na lud pa/_/dbugs mi bde dang mgul nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_sug smel la sogs pa'i phye ma go rims bzhin du cha
[\[252a.6\]]res bskyed pa'i phye ma dang kha ra mnyam por sbyar ba'i phye mas ni mchil ma mang ba la sogs pa 'joms par byed do/_/cha res bskyed pa'i tshul ni sug smel zho gcig_/shing tsha zho gnyis/_nA ga ge sar zho gsum/_na le sham zho bzhi/_pi pi ling zho lnga/_bca' sga zho
[\[252a.7\]]drug ste/_de spyir bsdoms pa'i phye ma dang kha ra mnyam por sbyar bar bya'o/_/la la phud dang da trig dang /_/star bu bca' sga se'u 'bru dang /_/rgya shug zho ni gnyis gnyis byas/_/kha ra srang bzhi 'u su dang /_/go snyod shing tsha kha ru tsha/_/zho re pi pi ling 'bru brgya/_/
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]na le sham ni nyis brgya dag_/phyer btags yi ga 'byed pa'i mchog_/yid 'ong phyi sa 'gags pa dang /_/lud pa snying ga rtsib logs na/_/mcher pa gzhang 'brum pho nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_la la phud la sogs pa'i sman sna re re zho gnyis gnyis byas la khar srang bzhi dang /_
[\[252b.2\]]'u su la sogs pa'i sman sna bzhi po sna re zhing zho re/_pi pi ling 'brum bu brgya/_na le sham nyis brgya/_de thams cad phye mar btags pa de ni yi ga 'byed pa'i mchog yin zhing phyi sa 'gags pa la sogs pa bsal bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/bal bu'i lo ma na le sham/_/
[\[252b.3\]]dong gra dang ni pi pi ling /_/go rims bzhin du cha res bskyed/_/shing tsha sug smel dang po'i phyed/_/pi pi ling gi brgyad 'gyur gyi/_/kha rar sbyar ba'i phye ma de/_/drod skyed yi ga 'byed pa dang /_/lud pa lu dang dbugs mi bde/_/yi ga 'chus dang slon bro dang /_/mcher pa snying nad
[\[252b.4\]]rtsib logs zug_/skya rbab tshad 'khru rims nad 'joms/_/rlung 'khyil pa ni bde rgyu byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bal bu'i lo ma la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin du cha res bskyed de des na bal bu'i lo ma zho gcig_/na le sham zho gnyis/_dong gra zho gsum/_pi pi ling zho bzhi/_shing tsha
[\[252b.5\]]sug smel dang po zhes bya ba bal bu'i phyed de/_des na shing tsha zho phyed/_kha ra pi pi ling brgyad 'gyur du byas pa ste srang bzhi phye mar byas pa de ni pho ba'i me drod skyed pa dang yi ga 'byed cing zas len par byed pa dang /_lud pa la sogs pa'i nad 'joms par byed pa dang /_rlung 'khyil zhing
[\[252b.6\]]lam log par 'gro ba lugs bzhin du rgyu bar byed pa yin no/_/sug smel shing tsha pu shel tse/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis byas pa dang /_/nA ga ge sar srang phyed dang /_/gan d+ha b+ha dra srang phyed gzhug_/phyer btags bu ram rnying pa ni/_/srang ni nyi shu lnga nang bskol/_/sbrus te zho gnyis
[\[252b.7\]]tshad ri lur/_/byas pa'i yon tan de dag mnyam/_/zhes bya ba la/_sug smel la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa bzhin du sbyar te/_phye mar btags pa bu ram rnying pa srang nyi shu rtsa lnga'i nang du bskol la sbrus te zho gnyis kyi tshad ba ru ra'i rdog ma tsam gyi ri lur byas pa las re re
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]zos na yang da lis kyi phye ma dang mnyam pa'o/_/arka sle tres k+Sha ra'i chur/_/nas dang nub gcig spangs nas ni/_/chu dang zan ni sbrus nas su/_/byin te nyams stobs ldan slon gzhug_/de bzhin skam sa'i srog chags sha_/bsregs pa tsha dang kha sbyar sbyin/_/
[\[253a.2\]]zas ni skam zhing rab yang dang /_/tsa na ka sogs khu ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i mchil snabs mang ba'i nad la shing arka dang /_sle tres/_ya bak+Sha ra'i chur bcug la/_nas dang nub gcig sbangs nas chu dang zan du sbrus te nyams stobs dang ldan pa'i
[\[253a.3\]]mi la slon du gzhug go/_/yang de bzhin du de la skam sa'i srog chags kyi sha thur ma la bskyon te bsregs nas sman tsha ba dang kha bar sbyar te sbyin la yang zas kyi rnam pa skam bag dang /_rab tu yang ba byin la tsa na ka'i khu ba blud par bya'o/_/bad kan gyis rab mchil ma mang /_/
[\[253a.4\]]rlung gis mchil mang skyed par byed/_/de ni bad kan mchil mar bshad/_/snum dang dro bas de bsal bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i mchil ma mang po yang dang yang du 'byung ba na rlung 'phel bas bad kan gyi mchil ma'i ljan ljin skyed cing 'byin par byed la/_'di ni
[\[253a.5\]]bad kan las gyur pa'i mchil ma mang ba yin par bshad pas/_de la sman pas snum dro ba'i sman dang zas btang bas de bsal bar bya'o/_/rims 'di cham pa dag dang ni/_/slon pa'i nad la'ang sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyis mchil ma mang ba'i gso ba'i rim
[\[253a.6\]]pa de ni cham pa zhes bya ba sna chu 'dzag pa'i nad dang /_slon zhing skyug pa'i nad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/mchog tu cham par bsku ba dang /_/snum dang dugs kyi cho ga bya/_/mgo dang lkog ma rtsib logs su/_/'bras khur snum bcas dugs bya zhing /_/lan tshwa skyur dang kha dang tsha/_/sha
[\[253a.7\]]khu snum dang bcas pa sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mchog gam khyad par du cham pa'i nad la ni lus bsku ba dang /_snum bsten pa dang /_de bzhin du mgo bo dang /_lkog ma la sogs par 'bras khur btsags pa snum can gyis dugs bya ba dang /_sha khu snum dang sbyar ba blud pa dang /_
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]ro lan tshwa dang /_skyur ba dang /_kha ba dang /_tsha ba bsten cing sbyin par bya ba'o/_/mgo dang snying ga rtsib logs gzer/_/nad gzhi ji bzhin gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mgo bo la sogs pa'i nad la nad dmigs ji lta ba las de'i gso ba'i dpyad bya'o/_/chu dang rlan can gnas
[\[253b.2\]]pa'i sha/_/legs sbyar dkri ba'i dugs bya zhing /_/der ni snum bzhi'i sbyor ba bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_chu dang rlan can na gnas pa'i srog chags kyi shas dkri ba'i dugs kyi rnam pa bya la/_de yang legs par sbyar zhing lan tshwa dang shing kun la sogs pa'i sman sbyar bas dugs
[\[253b.3\]]bya'o/_/yang cham pa'i nad de la snum gyi cho gar bshad pa dag gis dugs bya zhing bsku ba yang bsngags pa yin no/_/nad gzhi 'dres par gyur pa la/_/rgya spos shu ti shing mngar dang /_/tsan+dan mar gyi lde gus byug_/ces bya ba la/_nad gzhi 'dres pa ste mkhris pa dang bad
[\[253b.4\]]kan 'dres par gyur pa la/_rgya spos la sogs pa'i sman sbyar ba'i snum gyis byugs pa phan no/_/ba la ra sna til mar dang /_/shing mngar ut+pal mar de bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du nad gzhi 'dres par gyur pa de la ba la la sogs pa'i sman dang sbyar ba'i mar
[\[253b.5\]]gyis bsku ba de de bzhin du bsngags pa yin no/_/ba spru ba dang shi kru dang /_/ba la ra mnye bi da ri/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi 'dres pa la ba spru ba dang /_shi kru zhes bya ba so ban dzi dang ba la dang /_ra mnye ba dang /_bi da ri'i lde gu snum dang sbyar ba'i bsku ba yang bsngags pa
[\[253b.6\]]yin no/_/sna sman dud pa brngub pa dang /_/zas zos 'og tu snum bsten cing /_/til mar gyis ni bsku ba dang /_/de bzhin 'jam rtsi'i las rab bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du mgo dang rtsib logs dang phrag par na zhing zug pa la ni rtsib logs dang sna nas
[\[253b.7\]]btang ba dang dud pa brngub pa dang /_zas zos pa'i 'og tu snum bsten cing bza' ba dang /_ba la'i til mar la sogs pa'i til mar gyis bsku ba dang /_de bzhin du 'jam rtsi mas gtong ba'i las bya ba ni mchog tu bsngags pa yin no/_/yang na rngabs rwa la sogs
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]pas/_/nad dmigs ji bzhin nad khrag dbyung /_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du mgo dang rtsib logs gzer zhing nad gzhi 'dres pa dang ldan pa de la rngabs rwa dang /_srin bu pad pa dang /_bsku ba la zhal zhal gdab pa la sogs pa nad dmigs ji skad
[\[254a.2\]]bstan pa bzhin du khrag dbyung bar bya ste/_rlung las gyur pa'i nad khrag dbyung bar bya/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i srin bu pad pas/_bad kan las gyur pa'i bsku bas dbyung bar bya'o/_/shug pa tsan+dan pu shel tsi/_/mar bcas sde gus bsku ba 'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[254a.3\]]yang na khrag can la ni shug pa la sogs pa'i lde gu mar dang sbyar ba bskus pas phan no/_/drur ba shing mngar btsod dang ni/_/nA ga ge sar mar sbyar bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na drur ba la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu mar dang sbyar ba bskus na yang phan no/_/n+ya gro d+ha sogs
[\[254a.4\]]bskol til mar/_/lan brgya bkrus pa'i mar gyis ni/_/bsku ba'am 'o ma shing mngar chus/_/blugs par gyur pa 'ang bsngags pa yin/_/yang na khrag de nyid n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa ste/_n+ya gro d+ha'i sde tshan las bshad pa'i sman dang bskol ba'i til mar gyis bskus na yang
[\[254a.5\]]phan no/_/yang na chu grang mo'i nang du lan mang du bkrus shing lag pas mnyes pa'i mar sar gyis bskus na yang phan no/_/yang na 'o ma 'ba' zhig gis blugs pa phan pa yin no/_/yang na shing mngar gyi chu blugs pa yang phan pa yin no/_/phal cher me drod nyams pa'i
[\[254a.6\]]phyir/_/ma zhu be'u snabs bcas 'khru na/_/de la pho ba'i tshad 'khru yi/_/skabs su bshad pa'i sman bsten phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen po'i nad dang ldan pa dag ni phal cher gyi nang du pho ba'i me drod nyams shing bri ba yin pa'i phyir/_ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs dang bcas
[\[254a.7\]]par 'khru bar 'gyur la/_de bas nad de la pho ba'i nad gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa dang /_tshad pas 'khru ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i sman de dag nad dmigs dang sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o/_/zad byed ldan pa'i bshang ba ni/_/rnam pa kun tu bsrung bya ste/_/de yi lus zungs
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]kun zad pas/_/de stobs bshang ba'i stobs kyis gnas/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen pos btab pa'i nad pa de lus skam zhing rid par gyur pas na de'i phyir bshang ba ci nas kyang shas cher mi 'byung bar bsrung bar bya ste/_gang gi phyir gcong chen po'i nad kyis thebs pa
[\[254b.2\]]de'i lus zungs kun zad par 'gyur bas de'i nyams stobs ni bshang ba la gnas pa'i stobs kyis gnas par byed pa yin pas ci nas kyang bshang ba shas cher mi 'byung zhing /_'khru ba la sogs pa mi 'gyur ba de ltar bsrung bar bya'o/_/rigs pas sha rnams kho na sbyin/_/
[\[254b.3\]]skom du rgun chang blud par bya/_/shugs ni bkag par gyur pa yis/_/gcong chen gyis ni glags mi rnyed/_/ces bya ba la/_gcong chen po'i nad dang ldan pa de la rigs shing ran par sha rnams kho na sbyin par bya zhing bza' bar bya la/_skom zhing 'tshal nan du rgun chang
[\[254b.4\]]blud par bya zhing /_de bzhin du bshang ba'i shugs bkag par gyur pas gcong chen po'i nad kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/chang dang chang dwangs rgun chang dang /_/chang rnying bu ram sbrang chang dang /_/ci rigs par ni blud pa dang /_/sha ni sbyin pa nyid du bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong
[\[254b.5\]]chen po'i mi de la bza' bar sha byin nas chang dang chang gi dwangs ma la sogs pa ci rigs blud par bya'o/_/bu ga'i rgyun 'gags dag phyir dang /_/stobs dang mdangs ni rgyas bya'i phyir/_/snum dang 'o ma chus gang ba'i/_/snod du lus ni bying bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de la
[\[254b.6\]]bu ga'i rgyun srang nad kyis 'gags pa de dag par bya ba'i phyir dang /_lus kyi stobs dang mdangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir snum gyis gang ba'i snod dang 'o mas gang ba'i snod dang sman gyi chus gang ba'i snod du lus bying bar bya ba'am/_nad dmigs ji lta ba bzhin du gzhug par
[\[254b.7\]]bya'o/_/phyung nas bsres pa'i snum gyis ni/_/bsku zhing lag pas bde bar mnye/_/bde bar 'dug par gyur pa la/_/dal gyis lde gus dril bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus bying ba'i chu las slar phyung ste/_bsres pa'i snum gyis slar yang lus bsku zhing lag pas
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]dal gyis mnye ba dang /_bde bar lus phab ste 'dug par gyur pa dal gyis lde gus dril bar bya'o/_/dzi ban ti dang dUr ba dang /_/btsod dang a shwa gan d+ha dang /_/a ba marga ba spru ba/_/ag ni man ti shing mngar dang /_/ba la yungs kar bi da ri/_/ru rta 'bras dang
[\[255a.2\]]zar ma dang /_/mon sran gre'u gnyis til dang phabs/_/thams cad gcig tu btags nas ni/_/nas kyi phye ni sum 'gyur dang /_/zho dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig sbyar/_/'di dag gis ni dril phyi bya/_/sha rgyas mdog bzang stobs skyed byed/_/ces bya ba la/_dzi ban ti nas phabs kyi
[\[255a.3\]]bar gcig nas phye mar btags la phye ma de dag gi sum 'gyur gyi nas kyi rjen phye dang bsres la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'dis lus la dril phyis byas na/_de'i sha rgyas pa dang /_mdog bzang ba dang /_stobs skyed par 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar ser po'i lde gu dang /_/'tsho byed sde tshan
[\[255a.4\]]dang sbyar ba/_/khrus kyi sman gyis khrus bya zhing /_/dus tshigs bde ba'i chus khrus bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang zad byed kyi nad dang ldan pa de yungs kar gyi lde gu dang 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan gyi sman dang bskol ba'i chus khrus kyi sman dri bzang po dag gi khrus de yang dus tshigs dang rjes su mthun
[\[255a.5\]]zhing lus bde ba skyed par byed do/_/dri dang phreng ba sogs kyis brgyan/_/bkra mi shis pa 'jigs pa bstan/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar khrus byas nas dri dang phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan zhing spud pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa'i 'jigs pa mdangs dang skal ba skyed par byed pa'i dngos
[\[255a.6\]]po la bstan par bya'o/_/mdza' bshes blta zhing glu dang ni/_/rol mo mnyan zhing dga' ston bya/_/'jam rtsi 'o ma zhun mar dang /_/sha dang chang bsten tshul la gnas/_/lha la brten pa'i cho ga dang /_/mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen po
[\[255a.7\]]dang ldan pa'i mi de mdza' bshes yid du 'ong ba la lta ba dang /_glu la sogs pa la mnyan pa la dga' ston gyi rnam pa bya ba dang /_'jam rtsi dang 'o ma dang zhun mar bsten pa dang /_de bzhin du sha la sogs pa bsten pa dang /_tshul legs pa la gnas par bya ba dang /_lha la
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]brten pa'i cho ga gtor ma dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa la gnas pa dang /_mchod pa'i las la brtson pa dag kyang phan pa yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa'i tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la
[\[255b.2\]]dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_gso ba'i gnas le'u lnga pa'i rnam par 'grel ba'o//_//de nas slon pa'i nad dang snying nad dang skom dad gso ba'i gnas bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi'i rims kyis slon pa la sogs pa'i gso ba'i
[\[255b.3\]]rim pas 'byung bas na de brtsams te bshad pa yin no/_/slon nad phal cher ma zhu ba'i/_/gnas 'khrugs las byung de yi phyir/_/rlung ma gtogs la dang por ni/_/smyung byas skyug sman btang ba phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_slon nad phal cher ni ma zhu ba'i gnas nas
[\[255b.4\]]'khrugs shing slongs pa las byung ba yin la/_des na rlung las gyur pa ma gtogs pa dag la ni dang por smyung ba byas nas skyug sman gtang ba phan pa yin no/_/stobs ldan rgyun du slon gyur cing /_/nad mang gyur la gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la skyug sman de yang
[\[255b.5\]]nyams stobs dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la sbyar bar bya'i nyams stobs zhan pa la ni ma yin pa de yang rgyun du slon zhing nad mang la/_phal cher slon par gyur pa la skyug sman gtang bar bya'o/_/de 'og rim gyis bkru sman ni/_/yid 'ong chang rgun chu sogs sam/_/'o mas
[\[255b.6\]]btang gyur de mod la/_/gyen 'byung nang ni thur du 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar slon sman btang ba'i 'og tu bkru sman gtang bar bya ste/_de la yang rim gyis bya'i cig car ni ma yin no/_/de yang yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar byed pa bkru sman chang dang rgun chu la sogs
[\[255b.7\]]pa dang lhan cig btang ba'am/_yang na 'o ma dang lhan cig bkru sman gtang bar bya ste/_gang gi phyir bkru sman de btang bar gyur na/_de'i mod la gyen du 'byung zhing slon pa'i nad thur du 'byung bar byed do/_/zhi ba'i sman ni rtsub pa ste/_/nyam chung ba yang de nyid
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du zhi bar bya ba'i sman 'bras yos la sogs pa rtsub bag gis bya la/_skyes bu nyam chung ba dag la ni zhi bar bya ba'i sman de nyid bya'i sbyang ba'i sman mi bya ste/_sbyang ba'i sman sbyar mi bzod pa'i phyir ro/_/zas ni skam
[\[256a.2\]]zhing yi gar 'ong /_/goms shing yang ba bsngags pa yin/_/de bzhin smyung ba yu sha dang /_/sha khu 'ba' cha skam pa la/_/tshod ma lde gu bza' ba dang /_/btung ba dri bzangs pa na ka_/ro drug zas skom sna tshogs dang /_/'bras bu khrus dang mnye ba dang /_/dri
[\[256a.3\]]zhim 'bras bu me tog skyes/_/zas dang skom la spyod pa dang /_/zos ma thag tu 'phral du ni/_/chu grang gis ni gdong bkru bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_slon pa'i nad la zas kyang skam zhing slon bag ma yin par sbyin pa dang /_yi gar 'ong zhing snying dga' bar byed pa dang /_goms
[\[256a.4\]]shing rgyun du bsten la dus yun ring por zos pa dang /_tshad dang rdzas kyi rang bzhin gyis yang ba de lta bu'i kha zas sbyin pa ni bsngags pa yin no/_/yang de bzhin du smyung bar bya zhing /_zas bcad pa dang /_yu sha zhes bya ba mon sran sde'u la sogs pa'i khu ba las
[\[256a.5\]]byas pa'i btung ba dang /_sha khu dang 'ba' cha ste rtsa ba dang 'bras bu las byas pa dang /_skam pa la zhes bya ba phal cher til gyi lde gu dang skyur bag las ba byas pa ste/_de yang gzhung las/_/de la sha la sha khu ste/_/'bru las yu sha 'bras bu las/_/kha lo'i
[\[256a.6\]]rtsa ba til rtsig skyur/_/las byas skam pa li kar bshad/_/ces 'byung ba yin no/_/tshod ma ni tshod ma'i sde tshan las bshad pa'i rigs sna tshogs pa'o/_/lde gu ni lde gur sbyar nas lhag pa'i sman rnams so/_/bza' ba ni bza' ba dang btung
[\[256a.7\]]ba rnams so/_/btung ba dri bzangs ni rgun chu la sogs pa las byas pa'i btung ba'i dri zhim po dang sbyar ba'o/_/bad kan ni sbrang chu dang dri sna gsum la sogs pa la sbyar ba'o/_/ro drug pa ni phal cher skyur ba'i shas dang ldan zhing se'u 'brul sogs pa la
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]sbyar ba'i tshod ma bshad pa zhes bya'o/_/zas skam po sna tshogs ni la du la sogs pa'o/_/'bras bu ni shing tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi sde tshan la bsten pa'o/_/khrus ni chu dri zhim po dro 'jam tsam gyis bkru ba'o/_/mnye ba ni rgya mtsho'i lbu ba la sogs
[\[256b.2\]]pas mnye ba'o/_/dri zhim pa ni dri zhim pa'i sman dang sbyar ba ste/_dri de dag kyang 'bras bu dang me tog las byung ba ste/_'dir dri zhes bya ba'i sgras ni dri sman dag kyang bya'o/_/yang de bzhin du zas skom la sogs pa la spyad ma thag du 'phral du de'i mod la chu
[\[256b.3\]]grang gis gtor zhing blugs pa'am slon pa'i nad rnams la phan pa yin no/_/de dag ni slon zhing skyug bro ba'i nad thams cad kyi spyi'i gso ba bshad pa yin no/_/rlung las gyur pa'i slon pa'i nad/_/rgyam tsha mar bcas dro ba'am/_/tsha gsum lan tshwa gsum sbyar
[\[256b.4\]]bas/_/lud pa dang ni snying 'dzag dang /_/bcas pa sel bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i slon nad la ni rgyam tsha dang zhun mar sbyar ba nyung zad dro bas sel bar byed do/_/de las kyang mchog tu lud pa dang snying 'dzag cing na ba dang bcas
[\[256b.5\]]pa'i slon bro ba sel to/_/yang na tsha ba gsum dang lan tshwa gsum/_/zhes bya ba lce myang tsha dang kha ru tsha dang /_kha ru tsha nag po dang /_zhes bya ba gsum dang sbyar ba'i zhun mar blud na yang rlung las gyur pa'i slon nad sel to/_/se'u 'bru'i khu ba bca' sga
[\[256b.6\]]dang /_/'u su zho dang mar bskol ba'am/_/chu dang 'o ma cha mnyam pa/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na se'u 'bru'i khu ba dang bca' sga dang 'u su dang /_zhor bsres pa dang bskol ba'i mar blud na rlung las gyur pa'i slon nad 'joms so/_/yang na chu dang 'o ma
[\[256b.7\]]cha mnyam pa blud na rlung las gyur pa'i slon bro ba sel to/_/khron gyi zas tshol sha khu ni/_/'bras skyur rgyam tsha mar shas che/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na khron gyi zas tshol ba'i khyim bya la sogs pa'i sha khu se'u 'bru la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang sbyar
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]zhing zhun mar dang rgyam tsha shas cher btab pa blud na yang rlung las gyur pa'i slon bro ba 'joms so/_/kha zas snum po bca' sga dang /_/zho dang se 'brur sbyar ba'am/_/rgyam tshar bcas pa dro 'jam phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha zas snum
[\[257a.2\]]bag tu bca' zhing bca' sga la sogs pa sbyar ba la rgyam tsha btab pa dro 'jam tsam byin na yang phan no/_/'dir ni bkru sman lan tshwa dang /_/snum dang dro bar bcas pa phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las skyes pa'i slon nad 'di la snum dang seng phrom la sogs pa
[\[257a.3\]]dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman lan tshwa dang sbyar zhing chu dro ba btang na phan no/_/mkhris pa las gyur bkru sman phyir/_/rgun 'bru bu ram shing khu dang /_/dur byid sbyar ba'i bkru sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i slon bro ba'i bkru sman bya ba'i phyir rgun
[\[257a.4\]]'bru'i khu ba dang bu ram shing gi khu ba dang dur byid du sbyar ba'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/_/zhun mar seng phrom sbyar ba gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i slon bro ba dang /_seng phrom dang zhun mar sbyar ba gtang bar bya ste/_de yang seng phrom
[\[257a.5\]]srang brgyad ces bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bshad pa ltar bya'o/_/'phel te bad kan gnas khyab pa'i/_/mkhris par mngar dang kha ba yis/_/gyen du drangs la/_zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i slon bro ba 'phel bar 'gyur te/_bad kan gyi
[\[257a.6\]]gnas khyab par gyur pa la ni mkhris pa'i nad de sman mngar ba dang kha ba dag gis gyen du drangs la slon par bya'i sman gtang bar ni mi bya'o/_/dag gyur nas/_'bras yos kha ra bcas pa las/_/skyo ma'am nas thug blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrus dang slon
[\[257a.7\]]gyis de dag cing sbyangs par gyur na 'bras yos kha ra dang bcas pa las skyo mar byas te blud pa'am nas thug gi nang du sbrang rtsi dang kha ra btab pa blud par bya'o/_/sA lu drug cu pa yi chan/_/skam sa'i sha khu mung+ga'i khu/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du skam sa'i sha
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]khu dang mung+ga'i khu ba yu sha zhes bya ba dang /_sA lu rtsa snar ram 'bras drug cu pa'i chan sbags te bza' ba sbyin par bya'o/_/so phag bsregs te chur bcug gsur/_/shin tu bsgrangs pa'i chu blud pa'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_skom du ni so phag legs par bsregs te
[\[257b.2\]]chu'i nang du bcug la gsur ba'i chu dwangs ma shin tu legs par bsgrangs la blud par bya'o/_/mung+ga 'u su pu shel tse/_/pi pi ling dang nub gcig sbangs/_/zhes bya ba la/_mon sran sde'u dang 'u su la sogs pa'i sman dang nub gcig spangs pa'i chu bskol te bsgrangs
[\[257b.3\]]pa blud par bya'o/_/yang na rgun chu bu ram shing /_/sle tres chu 'am 'o ma blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i slon bro ba la rgun 'bru'i chu'am/_bu ram gyi khu ba'am/_sle tres bskol ba'i chu'am/_'o ma gang yang rung ba blud par bya'o/_/'dzam bu a
[\[257b.4\]]mra'i lo ma dang /_/u shir n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu/_/bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi ni/_/btab ste blud na slon pa dang /_/rims dang tshad 'khru brgyal ba dang /_/skom dad che ba mi bzad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing 'dzam bu dang a mra gnyis kyi lo ma ni u shi ra zhes bya ba
[\[257b.5\]]pu shel tse dang /_/shing n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu bskol ba'i chu bsgrangs te sbrang rtsi btab pa blud na yang slon pa la sogs pa'i nad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/skyu ru ra'i khu tsan dan bcas/_/mung+ga ba la'i chu blud phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na slon nad de la skyu ru ra bskol ba'i chu bsgrangs
[\[257b.6\]]par tsan+dan dkar po lde gu dang sbyar ba blud par bya'o/_/yang na mung+ga dang ba la chur nub gcig sbangs pa blud par bya'o/_/rgya shug tshi gu kha ra dkar/_/'bras yos sbra tshil pi pi ling /_/dngul rdo sbrang rtsi'am a ru ra/_/rgun 'bru'am rgya shug dang sbyar phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[257b.7\]]yang slon nad de la rgya shug gi tshi gu la sogs pa'i sman sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na a ru ra sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_rgun 'bru sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_rgya shug sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin par bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur nim pa dang /_/pi pi ling dang po son cha/_/
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]yungs kar chu dron gyis slon bya/_/nyam chung ba la smyung ba bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i slon bro ba la ni nim pa la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i chu dro 'jam tsam byas pa blud la slon par bya'o/_/gal te nad pa nyam chung ba la ni slon par
[\[258a.2\]]mi bya'i/_smyung bar byas pa des zhi bar bya'o/_/dong ga la sogs khu ba bskol/_/bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i slon bro ba la dong ga la sogs pa'i sman gyi sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab
[\[258a.3\]]pa blud na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nas kyi skyo ma slon 'joms pa'i/_/sman dag dang ni sbyar ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang bad kan gyi slon bro ba la ni nas kyi phye dang /_slon 'joms pa'i sman 'bras yos dang /_rgya shug dang se'u 'bru la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba
[\[258a.4\]]dang nas phye dang sbyar te de'i zan nam skyo ma blud par bya'o/_/bad kan 'joms zas yi gar 'ong /_/btung ba zin thig bu srin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang bad kan las gyur pa'i slon bro ba la ni/_bad kan 'joms pa'i zas 'bras yos la sogs pa las g.yos
[\[258a.5\]]pa'i zas rgun 'bru la sogs pa las byas pa'i btung ba ra gzhes bya ba ro drug pa/_zin thig le dang /_bu srin dang bcas pa blud na yang bad kan las gyur pa'i slon bro ba sel to/_/zin thig le ni ar dza ka dang /_ku the ra zhes bya ba'o/_/bu srin ni ka tri na'o/_/ldong
[\[258a.6\]]ros dang ni pi pi ling /_/na le sham ni skyur rtsi che/_/ka pid tha yi khu ba dang /_/sbrang rtsir bcas pas slon nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_ldong ros la sogs pa'i sman gsum pa skyur rtsi chen po zhes bya ba bi dza pu ra'i khu ba dang /_ka pid tha'i khu ba dang sbyar zhing sbrang rtsi dang sbyar
[\[258a.7\]]ba blud na slon nad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/ka pid tha dang tsha ba gsum/_/byi tsher sbrang rtsir sbyar ba sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i slon bro ba la ni/_ka pid tha dang tsha ba gsum sbyar ba sbyin pa'am/_yang na byi tsher ba dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o/_/mthun
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]pa'i spyod pa byas pa yis/_/mi sdug yul mthong las byung sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_yul mi sdug pa mthong ba las byung ba'i slon bro ba la ni/_yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa yid dga' zhing dbugs phyung bas mgu bar byas pa'i spyod pa byas pas sel bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[258b.2\]]srin bu las byung srin bu yi/_/sman du bshad pa rnams kyis gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_srin bu las byung ba'i slon bro ba la ni srin bu las gyur pa'i snying nad kyi skabs su bshad pa'i sman rnams kyis gso zhing zhi bar bya'o/_/lhag ma nad dmigs ji bzhin du/_/de zhi 'gyur
[\[258b.3\]]ba'i dpyad kyis gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_slon pa'i nad lhag ma skom dad dang ma zhu ba dang yid mi bde ba skyes par gyur pa dag la ni/_rang gi nad dmigs ji lta ba bzhin du rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa la phan pa'i sman gyis zhi bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin du de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i
[\[258b.4\]]spyod pa skom dad dang /_slon pa la sogs pa la gang dag phan par 'gyur ba dag gis gso bar bya'o/_/slon pa'i skabs su rlung gi nad rnams ni/_/lus zungs zad pas nges par ldang 'gyur ro/_/de bas 'dir ni skyug sman sbyor drags pa'i/_/skabs bshad bcad
[\[258b.5\]]dang brta ba'i cho ga bya/_/bu ram zhun mar sha khu dge ba che/_/tsha ba gsum dang 'tsho byed sman mar dang /_/'o thug dang ni phan pa'i lde gu yis/_/rgyun du slon pa zhi ba nyid du bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir slon pa'i skabs su ni slon pa'i lus zungs zad par bya
[\[258b.6\]]ba'i phyir nges pa kho nar ldang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na skabs 'dir ni skyug sman gyi sbyor ba drags pa'i skabs su slon drags pas nad 'gyur ba'i gso bar bshad pa des/_gcad pa dang brta ba'i cho ga gang dag yin pa bya'o/_/de bzhin du bu
[\[258b.7\]]ram dang /_zhun mar dang /_sha khu dang /_dge ba chen po'i sman mar la sogs pa dus ji lta ba bzhin du nad dmigs dang lus zungs kyi tshul dang sbyar te rgyun du slon pa zhi ba nyid du bya'o/_/snying nad rlung gyur til mar ni/_/skyur rtsabs dar ba zho ga chu/_/ldan pa tsha na dro
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]'jam blud/_/des ni lto sbos skran kyang 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_snying gi nad rlung las gyur pa la ni 'bras khu dang skyur du gyur pa skyur rtsabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i til mar bskol ba blud par bya ste/_de yang dro 'jam tsam du byas
[\[259a.2\]]la blud par bya'o/_/des ni de'i lto sbos pa la sogs pa 'joms par byed do/_/til mar lan tshwar bcas dang skyur/_/ba gcin bskol ba'ang de dang mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_sgyur bag skyur rtsabs la sogs pa dang ba gcin dang lan tshwa thams cad dang til mar lhan
[\[259a.3\]]cig bskol la tshos par gyur pa 'thungs na yang yon tan de dang 'dra ste/_rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad dang /_/lto sbo ba dang skran nad 'joms pa yin no/_/bil ba ra sna rgya shug nas/_/thang shing dang ni ba spru ba/_/rgya sran rtsa ba lnga pa rnams/_/bskol ba'i chu der til mar ni/_/
[\[259a.4\]]bskol ba de ni snar btang dang /_/btung dang 'jam rtsir gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bil ba la sogs pa bskol nas sman gyi khu ba til mar bzhi 'gyur dang bskol la til mar de sna nas btang ba dang 'jam rtsi mas gtong ba'i sbyor ba bya'o/_/bca' sga rgyam tsha bye'u rug pa/_/
[\[259a.5\]]sle tres shing kun ma nu dang /_/a ru ra dang mar bskol ba/_/snying nad rtsib logs gzer skran 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_bca' sga la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa 'dir ma smos su zin kyang mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi chu dang bskol la/_de'i khu ba dang mar bskol ba'i sman
[\[259a.6\]]mar de zos na yang snying nad la sogs pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/kha ru tsha ni srang gnyis dang /_/a ru ra ni lnga bcu dang /_zhun mar bre gang bskol rtsib logs/_/snying nad skran dbugs mi bde sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha ru tsha srang gnyis dang a ru rdog ma lnga bcu lde gur byas
[\[259a.7\]]pa chu bre bzhi'i nang du bskol la de'i khu ba dang mar bre gang bskol ba'i sman mar gyis ni rtsib logs kyi nad dang snying nad la sogs pa 'joms par byed do/_/se'u 'bru bca' sga kha ru tsha/_/shing kun star bu phye mar sbyar/_/rlung nad gzhan dbang can snying nad/_/dbugs mi bde ba sel
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_se'u 'bru la sogs pa'i sman lnga phye mar sbyar bas rlung nad gzhan dbang can la sogs pa sel bar byed pa'i mchog yin te/_rlung nad gzhan dbang can ni 'og nas bshad do/_/gang du tshad ni ma bshad par/_/cha ni mnyam por btags
[\[259b.2\]]par bya/_/zhes bya ba'i tshig sman gyi khu ba bskol ba dang lde gu dang nas thug sbrus pa dang phye ma la sogs pa dran par bya'o/_/ma nu zur pa bca' sga dang /_/skyur rtsi che rtsa a ru ra'i/_/lde gu ya bak+Sha ra dang /_/mngar skyur lan tshwa ldan pa 'thungs/_/bcad snyam sems pa'i gzer
[\[259b.3\]]'joms byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ma nu zhes bya ba puSh+kar mU la la sogs pa'i sman btab ste lde gur byas te ya bak+Sha ra la sogs pa dang bcas pa ni snying bcad cing gtub pa snyam du sems pa'i nad 'joms par byed do/_/skyur rtsi chen po'i rtsa ba ni ma du lung ga'i rtsa ba ste/_bi dza pu
[\[259b.4\]]ra'i rtsa ba'o/_/ya bak+Sha ra ni nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba'o/_/rgyam tsha la la phud k+Sha ra/_/shu dag go snyod bca' sga dang /_/thang shing skyur rtsi chen po dang /_/zur pa ma nu pa la sha_/bskol khu 'jam 'thungs yon tan mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyam tsha la sogs pa sman
[\[259b.5\]]gyi lde gu bskol ba dro 'jam tsam 'thungs na yang yon tan gong ma dang 'dra ste snying bcad pa snyam du sems pa'i gzer 'joms pa yin no/_/tsha lnga zur pa a ru ra/_/bu ram ma nu skyur rtsi che/_/chang btags lde gu mar til mar/_/brngos te rgyam tshar ldan 'thungs na/_/snying
[\[259b.6\]]nad rtsib logs mo mtshan zug_/skran dang dmu rdzing nad rnams sel/_/'di la snum gyis dugs byas phan/_/sman mar gyi ni sbyor ba phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad 'di la ni snum gyis dugs bya ba dang sman mar gyi sbyor ba phan no/_/skom la rtsa ba chung ngu
[\[259b.7\]]lnga'am/_/bca' sga dang ni bskol ba'i chu'am/_/chang gi dwangs ma zho ga chu/_/'bras bu'i rang skyur blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_skom pa dang bcas pa'i snying nad la rtsa ba chung ngu lnga bskol ba'i chu blud pa'am/_bca' sga dang bskol ba'i chu dwangs ma'am zhog chu'am/_'bras bu
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]rang skyur kan dzi zhes bya ba blud par bya'o/_/bya rmyang res gzer ma zhur bcas/_/snying la rlung gis gnod gyur la/_/bya ba 'di bya/_zhes bya ba la/_bya rmyang ni rkang lag rkyong ba la sogs pa ste/_de dag la sogs pa dang ldan par gyur pa'i snying nad la yang sngar
[\[260a.2\]]bshad pa'i gso ba'i sbyor ba 'di nyid bya'o/_/snying 'dzag cing /_/'phar dang gcin snyi bcas pa la/_/sreg pa khrung khrung rma bya dang /_/dgo ba khyim bya snum mang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang snying nad snying 'dzag pa la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i rlung las gyur pa ni/_sreg
[\[260a.3\]]pa la sogs pa'i sha khu snum mang po dang brngos shing snum mang po btab pa phan no/_/snying nad bcas la ba la'i mar/_/yang na skyi de ba'i mar blud/_/shing mngar lan brgyar btsos pa'am/_/de bzhin snum chen mchog tu phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_snying nad dang bcas
[\[260a.4\]]pa'i skyes bus ba la'i til mar rlung nad gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa blud par bya'o/_/yang na skyi de ba'i sman mar bya ba'i skabs su bshad pa blud par bya'o/_/yang na shing mngar lan brgyar btsos pa'i mar rlung nad drag po gso ba'i skabs su shing mngar srang brgya
[\[260a.5\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bstan pa'i til mar dang lan brgya bskol zhing btsos pa blud par bya'o/_/yang na de bzhin du snum chen po'i mchog blud na yang phan no/_/snum chen po bsten pa'i phyir smras pa ni/_ra sna 'tsho byed dzi ban ti/_/ba la bya kri ba sbru ba/_/ga
[\[260a.6\]]bra'i rtsa ba ti ra dang /_/shu dag tsha ba gsum dang ni/_/snum chen zhes bya bskol bar bya/_/zho ni bzhi cha de bzhin skyur/_/ji snyed pa las sbyar ba bsten/_/tshim byed brtas byed stobs skyed cing /_/rlung gi snying nad 'joms pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ra sna la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde
[\[260a.7\]]gu dang /_snum chen po zhes bya ba'i zhun mar dang /_rkang dang zhag la sogs pa bskol bar bya ba de yang zho bzhi cha dang /_de bzhin du skyur rtsabs dang /_zho ga chu dang dar ba la sogs pa ji snyed pa la snum gyi cho ga 'di nyid sbyar bar bya ste/_lnga nag po la sogs pa'i rdzas/_/snum nag
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]so sor mnyam bya ba/_/zhes bya ba'i tshul du bya'o/_/snum chen po de bsten na dbang po tshim par byed pa dang /_lus brtas par byed pa dang /_stobs skyed cing 'phel ba dang /_rlung gi snying nad 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/snying nad drod chen 'phar ba ni/_/rlung las gyur pa'i snying
[\[260b.2\]]nad la/_/'o ma zho dang bu ram mar/_/chu dang rlan can sha dag phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad me drod che zhing 'phar zhing 'gul ba la 'o ma blud na phan pa yin la/_yang de bzhin du zho dang bu ram dang zhun mar phan la/_yang de bzhin du chu dang rlan can gyi sa la gnas
[\[260b.3\]]pa'i srog chags kyi sha la sogs pa byin na yang phan pa yin no/_/'di ma gtogs pa'i snying nad ni/_/bzhi po dag la spang bar bya/_/rlung can rengs dang be'u snabs can/_/tshor med lhag ma rnams la'ang spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad ma gtogs
[\[260b.4\]]pa snying nad de las zhen pa bzhi po mkhris pa dang bad kan dang 'dus pa dang srin bu las gyur pa'i snying nad bzhi po la ni 'o ma la sogs pa 'di dag spang bar bya ste sbyin par mi bya'o/_/de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad rengs pa dang be'u snabs can la
[\[260b.5\]]sogs pa la yang 'o ma la sogs pa 'di dag spang bar bya'o/_/bad kan 'dres gyur de la ni/_/rtsub drod bshad pa'i bya ba bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad bad kan dang 'dres par gyur pa de la ni rtsub pa dang dro ba'i bag dang 'dres pa'i gso ba'i las su bya ba bya'o/_/
[\[260b.6\]]mkhris gyur rgun chu bu ram chu/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi pa ru shar/_/ldan pa'i bkru sman yid 'ong bas/_/sbyangs la mkhris sel rim pa bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i snying nad la rgun chu dang bu ram shing gi khu ba la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman yid dang 'thad pa btang
[\[260b.7\]]bas sbyangs la dag par gyur nas mkhris pa sel bar byed pa'i thug pa la sogs pa'i rim pa mkhris pa'i rims gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa dag bya'o/_/glo rdol rims kyi mkhris skabs bshad/_/phyi nang gi ni sbyang ba bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las byung ba'i snying
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]nad de la ni glo rdol ba gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa dang /_mkhris pa'i rims gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i sbyang ba lde gus dril zhing phyi ba dang bsku ba dang byug pa dang bkru ba la sogs pa bya ba dang /_de bzhin du nang gi sbyang ba skyug sman dang bkru
[\[261a.2\]]sman la sogs pa dang zhi ba'i bya ba dag phan no/_/pu shel tse dang shing mngar btags/_/kha ra ra bcas pa'i chu blud bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i snying nad la pu shel tse dang shing mngar btags pa'i lde gu kha ra dang sbyar ba chu dang sbyar te blud par
[\[261a.3\]]bya'o/_/ra sna kha ra rgun 'bru dang /_/'tsho byed ut+pal zangs rtsi ba/_/ba la 'bra go ra mnye ba/_/me da gnyis dang ma he'i mar/_/'o mar bcas pa bskol ba ni/_/mkhris gyur snying nad sel byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ra sna la sogs pa'i lde gur byas pa dang /_
[\[261a.4\]]ma he'i mar dang 'o mar bcas pa dang bskol ba ni/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i snying nad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/shing mngar ba spru puN+Da rI/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba ka she ru/_/bca' sga ba lar bcas de dang /_/'o mar bcas dang bca' sgar bskol/_/bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi btab
[\[261a.5\]]pa dang /_/mngar ba'i sde tshan bsdus pa'ang bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing mngar la sogs pa'i sman mar dang 'o mar bcas pa bskol la mar de bsgrangs pa la sbrang rtsi btab pa yang mkhris pa'i snying nad la phan no/_/de bzhin du mngar ba'i sde tshan du gtogs
[\[261a.6\]]pa'i sman cho ga snga ma bzhin du byas pa de yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i snying nad la bsngags pa yin no/_/til mar shing mngar bcas bskol zhing /_/sbrang rtsi btab pa'i 'jam rtsi'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing mngar gyi lde gu snga ma bzhin du bskol ba dang /_til
[\[261a.7\]]mar bskol la sbrang rtsi btab pa'i 'jam rtsi gtang ba yang phan no/_/bad kan las gyur dugs byas la/_/nim pa shu dag chu yis slon/_/rgya sran khu ba rgyam tsha'i chu/_/chang rno blud cing nas zan sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i snying nad la
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]dang por dugs byas la/_de'i 'og tu nim pa dang shu dag bskol ba'i chu'i skyug sman btang zhing slon la rgya sran ku lang+tha la sogs pa'i kha zas sbyin par bya'o/_/shu dag shing kun lan tshwa gnyis/_/dong ga sug smel la la phud/_/nas tshig 'khus thal pi
[\[261b.2\]]pi ling /_/phye ma dro 'jam chur blud pa'am/_/'bras bu'i chu'am rang skyur ram/_/rgya sran ba gcin chang rnying blud/_/ces bya ba la/_shu dag la sogs pa'i sman gyi phye ma chu bskol ba dro 'jam tsam gyi nang du bcug ste blud pa'am/_yang na 'bras bu'i chu la
[\[261b.3\]]sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te blud par bya'o/_/ma nu bca' sga a ru ra/_/zur pa ra sna pi pi ling /_/shu dag bskol te blud pa'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na ma nu la sogs pa'i sman khu cho ga bzhin du bskol te blud na yang phan no/_/de bzhin
[\[261b.4\]]bca' sga a ru ra/_/bong nga dkar po yung ba dang /_/kad pa la ni bskol ba'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du bca' sga la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i chu blud na yang phan no/_/ro hi ta ka a shwang+tha/_/seng ldeng u dum+bA ra dang /_/ardzu na dang pa la sha_/_
[\[261b.5\]]n+ya gro d+ha bskol tsha ba gsum/_/dur byid phye mar bcas lde gu/_/zos te chu tshan rjes 'thungs na/_/bad kan snying nad sel byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing ro hi ta ka la sogs pa bskol ba'i nang du tsha ba gsum dang dur byid kyi phye ma btab ste lde gur byas pa
[\[261b.6\]]de zos la de'i rjes la chu tshan dro 'jam 'thungs na bad kan las gyur pa'i snying nad sel ba yin no/_/bad kan skran skabs bshad mar dang /_/k+Sha ra sna tshogs blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang bad kan gyi snying nad la bad kan gyi skran gso ba'i skabs su
[\[261b.7\]]bshad pa'i sman mar gang dag yin pa dang /_ya bak+Sha ra la sogs pa sna tshogs pa skabs 'di nyid du bshad pa dag kyang blud par bya'o/_/yang na brag zhun bcud len dang /_/tshangs pa'i bcud len sgyu ru ra'i/_/lde gu'am ri byis bshad pa'am/_/bdud
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]rtsi'i mar ni 'dir sbyar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na de la bcud len gyis sbyar bar bya ba'am/_yang na tshangs pa'i bcud kyis len gyi cho ga'i skabs su bshad pa sbyin pa'am/_yang na skyu ru ra'i lde gu de nyid las bshad pa sbyor bar bya ba'am/_yang glo rdol
[\[262a.2\]]skabs su ri byis bshad pa'i sman mar skabs 'dir sbyar zhing sbyin par bya'o/_/gang zhig zas zos gzer gyis 'debs/_/zas zhu gyur nas zhi gyur pa/_/de la ru rta byi dang ga_/lan tshwa gnyis dang seng phrom dang /_/thang shing bong nga dkar por bcas/_/phye ma chu bskol dro
[\[262a.3\]]sbyar blud/_/ces bya ba la/_mi gang zas zos zin nas gzer gyis 'debs la zas de zhu bzhin du 'bri zhing zas zhu bar gyur ba de la ni ru rta la sogs pa'i phye mchu dron dang sbyar te blud par bya'o/_/lan tshwa gnyis ni lce myang tsha dang kha ru tsha'o/_/de dag gi thun tshad ni phye ma zho gnyis
[\[262a.4\]]chu srang gsum gyi nang du bskol te blud par bya'o/_/de yang gzhung las/_phye ma zho gnyis gsher ba'i rdzas/_/srang gsum du ni sbyar te blud/_/ces bshad pa yin no/_/gang zhig zhu nas cher gzir ba/_/de la snum gyi bkru sman ni/_/'bras bu dang ni de bzhin du/_/rtsa ba'i bkru sman
[\[262a.5\]]sbyin par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang zhig zas zhu nas shas cher gzer bar gyur pa de la ni bkru sman seng phrom dang /_pi na ya'i mar dang /_e raN+Da'i til mar dang /_rtsa ba'i bkru sman dra ban ti dang /_sha ma dur byid dang /_dan ti la sogs pa'i bkru sman gyis 'khrur gzhug
[\[262a.6\]]par bya'o/_/rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i bkru sman ni rgyud gzhan las shes par bya ste/_de yang /_rgun 'bru de bzhin byi dang ga_/'bra go pa ru sha ka dang /_/dong ga'am yang na skyu ru ra/_/a ru ra dang ba ru ra/_/u pa tsi tra kam pi l+ya/_/tsi tra ku mud da nyid dang /_/ni la ni ka dang ba ku la/_/pi
[\[262a.7\]]lu 'bras bu'i bkru sman yin/_/dan ti dang ni sab ta la/_/bya nu shang gi tra ban ni/_/sha ma dur byid ka rany+dza/_/pra gi d+ya dang k+Shi ri ni/_/ba da gan di ga ba gyi/_/gi ba k+Sha ra bi sha li/_/ma su ra bi da li nyid/_/rtsa ba'i bkru sman gyur ba yin/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/phal cher rlung ni
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]lam 'gags pa/_/ma zhu'i gnas su 'khru bar 'gyur/_/de la smyung dang smin pa dang /_/sbyang bas bde bar rgyu bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_phal cher te mang du rlung gi lam 'gags shing rgyun srang gi bu gar bde bar rgyur med par gyur pa ni/_ma zhu ba'i gnas su 'khru bar byed cing nad skyed par
[\[262b.2\]]'gyur la rlung de bde bar rgyu zhing gang dag gnas nas gnod pa med par 'gro bar bya la de yang smyung ba dang /_de bzhin du ma zhu ba 'joms pa'i sman gyis smin par bya ba dang /_skyug sman dang bkru sman gyis sbyangs pas bde bar rgyu bar bya'o/_/'bu 'joms pa yi sman kun gyis/_/'bu yi
[\[262b.3\]]snying nad gso bar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bus nyen pa las gyur pa'i snying nad la ni 'bu 'joms par byed pa'i sman thams cad phan pas de gso bar bya'o/_/skom dad kyi gso ba smras pa ni/_/skom dad rlung dang mkhris pa 'joms/_/cho ga phal cher bsngags pa yin/_/kun la phyi
[\[262b.4\]]nang bsil ba dang /_/de bzhin zhi dang sbyang ba bya/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te skom dad thams cad la ni phal cher rlung dang mkhris pa 'joms pa'i cho ga gang dag yin pa de byas na bsngags pa yin no/_/de bzhin du phyi nang nas bsil bar bya ba'i cho ga byas na phan pa dang /_
[\[262b.5\]]de bzhin du zhi ba dang sbyang ba'i cho ga byas na phan pa yin no/_/char chu grang mo sbrang rtsir bcas/_/sa chu'i yon tan de ldan bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_skom dad la char chu grang mo sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba bsngags pa yin no/_/yang sa'i char pa'i chu'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba
[\[262b.6\]]yang de bzhin du bsngags pa yin no/_/bong ba rdza skyogs phye ma'am/_/gshag ma bsregs bcug dwangs mar bcas/_/zhes bya ba la/_char pa dang sa'i chu de la yang bang ba bsregs pa la sogs pa bcug la dwangs mar bcas pa bsngags pa yin no/_/bskol te kha rar bcas
[\[262b.7\]]pa'am/_/dUr ba la sogs rtsa ba lnga/_/bskol te kha ra btab pa'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na chu de dag bskol la bsgrangs te kha ra btab pa yang bsngags pa yin no/_/yang dUr ba la sogs pa'i rtsa ba lnga bskol te bsgrangs pa'i chur khar btab pa bsngags pa yin no/_/
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]'bras yos phye sbyar skyo ma'ang bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang skom dad la ni 'bras yos kyi phye'i skyo mar byas la kha ra btab pa yang bsngags pa yin no/_/nas rjen chag tshe sbrang rtsi dang /_/khar btab pa grang mo phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_chag tshe ni
[\[263a.2\]]nas dral ba'i chan te/_de yang rjen pa las byas pa la sbrang rtsi dang kha ra btab pa grang mo phan pa yin no/_/de bzhin nas thug sA lu dang /_/ko tra pa ni rnying pa ni/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du nas thug dang /_sA lu dang /_ko tra pa ni lo gcig lon pa rnying pa las
[\[263a.3\]]g.yos pa'i zas la sbrang rtsi dang kha ra btab ste bsgrangs pa yang phan no/_/'o ma bsil zhing nus bsil ba'i/_/sman dang bskol ba'i kha zas ni/_/nad pa chu grang gis bkrus nas/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi sbyin pa bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_'o ma lta bu rang bzhin
[\[263a.4\]]bsil ba'i sman dang bskol ba'i kha zas bsgrangs pa de nad pa chu grang gis bkrus nas kha ra dang sbrang rtsi btab pa'i zas de byin na bsngags pa yin no/_/skam sa'i sha khu lan tshwa skyur/_/med cing mar dang brngos pa'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_skam sa'i srog chags kyi
[\[263a.5\]]sha khu lan tshwa dang skyur med pa mar gyis brngos pa de nad pa chu grang gis lus bkrus nas byin na yang bsngags pa yin no/_/de bzhin mung+ga sogs khu ba/_/'tsho byed sde tshan khu bar bcas/_/zhes bya ba la/_mung+ga la sogs pa'i gang bu can gyi 'bru'i khu ba 'tsho byed kyi sde
[\[263a.6\]]tshan gyi sman gyi khu ba dang bcas par blud na yang bsngags pa yin no/_/sna sman 'o ma mar bsil sman/_/bskol ba'am bu ram shing khu phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_'o ma dang mar grang mo dang bskol ba sna nas gtang ba yang phan pa yin no/_/yang na bu ram shing gi khu ba
[\[263a.7\]]'ba' zhig sna nas gtang ba yang phan pa yin no/_/skom sel mkhur ba bkang nas ni/_/mdo yi gnas las bshad pa'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du skom sel zhing zhi bar byed pas mkhur ba bkang nas 'o ma bu ram shing gi khu ba dang kha ra'i chu dang sbrang rtsi'i chu dang rgun chang
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]dang skyur rtsabs la sogs pa kha skam pa la sogs pa sel bar byed pa'i mdo'i gnas su bshad pa byas na phan no/_/tsha rims bshad pa'i lde gu sogs/_/zhes bya ba la/_tsha ba'i rims gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i lde gus bsku ba dang sman chu blugs pa la sogs pa gang dag yin
[\[263b.2\]]pa de yang skom dad sel ba la phan no/_/rtsol ba chung zhing sems dga' dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_las su bya ba bya rtsol gyi rnam pa chung bar bde bar gnas pa dang /_dngos po yid du 'ong ba la sems shing snying dga' ba yang skom dad la phan no/_/chu bo dang ni chen po sogs/_/dran pa dang ni mthong
[\[263b.3\]]ba phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_chu bo chen po dang mtsho dang rdzing bu chen po la sogs pa dran pa dang mthong ba dang gtam du byas pa yang phan no/_/skom dad thams cad spyi'i gso ba bshad nas/_khyad par gyi gso ba bshad pa ni/_skom dad rlung las gyur pa la/_/zho ni bu ram bcas pa
[\[263b.4\]]bsngags/_/sha khus nyams brtas bi da ri/_/sogs te bskol nas bsgrangs pa phan/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/rlung las gyur pa'i skom dad la ni/_zho'i nang du bu ram btab pa bsngags pa yin no/_/yang de bzhin du sha khu byin zhing nyams brta ba dang /_bi da
[\[263b.5\]]ri la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i chu blud na yang phan pa yin no/_/mkhris gyur u dum+bA ra smin/_/khu bar kha ra btab pa phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skom dad la ni u dum+bA ra smin pa'i khu bar kha ra btab pa phan pa yin no/_/yang na de bskol bsgrangs
[\[263b.6\]]pa'am/_/sha ri ba sogs sde tshan chu/_/zhes bya ba la/_/yang u dum+bA ra bskol ba'i chu bsgrangs pa'i nang du kha ra btab pa yang phan no/_/yang na sha ri ba la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang /_chu bskol ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du kha ra btab pa yang phan pa yin no/_/sde tshan de 'dra bskol
[\[263b.7\]]khu ba/_/bsgrangs pa kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas/_/zhes bya ba la/_de zhes bya ba ni sha ri ba'i sde tshan la snyeg ste/_sha ri ba'i sde tshan ltar tsha ba sel bar byed pa'i sde tshan ba ru sha ka la sogs pa'i sman sde dang sle tres la sogs pa'i sman gyi sde tshan de dag bskol ba'i khu ba
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]bsgrangs pa'i nang du kha ra dang sbrang rtsi btab ste blud na yang phan no/_/mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan dang /_/'o ma can shing bskol de bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du rgun 'bru la sogs pa mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan bskol ba'i chu
[\[264a.2\]]bsgrangs pa la kha ra dang sbrang rtsi btab pa blud pa'am/_yang n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa 'o ma can gyi shing bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa la yang de bzhin du kha ra dang sbrang rtsi btab pa blud na yang phan pa yin no/_/byi zi pu ra rgun 'bru dang /_/lcang ma n+ya gro d+ha'i lo ma/_/ku sha
[\[264a.3\]]'jag ma'i rtsa ba dang /_/shing mngar chu ni bskol ba'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_byi zi pu ra zhes bya ba skyur rtsi chen po la sogs pa sman gyi 'o ma dang ku sha la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang /_shing mngar lde gur byas la bskol te bsgrangs pa blud na phan no/_/rims la phan
[\[264a.4\]]sman rgun 'bru sogs/_/snying po lnga yi chu blud phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgun 'bru la sogs pa rims la phan pa'i sman rims gso ba'i skabs su rgun 'bru shing mngar ma du ka la sogs pa'i skyo ma'am khu ba grang mo blud na yang phan no/_/yang na snying po lnga'i chu ste/_sbrang
[\[264a.5\]]rtsi 'bra go rgun 'bru dang /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa khrag mkhris gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa blud na yang phan pa yin no/_/bad kan las gyur nim pa ni/_/chu mchog bskol bas slon du gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i skom dad la ni nim pa chur
[\[264a.6\]]bskol te slon du gzhug pa yin no/_/bil ba 'u su tsha ba lnga/_/'jag ma kru trug tres bskol blud/_/yang na skyer pa chur bskol ba/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi btab pa blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bil ba la sogs pa bskol ba'i chur kha ra dang sbrang rtsi btab pa blud na phan no/_/mung+ga'i
[\[264a.7\]]khu ba pa to la/_/nim pa'i lo ma tsha gsum bcas/_/nas zan mkhur bkang rnon po dang /_/sna sman lde gu rnon po'ang bsten/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i skom dad la mung+ga'i khu ba tsha ba gsum la sogs pa sbyin par bya zhing /_de bzhin du nas kyi zan dang mkhur ba
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]bkang ba rnon po dang /_sna sman dang lde gu rnon po bsten par bya'o/_/nyes kun ma zhu des 'joms pas/_/de bzhin slon gyi bya ba'ang bsngags/_/go bye shu dag tsha ba gsum/_/'bras bu skyur pa'ang chu tshan nam/_/zho ga chu dang btung ba'ang bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[264b.2\]]slon nad gang nyes pa kun de gsum char las byung ba gang yin pa de bzhin du ma zhu ba las byung ba'i skom dad gang yin pa de la ni/_de gnyis 'joms par byed pa'i gso bas gso ste/_nad gzhi thams cad las byung ba'i slon pa la ni skom dad kyi rjes su
[\[264b.3\]]dpags te nad kun 'joms pa'i gso ba bya ba bsngags pa yin la/_ma zhu ba las byung ba'i slon nad la ni de'i tshul las dpags te ma zhu ba 'joms pa'i bya ba bsngags pa dang /_de bzhin du skyug sman btang ste slon du gzhug pa bsngags pa dang /_de bzhin
[\[264b.4\]]du ma zhu ba'i skom dad la ni 'bras bu skyur ba'i chu'am chu tshan nam zhog chu dang go bye la sogs pa'i sman sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o/_/zas kyi nyes byung dus shes pas/_/thug sla'am skyo ma bsil ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_zas kyi nyes pa las skom dad skyes par gyur
[\[264b.5\]]pa gang yin pa de la ni thug pa sla mo rkyang rkyang po'am bsil ba blud par bya'o/_/de yang dus shes pa'i tshul gyis blud par bya ste/_dus 'di'i tshe na ni thug pa blud par bya'o/_/dus 'di'i tshe na ni skyo ma blud par bya'o/_/zhes bye brag shes shing nad kyi dmigs kyang shes par bya ste/_
[\[264b.6\]]rlung dang bad kan gyi shas che ba la ni thug pa rkyang rkyang po blud par bya la/_mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi shas che ba la ni phye ma la sogs pa'i skyo ma blud par bya'o/_/de yang /_'bras yos phye chu se'u 'bru dang /_/pi pi ling bca' sgar bskol ba/_/thug pa yin te me drod skyed/_/rlung dang
[\[264b.7\]]bshang ba bde rgyu byed/_/phye dang zhun mar sbrus pa ni/_/chu grang la ni bskol gyur pa/_/shin tu sla min ska ma yin/_/skyo ma zhes ni bya bar bshad/_/ces bya ba yin no/_/ngal bas skom la sha khu'am/_skyom kha rar bcas pa blud/_/ces bya ba la/_ngal ba las skom dad du gyur pa la ni sha khu blud
[\[265a\]]
